[sujeto(['Moreover,', studies, with, 'MG63', 'osteoblast-like', cells, indicate, that, 'CaP1', is, not, toxic, and]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([bone, mineralization, 'and,', 'thus,', holds, considerable, potential, for, treating, bone, 'diseases,', such, as, osteoporosis])].

[sujeto(['Candida', albicans, is, one, of, the, most, important, opportunistic, 'pathogens,']), verbo([causing]), complemento([both, mucosal, candidiasis, and, 'life-threatening', systemic, infections])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([extensive, divergence, between, the, biofilm, regulators, of, the, two, species])].

[sujeto(['Only', three, '(', 'Efg1,', 'Bcr1', and, 'Ace2)']), verbo([have]), complemento([similar, effects, on, 'C'])].

[sujeto(['Srv2/CAP', is, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['actin-binding', protein, with, important, roles, in, driving, cellular, actin, dynamics, in, diverse, 'animal,', 'fungal,', and, plant, species])].
[sujeto(['However,', there]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, conflicting, reports, about, whether, the, activities, of, 'Srv2/CAP', are, 'conserved,', particularly, between, yeast, and, mammalian, homologs])].
[sujeto(['Yeast', 'Srv2']), verbo([has]), complemento([two, distinct, functions, in, actin, 'turnover:', its, hexameric, 'N-terminal-half', enhances, 'cofilin-mediated', severing, of, 'filaments,', while, its, 'C-terminal-half', catalyzes, dissociation, of, cofilin, from, 'ADP-actin', monomers, and, stimulates, nucleotide, exchange])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'CAP1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, shorter, 'N-terminal', oligomerization, sequence, compared, with, 'Srv2,', we, find, that, the, 'N-terminal-half', of, 'CAP1', '(', 'N-CAP1)', forms, hexameric, structures, with, six, 'protrusions,', similar, to, 'N-Srv2'])].
[sujeto(['Further,', 'N-CAP1', autonomously]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'F-actin', and, decorates, the, sides, and, ends, of, 'filaments,', altering, 'F-actin', structure, and, enhancing, 'cofilin-mediated', severing])].
[sujeto(['These', activities, depend, on]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([surface, residues, on, the, 'helical-folded', domain])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'N-CAP1']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([yeast, 'cofilin-mediated', 'severing,', and, 'conversely,', yeast, 'N-Srv2', enhances, human, 'cofilin-mediated', 'severing,', highlighting, the, mechanistic, conservation, between, yeast, and, mammals])].
[sujeto(['Further,', we, demonstrate, that, the, 'C-terminal', 'actin-binding', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-sheet', domain, of, 'CAP1', is, sufficient, to, catalyze, 'nucleotide-exchange', of, 'ADP-actin', 'monomers,', while, in, the, presence, of, cofilin, this, activity, additionally]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, 'WH2', domain])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', the, 'structures,', 'activities,', and, mechanisms, of, mouse, and, yeast, 'Srv2/CAP', homologs, are, remarkably, well, 'conserved,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, same, activities, and, mechanisms, underlie, many, of, the, diverse, 'actin-based', functions, ascribed, to, 'Srv2/CAP', homologs, in, different, organisms])].
[sujeto(['The', 5, '\'', cap, of, human, messenger, 'RNA', consists, of, an, inverted, 7, -, methylguanosine, linked, to, the, first]), verbo([transcribed]), complemento([nucleotide, by, a, unique, 5, '\'', -, 5, '\'', triphosphate, bond, followed, by, 2, '\'', -, 'O-ribose', methylation, of, the, first, and, often, the, second, transcribed, 'nucleotides,', likely, serving, to, modify, efficiency, of, transcript, 'processing,', translation, and, stability])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, validation, of, a, human, enzyme, that, methylates, the, ribose, of, the, second, transcribed, nucleotide, encoded, by, 'FTSJD1,', henceforth, renamed, 'HMTR2', to, reflect, function])].
[sujeto(['Purified', recombinant, hMTr2, protein, transfers, a, methyl, group, from, 'S-adenosylmethionine', to, the, 2, '\'', -, 'O-ribose', of, the, second, nucleotide, of, messenger, 'RNA', and, small]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['RNA'])].
[sujeto(['Neither', 'N(7)', methylation, of, the, guanosine, cap, nor, 2, '\'', -, 'O-ribose', methylation, of, the, first]), verbo([transcribed]), complemento([nucleotide, are, required, for, 'hMTr2,', but, the, presence, of, cap1, methylation, increases, hMTr2, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', hMTr2, protein, is, distributed, throughout, the, nucleus, and, 'cytosol,', in, contrast, to, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hMTr1])].
[sujeto(['High', molecular, weight, hyperbranched, polyglycerol, '(', 'HPG)', was, selected, for, development, as, a, soluble, polymer, support, for, the]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([selection, and, release, of, 'primary-amine', containing, peptides, from, a, complex, mixture])].
[sujeto(['HPG']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, functionalized, with, 'ester-linked', aldehyde, groups, that, can, bind, 'primary-amine', containing, peptides, via, a, reductive, alkylation, reaction])].
[sujeto(['Following', the, removal, of, unbound, peptides, and, 'reagents,', subsequent, hydrolysis, of, the, ester, linker]), verbo([releases]), complemento([the, bound, peptide, into, solution, for, analysis, by, mass, spectrometry])].
[sujeto(['Released', peptides]), verbo([retain]), complemento([the, linker, moiety, and, are, therefore, characteristically, 'mass-shifted'])].
[sujeto(['Four', 'water-soluble', cleavable, aldehyde, polymers, '(', 'CAP1,', 'CAP2,', 'CAP3,', and, 'CAP4)', ranging, in, types, of, linker, 'groups,', length, of, the, linker, 'groups,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, prepared, and, 'characterized,', each, demonstrating, the, ability, to, selectively, enrich, and, sequence, 'primary-amine', peptides, from, a, complex, human, proteome, containing, blocked, '(', dimethylated, 'amine)', and, unblocked, '(', primary, 'amine)', peptides])].

[sujeto(['Interferon-induced', proteins, with, tetratricopeptide, repeats, '(', 'IFITs)', are, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([effectors, of, innate, immunity, that, inhibit, viral, replication, by, incompletely, understood, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, the, ability, of, 'IFIT', family, members, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'cap1-,', 'cap0-', and, 5, '\'', 'ppp-', mRNAs, and, inhibit, their, translation])].
[sujeto(['The', 2, '\'', -, 'O-methylation', abrogated, 'IFIT1/mRNA', 'interaction,', whereas, 'IFIT1B']), verbo([retained]), complemento([the, ability, to, bind, 'cap1-mRNA,', albeit, with, reduced, affinity, '(', 'K1/2,app', &, 'acirc;&circ;&frac14;450', 'nM)'])].

[sujeto(['In', falling, ball, viscosimetry, it]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, reduction, in, viscosity, that, could, be, attributed, to, a, decrease, in, the, concentration, of, polymeric, actin])].

[sujeto(['To', evaluate, 'GATA', proteins, as, potential]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'lead,', spectroscopically, monitored, 'metal-binding', titrations, were, used, to, measure, the, affinity, of, 'Pb2+', for, the, 'C-terminal', 'zinc-binding', domain, from, chicken, 'GATA-1', '(', 'CF)', and, the, 'double-finger', domain, from, human, 'GATA-1', '(', 'DF)'])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Pb2+', was, able, to, displace]), verbo([bound]), complemento(['Zn2+', from, 'CF', and, 'DF'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', addition, of, 'Pb2+,', 'GATA', shows, a]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([ability, to, bind, to, 'DNA', and, subsequently, activate, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, transcriptional, activity, of, 'GATA', proteins, are, most, likely, to, be, targeted, by, 'Pb2+', in, cells, and, tissues, that, sequester, 'Pb2+', in, 'vivo,', which, include, the, brain, and, the, heart])].
[sujeto(['Vertebrate', 'GATA', proteins]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([processes, that, are, vital, to, 'development,', and, each, possesses, two, tandem, 'GATA', finger, 'domains:', an, 'N-terminal', 'GATA', finger, and, a, 'C-terminal', 'GATA', finger])].
[sujeto(['These', 'GATA', fingers]), verbo([require]), complemento(['Zn(2+)', to, 'fold,', to, bind, 'DNA', recognition, 'elements,', and, to, regulate, transcription])].
[sujeto(['While', the, 'GATA-1', 'C-terminal', finger, is, necessary, and, sufficient, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, single, 'GATA', 'DNA', 'sites,', the, 'N-terminal', finger, interacts, with, 'DNA', such, that, the, double, finger, unit, '(', 'DF', 'domain)', has, a, binding, and, transactivation, profile, that, is, tuned, by, the, 'DNA-binding', site])].
[sujeto(['Co(2+)', was, used, as, a, spectroscopic, probe, in, a, series, of, competition, titrations, to, determine, the, affinity, of, 'Co(2+)', and, 'Zn(2+)', for, the, 'C-terminal', finger, from, chicken, 'GATA-1', and, the, double, finger, from, human, 'GATA-1', '(', referred, to, in, this]), verbo([report]), complemento([as, 'CF', and, 'DF)'])].
[sujeto(['For', 'DF,', these, experiments, yielded, equilibrium, constants, for, the, process, of, two, 'M(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, form, 'M(2+)(2)-DF', of, 'beta(2)(Co)', =, 2.5, '(', +, /, -, 1.6, ')', x, 10, '(', 14, ')', 'M(-2)', and, 'beta(2)(Zn)', =, 6.3, '(', +, /, -, 2.5, ')', x, 10, '(', 20, ')', 'M(-2)'])].
[sujeto(['A', detailed, analysis, of, these, data]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, 'N-terminal', and, 'C-terminal', fingers, of, 'DF', act, as, independent, and, identical, 'Zn(2+)-binding', sites, and, each, finger, binds, 'Zn(2+)', with, an, affinity, equivalent, to, that, of, 'CF'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Dof', '(', 'DNA-binding', with, one, 'finger)', proteins, are, plant, transcription, factors, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, highly, conserved, 'DNA-binding', 'domain,', called, the, 'Dof', domain])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Dof', 'domain,', which, is, composed, of, 52, amino, acid, 'residues,', is, similar, to, the, 'Cys2/Cys2', zinc, finger, 'DNA-binding', domain, of, 'GATA1', and, steroid, hormone, 'receptors,', but]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, longer, putative, loop, than, that, in, the, case, of, these, zinc, finger, domains])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DNA-binding', function, of, ascorbate, oxidase, gene]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'AOBP),', a, 'Dof', 'protein,', was, investigated, by, gel, retardation, analysis])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', heavy, metals, such, as, 'Co(II),', 'Ni(II),', 'Cd(II),', 'Cu(II),', 'Hg(II),', 'Fe(II),', and, 'Fe(III)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'DNA-binding', activity, of, the, 'Dof', domain])].
[sujeto(['Emerging', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, microRNAs, have, key, roles, in, regulating, various, normal, physiological, 'processes,', whereas, their, deregulated, expression, is, correlated, with, various, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Recent', work, indicated, that, 'miR-146a']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, close, relationship, with, inflammation, and, autoimmune, diseases])].
[sujeto(['miR-146-deficient', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, some, abnormal, hematopoietic, 'phenotypes,', suggesting, the, potential, functions, of, 'miR-146', in, hematopoietic, development])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'miR-146b', was, consistently, 'up-regulated', in, both, 'K562', and, 'CD34(+)', hematopoietic, 'stem/progenitor', cells, '(', 'HSPCs)', undergoing, either, erythroid, or, megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, maturation, of, 'K562', cells, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, excess, 'miR-146b', but, inhibited, by, decreased, 'miR-146b', levels])].
[sujeto(['More', 'importantly,', an, mRNA, encoding, receptor, tyrosine, 'kinase,', namely, 'platelet-derived', growth, factor, receptor, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'PDGFRA),', was, identified, and, validated, as, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-146b', in, hematopoietic, cells])].
[sujeto(['miR-146b', could, ultimately, affect, the, expression, of, the, 'GATA-1', 'gene,', which, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'HEY1', '(', 'Hairy/enhancer-of-split', related, with, 'YRPW', motif, protein, 1, ')', ',', a, transcriptional, 'repressor,', via, inhibition, of, the, 'PDGFRA/JNK/JUN/HEY1', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Lentivirus-mediated', gene, transfer, also, demonstrated, that, the, overexpression, of, 'miR-146b']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([erythropoiesis, and, megakaryocytopoiesis, of, 'HSPCs', via, its, regulation, on, the, 'PDGFRA', gene, and, effects, on, 'GATA-1', expression])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, confirmed, that, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GATA-1', to, the, 'miR-146b', promoter, and, induction, of, 'miR-146b', during, hematopoietic, maturation, were, dependent, on, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'miR-146b,', 'PDGFRA,', and, 'GATA-1', formed, a, regulatory, circuit, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['GATA1', is, indispensable, for, survival, and, terminal, differentiation, of, 'erythroid,', megakaryocytic, and, eosinophilic, 'progenitors,', whereas, 'GATA2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([proliferation, and, maintenance, of, hematopoietic, stem, and, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', levels, of, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', are, primarily]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, the, transcriptional, level, through, 'auto-', and, reciprocal, regulatory, networks, formed, by, these, 'GATA', factors])].
[sujeto(['The', dynamic, and, strictly, controlled, change, of, expression, from, 'GATA2', to, 'GATA1', during, erythropoiesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, referred, to, as, 'GATA', factor, 'switching,', which, plays, a, crucial, role, in, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['The', regulatory, network, comprising, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', gives, rise, to, the, 'stage-specific', changes, in, 'Gata1', and, 'Gata2', gene, expression, during, erythroid, 'differentiation,', which]), verbo([ensures]), complemento([specific, expression, of, early, and, late, erythroid, genes, at, each, stage])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, shed, light, on, the, 'genome-wide', binding, profiles, of, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2,', and, the, significance, of, epigenetic, modification, of, 'Gata1', gene, during, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Although', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, several, miRNAs, that, regulate, erythroid, commitment, and, 'differentiation,', we, do, not, understand, the, mechanism, by, which, the, crucial, erythroid, transcription, 'factors,', 'GATA-1and', 'NF-E2', directly, regulate, and, control, differentiation, via, miRNA, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, 'miR-199b-5p', in, erythroid, cells, occurred, in, a, 'GATA-1-', and, 'NF-E2-dependent', manner, during, erythrocyte, maturation])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2']), verbo([bound]), complemento([upstream, of, the, 'miR-199b', gene, locus, and, activated, its, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, identified, 'c-Kit', as, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'miR-199b-5p', in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results, establish, a, functional, link, among, the, erythroid, transcription, factors, 'GATA-1/NF-E2,', 'miR-199b-5p', and, 'c-Kit,', and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, coupling, of, transcription, and, 'post-transcription', regulation, in, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Key', transcriptional, regulators, of, terminal, 'erythropoiesis,', such, as, 'GATA-binding', factor, 1, '(', 'GATA1)', and, 'T-cell', acute, lymphocytic, leukemia, protein, 1, '(', 'TAL1),']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, 'characterized,', but, transcription, factors, and, cofactors, and, their, expression, modulations, have, not, yet, been, explored, on, a, global, scale])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, use, global, gene, expression, analysis, to, identify, 28, transcription, factors, and, 19, transcriptional, cofactors]), verbo([induced]), complemento([during, terminal, erythroid, differentiation, whose, promoters, are, enriched, for, binding, by, 'GATA1', and, 'TAL1'])].
[sujeto(['TFDP2', is, a, critical, cofactor]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, proper, cell, cycle, control, and, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['GATA1', and, 'TAL1', are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, regulatory, regions, of, 'Tfdp2', and, upregulate, its, expression, and, knockdown, of, 'Tfdp2', results, in, significantly, reduced, rates, of, proliferation, as, well, as, reduced, upregulation, of, many, 'erythroid-important', genes])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'Tfdp2', also, globally]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, normal, downregulation, of, many, 'E2F2', target, 'genes,', including, those, that, regulate, the, cell, 'cycle,', causing, cells, to, accumulate, in, 'S', phase, and, resulting, in, increased, erythrocyte, size])].
[sujeto(['Activin', 'A,', a, member, of, the, transforming, growth, factor, '(', 'TGF)-&Icirc;&sup2;', 'superfamily,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, erythropoiesis, of, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', a, luciferase, reporter, assay, showed, that, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([activin, 'A-induced', &, 'Icirc;&para;-globin', promoter, activation, in, 'K562', erythroblast, cells, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', also]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, activation, of, activin, 'A-induced', &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin', promoter])].
[sujeto(['IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', reduced, the, mRNA, expression, of, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin,', &, 'Icirc;&para;-globin,', 'NF-E2p45,', and, 'GATA-1']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, activin, 'A'])].
[sujeto(['The', results, also, showed, that, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['c-Jun', expression, when, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;Bp65', and, 'c-Jun', bound, to, two, 'AP-1-binding', sites, on, the, 'c-Jun', promoter])].
[sujeto(['The', luciferase, activity, of, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin', and, &, 'Icirc;&para;-globin', promoters, were]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'wild-type', 'c-Jun', and, eliminated, by, 'dominant-negative', '(', 'DN)', 'c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['The', suppressive, effects, of, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', on, the, mRNA, expression, of, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin', and, &, 'Icirc;&para;-globin', were, absent, in, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['DN', 'c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'NF-E2', to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([activin, 'A-induced', &, 'Icirc;&para;-globin', promoter, activation, decreased, when, 'c-Jun', was, 'present,', and, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', treatment, further, enhanced, the, decreasing, effect, of, 'c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, revealed, that, 'NF-E2p45']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, upstream, regulatory, element, '(', 'HS-40)', of, the, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin', gene, cluster, in, response, to, activin, 'A,', whereas, 'c-Jun', eliminated, this, binding])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', modulates, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B/c-Jun', to, antagonize, activin, 'A-mediated', 'NF-E2', transcriptional, activity, on, globin, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Elucidation', of, the, genetic, pathways, that, control, red, blood, cell, development]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, central, goal, of, erythropoiesis, research, over, the, past, decade])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', data, from, several, recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, new, insights, into, the, regulation, of, erythroid, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', profiling, demonstrates, that, erythropoiesis, is, mainly, controlled, by, a, small, group, of, 'lineage-restricted', transcription, factors, '[', 'Gata']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'Gata1),', 'T', cell, acute, lymphocytic, leukemia, 1, protein, '(', 'Tal1),', and, 'Erythroid', 'Kruppel-like', factor, '(', 'EKLF;', henceforth, referred, to, as, 'Klf1)]'])].
[sujeto(['Binding-site', mapping, using, 'ChIP-Seq', indicates, that, most, 'DNA-bound', 'Gata1', and, 'Tal1', proteins, are, contained, within, higher, order, complexes, '(', 'Ldb1', 'complexes)', that, include, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([adapters, 'Ldb1', and, 'Lmo2'])].
[sujeto(['Ldb1', complexes]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['Klf1,', and, 'Ldb1', 'complex-binding', sites, frequently, colocalize, with, 'Klf1', at, erythroid, genes, and, 'cis-regulatory', 'elements,', indicating, strong, functional, synergy, between, 'Gata1,', 'Tal1,', and, 'Klf1'])].
[sujeto(['Together', with, new, data, demonstrating, that, 'Ldb1', can]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['long-range', 'promoter-enhancer', 'interactions,', these, findings, provide, a, foundation, for, the, first, comprehensive, models, of, the, global, regulation, of, erythroid, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto([1, axis, to, 'explore,', at, the, systems, 'level,', dynamic, relationships, between, transcription, factor, '(', 'TF)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, global, gene, expression, programs, as, multipotent, cells, differentiate])].
[sujeto(['Our', analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento(['(', 1, ')', differential, complexity, of, sequence, motifs, bound, by, 'GATA1,', 'GATA2,', and, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, ;, '(', 2, ')', the, scope, and, interplay, of, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', programs, 'within,', and, during, transitions, 'between,', different, cell, 'compartments,', and, the, extent, of, their, 'hard-wiring', by, 'DNA', 'motifs;', '(', 3, ')', the, potential, to, predict, gene, expression, trajectories, based, on, global, associations, between, 'TF-binding', data, and]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'expression;', and, '(', 4, ')', how, dynamic, modeling, of, 'DNA-binding', and, gene, expression, data, can, be, used, to, infer, regulatory, logic, of, 'TF', circuitry])].
[sujeto(['Gata1', hematopoietic, regulatory, domain, '(', 'G1HRD)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, recapitulate, endogenous, 'Gata1', gene, expression, in, transgenic, mouse, assays, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'CP2-binding', sites, also, moderately]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['G1HRD', activity])].
[sujeto(['The', combined, mutation, of, the, 'CP2-binding', sites, and, the, 'GATA-palindrome', motif, resulted, in, complete]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'G1HRD', activity])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'GFP', expression, was, aberrantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, 'HSCs', and, was, associated, with, decreases, in, 'DNA', methylation, and, abundant, 'GATA2', binding, to, the, transgenic, 'MG-GFP', allele])].
[sujeto(['The', 3.2, -, kb, sequences, interspaced, between, the, 'Gata1', hematopoietic, enhancer, and, the, double, 'GATA-motif', were, able, to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento(['DNA', methyltransferase, 1, ',', thereby, exerting, a, 'cis-repressive', function, in, the, 'HSC-like', cell, line])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, the, 3.2, -, kb, interspacing, sequences, inactivate, 'Gata1', by]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento(['DNA-methylation', in, the, 'HSCs'])].
[sujeto(['The', intense, physiologic, demand, to, generate, vast, numbers, of, red, blood, cells]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, establishment, of, a, complex, genetic, network, by, the, master, regulatory, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', and, its, coregulators])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, the, crucial, 'GATA-1', coregulator, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1),', a, component, of, the, 'Mediator', 'complex,', 'Med1,', facilitates, 'GATA-1-dependent', transcription, at, select]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, and, controls, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['It', is, not, known, to, what, extent, 'Med1', contributes, to, 'GATA-1', function, or, whether, 'Med1', controls, a, large, or, restricted, cohort, of, genes, that, are, not]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, genetic, complementation, assay, in, 'GATA-1-null', erythroid, 'cells,', we, demonstrate, that, 'Med1', and, another, 'Mediator', 'component,', 'Med25,']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, restricted, cohort, of, genes, that, are, predominantly, not, controlled, by, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Most', of, these, genes, were, not]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Med1', in, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Loss-of-function', analyses, with, 'GATA-1-independent', 'Med1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, indicate, that, 'Rrad,', which, encodes, a, small, 'GTPase', induced, during, human, 'erythropoiesis,', conferred, erythroid, cell, survival])].
[sujeto(['Notch', signaling]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, linked, to, impaired, erythropoietic, and, megakaryopoietic, development, of, 'CD34+', progenitor, 'cells,', but, its, role, in, 'MDS', is, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, the, transcriptional, activity, of, 'Notch', pathway, elements, and, its, association, with, the, key, erythroid, factor, globin, transcription, factor, 1, '(', 'GATA1)', and, the, apoptosis, regulatory, gene, 'B-cell', 'lymphoma-xl', '(', 'BCLxl)', in, 'MDS'])].
[sujeto(['The', methylation, of, 'GATA1', erythroid, promoter, 'CpG', dinucleotides, flanking, 'cis-regulatory', 'elements,', including, an, 'N-box', suppressor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, for, 'HES1', and, a, 'GATA-box', binding, 'site,', was, examined, in, normal, and, 'MDS', erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, a, kinetic, in, vitro, model, of, 'MDS', erythropoiesis, using, 'CD34+', bone, marrow, cells, from, healthy, donors, '(', n, =, 7, ')', and, patients, with, 'MDS', '(', low, 'risk:', 'RA/n', =, 6, ',', 'RARS/n', =, 3, ;, high, 'risk:', 'RAEB/n', =, 4, ',', 'RAEB-T/n', =, 2, ')'])].
[sujeto(['For', the, 'Notch', pathway, 'elements,', no, conclusive, expression, differences, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([between, 'MDS', and, normal, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['But', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([steadily, 'up-regulated', 'RNA', expression, of, 'GATA1', and, of, 'BCLxl', during, late, normal, erythropoietic, differentiation])].

[sujeto(['Hypermethylation', of, 'CpG', dinucleotides, flanking, the, repressor, 'HES1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, within, the, 5, '\'', region, of, 'GATA1', was, detected, particularly, during, late, 'MDS', erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['The', higher, residual, 5, '\'', -, 'GATA1', methylation, values, in, 'MDS', erythropoiesis, but, decremental]), verbo([loss]), complemento([thereof, in, normal, erythropoiesis, suggest, a, gene, dose, effect, for, 'GATA1', during, erythropoiesis, being, finely, tuned, by, 'CpG', methylation])].
[sujeto(['Using', knockdowns, with, morpholinos, and, cell, sorting, analysis, in, transgenic, zebrafish, 'embryos,', we, show, that, 'GATA-1', directly]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'Mfrn1'])].
[sujeto(['Mutagenesis', of, individual, 'GATA-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cis, elements, '(', 'GBE)', demonstrated, that, at, least, two, of, the, three, 'GBE', within, this, 'CRM', are, functionally, required, for, 'GATA-mediated', transcription, of, 'Mfrn1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, genetic, regulation, of, mitochondrial, function, and, iron, homeostasis, 'and,', more, 'generally,', illustrate, the, utility, of, 'genome-wide', 'ChIP', analysis, combined, with, zebrafish, transgenesis, for, identifying, 'long-range', transcriptional, enhancers, that, regulate, tissue, development])].
[sujeto(['Developmental', control, mechanisms, often, use, multimeric, complexes, containing, transcription, 'factors,', 'coregulators,', and, additional, 'non-DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([components])].
[sujeto(['We', analyzed, the, function, of, components, of, a, complex, containing, master, regulators, of, hematopoiesis, '(', 'GATA-1', and, 'Scl/TAL1)', and, the, 'non-DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([components, 'ETO2,', the, 'LIM', domain, protein, 'LMO2,', and, the, chromatin, looping, factor, 'LDB1'])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', we, discovered, that, 'ETO2', and, 'LMO2']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([distinct, 'target-gene', ensembles, in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['ETO2', commonly, repressed, 'GATA-1', function, via]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento([histone, 'H3', 'acetylation,', although, it, also, regulated, methylation, of, histone, 'H3', at, lysine, 27, at, select, loci])].
[sujeto(['Prior', studies, defined, multiple, modes, by, which, 'GATA-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([target, genes, with, or, without, the, coregulator, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)'])].
[sujeto(['As', 'LMO2', controls, 'hematopoiesis,', its, dysregulation, is, 'leukemogenic,', and, its, influence, on, 'GATA', factor, function, is, 'unknown,', this, mechanistic, link]), verbo([has]), complemento([important, biological, and, pathophysiological, implications])].
[sujeto(['The', demonstration, that, 'ETO2', and, 'LMO2', exert, qualitatively, distinct, functions, at, endogenous, loci, illustrates, how, components, of, complexes, containing, master, developmental, regulators, can, impart, the, capacity, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([unique, cohorts, of, target, 'genes,', thereby, diversifying, complex, function])].
[sujeto(['Suppression', of, programmed, cell, death, is, also, thought, to, be, critical, for, this, 'process;', 'however,', the, link, between, these, two, features, of, erythropoiesis]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, elusive])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, the, 'POZ-Kr&Atilde;&frac14;ppel', family, transcription, 'factor,', 'LRF', '(', also, known, as, 'Zbtb7a/Pokemon),', is, a, direct]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'GATA1', and, plays, an, essential, antiapoptotic, role, during, terminal, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, loss, of, 'Lrf', leads, to, lethal, anemia, in, 'embryos,', due, to, increased, apoptosis, of, 'late-stage', erythroblasts])].
[sujeto(['This', programmed, cell, death, is, 'Arf', and, p53, independent, and, is, instead]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, upregulation, of, the, proapoptotic, factor, 'Bim'])].
[sujeto(['In', strong, support, of, this, 'mechanism,', genetic, 'Bim']), verbo([loss]), complemento([delays, the, lethality, of, 'Lrf-deficient', embryos, and, rescues, their, anemia, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data, define, a, key, transcriptional, cascade, for, effective, 'erythropoiesis,', whereby, 'GATA-1']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento(['BIM-mediated', apoptosis, via, 'LRF'])].
[sujeto([1]), verbo([bind]), complemento([each, other, on, 'DNA', to, block, transcriptional, programs, of, undesired, lineage, during, hematopoietic, commitment])].
[sujeto([1, are, blocked, at, the, blast, stage, but]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, molecular, removal, '(', 'downregulation)', of, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, or, addition, '(', 'upregulation)', of, 'GATA-1', by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([terminal, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto([1, in, 'MEL', 'cells,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([conditionally, activated, a, transgenic, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, -, dependent, transcriptome, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-1', in, 'MEL', 'cells,', including, 'CCAAT/enhancer', binding, protein, alpha, '(', 'Cebpa)', and, 'core-binding', 'factor,', beta, subunit, '(', 'Cbfb),', which, encode, two, key, hematopoietic, transcription, factors])].
[sujeto([1]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto([1, and, 'GATA-1']), verbo([involves]), complemento([quantitative, increases, in, a, transcriptionally, active, chromatin, 'mark:', acetylation, of, histone, 'H3K9'])].
[sujeto([1, or, inhibition, of, 'GATA-1', efficiently, reverses, the, transcriptional, block, imposed, by, 'GATA-1', and]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, activation, of, a, myeloid, transcriptional, program, directed, by, 'PU'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, 'FOG-1', binds, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', to, facilitate, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, maturation])].
[sujeto(['However,', little, is, known, about, the, function, of, 'FOG-1', during, myeloid, and, lymphoid, development, or, how, 'FOG-1', expression, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, any, tissue])].
[sujeto(['Zebrafish', 'FOG-1', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, early, hematopoietic, 'cells,', as, well, as, 'heart,', 'viscera,', and, paraspinal, 'neurons,', suggesting, that, it, has, multifaceted, functions, in, organogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'FOG-1', is, dispensable, for, endoderm, specification, but, is, required, for, endoderm, patterning, affecting, the, expression, of, 'late-stage', 'T-cell', 'markers,', independent, of, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['The', suppression, of, 'FOG-1,', in, the, presence, of, normal, 'GATA-1', 'levels,']), verbo([induces]), complemento([severe, anemia, and, thrombocytopenia, and, expands, 'myeloid-progenitor', 'cells,', indicating, that, 'FOG-1', is, required, during, 'erythroid/myeloid', commitment])].
[sujeto(['To', functionally, interrogate, whether, 'GATA-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['FOG-1', in, 'vivo,', we, used, bioinformatics, combined, with, transgenic, assays])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, importance, of, the, 'GC-rich', region, adjacent, to, the, 3, '\'', -, end, of, this, 'GATA', site]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, also, suggested])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, this, 'GC-rich', region, contains, five, contiguous, deoxyguanosine, residues, '(', 'G(5)', 'string)', that, are]), verbo([bound]), complemento([by, multiple, nuclear, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', deletion, of, one, deoxyguanosine, residue, from, the, 'G(5)', string, '(', 'G(4)', 'mutant)', specifically, eliminates]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'ZBP-89,', a, 'Kr&Atilde;&frac14;ppel-like', transcription, 'factor,', but, not, to, 'Sp3', and, other, binding, factors])].
[sujeto(['Gel', mobility, shift, assays, and, 'DNA', affinity, precipitation, assays]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, binding, of, 'ZBP-89', to, this, region, is, reduced, in, the, absence, of, 'GATA-1', binding, to, the, 'G1HE'])].
[sujeto(['Luciferase', reporter, assays, demonstrate, that, 'ZBP-89']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'Gata1', enhancer, depending, on, the, 'G(5)', string, sequence])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', transgenic, mouse, studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 'G(4)', mutation, significantly, reduced, the, reporter, activity, of, the, 'Gata1', hematopoietic, regulatory, domain, encompassing, an, 8.5, -, kbp, region, of, the, 'Gata1', gene])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([compelling, evidence, that, the, 'G(5)', string, is, necessary, for, 'Gata1', gene, expression, in, vivo, and, 'ZBP-89', is, the, functional, 'trans-acting', factor, for, this, 'cis-acting', region])].
[sujeto(['One', such, signaling, pathway]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['RUNX1,', a, transcription, factor, upregulated, in, megakaryocytes, and, downregulated, in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', develop, a, computational, model, for, the, hematopoietic, 'erythroid-myeloid', lineage, 'decision,', which, is, determined, by, a, genetic, switch]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, genes, 'PU'])].
[sujeto(['We', therefore]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, new, mechanism, involving, a, cofactor, that, is, regulated, as, well, as, recruited, by, one, of, the, master, genes, to, bind, to, the, antagonistic, partner, that, is, necessary, for, bistability, and, hence, 'switch-like', behavior])].
[sujeto(['An', interesting, fallout, from, this, architecture, is, that, suppression, of, the, cofactor, through, external, means, can]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, loss, of, 'cooperativity,', and, hence, to, a, primed, state, for, 'PU'])].
[sujeto([1, -, 'GATA-1', switch, also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, another, mutually, antagonistic, 'pair,', 'C/EBPalpha-FOG-1'])].

[sujeto(['The', genetic, 'switch,', which, handles, the, 'erythroid-myeloid', lineage, 'decision,', is, an, example, of, a, network, that, implements, both, a, primed, and, a, committed, state, by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cooperativity, through, recruitment, of, cofactors])].
[sujeto(['Perturbing', the, feedback, between, the, master, regulators, and, downstream]), verbo([targets]), complemento([suggests, potential, reprogramming, strategies])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', from, different, regions, of, the, genome, frequently, forms, steady, associations, that, play, important, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'QACT,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, the, chromatin, conformation, of, the, mouse, 'alpha-globin', gene, cluster, and, proved, the, extensive, interaction, between, 'HS26', and, 'alpha-globin', genes])].

[sujeto(['Autophagy', is, a, process, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, degradation, of, unnecessary, or, dysfunctional, cellular, components, and, 'long-lived', protein, aggregates])].

[sujeto(['By', 'now,', considerable, progress]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, made, in, elucidating, 'GATA', 'factor-dependent', genetic, networks, that, control, red, blood, cell, development])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([an, important, 'MYBL2-VDAC2-BECN1-BCL2L1', pathway, linking, autophagy, suppression, in, the, developing, ovary])].

[sujeto(['MYBL2']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, spatiotemporal, expression, of, 'VDAC2', in, the, developing, ovary])].
[sujeto(['Strikingly,', in, the, 'VDAC2', transgenic, pigs, '(', 'Sus', 'scrofa/Ss),', 'VDAC2', exerts, its, function, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([autophagy, in, the, ovary])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'Vdac2', knockout]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([autophagy])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'VDAC2-mediated', autophagy, suppression, is, dependent, on, its, interactions, with, both, 'BECN1', and, 'BCL2L1', to, stabilize, the, 'BECN1', and, 'BCL2L1', 'complex,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento(['VDAC2', as, an, autophagy, suppressor, in, the, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, functional, connection, among, the, 'VDAC2,', 'MYBL2,', the, 'BECN1-BCL2L1', pathway, and, autophagy, suppression, in, the, developing, 'ovary,', which, is, implicated, in, improving, female, fecundity])].
[sujeto(['Cell', differentiation, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, hemin, and, the, effect, of, 'pre-incubation', with, 'T3', '(', 0.1, to, 100, 'nM)', was, analyzed, by, measuring, the, 'benzidine-positive', 'rate,', hemoglobin, 'content,', 'CD71', expression, '(', transferrin, 'receptor),', and, mRNA, expression, for, transcription, factors, related, to, erythropoiesis, and, thyroid, hormone, receptors, '(', 'TRs)'])].
[sujeto(['Hemin,', a, promoter, of, erythroid, 'differentiation,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, levels, of, mRNAs, for, 'TR&Icirc;&plusmn;,', 'TR&Icirc;&sup2;,', and, retinoid, 'X', receptor, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'RXR&Icirc;&plusmn;),', as, well, as, those, for, nuclear, 'factor-erythroid', 2, '(', 'NFE2),', 'GATA-binding', protein, 1, '(', 'GATA1)', and, 'GATA-binding', protein, 2, '(', 'GATA2)'])].
[sujeto(['T3', at, 100, nM, did, not, affect, cell, viability, and, 'proliferation,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, abrogation, of, erythropoiesis, enhancement, was, not, due, to, toxicity])].
[sujeto(['T3', at, 100, nM, also, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([expression, of, 'GATA2', and, 'RXR&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'mRNA,', compared, to, 1, nM, 'T3'])].
[sujeto(['KLF1', is, an, erythroid, specific, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, regulatory, regions, of, erythroid, genes])].
[sujeto(['Binding', sites, of, 'KLF1', are, often]), verbo([found]), complemento([near, binding, sites, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'TAL1'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', 'locus,', 'KLF1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, forming, active, chromatin, 'structure,', although, its, role, is, unclear])].
[sujeto(['To', explore, the, role, of, 'KLF1', in]), verbo([transcribing]), complemento([the, human, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;-globin', 'genes,', we, stably, reduced, the, expression, of, 'KLF1', in, erythroid, 'K562', 'cells,', compromising, its, association, in, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', locus])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'GATA-1', and, 'TAL1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, reduced, in, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', 'locus,', even, though, their, expressions, were, not, affected, by, 'KLF1', knockdown])].
[sujeto(['The', 'KLF1-dependent', 'GATA-1', and, 'TAL1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, observed, in, the, adult, locus, transcribing, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', gene, and, in, several, erythroid, 'genes,', where, 'GATA-1', occupancy, is, independent, from, 'TAL1'])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, a, 'robust,', 'genome-wide', mechanism, of, 'MEG-specific', lineage, priming, by, a, previously, described, 'stem/progenitor', 'cell-expressed', transcription, factor, heptad, '(', 'GATA2,', 'LYL1,', 'TAL1,', 'FLI1,', 'ERG,', 'RUNX1,', 'LMO2)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'MEG-associated', 'cis-regulatory', modules, '(', 'CRMs)', in, multipotential, progenitors])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'chromatin-associated', proteins, and, incorporation, of, histone, variants, correlates, with, alterations, in, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['These', changes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, particularly, well, analyzed, at, the, mammalian, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', 'locus,', where, transcription, factors, such, as, erythroid, 'Kr&Atilde;&frac14;ppel-like', factor, '(', 'EKLF),', which, is, also, known, as, 'Kr&Atilde;&frac14;ppel-like', factor, 1, '(', 'KLF1),', play, a, coordinating, role, in, establishing, the, proper, chromatin, structure, and, inducing, 'high-level', expression, of, adult, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin'])].
[sujeto(['We', had, previously, shown, that, 'EKLF', preferentially]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, histone, 'H3', and, that, the, 'H3'])].

[sujeto(['HIRA', is, not, only, critical, for, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', expression, but, is, also]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, activation, of, the, erythropoietic, regulators, 'EKLF', and, 'GATA', binding, protein, 1, '(', 'GATA1)'])].

[sujeto([&, 'Icirc;&sup2;-Thalassaemia', major, '(', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-TM)', is, an, inherited, haemoglobinopathy]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, a, quantitative, defect, in, the, synthesis, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', chains, of, 'haemoglobin,', leading, to, the, accumulation, of, free, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin', chains, that, form, toxic, aggregates])].
[sujeto(['Despite', extensive, knowledge, of, the, molecular, defects]), verbo([causing]), complemento([&, 'Icirc;&sup2;-TM,', little, is, known, of, the, mechanisms, responsible, for, the, ineffective, erythropoiesis, observed, in, the, 'condition,', which, is, characterized, by, accelerated, erythroid, 'differentiation,', maturation, arrest, and, apoptosis, at, the, polychromatophilic, stage])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, that, normal, human, erythroid, maturation, requires, a, transient, activation, of, 'caspase-3', at, the, later, stages, of, maturation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, 'that,', in, human, 'erythroblasts,', the, chaperone, heat, shock, protein70, '(', 'HSP70)', is, constitutively, expressed, 'and,', at, later, stages, of, 'maturation,', translocates, into, the, nucleus, and, protects, 'GATA-1', from, 'caspase-3', cleavage])].

[sujeto(['Here', we, show, in, vitro, that, during, the, maturation, of, human, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-TM', 'erythroblasts,', 'HSP70']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, with, free, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-globin', chains])].

[sujeto(['Transduction', of, a, 'nuclear-targeted', 'HSP70', mutant, or, a, 'caspase-3-uncleavable', 'GATA-1', mutant, restores, terminal, maturation, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-TM', 'erythroblasts,', which, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, rationale, for, new, targeted, therapies, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-TM'])].
[sujeto(['Wogonin,', a, flavonoid, derived, from, 'Scutellaria', baicalensis, 'Georgi,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, be, highly, effective, in, treating, hematologic, malignancies])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, wogonin, induces, cycle, arrest, and, erythroid, differentiation, in, vitro, and, inhibits, proliferation, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, identify, mutations, in, 'GATA1,', encoding, the, critical, hematopoietic, transcription, factor, 'GATA-binding', 'protein-1,', that, reduce, levels, of, 'full-length', 'GATA1', protein, and]), verbo([cause]), complemento(['DBA', in, rare, instances])].

[sujeto(['Promyelocytic', leukemia, protein, '(', 'PML)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, as, a, participant, in, multiple, cellular, processes, including, 'senescence,', 'apoptosis,', 'proliferation,', and, differentiation])].

[sujeto(['We', show, that, the, 'PML4', effect, is, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'GATA-1)', dependent, using, 'GATA-1', 'knockout/rescued', 'G1E/G1E-ER4', cells])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, role, of, erythroid, transcription, factors, mRNA, expression, in, patients, with, acute, myeloid, leukemia, '(', 'AML)', in, the, context, of, cytogenetic, and, other, prognostic, molecular, 'markers,', such, as, 'FMS-like', 'Tyrosine', 'Kinase', 3, '(', 'FLT3),', 'Nucleophosmin', 1, '(', 'NPM1),', and, 'CCAAT/enhance-binding', protein, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'CEBPA)', mutations])].
[sujeto(['We', evaluated, 'GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'GATA1),', 'GATA', binding, protein, 2, '(', 'GATA2),', 'EKLF', and, 'Myeloproliferative', 'Leukemia', virus, oncogen, homology, '(', 'cMPL)', gene, mRNA, expression, in, the, bone, marrow, of, 65, 'AML', patients, at, 'diagnosis,', and, assessed, any, correlation, with, 'NPM1,', 'FLT3', and, 'CEBPA', mutations])].

[sujeto(['ZNF143', is, a, 'sequence-specific', 'DNA-binding', protein, that]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([transcription, of, both, small, 'RNA', genes, by, 'RNA', polymerase, 'II', or, 'III,', or, 'protein-coding', genes, by, 'RNA', polymerase, 'II,', using, separable, activating, domains])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, phenotype, is, pleiotropic, and, includes, a, broad, array, of, abnormalities, including, defects, in, 'heart,', 'blood,', ear, and, midbrain, hindbrain, boundary])].
[sujeto(['The', zebrafish, pax2a, gene, proximal, promoter, contains, two]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, 'ZNF143,', and, reporter, gene, transcription, driven, by, this, promoter, in, transfected, cells, is, activated, by, this, protein])].

[sujeto(['The', human, 'ZNF268', gene, encodes, a, typical, 'KRAB-C2H2', zinc, finger, protein, that, may]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, hematopoiesis, and, leukemogenesis])].
[sujeto(['A', recent, microarray, study, revealed, that, 'ZNF268', expression, continuously]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([during, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1,', a, master, regulator, of, 'erythropoiesis,', repressed, the, promoter, activity, and, transcription, of, 'ZNF268'])].

[sujeto(['Interleukin', 6, '(', 'IL-6)', is, a, pleiotropic, cytokine]), verbo([acting]), complemento([on, a, variety, of, cell, 'types,', and, plays, important, roles, in, hematopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['GATA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'GATA-1)', is, an, important, transcription, factor, involved, in, either, megakaryocytic, or, erythrocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Herein', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Rab7b,', a, late, 'endosome/lysosome-localized', myeloid, small, 'GTPase,', promotes, 'phorbol-12-myristate-13-acetate', '(', 'PMA)-induced', megakaryocytic, differentiation, by, increasing, nuclear, factor, &, 'Icirc;&ordm;B', '(', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B)-dependent', 'IL-6', production, and, subsequently, enhancing, the, association, of, activated, signal, transducer, and, activator, of, transcription, 3, '(', 'STAT3)', with, 'GATA-1'])].

[sujeto(['Our', study, also, indicates, that, the, 'IL-6-induced', association, of, 'STAT3', with, 'GATA-1', may]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Helper', 'T', '(', 'Th)', cells, are, deeply]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathophysiology, of, bronchial, 'asthma,', such, as, eosinophilic, 'inflammation,', bronchial, hyperresponsiveness, '(', 'BHR),', airflow, limitation, and, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['The', number, of, 'BALF', eosinophils, was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'WT', 'mice,', but, not, detectable, in, 'Delta', dblGATA, mice])].

[sujeto(['Eosinophils', are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'T-cell-mediated', 'BHR'])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'GATA1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([multiple, genes, in, erythroid, lineage, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, means, by, which, 'GATA1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, target, genes, during, erythropoiesis, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Three', mechanisms]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, postulated, for, the, regulation, of, genes, by, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['First,', individual]), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, may, have, multiple, discrete, thresholds, for, cellular, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['GATA1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, dynamic, expression, profile, during, 'erythropoiesis,', thus, the, expression, of, a, set, of, 'GATA1', target, genes, may, be, triggered, at, a, given, stage, of, differentiation, by, cellular, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['Second,', the, expression, of, 'GATA1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, may, be, 'modified,', at, least, in, 'part,', by, 'GATA2', occupying, the, 'GATA-binding', motifs])].
[sujeto(['GATA2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([earlier, in, erythropoiesis, than, 'GATA1,', and, prior, 'GATA2', binding, may, afford, 'GATA1', access, to, 'GATA', motifs, through, epigenetic, remodeling, and, thus, facilitate, target, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Third,', other, regulatory, molecules, specific, to, each]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, may, function, cooperatively, with, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['If', 'GATA1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, expression, of, such, 'cofactors,', a, regulatory, network, will, be, formed, and, relevant, gene, expression, will, be, delayed])].
[sujeto(['The', transcriptional, 'activator,', 'Tax,', of, human, 'T-cell', leukemia, virus, '(', 'HTLV-I)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, considered, to, interact, with, cellular, proteins, to, act, on, target, enhancer, motifs])].
[sujeto(['Using', oligodeoxyribonucleotides, containing, the, 'tax-responsive', element, '(', 'TAXRE)', of, the, 'HTLV-I', 'enhancer,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, multiple, cDNAs, coding, for, 'TAXRE-binding', proteins, '(', 'TAXREB),', and, determined, the, cDNA, and, the, deduced, 200, -, 'amino-acid', sequences, for, 'TAXREB302'])].
[sujeto(['The', recombinant, protein]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, enhancer, 'DNA', by, specific, interaction, to, the, 'CRE-like', sequence])].
[sujeto(['TAXREB302', does, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([structural, features, common, to, the, 'CRE-binding', protein, or, activating, transcription, factor, '(', 'CREB/ATF)', 'family,', but, has, homology, to, chicken, erythroid, transcription, factor, '(', 'Eryf1', or, 'GATA-1),', suggesting, a, possible, 'protein-protein', interaction])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, the, present, study, was, to, investigate, the, role, of, each, estrogen, receptors, on, the, regulation, of, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([with, proliferation, and, differentiation, of, 'Sertoli', cells, from, 15, -, 'day-old', rats])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'ESR1', by, 17, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-estradiol', '(', 'E2)', and, 'ESR1-selective', agonist, 'PPT']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CCND1', 'expression,', and, this, effect, was, dependent, on, 'NF-kB', activation])].

[sujeto(['In', 'Sertoli', cells, from, 15, -, 'day-old', 'rats,', the, 'ESR1/ESR2', ratio, favors, the, effect, of, 'ESR1', and, the, activation, of, this, receptor]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['[', 'Methyl-(3)H]thymidine', incorporation])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, in, 'Sertoli', cells, from, 15, -, 'day-old', rats, 'E2']), verbo([modulates]), complemento(['Sertoli', cell, proliferation, through, 'ESR1/NF-kB-mediated', increase, of, 'CCND1,', and, cell, cycle, exit, and, differentiation, through, 'ESR2/CREB-mediated', increase, of, 'CDKN1B,', 'GATA-1', and, 'DMRT1'])].
[sujeto(['The', physiological, switch, in, expression, of, the, 'embryonic,', 'fetal,', and, adult, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-like', globin, genes]), verbo([has]), complemento([garnered, enormous, attention, from, investigators, interested, in, transcriptional, mechanisms, and, the, molecular, basis, of, hemoglobinopathies])].
[sujeto(['These', efforts]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, the, discovery, of, cell, 'type-specific', transcription, 'factors,', unprecedented, mechanisms, of, transcriptional, coregulator, 'function,', genome, biology, 'principles,', unique, contributions, of, nuclear, organization, to, transcription, and, cell, 'function,', and, promising, therapeutic, targets])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', an, erythroid, 'cell-specific', regulatory, element]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, in, the, first, intron, of, 'ABO', using, luciferase, reporter, assays, with, 'K562', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', partial, deletion, of, 'Intron', 1, including, the, element, was, observed, in, genomic, 'DNAs', obtained, from, 111, 'Bm', and, 'ABm', 'individuals,', except, for, 'one,', whereas, the, deletion, was, never]), verbo([found]), complemento([among, 1005, individuals, with, the, common, phenotypes])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', further, investigation, was, performed, to]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, underlying, mechanism, responsible, for, reduction, of, 'B', antigen, expression, in, the, exceptional, 'Bm', individual])].
[sujeto(['Electrophoretic', mobility, assays, and, promoter, assays, were, performed, to, examine, whether, a, nucleotide, substitution, reduced, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, a, transcription, factor, and, induced, loss, of, function, of, the, element])].
[sujeto(['The', electrophoretic, mobility, shift, assays, showed, that, the, mutation, abolished, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GATA', transcription, 'factors,', and, the, promoter, assays, demonstrated, complete, loss, of, enhancer, activity, of, the, element])].
[sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, mutation, in, the, 'GATA', motif, of, the, 'erythroid-specific', regulatory, element, may, diminish, the, binding, of, 'GATA', transcription, factors, and, down, regulate, transcriptional, activity, of, the, element, on, the, 'B', 'allele,', leading, to, reduction, of, 'B', antigen, expression, in, erythroid, lineage, cells, of, the, 'Bm', individual])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, 'Ikaros']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, development, of, hematopoietic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Recently,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Ikaros', was, associated, with, progression, of, myeloproliferative, neoplasms, to, acute, myeloid, leukemia, and, increasing, evidence, shows, that, 'Ikaros', is, also, critical, for, the, regulation, of, myeloid, development])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies, showed, that, 'Ikaros-deficient', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([increased, 'megakaryopoiesis,', but, the, molecular, mechanism, of, this, phenomenon, remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'Ikaros', overexpression]), verbo([decreases]), complemento(['NOTCH-induced', megakaryocytic, 'specification,', and, represses, expression, of, several, megakaryocytic, genes, including, 'GATA-1', to, block, differentiation, and, terminal, maturation])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrate, that, 'Ikaros', expression, is, differentially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-1', during, megakaryocytic, differentiation, and, reveal, that, the, combined, loss, of, 'Ikzf1', and, 'Gata1', leads, to, synthetic, lethality, in, vivo, associated, with, prominent, defects, in, erythroid, cells, and, an, expansion, of, megakaryocyte, progenitors])].
[sujeto(['The', human, 'embryonic,', fetal, and, adult, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-like', globin, genes]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, paradigm, for, 'tissue-', and, developmental, 'stage-specific', gene, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', fetal, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;-globin', gene, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, fetal, erythroid, cells, but, is, repressed, in, adult, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, proximal, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;-globin', promoter, complex, is, assembled, by, a, developmentally, 'regulated,', general, transcription, activator, 'NF-Y', bound, strongly, at, the, tandem, 'CCAAT', motifs, near, the, 'TATA', box])].
[sujeto(['NF-Y']), verbo([recruits]), complemento([to, neighboring, 'DNA', motifs, the, developmentally, 'regulated,', erythroid, transcription, activator, 'GATA-2', and, general, repressor, 'BCL11A,', which, in, turn, recruit, erythroid, repressor, 'GATA-1', and, general, repressor, 'COUP-TFII', to, form, respectively, the, 'NF-Y/GATA-2', transcription, activator, hub, and, the, 'BCL11A/COUP-TFII/GATA-1', transcription, repressor, hub])].
[sujeto(['Through', changes, in, their, levels, and, respective, interactions, with, the, 'co-activators', and, 'co-repressors', during, erythroid, 'development,', the, activator, and, the, repressor, hubs]), verbo([modulate]), complemento(['erythroid-', and, developmental, 'stage-specific', transcription, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;-globin', gene])].
[sujeto(['HDAC1-containing', 'NuRD', complex, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'GATA-1-mediated', repression, and, activation])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', associated, with, acetylated, 'HDAC1-containing', 'NuRD', 'complex,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, deacetylase, 'activity,', for, gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['Histone', deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs)', play, important, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cell, proliferation, and, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'HDAC1-containing', 'NuRD', complex, is, generally, considered, as, a, corepressor, complex, and, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'GATA-1-mediated', repression])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, studies, also, show, that, the, 'NuRD', complex, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'GATA-1-mediated', gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1-associated', deacetylase, activity, gradually, decreased, upon, induction, of, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, earlier, that, acetylated, 'HDAC1', has, no, deacetylase, activity])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', overexpression, of, an, 'HDAC1', 'mutant,', which, mimics, acetylated, 'HDAC1,']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['GATA-1-mediated', transcription, and, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', during, erythroid, 'differentiation,', acetylated, 'HDAC1', recruitment, is]), verbo([increased]), complemento([at, 'GATA-1-activated', 'genes,', whereas, it, is, significantly, decreased, at, 'GATA-1-repressed', genes])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', deacetylase, activity, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'Mi2', remodeling, 'activity,', suggesting, that, remodeling, activity, may, be, required, for, both, activation, and, repression])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'NuRD', can, function, as, a, coactivator, or, repressor, and, that, acetylated, 'HDAC1', converts, the, 'NuRD', complex, from, a, repressor, to, an, activator, during, 'GATA-1-directed', erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['During', 'erythropoiesis,', erythropoietin]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([induction, of, erythroid, transcription, factors, that, activate, expression, of, erythroid, genes, including, the, erythropoietin, receptor, '(', 'EPO-R)', that, results, in, increased, sensitivity, to, erythropoietin])].
[sujeto(['DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', transcription, 'factor,', 'TAL1/SCL,', is, required, for, normal, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['A', link, between, elevated, 'TAL1', and, excessive, erythrocytosis, is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([by, erythroid, progenitor, cells, from, a, patient, that, exhibits, unusually, high, sensitivity, to, erythropoietin, with, concomitantly, elevated, 'TAL1', and, 'EPO-R', expression])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'TAL1', regulates, 'EPO-R', expression, mediated, via, three, conserved, 'E-box', binding, motifs, '(', 'CAGCTG)', in, the, 'EPO-R', 5, '\'', untranslated, transcribed, region])].
[sujeto(['TAL1']), verbo([increases]), complemento([association, of, the, 'GATA-1&Acirc;&middot;TAL1&Acirc;&middot;LMO2&Acirc;&middot;LDB1', transcription, activation, complex, to, the, region, that, includes, the, transcription, start, site, and, the, 5, '\'', 'GATA', and, 3, '\'', 'E-box', motifs, flanking, the, 'EPO-R', transcription, start, site, suggesting, that, 'TAL1', promotes, accessibility, of, this, region])].
[sujeto(['Nucleosome', shifting]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, facilitate, 'TAL1', but, not, 'GATA-1', binding, to, regulate, target, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', we, observed, that, with]), verbo([induced]), complemento([expression, of, 'EPO-R', in, hemotopoietic, progenitor, 'cells,', nucleosome, phasing, shifts, to, increase, the, linker, region, containing, the, 'EPO-R', transcription, start, site, and, 'TAL1', binds, to, the, flanking, 5, '\'', 'GATA', and, 3, '\'', 'E-box', regions, of, the, promoter])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'TAL1', binds, to, the, 'EPO-R', promoter, to, activate, 'EPO-R', expression, and, provides, a, potential, link, to, elevated, 'EPO-R', expression, leading, to, hypersensitivity, to, erythropoietin, and, the, resultant, excessive, erythrocytosis])].
[sujeto(['Lysophosphatidic', acid, '(', 'LPA),', a, lipid, growth, factor, was, previously, shown, to, be, a, regulator, for, erythropoietic, process, through]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['LPA', receptor, 3, '(', 'LPA3)'])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'K562', cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([both, 'LPA2', and, 'LPA3,', and, the, expression, levels, of, 'LPA2', are, higher, than, 'LPA3'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, phorbol, 12, -, myristate, 13, -, 'acetate,', a, commonly, used, inducer, of, 'megakaryopoiesis,', reciprocally]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expressions, of, 'LPA2', and, 'LPA3'])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, hematopoietic, transcriptional, factors, 'GATA-1', and, 'FLI-1,', appear, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, these, regulatory, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'LPA2', and, 'LPA3', may, function, as, a, molecular, switch, and, play, opposing, roles, during, megakaryopoiesis, of, 'K562', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'viral-mediated', expression, of, 'hGATA-1', and, 'hGATA-2', in, the, dorsal, hippocampus]), verbo([caused]), complemento(['depressive-like', deficits, in, the, forced, swim, test, and, learned, helplessness, models, of, 'depression,', and, decreased, the, expression, of, several, 'synapse-related', genes, as, well, as, spine, number, in, hippocampal, neurons])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', shRNA, knockdown, of, 'GATA-2']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['synapse-related', gene, 'expression,', spine, 'number,', and, dendrite, branching])].

[sujeto(['Metastasis', is, the, main]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'cancer-related', death, and, thus, understanding, the, molecular, and, cellular, mechanisms, underlying, this, process, is, critical])].
[sujeto(['Here,', our, data, 'demonstrate,', contrary, to, established, 'dogma,', that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'haematopoietic-derived', focal, adhesion, kinase, '(', 'FAK)', is, sufficient, to, enhance, tumour, metastasis])].

[sujeto(['Overall', our, findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanism, by, which, haematopoietic, 'FAK', controls, cancer, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', mutations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, associated, with, various, 'diseases,', such, as, 'X-linked', thrombocytopenia])].
[sujeto(['ALAS2', is, an, 'X-linked', 'erythroid-specific', isoenzyme]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([a, case, of, newborn, twin, boy, with, anemia, and, thrombocytopenia, at, birth])].
[sujeto(['Gene', sequencing, study, showed, a, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([mutation, in, 'GATA-1', at, c])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1(low/low)', mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([an, increase, in, megakaryocytes, '(', 'MKs)', and, trabecular, bone])].

[sujeto(['Osteoprotegerin', '(', 'OPG)', is, known, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([osteoclastogenesis, and, 'OPG(-/-)', mice, have, reduced, trabecular, and, cortical, bone, due, to, increased, osteoclastogenesis])].

[sujeto(['These', studies, confirm, the, 'erythroid-specific', expression, of, 'Rh', 'antigens,', but]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([distinct, regulatory, mechanisms, for, 'RH', vs, 'RH50', genes])].
[sujeto(['The', human, 'epsilon-globin', gene, is]), verbo([transcribed]), complemento([in, erythroid, cells, only, during, the, embryonic, stages, of, development])].

[sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([two, zinc, fingers, essential, for, normal, function])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', finger]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([interaction, with, 'FOG-1,', a, cofactor, for, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, family, with, a, novel, single, base, mutation, that, results, in, an, amino, acid, substitution, '(', 'Gly208Arg)', within, the, highly, conserved, portion, of, the, 'GATA-1', 'N-terminal', finger, 'domain,', leading, to, dyserythropoietic, anemia, and, macrothrombocytopenia])].
[sujeto(['Another', mutation, described, at, the, same, codon, '(', 208, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, be, associated, with, thrombocytopenia, only])].
