[sujeto(['Mutations', in, the, 'DNA', or, 'FOG-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, of, its, 'N-terminal', zinc, finger, result, in, different, illnesses])].
[sujeto(['Alterations', of, the, 'FOG-1', face, are, responsible, for, dyserythropoietic, anemia, with, thrombocytopenia, while, 'R216Q,', the, only, mutation, identified, in, the, 'DNA', 'face,']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['X-linked', thrombocytopenia, with, thalassemia, '(', 'XLTT)'])].
[sujeto(['The', former, disorder]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, in, detail, whereas, little, is, known, about, the, latter, since, only, one, family, has, been, investigated])].
[sujeto(['However,', a, thalassemia, minor, phenotype]), verbo([has]), complemento([only, been, described, in, patients, with, 'XLTT', whereas, severe, anemia, and, thrombocytopenia, with, evident, defects, of, platelet, composition, and, function, may, be, observed, only, in, dyserythropoietic, anemia, with, thrombocytopenia])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N', finger]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([interaction, with, 'FOG-1,', a, cofactor, for, 'GATA-1,', and, also, modulates, 'DNA-binding', 'affinity,', notably, at, complex, or, palindromic, 'GATA', sites])].
[sujeto(['Strong', sequence, conservation, of, residues, facing, 'DNA']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, this, other, surface, may, also, have, an, important, role])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, a, syndrome, of, 'X-linked', thrombocytopenia, with, thalassemia, in, humans, is, caused, by, a, missense, mutation, '(', 'Arg216Gln)', in, the, 'GATA-1', 'N', finger])].
[sujeto(['Compared', with, 'wild-type', 'GATA-1,', 'Arg216Gln', 'GATA-1', shows, comparable, affinity, to, single, 'GATA', sites, but]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([affinity, to, palindromic, sites])].
[sujeto(['Arg216Gln', 'GATA-1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'FOG-1', similarly, with, 'wild-type', 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, residues, of, the, 'N', finger, of, 'GATA-1-facing', 'DNA', contribute, to, 'GATA-1', function, apart, from, interaction, with, the, cofactor, 'FOG-1'])].
[sujeto(['This', is, also, the, first, example, of, 'beta-thalassemia', in, humans]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, a, mutation, in, an, erythroid, transcription, factor])].
[sujeto(['However,', previous, studies, indicate, that, 'FOG-1', may, play, a, 'GATA-1-independent', role, in, early, 'megakaryopoiesis,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'FOG', proteins, might, act, in, a, 'GATA', 'factor-independent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([generated, mouse, 'knock-in', '(', 'KI)', mutants, harboring, a, critical, 'valine-to-glycine', substitution, in, the, 'amino-terminal', zinc, fingers, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2', to, ablate, 'FOG', interaction])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'FOG-1']), verbo([requires]), complemento([an, interaction, with, either, 'GATA-1', or, -, 2, as, part, of, its, essential, role, in, early, megakaryopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['FOG-1,', like, its]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([partner, 'GATA-1,', is, required, for, normal, differentiation, of, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, functional, assay, for, 'FOG-1', based, on, its, ability, to, rescue, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, maturation, of, a, genetically, engineered, 'FOG-1(-/-)', cell, line])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, interaction, through, only, one, of, 'FOG-1\'s', four, 'GATA-binding', zinc, fingers, is, sufficient, for, 'rescue,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([evidence, against, a, model, in, which, 'FOG-1', acts, to, bridge, multiple, 'GATA-binding', 'DNA', elements])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, distinct, regions, of, 'FOG-1', differentially, influence, erythroid, versus, megakaryocyte, maturation])].
[sujeto(['As', 'such,', we, propose, that, 'FOG-1', may]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, fate, of, a, bipotential, 'erythroid/megakaryocytic', precursor, cell])].
[sujeto(['Microsatellite', linkage, analysis, identified, a, region, of, the, 'X', chromosome, including, the, 'GATA-1', 'gene,', which, encodes, a, critical, transcription, factor]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, erythrocyte, and, megakaryocyte, development])].
[sujeto(['By', sequencing, the, entire, coding, region, of, 'GATA-1,', a, 2, -, base, mutation, was, detected, that, results, in, a, single, amino, acid, substitution, '(', glycine, 208, to, 'serine)', within, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([portion, of, the, 'N-terminal', zinc, finger, domain])].
[sujeto(['Although', not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'DNA', 'binding,', 'Gly208', of, 'GATA-1', is, involved, in, direct, interaction, with, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG),', a, cofactor, required, for, normal, megakaryocytic, and, erythroid, development])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, the, 'GATA-1-FOG', interaction, is, partially, disrupted, by, the, mutation, and, that, the, greatest, effect]), verbo([involves]), complemento([contact, with, the, 'FOG', zinc, finger, 9])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, help, describe, a, novel, mutation, of, 'GATA-1', in, humans, as, a]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'X-linked', 'thrombocytopenia,', and, they, confirm, the, vital, role, played, by, this, transcription, factor, during, in, vivo, megakaryocyte, development])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', finger, domains]), verbo([have]), complemento([traditionally, been, regarded, as, 'sequence-specific', 'DNA', binding, motifs])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, evidence, indicates, that, many, zinc, fingers]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([specific, 'protein-protein', interactions])].
[sujeto(['For', 'instance,', several, zinc, fingers, from, 'FOG', family, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, interact, with, the, 'N-terminal', zinc, finger, of, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 'NMR', spectroscopy, to, determine, the, first, structures, of, two, 'FOG', family, zinc, fingers, that, are, involved, in, 'protein-protein', 'interactions:', fingers, 1, and, 9, from, 'U-shaped'])].
[sujeto(['[', 15, 'N,(1)H]-HSQC', titrations]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, to, define, the, 'GATA', binding, surface, of, 'USH-F1,', and, comparison, with, other, 'FOG', family, proteins, indicates, that, the, recognition, mechanism, is, conserved, across, species])].
[sujeto(['The', surface, of, 'FOG-type', fingers, that]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'GATA-1', overlaps, substantially, with, the, surface, through, which, classical, fingers, typically, recognize, 'DNA'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, these, fingers, could, not, contact, both, 'GATA', and, 'DNA', simultaneously])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', results, from, 'NMR,', gel, 'filtration,', and, sedimentation, equilibrium, experiments]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, interactions, are, of, moderate, affinity])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, demonstrate, unequivocally, that, zinc, fingers, comprising, the, classical, betabetaalpha, fold, are, capable, of]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([specific, contacts, between, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', existence, of, this, alternative, function]), verbo([has]), complemento([implications, for, the, prediction, of, protein, function, from, sequence, data, and, for, the, evolution, of, protein, function])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the, 'GATA', family, of, 'zinc-finger', transcription, factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([critical, roles, in, a, variety, of, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1,', 'GATA-2', and, 'GATA-3', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, proliferation, and, differentiation, of, several, hematopoietic, 'lineages,', whereas, 'GATA-4,', 'GATA-5', and, 'GATA-6', activate, cardiac, and, endoderm, gene, expression, programs])].
[sujeto(['Two', 'GATA', cofactors]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, identified])].
[sujeto(['Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'GATA-1', and, is, expressed, principally, in, hematopoietic, 'lineages,', whereas, 'FOG-2', is, expressed, predominantly, in, heart, and, brain])].
[sujeto(['Although', gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([experiments, are, consistent, with, an, essential, role, for, 'FOG-1', as, an, activator, of, 'GATA-1', 'function,', reporter, assays, in, transfected, cells, indicate, that, 'FOG-1', and, 'FOG-2', can, act, as, repressors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([cloned, a, 'Xenopus', laevis, homologue, of, 'FOG', that, is, structurally, most, similar, to, 'FOG-1,', but, is, expressed, predominantly, in, heart, and, 'brain,', as, well, as, the, ventral, blood, island, and, adult, spleen])].
[sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, and, explant, assays, demonstrate, that, 'FOG', proteins, can]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, repressors, in, 'vivo,', in, part, through, interaction, with, the, transcriptional, 'co-repressor,', 'C-terminal', 'Binding', 'Protein', '(', 'CtBP)'])].
[sujeto(['FOG', may]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, differentiation, of, red, blood, cells, by, modulating, expression, and, activity, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2'])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, the, 'FOG', proteins]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, switch, from, progenitor, proliferation, to, red, blood, cell, maturation, and, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Haematopoietic', development, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, nuclear, protein, complexes, that, coordinate, 'lineage-specific', patterns, of, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Targeted', mutagenesis, in, embryonic, stem, cells, and, mice]), verbo([has]), complemento([revealed, roles, for, the, 'X-linked', gene, 'Gata1', in, erythrocyte, and, megakaryocyte, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', is, the, founding, member, of, a, family, of, 'DNA-binding', proteins, that]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([the, motif, 'WGATAR', through, a, conserved, multifunctional, domain, consisting, of, two, 'C4-type', zinc, fingers])].
[sujeto(['This', highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([valine, is, necessary, for, interaction, of, the, 'amino-terminal', zinc, finger, of, 'GATA-1', with, its, essential, 'cofactor,', 'FOG-1', '(', for, friend, of, 'GATA-1;', refs, 9, -, 12, ')'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, the, 'V205M', mutation, abrogates, the, interaction, between, 'Gata-1', and, 'Fog-1,']), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([the, ability, of, 'Gata-1', to, rescue, erythroid, differentiation, in, an, erythroid, cell, line, deficient, for, 'Gata-1', '(', 'G1E)'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, underscore, the, importance, of, 'FOG-1:Gata-1', associations, in, both, megakaryocyte, and, erythroid, 'development,', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, other, 'X-linked', anaemias, or, thrombocytopenias, may, be, caused, by, defects, in, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, novel, human, zinc, finger, 'protein,', 'hFOG-2,', which, is, related, to, but, distinct, from, the, murine, transcription, factor, 'Friend-of-GATA-1', '(', 'mFOG-1)'])].
[sujeto(['A', murine, homologue, of, 'hFOG-2', was, also, identified, in, the, mouse]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([sequence, tag, data, 'banks,', indicating, that, a, family, of, 'FOG', genes, exists, in, mammals])].
[sujeto(['hFOG-2', appears, to, be, widely, 'expressed,', while, 'mFOG-1', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([primarily, in, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, cells, and, plays, a, fundamental, role, in, the, development, of, these, lineages])].
[sujeto(['Sequencing', of, the, 'full-length', 'hFOG-2', cDNA, indicates, that, the, interaction, domains, for, transcription, factors, 'GATA-1', and, mCtBP2, are, both]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([and, we, have, shown, that, this, new, 'FOG', protein, also, physically, interacts, with, these, factors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'hFOG-2,', like, 'mFOG-1,', can, act, in, concert, with, 'GATA-1', to, activate, gene, expression, from, the, p45, 'NF-E2', promoter, 'region,', but, that, it, can, also, act, to, repress, 'GATA-mediated', activation, of, additional, reporter, constructs])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, repression, domain, in, 'hFOG-2', and, show, that, repression, is, dependent, upon, the, integrity, of, the, mCtBP2, interaction, motif, 'Pro-Ile-Asp-Leu-Ser'])].
[sujeto(['Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)', is, a, zinc, finger, protein, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, interact, physically, with, the, erythroid, 'DNA-binding', protein, 'GATA-1', and, modulate, its, transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', two, new, members, of, the, 'FOG', family]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'identified:', a, mammalian, 'protein,', 'FOG-2,', that, also, associates, with, 'GATA-1', and, other, mammalian, 'GATA', 'factors;', and, 'U-shaped,', a, 'Drosophila', protein, that, interacts, with, the, 'Drosophila', 'GATA', protein, 'Pannier'])].
[sujeto(['FOG', proteins, contain, multiple, zinc, fingers, and, it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, previously, that, the, sixth, finger, of, 'FOG-1', interacts, specifically, with, the, 'N-finger', but, not, the, 'C-finger', of, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, fingers, 1, ',', 5, and, 9, of, 'FOG-1', also]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, 'N-finger', of, 'GATA-1', and, that, 'FOG-2', and, 'U-shaped', also, contain, multiple, 'GATA-interacting', fingers])].
[sujeto(['We', define, the, key, contact, residues, and, show, that, these, residues, are, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, 'GATA-interacting', fingers])].
[sujeto(['We', examine, the, effect, of, selectively, mutating, the, four]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([fingers, of, 'FOG-1', and, show, that, each, contributes, to, 'FOG-1\'s', ability, to, modulate, 'GATA-1', activity])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, show, that, 'FOG-1', can, repress, 'GATA-1-mediated', activation, and, present, evidence, that, this, ability]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, recently, described, 'CtBP', 'co-repressor', proteins, that, recognize, all, known, 'FOG', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Using', mouse, erythroleukemia, 'cells,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'RNA', interference, '(', 'RNAi)-mediated', depletion, of, 'HES1', enhances, erythroid, cell, 'differentiation,', suggesting, that, this, protein, opposes, terminal, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['This', is, also, supported, by, the]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([primary, erythroid, cell, differentiation, upon, 'HES1', upregulation, in, 'Ikaros-deficient', mice])].
[sujeto(['A', comprehensive, analysis]), verbo([led]), complemento([us, to, determine, that, 'Ikaros', favors, 'Hes1', repression, in, erythroid, cells, by, facilitating, recruitment, of, the, master, regulator, of, erythropoiesis, 'GATA-1', alongside, 'FOG-1,', which, mediates, 'Hes1', repression])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', is, then, necessary, for, the, chromatin]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'NuRD', remodeling, complex, 'ATPase', 'MI-2,', the, transcription, factor, 'GFI1B,', and, the, histone, 'H3K27', methyltransferase, 'EZH2', along, with, 'Polycomb', repressive, complex, 2])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'EZH2', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, transient, repression, of, 'Hes1', in, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'aggregate,', our, results, describe, a, mechanism, whereby, 'GATA-1', utilizes, 'Ikaros', and, 'Polycomb', repressive, complex, 2, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento(['Hes1', repression, as, an, important, step, in, erythroid, cell, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', and, its, cofactor, 'FOG-1', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, differentiation, of, erythrocytes, and, megakaryocytes])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', mast, cell, development]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['GATA-1', and, the, absence, of, 'FOG-1'])].

[sujeto(['We', identified, 'GATA1-selective', and, 'GATA-1(V205G)-selective']), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, and, show, that, 'GATA-1,', in, the, absence, of, 'FOG-1,', occupies, 'GATA-1(V205G)-selective', 'sites,', but, not, 'GATA1-selective', sites])].
[sujeto(['By', integrating, 'ChIP-seq', and, gene, expression, 'data,', we, discovered, that, 'GATA-1(V205G)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([and, activates, mast, 'cell-specific', genes, via, 'GATA-1(V205G)-selective', sites])].
[sujeto(['We', further, show, that, exogenous, expression, of, 'FOG-1', in, mast, cells]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, displacement, of, 'GATA-1', from, mast, 'cell-specific', genes, and, causes, their, downregulation])].
[sujeto(['Together', these, findings, establish, a, mechanism, of, gene, regulation, whereby, a, 'non-DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([cofactor, directly, modulates, the, occupancy, of, a, transcription, factor, to, control, lineage, specification])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factors, that, control, lineage, specification, of, haematopoietic, stem, cells, '(', 'HSCs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, described, for, the, myeloid, and, lymphoid, 'lineages,', whereas, transcriptional, control, of, erythroid, '(', 'E)', and, megakaryocytic, '(', 'Mk)', fate, is, less, understood])].
[sujeto(['We', here, use, conditional, removal, of, the, 'GATA-1', and, 'FOG-1', transcription, factors, to, identify, 'FOG-1', as]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, formation, of, all, committed, 'Mk-', and, 'E-lineage', 'progenitors,', whereas, 'GATA-1', was, observed, to, be, specifically, required, for, 'E-lineage', commitment])].
[sujeto(['These', results, identify, 'FOG-1', and, 'GATA-1', as]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, formation, of, bipotent, 'Mk/E', progenitors, and, their, 'E-lineage', 'commitment,', 'respectively,', and, show, that, 'FOG-1', mediates, transcriptional, 'Mk/E', programming, of, 'HSCs', as, well, as, their, subsequent, 'Mk/E-lineage', commitment])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, sumoylation, of, 'GATA-1', 'K137']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([transcriptional, activation, only, at, target, genes, requiring, the, coregulator, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)'])].
[sujeto(['A', mutation, of, 'GATA-1', 'V205G', that, disrupts, 'FOG-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'K137', mutations, yielded, similar, 'phenotypes,', although, sumoylation, was, 'FOG-1', 'independent,', and, 'FOG-1', binding, did, not, require, sumoylation])].
[sujeto(['While', 'FOG-1-', and, 'SUMO-1-dependent', genes, migrated, away, from, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([periphery, upon, erythroid, 'maturation,', 'FOG-1-', and, 'SUMO-1-independent', genes, persisted, at, the, periphery])].
[sujeto(['These', results, illustrate, a, mechanism, that, controls, 'trans-acting', factor, function, in, a, 'locus-specific', 'manner,', and, differentially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([members, of, the, target, gene, ensemble, reside, in, distinct, subnuclear, compartments])].
[sujeto(['The', critical, regulator, of, hematopoiesis, 'GATA-1']), verbo([recruits]), complemento([diverse, coregulators, to, 'chromatin,', which, mediate, transcriptional, activation, and, repression])].
[sujeto(['These', coregulators, include, the, 'cell-type-specific', 'multi-zinc', finger, protein, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1),', the, histone, acetyltransferase, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP),', and, the, key, component, of, the, 'Mediator', complex, 'Med1'])].
[sujeto(['We', compared, the, capacity, of, 'GATA-1', to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento([and, utilize, 'FOG-1', and, 'Med1', at, activated, and, repressed, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['Similar', to, 'FOG-1,', 'GATA-1']), verbo([recruited]), complemento(['Med1', to, activated, 'genes,', and, the, kinetics, of, 'FOG-1', and, 'Med1', recruitment, were, similar])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1']), verbo([recruited]), complemento(['Med1', in, 'Fog1(-/-)', 'cells,', indicating, that, 'GATA-1-mediated', 'Med1', recruitment, is, 'FOG-1-independent'])].
[sujeto(['Erythrocyte', membrane, protein, genes, serve, as, excellent, models, of, complex, gene, locus, structure, and, 'function,', but, their, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, complicated, by, both, their, large, size, and, their, complexity])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', most, regions, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([were, remote, from, gene, promoters, and, transcriptional, start, 'sites,', located, primarily, in, introns])].
[sujeto(['Cooccupancy', with, 'FOG-1,', 'SCL,', and, 'MTA-2', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([at, all, regions, of, 'GATA-1', 'binding,', with, cooccupancy, of, 'SCL', and, 'MTA-2', also, found, at, regions, of, 'NF-E2', binding])].
[sujeto(['Cooccupancy', of, 'GATA-1', and, 'NF-E2', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([frequently])].
[sujeto(['A', common, signature, of, histone, 'H3', trimethylation, at, lysine, 4, ',', 'GATA-1,', 'NF-E2,', 'FOG-1,', 'SCL,', and, 'MTA-2']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, consensus, 'GATA-1-E-box', binding, motifs, located, 34, to, 90, bp, away, from, 'NF-E2', binding, motifs, was, found, frequently, in, erythroid, 'cell-expressed', genes])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, our, understanding, of, membrane, protein, gene, regulation, in, erythropoiesis, and, the, regulation, of, complex, genetic, loci, in, erythroid, and, nonerythroid, cells, and, identify, numerous, candidate, regions, for, mutations, associated, with, 'membrane-linked', hemolytic, anemia])].
[sujeto(['This', interaction]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, 'LXCXE', motif, that, is, evolutionary, conserved, among, 'GATA-1', orthologs, yet, absent, from, the, other, 'GATA', family, members])].
[sujeto(['A', 'GATA-1', mutant, unable, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([pRb, fails, to, inhibit, cell, proliferation, and, results, in, mouse, embryonic, lethality, by, anemia])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, clarify, the, previously, suspected, 'cell-autonomous', role, of, pRb, during, erythropoiesis, and, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, unifying, molecular, mechanism, for, several, mouse, phenotypes, and, human, diseases, associated, with, 'GATA-1', mutations])].
[sujeto(['This', fragment, reduced, reporter, gene, expression, in, 'K562', 'cells,', and, 'GATA-1', was, shown, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([within, this, sequence, at, the, -, 566, 'GATA', site])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin', immunoprecipitation, of, fetal, liver, tissue, from, 'beta-YAC', transgenic, mice, demonstrated, that, 'GATA-1,', 'FOG-1,', and, 'Mi2', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, '(', 'A)gamma-globin', -, 566, or, '(', 'G)gamma-globin', -, 567, 'GATA', site, when, 'gamma-globin', expression, was, low, '(', day, 18, ')', but, not, when, 'gamma-globin', was, expressed, '(', day, 12, ')'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, during, definitive, 'erythropoiesis,', 'gamma-globin', gene, expression, is, 'silenced,', in, 'part,', by, binding, a, protein, complex, containing, 'GATA-1,', 'FOG-1,', and, 'Mi2', at, the, -, 566, /, -, 567, 'GATA', sites, of, the, proximal, 'gamma-globin', promoters])].
[sujeto(['Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)', is, a]), verbo([binding]), complemento([partner, of, 'GATA-1,', a, zinc, finger, transcription, factor, with, crucial, roles, in, 'erythroid,', 'megakaryocytic,', and, 'mast-cell', differentiation])].
[sujeto(['FOG-1', is, indispensable, for, the, function, of, 'GATA-1', during, 'erythro/megakaryopoiesis,', but, 'FOG-1', is, not]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, mast, cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'FOG-1', during, the, progenitor, period]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, differentiation, of, mast, cells, and, enhanced, the, differentiation, of, neutrophils])].
[sujeto([1, ',', a, transcription, factor, that, positively, or, negatively, cooperates, with, 'GATA-1,', revealed, that, this, lineage, skewing, was]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, disrupted, binding, between, 'GATA-1', and, 'PU'])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'FOG-1', expression, in, mature, mast, cells, brought, approximately, a, reversible]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, 'mast-cell', phenotype])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, the, lineage, 'skewing,', the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, 'mast-cell', phenotype, was, caused, by, 'down-regulation', of, 'MITF,', a, basic, 'helix-loop-helix', transcription, factor, required, for, 'mast-cell', differentiation, and, maturation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'FOG-1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['mast-cell', differentiation, in, a, differentiation, 'stage-dependent', 'manner,', and, its, effects, are, produced, via, different, molecular, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, 'Hls7/Mlf1', imposes, a, monoblastoid, phenotype, on, erythroleukemic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'Hls5', impedes, erythroid, maturation, by, restricting, proliferation, and]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([hemoglobin, 'synthesis;', 'however,', 'Hls5', does, not, influence, the, morphology, of, erythroid, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'nucleus,', 'Hls5', is, able, to]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['GATA-1-mediated', transactivation, and, reduce, 'GATA-1', binding, to, 'DNA'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'Hls5', and, 'Hls7/Mlf1']), verbo([act]), complemento([cooperatively, to, induce, biochemical, and, phenotypic, changes, associated, with, 'erythroid/myeloid', lineage, switching])].
[sujeto(['The', 'GATA-1-interacting', protein, 'Friend', 'Of', 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG-1)', is, essential, for, the, proper, transcriptional, activation, and, repression, of, numerous, 'GATA-1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'FOG-1-independent', activation, by, 'GATA-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'described,', all, known, examples, of, 'GATA-1-mediated', repression, are, 'FOG-1', dependent])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'GATA-1-null', 'G1E', cell, 'line,', estrogen, receptor, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, '(', 'ER)', chimeras, of, either, 'wild-type', 'GATA-1', or, a, 'FOG-1-binding', defective, mutant, of, 'GATA-1', repressed, several, genes, similarly, upon, activation, with, 'beta-estradiol'])].
[sujeto(['Repression', also, occurred, in, a, 'FOG-1-null', cell, line]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['ER-GATA-1', and, during, ex, vivo, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['At', the, 'Lyl1', and, 'Rgs18', 'loci,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([highly, restricted, occupancy, by, 'GATA-1', and, 'GATA-2,', indicating, that, these, genes, are, direct, targets, of, 'GATA', factor, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', function, of, several, transcription, factors]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, in, hematopoietic, stem, cell, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Zfpm-1', siRNA, transfected, 'HSCs', contained, 20, '%', more, 'GPA+', cells, than, the, mock, transfected, 'cells,', and, showed, repressed, expression, of, the, hematopoietic, transcription, 'factors,', 'c-myc', and, 'c-myb,', but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, activator, and, repressor, of, different, target, 'genes,', for, 'example,', in, erythroid, cells, it, represses, cell, proliferation, and, early, hematopoietic, genes, while, activating, erythroid, 'genes,', yet, it, is, not, clear, how, both, of, these, functions, are, mediated])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', we, show, that, 'FOG-1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['GATA-1', interactions, with, the, 'MeCP1', 'complex,', thus, providing, an, explanation, for, the, overlapping, functions, of, these, two, factors, in, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, subsets, of, 'GATA-1', gene]), verbo([targets]), complemento([are, bound, in, vivo, by, distinct, 'complexes,', thus, linking, specific, 'GATA-1', partners, to, distinct, aspects, of, its, functions])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, these, 'findings,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, model, for, the, different, roles, of, 'GATA-1', in, erythroid, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', factor, 'GATA-1', and, its, cofactor, 'FOG-1', coordinate, erythroid, cell, maturation, by]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['erythroid-specific', genes, and, repressing, genes, associated, with, the, undifferentiated, state])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'FOG-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'NuRD', corepressor, complex, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, a, small, conserved, domain, at, the, extreme, 'N-terminus', of, 'FOG-1', that, is, necessary, and, sufficient, for, 'NuRD', binding])].
[sujeto(['This', domain, defines, a, novel, repression, module]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, diverse, transcriptional, repressors])].
[sujeto(['Point', mutations, near, the, 'N-terminus', of, 'FOG-1', that, abrogate, 'NuRD']), verbo([binding]), complemento([block, gene, repression, by, 'FOG-1'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', the, ability, of, 'GATA-1', to, repress, transcription, was, impaired, in, erythroid, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([mutant, forms, of, 'FOG-1', that, are, defective, for, 'NuRD', binding])].
[sujeto(['Second,', children, with, 'Down', syndrome, who, develop, acute, megakaryoblastic, leukemia, harbor, mutations, in, 'GATA1', that]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, the, exclusive, expression, of, a, shorter, isoform, named, 'GATA-1s'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', megakaryocytes, that]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['V205G', 'GATA-1', exhibited, reduced, 'proliferation,', but, failed, to, undergo, maturation])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, show, that, 'GATA-1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, both, normal, regulation, of, proliferation, and, terminal, maturation, of, 'megakaryocytes,', and, 'further,', that, these, functions, can, be, uncoupled, by, mutations, in, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'long-range', enhancers, and, gene, promoters, are, in, close, 'proximity,', which, might, reflect, the, formation, of, chromatin, loops])].
[sujeto(['By', using, chromosome, conformation, capture, '(', 3, 'C),', we, show, that, the, hematopoietic, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', and, its, cofactor, 'FOG-1', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, physical, interaction, between, the, 'beta-globin', locus, control, region, '(', 'LCR)', and, the, 'beta-major', globin, promoter])].
[sujeto(['Kinetic', studies]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1-induced', loop, formation, correlates, with, the, onset, of, 'beta-globin', transcription, and, occurs, independently, of, new, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', occupies, the, 'beta-major', globin, promoter, normally, in, fetal, liver, erythroblasts, from, mice, lacking, the, 'LCR,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'GATA-1', binding, to, the, promoter, and, 'LCR', are, independent, events, that, occur, prior, to, loop, formation])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, data, demonstrate, that, 'GATA-1', and, 'FOG-1', are, essential, anchors, for, a, 'tissue-specific', chromatin, 'loop,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([general, insights, into, 'long-range', enhancer, function])].
[sujeto(['GATA-1', and, friend, of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)', are, 'zinc-finger', transcription, factors, that, physically]), verbo([interact]), complemento([to, play, essential, roles, in, erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, development])].
[sujeto(['Several', naturally, occurring, mutations, in, the, 'GATA-1', gene, that, alter, the, 'FOG-binding', domain]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, molecular, basis, for, the, 'GATA-1/FOG', 'interaction,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, 'three-dimensional', structure, of, a, complex, comprising, the, interaction, domains, of, these, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', structure]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([how, zinc, fingers, can, act, as, protein, recognition, motifs])].
[sujeto(['Details', of, the, architecture, of, the, contact, domains, and, their, physical, properties]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, molecular, explanation, for, how, the, 'GATA-1', mutations, contribute, to, distinct, but, related, genetic, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', factor, 'GATA-1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'erythropoiesis,', yet, its, full, actions, are, unknown])].
[sujeto(['First,', the, large, number, of, genes]), verbo([responding]), complemento([quickly, to, restoration, of, 'GATA-1', extends, the, repertoire, of, its, potential, targets])].
[sujeto(['Third,', 'up-regulation', of, some, known, 'GATA-1']), verbo([targets]), complemento([was, 'delayed,', suggesting, that, auxiliary, factors, are, required])].
[sujeto(['For', 'example,', induction, of, the, direct, 'GATA-1']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, beta, major, globin, was, late, 'and,', 'surprisingly,', required, new, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, gene, encoding, 'Fog1,', which, cooperates, with, 'GATA-1', in, beta, globin, 'transcription,', was, rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([independently, of, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, how, these, alterations]), verbo([cause]), complemento([distinct, clinical, phenotypes, by, combining, 'structural,', 'biochemical,', and, genomic, approaches, with, gene, complementation, systems, that, examine, 'GATA1', function, in, biologically, relevant, cellular, contexts])].
[sujeto(['Substitutions', that, disrupt, 'FOG1', cofactor]), verbo([binding]), complemento([impair, both, gene, activation, and, repression, and, are, associated, with, pronounced, clinical, phenotypes])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', 2, mutations, shown, to, impair, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'GATA1', in, vitro, did, not, measurably, affect, in, vivo, target, gene, occupancy])].
[sujeto(['Rather,', one, of, these, disrupted]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'TAL1', 'complex,', implicating, it, in, diseases, caused, by, 'GATA1', mutations])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', different, substitutions, at, the, same, amino, acid, can, selectively]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['TAL1', complex, or, 'FOG1', 'binding,', producing, distinct, cellular, and, clinical, phenotypes])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', it, follows, that, the, 'converse,', alleviation, of, 'repression,', would, be, equally, 'effective,', since, the, net, result, would, be, the, 'same:', an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, fetal, hemoglobin])].
[sujeto(['A', 'GATA-1-FOG-1-Mi2', repressor, complex, was, recently, demonstrated, to, be]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, -, 566, 'GATA', motif, of, the, '(', 'A)&Icirc;&sup3;-globin', gene])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, '(', 'A)&Icirc;&sup3;-globin', was, detected, in, adult, blood, from, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-YAC', transgenic, mice, containing, a, 'T&gt;G', 'HPFH', point, mutation, at, the, -, 566, 'GATA', silencer, site])].
[sujeto(['ChIP', experiments, demonstrated, that, 'GATA-1', is]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, this, silencer, at, day, 'E16,', followed, by, recruitment, of, 'FOG-1', and, 'Mi2', at, day, 'E17', in, 'wild-type', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-YAC', transgenic, mice])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, temporal, repression, mechanism, is, operative, in, the, silencing, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;-globin', gene, expression, and, that, either, a, 'trans-acting', 'Mi2&Icirc;&sup2;', knockout, deletion, mutation, or, the, 'cis-acting', -, 566, '(', 'A)&Icirc;&sup3;-globin', 'HPFH', point, mutation, disrupts, establishment, of, 'repression,', resulting, in, continued, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;-globin', gene, transcription, during, adult, definitive, erythropoiesis])].
[sujeto(['Tissue-specific', transcription, patterns, are, preserved, throughout, cell, divisions, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([lineage, fidelity])].
[sujeto(['Live-cell', imaging, revealed, that, a, fraction, of, 'GATA1', is]), verbo([retained]), complemento([focally, within, mitotic, chromatin])].

[sujeto(['Mitotic', 'GATA1']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, tend, to, reactivate, more, rapidly, upon, entry, into, 'G1', than, genes, from, which, 'GATA1', dissociates])].
[sujeto(['Mitosis-specific', destruction, of, 'GATA1', delays, reactivation, selectively, of, genes, that]), verbo([retain]), complemento(['GATA1', during, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['These', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, requirement, of, mitotic, &, 'quot;bookmarking&quot;', by, 'GATA1', for, the, faithful, propagation, of, 'cell-type-specific', transcription, programs, through, cell, division])].
[sujeto(['Substitution', mutations, in, 'GATA1-Nf,', such, as, 'GATA1(V205M)', that, diminish, the, 'GATA1-FOG1', 'association,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, human, thrombocytopenia, and, anemia, cases])].
[sujeto(['A', mouse, model, of, human, thrombocytopenia]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, established, using, a, transgenic, complementation, rescue, 'approach;', 'GATA1-deficient', mice, were, successfully, rescued, from, embryonic, lethality, by, excess, expression, of, 'GATA1(V205G),', but, rescued, adult, mice, suffered, from, severe, thrombocytopenia])].
[sujeto(['Lack', of, these, membrane, proteins]), verbo([provoked]), complemento([perturbation, of, membrane, skeleton])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', the, red, cells, exhibited]), verbo([increased]), complemento([reactive, oxygen, species, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, thus, demonstrate, that, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, 'GATA1-FOG1', interaction, causes, a, unique, combination, of, membrane, protein, deficiency, and, disturbs, the, function, of, 'GATA1', in, maintaining, erythroid, homeostasis])].
[sujeto(['Understanding', platelet, biology]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, aided, by, studies, of, mice, with, mutations, in, key, megakaryocytic, transcription, factors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, point, mutations, in, the, 'GATA1', cofactor, 'FOG1', that, disrupt, binding, to, the, nucleosome, remodeling, and, deacetylase, '(', 'NuRD)', complex, have, erythroid, and, megakaryocyte, lineages, defects])].
[sujeto(['Mice', that, are, homozygous, for, a, 'FOG1', point, mutation, '(', 'ki/ki),', which, ablates, 'FOG1-NuRD', 'interactions,']), verbo([have]), complemento([platelets, that, display, a, gray, platelet, syndrome, '(', 'GPS)-like', macrothrombocytopenia])].

[sujeto(['Treatment', of, 'ki/ki', platelets, with, thrombin, failed, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento(['Akt', 'phosphorylation,', resulting, in, poor, granule, secretion, and, platelet, aggregation])].

[sujeto(['Most', 'GATA1-regulated', events]), verbo([require]), complemento(['GATA1', to, bind, 'FOG1,', and, essentially, all, 'GATA1-activated', genes, are, cooccupied, by, a, 'TAL1/E2A/LMO2/LDB1', 'complex;', 'however,', it, is, not, known, whether, 'FOG1', and, 'TAL1/E2A/LMO2/LDB1', are, simultaneously, recruited, by, 'GATA1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', structural, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, the, 'FOG1-binding', domain, of, 'GATA1,', the, 'N', 'finger,', can, also, directly, contact, 'LMO2', and, show, 'that,', despite, the, small, size, '(', &, 'lt;&Acirc;&nbsp;50', 'residues)', of, the, 'GATA1', 'N', 'finger,', both, 'FOG1', and, 'LMO2', can, simultaneously, bind, this, domain])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, first, structural, snapshot, of, multiprotein, complex, formation, at, 'GATA1-dependent', genes, and, support, a, model, in, which, 'FOG1', and, 'TAL1/E2A/LMO2/LDB1', can, cooccupy, 'E-box/WGATAR', sites, to, facilitate, 'GATA1-mediated', activation, of, gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['Such', changes, appear, to, be, important, for]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['transcription,', although, many, questions, remain, regarding, how, loci, reversibly, transit, in, and, out, of, their, territories, and, the, functional, significance, of, subnuclear, transitions])].
[sujeto(['In', a, genetic, complementation, assay, in, 'GATA-1-null', 'cells,', 'GATA-1', expels, 'FOG-1-dependent']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, from, the, nuclear, periphery, during, erythroid, 'maturation,', but, the, underlying, mechanisms, are, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'GATA-1']), verbo([induces]), complemento([extrusion, of, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-globin', locus, away, from, its, chromosome, territory, at, the, nuclear, 'periphery,', and, extrusion, precedes, the, 'maturation-associated', transcriptional, surge, and, morphological, transition])].
[sujeto(['FOG-1', and, its, interactor, 'Mi-2&Icirc;&sup2;,', a, chromatin, remodeling, factor, commonly, linked, to, 'repression,', were]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, locus, extrusion])].
[sujeto(['Erythroid', 'Kr&Atilde;&frac14;ppel-like', 'factor,', a, pivotal, regulator, of, erythropoiesis, that, often, 'co-occupies', chromatin, with, 'GATA-1,', also]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([locus, extrusion])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, model, for, how, a, master, developmental, regulator, relocalizes, a, locus, into, a, new, subnuclear, neighborhood, that, is, permissive, for, high, level, transcription, as, an, early, step, in, establishing, a, cell, 'type-specific', genetic, network])].
[sujeto([&, 'acirc;&euro;&sbquo;Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([evaluated, whether, anagrelide, interferes, with, the, major, signal, transduction, cascades, stimulated, by, thrombopoietin, in, the, hematopoietic, cell, line, 'UT-7/mpl', and, in, cultured, 'CD34(+)', -, derived, human, hematopoietic, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, quantitative, mRNA, expression, analysis, to, assess, whether, the, drug, affects, the, levels, of, known, transcription, factors, that, control, megakaryocytopoiesis])].
[sujeto([&, 'acirc;&euro;&sbquo;Anagrelide']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([megakaryocytopoiesis, by, reducing, the, expression, levels, of, 'GATA-1', and, 'FOG-1', via, a, 'PDEIII-independent', mechanism, that, is, differentiation, 'context-specific', and, does, not, involve, inhibition, of, 'MPL-mediated', early, signal, transduction, events])].
[sujeto(['The', human, 'beta-globin', genes, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, developmentally, controlled, fashion])].
[sujeto(['Studies', on, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, the, 'stage-specific', regulation, of, globin, genes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, fueled, by, the, clinical, benefit, of, elevated, fetal, 'gamma-globin', expression, in, patients, with, sickle, cell, anemia, and, thalassemia])].
[sujeto(['Recent']), verbo([reports]), complemento([suggested, a, role, of, the, hematopoietic, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1,', its, cofactor, 'FOG-1,', and, the, associated, chromatin, remodeling, complex, 'NuRD', in, the, developmental, silencing, of, 'HBG1', and, 'HBG2', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'FOG-1/NuRD', interaction, is, dispensable, for, the, silencing, of, human, 'HBG1', and, 'HBG2', expression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', a, significant, reduction, of, 'adult-type', human, and, murine, globin, gene, expression, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, adult, bone, marrows, of, mutant, animals])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that,', 'unexpectedly,', 'NuRD', is, required, for, 'FOG-1-dependent', activation, of, 'adult-type', globin, gene, expression, but, is, dispensable, for, human, 'gamma-globin', silencing, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, is, difficult, to, fractionate, living, eosinophils, by, flow, cytometry, because, these, granulocytes]), verbo([express]), complemento([multiple, cell, surface, markers, that, are, shared, by, other, cells, of, hematopoietic, or, 'non-hematopoietic', origin])].
[sujeto(['To', fractionate, these, cell, 'types,', we, used, transgenic, mouse, lines, that]), verbo([express]), complemento([fluorescent, proteins, under, control, of, the, 'Gata1', gene, hematopoietic, regulatory, region, '(', 'Gata1-HRD),', which, is, exclusively, active, in, 'Gata1-expressing', hematopoietic, 'cells,', including, eosinophils])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, these, 'eosinophil-specific', genes]), verbo([increased]), complemento([as, the, cells, differentiated])].
[sujeto(['Nuclear', factors]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, development, of, complex, tissues, by, promoting, the, formation, of, one, cell, lineage, over, another])].
[sujeto(['The', cofactor, 'FOG1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, transcription, factors, 'GATA1', and, 'GATA2', to, control, erythroid, and, megakaryocyte, '(', 'MK)', differentiation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'FOG1', antagonizes, the, ability, of, 'GATA', factors, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([mast, cell, '(', 'MC)', development])].
[sujeto(['Normal', 'FOG1', function, in, 'late-stage', erythroid, cells, and, 'MK']), verbo([requires]), complemento([interaction, with, the, chromatin, remodeling, complex, 'NuRD'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, mice, in, which, the, 'FOG1/NuRD', interaction, is, disrupted, '(', 'Fog(ki/ki))', produce, 'MK-erythroid', progenitors, that, give, rise, to, significantly, fewer, and, less, mature, 'MK', and, erythroid, colonies, in, vitro, while, retaining, multilineage, 'capacity,', capable, of, generating, 'MCs', and, other, myeloid, lineage, cells])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, 'GATA1-dependent', committed, erythroid, cell, 'line,', select, 'MC', genes, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, occupied, by, 'NuRD,', suggesting, a, direct, mechanism, of, repression])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, simple, heritable, silencing, mechanism, is, insufficient, to, permanently, repress, 'MC', genes])].
[sujeto(['Instead,', the, continuous, presence, of, 'GATA1,', 'FOG1,', and, 'NuRD', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, maintain, lineage, fidelity, throughout, 'MK-erythroid', ontogeny])].
[sujeto(['The', transcriptional, 'co-factor', 'Friend', of, 'GATA1', '(', 'FOG-1)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, interact, with, subunits, of, the, nucleosome, remodelling, and, histone, deacetylase, '(', 'NuRD)', complex, through, a, specific, motif, located, at, its, 'N-terminus'])].
[sujeto(['Homozygous', 'FOG-1(R3K5A)', mice, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, 'splenomegaly,', extramedullary, 'erythropoiesis,', granulocytosis, and, thrombocytopaenia, secondary, to, a, block, in, megakaryocyte, maturation])].
[sujeto(['FOG-1(R3K5A/R3K5A)', megakaryocytes, and, erythroid, progenitors]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([increased, levels, of, 'GATA2,', showing, that, 'FOG-1/NuRD', interaction, is, required, for, the, earlier, described, '\'', 'GATA', 'Switch\''])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', ablation, of, 'FOG-1/NuRD', interaction]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, inappropriate, expression, of, mast, cell, and, 'eosinophil-specific', genes, in, the, megakaryocyte, and, erythroid, lineages])].

[sujeto(['More', 'significantly,', our, findings, indicate, that, the, expression, of, the, dominant, negative, 'S133A', mutant, of, 'CREB']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, reduction, in, 'LPA-stimulated', proliferation, of, 'HeyA8', ovarian, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['Administration', of, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;2-agonists']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([skeletal, muscle, anabolism, and, hypertrophy])].

[sujeto(['This', could]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, a, transient, increase, in, protein, translation, and, could, explain, previous, studies, that, reported, increase, in, protein, synthesis, following, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;2-agonist', administration])].

[sujeto(['CREB', activation]), verbo([involves]), complemento([its, phosphorylation, on, 'Ser-133,', which, promotes, interaction, between, the, 'CREB', 'kinase-inducible', domain, '(', 'KID)', and, the, 'KID-interacting', domain, of, the, transcriptional, 'coactivator,', 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'KID', also, contains, a, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([phosphorylation, 'cluster,', termed, the, 'ATM/CK', 'cluster,', which, is, processively, phosphorylated, in, response, to, 'DNA', damage, by, the, coordinated, actions, of, 'ataxia-telangiectasia-mutated', '(', 'ATM)', and, casein, kinases, '(', 'CKs)', 1, and, 2])].

[sujeto(['Cocaine-', and, 'amphetamine-regulated', transcript, '(', 'CART)', is, an, islet, peptide, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['glucose-stimulated', insulin, secretion, in, beta, cells, via, 'cAMP/PKA-dependent', pathways])].

[sujeto(['Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD)', is, a, chronic, progressive, neurodegenerative, movement, disorder, characterized, by, the, selective]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, nigrostriatal, dopaminergic, neurons])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, molecular, pathways]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, dopaminergic, neuron, degeneration, have, remained, obscure, until, recently])].

[sujeto(['Bioactive', compounds]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, stimulate, mitochondrial, biogenesis, are, linked, to, many, health, benefits, such, increased, 'longevity,', improved, energy, 'utilization,', and, protection, from, reactive, oxygen, species])].

[sujeto(['Small-molecule', inhibitors, of, protein, kinases]), verbo([have]), complemento([contributed, immensely, to, our, understanding, of, biological, signaling, pathways, and, have, been, exploited, therapeutically, for, the, treatment, of, cancers, and, other, disease, states])].

[sujeto(['Finally,', we, demonstrate, that, both, transfections, of, 'MSK1-KD', and, 'MSK1', siRNA, -, -, but, not, the, 'WT', 'MSK1', or, control, siRNA, -, -, downregulate, the, expression, of, 'SCF']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'IL-1ss'])].

[sujeto(['Androgen', receptor, trapped, 'clone-27', '(', 'ART-27)', is, a, cofactor, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, androgen, receptor, '(', 'AR)', amino, terminus, and, modulates, 'AR-dependent', transcription])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ART-27', gene, expression, is, repressed, and, its, promoter, is, histone, 'H3-K27', 'tri-methylated', in, human, embryonic, kidney, 'cells,', but, not, prostate, 'cells,', and, the, histone, deacetylase, 'inhibitor,', trichostatin, 'A,', relieves, this, inhibition])].

[sujeto(['As', their, therapeutic, action]), verbo([requires]), complemento([chronic, 'treatment,', adaptive, neuronal, processes, are, suggested, to, be, involved])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, basis, of, this, are, changes, in, gene, expression]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, transcription, factors, such, as, 'CREB', '(', 'cAMP-response-element-binding', 'protein)'])].
[sujeto(['The', bZip, is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'CREB', dimerization, and, 'DNA-binding,', but, also, contributes, to, 'CREB', transactivation, by, recruiting, the, coactivator, 'TORC', '(', transducer, of, regulated, 'CREB)'])].
[sujeto(['LiCl', '(', 6, mM, or, 'higher)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([an, up, to, 4.7, -, fold, increase, in, 8, -, 'bromo-cAMP-stimulated', 'CRE/CREB-directed', transcription])].

[sujeto(['However,', lithium, no, longer]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['CREB', activity, when, the, 'CREB-bZip', was, deleted, or, the, 'TORC-binding', site, inside, the, 'CREB-bZip', was, specifically, mutated, '(', 'CREB-R300A)'])].

[sujeto(['We', thus, support, the, hypothesis, that, lithium, salts]), verbo([modulate]), complemento(['CRE/CREB-dependent', gene, transcription, and, suggest, the, 'CREB', coactivator, 'TORC', as, a, new, molecular, target, of, lithium])].
[sujeto(['A', subgroup, of, genes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'IFN-gamma', requires, both, 'STAT1', and, 'IRF1', for, transcriptional, activation])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'WT,', 'stat1(-/-),', or, 'irf1(-/-)', 'cells,', we, analyzed, the, changes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'IFN-gamma', in, gbp2, promoter, chromatin])].
[sujeto(['Hyperacetylation', of, histone, 4, also]), verbo([required]), complemento(['STAT1'])].

[sujeto(['RNA', polymerase, 'II', association, with, the, gbp2, promoter]), verbo([required]), complemento([both, 'STAT1', and, 'IRF1,', suggesting, that, both, proteins, mediate, essential, steps, in, transcriptional, activation])].

[sujeto(['MSK1', '(', 'mitogen-', and, 'stress-activated', kinase, 1, ')', is, a, dual, kinase, domain, protein, that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([downstream, of, the, 'ERK1/2', '(', 'extracellular-signal-regulated', kinase, 1, /, 2, ')', and, p38, 'MAPK', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase)', signalling, pathways, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['MSK1,', and, its, related, isoform, 'MSK2,', phosphorylate, the, transcription, factors, 'CREB', '(', 'cAMP-response-element-binding', 'protein)', and, 'ATF1', '(']), verbo([activating]), complemento([transcription, factor, 1, ')', ',', and, the, chromatin, proteins, histone, 'H3', and, 'HMGN1', '(', 'high-mobility-group', 'nucleosomal-binding', protein, 1, ')', in, response, to, either, mitogenic, stimulation, or, cellular, stress])].
[sujeto(['MSK1', activity, is, tightly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, 'cells,', and, activation, requires, the, phosphorylation, of, 'MSK1', by, either, 'ERK1/2', or, p38a])].
[sujeto(['This', results, in, activation, of, the, 'C-terminal', kinase, 'domain,', which, then, phosphorylates, further, sites, in, 'MSK1,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, activation, of, the, 'N-terminal', kinase, domain, and, phosphorylation, of, substrates])].
[sujeto(['One', of, these, 'sites,', 'Thr700,', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, a, third, site, in, 'MSK1', phosphorylated, by, the, upstream, kinases, 'ERK1/2', and, p38a])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, 'Thr700', resulted, in, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([basal, activity, of, 'MSK1,', but, this, could, be, further, increased, by, stimulation, with, 'PMA', or, 'UV-C', radiation])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', 'however,', mutation, of, 'Thr700', resulted, in, a, dramatic]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Thr581', 'phosphorylation,', a, site, essential, for, activity])].
[sujeto(['Together', these, results, are, consistent, with, a, mechanism, by, which, 'Thr700', phosphorylation, relieves, the, inhibition, of, 'MSK1', by, a, 'C-terminal', autoinhibitory, helix, and, helps]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, conformational, shift, that, protects, 'Thr581', from, dephosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Using', the, mouse, 'Langendorff', heart, perfusion, 'model,', the, signaling, pathways, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cardiac, 'CREB-S133', phosphorylation, have, been, defined])].
[sujeto(['In', mouse, hearts]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, isoproterenol, '(', 'ISO)', '(', 10, '(', -, 8, ')', 'M),', 'endothelin-1', '(', 'ET-1)', '(', 10, '(', -, 8, ')', 'M),', and, phorbol, 12, -, myristate, 13, -, acetate, '(', 'TPA)', '(', 10, '(', -, 7, ')', 'M),', 'CREB-S133', phosphorylation, was, attained, only, by, 'TPA-treatment'])].
[sujeto(['ISO-', and, 'ET-1-stimulation']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Ca2+/calmodulin-dependent', kinase, 'II', '(', 'CaMKII)'])].

[sujeto(['These', 'results,', unlike, those]), verbo([reported]), complemento([in, other, 'tissues,', demonstrate, that, cardiac, 'CREB', is, not, a, 'multi-signal', target])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([hormone, receptor, superfamily, function, as, key, transcriptional, regulators, of, inflammation, and, proliferation, in, cardiovascular, diseases])].
[sujeto(['The', 'neuron-derived', orphan, 'receptor-1', '(', 'NOR1)', belongs, to, the, 'ligand-independent', 'NR4A', 'subfamily,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, cell, 'proliferation,', 'differentiation,', and, apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', sustained, activation, of, 'CBP-responsive', genes, results, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['beta-cell', proliferation])].
[sujeto(['We', recently, described, a, pair, of, 'ligands,', 'PPKID4(P)', '(', 4, '(', 'P))', and, 'PPKID6(U)', '(', 6, '(', 'U)),', which, present, the, 'alpha-helical', functional, epitope]), verbo([found]), complemento([on, helix, 'B', of, the, 'CREB', 'KID', activation, domain, '(', 'KID(P))', on, a, pancreatic, fold, protein, scaffold])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, 'CREB', activates, transcription, of, target, genes, in, part, through, direct, interactions, with, the, 'KIX', domain, of, the, coactivator, 'CBP', in, a, 'phosphorylation-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['The', solution, structure, of, the, complex, formed, by, the, phosphorylated, 'kinase-inducible', domain, '(', 'pKID)', of, 'CREB', with, 'KIX']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, pKID, undergoes, a, 'coil--&gt;helix', folding, transition, upon, binding, to, 'KIX,', forming, two, alpha, helices])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, a, phosphoserine, binding, domain, in, the, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', which, interacts, with, the, protein, kinase, 'A-phosphorylated,', and, hence, 'activated,', form, of, the, cyclic, 'AMP-responsive', factor, 'CREB'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['domain,', referred, to, as, 'KIX,', is, alpha, helical, and, binds, to, an, unstructured, 'kinase-inducible', domain, in, 'CREB', following, phosphorylation, of, 'CREB', at, 'Ser-133'])].
[sujeto(['Like', the, src, homology, 2, '(', 'SH2)', domains, which]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['phosphotyrosine-containing', 'peptides,', phosphoserine, 133, appears, to, coordinate, with, a, single, arginine, residue, '(', 'Arg-600)', in, 'KIX', which, is, conserved, in, the, 'CBP-related', protein, 'P300'])].
[sujeto(['Since', mutagenesis, of, 'Arg-600', to, 'Gln', severely, reduces, 'CREB-CBP', complex, 'formation,', our, results, demonstrate, 'that,', as, in, the, case, of, tyrosine, kinase, 'pathways,', signal, transduction, through, 'serine/threonine', kinase, pathways, may, also]), verbo([require]), complemento([protein, interaction, motifs, which, are, capable, of, recognizing, phosphorylated, amino, acids])].
[sujeto(['Nearly', two, dozens, of, bioactive, compounds]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, isolated, from, 'SJW'])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', the, efficiency, of, the, extracts, of, 'SJW']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, dependent, on, the, concentration, of, hyperforin])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, review, article, is, to, propose, an, overview, of, the, recent, scientific, publications, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, new, and, relevant, insights, into, the, neurobiological, actions, of, hyperforin])].
[sujeto(['Hyperforin']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, described, as, an, inhibitor, of, the, reuptake, of, many, neurotransmitters, such, as, 'dopamine,', 'norepinephrine,', serotonin, or, glutamate])].
[sujeto(['More', 'recently,', hyperforin]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, activate, 'TRPC6,', a, 'Ca(2+)-conducting', channel, of, the, plasma, 'membrane,', which, is, the, only, channel, opened, by, this, molecule])].
[sujeto(['Chronically', applied, to, neuronal, cell, line, 'PC12,', hyperforin]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, extension, of, neurites, via, a, mechanism, implying, 'TRPC6', channels])].
[sujeto(['It', is, also, known, to]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([an, intracellular, signalling, pathway, that, involves, the, 'cAMP-dependent', protein, kinase, 'A', and, the, transcription, factor, cyclic, adenosine, monophosphate, response, element, binding, protein, '(', 'CREB)'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, an, 'up-regulation', of, the, expression, of, the, 'brain-derived', neurotrophic, factor, '(', 'BDNF)', receptor, neurotrophic, tyrosine, kinase, '(', 'TrkB)', and, 'TRPC6'])].
[sujeto(['One', key, aspect, of, the, cellular, responses]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, hyperforin, is, its, impact, on, the, homeostasis, of, several, cations, '(', 'Na(+),', 'Ca(2+),', 'Zn(2+)', and, 'H(+))'])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, experiments, demonstrated, that, 'hyperforin,', which, changes, the, fluidity, of, 'membranes,', elevates, the, intracellular, concentration, of, these, elements, by]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([their, influx, 'and/or', their, release, from, internal, compartments])].
[sujeto(['Although', it]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, reuptake, of, many, 'neurotransmitters,', hyperforin, is, in, fact, a, 'multi-target', drug, influencing, the, cellular, homeostatic, mechanisms, of, 'Ca(2+),', 'Zn(2+),', 'H(+)', and, 'Na(+)', due, to, its, effects, on, their, influx, 'and/or', release, from, internal, stores])].
[sujeto(['This', 'is,', at, least, in, 'part,', based, on, an, involvement, of, zinc, ions, in, immune, cell, signal, 'transduction;', dynamic, changes, of, the, intracellular, free, zinc, concentration]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, been, recognized, as, signaling, events])].
[sujeto(['Because', the, molecular]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, zinc, signals, remain, incompletely, 'understood,', we, investigated, the, impact, of, elevated, intracellular, free, zinc, on, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', activity, and, 'MAPK-dependent', cytokine, production, in, human, 'T-cells'])].
[sujeto([p38, was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, treatment, with, zinc, and, the, ionophore, 'pyrithione,', whereas, 'ERK1/2', and, 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinases, were, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', after, 'T-cell', receptor, stimulation, with, antibodies, against, 'CD3,', 'ERK1/2-phosphorylation', was, selectively]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, intracellular, zinc])].
[sujeto(['Mechanisms', that, had, been, shown, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['zinc-effects', in, other, 'cells,', such, as, activation, of, the, 'Src', kinase, 'Lck,', inhibition, of, the, protein, tyrosine, phosphatase, 'CD45', or, 'MAPK', phosphatases, and, cyclic, 'nucleotide/protein', kinase, 'A', signaling, were, not, involved])].

[sujeto(['In', many, 'cases,', metal]), verbo([binding]), complemento([provides, a, major, driving, force, for, a, polypeptide, chain, to, fold])].

[sujeto(['Tumor', micromilieu, often, shows, pronounced, acidosis, forcing, cells, to, adapt, their, phenotype, towards]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([tumorigenesis, induced, by, altered, cellular, signalling, and, transcriptional, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Extracellular', acidosis]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, rapid, and, sustained, decrease, of, 'pH(i)', in, parallel, to, p38, phosphorylation, in, all, cell, types, and, to, 'ERK1/2', phosphorylation, in, 3, of, 6, cell, types])].

[sujeto(['However,', our, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, acidosis, enhances, the, formation, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS),', probably, originating, from, 'mitochondria,', which, subsequently, trigger, 'MAPK', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Scavenging', of, 'ROS']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['acidosis-induced', 'MAPK', phosphorylation, whereas, addition, of, 'H(2)O(2)', enhanced, it])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', acidosis]), verbo([increased]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, the, transcription, factor, 'CREB', via, 'p38,', leading, to, increased, transcriptional, activity, of, a, 'CRE-reporter', even, 24, h, after, switching, the, cells, back, to, a, normal, environmental, milieu])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', an, acidic, tumor, microenvironment, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, longer, lasting, 'p38-CREB-medited', change, in, the, transcriptional, 'program,', which, may, maintain, the, altered, phenotype, even, when, the, cells, leave, the, tumor, environment])].
[sujeto(['Insulinotropic', actions, of, the, incretins]), verbo([involve]), complemento([modulation, of, 'voltage-gated', potassium, '(', 'Kv)', channels])].
[sujeto(['In', multiple, cell, 'types,', 'Kv', channel, activity]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, cell, volume, changes, accompanying, initiation, of, the, apoptotic, program])].
[sujeto([1, in, 'INS-1', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-cells', potentiated, apoptosis, in, response, to, mitochondrial, and, 'ER', stress, 'and,', 'conversely,', 'co-stimulation', with, 'GIP/GLP-1', uncoupled, this, 'potentiation,']), verbo([suppressing]), complemento([apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['This', appears, to, be, the, first, demonstration, of, modulation, of, delayed, rectifier, 'Kv', channels, contributing, to, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-cell', prosurvival, effects, of, incretins, and, of, 7, -, transmembrane, 'G', 'protein-coupled', receptor, '(', 'GPCR)-stimulated', export, of, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([lysine, acetyltransferase, that, regulates, cell, surface, ion, channel, function])].
[sujeto(['Principal', neurons, of, the, medial, nucleus, of, the, trapezoid, body, '(', 'MNTB)']), verbo([express]), complemento([a, spectrum, of, 'voltage-dependent', 'K(+)', conductances, mediated, by, 'Kv1-Kv4', 'channels,', which, shape, action, potential, '(', 'AP)', firing, and, regulate, intrinsic, excitability])].
[sujeto(['Postsynaptic', factors, influencing, expression, of, 'Kv', channels, were, explored, using, organotypic, cultures, of, brainstem, prepared, from, 'P9-P12', rats, and]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, either, low, '(', 5, 'mm,', 'low-K)', or, high, '(', 25, 'mm,', 'high-K)', '[', 'K(+)](o)', medium])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([orphan, receptor, gene, 'Nur77', in, neuronal, cells, is, induced, by, 'activity-dependent', increases, in, intracellular, 'Ca2+', ions])].

[sujeto(['Calcium', entry, into, neuronal, cells, through, voltage, or, 'ligand-gated', ion, channels]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([neuronal, 'activity-dependent', gene, expression, critical, for, adaptive, changes, in, the, nervous, system])].
[sujeto(['Cytoplasmic', calcium, transients, are, often, accompanied, by, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, concentration, of, nuclear, 'calcium,', but, the, functional, significance, of, such, spatially, distinct, calcium, signals, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, gene, expression, is, differentially, controlled, by]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([and, cytoplasmic, calcium, signals, which, enable, a, single, second, messenger, to, generate, diverse, transcriptional, responses])].

[sujeto(['Mineralocorticoid', hormones, such, as, aldosterone]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([cellular, ion, homeostasis, at, least, in, part, through, the, regulation, of, 'Na+,', 'K(+)-ATPase', '(', 'NAKA)', gene, expression])].

[sujeto([cAMP, also]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NAKA', alpha, 1, gene, expression, which, at, the, transcriptional, level, is, 'mediated,', in, 'part,', through, a, cAMP, response, element, '(', 'CRE)', present, on, a, highly, 'conserved,', 48, base, pair, enhancer, 'region,', the, 'PUC-1', 'core,', of, the, rat, 'NAKA', alpha, 1, subunit, gene, promoter])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'MR', suppresses, 'cAMP-mediated', activation, of, 'PUC-1', core, driven, 'CAT', activity, possibly, through, a, direct, interaction, with, 'CREB/ATF', transcriptional, factors])].
[sujeto(['This', in, turn]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, interaction, of, two, distinct, signal, transduction, 'systems,', aldosterone, and, 'cAMP,', may, define, the, mineralocorticoid, responsiveness, of, the, 'Na+,', 'K(+)-ATPase', alpha, 1, gene])].
[sujeto([5, ',', a, 'Shaker-like', delayed, rectifier, 'K+', channel, cloned, in, our, 'laboratory,', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, both, tissue, and, developmentally, specific, manners])].
[sujeto(['The', gene, lacks, a, canonical, 'TATA', 'box,']), verbo([has]), complemento([several, transcription, start, 'sites,', and, the, 5, '\'', -, noncoding, sequence, is, intronless])].

[sujeto(['We', tested, whether, neuroprotective, microRNAs, '(', 'miRs)', like, 'miR-206,', 'miR-17,', 'miR-21,', 'miR-7-1,', and, 'miR-106a', could]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([efficacy, of, estrogen, receptor, '(', 'ER)', agonists, such, as, 1, ',', 3, ',', 5, -, tris, '(', 4, -, 'hydroxyphenyl)-4-propyl-1H-pyrazole', '(', 'PPT,', 'ER&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'agonist),', 'Way200070', '(', 'WAY,', 'ER&Icirc;&sup2;', 'agonist),', and, estrogen, '(', 'EST,', 'ER&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, 'ER&Icirc;&sup2;', 'agonist)', in, preventing, apoptosis, in, the, calcium, ionophore, '(', 'CI)-insulted', ventral, spinal, cord, 4.1, '(', 'VSC4'])].

[sujeto(['We', previously, demonstrated, that, bone, morphogenetic, proteins, '(', 'BMPs)']), verbo([induce]), complemento([cardiomyocyte, differentiation, through, the, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinase, 'TAK1'])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', factors, 'Smads']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([transforming, growth, 'factor-beta', signaling, and, the, 'ATF/CREB', family, transcription, factor, 'ATF-2', has, recently, been, shown, to, act, as, a, common, target, of, the, 'Smad', and, the, 'TAK1', pathways])].

[sujeto(['In', 'end-stage', human, heart, 'failure,', excessive, 'beta-adrenergic', stimulation, of, the, 'cAMP-dependent', signaling, pathway, due, to]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([endogenous, catecholamines, is, hypothesized, to, contribute, to, expressional, alterations, of, myocardial, regulatory, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', cAMP, response, element, modulator, '(', 'CREM)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, transcription, of, 'cAMP-responsive', genes, and, might, be, involved, in, the, regulation, of, cardiac, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'CREM-Ib', 'deltaC-X']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([cAMP, response, element, '(', 'CRE)', -, mediated, gene, transcription, in, 'HIT-T15', 'cells,', and, this, activity, was, assigned, to, the, part, of, the, sequence, encoding, putative, internally, translated, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Two', of, three, possible, internally]), verbo([translated]), complemento([proteins, were, immunologically, identified, in, cells, overexpressing, 'CREM-Ib', 'deltaC-X', tagged, with, the, hemagglutinin, epitope, of, the, influenza, virus])].
[sujeto(['Both', proteins, were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, bacteria, and, showed, 'CRE-specific', 'DNA', 'binding,', formation, of, heterodimers, with, the, cAMP, response, element, binding, protein, '(', 'CREB),', and, inhibition, of, 'CREB\'s', binding, to, the, 'CRE'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'CREM-Ib', 'deltaC-X', generates, internally]), verbo([translated]), complemento([repressors, of, 'CRE-mediated', gene, 'transcription,', suggesting, the, first, example, for, the, existence, and, function, of, human, cardiac, 'CREM'])].
[sujeto(['Erythrocyte-binding', antigen, 175, '(', 'EBA-175)', is, a, member, of, a, family, of, 'Plasmodium', falciparum, 'erythrocyte-binding', proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, formation, of, a, tight, 'junction,', a, necessary, step, in, invasion])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, present, the, crystal, structure, of, 'EBA-175', region, 'VI', '(', 'rVI),', a, 'cysteine-rich', domain, that, is, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([within, the, protein, family, and, is, essential, for, 'EBA-175', trafficking])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, 'homodimer,', containing, in, each, subunit, a, compact, 'five-alpha-helix', core, that, is, stabilized, by, four, conserved, disulfide, bridges])].
[sujeto([rVI, adopts, a, novel, fold, that, is, likely]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([across, the, protein, 'family,', indicating, a, conserved, function])].
[sujeto(['It', shows, no, similarity, to, the, 'Duffy-binding-like', domains, of, 'EBA-175']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, erythrocyte, 'binding,', indicating, a, distinct, role])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', rVI, possesses, structural, features, related, to, the, 'KIX-binding', domain, of, the, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', 'protein,', supporting, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, trafficking, roles, that, have, been, ascribed, to, it, and, providing, a, rational, basis, for, further, experimental, investigation, of, its, function])].
[sujeto(['Proper', embryonic, development]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, 'fine-tuned', control, of, gene, 'expression,', which, is, achieved, in, part, through, the, activity, of, transcription, coactivators, or, corepressors])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([coactivator, 'cAMP-response', 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', binding, protein, '(', 'CREBBP', or, 'CBP)', interacts, with, numerous, transcription, factors, and, thereby, plays, a, key, role, in, various, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', in, 'cell-based', studies, 'CREBBP', activity, is]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, 'post-translational', modifications, such, as, methylation, on, arginine, residues, which, is, catalyzed, by, 'coactivator-associated', arginine, methyltransferase, 1, '(', 'CARM1)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', whether, and, where, 'CREBBP,', and, in, particular, its, methylated, 'forms,', are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([during, development, in, vertebrates, has, not, been, addressed, so, far])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, while, crebbpa, expression, is, higher, in, 'posterior,', caudal, nascent, somites, during, 'somitogenesis,', crebbpb, accumulates, in, 'anterior,', 'rostral,', and, more, mature, somites])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, while, 'CREBBP', is, clearly, cytoplasmic, in, the, early, 'blastula,', it, becomes, both, cytoplasmic, and, nuclear, at, 30, '%', epiboly, before, turning, mainly, nuclear, during, gastrulation])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'interest,', 'CREBBP', methylated, species, appear, to, be, mainly]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([from, 30, '%', epiboly, to, 6, -, somite, stage])].

[sujeto(['ATP-sensitive', potassium, '(', 'KATP)', channels]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, 'ASMCs'])].
[sujeto(['Mount', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([suggested, that, 'KATP', channel, openers, can, reduce, airway, hyperresponsiveness, and, alleviate, airway, remodeling])].

[sujeto(['Rubinstein-Taybi', syndrome, '(', 'RSTS)', is, one, of, the, neurodevelopmental, disorders]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, of, epigenetic, genes])].
[sujeto(['To', 'date,', there]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, few, reports, on, the, structural, abnormalities, of, the, brain, in, 'RSTS', patients])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, a, 'Moroccan', family, with, two, children, with, 'RSTS', and, apparently, unaffected, parents])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([a, girl, with, 'Rubinstein-Taybi', syndrome, '(', 'RSTS)', who, was, found, to, have, copy, number, loss, on, 16, p13])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, junction, sequence, across, the, breakpoint, region, for, a, microdeletion, in, 'RSTS'])].

[sujeto(['Rubinstein-Taybi', syndrome, '(', 'RSTS)', is, a, congenital, neurodevelopmental, disorder, defined, by, postnatal, growth, 'deficiency,', characteristic, skeletal, abnormalities, and, mental, retardation, and]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, mutations, in, the, genes, encoding, for, the, transcriptional, 'co-activators', with, intrinsic, lysine, acetyltransferase, '(', 'KAT)', activity, 'CBP', and, p300])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, neuronal, histone, acetylation, is, reduced, in, mouse, models, of, 'RSTS'])].
[sujeto(['The', most, severe, defects, were, observed, in, the, lines, carrying, the, whole, deletion, of, the, 'CREBBP', gene, and, the, truncating, 'mutation,', both]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, haploinsufficiency, state])].
[sujeto(['The', 'authors\'', results, extend, to, humans, the, seminal, observations, in, 'RSTS', mouse, models, and, point, to, histone, acetylation, 'defects,', mainly]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['H2B', and, 'H2A,', as, relevant, molecular, markers, of, the, disease])].
[sujeto(['Studies', in, mouse, models, for, 'RSTS', first]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([a, direct, role, for, 'CBP', and, histone, acetylation, in, cognition, and, memory])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, took, advantage, of, the, genetic, tools, for, generating, mice, in, which, the, 'CBP', gene, is, specifically, deleted, in, postmitotic, principal, neurons, of, the, forebrain, to, investigate, the, consequences, of, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'CBP', in, the, adult, brain])].
