[sujeto(['The', 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', plaques]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, disrupt, the, normal, cellular, processes, and, thereby, trigger, abnormal, signaling, which, results, in, the, death, of, neurons])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, 'molecular-genetic', 'mechanism(s)', responsible, for, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([neurodegeneration, is, yet, to, be, fully, understood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([utilized, 'Gal4/UAS', system, to, develop, a, transgenic, fruit, fly, model, for, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', mediated, neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['Targeted', misexpression, of, human, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', in, the, differentiating, photoreceptor, neurons, of, the, developing, eye, of, transgenic, fly]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, a, histone, 'acetylase,', 'CREB', 'Binding', 'Protein', '(', 'CBP),', as, a, genetic, modifier, of, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'gain-of-function', of, 'CBP', rescues, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', mediated, neurodegeneration, by, blocking, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Misexpression', of, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', affects, the]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, axons, from, retina, to, the, brain, but, misexpression, of, full, length, 'CBP', along, with, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', can, restore, this, defect])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CBP', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([multiple, domains, and, is, known, to, interact, with, many, different, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Our', structure, function, analysis, using, truncated, constructs, lacking, one, or, more, domains, of, 'CBP', 'protein,', in, transgenic, flies, revealed, that, 'Bromo,', 'HAT', and, polyglutamine, '(', 'BHQ)', domains, together, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, neuroprotective, function, of, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['This', 'BHQ', domain, of, 'CBP']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, attributed, to, promote, survival, in, any, other, neurodegenerative, disorders])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'CBP', as, a, genetic, modifier, of, 'A&Icirc;&sup2;42', mediated, neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'BHQ', domain, of, 'CBP', is, responsible, for, its, neuroprotective, function])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([significant, bearing, on, our, understanding, of, genetic, basis, of, 'AD'])].
[sujeto(['Green', anoles, are, seasonally, breeding, lizards, in, which, male, sexual, behavior, is, primarily]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, an, annual, increase, in, testosterone])].

[sujeto(['This', study, is, the, first, description, of, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', in, the, reptilian, 'brain,', and, investigates, the, possibility, that, changes, in, 'CBP,', an, androgen, receptor, 'coactivator,', may, facilitate, differences, in, responsiveness, to, testosterone, across, seasons])].
[sujeto(['Similar', to, other, 'vertebrates,', 'CBP', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, relatively, high, levels, in, 'steroid-sensitive', brain, regions])].
[sujeto(['This', pattern]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'CBP', might, influence, 'female-biased', functions, controlled, by, the, ventromedial, 'amygdala,', but, is, not, consistent, with, a, role, in, mediating, seasonal, differences, in, responsiveness, to, testosterone, in, these, areas, associated, with, reproductive, function])].
[sujeto(['The', cyclic, 'AMP', response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', is, a, 'signal-dependent', transcription, factor, that, exerts, its, positive, effects, on, gene, transcription, of, a, broad, range, of, genes, by]), verbo([recruiting]), complemento(['coactivators,', including, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP),', its, 'paralog,', 'p300,', and, the, family, of, 'CRTC', '(', 'CREB-regulated', transcriptional, 'coactivators)', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, describe, how, both, mechanisms, could, concurrently, drive, transcription, of, 'CREB']), verbo([targets]), complemento([in, a, subset, of, head, and, neck, cancers, featuring, chromosomal, translocations, that, fuse, portions, of, 'CRTC1', and, 'CRTC3', genes, with, that, of, the, 'Mastermind-like', transcriptional, coactivator, 'MAML2'])].

[sujeto(['Th17', responses, are, critical, to, a, variety, of, human, autoimmune, 'diseases,', and, therapeutic]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([with, monoclonal, antibodies, against, 'IL-17', and, 'IL-23', has, shown, considerable, promise])].

[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'CBP30']), verbo([has]), complemento([marked, molecular, specificity, for, the, bromodomains, of, 'CBP', and, 'p300,', compared, with, 43, other, bromodomains])].

[sujeto(['The', homeodomain, transcription, 'factor,', 'T-cell', leukemia, 3, '(', 'Tlx3),', functions, as, the, master, neuronal, fate, regulator, by, instructively]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([the, specification, of, glutamatergic, excitatory, neurons, and, suppressing, the, specification, of, 'gamma-aminobutyric', acid, '(', 'GABAergic)', neurons])].

[sujeto(['Nuclear', 'factor-&Icirc;&ordm;B', '(', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B)', is, an, inducible, transcription, factor, that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([immune, and, inflammatory, responses])].

[sujeto(['CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, p300, are, transcriptional, coactivators]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, numerous, biological, processes, that, affect, cell, 'growth,', 'transformation,', 'differentiation,', and, development])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, of, the, involvement, of, 'homeodomain-interacting', protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'HIPK2)', in, the, regulation, of, 'CBP', activity])].

[sujeto(['Mutations', of, the, 'Wnt/&Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', signaling, pathway, initiate, the, majority, of, 'CRC', 'cases,', and, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, hyperactivation, of, this, pathway, by, butyrate, and, other, 'HDACis', promotes, 'CRC', cell, apoptosis])].

[sujeto(['Intrinsically', disordered, proteins, '(', 'IDPs)', frequently, function, in, protein, interaction, networks, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([crucial, cellular, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Many', 'IDPs', undergo, transitions, from, disordered, conformational, ensembles, to, folded, structures, upon]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, their, cellular, targets])].
[sujeto(['Several', possible]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mechanisms, for, coupled, folding, and, binding, have, been, 'identified:', folding, of, the, 'IDP', after, association, with, the, target, '(', &, 'quot;induced', 'fit&quot;),', or, binding, of, a, prefolded, state, in, the, conformational, ensemble, of, the, 'IDP', to, the, target, protein, '(', &, 'quot;conformational', 'selection&quot;),', or, some, combination, of, these, two, extremes])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, the, intrinsically, disordered, phosphorylated, 'kinase-inducible', domain, '(', 'pKID)', of, the, 'cAMP-response', element]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 'CREB)', protein, with, the, 'KIX', domain, of, a, general, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', provides, an, example, of, the, 'induced-fit', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, by, 'NMR', relaxation, dispersion, experiments, that, a, different, intrinsically, disordered, 'ligand,', the, transactivation, domain, of, the, transcription, factor, 'c-Myb,']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'KIX', at, the, same, site, as, pKID, but, via, a, different, binding, mechanism, that, involves, elements, of, conformational, selection, and, induced, fit])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'pKID,', the, 'c-Myb', activation, domain]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, strong, propensity, for, spontaneous, helix, formation, in, its, 'N-terminal', 'region,', which, binds, to, 'KIX', in, a, predominantly, folded, conformation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'C-terminal', region, of, 'c-Myb', exhibits, a, much, smaller, helical, propensity, and, likely, folds, via, an, 'induced-fit', process, after]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'KIX'])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, the, intrinsic, secondary, structure, propensities, of, pKID, and, 'c-Myb', determine, their]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['mechanisms,', consistent, with, their, functions, as, inducible, and, constitutive, transcriptional, activators])].
[sujeto(['The', 'BCNT', '(', 'Bucentaur)', superfamily, is, classified, by, an, uncharacteristic]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([sequence, of, &, 'acirc;&circ;&frac14;80', amino, acids, '(', 'aa)', at, the, 'C-terminus,', 'BCNT-C', '(', the, conserved, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'Bcnt/Cfdp1)'])].
[sujeto(['To', characterize, this, mobility, discrepancy, and, the, effects, of, 'post-translational', modifications, '(', 'PTMs),', we]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([various, deleted, 'His-Bcnt', in, 'E'])].
[sujeto([coli, and, 'HEK', cells, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, an, acidic, stretch, in, the, 'N-terminal', region, is, a, main, cause, of, the, gel, shift])].
[sujeto(['Exogenous', 'BCNT/CFDP1', constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'HEK', clones, appears, as, a, doublet, at, 49, and, 47, &, 'Acirc;&nbsp;kDa,', slower, than, the, protein, expressed, in, 'Escherichia', coli, but, faster, than, the, endogenous, protein, on, 'SDS/PAGE'])].
[sujeto(['Together', with, experiments]), verbo([involving]), complemento([treatment, with, phosphatases, and, 'Ser(250)', 'substitutions,', the, results, indicate, that, the, complex, behaviour, of, 'Bcnt/Cfdp1', on, 'SDS/PAGE', is, caused, mainly, by, an, acidic, stretch, in, the, 'N-terminal', region, and, 'Ser(250)', phosphorylation, in, 'BCNT-C'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Bcnt/Cfdp1', is, acetylated, 'in&Acirc;&nbsp;vitro', by, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, four, lysine, residues, including, 'Lys(268)', in, 'BCNT-C', are, also, acetylated, 'in&Acirc;&nbsp;vivo,']), verbo([revealed]), complemento([a, protein, regulated, at, multiple, levels])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, sumoylation, of, 'BMAL1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, rapid, activation, of, 'CLOCK-BMAL1', by, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', in, nuclear, foci, and, also, the, resetting, of, the, circadian, clock])].
[sujeto(['Under', physiological, 'conditions,', a, bimolecular, fluorescence, 'complementation-based', fluorescence, resonance, energy, transfer, '(', 'BiFC-FRET)', assay, revealed, that, 'CLOCK-BMAL1', rapidly, dimerized, and, formed, a, ternary, complex, with, 'CBP', in, discrete]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([foci, in, response, to, serum, stimuli])].

[sujeto(['Targeting', mTOR, combined, with, endocrine, therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, clinical, 'utility;', 'however,', a, negative, feedback, loop, exists, downstream, of, 'PI3K/AKT/mTOR'])].
[sujeto(['AZD5363']), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, 'dose-dependent', decrease, in, proliferation, in, all, cell, lines, tested, '(', 'GI50', &, 'lt;', 500, 'nmol/L)', except, 'HCC1428', and, 'HCC1428-LTED'])].

[sujeto(['CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', is, a, lysine, acetyltransferase, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([transcription, by, acetylating, histone, and, 'non-histone', substrates])].
[sujeto(['To', observe, the, effects, of, moxibustion, on, factors, related, with, apoptosis, of, myocardial, cells, after, sports, fatigue, in, mice, as, well, as, the, relationship, among, histone, acetyltransferases, p300, '(', 'p300),', 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, cell, apoptosis, to, discuss, the, role, of, p300, and, 'CBP', in, moxibustion, against, apoptosis, of, myocardial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Compared', with, the, control, 'group,', the, apoptosis, rate, of, myocardial, cells, in, the, sport, group, was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto([1, ')', ',', and, apoptosis, body, with, dense, distribution, and, deep, coloring, can, be, seen, in, the, field, of, 'microscope;', the, expression, of, 'Fas', protein, was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['(', 'P&lt;0'])].

[sujeto(['Due', to, the, 'hyper-activation', of, 'WNT', signaling, in, a, variety, of, cancer, 'types,', there]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, a, strong, drive, to, develop, 'pathway-specific', inhibitors, with, the, eventual, goal, of, providing, a, chemotherapeutic, antagonist, of, 'WNT', signaling, to, cancer, patients])].
[sujeto(['The', canonical, 'WNT', signaling, pathway, initiates, when, 'WNT', ligands]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, 'receptors,', causing, the, nuclear, localization, of, the, 'co-activator', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', '(', 'CTNNB1),', which, leads, to, an, association, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', with, a, member, of, the, 'TCF', transcription, factor, family, at, regulatory, regions, of, 'WNT-responsive', genes])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TCF/&Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', complex, then]), verbo([recruits]), complemento(['CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', or, p300, '(', 'EP300),', leading, to, histone, acetylation, and, gene, activation])].
[sujeto(['A', current, model, in, the, field, is, that, 'CBP-driven', expression, of, 'WNT']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, supports, proliferation, whereas, 'p300-driven', expression, of, 'WNT', target, genes, supports, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', small, molecule, inhibitor, 'ICG-001']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'CBP,', but, not, to, 'p300,', and, competitively, inhibits, the, interaction, of, 'CBP', with, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-catenin'])].
[sujeto(['Upon', treatment, of, cancer, 'cells,', this, should, reduce, expression, of, 'CBP-regulated', 'transcription,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, reduced, tumorigenicity, and, enhanced, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([compared, the, 'genome-wide', effects, on, the, transcriptome, after, treatment, with, 'ICG-001', '(', the, specific, 'CBP', 'inhibitor)', versus, 'C646,', a, compound, that, competes, with, 'acetyl-coA', for, the, 'Lys-coA', binding, pocket, of, both, 'CBP', and, p300])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, drugs, cause, 'large-scale', changes, in, the, transcriptome, of, 'HCT116', colon, cancer, cells, and, 'PANC1', pancreatic, cancer, cells, and, reverse, some, 'tumor-specific', changes, in, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'WNT']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, were, similarly, downregulated, after, treatment, of, 'HCT116', with, 'C646', as, with, 'ICG-001'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, treatment, with, a, general, 'HAT', inhibitor, causes, similar, effects, on, the, transcriptome, as, does, treatment, with, a, 'CBP-specific', inhibitor, and, that, epigenetic, inhibition, affects, the, 'WNT', pathway, in, 'HCT116', cells, and, the, cholesterol, biosynthesis, pathway, in, 'PANC1', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', discovery, of, functional, crosstalk, between, 'WNT', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([factor, &, 'Icirc;&ordm;B', '(', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B)', signaling, has, established, a, more, complex, role, for, these, two, pathways, in, inflammation, and, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'WNT/&Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', signaling, selectively]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, expression, of, a, proinflammatory, subset, of, 'IL-1&Icirc;&sup2;-induced', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', target, genes])].
[sujeto(['WNT/&Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', signaling, does, not, affect]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, the, 'RelA', subunit, of, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', or, its, association, with, 'CBP', '(', also, known, as, 'CREBBP),', but, reduces, 'CBP-mediated', acetylation, and, chromatin, recruitment, of, 'RelA'])].

[sujeto(['Genome-wide', distribution, of, histone, 'H3K18', and, 'H3K27', 'acetyltransferases,', 'CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', and, p300, '(', 'EP300),', is, used, to, map, enhancers, and, 'promoters,', but, whether, these, elements, functionally]), verbo([require]), complemento(['CBP/p300', remains, largely, uncertain])].
[sujeto(['ChIP-seq', using, 'CBP-null', cells, as, a, control, revealed, nearby, 'CBP', recruitment, for, 20, '%', of, 'constitutively-expressed', 'genes,', but, 'surprisingly,', 'three-quarters', of, these, genes, were, unaffected, or, slightly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, dKO, cells])].

[sujeto(['Thus,']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, context, influences, the, transcriptional, requirement, for, 'CBP/p300,', possibly, by, multiple, mechanisms])].

[sujeto(['Experience-dependent', gene, transcription, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, nervous, system, development, and, function])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, characterize, the, enhancers, that, function, across, the, genome, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['activity-dependent', transcription, in, mouse, cortical, neurons])].

[sujeto(['Recent', studies, investigating, 'ligand-mediated', 'Wnt/&Icirc;&sup2;-catenin', signaling]), verbo([have]), complemento([highlighted, its, importance, in, pancreatic, cancer, initiation, and, 'progression,', as, well, as, its, potential, as, a, therapeutic, target, in, 'PDAC'])].

[sujeto(['Considerable', evidence, indicates, that, coactivator, of, transcription, and, histone, acetyltransferase, cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', binding, protein, '(', 'CBP)', is, critically, required, for, normal, neural, function])].

[sujeto(['Genistein,', an, isoflavone, present, in]), verbo([soy]), complemento(['products,', has, chemopreventive, effects, on, mammary, carcinogenesis])].

[sujeto(['The', combination, of, p300, and, 'CBP', expression, may, be, useful, in, identifying, patients, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([risks, of, cancer, recurrence, of, 'SCLC'])].

[sujeto(['Adult', blood, cell, production, or, definitive, hematopoiesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, transcription, factor, 'c-Myb'])].

[sujeto(['Perplexingly,', mice, homozygous, for, the, same, 'KIX', domain, mutation, in, 'CBP']), verbo([have]), complemento([normal, blood])].

[sujeto(['Together', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'KIX', domains, of, 'CBP,', and, especially, 'p300,', are, principal, mediators, of, 'c-Myb-dependent', gene, activation, and, repression, that, is, required, for, definitive, hematopoiesis])].
[sujeto(['MicroRNAs', are, extensively]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, pathogenesis, of, major, cardiovascular, diseases, by, suppressing, target, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([reported, that, 'microRNA-22', '(', 'miR-22)', may, be, implicated, in, 'ischemia-reperfusion', '(', 'I/R)', induced, myocardial, injury])].

[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP)', as, a, potential, 'miR-22', target, by, bioinformatics, was, significantly, inhibited, after, 'miR-22', transfection])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, p53, acetylation, 'activity,', 'pro-apoptotic', related, genes, 'Bax', and, p21, levels, were, all, decreased, associated, with, the, 'down-regulation', of, 'CBP'])].

[sujeto(['Hence,', the, dysfunction, of, p300, may, result, in, the, dysregulation, of, gene, expression]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, the, manifestation, of, many, disorders])].
[sujeto(['The', acetyltransferase, activity, of, 'p300/CREB-binding', protein, is, therefore, considered, as, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, new, generation, therapeutics])].
[sujeto(['We', describe, here, a, natural, 'compound,', plumbagin, '(', 'RTK1),', isolated, from, 'Plumbago', rosea, root, 'extract,', that]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([histone, acetyltransferase, activity, potently, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['RTK1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([p300, histone, acetyltransferase, activity, in, a, noncompetitive, manner])].
[sujeto(['Docking', studies, and, 'site-directed', mutagenesis, of, the, p300, histone, acetyltransferase, domain]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, single, hydroxyl, group, of, 'RTK1', makes, a, hydrogen, bond, with, the, lysine, 1358, residue, of, this, domain])].
[sujeto(['In', agreement, with, 'this,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, indeed, the, hydroxyl, 'group-substituted', plumbagin, derivatives, lost, the, acetyltransferase, inhibitory, activity])].
[sujeto(['This', study, describes, for, the, first, time, the, chemical, entity, '(', hydroxyl, 'group)']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, inhibition, of, acetyltransferase, activity])].
[sujeto(['TOX3', is, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, containing, a, high, mobility, group, '(', 'HMG)-box', 'domain,', which, regulates, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', transcription, in, neurons, through, interaction, with, the, 'cAMP-response-element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)'])].
[sujeto(['TOX3', appears, to, be, associated, with, breast, cancer, susceptibility, and, was, previously, shown, to, be]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([downstream, of, a, cytoprotective, cascade, together, with, 'CITED1,', a, transcriptional, regulator, that, does, not, bind, directly, to, 'DNA'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we, show, that, 'TOX3', is, predominantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'brain,', forms, homodimers, and, interacts, with, 'CITED1'])].
[sujeto(['TOX3', overexpression, protects, neuronal, cells, from, cell, death]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, endoplasmic, reticulum, stress, or, 'BAX', overexpression, through, the, induction, of, 'anti-apoptotic', transcripts, and, repression, of, 'pro-apoptotic', 'transcripts,', which, correlates, with, enhanced, transcription, involving, isolated, 'estrogen-responsive', elements, and, 'estrogen-responsive', promoters])].
[sujeto(['However,', both, functions, cannot, be]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([with, the, 'anti-estrogen', fulvestrant, and, are, only, attenuated, by, mutation, of, 'estrogen-responsive', elements])].
[sujeto(['TOX3', also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, native, 'CREB', and, induces, the, 'CREB-responsive', 'BCL-2', 'promoter,', which, can, be, inhibited, by, coexpression, of, 'CITED1'])].

[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([a, broad, range, of, gene, responses, that, are, primarily, mediated, by, the, transcription, 'factor,', 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1', '(', 'HIF-1)', that, complexes, with, the, transcriptional, coactivator, 'CREB-binding', 'protein/p300', '(', 'CBP/p300)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mammals,', members, of, the, 'CBP/p300-interacting', transactivators, with, 'ED-rich', tail, '(', 'CITED)', 'family,', such, as, 'CITED2', and, 'CITED4,']), verbo([bind]), complemento(['CBP/p300', with, high, affinity, and, thereby, negatively, regulate, 'HIF-1', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'fish,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, two, 'CITED3', homologues, from, the, 'hypoxia-tolerant', grass, carp, '(', 'Ctenopharyngodon', 'idellus)', are, induced, by, 'hypoxia/HIF-1', and, able, to, inhibit, 'HIF-1', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, identification, and, functional, characterization, of, the, grass, carp, 'CITED1', '(', 'gcCITED1)', protein, as, a, new, repressor, of, 'HIF-1-mediated', transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, gcCITED1, mRNA, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, 'heart,', kidney, and, liver, in, vivo, after, exposure, to, hypoxia])].

[sujeto(['In', the, 'AR(+)', 'LNCaP', prostate, cancer, 'cells,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, metformin, inhibits, 'androgen-induced', 'CRE', activity, and, 'IGF-IR', gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['CRE', activity]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, formation, of, a, 'CREB-CREB', binding, 'protein-CREB', regulated, transcription, coactivator, 2, '(', 'CRTC2)', 'complex,', which, follows, 'Ser133-CREB', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Metformin']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Ser133-CREB', phosphorylation, and, induced, nuclear, exclusion, of, 'CREB', cofactor, 'CRTC2,', thus, dissociating, the, 'CREB-CREB', binding, 'protein-CRTC2', complex, and, blocking, its, transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['Similarly', to, metformin, 'action,', 'CRTC2', silencing]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['IGF-IR', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', metformin, blocked, 'membrane-initiated', signals, of, 'AR', to, the, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'rapamycin/p70S6Kinase', pathway, by, inhibiting, 'AR', phosphorylation, and, its, association, with, 'c-Src'])].
[sujeto(['AMPK', signals, were, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([to, some, extent])].
[sujeto(['By']), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['androgen-dependent', 'IGF-IR', 'up-regulation,', metformin, reduced, 'IGF-I-mediated', proliferation, of, 'LNCaP', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, 'that,', in, prostate, cancer, 'cells,', metformin]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['IGF-I-mediated', biological, effects, by, disrupting, 'membrane-initiated', 'AR', action, responsible, for, 'IGF-IR', 'up-regulation', and, suggest, that, metformin, could, represent, a, useful, adjunct, to, the, classical, antiandrogen, therapy])].
[sujeto(['The', cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)-regulated', transcriptional, coactivator, 2, '(', 'CRTC2)', is, a, key, component, of, the, transcription, complex, regulating, glucagon, driven, hepatic, glucose, production, and, previous, evidence, suggests, that, &, 'quot;inhibition&quot;', of, 'CRTC2', improves, glucose, homeostasis, in, multiple, rodent, models, of, type, 2, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['The', compounds, with, the, best, activity, and, safety, profiles, were, then, evaluated, in, subchronic, efficacy, studies, using, the, diet]), verbo([induced]), complemento([obese, '(', 'DIO)', mouse, model, of, type, 2, diabetes, and, primary, human, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', for, the, first, 'time,', translation, to, human, cells]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, established, with, demonstration, of, a, reduction, in, 'glucagon-mediated', glucose, production, in, primary, human, hepatocytes, and, a, potential, clinical, biomarker, source, identified, to, assess, modulation, of, 'CRTC2', mRNA, following, 'ASO', treatment])].
[sujeto(['PRIP-Interacting', protein, with, methyl, transferase, domain, '(', 'PIMT)', serves, as, a, molecular, bridge, between, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)/', 'E1A']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, p300, '(', 'Ep300)', -, anchored, histone, acetyl, transferase, and, the, 'Mediator', complex, 'sub-unit1', '(', 'Med1)', and, modulates, nuclear, receptor, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'ERK2', phosphorylates, 'PIMT', at, 'Ser(298)', and, enhances, its, ability, to, activate, 'PEPCK', promoter])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, 'PIMT', is]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, 'PEPCK', promoter, and, 'adenoviral-mediated', 'over-expression', of, 'PIMT', in, rat, primary, hepatocytes, 'up-regulated', expression, of, gluconeogenic, genes, including, 'PEPCK'])].
[sujeto(['Reporter', experiments, with, phosphomimetic, 'PIMT', mutant, '(', 'PIMT(S298D))']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, conformational, change, may, play, an, important, role, in, 'PIMT-dependent', 'PEPCK', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', expression, of, gluconeogenic, genes, and, hepatic, glucose, output, were]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([in, isolated, liver, specific, 'PIMT', knockout, mouse, hepatocytes])].
[sujeto(['Pharmacological', blockade, of, 'MAPK/ERK', pathway, using, 'U0126,', abolished, 'PIMT/Med1-dependent', gluconeogenic, program]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, reduced, hepatic, glucose, output])].
[sujeto(['Further,', systemic, administration, of, 'T4', hormone, to, rats]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['ERK1/2', resulting, in, enhanced, 'PIMT', 'ser(298)', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, 'PIMT']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, its, increased, binding, to, the, 'PEPCK', 'promoter,', increased, 'PEPCK', expression, and, induction, of, gluconeogenesis, in, liver])].
[sujeto(['This', photic, resetting]), verbo([involves]), complemento([cAMP, response, element, binding, protein, '(', 'CREB)-mediated', upregulation, of, 'Per', genes, within, individual, cells, of, the, suprachiasmatic, nuclei, '(', 'SCN)'])].
[sujeto(['By', analyzing, the, 'light-regulated', transcriptome, of, the, 'SCN,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, key, role, for, salt, inducible, kinase, 1, '(', 'SIK1)', and, 'CREB-regulated', transcription, coactivator, 1, '(', 'CRTC1)', in, clock, 're-setting'])].

[sujeto(['This', pathway]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, potential, target, for, the, regulation, of, circadian, rhythms])].
[sujeto(['Immediate', early, transcription, is, an, integral, part, of, the, neuronal, response, to, environmental, stimulation, and, serves, many, brain, processes, including, 'development,', 'learning,']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([of, programmed, cell, 'death,', and, reaction, to, injury, and, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Following', a, 'stimulus,', neurons]), verbo([express]), complemento([a, select, few, genes, within, a, short, period, of, time, without, undergoing, de, novo, protein, translation])].
[sujeto(['Referred', to, as, the, '\'', gateway, to, genetic, 'response\',', these, immediate, early, genes, '(', 'IEGs)', are, either]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([within, a, few, minutes, of, stimulation, or, later, within, the, hour])].
[sujeto(['In', neuronal, 'IEGs', that, are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['rapidly,', productive, elongation, in, response, to, neuronal, activity, is, 'jump-started', by, constitutive, transcription, initiation, together, with, 'RNA', polymerase, 'II', stalling, in, the, vicinity, of, the, promoter])].
[sujeto(['IEGs']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([later, in, the, hour, do, not, depend, on, this, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', factors]), verbo([require]), complemento([coactivators, and, corepressors, to, modulate, transcription, in, mammalian, cells])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, established, the, 'VDR/RXR', cistrome, in, human, colon, cancer, cells, and, have, linked, these, binding, sites, to, the, genes, that, are, regulated, by, 1, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;,25-dihydroxyvitamin', 'D3', '(', 1, ',', 25, '(', 'OH)2D3)'])].

[sujeto(['SRC1', was, the, most, highly, correlated, to, 'VDR/RXR']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 50, '%', ')'])].

[sujeto(['There', is, evidence, demonstrating, that, activation, of, these, kinases, and, induction, of, 'PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', in, skeletal, muscle, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, catecholamines])].
[sujeto(['Despite', blunted]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, p38, 'phosphorylation,', the, ability, of, epinephrine, to, induce, 'PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', was, intact, in, skeletal, muscle, from, 'HFD-fed', rats, and, was, associated, with, normal, increases, in, activation, of, 'PKA', and, phosphorylation, of, cAMP, response, 'element-binding', 'protein,', reputed, mediators, of, 'PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', expression])].

[sujeto(['Gonadotropin-releasing', hormone, '(', 'GnRH)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, expression, of, all, three, gonadotropin, 'genes,', encoding, the, common, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', subunit, '(', &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;GSU)', and, 'hormone-specific', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;', 'subunits,', through, the, activation, of, several, signal, transduction, pathways])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'GnRH', also, upregulates, 'calcineurin,', and, we, hypothesized, that, calcineurin, mediates, the, effects, of, 'GnRH', on, the, transcription, of, the, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;GSU', and, 'follicle-stimulating', hormone, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;', '(', 'FSH&Icirc;&sup2;)', genes, through, two, of, its, 'targets:', nuclear, factor, of, activated, 'T', cells, '(', 'NFAT)', and, 'CREB-regulated', transcription, coactivator, '(', 'TORC)'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, calcineurin, is, essential, for, 'GnRH-induced', expression, of, both, genes, but, that, 'NFAT', and, 'TORC1', play, quite, distinct, roles, in]), verbo([activating]), complemento([each, gene])].

[sujeto(['GnRH', initially]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([the, degradation, of, 'TORC1', but, protects, the, 'N', terminus, of, the, newly, synthesized, protein, to, enhance, its, activity])].
[sujeto(['Calcineurin']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['Nur77', 'expression,', likely, via, 'NFAT3,', and, 'Nur77', interacts, synergistically, with, 'TORC1', and, 'CREB', to, increase, 'FSH&Icirc;&sup2;', promoter, activity])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'TORC', plays, a, role, in, the, basal, activity, of, the, 'FSH&Icirc;&sup2;', 'promoter,', it, does, not]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, phosphorylated, 'CREB', and, probably, does, not, play, a, major, role, in, direct, 'GnRH', signaling, to, this, gene])].
[sujeto(['TORC', may, be, part, of, an, alternatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['pathway,', possibly, involving, cross, talk, with, other, stimulatory, hormones])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'salt-inducible', kinase, 2, '(', 'SIK2)', was, abundantly, expressed, in, neurons, and, suppressed, 'CREB-mediated', gene, expression, after, 'oxygen-glucose', deprivation, '(', 'OGD)'])].

[sujeto(['We', showed, that, the, 'HS-diet']), verbo([increased]), complemento([acetylation, of, 'histones,', bindings, of, a, 'coactivator,', 'Creb', binding, protein, '(', 'CREBBP),', and, the, transcriptional, factors, caudal, type, homeobox, 2, '(', 'CDX2)', and, 'HNF1', homeobox, '(', 'HNF1)', in, the, 'promoter/enhancer', and, transcriptional, regions, of, 'Mgam', gene])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, the, phosphorylated, status, and, the, activity, of, 'FoxM1']), verbo([increase]), complemento([as, cells, progress, from, 'S', to, 'G(2)/M', phases])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, while, 24, out, of, 55, '(', 44, '%', ')', of, tumors, expressed, the, 'AR,', each, of, the, coactivators, was, expressed, by, 85, -, 100, '%', of, the, bladder, cancers])].

[sujeto(['Retinoic', acid, '(', 'RA)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([matrix, metalloproteinase, 9, '(', 'MMP-9)', expression, due, to, 'AP-1', inhibition, resulting, from, retinoic, acid, receptors, '(', 'RARs)', competing, for, limiting, amounts, of, coactivator, proteins])].

[sujeto(['Thyroid', hormone, '(', 'T(3))']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, function, of, many, tissues, within, the, body])].

[sujeto(['A', number, of, cofactors, such, as]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([receptor, corepressor, '(', 'NCoR),', 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP),', and, steroid, receptor, coactivator, 1, '(', 'SRC-1)', interact, with, estrogen, receptors, '(', 'ERs)', to, regulate, transcriptional, repression, or, activation, of, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, tamoxifen, '(', 'TAM)', treatment]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([cell, cycle, progression, and, proliferation, of, human, cancer, lines, derived, from, stratified, squamous, epithelium, squamous, cell, carcinoma, '(', 'SCC)'])].

[sujeto(['This']), verbo([increased]), complemento([proliferation, correlated, with, increased, extracellular, signal, regulated, kinase, 1, '(', 'ERK1)', expression])].
[sujeto(['SRC-1', and, 'CBP', were]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, proximal, 'ERK1', promoter, region, in, 'E2', but, not, in, 'TAM-treated', cells])].
[sujeto(['Coactivator-associated', arginine, 'methyltransferase-1', '(', 'CARM1)', is, known, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([transcriptional, activation, by, nuclear, receptors, through, interactions, with, the, coactivators, p160, and, cAMP, response, element, binding, 'protein-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', and, methylation, of, histone, 'H3', at, arginine, 17, '(', 'H3-R17)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'CARM1', can]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, coactivator, for, the, transcription, factor, nuclear, 'factor-kappaB', '(', 'NF-kappaB)', and, enhance, 'NF-kappaB', activity, in, a, 'CBP', '(', 'p300)-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['This', enhancement, in, 293, 'T', cells, was, abolished, by, cotransfection, with, a, specific, short, hairpin, 'RNA']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([to, knockdown, 'CARM1'])].
[sujeto(['This', was, accompanied, by, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, histone, 'H3-R17', methylation, as, well, as, 'H3-K9', and, 'H3-K14', 'acetylation,', and, a, decrease, in, 'H3-citrulline'])].
[sujeto(['Immunoprecipitation', with, 'anti-p65', antibody, revealed, that, 'CARM1', physically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'NF-kappaB', p65])].

[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'CARM1']), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, 'NF-kappaB-mediated', transcription, through, 'H3-R17', methylation, and, support, a, nonnuclear, 'receptor-associated', function, for, 'CARM1'])].

[sujeto(['RARs', '(', retinoic, acid, 'receptors)']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([the, effect, of, their, ligand, 'RA', '(', retinoic, 'acid)', on, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['We', previously, showed, that, 'RA']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([cellular, proliferation, in, part, by, decreasing, expression, of, the, mitogen, activated, protein, kinase, 'ERK1', '(', extracellular, signal, regulated, kinase, 1, ')'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'RA']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['ERK1', expression, is, largely, uncharacterized])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, characterizes, 'coactivator-mediated', regulation, of, 'RA']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, expression, by, analysing, 'ERK1', promoter, activation])].

[sujeto(['CBP', and, 'PCAF', differentially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento(['ERK1', expression, in, stable, clones])].

[sujeto(['(', 'Bu)2cAMP', treatment, of, 'MA-10', cells]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['CREB', phosphorylation, approximately, 2.3, -, fold, within, 30, min, but, did, not, change, total, nuclear, 'CREB', expression, levels])].

[sujeto(['CYP1B1']), verbo([activates]), complemento([polycyclic, aromatic, hydrocarbon, carcinogens, in, 'cAMP-regulated', tissues, such, as, the, 'adrenal,', 'ovary,', and, testis])].

[sujeto(['Transcription', factor, 'NF-E2-related', factor, 2, '(', 'Nrf2)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, induction, of, 'Phase', 'II', detoxifying, enzymes, as, well, as, 'anti-oxidative', enzymes])].
[sujeto(['The', high, transactivation, activity, of, 'Gal4-Nrf2-(113-251)', and, the, diminished, transactivation, activities, of, chimera, 'Gal4-Nrf2-(1-126)', and, 'Gal4-Nrf2-(230-370)']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, 'Nrf2', 'N-terminal', 113, -, 251, amino, acids, region, is, critical, in, maintaining, its, transactivation, activity])].

[sujeto(['The', p160, 'coactivators,', steroid, receptor, 'coactivator-1', '(', 'SRC-1),', transcriptional, intermediary, 'factor-2', '(', 'TIF2)', and, 'receptor-associated', 'coactivator-3', '(', 'RAC3),', as, well, as, the, 'coactivator/integrator', 'CBP,']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([estrogen, 'receptor-alpha', '(', 'ERalpha)-dependent', gene, expression])].

[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, the, situation, for, p160, 'coactivators,', 'E2-dependent', interaction, of, the, 'ERalpha', 'LBD', with, 'CBP', or, p300, was, detected, in, 'HeLa', but, not, 'HepG2', cells, by, mammalian, 'two-hybrid', and, coimmunoprecipitation, 'assays,', indicating, that, the, cellular, environment]), verbo([modulates]), complemento(['ERalpha-CBP/p300', interaction])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, data, revealed, the, influence, of, cellular, environment, on, 'ERalpha-CBP/p300', 'interactions,', as, well, as, 'CBP-p160', coactivator, 'binding,', and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, these, differences, may, contribute, to, the, cell, specificity, of, 'ERalpha-dependent', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['First', identified, as, a, dedicated, 'CREB', '(', cAMP, response, 'element-binding', 'protein)', 'co-activator,', 'CRTC1', '(', 'CREB-regulated', transcription, 'co-activator', 1, ')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, widely, implicated, in, various, neuronal, functions, because, of, its, predominant, expression, in, the, brain])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, evidences, converge, to, indicate, that, 'CRTC1', is, aberrantly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, an, expanding, number, of, adult, malignancies])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, evidences, of, enhanced, 'CRTC1', protein, content, and, transcriptional, activity, in, mouse, models, of, sporadic, '(', 'APC(min/+)', 'mice)', or, 'colitis-associated', colon, cancer, 'azoxymethane/dextran', sulfate, sodium, '(', 'AOM/DSS-treated', 'mice),', and, in, human, colorectal, tumors, specimens, compared, with, adjacent, normal, mucosa])].
[sujeto(['Among', signals, that, could]), verbo([trigger]), complemento(['CRTC1', activation, during, colonic, 'carcinogenesis,', we, demonstrate, that, treatment, with, cyclooxygenase, 2, '(', 'COX2)', inhibitors, reduced, nuclear, 'CRTC1', active, form, levels, in, colonic, tumors, of, 'APC(min/+)', or, 'AOM/DSS', mice])].
[sujeto(['In', 'accordance,', prostaglandins, 'E2', '(', 'PGE2)', exposure, to, human, colon, cancer, cell, lines]), verbo([promoted]), complemento(['CRTC1', dephosphorylation, and, parallel, nuclear, 'translocation,', resulting, in, enhanced, 'CRTC1', transcriptional, 'activity,', through, 'EP1', and, 'EP2', receptors, signaling, and, consecutive, calcineurin, and, protein, kinase, 'A', activation])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, 'CRTC1']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, in, colon, cancer, cell, lines, was, associated, with, reduced, viability, and, cell, division, rate, as, well, as, enhanced, 'chemotherapy-induced', apoptosis, on, 'PGE2', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', 'CRTC1', stable, overexpression, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([colonic, xenografts, tumor, 'growth,', therefore, demonstrating, the, role, of, 'CRTC1', signaling, in, colon, cancer, progression])].
[sujeto(['Identification', of, the, transcriptional, program]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, enhanced, 'CRTC1', expression, during, colonic, 'carcinogenesis,', revealed, some, notable, 'pro-tumorigenic', 'CRTC1', target, genes, including, 'NR4A2,', 'COX2,', amphiregulin, '(', 'AREG)', and, 'IL-6'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, demonstrate, that, 'COX2,', 'AREG', and, 'IL-6', promoter, activities]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, 'CRTC1', are, dependent, on, functional, 'AP1', and, 'CREB', transcriptional, partners])].
[sujeto(['Salt', inducible, kinase, 1, '(', 'SIK1)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, repress, 'cAMP-response', element, binding, protein, '(', 'CREB)-mediated', gene, transcription, by, causing, the, nuclear, export, of, 'CREB-regulated', transcription, coactivators, '(', 'CRTCs)', through, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, repressor, role, of, 'SIK1', in]), verbo([suppressing]), complemento([the, expression, of, arylalkylamine, 'N-acetyltransferase,', the, enzyme, that, controls, the, daily, rhythm, in, melatonin, production, in, the, rat, pineal, 'gland,', has, been, 'established,', whether, 'SIK1', regulates, the, phosphorylation, and, localization, of, 'CRTC1', and, 'CRTC2', in, this, tissue, remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, overexpressing, 'SIK1', in, 'NE-stimulated', rat, pinealocytes, could, increase, the, phosphorylation, of, 'CRTC1', and, 'CRTC2,', reduced, selectively, the, nuclear, level, of, 'CRTC2', '(', but, not, that, of, 'CRTC1),', and, elevated, the, cytosolic, levels, of, both, 'CRTC1', and, 'CRTC2'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, also, showed, that, adrenergic, blockade, during, 'NE', stimulation]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, rapid, rephosphorylation, and, decline, in, the, nucleus, levels, of, 'CRTC1', and, 'CRTC2;', however, 'SIK1', knockdown, had, no, effect, on, this, rapid, rephosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', studies, with, kinase, inhibitors, revealed, that, 'kinase(s)', sensitive, to, 'KT5823', appeared, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, this, rapid, rephosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Although', permanent, bilateral, common, carotid, artery, occlusion, '(', 2, 'VO)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, induce, retinal, 'injury,', there, is, still, a, lack, of, systematic, research, on, the, complex, processing, of, retinal, degeneration])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', 'time-dependent', '(', at, 'three,', 14, ',', 60, days, after, 2, 'VO', 'surgery)', changes, of, neurotrophic, and, inflammatory, 'systems,', as, well, as, 'cAMP-responsive', element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', 'signaling,', which, has, been, previously, reported, to, effectively, regulate, these, two, 'systems,', were, evaluated])].
[sujeto(['First,', a, morphological, study, confirmed, that, 2, 'VO', surgery, progressively]), verbo([induced]), complemento([severe, inner, retinal, degeneration, and, 'down-regulation', of, synaptic, 'proteins,', 'PSD95', and, synaptophysin])].
[sujeto(['The', mRNA, or, protein, levels, of, neurotrophic, factors, '(', 'NGF,', 'BDNF,', 'NT-3', and, 'GDNF)', and, their, receptors, '(', 'TrkA,', 'TrkB', and, 'TrkC)', showed, marked, and, persistent, 'down-regulation', in, the, rat, retina, since, three, days, after, 2, 'VO', 'surgery,', whereas, the, gene, transcription, levels, of, 'CNTF', were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([and, 'p75(NTR)', mRNA, levels, remained, unchanged])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, inner, retinal, 'degeneration,', retinal, 'M&Atilde;&frac14;ller', cells, displayed, rapid, and, prolonged, activation, since, three, days, after, 2, 'VO', 'lesion,', whereas, the, microglia, cell, 'number,', and, 'TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, 'IL-1&Icirc;&sup2;', levels, showed, a, robust]), verbo([increase]), complemento([with, a, maximal, effect, at, three, days, and, returned, to, levels, that, were, slightly, over, baseline, at, 14, and, 60, days, after, 2, 'VO', lesion])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, gene, expression, levels, of, iNOS, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, the, rat, retina, at, both, three, and, 14, days, after, 2, 'VO', surgery])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', for, the, first, 'time,', our, study, demonstrated, that, chronic, ischemia]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['long-term', aberrant, 'CREB', signaling, and, 'time-dependent', progressive, dysregulation, of, neurotrophic, and, inflammatory, systems, in, the, 'retina,', which, may, provide, important, clues, for, a, better, understanding, of, the, pathogenesis, of, retinal, ischemic, damage])].
[sujeto(['The', sensation, of, pain, is, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['mortality,', but, it, is, unknown, whether, pain, perception, can, directly, affect, aging])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, mice, lacking, 'TRPV1', pain, receptors, are, 'long-lived,', displaying, a, youthful, metabolic, profile, at, old, age])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'TRPV1', inactivates, a, 'calcium-signaling', cascade, that, ends, in, the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([exclusion, of, the, 'CREB-regulated', transcriptional, coactivator, 'CRTC1', within, pain, sensory, neurons, originating, from, the, spinal, cord])].

[sujeto(['The']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['CREB', consequently, transactivated, the, expression, of, 'Ras', homolog, enriched, in, brain, '(', 'RHEB),', a, direct, key, activator, of, 'mTORC1,', independent, of, 'AMP-activated', protein, kinase, or, tuberous, sclerosis, complex, protein, 2])].
[sujeto(['PDK4', potentiated, the, mTORC1, effectors, 'hypoxia-inducible', factor, 1, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', and, pyruvate, kinase, isozymes, 'M2', and]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([aerobic, glycolysis, '(', 'Warburg', 'effect)'])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'PDK4']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, tumor, development, of, cancer, cells, with, activated, mTORC1])].

[sujeto(['The', role, of, 'JAK-3', in, 'TLR-mediated', innate, immune, responses, is, poorly, 'understood,', although, the, suppressive, function, of, 'JAK3', inhibition, in, adaptive, immune, response]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, well, studied])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'JAK3', inhibition, enhanced, 'TLR-mediated', immune, responses, by, differentially, regulating, 'pro-', and, 'anti-', inflammatory, cytokine, production, in, innate, immune, cells])].

[sujeto(['LH']), verbo([triggers]), complemento([the, biosynthesis, of, androgens, in, the, 'theca-interstitial', '(', 'T-I)', cells, of, ovary, through, the, activation, of, a, 'cAMP-dependent', pathway])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, 'LH/human', chorionic, gonadotropin, '(', 'hCG)', activates, mammalian, target, of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)', signaling, 'network,', leading, to, cell, proliferation])].

[sujeto(['Huntington\'s', disease, '(', 'HD)', is, an, incurable, neurological, disorder]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, an, abnormal, glutamine, repeat, expansion, in, the, huntingtin, '(', 'Htt)', protein])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([significantly, decreased, 'TORC1', expression, levels, in, 'STHdhQ111', cells, expressing, mutant, 'Htt,', in, the, striatum, of, 'NLS-N171-82Q,', 'R6/2', and, 'HdhQ111', 'HD', transgenic, mice, and, in, postmortem, striatal, tissue, from, 'HD', patients])].

[sujeto(['Ligation', of, cell, 'surface-associated', 'GRP78', by]), verbo([activated]), complemento([&, 'Icirc;&plusmn;(2)', -, macroglobulin, triggers, 'pro-proliferative', cellular, responses])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 4, '\'', -, methylflavonoids, are, potent, inducers, of, melanogenesis, in, 'B16F10', melanoma, cells, and, in, mice])].

[sujeto(['CREB', is, a, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([transcription, factor, regulating, gene, expression, via, binding, to, a, 'CRE', 'DNA', element])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, 'DLK', also]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['CREB', activity, by, affecting, the, interaction, of, 'CREB', with, its, second, coactivator, 'TORC'])].

[sujeto([cAMP, response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([melanogenesis, by, inducing, 'microphthalmia-associated', transcription, factor, '(', 'Mitf&acirc;&euro;&Scaron;)', gene, expression])].

[sujeto(['The', activation, of, cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', and, transcription, of, 'CRE-targeted', genes, play, critical, roles, in, various, physiological, and, pathological, conditions])].

[sujeto(['Tanshinone', 'IIA', '(', 'TSA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proven, to, protect, the, brain, against, focal, ischemia, injury])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we, examined, the, 'activity-dependent']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'TORC1', '(', transducer, of, regulated, 'CREB', activity, 1, ')', and, the, expression, of, 'TORC1,', phosphorylated, 'CREB', '(', 'pCREB)', and, 'BDNF', '(', 'brain-derived', neurotrophic, 'factor)', at, the, early, time, of, ischemic, stroke, as, well, as, after, the, treatment, with, 'TSA'])].

[sujeto(['Compared', with, vehicle, 'group,', 'TSA', '(', 20, 'mg/kg)', dramatically, lessened, neurological, deficits, 'scores,', brain, water, contents, and, infarct, 'sizes,', significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([nuclear, accumulation, of, 'TORC1', and, upregulated, the, expression, of, 'TORC1,', pCREB, and, 'BDNF', '(', 'P&lt;0'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, 'phospho-cAMP', response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', is, essential, but, not, sufficient, for, activation, of, 'CRH', 'transcription,', suggesting, the, requirement, of, a, coactivator])].

[sujeto(['To', measure, 'CREB', 'binding,', we, used, 'HaloCHIP,', an, 'antibody-free', alternative, to, the, 'ChIP', method, that, utilizes, the, 'HaloTag', fusion, 'protein,', and, also, 'high-throughput', 'promoter-luciferase', reporter, 'assays,', which]), verbo([provide]), complemento([rapid, and, quantitative, screening, of, promoters, for, transcriptional, activation, or, repression, in, living, cells])].

[sujeto(['This', study, was, designed, to, investigate, the, chemopreventive, potential, of, peracetylated, '(', -, ')', -, 'epigallocatechin-3-gallate', '(', 'AcEGCG)', on, 7, ',', 12, -, 'dimethylbenz[a]-anthracene', '(', 'DMBA)-initiated', and, 12, -, 'O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13-acetate', '(', 'TPA)-promoted', skin, tumorigenesis, in, 'ICR', mice, and, to, elucidate, the, possible, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, inhibitory, action, of, 'PKD1', on, 'CSCs'])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', 'AcEGCG', not, only]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'p53,', 'p21,', 'c-Myc,', cyclin, 'B,', 'p-CDK1', and, 'Cdc25A', but, also, restored, the, activation, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinase, 1, /, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2),', which, decreased, 'DMBA/TPA-induced', increases, in, tumor, proliferation, and, mitotic, index])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'PKD1', was, strongly, expressed, in, 'CD34(+)', cells, and, that, pretreatment, with, 'AcEGCG', markedly, inhibited, 'PKD1', activation, and, 'CD34(+)', expression])].
[sujeto(['More', 'importantly,', pretreatment, with, 'AcEGCG', remarkably]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([nuclear, 'factor-kappaB,', cyclic, adenosine, 3, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, 'monophosphate-responsive', 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', and, 'CCAAT-enhancer-binding', protein, '(', 'C/EBPs)', activation, by, inhibiting, the, phosphorylation, of, 'c-Jun-N-terminal', kinase, 1, /, 2, ',', p38, and, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)/Akt', and, by, attenuating, downstream, target, gene, 'expression,', including, inducible, nitric, oxide, 'synthase,', 'cyclooxygenase-2,', ornithine, decarboxylase, and, vascular, endothelial, growth, factor])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', our, results, powerfully]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'AcEGCG', could, be, developed, into, a, novel, chemopreventive, agent, and, that, 'PKD1', may, be, a, preventive, and, therapeutic, target, for, skin, cancer, in, clinical, settings])].
[sujeto(['Garcinol', treatment, resulted, in, a, strong, reduction, in, 'H3K18', 'acetylation,', which, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'S', phase, progression])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', exposure, of, 'MCF7', cells, to, curcumin, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([global, levels, of, acetylated, 'H3K18', and, 'H4K16,', and, was, less, effective, in, inducing, 'DNA', damage, markers])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, its, effects, on, histone, 'modifications,', garcinol, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, block, 'CBP/p300-mediated', acetylation, of, the, 'C-terminal', activation, domain, of, 'p53,', but, resulted, in, enhanced, acetylation, of, 'p53K120,', and, accumulation, of, p53, in, the, cytoplasmic, compartment])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, show, that, the, elevation, of, 'H4K20Me3', levels, by, garcinol, correlated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'SUV420H2,', and, was, prevented, by, siRNA, targeting, of, 'SUV420H2'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', although, garcinol, and, curcumin, can, both]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([histone, acetyltransferase, 'activities,', our, results, show, that, these, compounds, have, differential, effects, on, cancer, cells, in, culture])].
[sujeto(['MicroRNAs', '(', 'miRNAs),', a, family, of, small, 'nonprotein-coding', 'RNAs,', play, a, critical, role, in, posttranscriptional, gene, regulation, by]), verbo([acting]), complemento([as, adaptors, for, the, 'miRNA-induced', silencing, complex, to, inhibit, gene, expression, by, targeting, mRNAs, for, translational, repression, 'and/or', cleavage])].
[sujeto(['MiR-155-5p', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, both, activated, 'B-', and, 'T-cells', and, in, 'monocytes/macrophages'])].
[sujeto(['Given', that, the, pathologies]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'miR-155-5p', result, from, the, 'over-expression', of, this, miRNA, it, may, be, possible, to, therapeutically, attenuate, 'miR-155-5p', levels, in, the, treatment, of, several, pathological, processes])].
[sujeto(['Bisphenol', 'A', '(', 'BPA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, widely, used, in, the, manufacture, of, polycarbonate, 'plastic,', water, bottles, and, food, containers])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([established, that, 'BPA', could, cause, developmental, toxicity, by, inhibiting, the, proliferation, and, differentiation, of, rat, embryonic, midbrain, '(', 'MB)', cells, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, underlying, mechanisms]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, well, studied, yet])].
[sujeto(['In', the, current, 'study,', we, examined, the, proliferation, and, differentiation, of, 'MB', cells, treated, with, 10, '(', -, 12, ')', -, 10, '(', -, 4, ')', 'M', 'BPA', and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, only, 10, '(', -, 4, ')', 'M', 'BPA', inhibited, proliferation, and, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Then,', we, investigated, the, cell, cycle, progression, and, apoptosis, of, 'MB', 'cells;', 10, '(', -, 4, ')', 'M', 'BPA']), verbo([caused]), complemento([an, explicit, 'S', phase, and, 'G2/M', phase, arrest, in, the, cell, cycle, and, increased, the, percentage, of, apoptotic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, phosphorylation, of, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', and, 'cyclic-AMP', response]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', and, the, expression, of, some, apoptotic, regulatory, genes, were, investigated])].
[sujeto(['BPA', '(', 10, '(', -, 4, ')', 'M)', reduced, the, phosphorylation, of, 'C-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', and, 'CREB,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, mRNA, expression, level, of, 'Bax', and, p53])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrated, that, 'BPA', could]), verbo([cause]), complemento([developmental, toxicity, through, 'anti-proliferation', and, 'pro-apoptosis', in, 'MB', cells])].
[sujeto(['Multiple', signaling, 'pathways,', such, as, the, 'JNK,', 'CREB', and, 'p53-mitochondrial', apoptosis, 'pathways,']), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, these, effects])].
[sujeto(['We', sequenced, 29, 'SCLC', 'exomes,', 2, genomes, and, 15, transcriptomes, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([an, extremely, high, mutation, rate, of, 7.4, &, 'Acirc;&plusmn;1', 'protein-changing', mutations, per, million, base, pairs])].
[sujeto(['In', all, 'cases,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([evidence, for, inactivation, of, 'TP53', and, 'RB1', and, identified, recurrent, mutations, in, the, 'CREBBP,', 'EP300', and, 'MLL', genes, that, encode, histone, modifiers])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, detected, many, of, the, alterations]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, humans, in, 'SCLC', tumors, from, 'Tp53', and, 'Rb1', double, knockout, mice])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, implicates, histone, modification, as, a, major, feature, of, 'SCLC,']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([potentially, therapeutically, tractable, genomic, alterations, and, provides, a, generalizable, framework, for, the, identification, of, biologically, relevant, genes, in, the, context, of, high, mutational, background])].
[sujeto(['Several', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([focused, on, the, function, of, 'AT1R', in, cell, proliferation, during, cancer, development])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we, hypothesized, that, angiotensin, 'II', '(', 'Ang', &, 'acirc;&hellip;&iexcl;)', can]), verbo([promote]), complemento([proliferation, of, breast, cancer, via, activated, 'AT1R;', the, activation, of, 'AT1R', may, play, an, important, role, in, promoting, breast, cancer, 'growth,', and, 'AT1R', blocker, '(', 'ARB)', may, suppress, the, promotional, effect, on, proliferation, by, antagonizing, 'AT1R'])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, level, of, 'AT1R', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, significantly, upregulated, in, breast, cancer, cells, by, 'immunohistochemistry,', but, no, correlation, between, 'AT1R', expression, and, 'ER/PR/Her-2', expression, was, observed])].
[sujeto(['ARBs,', and, in, particular, 'irbesartan,', effectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, effects, of, 'Ang', 'II', on, cell, 'proliferation,', cell, cycle, development, and, downstream, 'AT1R', signaling, 'events,', including, the, activation, of, the, 'Ras-Raf-MAPK', pathway, and, the, transcription, factors, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', and, 'CREB'])].
[sujeto(['Irbesartan', also, significantly, altered, 'p53,', 'PCNA', and, cyclin, 'D1', 'expression,', which, was, also, influenced, by]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['AT1R', in, 'AT1R(+)-MCF-7', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'ARBs', may, be, useful, as, a, novel, preventive, and, therapeutic, strategy, for, treating, breast, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Cancer', cells, with, p53, 'mutations,', in, 'general,', grow, more, aggressively, than, those, with, 'wild-type', p53, and, show, &, 'quot;gain', of, 'function&quot;', '(', 'GOF)', phenotypes, such, as]), verbo([increased]), complemento([growth, 'rate,', enhanced, resistance, to, chemotherapeutic, 'drugs,', increased, cell, motility, and, 'tumorigenicity;', although, the, mechanism, for, this, function, remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['In', this, communication, we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'p53-mediated', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B2', 'up-regulation', significantly, contributes, to, the, aggressive, oncogenic, behavior, of, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Lowering', the, level, of, mutant, p53, in, a, number, of, cancer, cell, lines, resulted, in, a]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GOF', phenotypes, directly, implicating, p53, mutants, in, the, process])].
[sujeto(['In', 'H1299', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([mutant, 'p53,', chromatin, immunoprecipitation, '(', 'ChIP)', assays, indicate, that, mutant, p53, induces, histone, acetylation, at, specific, sites, on, the, regulatory, regions, of, its, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['ChIP', assays, using, antibodies, against, transcription, factors, putatively, capable, of]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, the, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B2', promoter, show, increased, interaction, of, 'CBP', and, 'STAT2', in, the, presence, of, mutant, p53])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we, propose, that, in, 'H1299', 'cells,', mutant, p53, elevates, expression, of, genes, capable, of]), verbo([enhancing]), complemento([cell, 'proliferation,', 'motility,', and, tumorigenicity, by, inducing, acetylation, of, histones, via, recruitment, of, 'CBP', and, 'STAT2', on, the, promoters, causing, 'CBP-mediated', histone, acetylation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, the, two, most, common, 'types--follicular', lymphoma, and, diffuse, large, 'B-cell', 'lymphoma--harbour', frequent, structural, alterations, inactivating, 'CREBBP', 'and,', more, 'rarely,', 'EP300,', two, highly, related, histone, and, 'non-histone', acetyltransferases, '(', 'HATs)', that, act, as, transcriptional, 'co-activators', in, multiple, signalling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['These', lesions, usually, affect, one, 'allele,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, reduction, in, 'HAT', dosage, is, important, for, lymphomagenesis])].
[sujeto(['These', results, identify, 'CREBBP/EP300', mutations, as, a, major, pathogenetic, mechanism, shared, by, common, forms, of, 'B-cell', 'non-Hodgkin\'s', 'lymphoma,', with, direct, implications, for, the, use, of, drugs]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['acetylation/deacetylation', mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['The', histone, acetyltransferase, coactivators, 'CBP', '(', 'CREBBP)', and, p300, '(', 'EP300)']), verbo([have]), complemento([more, than, 400, described, protein, interaction, partners, and, are, implicated, in, numerous, transcriptional, pathways])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, 'CBP', and, p300, double, knockout, mutations, in, mouse, embryonic, fibroblasts, '(', dKO, 'MEFs)', result, in, mixed, effects, on, 'cAMP-inducible', gene, 'expression,', with, many, 'CREB', target, genes, requiring, 'CBP/p300', for, full, 'expression,', while, others, are, unaffected, or, expressed, better, in, their, absence])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, while, retinoic, 'acid-inducible', gene, expression, tends, to, be, uniformly, dependent, on, 'CBP/p300,', 'dsRNA-', and, 'serum-inducible', genes, displayed, 'non-uniform', requirements, for, 'CBP/p300,', with, the, 'dsRNA-inducible', expression, of, 'Ifnb1', '(', 'interferon-&Icirc;&sup2;)', being, particularly, dependent, on, 'CBP/p300'])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', the, 'p53-dependent', genes, 'Cdkn1a', '(', 'p21/CIP/WAF)', and, 'Mdm2', did, not]), verbo([require]), complemento(['CBP/p300', for, their, expression])].
[sujeto(['Rather,']), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, context, '(', e])].
[sujeto(['DNA', 'sequence)', influences, the, extent, to, which, transcription]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['CBP/p300', versus, other, 'coactivators,', which, may, not, be, 'HATs'])].
[sujeto(['Distinct', global, 'DNA', methylation, profiles]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, in, normal, breast, epithelial, cells, as, well, as, in, breast, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, 'DNA', methylation, profiles, of, 80, breast, tumors, using, a, panel, of, 807, cancer, related, genes, interrogating, 1505, 'CpG', sites])].
[sujeto(['Gene', 'Ontology', analysis, revealed, enrichment, for, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, developmental, processes, including, homeobox, domain, genes, '(', 'HOXA9,', 'HOXA11,', 'PAX6,', 'MYBL2,', 'ISL1', and, 'IPF1)', and, '(', 'ETS1,', 'HDAC1,', 'CREBBP,', 'GAS7,', 'SPI1', and, 'TBX1)'])].
[sujeto(['Some', of, the, transcription, factors, 'identified,', with, key, roles, in, differentiation, and, development, might, play, a, role, in]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([and, maintaining, the, different, phenotypes])].
[sujeto(['Genomic', stability, is, constantly, threatened, by, 'DNA', 'damage,']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, numerous, environmental, and, intrinsic, 'sources,', including, 'radiation,', chemicals, and, oncogene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', cells]), verbo([have]), complemento([evolved, a, sophisticated, signal, transduction, network, to, sense, 'DNA', damage, and, to, mount, an, appropriate, 'DNA', damage, response])].
[sujeto(['Dysregulation', of, the, 'DNA', damage, response]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, genomic, instability, and, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Dependent', on, the, cellular, background, and, extent, of, 'DNA', 'damage,', the, 'DNA', damage, response]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([cell, cycle, arrest, and, 'DNA', 'repair,', or, in, the, case, of, irreparable, 'damage,', inactivation, of, the, cells, by, senescence, or, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'minireview,', we, concentrate, on, the, apoptotic, response, to, 'DNA', damage, and, signalling, pathways, linked, to, the, cell, nucleus, and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['bodies,', with, a, particular, focus, on, the, molecular, players, p53, and, p73, and, on, the, 'DNA', 'damage-activated', kinase, 'homeodomain-interacting', protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'HIPK2)'])].
[sujeto(['The', tumor, suppressor, activity, of, p53, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, interactions, with, the, ubiquitin, ligase, 'HDM2', and, the, general, transcriptional, coactivators, 'CBP', and, p300])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'NMR', spectroscopy, and, isothermal, titration, 'calorimetry,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([dissected, the, binding, interactions, between, the, 'N-terminal', transactivation, domain, '(', 'TAD)', of, 'p53,', the, 'TAZ1,', 'TAZ2,', 'KIX,', and, nuclear, receptor, coactivator, binding, domains, of, 'CBP,', and, the, 'p53-binding', domain, of, 'HDM2'])].
[sujeto(['The', p53, 'TAD', contains, amphipathic]), verbo([binding]), complemento([motifs, within, the, 'AD1', and, 'AD2', regions, that, mediate, interactions, with, 'CBP', and, 'HDM2'])].
[sujeto(['Binding', of, the, p53, 'TAD', to, 'CBP', domains, is, dominated, by, interactions, with, 'AD2,', although, the, affinity, is]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, additional, interactions, with, 'AD1'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, p53, 'TAD', to, 'HDM2', is, mediated, primarily, by, 'AD1'])].
[sujeto(['The', p53, 'TAD', can]), verbo([bind]), complemento([simultaneously, to, 'HDM2', '(', through, 'AD1)', and, to, any, one, of, the, 'CBP', domains, '(', through, 'AD2)', to, form, a, ternary, complex])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, p53, at, 'T18', impairs]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'HDM2', and, enhances, affinity, for, the, 'CBP', 'KIX', domain])].
[sujeto(['Multisite', phosphorylation, of, the, p53, 'TAD', at, 'S15,', 'T18,', and, 'S20']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, increased, affinity, for, the, 'TAZ1', and, 'KIX', domains, of, 'CBP'])].
[sujeto(['These', observations]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, mechanism, whereby, 'HDM2', and, 'CBP/p300', function, synergistically, to, regulate, the, p53, response])].
[sujeto(['In', unstressed, 'cells,', 'CBP/p300,', 'HDM2', and, p53, form, a, ternary, complex, that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([polyubiquitination, and, degradation, of, p53])].
[sujeto(['After', cellular, stress, and, 'DNA', 'damage,', p53, becomes, phosphorylated, at, 'T18', and, other, residues, in, the, 'AD1', 'region,']), verbo([releases]), complemento(['HDM2', and, binds, preferentially, to, 'CBP/p300,', leading, to, stabilization, and, activation, of, p53])].
[sujeto(['The', transactivation, domain, '(', 'TAD)', of, p53]), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, several, 'CBP/p300', domains, '(', 'TAZ1,', 'TAZ2,', 'NCBD,', and, 'KIX)'])].
[sujeto(['KIX', is, a, structural, domain, in, 'CBP/p300', that, can, simultaneously]), verbo([bind]), complemento([two, polypeptide, 'ligands,', such, as, the, activation, domain, of, 'MLL', and, the, 'kinase-inducible', activation, domain, '(', 'pKID)', of, 'CREB,', using, distinct, interaction, surfaces])].
[sujeto(['The', p53, 'TAD', consists, of, two, subdomains, '(', 'AD1', and, 'AD2);', peptides, corresponding, to, the, isolated, 'AD1', and, 'AD2', subdomains]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'KIX', with, relatively, low, 'affinity,', but, a, longer, peptide, containing, both, subdomains, binds, 'KIX', tightly])].
[sujeto(['In', the, context, of, the, 'full-length', p53, 'TAD,', 'AD1', and, 'AD2']), verbo([bind]), complemento([synergistically, to, 'KIX'])].
[sujeto(['Mapping', of, the, chemical, shift, perturbations, onto, the, structure, of, 'KIX', shows, that, isolated, 'AD1', and, 'AD2', peptides]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, both, the, 'MLL', and, pKID, sites])].
[sujeto(['Spin-labeling', experiments, show, that, the, complex, of, the, 'full-length', p53, 'TAD', with, 'KIX', is, 'disordered,', with, the, 'AD1', and, 'AD2', subdomains, each]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, both, the, 'MLL', and, pKID, binding, surfaces])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, the, p53, 'TAD', at, 'Thr18', or, 'Ser20']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, 'KIX', binding, affinity])].
[sujeto(['The', affinity, is, further]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, simultaneous, phosphorylation, of, 'Thr18', and, 'Ser20,', and, the, specificity, of, the, interaction, is, increased])].
[sujeto(['The', p53, 'TAD', simultaneously, occupies, the, two, distinct, sites, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, on, the, 'CBP', 'KIX', domain, and, efficiently, competes, for, these, sites, with, other, known, 'KIX-binding', transcription, factors])].
[sujeto(['The', application, of, complex, system, engineering, approaches, to, cell, signaling, networks, should]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, novel, understandings, 'and,', 'subsequently,', new, treatments, for, complex, disorders])].
[sujeto(['To', show, the, utility, of, this, 'approach,', we, analyzed, three, 'well-characterized', signaling, 'networks--a', cellular, network, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'caspase3,', a, network, that, regulates, the, activity, of, 'p53,', and, a, central, nervous, system, network, that, regulates, the, activity, of, the, transcription, factor, 'CREB', '(', adenosine, 3, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, monophosphate, response, 'element-binding', 'protein)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([important, differences, among, the, vulnerability, values, of, different, molecules])].
[sujeto(['Because', this, approach, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, key, molecules, that, contribute, to, human, 'diseases,', it, may, aid, in, the, identification, of, critical, targets, for, drug, development])].
[sujeto(['The', activation, of, the, tumor, suppressor, p53, facilitates, the, cellular, response, to, genotoxic, 'stress;', 'however,', the, p53, response, can, only, be]), verbo([executed]), complemento([if, its, interaction, with, its, inhibitor, 'Mdm2', is, abolished])].
[sujeto(['There']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, conflicting, reports, on, the, question, of, whether, p53, posttranslational, 'modifications,', such, as, phosphorylation, or, 'acetylation,', are, essential, or, only, play, a, 'subtle,', 'fine-tuning', role, in, the, p53, response])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', it, remains, unclear, whether, p53, modification, is, absolutely]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, its, activation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, identified, all, major, acetylation, sites, of, p53])].
[sujeto(['Although', unacetylated, p53]), verbo([retains]), complemento([its, ability, to, induce, the, 'p53-Mdm2', feedback, 'loop,', loss, of, acetylation, completely, abolishes, 'p53-dependent', growth, arrest, and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Notably,', acetylation, of, p53, abrogates, 'Mdm2-mediated', repression, by, blocking, the, recruitment, of, 'Mdm2', to, 'p53-responsive', 'promoters,', which]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, p53, activation, independent, of, its, phosphorylation, status])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'Hes6', is, a, component, of, the, promyelocytic, leukemia]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([body, '(', 'PML-NB)', complex, in, the, nuclei, and, that, 'Hes6', inhibits, cell, proliferation, through, induction, of, p21, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['We', further, show, that, 'Hes6', directly]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP),', one, of, the, key, components, of, 'PML-NB,', via, its, basic, domain])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'Hes6-CBP', complex, in, 'PML-NB', may, influence, the, proliferation, of, cells, via, 'p53-dependent', and, -, independent, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Trichostatin', 'A', '(', 'TSA),', a, specific, inhibitor, of, histone, deacetylases, '(', 'HDACs),']), verbo([induces]), complemento([acetylation, of, various, 'non-histone', proteins, such, as, p53, and, 'alpha-tubulin'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([on, acetylation, of, 'CFIm25,', a, component, of, mammalian, cleavage, factor, 'Im', '(', 'CF', 'Im),', and, 'poly(A)', polymerase, '(', 'PAP),', a, polyadenylating, enzyme, for, the, 'pre-mRNA', 3, '\'', -, end])].
[sujeto(['The', residues, acetylated, in, these, proteins, were, mapped, onto, the, regions]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, interaction, with, each, other])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', 'CBP', acetylated, these, 'proteins,', 'HDAC1,', 'HDAC3,', 'HDAC10,', 'SIRT1,', and, 'SIRT2', were]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, in, vivo, deacetylation])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', the, interaction, between, 'PAP', and, 'CF', 'Im', complex, was]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, acetylation])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrated, that, acetylation, of, 'PAP']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, nuclear, localization, of, 'PAP', by, inhibiting, the, binding, to, the, importin, 'alpha/beta', complex])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'CBP', and, 'HDACs', regulate, the, 3, '\'', -, end, processing, machinery, and, modulate, the, localization, of, 'PAP', through, the, acetylation, and, deacetylation, cycle])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([placed, the, 'Fgfr1', gene, at, the, top, of, major, ontogenic, pathways, that, enable, 'gastrulation,', tissue, development, and, organogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'genome-wide', sequencing, and]), verbo([loss]), complemento([and, gain, of, function, experiments, the, present, investigation, reveals, a, mechanism, that, underlies, global, and, direct, gene, regulation, by, the, nuclear, form, of, 'FGFR1,', ensuring, that, pluripotent, 'Embryonic', 'Stem', 'Cells', differentiate, into, 'Neuronal', 'Cells', in, response, to, 'Retinoic', 'Acid'])].

[sujeto(['The', development, and, progression, of, melanoma]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, attributed, to, independent, or, combined, genetic, and, epigenetic, events])].

[sujeto(['The', regulatory, mechanisms, by, which, hydrogen, peroxide, '(', 'H2O2)']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, activity, of, transcription, factors, in, bacteria, '(', 'OxyR', and, 'PerR),', lower, eukaryotes, '(', 'Yap1,', 'Maf1,', 'Hsf1', and, 'Msn2/4)', and, mammalian, cells, '(', 'AP-1,', 'NRF2,', 'CREB,', 'HSF1,', 'HIF-1,', 'TP53,', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B,', 'NOTCH,', 'SP1', and, 'SCREB-1)', are, reviewed])].
[sujeto(['The', complexity, of, regulatory, networks]), verbo([increases]), complemento([throughout, the, phylogenetic, 'tree,', reaching, a, high, level, of, complexity, in, mammalians])].
[sujeto(['Multiple', 'H2O2', sensors, and, pathways, are]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([converging, in, the, regulation, of, transcription, factors, at, several, 'levels:', '(', 1, ')', synthesis, of, the, transcription, factor, by, upregulating, transcription, or, increasing, both, mRNA, stability, and, 'translation;', '(', 'ii)', stability, of, the, transcription, factor, by, decreasing, its, association, with, the, ubiquitin, 'E3', ligase, complex, or, by, inhibiting, this, 'complex;', '(', 'iii)', 'cytoplasm-nuclear', traffic, by, 'exposing/masking', nuclear, localization, 'signals,', or, by, releasing, the, transcription, factor, from, partners, or, from, membrane, 'anchors;', and, '(', 'iv)', 'DNA', binding, and, nuclear, transactivation, by, modulating, transcription, factor, affinity, towards, 'DNA,', 'co-activators', or, 'repressors,', and, by, targeting, specific, regions, of, chromatin, to, activate, individual, genes])].
[sujeto(['We', also, discuss, how, 'H2O2', biological, specificity, results, from, diverse, thiol, protein, 'sensors,', with, different, reactivity, of, their, sulfhydryl, groups, towards, 'H2O2,', being]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, different, concentrations, and, times, of, exposure, to, 'H2O2'])].
