[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', the, multitude, of, 'H2O2']), verbo([targets]), complemento([and, mechanisms, provides, an, opportunity, for, highly, specific, effects, on, gene, regulation, that, depend, on, the, cell, type, and, on, signals, received, from, the, cellular, microenvironment])].
[sujeto(['However,', despite, its, biological, 'importance,', the, mechanisms, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([its, expression, remain, obscure])].

[sujeto([12, -, 'O-tetradecanoylphorbol-13-acetate', '(', 'TPA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, induce, transcriptional, activation, of, human, manganese, superoxide, dismutase, '(', 'MnSOD)', mRNA, in, human, lung, carcinoma, 'cells,', 'A549,', mediated, by, a, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)-dependent', activation, of, 'cAMP-responsive', 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)-1/ATF-1-like', factors])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([performed, an, extensive, characterization, of, the, ionic, strength, dependence, of, the, interaction, between, the, molten, globular, nuclear, 'co-activator', binding, domain, '(', 'NCBD)', of, 'CREB', binding, protein, and, five, different, protein, 'ligands,', including, the, intrinsically, disordered, activation, domain, of, p160, transcriptional, 'co-activators', '(', 'SRC1,', 'TIF2,', 'ACTR),', the, p53, transactivation, 'domain,', and, the, folded, pointed, domain, '(', 'PNT)', of, transcription, factor, 'ETS-2'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'BV2', 'cells,', a, microglia, cell, 'line,', 'EP']), verbo([induced]), complemento([translocation, of, 'Nrf2', from, the, cytosol, to, the, nucleus, and, enhanced, the, expression, of, hemeoxygenase, 1, '(', 'HO-1)', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, and, 1, h, incubation, with, 10, mM, 'EP', increased, 'HO-1', to, 4.9, -, fold])].

[sujeto([cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', is, a, key, nuclear, factor, highly, expressed, in, hippocampal, neurons, on, which, many, signal, pathways, converge])].

[sujeto(['Mice', bearing, a, null, mutation, of, 'Ceacam1', gene, '(', 'Cc1(-/-))', develop, impaired, insulin, clearance, followed, by, hyperinsulinemia, and, insulin, 'resistance,', in, addition, to, visceral, obesity, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([plasma, fatty, acids])].

[sujeto(['While', the, functions, of, 'hypoxia-inducible', factor, 1, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'HIF1&Icirc;&plusmn;)/aryl', hydrocarbon, receptor]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocator, '(', 'ARNT)', and, 'HIF2&Icirc;&plusmn;/ARNT', '(', 'HIF2)', proteins, in, activating, 'hypoxia-inducible', genes, are, well, 'established,', the, role, of, other, transcription, factors, in, the, hypoxic, transcriptional, response, is, less, clear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, for, the, first, time, that, the, basic, 'helix-loop-helix-leucine-zip', transcription, factor, upstream, stimulatory, factor, 2, '(', 'USF2)', is, required, for, the, hypoxic, transcriptional, 'response,', 'specifically,', for, hypoxic, activation, of, 'HIF2', target, genes])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['USF2', activity, greatly, reduces, hypoxic, induction, of, 'HIF2', target, genes, in, cell, lines, that, have, 'USF2', 'activity,', while, inducing, 'USF2', activity, in, cells, lacking, 'USF2', activity, restores, hypoxic, induction, of, 'HIF2', target, genes])].

[sujeto(['Functionally,', the, effect, of, 'USF2', knockdown, on, 'proliferation,', 'motility,', and, clonogenic, survival, of, 'HIF2-dependent', tumor, cells, in, vitro, is, phenocopied, by, 'HIF2&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'knockdown,', indicating, that, 'USF2', works, with, 'HIF2', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['HIF2', target, genes, and, to, drive, 'HIF2-depedent', tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, therapeutic, benefits, of]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([this, target, class, are, largely, unexplored, due, to, the, lack, of, suitable, chemical, probes])].

[sujeto(['Two', of, the, fragments, are, completely, new, bromodomain, 'chemotypes,', and, three]), verbo([have]), complemento([never, before, been, crystallized, in, a, 'bromodomain,', so, our, results, significantly, extend, the, limited, public, 'knowledge-base', of, crystallographic, small, 'molecule/bromodomain', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Certain', fragments, '(', including, 'paracetamol)']), verbo([bind]), complemento([in, a, consistent, mode, to, different, bromodomains, such, as, 'CREBBP,', suggesting, their, potential, to, act, as, generic, bromodomain, templates])].

[sujeto(['We', are, interested, in, understanding, the, mechanism, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([specificity, between, 'ABREs', and, a, class, of, bZIP, transcription, factors, known, as, 'ABRE', binding, factors, '(', 'ABFs)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([modeled, the, homodimeric, structure, of, the, bZIP, domain, of, 'ABRE', binding, factor, 1, from, 'Arabidopsis', thaliana, '(', 'AtABF1)', and, studied, its, interaction, with, 'ACGT', core, 'motif-containing', 'ABRE', sequences])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, examined, the, variation, in, the, stability, of, the, 'protein-DNA', complex, upon, mutating, 'ABRE', sequences, using, the, protein, design, algorithm, 'FoldX'])].
[sujeto(['The', high, throughput, free, energy, calculations, successfully, predicted, the, ability, of, 'ABF1', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, alternative, core, motifs, like, 'GCGT', or, 'AAGT', and, also, rationalized, the, role, of, the, flanking, sequences, in, determining, the, specificity, of, the, 'protein-DNA', interaction])].
[sujeto(['cAMP-responsive', 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)-regulated', transcription, coactivator, 2, '(', 'CRTC2)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([transcription, of, gluconeogenic, genes, by, specifying, targets, for, the, transcription, factor, 'CREB', in, response, to, glucagon])].
[sujeto(['We', used, an, antisense, oligonucleotide, directed, against, 'CRTC2', in, both, normal, rodents, and, in, rodent, models, of]), verbo([increased]), complemento([gluconeogenesis, to, better, understand, the, role, of, 'CRTC2', in, metabolic, disease])].
[sujeto(['When', this, phenomenon, was]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([with, somatostatin, or, a, 'glucagon-neutralizing', 'antibody,', endogenous, glucose, production, was, reduced, by, 'CRTC2', 'KD'])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'CRTC2', inhibition, resulted, in, reduced, expression, of, several, 'glucagon-induced', pyridoxal, 5, '\'', -, 'phosphate-dependent', enzymes, that, convert, amino, acids, to, gluconeogenic, 'intermediates,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, it, may, control, substrate, availability, as, well, as, gluconeogenic, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', it, is, also, part, of, a, previously, unidentified, negative, feedback, loop, that, degrades, glucagon, and]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([amino, acid, metabolism, to, coordinately, control, glucose, homeostasis, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Brain', derived, neurotrophic, factor, '(', 'BDNF)']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, levels, of, somatostatin, '(', 'SS)', and, its, mRNA])].
[sujeto(['To', test, the, hypothesis, that, the, regulation, of, 'SS', synthesis, by, 'BDNF', occurs, at, the, transcriptional, level, and]), verbo([requires]), complemento([specific, promoter, 'sequences,', cerebrocortical, and, 'PC12trkB', neurons, were, transiently, transfected, with, different, constructs, of, the, 'SS', promoter, fused, to, the, luciferase, and, 'CAT', reporter, genes])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'BDNF']), verbo([triggered]), complemento([the, transcription, of, the, 'SS', gene, through, the, 'CRE', sequence, located, in, the, 'SS', promoter])].
[sujeto(['BDNF', and, 'SS', are, genes]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'K(+)-induced', neuronal, activity])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'BDNF', blocking, 'antibodies,', we, investigated, whether, 'K(+)-induced', 'BDNF', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'K(+)-dependent', 'SS', mRNA, induction])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'K(+)-induced', 'SS', mRNA, was, partially, prevented, when, 'BDNF', was, blocked])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([indicated, that, 'BDNF', mediated, the, induction, of, 'SS', mRNA, by, 'K(+)', depolarization])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, the, mechanisms, by, which, 'BDNF']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['SS', gene, transcription, we, first, elucidated, the, signaling, pathways, activated, by, 'BDNF', in, cerebrocortical, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', confirmed, that, 'BDNF']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'MAPK/ERKs', and, 'PI3K/Akt', pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, we, observed, that, the, 'PKA', 'inhibitors,', 'H89', and, 'Rp-cAMPS']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['BDNF-induced', 'CREB', activation])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'BDNF-induced', 'CREB', activation, was, also, mediated, by, the, 'cAMP/PKA', pathway])].
[sujeto(['We', next, elucidated, the, mechanism, by, which, 'BDNF']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['SS', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, 'H89,', 'PD0998059,', 'KN62', and, 'LY294002', diminished, 'BDNF-induced', 'SS', mRNA]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'BDNF-induced', 'SS', mRNA, is, mediated, by, the, activation, of, 'cAMP/PKA,', 'MAPK/ERKs,', 'CaMK', and, 'PI3K', pathways])].
[sujeto(['p300/CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['protein-associated', factor, '(', 'PCAF)', regulates, gene, expression, by, acting, through, histone, acetylation, and, as, a, transcription, coactivator])].
[sujeto(['Although', histone, acetyltransferases, were]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, toxicity, induced, by, 'amyloid-beta', '(', 'Abeta)', 'peptides,', nothing, is, known, about, 'PCAF'])].
[sujeto(['We', here, analyzed, the, sensitivity, of, 'PCAF', knockout, '(', 'KO)', mice, to, the, toxic, effects]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, i])].

[sujeto(['Examination', of, enzymes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Abeta', generation, or, degradation, revealed, changes, in, transcription, of, 'presenilins,', activity, of, neprilysin, '(', 'NEP)', and, an, absence, of, 'Abeta(25-35)-induced', regulation, of, 'NEP', activity, in, 'PCAF', 'KO', 'mice,', partly, due, to, an, altered, expression, of, somatostatin, '(', 'SRIH)'])].

[sujeto(['We', investigated, which, of, the, signalling, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'CREB', activation, mediates, 'SS', gene, induction, in, response, to, membrane, depolarization, in, cerebrocortical, cells, exposed, to, 56, mM, 'K(+)'])].
[sujeto(['The', selective, inhibitors, of, extracellular, signal, related, protein, 'kinase/mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'ERK/MAPK)', 'PD098059,', 'cyclic-AMPdependent', protein, kinase, '(', 'cAMP/PKA)', 'H89', and, 'RpcAMPS,', and, 'Ca(2+)/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinases, '(', 'CaMKs)', pathways, 'KN62', and, 'KN93', were, used, to, determine, the, signalling, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'CREB', activation])].

[sujeto(['Neuronal', survival]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, enhanced, by, 'alpha-tocopherol', and, modulated, by, cyclic, 'AMP', '(', 'cAMP)'])].
[sujeto(['Somatostatin', '(', 'SST)', receptors, couple, negatively, to, adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'AC),', thus]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, decreased, cAMP, levels])].

[sujeto(['The', insulin, promoter, contains, a, number, of, dissimilar, 'cis-acting', regulatory, elements, that]), verbo([bind]), complemento([a, range, of, tissue, specific, and, ubiquitous, transcription, factors])].

[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, recently, that]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([the, levels, of, cAMP, allows, opioids, to, modulate, 'GABAergic', synaptic, transmission, between, the, nucleus, of, the, tractus, solitarius, '(', 'NTS)', and, dorsal, motor, nucleus, of, the, vagus, '(', 'DMV)'])].

[sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, the, activity, of, cAMP, responsive, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', and, of, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP)', is, decreased, in, 'Huntington\'s', disease, '(', 'HD)', '[', 'Steffan', et, al])].
[sujeto(['Such']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([is, thought, to, reflect, the, impaired, energy, metabolism, observed, in, a, 'HD', mouse, 'model,', where, a, decline, in, striatum, cAMP, levels, has, been, observed, '[', 'Gines', et, al])].
[sujeto(['Increased', levels, of, 'CREB']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, demonstrated, to, exert, neuroprotective, functions, '[', 'Lonze', &, 'amp;', 'Ginty', '(', 2002, ')', 'Neuron,', 35, ',', 605, -, 623, ;, 'Lonze', et, al])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, show, that]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['CREB', levels, decrease, progressively, in, projection, neurons, and, parvalbumin, '(', 'PARV)', and, calretinin, '(', 'CALR)', 'interneurons,', whereas, such, levels, remain, stable, in, cholinergic, and, somatostatin, interneurons])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we, speculate, that, the, ability, of, cholinergic, interneurons, to]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([their, levels, of, 'CREB', after, excitotoxic, lesions, is, one, of, the, factors, determining, their, protection, in, 'Huntington\'s', disease])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', activity]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([multiple, signal, transduction, pathways, and, potently, regulates, gene, expression, in, the, brain])].
[sujeto(['In', the, central, nervous, 'system,', in, addition, to, the, synaptic, 'input,', neurons, are, subject, to, neuromodulatory, influences, that, can]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, same, signaling, elements])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, examine, how, serotonergic, neuromodulation]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, neuronal, activity, in, the, regulation, of, gene, expression, in, hippocampal, neurons])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', exposure, of, cells, to, 'NaAsO2', resulted, in, a, significant, inhibition, of, expression, of, the, cell, cycle, and, growth]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['gene,', cyclin, 'D1'])].
[sujeto(['Whether', or, not, the, inhibition, of, cyclin, 'D1', in, the, 'NaAsO2-treated', cells, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, the, inhibition, of, eIF4E, was, tested, by, silencing, the, expression, of, eIF4E, gene, in, the, cells])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', of, cells, with, 'SiRNA', specifically]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([eIF4E, gene, expression, resulted, in, a, significant, inhibition, of, cyclin, 'D1', gene, suggesting, that, the, observed, inhibition, of, cyclin, 'D1', gene, in, the, 'NaAsO2-treated', cells, is, most, likely, mediated, through, inhibition, of, eIF4E, gene])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results, indicate, that, the, exposure, of, cells, to, 'NaAsO2', resulted, in, cytotoxicity, and, cell, 'death,', at, least, in, 'part,', due, to, the, inhibition, of, eIF4E, gene, expression]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, diminished, cellular, levels, of, critical, genes, such, as, cyclin, 'D1'])].
[sujeto(['We', also, investigated, the, effects, on, mRNA, expression, of, the, transcription, initiator, 'gene,', 'RNA', polymerase, 'II', '(', 'RNAP', 'II),', and, key, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, protein, 'translation,', eukaryotic, initiation, 'factor-4E', '(', 'eIF-4E)', and, '4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)'])].
[sujeto(['Cycling', to, fatigue, '[', 54.5, '(', 'SD', 20.6, ')', 'min]', immediately]), verbo([increased]), complemento([alpha3, '(', 'P', =, 0.044, ')', and, beta2, mRNA, '(', 'P', =, 0.042, ')', by, 2.2, -, and, 1.9, -, 'fold,', 'respectively,', whereas, alpha1, mRNA, was, elevated, by, 2.0, -, fold, at, 24, h, postexercise, '(', 'P', =, 0.036, ')'])].
[sujeto(['A', significant, time, main, effect, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([for, alpha3, protein, abundance, '(', 'P', =, 0.046, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Exercise', immediately]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['RNAP', 'II', mRNA, by, 2.6, -, fold, '(', 'P', =, 0.011, ')', but, had, no, effect, on, 'eIF-4E', and, '4E-BP1', mRNA])].
[sujeto(['Thus', a, single, bout, of, prolonged, submaximal, exercise]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['isoform-specific', 'Na+-K+-ATPase', 'responses,', increasing, 'alpha1,', 'alpha3,', and, beta2, mRNA, but, only, alpha3, protein, expression])].
[sujeto(['Exercise', also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mRNA, expression, of, 'RNAP', 'II,', a, gene, initiating, 'transcription,', but, not, of, 'eIF-4E', and, '4E-BP1,', key, genes, initiating, protein, translation])].
[sujeto(['The', study, of, intracellular, signaling, pathways]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, aided, by, the, use, of, sodium, 'orthovanadate,', a, 'cell-permeable', inhibitor, of, tyrosine, phosphatases])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we, demonstrate, that, the, growth, 'factor-mediated']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, rate, of, protein, synthesis, was, inhibited, by, sodium, orthovanadate])].
[sujeto(['As', a, 'consequence,', the, fetal, bovine, 'serum-mediated', induction, of, the, 'immediate-early', 'genes,', 'c-Fos', and, 'MKP-1,', at, the, protein, level, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, orthovanadate])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, several, elements, of, signaling, pathways, which, are, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([protein, synthesis, in, a, positive, manner, '(', 'p42/p44', 'MAPK,', 'AKT', and, p70, 'S6K', 'stimulation,', and, hyperphosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I)', were, not, inhibited, but, rather, were, stimulated, by, orthovanadate])].
[sujeto([p70, 'S6', kinase, '(', p70, 'S6k)', is, important, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([a, variety, of, cellular, functions, including, mRNA, translation, and, cell, cycle, progression, and, is, activated, by, mitogens, and, hormones])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, 'that,', in, adult, rat, 'cardiomyocytes,', 'arsenite,', which, generally, induces, stress, 'responses,', markedly, and, rapidly, activates, p70, 'S6k'])].
[sujeto(['This', activation, of, p70, 'S6k', is, completely, blocked, by, rapamycin, but, only, partially]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, inhibitors, of, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase])].
[sujeto(['In', trying, to, delineate, the, mechanism, underlying, this, 'effect,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, arsenite, did, not, activate, protein, kinase, 'B,', 'JNK', or, 'MAP', 'kinase,', but, did, activate, p38, 'MAP', kinase, in, cardiac, myocytes])].
[sujeto(['These', data, indicate, that, the, activation, of, p70, 'S6k', by, arsenite]), verbo([involves]), complemento([p38, 'MAP', kinase, and, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, but, not, 'PKB'])].
[sujeto(['Initiation', factor, 'eIF-4F,', a, multiprotein, cap]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 'complex,', was, purified, from, 'HeLa', cells, by, m7G, affinity, chromatography, and, independently, by, phosphocellulose, column, chromatography])].
[sujeto(['The', phosphorylation, of, p28]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([upon, heat, shock, when, protein, synthesis, is, repressed])].
[sujeto(['The', correlation, of, dephosphorylation, of, p28, with, the, inhibition, of, protein, synthesis, and, the, relatively, low, abundance, of, the, 'eIF-4F', complex]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'eIF-4F', plays, a, role, in, the, translational, control, of, mRNA, binding])].
[sujeto(['Among', three, classes, of, 'sodium/phosphate', 'co-transporters', '(', 'NPTs),', two, types]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, mammalian, lung])].
[sujeto(['The', potential, importance, of, 'Pi', as, a, novel, signaling, molecule, and, pulmonary, expression, of, 'NPTs', with, poor, prognosis, of, diverse, lung, diseases, including, cancer]), verbo([have]), complemento([prompted, us, to, begin, to, define, the, pathways, by, which, 'Pi', regulates, nontumorigenic, human, bronchial, epithelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Pi']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Akt', phosphorylation, on, 'Thr308', 'specifically,', and, activated, signal, transmits, on, the, 'Raf/MEK/ERK', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Pi', controls, cell, growth, by, activating, 'ERK', cascades, and, by, facilitating, the, translocation, of, 'Mnk1', from, cytosol, into, nucleus, through, an, 'Akt-mediated', 'MEK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Sequentially,', translocated, 'Mnk1']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['eIF4E-BP1', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['As', a, 'result,', 'Pi']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['cap-dependent', protein, translation])].
[sujeto(['Such', 'Akt-mediated', signaling, of, inorganic, phosphate, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([critical, clues, for, treatment, as, well, as, prevention, of, diverse, lung, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Under', most, 'circumstances,', translational, control, occurs, at, the, initiation, step, at, which, the, ribosome, is]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, mRNA])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E),', as, part, of, the, eIF4F, 'complex,']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([first, with, the, mRNA, and, facilitates, the, recruitment, of, the, 40, 'S', ribosomal, subunit])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, eIF4E, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, many, 'levels,', most, profoundly, by, two, major, signalling, 'pathways:', 'PI3K', '(', phosphoinositide, 3, -, 'kinase)/Akt', '(', also, known, and, 'Protein', 'Kinase', 'B,', 'PKB)/mTOR', '(', 'mechanistic/mammalian', target, of, 'rapamycin)', and, 'Ras', '(', rat, 'sarcoma)/MAPK', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, 'kinase)/Mnk', '(', 'MAPK-interacting', 'kinases)'])].
[sujeto([mTOR, directly, phosphorylates, the, '4E-BPs', '(', 'eIF4E-binding', 'proteins),', which, are, inhibitors, of, 'eIF4E,', to, relieve, translational, 'suppression,', whereas, 'Mnk', phosphorylates, eIF4E, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([translation])].
[sujeto(['Hyperactivation', of, these, pathways, occurs, in, the, majority, of, 'cancers,', which, results, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([eIF4E, activity])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', translational, control, via, eIF4E]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, convergence, point, for, hyperactive, signalling, pathways, to, promote, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['Consequently,', recent, works]), verbo([have]), complemento([aimed, to, target, these, pathways, and, ultimately, the, translational, machinery, for, cancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Non-small', cell, lung, cancer, '(', 'NSCLC)', remains, the, most, common]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'cancer-related', death, worldwide])].
[sujeto(['Patients', presenting, with, 'advanced-stage', 'NSCLC']), verbo([have]), complemento([poor, 'prognosis,', while, metastatic, spread, accounts, for, &, 'gt;70&Acirc;&nbsp;%', of, 'patient\'s', deaths])].
[sujeto(['The', major, advances, in, the, treatment, of, lung, cancer]), verbo([have]), complemento([brought, only, minor, improvements, in, 'survival;', 'therefore,', novel, strategic, treatment, approaches, are, urgently, needed])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', studies, indicate, that, translation, initiation, factors, are, over]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'NSCLC', and, negatively, impact, its, prognosis])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', translation, initiation, is, highly]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, microenvironmental, cues])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, therapeutic, approach, that, will, sabotage, this, 'dialogue,', especially, in, the, 'BM', 'microenvironment,', may, diminish, lung, cancer, metastatic, spread, and, morbidity, and, improve, the, 'patient\'s', life, quality])].
[sujeto(['The', overexpression, of, eIF4E, gene]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, in, a, variety, of, human, malignancies])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, attempted, to, identify, the, potential, effects, of, eIF4E, and, explore, the, possibility, of, eIF4E, as, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, treatment, of, human, ovarian, cancer])].
[sujeto(['First', the, activation, of, eIF4E, protein, was, detected, with, 'm7-GTP', cap]), verbo([binding]), complemento([assays, in, ovarian, cancer, and, control, cells])].
[sujeto(['Next,', the, 'eIF4E-shRNA', expression, plasmids, were, used, to, specifically]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([eIF4E, activity, in, ovarian, cancer, cells, line, 'A2780', and, 'C200'])].
[sujeto(['The', results, of, 'BrdU', incorporation, and, 'FCM', assay, indicate, that, knockdown, of, eIF4E, efficiently]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([cell, growth, and, induce, cell, cycle, arrest, in, 'G1', phase, and, subsequent, apoptosis, in, ovarian, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['From', 'Transwell', assay, 'analysis,', knockdown, eIF4E, significantly]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([cellular, migration, and, invasion, of, ovarian, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, confirmed, that, knockdown, eIF4E, could, synergistically]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, cytotoxicity, effects, of, cisplatin, to, cancer, cells, and, sensitized, 'cisplatin-resistant', 'C200', cells, 'in&Acirc;&nbsp;vitro'])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', eIF4E, gene, can, be, used, as, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, treatment, of, human, ovarian, cancer])].
[sujeto(['To', assess, the, effect, of, downregulation, of, eIF4E, on, the, proliferation, and, invasiveness, of, a, human, lung, adenocarcinoma, cell, 'line,', a, short, hairpin, '(', 'sh)RNA']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([eIF4E, was, constructed, and, transfected, into, 'A549&Acirc;&nbsp;human', lung, adenocarcinoma, cells])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', of, the, 'A549&Acirc;&nbsp;cells', with, eIF4E]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([shRNA, reduced, the, mRNA, and, protein, expression, levels, of, eIF4E, by, &, 'gt;70%', 48, and, 72, &, 'Acirc;&nbsp;h', following, 'transfection,', and, eIF4E, targeting, 'shRNA&acirc;&euro;&lsquo;transfected', cells, were, significantly, less, viable, compared, with, the, cells, transfected, with, scrambled, shRNA])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', inhibition, of, eIF4E]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([cell, growth, and, 'invasion,', induced, apoptosis, and, cell, cycle, 'arrest,', suggesting, that, eIF4E, may, be, a, potential, therapeutic, target, in, lung, adenocarcinoma])].
[sujeto(['Decreased', regenerative, capacity, of, old, skeletal, muscles]), verbo([involves]), complemento([disrupted, turnover, of, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Leucine', supplementation, attenuated, the]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, expression, of, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', binding, protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', in, young, and, old, muscles, on, day, 3, 'post-injury', and, promoted, an, increase, in, the, 'cross-sectional', area, of, regenerating, myofibers, from, both, young, and, old, soleus, muscles, on, day, 10, 'post-injury'])].
[sujeto(['This', supplementation]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, levels, of, ubiquitinated, proteins, and, increased, the, proteasome, activity, in, young, regenerating, 'muscles,', but, the, opposite, effect, was, observed, in, old, regenerating, muscles])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', leucine]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, inflammation, area, and, induced, an, increase, in, the, number, of, proliferating, satellite, cells, in, both, young, and, old, muscles])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, leucine, supplementation, improves, the, regeneration, of, skeletal, muscles, from, old, 'rats,', through, the, preservation, of, some, biological, responses, upon, leucine, supplementation])].
[sujeto(['Such', responses, comprise, the]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, inflammation, 'area,', increase, in, the, number, of, proliferating, satellite, cells, and, size, of, regenerating, 'myofibers,', combined, with, the, modulation, of, components, of, the, phosphoinositide, 3, -, 'kinase/Akt-protein', kinase, 'B/mammalian', target, of, rapamycin, '(', 'PI3K/Akt/mTOR)', pathway, and, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', system])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RAS/mitogen-activated', protein, kinases, '(', 'MAPK)', and, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, inhibitor, '(', 'PI3K)/mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', pathways, are, considered, to, be, 2, major, mechanisms, for, sarcoma, proliferation, and, survival, and, to, the, 'authors\'', knowledge, their, role, in, 'UPS', remains, unclear])].
[sujeto(['The', objective, of, the, current, study, was, to, investigate, whether, the, 'RAS/MAPK', and, 'PI3K/mTOR', pathways, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, 'UPS,', and, whether, pathway, activation, is, associated, with, outcome])].
[sujeto(['Critical', lymph, nodes, within, the, 'RAS/MAPK', and, 'PI3K/mTOR', pathways, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, activated, in, &, 'gt;80%', of, 'UPS', cases])].
[sujeto(['Hyperactivation', of, the, 'RAS/MAPK', 'pathway,', as, assessed, by, expression, of, phosphorylated, 'ERK', 1, /, 2, ',', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, independently, predict, a, higher, risk, of, disease, recurrence, and, impaired, overall, survival])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RAS/MAPK', and, 'PI3K/mTOR', pathways, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, the, majority, of, cases, of, 'UPS'])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', '4E-BP1)', results, in, release, of, 'eIF4E,', which, sequentially, relieves, translational, repression, and, enhances, oncogenic, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['We', performed, immunohistochemical, staining, for, 'p-4E-BP1', in, 117, tumors, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 77, '(', 66, &, 'Acirc;&nbsp;%)', were, positive, for, 'p-4E-BP1', with, cytoplasmic, 'and/or', nuclear, immunostaining])].
[sujeto(['Patients', with, 'p-4E-BP1-positive', 'SCLC', tended, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([poor, performance, 'status,', although, the, difference, was, not, statistically, significant, '(', 'p&Acirc;&nbsp;=&Acirc;&nbsp;0'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'p-4E-BP1', expression, could, represent, oncogenic, potential, and, contribute, to, the, progression, and, aggressiveness, of, 'SCLC,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([it, could, be, a, candidate, prognostic, biomarker, of, 'SCLC,', especially, in, limited, disease])].
[sujeto(['A', key, integrator, of, the, 'cell\'s', responses, to, starvation, and, other, stresses, is, 'amino-acid-dependent', mechanistic]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)'])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, 'this,', 'PAT4']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['HCT116', human, colorectal, cancer, cell, proliferation, in, culture, and, tumour, growth, in, xenograft, models])].
[sujeto(['Inducible', knockdown, in, 'HCT116', cells]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'PAT4', regulates, a, form, of, mTORC1, with, two, distinct, 'properties:', 'first,', it, preferentially, targets, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1),', and, 'second,', it, is, resistant, to, rapamycin, treatment])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', in, 'HCT116', cells, two, 'non-essential', amino, 'acids,', glutamine, and, 'serine,', which, are, often, rapidly, metabolised, by, tumour, 'cells,']), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['rapamycin-resistant', mTORC1, in, a, 'PAT4-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Overexpressed', 'PAT4', is, also, able, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([rapamycin, resistance, in, human, embryonic, 'kidney-293', cells])].
[sujeto(['PAT4', is, predominantly, associated, with, the, 'Golgi', apparatus, in, a, range, of, cell, 'types,', and, in, situ, proximity, ligation, analysis, shows, that, 'PAT4']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, both, mTORC1, and, its, regulator, 'Rab1A', on, the, 'Golgi'])].
[sujeto(['These', 'findings,', together, with, other, 'studies,']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, differentially, localised, intracellular, 'amino-acid', transporters, contribute, to, the, activation, of, alternate, forms, of, mTORC1])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, data, predict, that, colorectal, cancer, cells, with, high, 'PAT4', expression, will, be, more, resistant, to, depletion, of, serine, and, 'glutamine,', allowing, them, to, survive, and, outgrow, neighbouring, normal, and, tumorigenic, 'cells,', and, potentially]), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, new, route, for, pharmacological, intervention])].
[sujeto(['Mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', is, a, 'serine-threonine', kinase, that, acts, downstream, of, the, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, signaling, pathway, and, regulates, a, wide, range, of, cellular, functions, including, 'transcription,', 'translation,', 'proliferation,', 'apoptosis,', and, autophagy])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', genetic, alterations, that, result, in, mTOR, activation, are, frequently, present, in, human, 'cancers,', whether, the, mTOR, gene, itself, becomes, an, oncogene, through, somatic, mutation]), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, identified, a, somatic, 'non-synonymous', mutation, of, mTOR, that, results, in, a, 'leucine-to-valine', substitution, at, amino, acid, position, 2209, in, a, specimen, of, large, cell, neuroendocrine, carcinoma])].
[sujeto(['The', 'mTOR(L2209V)', mutant, manifested, marked, transforming, potential, in, a, focus, formation, assay, with, mouse, 3, 'T3', 'fibroblasts,', and, it]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, of, p70, 'S6', 'kinase,', 'S6', ribosomal, 'protein,', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, in, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['Transforming', mTOR, mutants, were, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, promote, 3, 'T3', cell, 'survival,', and, their, oncogenic, activity, was, sensitive, to, rapamycin])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, thus, show, that, mTOR, acquires, transforming, activity, through, genetic, changes, in, 'cancer,', and, they]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, such, tumors, may, be, candidates, for, molecularly, targeted, therapy, with, mTOR, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', 'protein-protein']), verbo([interacting]), complemento([sites, for, potential, therapeutic, applications, is, a, challenge, in, the, development, of, 'inhibitors,', and, this, becomes, more, difficult, when, these, interfaces, are, relatively, 'planar,', as, in, the, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', protein])].
[sujeto([eIF4E, is, an, oncogene, that, is, overexpressed, in, numerous, forms, of, 'cancer,', making, it, a, prime]), verbo([target]), complemento([as, a, therapeutic, molecule])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, the, presence, of, a, cryptic, pocket, at, the, 'protein-binding', interface, of, 'eIF4E,', which, opens, transiently, during, molecular, dynamics, simulations, of, the, protein, in, solvent, water, and, is, observed, to, be, stable, when, solvent, water, is, mixed, with, benzene, molecules])].
[sujeto(['The', accessibility, of, the, pocket, is, gated, by, the, 'side-chain', transitions, of, an, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([tryptophan, residue])].
[sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, feasible, for, accommodating, clusters, of, benzene, 'molecules,', which, signify, the, plasticity, and, ligandability, of, the, pocket])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observe, that, the, newly, formed, cavity]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, favorable, binding, environment, for, interaction, of, a, 'well-recognized', small, molecule, inhibitor, of, eIF4E])].
[sujeto(['The', occurrence, of, this, transiently, accessible, cavity, highlights, the, existence, of, a, more, pronounced]), verbo([binding]), complemento([groove, in, a, region, that, has, traditionally, been, considered, to, be, planar])].
[sujeto(['Together,', the, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, an, alternate, binding, cavity, exists, on, eIF4E, and, could, be, exploited, for, the, rational, design, and, development, of, a, new, class, of, lead, compounds, against, the, protein])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, 'LMP1', was, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'SNK-6', cells, compared, with, control, groups])].
[sujeto(['Following', pretreatment, with, 'LMP1', 'shRNA,', the, proliferation, of, 'SNK-6', cells, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([and, resulted, in, a, 'G0/G1', phase, arrest])].
[sujeto(['LMP1', silencing]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([cell, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Further', mechanistic, analysis]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'LMP1', overexpression, induced, the, expression, of, 'eIF4E,', while, 'eIF4E-shRNA', dramatically, attenuated, the, increase, in, cell, 'proliferation,', 'invasion,', migration, and, the, inhibition, of, apoptosis, triggered, by, 'LMP-1', upregulation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, effect, of, 'LMP1', on, eIF4E, expression, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', this]), verbo([finding]), complemento([may, provide, a, potential, target, against, 'NKTL'])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'E7', gene]), verbo([increased]), complemento([eIF4E, mRNA, level, by, 24.3, '%', '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Knock', down, of, 'E7']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([markedly, eIF4E, mRNA, by, 73, '%', '(', 'P&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Under', the, state, of, high, expression, of, 'E7,', 1, ')', 'up-regulation', of, eIF4E, drastically]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, cell, 'proliferation,', cell, cycle, and, cell, 'migration,', and, inhibited, the, cell, apoptosis])].
[sujeto([2, ')', 'down-regulation', of, eIF4E, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, cell, 'proliferation,', cell, cycle, and, the, ability, of, cell, 'migration,', and, also, promoted, the, apoptosis, of, cervical, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['HPV', 'E7']), verbo([induced]), complemento([eIF4E, gene, over, transcription, which, might, be, a, new, marker, for, 'CC'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([finding]), complemento([broadens, the, understanding, of, the, 'CC', carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([the, mRNA, cap, structure, 'and,', together, with, eIF4G, and, 'eIF4A,', form, the, eIF4F, complex, that, regulates, translation, initiation, in, eukaryotes])].
[sujeto(['In', 'trypanosomatids,', 2, eIF4E, homologues, '(', 'EIF4E3', and, 'EIF4E4)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, part, of, 'eIF4F-like', complexes, with, presumed, roles, in, translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['Both', proteins, possess, unique, 'N-terminal', 'extensions,', which, can, be]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([for, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insights, on, the, 'Leishmania', infantum, 'EIF4E4', function, and, regulation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'EIF4E4', is, constitutively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([throughout, the, parasite, development, but, is, preferentially, phosphorylated, in, exponentially, grown, promastigote, and, amastigote, life, 'stages,', hence, correlating, with, high, levels, of, translation])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation']), verbo([targets]), complemento([multiple, 'serine-proline', or, 'threonine-proline', residues, within, the, 'N-terminal', extension, of, 'EIF4E4', but, does, not, require, binding, to, the, 'EIF4E4\'s', 'partner,', 'EIF4G3,', or, to, the, cap, structure])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'EIF4E4', interacts, with, 'PABP1', through, 3, conserved, boxes, at, the, 'EIF4E4&Acirc;&nbsp;N-terminus', and, that, this, interaction, is, a, prerequisite, for, efficient, 'EIF4E4', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['EIF4E4', is, essential, for, 'Leishmania', growth, and, an, 'EIF4E4', null, mutant, was, only, obtained, in, the, presence, of, an, ectopically]), verbo([provided]), complemento([wild, type, gene])].
[sujeto(['Complementation', for, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'EIF4E4', with, several, 'EIF4E4', mutant, proteins, affecting, either, phosphorylation, or, binding, to, mRNA, or, to, 'EIF4E4', protein, partners, revealed, 'that,', in, contrast, to, other, 'eukaryotes,', only, the, 'EIF4E4-PABP1', interaction, but, neither, the, binding, to, 'EIF4G3', nor, phosphorylation, is, essential, for, translation])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, also, demonstrated, that, the, lack, of, both, 'EIF4E4', phosphorylation, and, 'EIF4G3']), verbo([binding]), complemento([leads, to, a, 'non-functional', protein])].
[sujeto(['Since', that, 'time,', numerous, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, performed, with, the, three, proteins, specifically, required, for, the, translation, initiation, of, natural, 'mRNAs,', 'eIF4A,', 'eIF4B,', and, eIF4F])].
[sujeto(['These']), verbo([have]), complemento([involved, enzymatic, and, structural, studies, of, the, proteins, and, a, number, of, 'site-directed', mutagenesis, studies])].

[sujeto(['Our', findings, indicate, eIF4E, is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([at, levels, in, excess, for, normal, development, that, are, hijacked, by, cancer, cells, to, drive, a, translational, program, supporting, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['We', 'determined,', using, immortalized, human, breast, epithelial, 'cells,', that, elevated, expression, of, eIF4E, translationally]), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, transforming, growth, factor, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;', '(', 'TGF-&Icirc;&sup2;)', 'pathway,', promoting, cell, 'invasion,', a, loss, of, cell, 'polarity,', increased, cell, 'survival,', and, other, hallmarks, of, early, neoplasia])].
[sujeto(['This', receptor, complex, acutely, sensitizes, nonmalignant, breast, epithelial, cells, to, activation, by, typically, substimulatory, levels, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['TGF-&Icirc;&sup2;'])].
[sujeto(['TGF-&Icirc;&sup2;', can]), verbo([promote]), complemento([cellular, differentiation, or, invasion, and, transformation])].
[sujeto(['As', a, translational, coactivator, of, 'TGF-&Icirc;&sup2;,', eIF4E]), verbo([confers]), complemento([selective, mRNA, 'translation,', reprogramming, nonmalignant, cells, to, an, invasive, phenotype, by, reducing, the, set, point, for, stimulation, by, activated, 'TGF-&Icirc;&sup2;'])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)', is, a, critical, regulator, of, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', best, studied]), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, mTORC1, in, translation, are, the, eukaryotic, initiation, 'factor-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', and, ribosomal, protein, 'S6', kinase, 1, '(', 'S6K1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, identify, the, 'La-related', protein, 1, '(', 'LARP1)', as, a, key, novel]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, mTORC1, with, a, fundamental, role, in, terminal, oligopyrimidine, '(', 'TOP)', mRNA, translation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LARP1', functions, as, a, key, repressor, of, 'TOP', mRNA, translation, downstream, of, mTORC1])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, show, the, 'following:', '(', 'i)', 'LARP1', associates, with, mTORC1, via, 'RAPTOR;', '(', 'ii)', 'LARP1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'TOP', mRNAs, in, an, 'mTORC1-dependent', 'manner;', '(', 'iii)', 'LARP1', binds, the, 5, '\'', 'TOP', motif, to, repress, 'TOP', mRNA, 'translation;', and, '(', 'iv)', 'LARP1', competes, with, the, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '(', 'eIF)', 4, 'G', for, 'TOP', mRNA, binding])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, a, 'light-', and, circadian, 'clock-regulated', 'MAPK/MNK', pathway, led, to, phosphorylation, of, the, 'cap-binding', protein, eIF4E, in, the, mouse, suprachiasmatic, nucleus, of, the, 'hypothalamus,', the, locus, of, the, master, circadian, clock, in, mammals])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, eIF4E, specifically]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([translation, of, 'Period', 1, '(', 'Per1)', and, 'Period', 2, '(', 'Per2)', mRNAs, and, increased, the, abundance, of, basal, and, inducible, 'PER', 'proteins,', which, facilitated, circadian, clock, resetting, and, precise, timekeeping])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', plays, an, important, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([gene, expression, because, eIF4E, binding, to, the, mRNA, cap, is, a, control, point, for, translation])].
[sujeto(['Dinoflagellate', eIF4E, diversity, could]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanism, for, dinoflagellates, to, regulate, gene, expression, in, a, 'post-transcriptional', manner])].
[sujeto(['The', eIF4E, family, members, from, heterokonts, and, dinoflagellates, segregated, into, three, 'clades,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([at, least, three, eIF4E, cognates, were, present, in, their, common, ancestor])].

[sujeto(['Herein,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, previously, unidentified, 'cell-autonomous', 'Stat1', 'function,', which, is, its, ability, to, exhibit, both, antiproliferative, and, prosurvival, properties, by, facilitating, translation, of, mRNAs, encoding, for, the, 'cyclin-dependent', kinase, inhibitor, 'p27(Kip1)', and, antiapoptotic, proteins, 'X-linked', inhibitor, of, apoptosis, and, 'B-cell', lymphoma, xl])].

[sujeto(['While', phosphorylation, of, '4E-BPs', is, known, to, disrupt, their]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'eIF4E,', the, mechanism, by, which, this, occurs, has, been, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Retroviruses']), verbo([cause]), complemento([immunodeficiency, and, cancer, but, also, are, used, as, vectors, for, the, expression, of, heterologous, genes])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'TURBS-like', elements, can, serve, for, translation, control, of, certain, cellular, mRNAs, containing, uORFs])].

[sujeto(['Consequently,', they, compete, with, eIF4G, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'eIF4E,', thereby, inhibiting, translation, initiation])].
[sujeto(['Mextli', '(', 'Mxt)', is, an, unusual, '4E-BP', that]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([translation, by, also, interacting, with, eIF3])].

[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([tumor, evolution, and, 'metastasis,', and, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;)', is, a, key, regulator, of, 'hypoxia-related', cellular, processes, in, cancer])].

[sujeto(['The', number, of, paralogs, of, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, translation, initiation, is, larger, in, trypanosomes, than, in, yeasts, or, many, metazoan, and, includes, two, 'poly(A)', binding, 'proteins,', 'PABP1', and, 'PABP2,', and, four, eIF4E, variants])].
[sujeto(['In', many, 'cases,', the, paralogs, are, individually, essential, and, are, thus, unlikely, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([redundant, functions, 'although,', as, 'yet,', distinct, functions, of, different, isoforms, have, not, been, determined])].
[sujeto(['Here,', trypanosome, 'PABP1', and, 'PABP2']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, further, characterised])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, efficient, accumulation, of, 'Turnip', yellows, virus, '(', 'TuYV)', in, 'A'])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, underlying, molecular, mechanism, is, still, 'unknown,', this, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, totally, unforeseen, situation, in, which, closely, related, viruses, belonging, to, the, same, genus, use, different, translation, initiation, factors, for, efficient, infection, of, 'A'])].
[sujeto([eIF4E, belongs, to, a, small, multigenic, family, and, three, 'genes,', 'eIF4E1,', eIF4E2, and, 'eIF(iso)4E,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, tomato])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, that, 'eIF4E-mediated', natural, recessive, resistances, against, potyviruses, result, from, 'non-synonymous', mutations, in, an, eIF4E, 'protein,', which, impair, its, direct, interaction, with, the, potyviral, protein, 'VPg'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'tomato,', the, role, of, eIF4E, proteins, in, potyvirus, resistance, is, still, unclear, because, natural, or]), verbo([induced]), complemento([mutations, in, eIF4E1, confer, only, a, narrow, resistance, spectrum, against, potyviruses])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, more, than, one, eIF4E, protein, form, is, involved, in, the, observed, broad, spectrum, resistance])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, the, respective, contribution, of, each, eIF4E, protein, in, 'tomato-potyvirus', 'interactions,', two, tomato, lines, silenced, for, both, eIF4E1, and, eIF4E2, '(', 'RNAi-4E)', and, two, lines, silenced, for, 'eIF(iso)4E', '(', 'RNAi-iso4E)', were, obtained, and, characterized])].
[sujeto(['Yeast', 'two-hybrid', interaction, assays, between, the, three, eIF4E, proteins, and, a, set, of, viral, 'VPgs', identified, two, types, of, 'VPgs:', those, that]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([only, with, eIF4E1, and, those, that, interacted, with, either, eIF4E1, or, with, eIF4E2])].
[sujeto(['These', experiments]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, for, the, involvement, of, both, eIF4E1, and, eIF4E2, in, broad, spectrum, resistance, of, tomato, against, potyviruses, and, suggest, a, role, for, eIF4E2, in, 'tomato-potyvirus', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Translation', initiation, in, eukaryotes]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['eIF4E,', the, cap, binding, 'protein,', which, mediates, its, function, through, an, interaction, with, the, scaffolding, protein, 'eIF4G,', as, part, of, the, eIF4F, complex])].
[sujeto(['In', 'trypanosomatids,', four, eIF4E, homologues]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, described, but, the, specific, function, of, each, is, not, well, characterized])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([a, study, of, these, proteins, in, 'Trypanosoma', brucei, '(', 'TbEIF4E1', through, 4, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Simultaneous', 'RNAi', knockdown, of, 'TbEIF4E1', and, 2]), verbo([caused]), complemento([cessation, of, growth, and, death, in, 'procyclics,', but, with, a, delayed, impact, on, 'translation,', whilst, knockdown, of, 'TbEIF4E3', alone, or, a, combined, 'TbEIF4E1', and, 4, knockdown, led, to, substantial, translation, inhibition, which, preceded, cellular, death, by, several, 'days,', at, least])].
[sujeto(['Only', 'TbEIF4E3', and, 4, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interact, with, 'T'])].
[sujeto([brucei, eIF4G, 'homologues;', 'TbEIF4E3']), verbo([bound]), complemento([both, 'TbEIF4G3', and, 4, whilst, 'TbEIF4E4', bound, only, to, 'TbEIF4G3'])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, is, the, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([providing, evidence, for, a, physiological, role, of, a, truncated, form, of, the, mRNA, 'cap-binding', protein, eIF4E1, '(', eukaryotic, initiation, factor, 40.0, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Our', initial, observation, was, that, 'eIF4E,', which]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, mRNA, cap, function, by, recruiting, the, eIF4F, complex, '(', composed, of, 'eIF4E,', 4, 'G', and, 4, 'A),', occurs, in, two, forms, in, porcine, endometrial, tissue, in, a, strictly, temporally, restricted, fashion])].
[sujeto(['The', ubiquitous, prototypical, 25, &, 'Acirc;&nbsp;kDa', form, of, eIF4E, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, ovariectomized, and, cyclic, animals])].
[sujeto(['Steroid', replacements, indicated, that, progesterone, in, combination, with, 17, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-oestradiol']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, formation, of, the, 23, &, 'Acirc;&nbsp;kDa', eIF4E])].
[sujeto(['Thus', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, truncated, eIF4E, provides, an, alternative, regulation, mechanism, by, an, altered, dynamic, of, 'eIF4E/4E-BP1', binding, under, conditions, where, '4E-BP1', is, hypophosphorylated])].
[sujeto(['Together', with, the, impaired, 'eIF4G-PABP', 'interaction,', the, modified, translational, initiation, might, particularly]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([protein, synthesis, during, conceptus, attachment, at, the, time, of, implantation])].
[sujeto(['The', characterization, of, natural, recessive, resistance, genes, and, 'Arabidopsis', 'virus-resistant', mutants]), verbo([have]), complemento([implicated, translation, initiation, factors, of, the, eIF4E, and, eIF4G, families, as, susceptibility, factors, required, for, virus, infection, and, resistance, function])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, further, the, role, of, translation, initiation, factors, in, virus, resistance, we, set, up, a, 'TILLING', platform, in, 'tomato,', cloned, genes, encoding, for, translation, initiation, factors, eIF4E, and, eIF4G, and, screened, for]), verbo([induced]), complemento([mutations, that, lead, to, virus, resistance])].
[sujeto([l_eIF4E1, 'G1485A,', was, identified, and, characterized, with, respect, to, cap]), verbo([binding]), complemento([activity, and, resistance, spectrum])].

[sujeto(['Mutation', analysis, of, translation, initiation, factors, shows, that, translation, initiation, factors, of, the, eIF4E, family, are, determinants, of, plant, susceptibility, to, 'RNA', viruses, and, viruses]), verbo([have]), complemento([adopted, strategies, to, use, different, isoforms])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, developed, a, complete, tool, that, can, be, used, for, both, forward, and, reverse, genetics, in, 'tomato,', for, both, basic, science, and, crop, improvement])].
[sujeto(['Translational', repression, of, mRNAs, in, eggs, of, various, species, is]), verbo([conferred]), complemento([by, 'interactions,', either, direct, or, via, intermediate, 'proteins,', of, repressive, factors, bound, to, the, 3, '\'', -, untranslated, regions, with, the, proteins, of, the, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', family, bound, to, the, 5, '\'', -, cap, of, the, transcripts])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', a, novel, 'oocyte-specific', eIF4E, encoded, by, the, 'Eif41b', gene, in, mammals]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, by, our, group])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', other, known, proteins, of, three, subfamilies, comprising, eIF4E, family, '(', 'eIF4E1,', 'eIF4E2,', and, 'eIF4E3),', cDNA, library, evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'Eif41b', locus, has, an, 'oocyte-restricted', expression, across, all, classes, of, 'Tetrapoda'])].
[sujeto(['The', resulted, ablation, of, eIF4E1B, protein]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, significant, acceleration, of, oocyte, maturation, after, progesterone, 'induction;', 'morpholino-injected', oocytes, formed, the, metaphase, plate, 30, min, faster, than, the, control, groups])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, eIF4E1B, protein, acts, as, a, repressor, in, translational, regulation, of, maternal, mRNAs, activated, 'during,', and, required, 'for,', oocyte, maturation])].
[sujeto(['Eukaryotic', translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'm(7)GTP', of, capped, mRNAs, and, is, an, essential, component, of, the, translational, machinery, that, recruits, the, 40, 'S', small, ribosomal, subunit])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'm(7)GTP-Sepharose', affinity, column, 'chromatography,', a, specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, was, isolated, and, identified, as, 'Giardia', eIF4E2])].
[sujeto(['The', other, 'homologue,', 'Giardia', 'eIF4E1,']), verbo([bound]), complemento([only, to, the, 'm(2,2,7)GpppN', structure])].
[sujeto(['Although', neither, homologue, can, rescue, the, function, of, yeast, 'eIF4E,', a, knockdown, of, eIF4E2, mRNA, in, 'Giardia', by, a, 'virus-based', antisense, ribozyme]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['translation,', which, was, shown, to, use, 'm(7)GpppN-capped', mRNA, as, a, template])].
[sujeto(['The', same, knockdown, approach, indicated, that, eIF4E1, is, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, translation, in, 'Giardia'])].
[sujeto(['But', eIF4E1, was, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([concentrated, and, colocalized, with, the, 'm(2,2,7)GpppN', 'cap,', 16, 'S-like', 'rRNA,', and, fibrillarin, in, the, 'nucleolus-like', structure, in, the, nucleus])].
[sujeto([eIF4E1, depletion, from, 'Giardia', did, not, affect, mRNA, 'splicing,', but, the, protein, was]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'Giardia', small, nuclear, 'RNAs', 'D', and, 'H', known, to, have, an, 'm(2,2,7)GpppN', 'cap,', thus, suggesting, a, novel, function, not, yet, observed, among, other, eIF4Es, in, eukaryotes])].
[sujeto(['The', eukaryotic, 'cap-binding', proteins, belonging, to, the, eIF4E, family, are, generally]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, mediating, the, recruitment, of, ribosomes, to, capped, mRNA])].
[sujeto(['We', described, previously, a, 'cap-binding', protein, '(', now, called, 'eIF4E1)', in, 'Schizosaccharomyces', pombe, that, appears, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([all, of, the, usual, structural, and, functional, attributes, of, an, eIF4E])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([now, characterised, a, new, type, of, 'cap-binding', protein, '(', 'eIF4E2)', from, this, 'organism,', which, at, the, amino, acid, sequence, 'level,', is, 52, '%', identical, and, 59, '%', similar, to, eIF4E1])].
[sujeto([pombe, but]), verbo([has]), complemento([some, novel, properties, that, may, be, related, to, a, special, function, in, the, cell])].
[sujeto(['Despite', having, all, of, the, dorsal, face, amino, acids, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([so, far, been, associated, with, eIF4G, binding, to, 'eIF4E1,', eIF4E2, binds, the, 'eIF4E-binding', domain, of, 'S'])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, eIF4E2, is, not, active, on, the, main, pathway, of, translation, initiation, in, fission, yeast, but, might, play, a, role, in, the, adaptation, strategy, of, this, organism, under, specific, growth, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', they]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, the, molecular, characteristics, required, for, tight, binding, to, eIF4G])].
[sujeto(['EIF4E2', grew, poorly, compared, with, an, isogenic, strain]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['At'])].
[sujeto(['EIF4E1', mRNA, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, all, tissues, except, in, the, cells, of, the, specialization, zone, of, the, 'roots;', the, 'At'])].
[sujeto(['This', work, further, demonstrates, an, association, between, a, high, level, of, 'EIF4E', mRNAs, and, cell, proliferation, and]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, plant, eIF4E, isoforms, may, have, distinct, functions, in, cell, development, and, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['The', promoter, of, 'EIF4E1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, characterized, previously])].
[sujeto(['The', putative, promoter, of, 'EIF4E2', contained, no, 'TATA', box, but, did, contain, a, transcription, initiator, region, '(', 'Inr)', and, numerous, other, sequence, motifs, characteristic, of]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([promoters])].
[sujeto(['Evidence', for, transcription, of, both, genes, was, obtained, from]), verbo([primer]), complemento(['extension,', 'S1', 'mapping,', ribonuclease, 'protection,', and, reverse, 'transcriptase-polymerase', chain, reaction, experiments])].
[sujeto(['Transcription', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, initiate, 19, bp, upstream, of, the, translational, initiation, codon, in, the, case, of, 'EIF4E1', and, 80, bp, in, the, case, of, 'EIF4E2'])].
[sujeto(['The', two, genes, were, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, four, human, cell, 'lines,', 'Wish,', 'Chang,', 'K562,', and, 'HeLa'])].
[sujeto(['The', phosphorylation, of, eIF4E1, at, serine, 209, by, 'MNK1', or, 'MNK2']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, initiate, oncogenic, mRNA, 'translation,', a, process, that, favours, cancer, development, and, maintenance])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, interrogate, the, 'MNK-eIF4E', axis, in, diffuse, large, 'B-cell', lymphoma, '(', 'DLBCL)', and, show, a, distinct, distribution, of, 'MNK1', and, 'MNK2', in, germinal, centre, 'B-cell', '(', 'GCB)', and]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['B-cell', '(', 'ABC)', 'DLBCL'])].
[sujeto(['MNK', inhibition, ablates, eIF4E1, phosphorylation, and, concurrently]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([eIF4E3, expression])].

[sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'MNKs', can]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([oncogenic, translation, by, regulating, 'eIF4E1-eIF4E3', levels, and, activity, in, 'DLBCL'])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', evidence, shows, that, potyviruses]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, specific, requirement, for, a, given, '4E', isoform, that, depends, on, the, host, plant])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, a, complementation, system, in, 'Arabidopsis', that, makes, it, possible, to, assess, the, role, of, pepper, 'pvr2-eIF4E', alleles, in, susceptibility, to, 'TEV'])].

[sujeto(['In', addition, to, the, canonical, eIF4E, 'cap-binding', 'protein,', eukaryotes]), verbo([have]), complemento([evolved, 'sequence-related', variants, with, distinct, 'features,', some, of, which, have, been, shown, to, negatively, regulate, translation, of, particular, 'mRNAs,', but, which, remain, poorly, characterised])].
[sujeto(['Mammalian', eIF4E, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, divided, into, three, 'classes,', with, class, 'I', representing, the, canonical, 'cap-binding', protein, eIF4E1])].
[sujeto([eIF4E1]), verbo([binds]), complemento([eIF4G, to, initiate, 'translation,', and, other, 'eIF4E-binding', proteins, such, as, '4E-BPs', and, '4E-T', prevent, this, interaction, by, binding, eIF4E1, with, the, same, consensus, sequence, 'YX', 4, 'L&Iuml;&bull;'])].
[sujeto(['We', investigate, here, the, interaction, of, human, eIF4E2, '(', '4EHP),', a, class, 'II', eIF4E, 'protein,', which]), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, cap, 'weakly,', with, 'eIF4E-transporter', 'protein,', '4E-T'])].

[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, while, both, eIF4E1, and, eIF4E2]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['4E-T', via, the, canonical, 'YX', 4, 'L&Iuml;&bull;', 'sequence,', nearby, downstream, sequences, also, influence, 'eIF4E:4E-T', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Altogether', we, conclude, that, while, both, 'cap-binding', proteins]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, '4E-T,', and, can, be, recruited, by, '4E-T', to, 'P-bodies,', eIF4E2, functions, are, likely, to, be, distinct, from, those, of, 'eIF4E1,', both, in, the, cytoplasm, and, 'nucleus,', further, extending, our, understanding, of, mammalian, class, 'I', and, 'II', 'cap-binding', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Two', related, eukaryotic, initiation, 'factor-4E']), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, '(', '4E-BP1', and, '4E-BP2)', were, recently, characterized, for, their, capacity, to, bind, specifically, to, eIF4E, and, inhibit, its, function])].
[sujeto(['4E-BP1', mRNA, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, most, 'tissues,', but, is, most, abundant, in, adipose, 'tissue,', 'pancreas,', and, skeletal, 'muscle,', while, '4E-BP2', mRNA, is, ubiquitously, expressed])].
[sujeto(['Using', in, utero, electroporation, during, 'corticogenesis,', we, show, that]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([mTORC1, activity, accelerates, axon, growth, without, multiple, axon, formation])].
[sujeto(['This', was]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, counteracting, mTORC1, signaling, through, p70S6Ks, '(', 'S6K1/2)', or, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, '(', '4E-BP1/2),', which, both, regulate, translation])].

[sujeto(['At', the, end, of, the, feeding, 'trial,', the, results, indicated, that, hepatopancreas, 'weight,', hepatosomatic, 'index,', hepatopancreatic, protein, 'content,', intestinal, 'weight,', intestosomatic, index, and, intestinal, protein, content]), verbo([increased]), complemento([with, increasing, dietary, 'Thr', levels, up, to, 1, &, 'Acirc;&middot;58&Acirc;&nbsp;%', and, thereafter, decreased, '(', 'P&lt;&Acirc;&nbsp;0&Acirc;&middot;05)'])].

[sujeto(['Our', previous, study]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, unphosphorylated, 'HSP27', has, an, inhibitory, role, in, triiodothyronine, '(', 'T(3))&acirc;&euro;&lsquo;induced', osteocalcin, '(', 'OC)', synthesis, in, osteoblasts])].

[sujeto(['The', levels, of, 'OC', mRNA]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'T(3)', in, the, 'HSP27&acirc;&euro;&lsquo;overexpressing', cells, did, not, show, any, significant, differences, compared, with, those, in, the, control, empty, 'vector&acirc;&euro;&lsquo;transfected', cells])].
[sujeto(['Under', 'T(3)', 'stimulation,', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, eIF4E, to, eIF4G, was, markedly, attenuated, in, the, 'HSP27&acirc;&euro;&lsquo;overexpressing', cells, compared, with, the, control, cells])].

[sujeto(['Transgenic', animals, displayed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([energy, 'expenditure;', altered, adipose, tissue, 'distribution,', including, reduced, white, adipose, accumulation, and, preserved, brown, adipose, 'mass;', and, were, protected, from, hepatic, steatosis])].

[sujeto(['Unlike', skeletal, 'muscle,']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['adipose-specific', '4E-BP1', activity, was, not, protective, but, instead, was, deleterious, in, response, to, the, same, challenges])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', '4E-BP1)', results, in, release, of, 'eIF4E,', which, sequentially, relieves, translational, repression, and, enhances, oncogenic, protein, synthesis])].

[sujeto(['By', monitoring, the, fragmentation, of, a, 'GST-BHMT', '(', a, protein, fusion, of, glutathionine, 'S-transferase', 'N-terminal', to, 'betaine-homocysteine', 'S-methyltransferase)', reporter, in, 'lysosomes,', the, 'GST-BHMT', assay]), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, established, as, an, 'endpoint,', 'cargo-based', assay, for, 'starvation-induced', autophagy, that, is, largely, nonselective])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, under, 'nutrient-rich', 'conditions,', proteasome, inhibition, by, either, pharmaceutical, or, genetic, manipulations]), verbo([induces]), complemento([similar, 'autophagy-dependent', 'GST-BHMT', processing])].
[sujeto(['However,', mechanistically, this, proteasome, 'inhibition-induced', autophagy, is, different, from, that]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, starvation, as, it, does, not, rely, on, regulation, by, 'MTOR', '(', mechanistic, target, of, rapamycin, '[', 'serine/threonine', 'kinase])', and, 'PRKAA/AMPK', '(', protein, 'kinase,', 'AMP-activated,', &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', catalytic, 'subunit),', the, upstream, central, sensors, of, cellular, nutrition, and, energy, 'status,', but, requires, the, presence, of, the, cargo, receptors, 'SQSTM1/p62', '(', sequestosome, 1, ')', and, 'NBR1', '(', neighbor, of, 'BRCA1', gene, 1, ')', that, are, normally, involved, in, the, selective, autophagy, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Further,', it, depends, on, 'ER', '(', endoplasmic, 'reticulum)', stress, 'signaling,', in, particular, 'ERN1/IRE1', '(', endoplasmic, reticulum, to, nucleus, signaling, 1, ')', and, its, main, downstream, effector, 'MAPK8/JNK1', '(', 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, 8, ')', ',', but, not, 'XBP1', '(', 'X-box']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, ')', ',', by, regulating, the, 'phosphorylation-dependent', disassociation, of, 'BCL2', '(', 'B-cell', 'CLL/lymphoma', 2, ')', from, 'BECN1', '(', 'Beclin', 1, ',', autophagy, 'related)'])].

[sujeto(['Complete', inhibition, of, mTORC1, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, suppress, liver, cancer, development, induced, by, 'AKT', and, 'Ras', 'proto-oncogenes', in, mice])].
[sujeto(['Breast', cancers, and, most, malignant, tumors, are, composed, of, heterogeneous, tumor, cells, both, at, genetic, and, morphological, 'levels;', 'intra-tumor', heterogeneity, can, be, one, underlying]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, therapeutic, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Classical', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([focused, on, analyses, of, the, relationship, between, primary, tumors, and, metastatic, 'dissemination,', and, on, subclone, evolution])].
[sujeto(['However,', it, should, be, noted, that, tumor, heterogeneity, at, the, level, of, protein, expression, '(', 'proteomics)']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, yet, studied, in, depth])].
[sujeto(['In', 'fact,', in, human, tumors, there, is, not, always, a, homogeneous, expression, of, many, of, the, crucial, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cell, 'signaling,', such, as, 'pMAPK,', 'pAKt,', 'pMTOR,', even, with, constitutive, oncogenic, alterations, 'upstream,', such, as, 'HER2,', 'PI3', 'K'])].

[sujeto(['In', skeletal, 'muscle,', the, 'nutrient-induced', stimulation, of, protein, synthesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([signaling, through, the, mechanistic, target, of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)'])].

[sujeto(['The', results, show, that, 'REDD1', expression, limits, protein, synthesis, in, mouse, skeletal, muscle, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([mTORC1, signaling, during, periods, of, feed, deprivation, and, that, a, reduction, in, its, expression, is, necessary, for, maximal, stimulation, of, protein, synthesis, in, response, to, refeeding])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, showing, that, 'T2A', inhibited, angiogenesis, and, breast, cancer, growth, by, 'down-regulating', 'VEGF', expression])].

[sujeto(['However,', pleiotropic, effects, of, leptin]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, reproduction, and, 'pregnancy,', particularly, in, 'placenta,', where, it, may, work, as, an, autocrine, 'hormone,', mediating, 'angiogenesis,', 'growth,', and, immunomodulation])].

[sujeto(['Insulin']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, multiple, sites, in, the, 'eIF4E-binding', 'protein,', 'PHAS-I,', leading, to, dissociation, of, the, 'PHAS-I'])].
[sujeto([eIF4E, complex, and, to, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'cap-dependent', translation])].

[sujeto(['To', determine, whether, the, effects, of, insulin]), verbo([require]), complemento([these, 'sites,', we, assessed, the, control, of, 'PHAS-I', proteins, having, 'Ala-64', or, 'Ala-111', mutations])].

[sujeto(['Mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', is, the, central, element, of, a, signaling, pathway, involved, in, the, control, of, mRNA, translation, and, cell, growth])].
[sujeto(['The', actions, of, mTOR, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([in, part, through, the, phosphorylation, of, the, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', 'protein,', 'PHAS-I'])].

[sujeto(['Pancreastatin', '(', 'PST),', a, chromogranin, 'A-derived', 'peptide,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, modulate, 'glucose,', 'lipid,', and, protein, metabolism, in, rat, adipocytes])].

[sujeto(['However,', 'PST']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([both, basal, and, 'insulin-mediated', protein, synthesis, in, rat, adipocytes])].

[sujeto(['We', examined, whether, phosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I', and, 'p70(S6k)', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, feeding, and, determined, the, separate, effects, of, insulin, and, amino, acids, on, 'PHAS-I', and, 'p70(S6k)', phosphorylation, in, rat, skeletal, muscle, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, feeding]), verbo([increased]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, both, 'PHAS-I', and, 'p70(S6k)', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Physiological', hyperinsulinemia]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['p70(S6K)', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')', but, not, 'PHAS-I', phosphorylation, '(', 'P', =, 0.98, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Addition', of, insulin, to, amino, acid, infusion, was, no, more, effective, than, amino, acids, alone, in]), verbo([promoting]), complemento(['PHAS-I', and, 'p70(S6k)', phosphorylation])].
