[sujeto(['This', effect, is, not, dependent, on]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, plasma, insulin, and, simulates, the, activation, of, protein, synthesis, that, accompanies, normal, feeding])].
[sujeto(['Control', of, the, translational, 'repressor,', 'PHAS-I,', was, investigated, by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([proteins, with, 'Ser/Thr', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'Ala', mutations, in, the, five, '(', 'S/T)P', phosphorylation, sites])].
[sujeto(['Results', of, experiments, with, 'HEK293', cells]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([at, least, three, levels, of, control])].
[sujeto(['At', an, intermediate, 'level,', amino, acids, and, insulin]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, of, 'Thr36,', 'Thr45,', and, 'Thr69', via, 'mTOR-dependent', processes, that, function, independently, of, other, sites, in, 'PHAS-I'])].
[sujeto(['At', the, third, 'level,', the, extent, of, phosphorylation, of, one, site]), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, phosphorylation, of, another])].
[sujeto(['The', five, sites]), verbo([have]), complemento([different, influences, on, the, electrophoretic, properties, of, 'PHAS-I', and, on, the, affinity, of, 'PHAS-I', for, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)'])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, 'Thr45', or, 'Ser64', results, in, the, most, dramatic]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([in, eIF4E, binding, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['However,', each, of, the, sites, influences, mRNA, 'translation,', either, directly, by]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([the, binding, affinity, of, 'PHAS-I', and, eIF4E, or, indirectly, by, affecting, the, phosphorylation, of, other, sites])].
[sujeto(['eIF4E-BP1', dephosphorylation, is, associated, with, eIF4E, dissociation, from, large, molecular, mass, complexes, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([binding, to, 'eIF4E-BP1'])].
[sujeto(['eIF4E-BP1', phosphorylation, changes]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, heat, shock, also, occur, in, 'Drosophila'])].
[sujeto(['Of', the, 10, isoforms, of, 'eIF4E-BP1', resolved, by, 'IEF/SDS/PAGE,', at, least, seven, are, labelled, with, '[', 32, 'P]', and, all, 10, are]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([by, '(', 'eIF4E-BP1)-specific', antibodies])].
[sujeto(['The', effects, of, phosphorylating, these, sites, on, eIF4E]), verbo([binding]), complemento([were, assessed, in, a, 'far-Western', analysis, with, a, labeled, eIF4E, probe])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, 'Thr36', only, slightly, attenuated]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'PHAS-I', to, 'eIF4E,', while, phosphorylation, of, 'Thr45', markedly, inhibited, binding])].
[sujeto(['A', relatively, small, amount, of, phosphorylation, of, 'Ser99', was, also, 'detected,', and, mutating, 'Ser99', to, 'Ala', in, 'PHAS-I', slightly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([phosphorylation, by, 'CK2', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, 'Ser111', did, not]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([binding, of, 'PHAS-I', to, 'eIF4E,', and, results, of, peptide, mapping, experiments, with, 'PHAS-I', immunoprecipitated, from, 32, 'P-labeled', adipocytes, indicated, that, 'Ser111', was, not, phosphorylated, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['These', results, support, the, conclusion, that, 'CK2', is, not]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, control, of, 'PHAS-I'])].
[sujeto(['Akt', is, a, 'serine/threonine', kinase, that]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, functional, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, to, be, stimulated, by, insulin, and, other, growth, factors])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', a, conditionally, active, version, of, 'Akt', was, constructed, by, fusing, the, 'Akt', containing, the, myristoylation, sequence, to, the, hormone]), verbo([binding]), complemento([domain, of, a, mutant, murine, estrogen, receptor, that, selectively, binds, 4, -, hydroxytamoxifen])].
[sujeto(['The', chimeric, protein, was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'NIH3T3', cells, and, was, shown, to, be, stimulated, by, hormone, treatment, 17, -, fold, after, only, a, 20, -, min, treatment])].
[sujeto(['This', hormone, treatment, also]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([an, approximate, 3, -, fold, increase, in, the, phosphorylation, of, the, chimeric, protein, and, a, shift, in, its, migration, on, 'SDS', gels])].
[sujeto(['This', conditionally, active, 'Akt', was, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, rapidly, stimulate, in, these, cells, the, phosphorylation, of, properties, of, 'PHAS-I,', a, key, protein, in, the, regulation, of, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['The', conditionally, active, 'Akt,', when]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 3, 'T3-L1', 'adipocytes,', was, also, 'stimulated,', although, its, rate, and, extent, of, activation, was, less, then, in, the, 'NIH3T3', cells])].
[sujeto(['Its', stimulation, was, shown, to, be, capable, of]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([glucose, uptake, into, adipocytes, by, stimulating, translocation, of, the, 'insulin-responsive', glucose, transporter, 'GLUT4', to, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['Although', glucose]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, biosynthesis, of, a, variety, of, beta, cell, proteins, at, the, level, of, 'translation,', the, mechanism, responsible, for, this, effect, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Our', initial, approach, was, to, determine, if, this, effect, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, metabolism, of, glucose, and, activation, of, islet, cell, protein, 'kinases,', or, whether, insulin, secreted, from, the, beta, cell, stimulates, phosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I', via, an, 'insulin-receptor', mechanism, as, described, for, 'insulin-sensitive', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', support, of, the, latter, 'mechanism,', inhibitors, of, islet, cell, protein, kinases, 'A', and, 'C', exert, no, effect, on, 'glucose-stimulated', phosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I,', whereas, the, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, 'inhibitor,', 'wortmannin,', the, 'immunosuppressant,', 'rapamycin,', and, 'theophylline,', a, phosphodiesterase, 'inhibitor,']), verbo([promote]), complemento([marked, dephosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', exogenous, insulin, and, endogenous, insulin, secreted, by, the, beta, cell, 'line,', 'betaTC6-F7,']), verbo([increase]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I,', suggesting, that, beta, cells, of, the, 'islet,', in, 'part,', mediate, this, effect])].
[sujeto(['Studies', with, beta, cell, lines, and, islets, indicate, that, amino, acids, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, glucose, or, exogenous, insulin, to, stimulate, the, phosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I,', and, amino, acids, alone, 'dose-dependently', stimulate, the, phosphorylation, of, 'PHAS-I,', which, is, further, enhanced, by, insulin])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', rapamycin]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([by, approximately, 62, '%', the, increase, in, total, protein, synthesis, stimulated, by, high, glucose, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, glucose]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['PHAS-I', phosphorylation, via, insulin, interacting, with, its, own, receptor, on, the, beta, cell, which, may, serve, as, an, important, mechanism, for, autoregulation, of, protein, synthesis, by, translation])].
[sujeto(['Various', factors, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, heat, 'shock-induced', inhibition, of, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto(['Changes', upon, heat, shock, in, 'phosphorylation,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, 'inactivation,', of, eukaryotic, initiation, factors, '(', 'eIFs)', eIF2, and, eIF4E, have, been, shown, for, several, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['In', searching, for, the]), verbo([cause]), complemento([for, the, inhibition, of, protein, 'synthesis,', the, regulation, of, eIF2, and, eIF4E, by, additional, factors, was, analyzed])].
[sujeto(['A', very, clear, correlation, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([between, the, activity, of, this, guanine, exchange, factor, and, the, levels, of, protein, 'synthesis,', also, at, mild, heat, shock, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', in, 'H35', cells, as, well, as, in, some, other, cell, 'lines,', 'PHAS-I', phosphorylation, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, heat, 'shock,', whereas, in, others, it, was, decreased])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,']), verbo([decreasing]), complemento([the, eIF4E, availability, under, stressful, conditions, does, not, seem, to, be, a, general, mechanism, to, inhibit, protein, synthesis, by, heat, shock])].
[sujeto(['The', translational, repressor, protein, 'eIF4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1,', also, termed, 'PHAS-I)', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, phosphorylation, through, the, 'rapamycin-sensitive', mTOR, '(', mammalian, target, of, 'rapamycin)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, two, regulatory, motifs, in, '4E-BP1,', an, 'mTOR-signaling', '(', 'TOS)', motif, in, the, 'C', terminus, of, '4E-BP1', and, an, 'RAIP', motif, '(', named, after, its, 'sequence)', in, the, 'N', terminus])].
[sujeto(['Other', recent, work]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, the, protein, raptor, binds, to, mTOR, and, '4E-BP1'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, raptor]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'full-length', '4E-BP1', or, a, 'C-terminal', fragment, containing, the, 'TOS', motif, but, not, to, an, 'N-terminal', fragment, containing, the, 'RAIP', motif])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, several, residues, within, the, 'TOS', motif, abrogates]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'raptor,', indicating, that, the, 'TOS', motif, is, required, for, this, interaction])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RAIP', motif, is, absolutely]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, phosphorylation, of, sites, in, the, 'N', and, 'C', termini, of, '4E-BP1,', whereas, the, 'TOS', motif, primarily, affects, phosphorylation, of, 'Ser-64/65,', 'Thr-69/70,', and, also, the, 'rapamycin-insensitive', site, 'Ser-101'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'RAIP', motif, thus]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, 'mTOR-dependent', phosphorylation, of, multiple, sites, in, '4E-BP1', independently, of, the, '4E-BP1/raptor', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Thr(P)-69', antibodies]), verbo([bound]), complemento([the, forms, of, intermediate, and, lowest, 'mobility,', and, 'Ser(P)-64', antibodies, reacted, only, with, the, lowest, mobility, form])].
[sujeto(['Immunoprecipitated', 'epitope-tagged', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', phosphorylated, 'Thr-36/45'])].
[sujeto([mTOR, also, phosphorylated, 'Thr-69', and, 'Ser-64', but, only, when, purified, immune, complexes, were, incubated, with, the]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['antibody,', mTAb1])].
[sujeto(['Wild-type', tagged, 'C']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, low, levels, formed, 'ABC', trimer, and, 'AC', dimer, like, the, endogenous, 'C'])].

[sujeto(['Signals', that, affect, phosphorylation, or, methylation, of, the, 'C', subunit, of, 'PP2A', may]), verbo([promote]), complemento([subunit, exchange, and, direct, phosphatase, activity, to, specific, intracellular, substrates])].
[sujeto(['Identifying', the, biochemical, changes, and, molecular, pathways, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([fetal, mammary, development, in, response, to, maternal, nutrition, is, important, for, understanding, the, link, between, fetal, programming, of, mammary, development, and, future, lactation, performance])].
[sujeto(['Although', there, are, published, studies, regarding, biochemical, changes, in, the, developing, mammary, 'gland,', there, are, currently, no, data, on, molecular, pathway, involvement, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([ruminant, fetal, mammary, development])].
[sujeto(['This', study, investigated, changes, in, fetal, mammary, biochemical, indices, and, mechanistic]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)/mitogen', activated, protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', signaling, at, d, 100, and, 140, of, gestation, in, an, ovine, model, of, restricted, maternal, nutrition])].
[sujeto(['At', d, 140, ',', mammary, glands, of, fetuses, carried, by, 'M-fed', dams, were, lighter, '(', =, 0.07, ')', than, fetuses, carried, by, 'A-fed', dams, because, of]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([hyperplasia, '(', =, 0.04, ')', and, hypertrophy, '(', =, 0.09, ')', but, had, increased, protein, synthetic, capacity, '(', =, 0.02, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Increased', protein, synthetic, capacity, was, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([abundance, of, 'MAPK', pathway, signaling, proteins, eukaryotic, intiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)/eIF4E', and, mTOR, pathway, signaling, proteins, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)/4E-BP1', and, ribosomal, protein, 'S6', '(', 'RPS6)/RPS6', '(', &, 'acirc;&permil;&curren;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Increased', abundance, of, 'MAPK/mTOR', pathway, proteins, is, proposed, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([increased, protein, synthetic, capacity, via, ribosome, biogenesis, and, the, availability, of, factors, required, to, initiate, protein, translation])].
[sujeto(['The', primary, regulator, of, '4E-BP1', phosphorylation, at, 'Ser65', and, 'RPS6', at, 'Ser235/236', is, the]), verbo([activated]), complemento([form, of, 'mTOR:', mTOR])].
[sujeto(['Results', showed, that, the, abundance, of, mTOR, was, primarily, localized, to, the, fat, 'pad,', indicating, that, the, fat, pad, plays, a, potential, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([development, of, the, fetal, mammary, gland])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, an, alternative, control, mechanism, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento(['cap-dependent', translation, during, mitosis, revealed, by, a, viral, 'oncoprotein,', 'Merkel', cell, polyomavirus, small, 'T', '(', 'MCV', 'sT)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento(['MCV', sT, to, be, a, promiscuous, 'E3', ligase, inhibitor, targeting, the, 'anaphase-promoting', 'complex,', which, increases, cell, mitogenesis])].
[sujeto(['MCV', sT]), verbo([binds]), complemento([through, its, 'Large', 'T', stabilization, domain, region, to, cell, division, cycle, protein, 20, '(', 'Cdc20)', 'and,', 'possibly,', cdc20, homolog, 1, '(', 'Cdh1)', 'E3', ligase, adapters])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['cyclin-dependent', kinase, 1, /, cyclin, 'B1', '(', 'CDK1/CYCB1)', to, directly, hyperphosphorylate, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)-binding', protein, '(', '4E-BP1)', at, authentic, 'sites,', generating, a, 'mitosis-specific,', mechanistic, target, of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', 'inhibitor-resistant', &, 'Icirc;&acute;', 'phospho-isoform', not, present, in, 'G1-arrested', cells])].
[sujeto(['Recombinant', '4E-BP1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([capped, mRNA, reticulocyte, 'translation,', which, is, partially, reversed, by, 'CDK1/CYCB1', phosphorylation, of, '4E-BP1'])].
[sujeto([eIF4G]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'eIF4E-m(7)GTP', cap, complex, is, resistant, to, mTOR, inhibition, during, mitosis, but, sensitive, during, interphase])].
[sujeto(['Flow', 'cytometry,', with, and, without, 'sT,']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([an, orthogonal, 'pH3(S10+)', mitotic, cell, population, having, higher, inactive, 'p4E-BP1(T37/T46+)', saturation, levels, than, 'pH3(S10-)', interphase, cells])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, 'Click-iT', flow, cytometric, assay, to, directly, measure, mitotic, protein, 'synthesis,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, most, new, protein, synthesis, during, mitosis, is, 'cap-dependent,', a, result, confirmed, using, the, 'eIF4E/4G', inhibitor, drug, 40.0, 'RCat'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, mitotic, 'cap-dependent', translation, is, generally, sustained, during, mitosis, by, 'CDK1', phosphorylation, of, '4E-BP1', even, under, conditions, of, reduced, mTOR, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Pirarubicin', is, widely, used, in, intravesical, chemotherapy, for, bladder, 'cancer,', but, its, efficacy, is, limited, due, to, drug, 'resistance;', the, mechanism]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, well, studied])].
[sujeto(['Emerging', evidence, shows, that, autophagy, can, be, a, novel]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, cancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['The', phosphorylated, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'rapamycin,', 'serine/threonine', kinase, p70, 'S6', 'kinase,', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', binding, protein, 1, were, also, investigated, by, immunoblotting])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, pirarubicin, could, induce, autophagy, in, bladder, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, autophagy, by, 3, -, 'methyladenine,', hydroxychloroquine, or, knockdown, of, autophagy, related, gene, 3, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([apoptosis, in, 'pirarubicin-treated', bladder, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Pirarubicin-induced', autophagy, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([via, the, 'mTOR/p70S6K/4E-BP1', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', autophagy]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, pirarubicin, plays, a, cytoprotective, role, in, bladder, cancer, 'cells,', suggesting, that, inhibition, of, autophagy, may, improve, efficacy, over, traditional, pirarubicin, chemotherapy, in, bladder, cancer, patients])].
[sujeto(['Cap', dependent, translation, is, mainly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, the, level, of, the, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E),', the, activity, of, which, is, controlled, by, phosphorylation, and, sequestration, by, its, well, established, 'regulator,', '4E', binding, protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)'])].
[sujeto(['Both', eIF4E, and, '4E-BP1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, involved, in, the, malignant, progression, of, multiple, human, 'cancers,', including, colorectal, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, showed, that, the, expression, levels, of, eIF4E]), verbo([increased]), complemento([steadily, as, the, cancer, progressed, from, the, case, of, benign, dysplasia, to, an, 'adenocarcinoma;', all, the, while, maintaining, an, unphosphorylated, form])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', total, expression, levels, of, '4E-BP1']), verbo([increased]), complemento([only, in, the, premalignant, state, of, the, disease, and, decreased, '(', but, highly, phosphorylated, or, 'inactivated)', or, abolished, upon, malignancy])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, strong, correlations, exist, between, the, expression, of, eIF4E, '(', not, 'p-eIF4E)', and, tumor, grade, providing, evidence, that, eIF4E, expression, plays, a, pivotal, role, in, the, malignant, progression, of, colorectal, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', '4E-BP1', showed, a, 'bi-phasic', level, of, expression, during, 'carcinogenesis,', which, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([only, in, hyperplasic, or, dysplastic, tissues, as, an, endogenous, tumor, suppressor, molecule])].
[sujeto(['Although', marked, improvements]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, made, in, surgical, technique, and, 'chemoradiotherapy,', the, prognosis, for, patients, with, esophageal, squamous, cell, carcinoma, '(', 'ESCC)', is, still, unsatisfactory])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', and, its, downstream, 'signaling,', p70, ribosomal, 'S6', protein, kinase, '(', 'p70S6K)', and, eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1),', seem, to, play, central, roles, in, the, regulation, of, cancer, cell, proliferation, and, survival])].
[sujeto(['In', cell, lines, and, the, xenograft, 'model,', everolimus, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['ESCC', growth])].
[sujeto(['The', mTOR, signaling, pathway, inhibitor, everolimus, can]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['ESCC', growth, 'in&Acirc;&nbsp;vitro', and, 'in&Acirc;&nbsp;vivo'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, inhibition, of, mTOR, signaling, pathway, may, be, a, promising, novel, target, for, 'ESCC'])].
[sujeto(['Multiple', intracellular, transforming, signals]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([eukaryotic, translation, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)-binding', protein, '(', '4E-BP1)'])].
[sujeto(['The', signals, result, in, hierarchical, phosphorylation, of, '4E-BP1,', resulting, in]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'eIF4E,', relieving, translational, repression, and, enhancing, oncogenic, protein, synthesis])].
[sujeto([1, ')', ;, did, not]), verbo([have]), complemento([distant, metastasis, '(', 'P=0'])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'p-4E-BP1', is, more, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, early, gastric, cancers, than, in, advanced, 'ones,', and, has, limited, potential, as, an, independent, prognostic, biomarker, in, patients, with, gastric, cancer])].
[sujeto(['The', 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1', '(', 'HIF-1)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, known, to, be, correlated, to, the, adaptation, and, proliferation, of, tumor, 'cells;', therefore, 'HIF-1', has, become, an, important, target, in, the, development, of, anticancer, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Dihydrotanshinone', 'I', '(', 'DHTS)', is, a, phenanthrenequinone, compound, from, 'Salvia', miltiorrhiza, 'Bunge,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, used, in, oriental, medicine, for, its, antitumor, activities])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, by, which, 'DHTS']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([tumor, growth, are, not, fully, understood])].
[sujeto(['DHTS', 'dose-dependently']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, 'hypoxia-induced', accumulation, and, activation, of, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', protein])].
[sujeto(['Further', analysis, revealed, that, 'DHTS']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', protein, 'synthesis,', without, affecting, the, expression, level, of, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', mRNA, or, degradation, of, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', protein])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, phosphorylation, levels, of, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR),', extracellular, 'signal-regulated', 'kinase-1/2', '(', 'ERK1/2),', ribosomal, protein, 'S6', kinase, '(', 'p70S6K),', eIF4E, binding, 'protein-1', '(', '4E-BP1),', and, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E', '(', 'eIF4E)', were, 'dose-dependently', suppressed, by, 'DHTS,', but, no, significant, effect, on, total, protein, levels, was, observed])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'DHTS']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['hypoxia-induced', expression, of, 'HIF-1', target, genes, and, flow, cytometric, analysis, indicated, that, 'DHTS', induced, 'G1', phase, arrest, in, 'HeLa', cell])].
[sujeto(['In&Acirc;&nbsp;vivo', studies, further, confirmed, the, inhibitory, effect, of, 'DHTS', on, the, expression, of, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'proteins,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, decrease, in, growth, of, 'HeLa', cells, in, a, xenograft, tumor, model])].
[sujeto(['These', results, show, that, 'DHTS']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', protein, synthesis, by, downregulating, the, 'mTOR/p70S6K/4E-BP1', and, 'MEK/ERK', pathways])].
[sujeto(['These', conclusions]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'DHTS', is, an, effective, inhibitor, of, 'HIF-1', and, provide, new, perspectives, into, the, mechanism, of, its, anticancer, activity])].
[sujeto([eIF4E]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1),', is, critical, for, 'cap-dependent', and, 'cap-independent', translation])].
[sujeto(['Hypoxia']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, considered, as, an, obstacle, for, cancer, therapeutics])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, whether, 'YXM110', could]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([protein, synthesis, under, hypoxia])].
[sujeto(['4E-BP1', expression, was, notably]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([by, 'YXM110', under, hypoxic, 'conditions,', implying, that, 'cap-independent', translation, could, be, suppressed, by, 'YXM110'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'YXM110', repressed, 'hypoxia-inducible', factor, 1, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;)', 'expression,', which, resulted, in]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([downstream, vascular, endothelial, growth, factor, '(', 'VEGF)', expression])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'CCAAT/enhancer-binding', protein, '(', 'C/EBP)', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;', and, 'C/EBP&Icirc;&acute;,', two, crucial, 'pro-adipogenic', transcription, 'factors,', are, controlled, at, a, translational, level, by, 'serine/threonine', kinase, 40, '(', 'Stk40)'])].
[sujeto(['Genetic', knockout, '(', 'KO)', or, knockdown, '(', 'KD)', of, 'Stk40']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, increased, protein, levels, of, 'C/EBP', proteins, and, adipocyte, differentiation, in, mouse, embryonic, fibroblasts, '(', 'MEFs),', fetal, liver, stromal, 'cells,', and, mesenchymal, stem, cells, '(', 'MSCs)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', overexpression, of, 'Stk40', abolishes, the]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['C/EBP', protein, translation, and, adipogenesis, observed, in, 'Stk40-KO', and, -, 'KD', cells])].
[sujeto(['Functionally,', knockdown, of, 'C/EBP&Icirc;&sup2;', eliminates, the]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([adipogenic, differentiation, in, 'Stk40-KO', and, -, 'KD', cells, substantially])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', deletion, of, 'Stk40']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'eIF4E-binding', protein, 1, ',', leading, to, increased, 'eIF4E-dependent', translation, of, 'C/EBP&Icirc;&sup2;', and, 'C/EBP&Icirc;&acute;'])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, eIF4E, in, 'MSCs']), verbo([decreases]), complemento([translation, of, 'C/EBP', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'Stk40-KO', fetal, livers, display, an]), verbo([increased]), complemento([adipogenic, program, and, aberrant, lipid, and, steroid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, study, uncovers, a, new, repressor, of, 'C/EBP', protein, translation, as, well, as, adipogenesis, and]), verbo([provides]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, molecular, mechanism, underpinning, the, adipogenic, program])].
[sujeto(['The', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, complex, 1, '(', 'mTORC1)', is, known, as, a, central, coordinator, of, protein, synthesis, and, cell, growth, in, response, to, the, cellular, environment])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', chemical, manipulation, of, mTORC1, pathway, was, employed, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([mAb, production, as, well, as, increase, understanding, of, intracellular, pathways, in, 'GS-CHOK1', cells])].
[sujeto(['Using', the, phosphorylation, status, of, mTORC1, downstream, 'targets,', 'S6K1', and, '4E-BP1,', as, 'read-outs', of, mTORC1, 'activity,', we, investigated, the, contribution, of, each]), verbo([target]), complemento([protein, to, growth, 'and/or', productivity])].
[sujeto(['Inoculation', of, cultures, in, the, presence, of, 'rapamycin,', a, specific, inhibitor, of, 'mTORC1,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([viability, and, final, titer])].
[sujeto(['The', initial]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, specific, productivity, and, inhibition, of, growth, by, rapamycin, correlated, with, diminished, 'phospho-S6K1'])].
[sujeto(['Feeding']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, substantial, increase, in, growth, and, productivity, and, the, phosphorylation, of, both, targets, was, elevated])].
[sujeto(['Though', many, details, of, mTORC1, signaling, in, 'CHO', cells, remain, to, be, 'clarified,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, evidence, that, environmental, manipulation, of, the, mTORC1, pathway, correlates, with, changes, in, cell, growth, and, recombinant, protein, production])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, role, of, apoptosis, resistance, gene, 'bcl-2', in, the, activation, of, cellular, senescence, program, induced, by, histone, deacetylase, inhibitor, '(', 'HDACi)', sodium, butyrate, '(', 'NaBut)', in, transformed, rat, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, that, 'NaBut', reduces, proliferation, rate, of, 'ERasBcl', cells, significantly, weaker, than, of, 'ERas', transformed, 'cells,', despite, the, fact, that, the, 'G1', cell, cycle, arrest, was, observed, in, both, cell, lines])].
[sujeto([sessed, by, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, 'phosphorylation:', the, ribosomal, 'S6', protein, and, '4E-BP1--inhibitor', of, translation, initiation, factor, eIF4E])].
[sujeto(['The', accumulation, of, 'lipid-bound', form, 'LC3-II', changes, significantly, in, 'ERasBcl', cells, after, 'NaBut', treatment, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([transient, nature])].
[sujeto(['The', set, of, analyzed, cellular, senescence, markers]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, a, high, level, of, apoptosis, resistance, gene, 'bcl-2', expression, prevents, the, realization, of, 'tumor-suppressor', senescence, program, induced, by, 'HDACi', sodium, butyrate, treatment])].
[sujeto(['An', important, strategy, for, improving, advanced, 'PCa', treatment, is]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapies, combined, with, chemotherapy])].
[sujeto(['PC-1,', a, prostate, 'Leucine', 'Zipper', gene, '(', 'PrLZ),', is, specifically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, prostate, tissue, as, an, 'androgen-induced', gene, and, is, 'up-regulated', in, advanced, 'PCa'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', work, confirmed, that, 'PC-1', expression]), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['PCa', growth, and, 'androgen-independent', progression])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'PC-1', overexpression, confers, 'PCa', cells, resistance, to, rapamycin, treatment, by, antagonizing, 'rapamycin-induced', cytostasis, and, autophagy, '(', 'rapamycin-sensitivity', was, observed, in, 'PC-1-deficient', '(', 'shPC-1)', 'C4-2', 'cells)'])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, the, mTOR, pathway, in, 'PCa', cells, with, 'PC-1', overexpressed, and, depressed, revealed, that, eukaryotic, initiation, factor, '4E-binding', protein, 1, '(', '4E-BP1)', was, highly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'PC-1'])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistochemistry', assays, indicated, that, '4E-BP1', 'up-regulation', correlates, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['PC-1', expression, in, human, prostate, tumors, and, in, 'PCa', cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'PC-1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([directly, with, '4E-BP1', and, stabilizes, '4E-BP1', protein, via, inhibition, of, its, ubiquitination, and, proteasomal, degradation])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'PC-1', is, a, novel, regulator, of, '4E-BP1', and, our, work]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([a, potential, mechanism, through, which, 'PC-1', enhances, 'PCa', cell, survival, and, malignant, progression, and, increases, chemoresistance])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', the, 'PC-1-4E-BP1', interaction, may, represent, a, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, treating, advanced, 'PCa'])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', in, genes, encoding, regulators, of, 'mTOR,', the, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'rapamycin,', commonly, provide, survival, signals, in, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Rapamycin', and, analogs, of, rapamycin]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, used, with, limited, success, in, clinical, trials, to, target, 'mTOR-dependent', survival, signals, in, a, variety, of, human, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Suppression', of, mTOR, predominantly]), verbo([causes]), complemento(['G1', cell, cycle, 'arrest,', which, likely, contributes, to, the, ineffectiveness, of, 'rapamycin-based', therapeutic, strategies])].
[sujeto(['While', rapamycin]), verbo([causes]), complemento([the, accumulation, of, cells, in, 'G1,', its, effect, in, other, cell, cycle, phases, remains, largely, unexplored])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([here, that, when, synchronized, 'MDA-MB-231', breast, cancer, cells, are, allowed, to, progress, into, 'S-phase', from, 'G1,', rapamycin, activates, the, apoptotic, machinery, with, a, concomitant, increase, in, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['In', 'Calu-1', lung, cancer, 'cells,', rapamycin]), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, feedback, increase, in, 'Akt', phosphorylation, at, 'Ser473', in, 'S-phase', that, mitigated, 'rapamycin-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, glutamine, '(', 'Gln)', deprivation, causes, 'K-Ras', mutant, cancer, cells, to, aberrantly, arrest, primarily, in, 'S-phase'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', rapamycin]), verbo([induced]), complemento([substantially, higher, levels, of, cell, death, upon, 'Gln', depletion, than, that, observed, in, cancer, cells, that, were, allowed, to, progress, through, 'S-phase', after, being, synchronized, in, 'G1'])].
[sujeto(['We', postulate, that, exploiting, metabolic, vulnerabilities, in, cancer, cells, such, as, 'S-phase']), verbo([arrest]), complemento([observed, with, 'K-Ras-driven', cancer, cells, deprived, of, 'Gln,', could, be, of, great, therapeutic, potential])].
[sujeto(['Adenylyl', cyclase, '(', 'AC)', is, a, key, enzyme, that, synthesizes, cyclic, 'AMP', '(', 'cAMP)', at, the, onset, of, the, signaling, pathway, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([sperm, motility])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, showed, that, both, transmembrane, 'AC', '(', 'tmAC)', and, soluble, 'AC', '(', 'sAC)', are, distinctly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, sperm, motility, in, the, ascidian, 'Ciona', intestinalis])].
[sujeto(['A', tmAC, inhibitor, blocked, both, cAMP, synthesis, and, the, activation, of, sperm, motility]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, egg, factor, sperm, activating, and, attracting, factor, '(', 'SAAF),', as, well, as, those, induced, by, 'theophylline,', an, inhibitor, of, phoshodiesterase])].
[sujeto(['It', also, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['cAMP-dependent', phosphorylation, of, a, set, of, proteins, at, motility, activation])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', a, sAC, inhibitor, does, not, affect, on, 'SAAF-induced', transient]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, 'cAMP,', motility, activation, or, protein, 'phosphorylation,', but, it, reduced, swimming, velocity, to, half, in, 'theophylline-induced', sperm])].
[sujeto(['A', sAC, inhibitor, 'KH-7']), verbo([induced]), complemento([circular, swimming, trajectory, with, smaller, diameter, and, significantly, suppressed, chemotaxis, of, sperm, to, 'SAAF'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, tmAC, is, involved, in, the, basic, mechanism, for, motility, activation, through, 'cAMP-dependent', protein, 'phosphorylation,', whereas, sAC, plays, distinct, roles, in, increase, of, flagellar, beat, frequency, and, in, the, 'Ca2+-dependent', chemotactic, movement, of, sperm])].
[sujeto(['Recently', published, findings, indicate, that, a, knockout, '(', 'KO)', of, soluble, adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'sAC,', also, known, as, 'AC-10)', gene, expression, in, mice]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, defective, glucoregulation, that, is, characterized, by, reduced, pancreatic, insulin, secretion, and, reduced, intraperitoneal, glucose, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['Highlighted', is, new, evidence, that, in, pancreatic, beta, 'cells,', oxidative, glucose, metabolism]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([mitochondrial, 'CO&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;production', that, in, turn, generates, bicarbonate, ion, '(', 'HCO(3)(-))'])].
[sujeto(['Since', 'HCO(3)(-)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, and, directly, stimulates, the, activity, of, 'sAC,', we, propose, that, 'glucose-stimulated', cAMP, production, in, beta, cells, is, mediated, not, simply, by, transmembrane, adenylyl, cyclases, '(', 'TMACs),', but, also, by, sAC])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, evidence, that, sAC, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'mitochondria,', there, exists, the, possibility, that, 'beta-cell', glucose, metabolism, is, linked, to, mitochondrial, cAMP, production, with, consequent, facilitation, of, oxidative, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Since', sAC, is, also]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'cytoplasm,', sAC, catalyzed, cAMP, production, may, activate, cAMP, sensors, such, as, 'PKA', and, 'Epac2', to, control, ion, channel, 'function,', intracellular, 'Ca&Acirc;&sup2;&acirc;&#65533;&ordm;', 'handling,', and, 'Ca&Acirc;&sup2;&acirc;&#65533;&ordm;-dependent', exocytosis])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', we, propose, that, the, existence, of, sAC, in, beta, cells]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, new, and, unexpected, explanation, for, previously, reported, actions, of, glucose, metabolism, to, stimulate, cAMP, production])].
[sujeto(['It', seems, possible, that, alterations, of, sAC, activity, might, be, of, importance, when, evaluating, new, strategies, for, the, treatment, of, type, 2, diabetes, '(', 'T2DM),', or, when, evaluating, why, glucose, metabolism, fails, to]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([insulin, secretion, in, patients, diagnosed, with, 'T2DM'])].
[sujeto([cAMP, is, an, evolutionary, 'conserved,', prototypic, second, messenger]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([numerous, cellular, functions])].
[sujeto(['Among', 'these,', only, sAC, is, directly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, bicarbonate, '(', 'HCO3(-));', it, thereby, serves, as, a, cellular, sensor, for, 'HCO3(-),', carbon, dioxide, '(', 'CO2),', and, pH, in, physiological, 'functions,', such, as, sperm, 'activation,', aqueous, humor, 'formation,', and, metabolic, regulation])].
[sujeto(['The', activator, 'HCO3(-)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([adjacent, to, 'Arg176,', which, acts, as, a, switch, that, enables, formation, of, the, catalytic, cation, sites])].
[sujeto(['An', anionic, 'inhibitor,', 4, ',', 4, '\'', -, 'diisothiocyanatostilbene-2,2\'-disulfonic', 'acid,']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([sAC, through, binding, to, the, active, site, 'entrance,', which, blocks, 'HCO3(-)', activation, through, steric, hindrance, and, trapping, of, the, 'Arg176', side, chain])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', product, complexes]), verbo([reveal]), complemento(['small,', local, rearrangements, that, facilitate, catalysis])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, molecular, mechanism, for, sAC, catalysis, and, cellular, 'HCO3(-)', sensing, and, a, basis, for, targeting, this, system, with, drugs])].
[sujeto(['There', is, evidence, that, in, some, tissues, 'Ca2', expression, can, be, acutely]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'cAMP,', whereas, in, other, cell, types, it, is, unresponsive, to, 'cAMP-mediated', transcriptional, activation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'Ca2', expression, is, strongly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, chronic, incubation, with, 'dibutyryl-cAMP,', forskolin, or, alkaline, pH, in, cultured, mouse, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', fibroblasts, obtained, from, anion, exchanger, 2, deficient, '(', 'Ae2a,b(-/-))', 'mice,', which, display, intracellular, alkalosis, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cAMP, 'production,', express, less, than, 10, '%', of, control, 'Ca2', mRNA, and, protein])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', inhibition, of, the, 'bicarbonate-sensitive', soluble, adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'sAC)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, reduce, 'CA2', expression, instead, of, increasing, it])].
[sujeto(['CA2', expression, is, strongly]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, intracellular, pH, and, by, 'cAMP,', suggesting, a, role, for, soluble, adenylyl, cyclase])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, examine, the, contribution, of, sAC, to, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, cyclic, 'AMP', '(', 'cAMP)', and, changes, in, a, key, ion, 'transporter,', 'H(+)-ATPase,', in, 'NPE', exposed, to, 'acetazolamide,', a, carbonic, anhydrase, inhibitor, '(', 'CAI)'])].
[sujeto(['A', transient, cAMP, 'increase,', detectable, within, minutes, of, acetazolamide, 'treatment,', was]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, 'KH7,', a, specific, sAC, inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['Following', 10, -, minute, exposure, to, 'acetazolamide,', the, abundance, of, 'H(+)-ATPase', 'B1', subunit, and, sAC, was, doubled, in, a, plasma, 'membrane-rich', 'fraction,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([subcellular, translocation])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([capacity, for, proton, 'export,', acetazolamide, increased, the, rate, of, pH, recovery, from, acidification])].
[sujeto(['KH7', and, bafilomycin, 'A1,', an, inhibitor, of, 'H(+)-ATPase,', both]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, stimulatory, effect, of, acetazolamide, on, pH, recovery])].
[sujeto(['In', a, parallel, 'study,', 'H(+)-ATPase', abundance, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, higher, in, the, plasma, membrane, of, 'HEK293', cells, that, overexpress, sAC, compared, to, the, normal, 'HEK293', cells])].
[sujeto(['Acetazolamide']), verbo([increases]), complemento([cAMP, in, a, response, that, involves, activation, of, sAC])].
[sujeto(['Subcellular', translocation, of, 'H(+)-ATPase', and, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, capacity, for, proton, export, by, 'acetazolamide-treated', 'NPE', cells, is, a, 'cAMP-dependent', response])].
[sujeto(['It', is, becoming, increasingly, apparent, that, cAMP, signals, within, the, pulmonary, endothelium, are, highly, 'compartmentalized,', and, this, compartmentalization, is, critical, to]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([endothelial, barrier, integrity])].
[sujeto(['AC10', is, uniquely]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, bicarbonate, to, generate, cytosolic, 'cAMP,', yet, its, role, in, regulation, of, endothelial, barrier, integrity, has, not, been, addressed])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, 'that,', within, the, pulmonary, 'circulation,', 'AC10', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, pulmonary, microvascular, endothelial, cells, '(', 'PMVECs)', and, pulmonary, artery, endothelial, cells, '(', 'PAECs),', yet, expression, in, 'PAECs', is, lower])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', pulmonary, endothelial, cells, selectively]), verbo([express]), complemento([bicarbonate, cotransporters])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', addition, of, extracellular, bicarbonate]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([resistance, across, the, 'PMVEC', monolayer, and, increases, the, filtration, coefficient, in, the, isolated, perfused, lung, above, osmolality, controls])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PMVECs', have, a, 'bicarbonate-sensitive', cytosolic, cAMP, pool, that, disrupts, endothelial, barrier, integrity])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, could]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, alternative, mechanism, for, the, controversial, effects, of, bicarbonate, correction, of, acidosis, of, acute, respiratory, distress, syndrome, patients])].
[sujeto(['The', process, of, epithelial, 'HCO&acirc;&sbquo;&fnof;&acirc;&#65533;&raquo;', secretion, is, under, endocrine, 'control,', 'therefore,', in, this, study, we, aimed, to, characterize, the, involvement, of, transmembrane, '(', 'tmACs)', and, soluble, '(', 'sACs)', adenylyl, cyclases, on, the, regulation, of, bicarbonate, secretion, '(', 'BCS)', and, water, absorption, in, the, intestine, of, the]), verbo([sea]), complemento([bream, '(', 'Sparus', 'aurata)'])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, all, sections, of]), verbo([sea]), complemento([bream, intestine, are, able, to, secrete, bicarbonate, as, measured, by, 'pH-Stat', in, 'Ussing', chambers])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', gut, sac, preparations]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([net, water, absorption, in, all, segments, of, the, 'intestine,', with, significantly, higher, absorption, rates, in, the, anterior, intestine, that, in, the, rectum])].
[sujeto(['BCS', and, water, absorption, are, positively, correlated, in, all, regions, of, the]), verbo([sea]), complemento([bream, intestinal, tract])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', stimulation, of, tmACs, '(', 10, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M', 'FK', +, 500, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M', 'IBMX)']), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, significant, decrease, in, 'BCS,', bulk, water, absorption, and, short, circuit, current, '(', 'Isc)', in, a, region, dependent, manner])].
[sujeto(['In', 'turn,', stimulation, of, sACs, with, elevated, 'HCO&acirc;&sbquo;&fnof;&acirc;&#65533;&raquo;', results, in, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'BCS,', and, bulk, water, absorption, in, the, anterior, 'intestine,', an, action, completely, reversed, by, the, sAC, inhibitor, 'KH7', '(', 200, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M)'])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', the, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, functional, relationship, between, 'BCS', and, water, absorption, in, marine, fish, intestine, and, modulation, by, tmACs, and, sAC])].
[sujeto(['In', light, of, the, present, 'observations,', it, is, hypothesized, that, the, endocrine, effects, on, intestinal, 'BCS', and, water, absorption]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, tmACs, are, locally, and, reciprocally, modulated, by, the, action, of, sACs, in, the, fish, 'enterocyte,', thus, 'fine-tuning', the, process, of, carbonate, aggregate, production, in, the, intestinal, lumen])].
[sujeto(['Cyclic', 'AMP', produced, from, membrane, receptor, complex]), verbo([bound]), complemento([adenylyl, cyclases, is, protective, in, corneal, endothelial, cells, '(', 'CEC)'])].
[sujeto(['CEC', also]), verbo([express]), complemento([soluble, adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'sAC),', which, is, localized, throughout, the, cytoplasm])].
[sujeto(['When']), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'HCO(3)(-),', cAMP, concentration, '(', '[', 'cAMP])', increases, by, &, 'acirc;&circ;&frac14;50%'])].
[sujeto(['HCO(3)(-)', '(', 40, 'mM)', or, 50, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M', rolipram, raised, '[', 'cAMP]', to, similar, levels, and, protected, endothelial, cells, by, 50, '%', relative, to, a, 'HCO(3)(-)-free', 'control,', whereas, 2, 'HE,', which]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['[', 'cAMP]', by, 40, '%', ',', and, 'H89', '(', 'PKA', 'inhibitor)', doubled, the, apoptotic, rate])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', 'caspase-3', activity, and, cytochrome, c]), verbo([release]), complemento([were, reduced, by, 'HCO(3)(-)', and, enhanced, by, 2, 'HE', or, siRNA])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, percent, annexin, 'V+', cells, as, a, function, of, '[', 'cAMP]', revealed, an, 'inverse,', nonlinear, 'relation,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, protective, threshold, '[', 'cAMP]', of, 10, 'pmol/mg', protein])].
[sujeto(['Relative', levels, of, phosphorylated, cAMP, response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, and, phosphorylated, 'Bcl-2', were, decreased, in, 'CEC', treated, with, 2, 'HE', or, 'siRNA,', suggesting, that, 'HCO(3)(-)-dependent', endogenous, sAC, activity, can, mobilize, antiapoptotic, signal, transduction])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, new, role, for, sAC, in, endogenous, cellular, protection])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies, showed, that, amantadine, transport]), verbo([increased]), complemento([while, tetraethylammonium, '(', 'TEA)', transport, decreased, in, kidney, tissue, from, diabetic, rats])].
[sujeto(['In', support, of, differential, 'regulation,', 'short-term', glucose, starvation]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([amantadine, transport, and, inhibited, 'TEA', 'transport,', but, the, effect, was, 'bicarbonate-modulated', only, for, amantadine])].
[sujeto([cAMP, analogues]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TEA', transport, while, stimulating, amantadine, transport])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, indicated, that, regulation, of, rOCT, 1, and, 2, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, transmembrane, adenylyl, 'cyclase,', and, regulation, of, amantadine, transport, was, mediated, by, soluble, adenylyl, 'cyclase,', suggesting, that, intracellular, microdomains, of, cAMP, may, be, important, in, determining, overall, cellular, transport, for, organic, cations])].
[sujeto(['Soluble', adenylyl, cyclase, activity, is, known, to, be]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, bicarbonate, and, lactate])].
[sujeto(['These', observations, support, our, hypothesis, and, reconcile, our, previous, studies, demonstrating]), verbo([increased]), complemento([transport, affinity, for, amantadine, in, the, presence, of, bicarbonate, and, decreased, transport, affinity, in, the, presence, of, lactate])].
[sujeto(['Soluble', adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'sAC)', is, an, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([bicarbonate, sensor])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mammals,', it, is, responsible, for, 'bicarbonate-induced,', 'cAMP-dependent', processes, in, sperm]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, fertilization, and, postulated, to, be, involved, in, other, 'bicarbonate-', and, carbon, 'dioxide-dependent', functions, throughout, the, body])].
[sujeto(['Among', 'eukaryotes,', 'sAC-like', cyclases]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, detected, in, mammals, and, in, the, fungi, 'Dictyostelium;', these, enzymes, display, extensive, similarity, extending, through, two, cyclase, catalytic, domains, and, a, long, carboxy, terminal, extension])].
[sujeto(['sAC-like', cyclases, are, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, a, number, of, bacterial, phyla, '(', 'Cyanobacteria,', 'Actinobacteria,', and, 'Proteobacteria),', but, these, enzymes, generally, possess, only, a, single, catalytic, domain, and, 'little,', if, 'any,', homology, with, the, remainder, of, the, mammalian, protein])].
[sujeto(['We', cloned, one, of, the, 'Chloroflexus', 'sAC-like', cyclases, and, confirmed, it, to, be]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, bicarbonate])].
[sujeto(['Bicarbonate']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Soluble', 'Adenylyl', 'Cyclase', '(', 'sAC)', is, a, unique, cytoplasmic, and, nuclear, signaling, mechanism, for, the, generation, of, cAMP])].
[sujeto(['HCO3-']), verbo([activates]), complemento([sAC, in, bovine, corneal, endothelial, cells, '(', 'BCECs),', increasing, '[', 'cAMP]', and, stimulating, 'PKA,', leading, to, phosphorylation, of, the, cystic, fibrosis, 'transmembrane-conductance', regulator, '(', 'CFTR)', and, increased, apical, 'Cl-', permeability])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, examined, whether, 'HCO3-', may, also]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, expression, of, sAC, and, thereby, affect, the, production, of, cAMP, upon, activation, by, 'HCO3-', and, the, stimulation, of, 'CFTR', in, 'BCECs'])].
[sujeto(['Immunoblots', showed, that, 10, and, 40, mM, 'HCO3-']), verbo([increased]), complemento([sAC, protein, expression, by, 45, '%', and, 87, '%', ',', 'respectively,', relative, to, cells, cultured, in, the, absence, of, 'HCO3-'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 'BCECs', 'pre-treated', with10, microM, adenosine, or, 10, microM, 'forskolin,', which]), verbo([increase]), complemento([cAMP, 'levels,', showed, decreased, sAC, mRNA, expression, by, 20, '%', and, 30, '%', ',', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Bicarbonate-induced', apical, 'Cl-', permeability]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, 78, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', in, 'BCECs', cultured, in, 'HCO3-'])].
[sujeto(['However', for, cells, cultured, in, the, absence, of, 'HCO3-,', apical, 'Cl-', permeability]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, only, 10.3, '%', '(', 'P', &, 'gt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['HCO3-', not, only, directly]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['sAC,', but, also, 'up-regulates', the, expression, of, sAC])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, active, cellular, uptake, of, 'HCO3-', can, contribute, to, the, basal, level, of, cellular, cAMP, in, tissues, that, express, sAC])].
[sujeto(['Activators', and, inhibitors, of, soluble, guanylyl, cyclase, had, no, major, effects, on, 'cNMPs,', and, the, activator, of, membranous, adenylyl, cyclase, forskolin]), verbo([increased]), complemento([only, cAMP])].
[sujeto(['Addition', of, bicarbonate, to, medium, 'increased,', whereas, removal, of, bicarbonate]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([levels, of, all, four, cNMPs])].
[sujeto(['Soluble', adenylate, cyclases, catalyse, the, synthesis, of, the, second, messenger, cAMP, through, the, cyclisation, of, 'ATP', and, are, the, only, known, enzymes, to, be, directly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, bicarbonate])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, first, crystal, structure, of, the, human, enzyme, that, reveals, a, pseudosymmetrical, arrangement, of, two, catalytic, domains, to, produce, a, single, competent, active, site, and, a, novel, discrete, bicarbonate, binding, pocket])].
[sujeto(['Crystal', structures, of, the, apo, 'protein,', the, protein, in, complex, with, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;,&Icirc;&sup2;-methylene', adenosine, 5, '\'', -, triphosphate, '(', 'AMPCPP)', and, 'calcium,', with, the, allosteric, activator, 'bicarbonate,', and, also, with, a, number, of, inhibitors, identified, using, fragment, 'screening,', all, show, a, flexible, active, site, that, undergoes, significant, conformational, changes, on]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, ligands])].
[sujeto(['The', resulting, 'nanomolar-potent', inhibitors, that, were, developed]), verbo([bind]), complemento([at, both, the, substrate, binding, pocket, and, the, allosteric, 'site,', and, can, be, used, as, chemical, probes, to, further, elucidate, the, function, of, this, protein])].
[sujeto(['Structurally', related, to, other, ciliary, 'appendages,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([unique, cytoskeletal, structures, that, serve, to, assemble, signaling, complexes, as, well, as, components, of, metabolic, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Flagellar', motility, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, signaling, events, that, control, sperm, ion, 'milieu,', energy, 'production,', and, classical, second, 'messenger-dependent', phosphorylation, cascades])].
[sujeto(['This', soluble, adenylyl, cyclase, '(', 'sAC)', is, a, sensor, for, 'bicarbonate,', 'pH,', and, 'Ca(2+)', and, is, likely]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, coupling, energy, homeostasis, with, signaling, events])].
[sujeto([cAMP, is, a, critical, second, messenger]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['activity-dependent', neuronal, survival, and, neurite, growth])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([sAC, protein, expressed, in, multiple, 'RGC', compartments, including, the, 'nucleus,', cytoplasm, and, axons])].
[sujeto([sAC, activation]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cAMP, above, the, level, seen, with, transmembrane, adenylate, cyclase, '(', 'tmAC)', activation])].
[sujeto(['Electrical', activity, and, 'bicarbonate,', both, physiologic, sAC, 'activators,', significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([survival, and, axon, 'growth,', whereas, pharmacologic, or, 'siRNA-mediated', sAC, inhibition, dramatically, decreased, 'RGC', survival, and, axon, growth, in, 'vitro,', and, survival, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', 'RGC', survival, and, axon, growth, were, unaltered, in, 'RGCs', from, 'AC1/AC8', double, 'knock-out', mice, or, after, specifically]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([tmACs])].
[sujeto(['These', data, identify, a, novel, 'sAC-mediated', cAMP, signaling, pathway]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['RGC', survival, and, axon, 'growth,', and, suggest, new, neuroprotective, or, regenerative, strategies, based, on, sAC, modulation])].
[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, is, to]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, of, the, existence, of, the, adenylyl, cyclase, 10, '(', 'ADCY10)', ortholog, proteins, in, boar, spermatozoa])].
[sujeto(['Experiments', with, 'RT-PCR', 'techniques,', nucleotide, sequence, analyses, and, 'Northern', blot, analyses, revealed, that, boar, testes, exclusively]), verbo([express]), complemento([approximately, 5.1, -, kbp, 'RNA,', the, nucleotide, sequence, of, which, is, highly, similar, to, that, of, human, 'ADCY10'])].
[sujeto(['Database', analyses, with, 'CDART']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, pig, 'ADCY10', ortholog, proteins, conserve, two, catalytic, domains, of, adenylyl, cyclase])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, analyzed, the, possible, intracellular, transduction, pathways, that, are]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, mechanisms, induced, by, 'SRIF', and, 'GHRH', to, regulate, 'GH', release])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, pharmacological, 'approach,', the, blockade, of, the, 'PLC/IP/PKC', pathway, reversed, the, 'SRIF-induced', inhibition, of, 'GH']), verbo([release]), complemento([but, did, not, affect, the, 'GHRH-induced', stimulation, of, 'GH', release])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'SRIF', reduced, the, 'GH']), verbo([release]), complemento([induced, by, two, 'PKC', activators])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, 'GH']), verbo([release]), complemento([evoked, by, forskolin, and, 8, -, 'Br-cAMP', were, completely, abolished, by, 'SRIF'])].
[sujeto(['The', blockade, of, the, 'NOS/NO', pathway, attenuated, the, 'GHRH-induced', 'GH']), verbo([release]), complemento([but, had, minimal, effects, on, the, inhibitory, actions, of, 'SRIF'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, findings, indicate, that, the, 'SRIF-induced', inhibition, of, 'GH']), verbo([release]), complemento([is, mediated, by, both, the, 'PLC/IP/PKC', and, the, 'AC/cAMP/PKA', pathways, and, not, by, the, 'NOS/NO/sGC/cGMP', pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'GHRH-induced', stimulation, of, 'GH', secretion, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, both, the, 'AC/cAMP/PKA', and, the, 'NOS/NO', pathways, and, is, independent, of, the, 'sGC/cGMP', pathway, and, the, 'PLC/IP/PKC', system])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', nifedipine]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([only, the, contraction, elicited, by, membrane, depolarization, with, high, 'KCl'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'HNS-32']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([both, 'L-type', 'Ca2+', 'channel-dependent', and, -, independent, vascular, contraction])].
[sujeto(['Blockade', of, 'Ca2+', entry, through, 'L-type', 'Ca2+', channels, may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, inhibitory, effect, of, 'HNS-32', on, the, contraction, due, to, membrane, depolarization, with, high, 'KCl'])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'HNS-32', seems, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Ca2+', 'channel-independent', contraction, via, 'mechanism(s)', other, than, elevation, of, cyclic, nucleotides, '(', cAMP, and, 'cGMP)', and, opening, of, 'K+', channels])].
[sujeto(['A', monolysogen, containing, an, 'hmp-lacZ', operon, fusion, was, constructed, to, determine, how, the, hmp, promoter, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, response, to, heme, ligands, '(', 'O2,', 'NO)', or, the, presence, of, anaerobically, utilized, electron, acceptors, '(', 'nitrate,', 'nitrite)'])].
[sujeto(['Anaerobic,', but, not, 'aerobic,', expression, of, phi, '(', 'hmp-lacZ)1', was]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['three-', to, 'four-fold', by, an, fnr, 'mutation;', an, apparent, 'Fnr-binding', site, is, present, in, the, hmp, promoter])].
[sujeto(['Iron', depletion, of, rich, broth, medium, by, the, chelator, 2, '\'', 2, '\'', -, dipyridyl, '(', 0.1, 'mM)']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([hmp, expression, 40, -, fold, under, anaerobic, 'conditions,', tentatively, attributed, to, effects, on, 'Fnr'])].
[sujeto(['At', a, higher, chelator, concentration, '(', 0.4, 'mM),', hmp, expression, was, also]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([aerobically])].
[sujeto(['Anaerobic', expression, was]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([6, -, fold, by, the, presence, of, nitrate, and, 25, -, fold, by, the, presence, of, nitrite])].
[sujeto(['Nitric', oxide, '(', 10, to, 20, 'microM)']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([aerobic, phi, '(', 'hmp-lacZ)1', activity, by, up, to, 19, -, 'fold;', soxS, and, soxR, mutations, only, slightly, reduced, the, 'NO', effect])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, hmp, expression, is, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Fnr', under, anaerobic, conditions, and, that, additional, regulatory, mechanisms, are, involved, in, the, responses, to, 'oxygen,', nitrogen, 'compounds,', and, iron, availability])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, procedure, for, the, solubilization, of, stable, and, functional, 'FSH', receptors, with, 'Triton', 'X-100'])].
[sujeto(['The', conditions, of, detergent, solubilization, were, optimized, to, reduce, the]), verbo([required]), complemento([ratio, of, 'Triton', 'X-100', to, membrane, protein, to, a, minimum])].

[sujeto(['The', 'detergent-soluble', fraction]), verbo([has]), complemento([several, interesting, properties, not, previously, reported])].

[sujeto(['Adenylate', cyclase, activity, also]), verbo([responds]), complemento([to, 'F-', stimulation, and, the, detergent, extract, retains, full, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'imidotriphosphate-binding', activity])].

[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, 'FSH', with, membrane, receptors, from, rat, and, calf, testis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, studied, in, some, detail])].

[sujeto(['Phospholipids', may]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([or, stabilize, a, particular, receptor, conformation, necessary, for, interaction, with, the, hormone])].
[sujeto(['Follitropin']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, testes, receptor, appears, modulated, by, a, variety, of, factors, present, in, 'serum,', testes, 'extracts,', follicular, 'fluid,', and, seminal, 'plasma,', which, are, poorly, understood, at, present])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'FSH']), verbo([binding]), complemento([by, seminal, plasma, 'best-fit', by, a, model, proposing, two, hormone, binding, sites, per, receptor, 'molecule,', where, binding, to, one, site, decreases, the, affinity, of, the, other, site, for, 'FSH'])].
[sujeto(['Although', our, previous, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, adjudin, exerts, its, effect, by, disrupting, 'sertoli-germ', cell, adhesion, 'junctions,', most, notably, apical, ectoplasmic, specialization, by, targeting, testin, and, actin, filament, bundles, that, disrupts, the, 'actin-based', cytoskeleton, in, sertoli, 'cells,', it, remains, unclear, whether, adjudin, impedes, 'Cl&acirc;&#65533;&raquo;', ion, transport, function, in, the, human, sperm])].

[sujeto(['Functional', nicotinic, acetylcholine, receptors, '(', 'nAChR)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, airway, epithelia, and, their, location, in, the, apical, and, basolateral, membrane, makes, them, targets, for, acetylcholine, released, from, neuronal, and, 'non-neuronal', sources])].
[sujeto(['The', ion, current, changes]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, nicotine, '(', 100, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M,', 'apical)', were, not, altered, in, the, presence, of, high, doses, of, atropine, '(', 25, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M,', apical, and, 'basolateral),', underlining, the, involvement, of, nAChR])].

[sujeto(['Pentose', phosphate, pathway, '(', 'PPP)', 'inhibitors,', 6, -, aminonicotinamide, '(', 6, -, 'AN)', and, epiandrosterone, '(', 'Epi),', were, employed, to, examine, whether, changes, in, 'NADP(H)', redox]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([contractile, force, in, 'endothelium-removed', bovine, coronary, arteries, '(', 'BCAs)'])].

[sujeto(['Type', 'V', and, 'VI', mammalian, adenylyl, cyclases, '(', 'AC5,', 'AC6)', are]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'Ca(2+)', at, both, 'sub-', and, supramicromolar, concentration])].

[sujeto(['Ca(2+)']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, soluble, 'AC', core, composed, of, the, 'C1', domain, of, 'AC5', '(', 'VC1)', and, the, 'C2', domain, of, 'AC2', '(', 'IIC2)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, latter, 'complexes,', 'Ca(2+)', and, 'Mg(2+)']), verbo([bind]), complemento([only, to, the, 'high-affinity', &, 'quot;B&quot;', metal, site, associated, with, 'substrate/product', stabilization])].
[sujeto(['The', rod, outer, segments, of, bovine, retina, contain, two, different, adenylate, 'kinases:', a, soluble, 'activity,', which, is, not, sensitive, to, calcium, 'ion,', and, an, activity]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, disk, 'membranes,', which, is, dependent, on, the, calcium, levels])].
[sujeto(['Forskolin,', a, naturally, occurring, diterpene, that]), verbo([activates]), complemento([adenylate, 'cyclase,', 'HL706,', a, 'water-soluble', derivative, of, forskolin, '(', 6, 'beta-[(piperidino)acetoxy]-7-desacetylforskolin)', that, is, less, potent, than, forskolin, in, activating, adenylate, 'cyclase,', and, 1, ',', 9, -, 'dideoxyforskolin,', an, analogue, that, does, not, activate, adenylate, 'cyclase,', were, examined, for, effects, on, the, nicotinic, 'receptor-mediated', 22, 'Na+', 'flux,', a, high, 'potassium-induced', 45, 'Ca2+', flux, through, 'L-type', calcium, 'channels,', and, a, high, 'potassium-induced', 86, 'Rb+', efflux, through, a, 'calcium-dependent', potassium, channels, in, 'PC12', cells])].
[sujeto(['Forskolin', and, its, analogues, appear, to, be, noncompetitive, blockers, of, the, neuronal, nicotinic, 'receptor-channel', complex, in, 'PC12', 'cells,', but, unlike, many, noncompetitive, 'blockers,', did, not, markedly]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([desensitization])].
[sujeto(['Forskolin,', 'HL706,', and, 1, ',', 9, -, dideoxyforskolin, in, the, presence, of, carbamylcholine]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, binding, of, a, noncompetitive, 'blocker,', '[', 3, 'H]perhydrohistrionicotoxin,', to, the, 'muscle-type', nicotinic, 'receptor-channel', complex, in, 'Torpedo', electroplax, membranes, with, 'IC50', values, of, 20, microM])].

[sujeto(['Forskolin,', but, not, 'HL706', or, 1, ',', 9, -, dideoxyforskolin, had, a, slight, inhibitory, effect, on, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, '[', 125, 'I]alpha-bungarotoxin', to, acetylcholine, recognition, sites, in, 'Torpedo', membranes])].
[sujeto([1, ',', 9, -, 'Dideoxyforskolin', at, 30, 'microM,', but, not, forskolin, or, 'HL706,', markedly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['depolarization-evoked', 45, 'Ca+', flux, and, 86, 'Rb+', efflux, in, 'PC12', 'cells,', suggesting, that, 1, ',', 9, -, dideoxyforskolin, has, nonspecific, inhibitory, effects, on, a, variety, of, ion, channels])].
[sujeto(['Even', ligands, that]), verbo([stimulate]), complemento([directly, the, catalytic, subunit, are, incapable, of, bringing, the, activity, of, the, 'mutant\'s', enzyme, to, normal, levels])].
[sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, rutabaga, is, lesioned, in, a, 'subpopulation,', or, a, functional, 'state,', of, adenylate, 'cyclase,', which, may, play, a, role, in, memory, formation])].
[sujeto(['Kidney', function, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, several, hormones, which, act, through, adenylate, 'cyclase-cyclic', 'AMP', system])].

[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([further, insights, into, the, functional, role, of, 'lasp-2,', we, identified, two, additional, binding, partners, of, 'lasp-2:', the, integral, focal, adhesion, proteins, vinculin, and, paxillin])].
[sujeto(['Of', 'interest,', the, interaction, of, 'lasp-2', with, its]), verbo([binding]), complemento([partners, vinculin, and, paxillin, is, significantly, reduced, in, the, presence, of, 'lasp-1,', another, nebulin, family, member])].

[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, interplay, between, 'lasp-2', and, 'lasp-1', could, be, an, adhesion, regulatory, mechanism])].

[sujeto(['At', 'cell-substrate', adhesion, 'sites,', the, linkage, between, actin, filaments, and, integrin, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, mechanical, stiffness, of, the, substrate])].
[sujeto(['Of', potential, molecular, 'regulators,', the, linker, proteins, talin, and, vinculin, are, of, particular, interest, because, mechanical, extension, of, talin]), verbo([induces]), complemento([vinculin, binding, with, 'talin,', which, reinforces, the, 'actin-integrin', linkage])].

[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, talin, extension, is, a, key, step, in, sensing, and, responding, to, substrate, stiffness, at, cell, adhesion, sites])].
[sujeto(['Mechanical', stimulation, of, osteoblasts]), verbo([activates]), complemento([many, cellular, mechanisms, including, the, release, of, 'ATP'])].
[sujeto(['Osteoblasts', also]), verbo([respond]), complemento([to, fluid, shear, stress, '(', 'FSS)', with, increased, actin, stress, fiber, formation, '(', 'ASFF)', that, we, postulate, is, in, response, to, activation, of, the, 'P2Y2', receptor, '(', 'P2Y2R)'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, predict, that, 'ASFF']), verbo([increases]), complemento([cell, stiffness, and, reduces, the, sensitivity, to, further, mechanical, stimulation])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'RhoA', 'GTPase', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([within, 15, min, after, the, onset, of, 'FSS', or, 'ATP', treatment, and, mediated, 'ASFF', following, 'P2Y2R', activation, via, the, 'Rho', kinase, '(', 'ROCK)1/LIM', kinase, 2, /, cofilin, pathway])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observed, that, 'ASFF', in, response, to, 'FSS', or, 'ATP', treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, cell, stiffness, and, was, prevented, by, knocking, down, 'P2Y2R'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, confirmed, that, the]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cell, stiffness, and, 'ASFF', in, response, to, 'RhoA', 'GTPase', activation, during, 'FSS', drastically, reduced, the, mechanosensitivity, of, the, osteoblasts, based, on, the, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', concentration, '(', '[', 'Ca(2+)]i)', response, to, consecutive, bouts, of, 'FSS'])].

[sujeto(['Leptin']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['F-actin', reorganization, and, stress, fiber, formation, in, nucleus, pulposus, 'cells,', accompanied, by, localized, 'RhoA', activation, and, phosphorylation, of, 'LIMK1', and, cofilin])].

[sujeto(['These', findings, may]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insights, into, the, pathogenic, mechanism, of, 'obesity-associated', lumbar, disc, degeneration])].

[sujeto(['Axon', pathfinding, relies, on, the, ability, of, the, growth, cone, to, detect, and, interpret, guidance, cues, and, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([cytoskeletal, changes, in, response, to, these, signals])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([that, the, murine, 'POU', domain, transcription, factor, 'Brn-3'])].

[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insights, into, a, 'Brn-3'])].

[sujeto([elegans, 'unc-115', 'gene,', which, encodes, a, candidate, cytoskeletal, linker, protein, that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([in, axon, guidance])].
[sujeto(['unc-115', mutants]), verbo([have]), complemento([defects, in, a, subset, of, 'axons,', particularly, as, the, affected, axons, change, environments, during, outgrowth])].

[sujeto(['LIM', 'domains,']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, over, 60, 'proteins,', play, key, roles, in, the, regulation, of, developmental, pathways])].
[sujeto(['They', were, first, identified, as, 'cysteine-rich', motifs]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, three, proteins, 'Lin-11,', 'Isl-1,', and, 'Mec-3'])].
[sujeto(['LIM', proteins, frequently, contain, 'DNA-binding', 'homeodomains,', allowing, these, proteins, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([transcription])].
[sujeto(['LIM', domains, also, function, as, 'protein-binding', 'interfaces,']), verbo([mediating]), complemento([specific, 'protein-protein', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Limatin', is, a, novel, 'LIM', protein, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, actin, filaments, via, a, domain, that, is, homologous, to, erythrocyte, dematin])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, murine, and, human, chromosomal, localizations, of, limatin, '(', 'LIMAB1)'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', 10, q25, is, a, region, of, frequent]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, heterozygosity, in, human, 'tumors,', thus, identifying, limatin, as, a, candidate, tumor, suppressor, gene])].
[sujeto(['Lipoma', preferred, partner, '(', 'LPP)', is, a, 'LIM', domain, 'protein,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([multiple, functions, as, an, 'actin-binding', protein, and, a, transcriptional, 'coactivator,', and, it, has, been, suggested, that, 'LPP', has, some, roles, in, cell, migration, or, 'invasion,', 'however,', its, role, in, cancer, cells, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, showed, that, 'LPP', degraded, 'N-cadherin', in, lung, 'cancer,', 'PC14PE6', cells, via]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, expression, of, matrix, metalloproteinase, 15, '(', 'MMP-15),', and, 'loss-of-LPP', increases, collective, cell, migration, '(', 'CCM)', and, dissemination, consequently])].

[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, common]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 'LPP', and, 'Etv5,', and, found, that, 'MMP-15', is, transcribed, as, their, direct, transcriptional, target])].
[sujeto(['LPP', knockdown, in, 'PC14PE6', cells]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['N-cadherin-dependent', 'CCM', in, the, 'three-dimensional', collagen, gel, invasion, 'assays,', and, promoted, the, dissemination, of, cancer, cells, when, they, were, orthotopically, implanted, in, nude, mice])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'loss-of-LPP,', 'Etv5', or, 'MMP-15', can, be, a, prognostic, marker, of, increasing, malignancy])].
[sujeto(['Chronic', stress]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cognitive, impairment, and, dendritic, spine, loss, in, hippocampal, neurons])].
[sujeto(['In', this, animal, model, of, 'depression,', spine]), verbo([loss]), complemento([probably, involves, a, weakening, of, the, interaction, between, 'pre-', and, postsynaptic, cell, adhesion, 'molecules,', such, as, 'N-cadherin,', followed, by, disruption, of, the, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Via', their, effector, 'LIM', kinase, '(', 'LIMK),', 'RhoA', and, 'ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, substrate, 1, '(', 'RAC)', 'GTPases', phosphorylate, and]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['cofilin,', an, 'actin-depolymerizing', 'molecule,', favoring, spine, growth])].
[sujeto(['Some', 'micro-RNAs', negatively, control, the, translation, of, specific, mRNAs]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'Rho', 'GTPase', signaling])].
[sujeto(['For', 'example,', 'miR-138', indirectly]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['RhoA,', and, 'miR-134', reduces, 'LIMK1', 'levels,', resulting, in, spine, 'shrinkage;', in, 'contrast,', 'miR-132', activates, 'RAC1,', promoting, spine, formation])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, stress, did, not, modify, the, 'RAC-LIMK-cofilin', signaling, 'pathway,', we, observed]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['phospho-MYPT1', 'levels,', probably, mediated, by, 'RhoA-ROCK', activation])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, dysregulation, of, 'RhoA-ROCK', activity, by, chronic, stress, could, potentially, underlie, spine, loss, in, hippocampal, neurons])].
[sujeto(['Thyroid', 'receptor-interacting', protein, 6, '(', 'Trip6),', a, multifunctional, protein, belonging, to, the, zyxin, family, of, 'LIM', 'proteins,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, various, physiological, and, pathological, 'processes,', including, cell, migration, and, tumorigenesis])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', phosphorylation, of, 'GRIP1(956T)', by, 'AKT1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, interaction, between, 'GRIP1', and, myosin, 'VI,', but, facilitates, 'GRIP1', binding, to, 14, -, 3, -, 3, 'protein,', which, is, required, for, regulating, 'F-actin', organization, and, dendritic, morphogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, the, potential, beneficial, effects, of, growth, hormone]), verbo([releasing]), complemento([peptide, '(', 'GHRP)-6', on, muscle, 'functions,', a, newly, synthesized, 'GHRP-6-biotin', conjugate, was, tested, on, cultured, myoblast, cells])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, levels, of, 'insulin-like', growth, 'factor-1', and, collagen, type, 'I', were, observed])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GHRP-6-biotin', 'conjugate-treated', cells, showed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([metabolic, 'activity,', as, indicated, by, increased, concentrations, of, energy, 'metabolites,', such, as, 'ATP', and, 'lactate,', and, increased, enzymatic, activity, of, lactate, dehydrogenase, and, creatine, kinase])].
[sujeto(['Finally,']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, analysis, suggested, few, candidate, 'proteins,', including, 'desmin,', 'actin,', and, zinc, finger, protein, 691, as, potential, targets, for, 'GHRP6-biotin', conjugate, action])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, newly, synthesized, 'GHRP-6-biotin', conjugate, has, myogenic, stimulating, activity, 'through,', at, least, in, 'part,', by, stimulating, collagen, type, 'I', synthesis, and, several, key, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'PINCH-1', '(', also, known, as, 'Lims1)', gene, ablation, in, the, epidermis, of, mice]), verbo([caused]), complemento([epidermal, detachment, from, the, basement, 'membrane,', epidermal, hyperthickening, and, progressive, hair, loss])].
[sujeto(['Given', that, the, low, 'PINCH-1', levels, in, 'ILK-deficient', keratinocytes, were, sufficient, to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento(['EPLIN', to, integrin, 'adhesions,', our, findings, suggest, that, 'PINCH-1', regulates, 'integrin-mediated', adhesion, of, keratinocytes, through, the, interactions, with, 'ILK', as, well, as, 'EPLIN'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 25, 'years,', as, the, first, of, the, syndecan, family, was, 'cloned,', interest, in, these, transmembrane, proteoglycans]), verbo([has]), complemento([steadily, increased])].
[sujeto(['The', 'syndecans,', 'therefore,']), verbo([have]), complemento([a, long, evolutionary, 'history,', indicative, of, important, roles])].
[sujeto(['However,', these, roles]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, elusive])].
[sujeto(['The', knockout, in, the, worm]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, developmental, neuronal, 'phenotype,', while, knockouts, of, the, syndecans, in, the, mouse, are, mild, and, mostly, limited, to, 'post-natal', rather, than, developmental, effects])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', their, association, with, 'high-affinity', 'receptors,', such, as, 'integrins,', growth, factor, 'receptors,', frizzled, and, 'slit/robo,']), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, the, notion, that, syndecans, are, 'coreceptors,', with, minor, roles])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([has]), complemento([provided, impetus, to, understanding, syndecan, roles, in, more, detail])].
[sujeto(['It', emerges, that, while, the, cytoplasmic, domains, of, syndecans, are, 'small,', they]), verbo([have]), complemento([clear, interactive, 'capabilities,', most, notably, with, the, actin, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', through, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, activation, of, signalling, 'molecules,', it, is, likely, that, syndecans, are, important, receptors, in, their, own, right])].
[sujeto(['Glomerular', podocytes, are, highly, specialized, terminally, differentiated, cells, that]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, filtration, barrier, in, the, kidney])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, here, that, stable, knockdown, of, 'ACTN4', in, podocytes, significantly, reduces, 'TNF&Icirc;&plusmn;-mediated', induction, of, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B']), verbo([target]), complemento(['genes,', including, 'IL-1&Icirc;&sup2;', and, 'NPHS1,', and, activation, of, an, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B-driven', reporter, without, interfering, with, p65, nuclear, translocation])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'ACTN4', and, an, actin, 'binding-defective', variant]), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, reporter, activity])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'LASP1', is, overexpressed, in, pancreatic, ductal, adenocarcinoma, '(', 'PDAC)', where, it, promotes, invasion, and, metastasis])].

[sujeto(['LtxA']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, receptor, known, as, lymphocyte, function, associated, 'antigen-1', '(', 'LFA-1),', a, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;2', integrin, expressed, only, on, the, surface, of, 'WBCs'])].
