[sujeto(['Myotonic', dystrophy, 'kinase-related', 'Cdc42-binding', kinase, '(', 'MRCK)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, localize, to, the, lamella, of, mammalian, cells, through, its, interaction, with, an, adaptor, 'protein,', leucine, repeat, adaptor, protein, 35, a, '(', 'LRAP35a),', which, links, it, with, myosin, 18, 'A', '(', 'MYO18A)', for, activation, of, the, lamellar, actomyosin, network, essential, for, cell, migration])].

[sujeto(['Folate,', an, important, nutrient, in, the, human, 'diet,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, 'cancer,', but, its, role, in, metastasis, is, not, established])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, the, withdrawal, of, medium, folate, leads, to, the, inhibition, of, migration, and, invasion, of, 'A549', lung, carcinoma, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, medium, folate, regulates, the, function, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', by, enabling, their, carboxyl, methylation, and, translocation, to, plasma, membrane])].

[sujeto(['Metabolic', stress, primes, monocytes, for, accelerated, 'chemokine-mediated', 'adhesion,', 'migration,', and, recruitment, into, vascular, lesions, by]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([actin, remodeling])].

[sujeto(['Although', many, 'DNA', aberrations, in, melanoma]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, well, 'characterized,', including, focal, amplification, and, deletions, of, oncogenes, and, tumor, 'suppressors,', broad, regions, of, chromosomal, gain, and, loss, are, less, well, understood])].

[sujeto(['Endogenous', 'c-MYC', '(', 'MYC)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, a, potential, pharmacological, target, to, trigger, ubiquitous, tumor, regression, of, pancreatic, neuroendocrine, tumors, '(', 'PanNETs)', and, lung, tumors])].

[sujeto(['To', determine, if, the, 'small-molecule', radioprotector, 'GS-nitroxide,', 'JP4-039,', improved, hematopoiesis, in, 'long-term', bone, marrow, cultures, '(', 'LTBMCs),', explanted, marrow, from, in, vivo, 'drug-treated', 'C57BL/6NTac', mice, was]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, 'JP4-039', for, 25, weeks])].

[sujeto(['Deficiency', or]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, of, 'Retinoblastoma-associated', proteins, '(', 'RbAp48)', is, related, with, 'Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD),', and, 'AD', disease, is, associated, with, 'age-related', memory, loss])].

[sujeto(['The', nucleosome, remodeling, and, deacetylase, '(', 'NuRD)', complex, is, a, widely]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([transcriptional, 'co-regulator', that, harbors, both, nucleosome, remodeling, and, histone, deacetylase, activities])].

[sujeto(['Affymetrix', and, 'real-time', 'PCR', studies, of, 'siRNA-treated', human, 'PS', cells, showed, that, reduced, 'RBBP4', or, 'RBBP9', expression, concomitantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, 'POU5F1,', 'NANOG,', 'SOX2,', 'and/or', 'FOXD3', plus, certain, cell, cycle, genes, '(', e])].
[sujeto([',', 'CCNA2,', 'CCNB1),', while]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([expression, of, genes, involved, in, organogenesis, '(', particularly, 'neurogenesis)'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Polycomb', repressive, complex, 2, '(', 'PRC2)']), verbo([confers]), complemento([transcriptional, repression, through, histone, 'H3', lysine, 27, trimethylation, '(', 'H3K27me3)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, examined, how, 'PRC2', is]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, histone, modifications, associated, with, transcriptionally, active, chromatin])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, molecular, basis, of, histone, 'H3', 'N', terminus, recognition, by, the, 'PRC2', 'Nurf55-Su(z)12', submodule])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'H3K4me3', inhibits, 'PRC2', activity, in, an, allosteric, fashion, assisted, by, the, 'Su(z)12', 'C', terminus])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, 'H3K4me3,', 'PRC2', is]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'H3K36me2/3', '(', i])].
[sujeto(['Direct', 'PRC2', inhibition, by, 'H3K4me3', and, 'H3K36me2/3', active, marks, is]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, 'humans,', 'mouse,', and, 'fly,', rendering, transcriptionally, active, chromatin, refractory, to, 'PRC2', 'H3K27', trimethylation])].
[sujeto(['While', inhibition, is, present, in, plant, 'PRC2,', it, can, be]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([through, exchange, of, the, 'Su(z)12', subunit])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, mechanisms]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, cell, cycle, exit, into, quiescence, or, senescence, are, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['In', mammalian, 'cells,', the, 'MuvB', core, dissociates, from, p130, upon, entry, into, the, cell, cycle, and]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'BMYB', during, 'S', phase, to, activate, the, transcription, of, genes, expressed, late, in, the, cell, cycle])].
[sujeto(['We', used, mass, spectroscopic, analysis, to, identify, phosphorylation, sites, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, switch, of, the, 'MuvB', core, from, 'BMYB', to, 'DREAM'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'DYRK1A', can, specifically, phosphorylate, 'LIN52', on, serine, residue, 28, ',', and, that, this, phosphorylation, is, required, for, 'DREAM', assembly])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([an, important, role, for, 'DYRK1A', in, the, regulation, of, 'DREAM', activity, and, entry, into, quiescence])].
[sujeto(['Chromatin-modifying', complexes, such, as, the, 'NuRD', complex, are]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, particular, genomic, sites, by, 'gene-specific', nuclear, factors])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, present, the, 1.9, &, 'acirc;&bdquo;&laquo;', resolution, crystal, structure, of, the, 'NuRD', subunit, 'RbAp48']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 15, 'N-terminal', amino, acids, of, the, 'GATA-1', cofactor, 'FOG-1'])].

[sujeto(['Our', 'RbAp48&Acirc;&middot;FOG-1', structure]), verbo([provides]), complemento([insight, into, the, molecular, determinants, of, 'FOG-1-dependent', association, with, the, 'NuRD', complex, and, into, the, links, between, transcription, regulation, and, nucleosome, remodeling])].
[sujeto(['The', polycomb, repressive, complex, 2, '(', 'PRC2)', is, the, major, methyltransferase, for, 'H3K27', 'methylation,', a, modification, critical, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([repressed, gene, expression, programs, throughout, development])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, previously, shown, that, 'PRC2', maintains, histone, methylation, patterns, during, 'DNA', replication, in, part, through, its, ability, to, bind, to, 'H3K27me3'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanism, by, which, 'PRC2']), verbo([recognizes]), complemento(['H3K27me3', is, unclear])].

[sujeto(['Histone', deacetylation, plays, a, pivotal, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([human, cytomegalovirus, gene, expression])].

[sujeto([miRNAs, are, posttranscriptional, regulators, of, gene, expression, that, associate, with, 'Argonaute', and, 'GW182', proteins, to, repress, translation, 'and/or']), verbo([promote]), complemento([mRNA, degradation])].
[sujeto(['miRNA-mediated', mRNA, degradation, is, initiated, by, 'deadenylation,', although, it, is, not, known, whether, deadenylases, are]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, mRNA, target, directly, or, by, 'default,', as, a, consequence, of, a, translational, block])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, human, 'GW182', proteins, recruit, the, 'PAN2-PAN3', and, 'CCR4-CAF1-NOT', deadenylase, complexes, through, direct, interactions, with, 'PAN3', and, 'NOT1,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['These', interactions, are, critical, for, silencing, and, are]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, 'D'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'GW182', proteins, provide, a, docking, platform, through, which, deadenylase, complexes, gain, access, to, the, 'poly(A)', tail, of, miRNA, targets, to, promote, their, 'deadenylation,', and, they, further, indicate, that, deadenylation, is, a, direct, effect, of, miRNA, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Several', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([begun, to, shed, light, on, the, molecular, basis, for, the, physiological, function, of, the, 'PRC2', complex])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, discuss, some, of, these, results, and, how, they]), verbo([provide]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, 'composition,', recruitment, and, regulation, of, the, 'PRC2', complex])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'CUP', employs, multiple, mechanisms, to, repress, the, expression, of]), verbo([target]), complemento([mRNAs])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([translational, 'repression,', 'CUP', maintains, mRNA, targets, in, a, repressed, state, by, promoting, their, deadenylation, and, protects, deadenylated, mRNAs, from, further, degradation])].
[sujeto(['Translational', repression, and, deadenylation, are, independent, of, eIF4E]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, require, both, the, middle, and, 'C-terminal', regions, of, 'CUP,', which, collectively, we, termed, the, effector, domain])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', in, 'isolation,', the, effector, domain, is, a, potent]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([of, mRNA, degradation, and, promotes, 'deadenylation,', decapping, and, decay])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, the, context, of, the, 'full-length', 'CUP', 'protein,', the, decapping, and, decay]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, effector, domain, are, 'inhibited,', and, target, mRNAs, are, maintained, in, a, 'deadenylated,', repressed, form])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', an, 'N-terminal', regulatory, domain, containing, a, noncanonical, 'eIF4E-binding', motif, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, protect, 'CUP-associated', mRNAs, from, decapping, and, further, 'degradation,', suggesting, that, this, domain, counteracts, the, activity, of, the, effector, domain])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, indicate, that, the, mode, of, action, of, 'CUP', is, more, complex, than, previously, thought, and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([mechanistic, insight, into, the, regulation, of, mRNA, expression, by, '4E-BPs'])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, the, 1.75, -, &, 'Atilde;&hellip;', crystal, structure, of, 'Nurf55']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, histone, 'H4', helix, 1, ',', we, analyzed, interactions, of, 'Nurf55', '(', 'Nurf55', or, p55, in, fly, and, 'RbAp48/46', in, 'human)', with, the, 'N-terminal', tail, of, histone, 'H3,', the, first, helix, of, histone, 'H4,', and, an, 'N-terminal', fragment, of, the, 'PRC2', subunit, 'Su(z)12', using, isothermal, calorimetry, and, pulldown, experiments])].
[sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, identified, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, of, histone, 'H3', at, the, top, of, the, 'Nurf55', 'WD40', propeller])].
[sujeto(['Unmodified', or, 'K9me3-', or, 'K27me3-containing', 'H3', peptides, were]), verbo([bound]), complemento([with, similar, 'affinities,', whereas, the, affinity, for, 'K4me3-containing', 'H3', peptides, was, reduced])].
[sujeto(['Helix', 1, of, histone, 'H4', and, 'Su(z)12']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, edge, of, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-propeller', using, overlapping, binding, sites])].
[sujeto(['In', vitro, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, human, 'RbAp46', and, 'RbAp48', genes, encode, proteins, involved, in, multiple, chromatin, remodeling, complexes, and, are, likely, to, play, important, roles, in, development, and, tumor, suppression])].
[sujeto(['However,', to, 'date,', our, understanding, of, the, role, of, 'RbAp46/RbAp48', and, its, homologs, in, metazoan, development, and, disease]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, hampered, by, a, lack, of, insect, and, mammalian, mutant, 'models,', as, well, as, redundancy, due, to, multiple, orthologs, in, most, organisms, studied])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, first, mutations, in, the, single, 'Drosophila', 'RbAp46/RbAp48', homolog, 'Caf1,', identified, as, strong, suppressors, of, a, senseless, overexpression, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', analysis, of, 'Caf1', mutant, tissue]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'Caf1', plays, important, roles, in, cell, survival, and, segment, 'identity,', and, loss, of, 'Caf1', is, associated, with, a, reduction, in, the, 'Polycomb', 'Repressive', 'Complex', 2, '(', 'PRC2)-specific', histone, methylation, mark, 'H3K27me3'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([suppression, of, senseless, overexpression, by, mutations, in, 'Caf1', is, mediated, by, participation, of, 'Caf1', in, 'PRC2-mediated', silencing])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'tissue-specific', apoptosis, in, the, exocrine, glands, in, 'estrogen-deficient', mice, may, contribute, to, the, development, of, autoimmune, exocrinopathy])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'RbAp48', overexpression, induces, 'p53-mediated', apoptosis, in, the, exocrine, glands, depending, on, estrogen, deficiency])].

[sujeto(['Thus,', these, data, indicate, 'RbAp48', to, be, a, novel, immunotherapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, preventing, epithelial, cell, apoptosis, and, the, development, of, 'gender-based', autoimmune, exocrinopathy])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'retinoblastoma-associated', protein, 'RbAp48', overexpression, induces, 'p53-mediated', apoptosis, in, the, salivary, glands, caused, by, estrogen, deficiency])].

[sujeto(['Indeed,', the, autoimmune, lesions, into, 'Rag2(-/-)', mice, were]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, adoptive, transfer, of, lymph, node, cells, from, 'RbAp48-Tg', mice])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, a, novel, immunocompetent, role, of, epithelial, cells, that, can, produce, 'IFN-gamma,', resulting, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, local, tolerance, prior, to, developing, 'gender-based', autoimmunity])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'retinoblastoma-associated', protein, 48, '(', 'RbAp48)', induces, 'tissue-specific', apoptosis, in, the, exocrine, glands, depending, on, the, level, of, estrogen, deficiency])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, transgenic, '(', 'Tg)', expression, of, 'RbAp48', resulted, in, the, development, of, autoimmune, exocrinopathy, resembling, 'Sj&Atilde;&para;gren\'s', syndrome])].

[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, a, novel, immunocompetent, role, of, epithelial, cells, that, can, produce, 'IFN-gamma,', resulting, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, local, tolerance, before, developing, 'gender-based', autoimmunity])].
[sujeto(['The', differential, recruitment, of, coregulatory, proteins, to, the, 'DNA-bound', estrogen, receptor, alpha, '(', 'ERalpha)', plays, a, critical, role, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['estrogen-responsive', gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['We', now, demonstrate, that, 'RbAp46', and, 'RbAp48']), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'ERalphain', vitro, and, in, 'vivo,', associate, with, 'ERalpha', at, 'endogenous,', 'estrogen-responsive', 'genes,', and, alter, expression, of, 'endogenous,', 'ERalpha-activated', and, -, repressed, genes, in, 'MCF-7', breast, cancer, cells])].

[sujeto(['RbAp48', is, a, 'WD-40', protein, that, plays, an, important, role, in, chromatin, metabolism, and]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Ras', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'RbAp48', is, involved, in, the, regulation, of, cytoskeletal, 'organization,', a, novel, function])].
[sujeto(['First,', we, show, that, transfection, of, 'RbAp48', into, 'Hs-578T', breast, cancer, cells, '(', 'Hs-RbAp48-hi)']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, cell, size, 'reduction,', a, rounded, cell, 'shape,', decreased, cellular, 'protrusions,', and, a, higher, 'nuclear/cytoplasmic', ratio])].

[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', our, data, support, a, model, whereby, 'RbAp48']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cellular, morphology, and, cytoskeletal, organization, by, increasing, 'K-Ras', activity, and, signaling, through, 'MAPK'])].

[sujeto(['Every', eukaryotic, chromosome]), verbo([requires]), complemento([a, centromere, for, attachment, to, spindle, microtubules, for, chromosome, segregation])].

[sujeto(['Two', different, affinity, procedures]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, purification, of, the, same, 'complex,', which, consists, of, 'CenH3,', histone, 'H4,', and, a, single, protein, 'chaperone,', 'RbAp48,', a, highly, abundant, component, of, various, chromatin, 'assembly,', 'remodeling,', and, modification, complexes])].

[sujeto([3, ',']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, centromeres, are, maintained, by, a, passive, mechanism, that, involves, exclusion, of, the, complexes, that, deposit, canonical, 'H3s', during, replication, and, transcription])].
[sujeto(['RbAp46', and, 'RbAp48', '(', 'pRB-associated', proteins, p46, and, 'p48,', also, known, as, 'RBBP7', and, 'RBBP4,', 'respectively)', are, highly, homologous, histone, chaperones, that, play, key, roles, in, establishing, and]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([chromatin, structure])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Drosophila', 'Polycomb', group, protein, 'E(z)', is, a, histone, methyltransferase, '(', 'HMTase)', that, is, essential, for]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento(['HOX', gene, silencing, during, development])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'PRC2']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, nucleosomes, in, vitro, but, that, individual, 'PRC2', subunits, alone, do, not, bind, to, nucleosomes])].
[sujeto(['By', analysing, 'PRC2', 'subcomplexes,', we, show, that, 'Su(z)12-Nurf55', is, the, minimal, 'nucleosome-binding', module, of, 'PRC2', and, that, 'Esc', contributes, to, 'high-affinity']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'PRC2', nucleosomes])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, two, genes, in, one, of, these, pathways])].
[sujeto(['lin-53', encodes, a, protein, similar, to, 'RbAp48,', a, mammalian, protein, that]), verbo([binds]), complemento(['Rb'])].

[sujeto(['Chromatin', regulators, are, widely]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([proteins, with, diverse, roles, in, gene, 'expression,', nuclear, 'organization,', cell, cycle, 'regulation,', 'pluripotency,', physiology, and, 'development,', and, are, frequently, mutated, in, human, diseases, such, as, cancer])].

[sujeto(['GATA', proteins, are, a, family, of, zinc, finger, transcription, factors]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([gene, 'expression,', differentiation, and, proliferation, in, various, tissues])].
[sujeto(['FOG-2', was, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 5, /, 6, 'JGCT,', while, 'GATA-4', was, weakly, detectable, only, in, 1, of, the, cases])].
[sujeto(['SLCT']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([diffusely, 'FOG-2', '(', 4, /, 6, ')', and, 'GATA-4', '(', 3, /, 5, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Pediatric', granulosa, tumors, appear, to]), verbo([express]), complemento([a, 'FOG-2/GATA-4', phenotype, in, keeping, with, primordial, ovarian, follicles])].
[sujeto(['High', expression, of, 'GATA-4', does, not, correlate, with, aggressive, behaviour, as, seen, in, 'adults,', but, it, is, probably]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, cell, proliferation, its, absence, can, be, associated, with, the, better, outcome, of, 'JGCT'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'group,', the, lack, of, expression, of, 'FOG-2', in, tumors, in, advanced, stages, might]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, hypothetical, role, in, inhibiting, 'GATA-4', cell, proliferation, pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', 'fibroma/thecoma', group, 'GATA-4', and, 'FOG-2', point, out, the, abnormal, activation, of, 'GATA', pathway, and, might, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, onset, of, these, tumors])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Friend', of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)', family, of, proteins, is, an, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([class, of, large, multitype, zinc, finger, cofactors, that, bind, to, the, amino, zinc, finger, of, 'GATA', transcription, factors, and, modulate, their, activity])].
[sujeto(['Two', 'FOG', genes]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, 'mammals,', both, of, which, interact, with, each, of, the, six, known, vertebrate, 'GATA', factors, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', zinc, finger, '(', 'ZnF)', from, 'GATA', transcription, factors]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([interactions, with, 'FOG', family, proteins])].
[sujeto(['In', 'FOG', 'proteins,', the]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([domains, are, also, 'ZnFs;', these, domains, are, related, to, classical, 'CCHH', fingers, but, have, an, 'His', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'Cys', substitution, at, the, final, 'zinc-ligating', position])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, demonstrate, that, the, variant, 'CCHC', topology]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([binding, 'affinity,', although, the, 'His', -, -, &, 'gt;', 'Cys', change, is, not, essential, for, the, formation, of, a, stably, folded, domain])].
[sujeto(['To', ascertain, the, structural, basis, for, the, contribution, of, the, 'CCHC', 'arrangement,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, structure, of, a, 'CCHH', mutant, of, finger, nine, from, 'U-shaped'])].
[sujeto(['The', structure, is, very, similar, overall, to, the, 'wild-type', 'domain,', with, subtle, differences, at, the, 'C', terminus, that, result, in]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, the, interaction, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'CCHC', zinc, binding, topology, is, required, for, the, integrity, of, 'GATA-FOG', interactions, and, that, weak, interactions, can, play, important, roles, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['FOG-1\'s', function, in, hematopoiesis, is, dependent, on, its, ability, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, the, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1'])].
[sujeto(['FOG-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, observed, to, interact, with, the, corepressor, molecule, 'C-terminal', binding, protein, '(', 'CtBP)', through, a, peptide, motif, shared, by, all, 'FOG', family, members])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, confirmed, that, 'FOG-1', and, 'CtBP']), verbo([interact]), complemento([by, coimmunoprecipitation])].
[sujeto(['We', further, demonstrate, that, a, 'FOG-1', mutant, unable, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'CtBP', has, increased, erythropoietic, '(', but, not, 'megakaryocytic)', rescue, '(', relative, to, the, wild, 'type)', of, a, 'FOG-1(-/-)', cell, line])].

[sujeto(['Our', results, show, that, 'fog-1', produces, two, 'transcripts,', both, of, which, are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, germ, cells, but, not, in, the, soma])].

[sujeto(['Members', of, the, 'GATA', family, of, zinc, finger, transcription, factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, play, important, roles, in, the, control, of, gene, expression, in, a, variety, of, cell, types])].

[sujeto(['GATA', transcriptional, activity, is, also]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([by, two, multitype, zinc, finger, proteins, called, the, 'Friend', of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)', 'proteins,', which, were, cloned, as, 'GATA-specific', cofactors])].

[sujeto(['In', 'GATA-1-deficient', 'FDCER', cells, '(', in, the, presence, of, endogenous, 'FOG),', ectopically]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['GATA-1', activated, transcription, 3, -, 10, -, fold, both, from, alpha, 'IIb', templates, and, the, endogenous, alpha, 'IIb', gene])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'FOG', increased, reporter, construct, transcription, 30, -, fold, overall])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', alphaIIb, gene, transcription, also, was]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([efficiently, upon, the, ectopic, expression, in, of, 'FOG', per, se])].
[sujeto(['This', occurred, in, the, absence, of, any, detectable, expression, of, 'GATA-1', and, was, observed, in, multiple, independent, sublines, for, both, the, endogenous, alpha, 'IIb', gene, and, transfected, constructs, yet, proved, to, depend, largely, upon]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['GATA', elements, 457, and, 55, base, pairs, upstream, from, the, transcriptional, start, site])].
[sujeto(['In', 293, 'cells,', 'FOG', plus, 'GATA-1', but, not, 'FOG', alone, only, moderately]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([alpha, 'IIb', 'transcription,', and, no, direct, interactions, of, 'FOG', with, the, alpha, 'IIb', promoter, were, detectable])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'FOG']), verbo([acts]), complemento([in, concert, with, 'GATA-1', to, stimulate, alpha, 'IIb', expression, but, also, can, act, via, a, 'GATA-1-independent', 'route,', which, is, proposed, to, involve, additional, 'hematopoietic-restricted', cofactors, '(', possibly, 'GATA-2)'])].
[sujeto(['GATA', transcription, factors, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, differentiation, of, diverse, cell, types, in, several, species])].
[sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, their, biologic, activities, may, be, modulated, through, interaction, with, multitype, zinc, finger, 'proteins,', such, as, 'Friend', of, 'GATA-1', '(', 'FOG)', and, 'U-shaped', '(', 'Ush)'])].
[sujeto(['In', cell, 'culture,', 'FOG', cooperates, with, the, hematopoietic, transcription, factor, 'GATA-1', to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([erythroid, and, megakaryocytic, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'FOG-/-', erythroid, phenotype, supports, the, proposed, role, of, 'FOG', as, a, 'GATA-1', cofactor, in, 'vivo,', the, latter]), verbo([finding]), complemento([points, to, a, 'pivotal,', 'GATA-1-independent', requirement, for, 'FOG', in, megakaryocyte, development, from, the, bipotential, 'erythroid/megakaryocytic', progenitor])].
[sujeto(['We', speculate, that, 'FOG', and, other, 'FOG-like', proteins, serve, as, complex, cofactors, that]), verbo([act]), complemento([through, both, 'GATA-dependent', and, 'GATA-independent', mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['GATA', transcription, factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, controlling, adipogenesis, in, 'Drosophila', and, in, mammals])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mammals,', both, 'GATA2', and, 'GATA3']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, present, in, 'preadipocytes,', and, their, silencing, allows, the, onset, of, adipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['GATA', factors]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, operate, through, recruiting, cofactors, of, the, 'Friend', of, 'GATA', '(', 'FOG)', family])].
[sujeto(['FOG', 'proteins,', in, 'turn,']), verbo([recruit]), complemento(['co-regulators,', including, 'C-terminal', binding, proteins, '(', 'CTBPs)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, whether, 'FOGs', and, 'CTBPs', influence, adipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, both, 'FOG1', and, 'FOG2', are, expressed, in, cells, prior, to, adipogenesis, but, are, 'down-regulated', as, adipogenesis, proceeds])].
[sujeto(['Mutant', versions, of, 'FOG2', unable, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['CTBP', or, 'GATA', proteins, are, impaired, in, their, inability, to, inhibit, adipogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', a, mutant, version, of, 'GATA2,', unable, to, associate, with, 'FOGs,', also, displays, abnormal, activity, and]), verbo([causes]), complemento([enhanced, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['However,', because, few, 'Scl']), verbo([target]), complemento([genes, have, been, validated, to, 'date,', the, underlying, mechanisms, have, remained, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 'ChIP-Seq', technology, '(', coupling, chromatin, immunoprecipitation, with, deep, 'sequencing)', to, generate, a, 'genome-wide', catalog, of, 'Scl-binding', events, in, a, 'stem/progenitor', cell, 'line,', followed, by, validation, using, primary, fetal, liver, cells, and, comprehensive, transgenic, mouse, assays])].
[sujeto(['Transgenic', analysis]), verbo([provided]), complemento([in, vivo, validation, of, multiple, new, direct, 'Scl', target, genes, and, allowed, us, to, reconstruct, an, in, vivo, validated, network, consisting, of, 17, factors, and, their, respective, regulatory, elements])].
[sujeto(['By', coupling, 'ChIP-Seq', in, model, cell, lines, with, in, vivo, transgenic, validation, and, sophisticated, bioinformatic, 'analysis,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, widely, applicable, strategy, for, the, reconstruction, of, stem, cell, regulatory, networks, in, which, biologic, material, is, otherwise, limiting])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, addition, to]), verbo([revealed]), complemento([multiple, previously, unrecognized, links, to, known, 'HSC', 'regulators,', as, well, as, novel, links, to, genes, not, previously, implicated, in, 'HSC', 'function,', comprehensive, transgenic, analysis, of, regulatory, elements, provided, substantial, new, insights, into, the, transcriptional, control, of, several, important, hematopoietic, 'regulators,', including, 'Cbfa2t3h/Eto2,', 'Cebpe,', 'Nfe2,', 'Zfpm1/Fog1,', 'Erg,', 'Mafk,', 'Gfi1b,', and, 'Myb'])].

[sujeto(['To', improve, our, understanding, of, the, molecular, basis, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Rb', to, 'RIZ,', we, investigated, the, interaction, between, purified, recombinant, 'AR', and, the, pocket, domain, of, 'Rb', using, nuclear, magnetic, resonance, 'spectroscopy,', isothermal, titration, 'calorimetry,', and, fluorescence, anisotropy, experiments])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'AR', is, intrinsically, disordered, and, that, it]), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, pocket, domain, with, submicromolar, affinity])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrate, that, the, interaction, between, 'AR', and, the, pocket, domain, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([primarily, by, the, short, stretch, of, residues, containing, the, 'IRCDE', motif, and, that, the, contribution, of, other, parts, of, 'AR', to, the, interaction, with, the, pocket, domain, is, minimal])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([clear, evidence, that, 'RIZ', is, one, of, the, few, cellular, proteins, that, can, interact, directly, with, the, 'LXCXE-binding', cleft, on, 'Rb'])].

[sujeto(['Exodus-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3, did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([detectable, chemotaxis, of, resting, peripheral, blood, 'NK', cells])].

[sujeto(['Exodus-2', and, -, 3, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['dose-dependent', chemotaxis, of, 'NKL,', an, 'IL-2-dependent', human, 'NK', cell, line])].
[sujeto(['Exodus-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3, did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['NK', cell, proliferation, in, the, absence, of, other, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'Exodus-1,', -, 2, ',', and, -, 3, did, not, affect, the, cytolytic, activity, of, resting, or]), verbo([activated]), complemento([peripheral, blood, 'NK', cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, message, for, 'CCR7,', a, shared, receptor, for, 'Exodus-2', and, -, 3, ',', was, detected, in]), verbo([activated]), complemento([polyclonal, 'NK', cells, and, 'NKL', cells, but, not, resting, 'NK', cells])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results, indicate, that, 'Exodus-2', and, -, 3, can]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, recruitment, and, proliferation, of, activated, 'NK', cells])].
[sujeto(['Exodus-2', and, -, 3, may]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([interactions, between, 'T', cells, and, 'NK', cells, that, are, crucial, for, the, generation, of, optimal, immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['Chemokines', are, a, family, of, related, proteins, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([leukocyte, infiltration, into, inflamed, tissue, and, play, important, roles, in, disease, processes])].
[sujeto(['However,', chemokines, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([normal, progenitors, rarely, inhibit, proliferation, of, hematopoietic, progenitors, from, patients, with, chronic, myelogenous, leukemia, '(', 'CML)'])].
[sujeto(['These', 'chemokines,', 'Exodus-1/LARC/MIP-3alpha,', 'Exodus-2/SLC/6Ckine/TCA4,', and, 'Exodus-3/CKbeta11/MIP-3beta,', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, inhibit, proliferation, of, normal, human, marrow, progenitors])].
[sujeto(['The', study, described, here]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, these, chemokines, also, inhibited, the, proliferation, of, progenitors, in, every, sample, of, marrow, from, patients, with, 'CML', that, was, tested])].
[sujeto([2000, ;, 95, :, 1506, -, 1508, ')', 'Chemokines']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, hypothesized, to, contribute, to, the, selectivity, of, lymphocyte, trafficking, not, only, as, 'chemoattractants,', but, also, by, triggering, 'integrin-dependent', sticking, '(', 'arrest)', of, circulating, lymphocytes, at, venular, sites, of, extravasation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'T', cells, roll, on, most, 'Peyer\'s', patch, high, endothelial, venules, '(', 'PP-HEVs),', but, preferentially]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, segments, displaying, high, levels, of, luminal, secondary, lymphoid, tissue, chemokine, '(', 'SLC)', '(', 6, 'Ckine,', 'Exodus-2,', 'thymus-derived', chemotactic, agent, 4, '[', 'TCA-4])'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([arrest]), complemento([is, selectively, inhibited, by, functional, deletion, '(', 'desensitization)', of, 'CC', chemokine, receptor, 7, '(', 'CCR7),', the, receptor, for, 'SLC', and, for, macrophage, inflammatory, protein, '(', 'MIP)-3beta', '(', 'EBV-induced', molecule, 1, ligand, chemokine, '[', 'ELC]),', and, does, not, occur, in, mutant, 'DDD/1', mice, that, are, deficient, in, these, 'CCR7', ligands])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', pertussis, 'toxin-sensitive', 'B', cell, sticking, does, not]), verbo([require]), complemento(['SLC', or, 'MIP-3beta', 'signaling,', and, occurs, efficiently, in, 'SLC(low/-)', 'HEV', segments, in, 'wild-type', 'mice,', and, in, the, 'SLC-negative', 'HEVs', of, 'DDD/1', mice])].
[sujeto(['Remarkably,', sites, of, 'T', and, 'B', cell, firm, adhesion, are, segregated, in, 'PPs,', with, 'HEVs', supporting, 'B', cell, accumulation, concentrated, in, or, near, 'follicles,', the]), verbo([target]), complemento([domain, of, most, 'B', cells, entering, 'PPs,', whereas, 'T', cells, preferentially, accumulate, in, interfollicular, 'HEVs'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, fundamental, difference, in, signaling, requirements, for, 'PP-HEV', recognition, by, 'T', and, 'B', 'cells,', and, describe, an, unexpected, level, of, specialization, of, 'HEVs', that, may, allow, 'differential,', segmental, control, of, lymphocyte, subset, recruitment, into, functionally, distinct, lymphoid, microenvironments, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['After', initial, tethering, and, rolling, via, 'L-selectin,', firm, adhesion, of, 'T', cells]), verbo([requires]), complemento([rapid, upregulation, of, lymphocyte, 'function-associated', antigen, 1, '(', 'LFA-1)', adhesiveness, by, a, previously, unknown, pathway, that, activates, a, 'Galpha(i)-linked', receptor])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, used, intravital, microscopy, of, murine, 'PLNs', to, study, the, role, of, 'thymus-derived', chemotactic, agent, '(', 'TCA)-4', '(', secondary, lymphoid, tissue, 'chemokine,', 6, 'Ckine,', 'Exodus-2)', in, homing, of, adoptively, transferred, 'T', cells, from, 'T-GFP', 'mice,', a, transgenic, strain, that]), verbo([expresses]), complemento([green, fluorescent, protein, '(', 'GFP)', selectively, in, naive, 'T', lymphocytes, '(', 'T(GFP)', 'cells)'])].
[sujeto(['TCA-4', was, constitutively, presented, on, the, luminal, surface, of, 'HEVs,', where, it, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'LFA-1', activation, on, rolling, 'T(GFP)', cells])].
[sujeto(['TCA-4', protein, was, not, detected, on, the, luminal, surface, of, 'PLN', 'HEVs', in, 'plt/plt', 'mice,', which]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, congenital, defect, in, 'T', cell, homing, to, 'PLNs'])].
[sujeto(['Accordingly,', 'T(GFP)', cells, rolled, but, did, not]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, 'plt/plt', 'HEVs'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'TCA-4', is, both]), verbo([required]), complemento([and, sufficient, for, 'LFA-1', activation, on, rolling, 'T', cells, in, 'PLN', 'HEVs'])].

[sujeto(['The', chemokine, receptor, 'CCR-7', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'T,', 'NK,', and, dendritic, cells, in, a, 'time-ordered', and, 'stimulus-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Thorough', analyses, of, the, pharmacological, profiles, of, the, recombinant, ligands, for, 'CCR-7,', 'MIP-3beta/ELC/CK-beta', 11, ',', and, 'SLC/Exodus-2/TCA4/6C-kine,', using, 'CCR-7-expressing', 'HEK-293E', transfectants, determine, that, ligands, both]), verbo([bind]), complemento([with, a, 'K(d)', in, the, 100, pM, 'range-10-', to, 100, -, fold, greater, affinities, than, published, 'K(d)', values])].

[sujeto(['We', and, other, workers]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, isolated, three, novel, 'CC', chemokines, termed, 'Exodus-1/LARC/Mip-3alpha,', 'Exodus-2/6Ckine/SLC/TCA4,', and, 'Exodus-3/Mip-3beta/CKbeta11/ELC'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'CC', chemokine, known, as, 6, 'Ckine', '(', 'SLC,', 'Exodus-2,', or, 'TCA4)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, ligand, for, 'CCR7'])].
[sujeto(['Mouse', 6, 'Ckine']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, shown, to, signal, through, mouse, 'CXCR3', and, share, some, of, the, activities, of, 'IFN-gamma', inducible, protein, 10, and, monokine, induced, by, 'IFN-gamma'])].
[sujeto(['Nonetheless,', human, 6, 'Ckine']), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, shown, to, bind, 'CXCR3', receptor, or, have, angiostatic, activity])].

[sujeto(['The', attachment, of, leukocytes, to, the, endothelium, is, a, multistep, process, that, depends, upon, a, very, rapid]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, adhesive, activity, of, leukocyte, integrins])].
[sujeto(['A', pertussis, 'toxin-sensitive', pathway]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['integrin-dependent', lymphocyte, adhesion, to, 'Peyer\'s', patch, high, endothelial, venules, in, 'vivo,', but, the, factors, responsible, for, activating, this, pathway, have, not, been, identified, previously])].

[sujeto(['Immobilized', 'SLC']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, adhesion, of, 'HUT-78', 'T', cells, and, human, 'PBLs', to, mucosal, addressin, cell, adhesion, 'molecule-1,', a, protein, that, is, expressed, on, 'Peyer\'s', patch, and, mesenteric, lymph, node, high, endothelial, venules])].

[sujeto(['The', other, 'CC', chemokines, tested, did, not]), verbo([increase]), complemento([adhesion, to, mucosal, addressin, cell, adhesion, 'molecule-1'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, its, 'production,', receptor, usage, and, biological, activities])].

[sujeto(['The', beta, chemokine, known, as, 6, -, 'C-kine,', secondary, 'lymphoid-tissue', chemokine, '(', 'SLC),', 'TCA4,', or, 'Exodus-2', '(', herein, referred, to, as, 6, 'CK/SLC)', can]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([rapid, 'integrin-dependent', arrest, of, lymphocytes, rolling, under, physiological, shear, and, is, highly, expressed, by, high, endothelial, 'venules,', specialized, vessels, involved, in, lymphocyte, homing, from, the, blood, into, lymph, nodes, and, 'Peyer\'s', patches])].

[sujeto(['Although', the, mechanisms, are, 'unknown,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, the, chemokine, 'CCL21', '(', also, known, as, 'TCA4,', 'SLC,', 6, 'Ckine),', a, ligand, for, the, chemokine, receptor, 'CCR7,', can, regulate, homeostasis, of, 'CD4', '(', but, not, 'CD8)', 'T', cells])].

[sujeto(['Chemokines']), verbo([induce]), complemento([chemotaxis, of, hematopoietic, progenitor, cells, '(', 'HPC),', and, suppress, their, proliferation])].

[sujeto(['In', recent, 'years,', experimental, studies, in, rodents]), verbo([have]), complemento([led, to, a, better, understanding, of, the, role, played, by, these, inflammatory, mediators, in, the, development, and, progression, of, colitis])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, aim, of, this, study, was, to, evaluate, systemic, concentrations, of, key, chemokines, and, cytokines, in, 'forty-two', 'IBD', patients, with, a, range, of, disease, activity, compared, to, levels]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, ten, healthy, donors])].

[sujeto(['Chemokine', '(', 'C-C', 'motif)', receptor, 7, '(', 'CCR7),', a, class, 'A', subtype, 'G-Protein', 'Coupled', 'Receptor', '(', 'GPCR),', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'migration,', activation, and, survival, of, multiple, cell, types, including, dendritic, 'cells,', 'T', 'cells,', 'eosinophils,', 'B', 'cells,', endothelial, cells, and, different, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Together,', 'CCR7', signaling, system]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, diverse, biological, processes, such, as, lymph, node, 'homeostasis,', 'T', cell, 'activation,', immune, 'tolerance,', inflammatory, response, and, cancer, metastasis])].

[sujeto(['Although', the, differential, ligand, signaling, through, single, receptor]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, suggested, for, many, receptors, including, 'GPCRs,', there, exists, no, resource, or, platform, to, analyse, them, globally])].
[sujeto(['Three', inactivated, 'EV71', 'whole-virus', vaccines]), verbo([have]), complemento([completed, 'Phase', 'III', clinical, trials, in, mainland, 'China,', with, high, 'efficacy,', satisfactory, 'safety,', and, sustained, immunogenicity])].
[sujeto(['The', results, showed, that, primary, and, recall, response, to, 'EV71', antigen]), verbo([have]), complemento([both, activated, an, 'IRF7', regulating, type, 'I', interferon, and, antiviral, immune, response, network])].

[sujeto(['Tumor', cells, in, all, specimens]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([lymphangiogenic, growth, factors, 'VEGFC,', 'VEGFD,', and, their, receptor, 'VEGFR3'])].

[sujeto(['Staining', was, most, intense, for, these, proteins, at, the, invasive, tumor, 'edge,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([increased, lymphangiogenic, activity, at, this, location])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'CSC-DC', vaccine, approach, may, be, useful, in, the, adjuvant, setting, where, local, and, systemic, relapse, are, high, after, conventional, treatment, of, cancers])].
[sujeto(['We', speculated, that, the, malignant, 'B', cells, in, these, disorders]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, potential, for, trafficking, between, blood, and, secondary, lymphoid, organs, '(', 'SLO)', or, extranodal, sites, and, that, their, preferential, accumulation, at, different, locations, is, governed, by, the, expression, of, key, molecules, that, regulate, the, trafficking, of, normal, lymphocytes])].
[sujeto(['Biopsy', or, blood, samples, from, 91, cases, of, 'B-NHL', affecting, 'SLO', '(', 'n&acirc;&euro;&permil;=&acirc;&euro;&permil;27),', ocular, adnexae, '(', 'n&acirc;&euro;&permil;=&acirc;&euro;&permil;51)', or, blood, '(', 'n&acirc;&euro;&permil;=&acirc;&euro;&permil;13)', were, analysed, by, immunohistochemistry, or, flow, cytometry, for, the, expression, of, the, following, 'molecules:', 'CCR7,', 'CCL21', and, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;L', '(']), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, entry, of, normal, lymphocytes, into, 'SLO);', 'CXCR4,', 'CXCL12', and, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;4', '(', required, for, entry, into, extranodal, 'sites);', 'CXCR5,', 'CXCL13', and, 'S1PR2', '(', required, for, tissue, 'retention);', 'S1PR1', and, 'S1PR3', '(', required, for, egress, into, the, 'blood)'])].
[sujeto(['SLO', lymphomas, '[', comprising, 10, follicular, lymphoma, '(', 'FL),', 8, diffuse, large, 'B-cell', lymphoma, '(', 'DLBCL),', 4, 'mantle-cell', lymphoma, '(', 'MCL)', and, 5, 'marginal-zone', lymphoma, '(', 'MZL)]', were, characterised, by, pronounced, 'over-expression', of, 'S1PR2,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, malignant, cells, in, these, lymphomas, are, actively, retained, at, the, site, of, clonal, expansion])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, malignant, 'B', cells, in, ocular, adnexal, lymphomas, '(', 10, 'FL,', 9, 'DLBCL,', 4, 'MCL', and, 28, 'MZL)']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([a, profile, of, molecules, suggesting, a, dynamic, process, of, trafficking, involving, not, only, tissue, retention, but, also, egress, via, 'S1PR3', and, homing, back, to, extranodal, sites, via, 'CXCR4/CXCL12', and, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;4'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', leukaemic, lymphomas, '(', 6, 'FL,', 5, 'MCL', and, 2, 'MZL)', were, characterised, by, aberrant, expression, of, the, egress, receptor, 'S1PR1', and, low, expression, of, molecules]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, tissue, 'entry/retention'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', our, study, strongly]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, anatomical, location, in, 'B-NHL', is, governed, by, the, differential, expression, of, specific, 'adhesion/motility', molecules])].
[sujeto(['This', novel, observation]), verbo([has]), complemento([important, implications, for, therapeutic, strategies, that, aim, to, disrupt, protective, 'micro-environmental', interactions])].
[sujeto(['Trisomy', 12, '(', 'tri12)', defines, a, 'CLL', subgroup, with, specific, clinical, features, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, the, negative, prognostic, marker, 'CD49d,', the, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;4-subunit', of, the, integrin, 'VLA-4,', which, is, a, key, regulator, of, 'CLL', cell, homing, to, bone, marrow, '(', 'BM)'])].
[sujeto(['Chemokine-induced', 'inside-out', 'VLA-4', 'activation,', particularly, via, the, 'CXCL12-CXCR4', 'axis,']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, arrest, of, various, cell, types, on, 'VCAM-1', presenting, endothelium])].

[sujeto(['In', 'line,', 'CCL21-CCR7', rather, than, 'CXCL12-CXCR4', interactions]), verbo([triggered]), complemento(['VLA-4-mediated', arrests, of, tri12, 'CLL', cells, to, 'VCAM-1', under, blood, flow, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Concordantly,', in, 'real-time', kinetic, analyses, we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['CCL21', but, not, 'CXCL12', being, capable, to, induce, 'inside-out', 'VLA-4', conformational, changes, in, this, 'CLL', subgroup])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insights, into, the, peculiar, 'clinico-biological', behaviour, of, tri12, 'CLL', and, emphasize, its, specific, chemokine, and, integrin, utilization, during, pathophysiologically, and, therapeutically, relevant, interactions, with, the, microenvironment])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', is, a, multispecific, protein]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, a, number, of, binding, partners, in, both, 'calcium-dependent', and, independent, 'manners,', and, acting, in, a, variety, of, cellular, processes, in, which, it, has, been, linked, to, a, number, of, disorders, such, as, schizophrenia, and, autism])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', what]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, with, the, 'Ca(2+)-bound', 'state,', the, presence, of, 'Mg(2+)', allows, both, the, 'N-', and, 'C-domain', to, fold, through, 'all-or-none', transitions, with, similar, refolding, rates])].
[sujeto(['In', the, absence, of, divalent, 'ions,', 'NCS-1', unfolds, and, refolds, reversibly, in, a, 'two-state', reaction]), verbo([involving]), complemento([only, the, 'C-domain,', whereas, the, 'N-domain', has, no, detectable, transitions])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', the, results, allowed, us, to, trace, the, progression, of, 'NCS-1', folding, along, its, energy, landscapes, and]), verbo([provided]), complemento([a, solid, platform, for, understanding, the, conformational, dynamics, of, similar, 'EF-hand', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Sensing', and]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([intracellular, levels, of, calcium, are, essential, for, proper, cellular, function])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)', is, a, member, of, the, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([neuronal, calcium, sensor, family])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'NCS-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, psychiatric, conditions, including, 'autism,', bipolar, disorder, and, 'schizophrenia,', it, is, unclear, which, role, 'NCS-1', plays, in, behavior])].
[sujeto(['To', understand, the, involvement, of, 'NCS-1', in, psychiatric, 'conditions,', we]), verbo([provided]), complemento([a, comprehensive, behavioral, characterization, of, 'NCS-1', knockout, '(', 'KO)', mice])].
[sujeto(['These', data, implicate, 'NCS-1', in, exploratory, 'activity,', memory, and, 'mood-related', 'behaviors,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'NCS-1', gene, ablation, may, result, in, phenotypic, abnormalities, associated, with, neuropsychiatric, disorders])].
[sujeto(['Certain', thermoreceptor, neurons, are, sensitive, to, tiny, thermal, fluctuations, '(', 0.01, &, 'Acirc;&deg;C', or, 'less)', and]), verbo([maintain]), complemento([their, sensitivity, across, a, wide, range, of, ambient, temperatures, through, a, process, of, 'adaptation,', but, understanding, of, the, biochemical, basis, for, this, performance, is, rudimentary])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, use, in, vivo, 'whole-cell', 'patch-clamp', recording, from, 'AFD', to, show, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GCY-8,', but, not, of, 'GCY-18', or, 'GCY-23,', reduces, or, eliminates, 'ThRCs,', identifying, this, rGC, as, a, crucial, signaling, element])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, the, conserved, neuronal, calcium, sensor, 1, protein, also, regulates, the, threshold, for, 'ThRC', activation, and, propose, a, signaling, network, to, account, for, 'ThRC', activation, and, adaptation])].
[sujeto(['Because', 'PDEs', play, essential, roles, in, diverse, biological, 'processes,', including, vertebrate, phototransduction, and, 'olfaction,', and, regulation, of, smooth, muscle, contractility, and, cardiovascular, 'function,', this, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([broad, implications, for, understanding, how, extraordinary, sensitivity, and, dynamic, range, is, achieved, in, cyclic, 'nucleotide-based', signaling, networks])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)', is, a, small, calcium]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, that, plays, a, key, role, in, the, internalization, and, desensitization, of, activated, 'D2', dopamine, receptors, '(', 'D2Rs)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, fluorescence, anisotropy, '(', 'FA)', and, a, panel, of, 'NCS-1', 'EF-hand', variants, to, interrogate, the, interaction, between, the, 'D2R', and, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['(', 1, ')', 'FA', titration, experiments, indicate, that, at, low, 'D2R', peptide, concentrations, 'calcium-loaded', 'NCS-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'D2R', peptide, in, a, monomeric, form])].
[sujeto(['At', high, 'D2R', peptide, 'concentrations,', the, 'FA', titration, data, are, best, fit, by, a, model, in, which, the, 'D2R', peptide]), verbo([binds]), complemento([two, 'NCS-1', monomers, sequentially, in, a, cooperative, fashion])].
[sujeto(['(', 2, ')', 'Competition', 'FA', experiments, in, which, unlabeled, 'D2R', peptide, was, used, to, compete, with, labeled, peptide, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'NCS-1', shifted, titration, curves, to, higher, 'NCS-1', 'concentrations,', suggesting, that, the, binding, of, 'NCS-1', to, the, 'D2R', is, highly, specific, and, that, binding, occurs, in, a, cooperative, fashion])].
[sujeto(['(', 4, ')', 'Co-immunoprecipitation', experiments, in, 'HEK-293', confirm, that, 'NCS-1', can, oligomerize, in, cell, lysates, and, that, oligomerization, is, dependent, on, calcium]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, requires, functionally, intact, 'EF-hand', domains])].
[sujeto(['(', 5, ')', 'Ca(2+)/Mg(2+)', 'FA', titration, experiments, revealed, that, 'NCS-1', 'EF-hands', 2, -, 4, '(', 'EF2-4)', contributed, to]), verbo([binding]), complemento([with, the, 'D2R', peptide])].
[sujeto(['EF2', appears, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, highest, affinity, for, 'Ca(2+),', and, occupancy, of, this, site, is, sufficient, to, promote, 'high-affinity', binding, of, the, 'NCS-1', monomer, to, the, 'D2R', peptide])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, propose, a, structural, model, that, predicts, that, the, 'D2R', peptide]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, first, 60, residues, of, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, effects, of, binding, of, 'Mg(2+)', to, the, second, 'Ca(2+)-binding', domain, '(', 'CBD2)', of, the, 'sodium-calcium', exchanger])].
[sujeto(['CBD2', is, known, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([two, 'Ca(2+)', ions, using, its, 'Ca(2+)-binding', sites, 'I', and, 'II'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, by]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([magnetic, resonance, '(', 'NMR),', circular, 'dichroism,', isothermal, titration, 'calorimetry,', and, mutagenesis, that, 'CBD2', also, binds, 'Mg(2+)', at, both, 'sites,', but, with, significantly, different, affinities])].
[sujeto(['The', results, from, 'Mg(2+)-Ca(2+)', competition, experiments, show, that, 'Ca(2+)', can, replace, 'Mg(2+)', from, site, 'I,', but, not, site, 'II,', and, that, 'Mg(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([affects, the, affinity, for, 'Ca(2+)'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', thermal, unfolding, circular, dichroism, data, demonstrate, that, 'Mg(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([stabilizes, the, domain])].
[sujeto(['NMR', chemical, shift, perturbations, and, '(', 15, ')', 'N', relaxation, data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'Mg(2+)-bound', 'CBD2', adopts, a, state, intermediate, between, the, apo, and, fully, 'Ca(2+)-loaded', forms])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, '~20%', of, the, residues, in, the, protein, access, alternative, conformations, in, 'non-myr', 'case,', which, increases, to, '~28%', for, myr, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['Besides,', residues, responsible, for, the, absence, of, 'Ca&Acirc;&sup2;(+)-myristoyl', switch, are, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([accessing, alternative, states])].
[sujeto(['This', observation, prompts, us, to, conclude, that, this, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, differences, in, their, individual, conformational, flexibility, and, has, implications, on, the, functionality])].
[sujeto(['Theoretical', simulations]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, these, 'low-energy', excited, states, are, within, an, energy, band, of, 2, -, 4, 'kcal/mol', with, respect, to, the, native, state])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([one, cryptic, '(', 'EF1)', and, three, functional, '(', 'EF2,', 'EF3,', and, 'EF4)', 'EF-hand', motifs])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'work,', we, determined, the, specificity, of, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([using, 'NMR', and, 'EF-hand', mutants])].
[sujeto(['Ca(2+)', 'titration,', as, monitored, by, '[', '(', 15, ')', 'N,(1)H]', heteronuclear, single, quantum, 'coherence,']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'Ca(2+)', binds, to, the, 'EF2', and, 'EF3', almost, 'simultaneously,', followed, by, 'EF4'])].
[sujeto(['Our', 'NMR', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Mg(2+)', binds, to, 'EF2', and, 'EF3,', thereby, classifying, them, as, structural, 'sites,', whereas, 'EF4', is, a, 'Ca(2+)-specific', or, regulatory, site])].
[sujeto(['This', was, further, corroborated, using, an, 'EF2/EF3-disabled', 'mutant,', which]), verbo([binds]), complemento([only, 'Ca(2+)', and, not, 'Mg(2+)'])].
[sujeto(['Ca(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([induces, conformational, rearrangements, in, the, protein, by, reversing, 'Mg(2+)-induced', changes, in, 'Trp', fluorescence, and, surface, hydrophobicity])].
[sujeto(['Under', current, 'clamp,', 'UTP']), verbo([increased]), complemento([action, potential, '(', 'AP)', firing, in, response, to, depolarizing, current, 'steps,', depolarized, the, resting, 'potential,', decreased, the, threshold, current, required, to, fire, an, 'AP,', and, decreased, 'spike-frequency', adaptation])].
[sujeto(['Like', 'bradykinin,', but, unlike, 'muscarinic,', purinergic, stimulation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([rises, in, intracellular, '[', 'Ca(2+)](i)'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrate, that, an, 'EF-hand', 'Ca2+-binding', protein, neuronal, 'Ca2+', 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1),', one, of, the, key, proteins, for, various, neuronal, 'functions,', also]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, important, survival, factor])].

[sujeto(['The', 'calcium-', and, 'sodium-permeable', transient, receptor, potential, channel, 'TRPC5']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, inhibitory, role, in, neuronal, outgrowth, but, the, mechanisms, governing, its, activity, are, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, propose, a, mechanism]), verbo([involving]), complemento([the, neuronal, calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)', protein])].
[sujeto(['Inhibitory', mutants, of, 'TRPC5', and, 'NCS-1']), verbo([enhance]), complemento([neurite, outgrowth, similarly])].
[sujeto(['Mutant', 'NCS-1', does, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['surface-expression', of, 'TRPC5', but, generally, suppresses, channel, 'activity,', irrespective, of, whether, it, is, evoked, by, 'carbachol,', store, 'depletion,', lanthanides, or, elevated, intracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', and, 'TRPC5', are, in, the, same, protein, complex, in, rat, brain, and, 'NCS-1', directly]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'TRPC5', 'C-terminus'])].
[sujeto(['The', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['protein-protein', interaction, between, 'NCS-1', and, 'TRPC5,', and, involvement, of, this, protein, complex, in, retardation, of, neurite, outgrowth])].
[sujeto(['This', work, tested, the, theory, that, neuronal, calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)']), verbo([has]), complemento([effects, on, neurotransmitter, release, beyond, its, actions, on, membrane, channels])].
[sujeto(['Exogenous,', myristoylated, 'NCS-1']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([nerve, ending, phosphatidylinositol, 4, -, phosphate, '[', 'PI(4)P]', 'synthesis,', but, 'non-myristoylated-NCS-1', did, not])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', peptide, of, 'NCS-1', interfered, with, 'PI(4)P', 'synthesis,', and, with, spontaneous, and, 'Ca(2+)-evoked']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, both, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]-norepinephrine', '(', 'NA)', and, '[', '(', 14, ')', 'C]-glutamate', '(', 'glu)', in, a, 'concentration-dependent', manner])].

[sujeto(['Antibodies', against, the, 'N-', and, 'C-termini', of, 'NCS-1']), verbo([caused]), complemento([significant, increases, in, 'mini/spontaneous/stimulation-independent', release, of, '[', '(', 3, ')', 'H]-NA', from, perforated, nerve, 'endings,', but, had, no, effect, on, '[', '(', 14, ')', 'C]-glu', release])].
[sujeto(['These', results, support, the, idea, that, 'NCS-1', facilitates, nerve, ending, neurotransmitter]), verbo([release]), complemento([and, phosphoinositide, production, via, 'PI4K', and, localizes, these, effects, to, the, 'N-terminal', of, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['Combined', with, previous, work, on, the, regulation, of, channels, by, 'NCS-1,', the, data, are, consistent, with, the, hypothesis, that, a, 'NCS-1-PI4K', '(', 'NP,', 'neuropotentiator)', complex, may, serve, as, an, essential, linker, between, lipid, and, protein, metabolism, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([membrane, traffic, and, 'co-ordinate', it, with, ion, fluxes, and, plasticity, in, the, nerve, ending])].

[sujeto(['All']), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, protein, levels, were, correlated, with, those, of, corresponding, messages])].
[sujeto(['Also,', 'up-regulation', of, both, calcyon, and, 'NCS-1', in, the, cortex, of, schizophrenia, patients, can, be, attributed, largely, to, an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([transcription, or, reduced, degradation, of, their, messages])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, elevations, in, the, expressions, of, calcyon, and, 'NCS-1', in, schizophrenia, may, have, the, same, underlying, cause])].
[sujeto(['SOS3']), verbo([activates]), complemento([the, 'SOS2', protein, 'kinase,', which, activates, various, ion, transporters])].
[sujeto(['SOS3', was, cloned, into, a, plasmid, and]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'Escherichia', 'coli,', allowing, purification, of, the, protein, to, homogeneity])].
[sujeto(['A', promising, 'molecular-replacement', solution]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, using, neuronal, 'calcium-sensor', 1, as, the, search, model])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', no, solution, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([using, 'AtCBL2', '(', 'A'])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1),', a, 'Ca(2+)-binding', 'protein,', plays, an, important, role, in, the, modulation, of, neurotransmitter]), verbo([release]), complemento([and, phosphatidylinositol, signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, present, the, role, of, myristoylation, of, 'NSC-1', in, governing, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'Ca(2+)-induced', conformational, changes, in, 'NCS-1', as, compared, with, the, role, in, the, nonmyristoylated, protein])].
[sujeto(['The', '(', 45, ')', 'Ca']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, isothermal, titration, calorimetric, data, show, that, myristoylation, increases, the, degree, of, 'cooperativity;', 'thus,', the, myristoylated, 'NCS-1', binds, 'Ca(2+)', more, strongly, '(', with, three, 'Ca(2+)', binding, 'sites)', than, the, 'non-myristoylated', one, '(', with, two, 'Ca(2+)', binding, 'sites)'])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, changes, in, the, 'far-UV', 'CD', upon, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([were, not, seen, in, 'E120Q', mutant, '(', disabling, 'EF-hand', 3, ')', ',', the, 'near-UV', 'CD', changes, in, conformation, also, were, not, influenced, by, this, mutation])].
[sujeto(['The', difference, in, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, of, myristoylated, and, 'non-myristoylated', proteins, to, 'Ca(2+)', also, was, reflected, by, 'Trp', fluorescence])].
[sujeto([8, -, 'Anilino-1-naphthalene', sulfonic, acid]), verbo([binding]), complemento([data, showed, solvation, of, the, myristoyl, group, in, the, presence, of, 'Ca(2+),', which, could, be, attributed, to, the, 'myristoyl-dependent', conformational, changes, in, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, myristoylation, influences, the, protein, conformation, and, 'Ca(2+)', 'binding,', which, might, be, crucial, for, its, physiological, functions])].
[sujeto(['recoverin,', 'neurocalcins,', and, 'frequenin)', are]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, highest, levels, in, excitable, 'cells,', and, some, of, them, regulate, desensitization, of, 'G', 'protein-coupled', receptors])].
[sujeto(['Ncs1p']), verbo([binds]), complemento([three, 'Ca2+', ions, at, saturation, with, an, apparent, affinity, of, 2, microm, and, 'Hill', coefficient, of, 1.9])].
[sujeto(['Subcellular', fractionation, experiments, showed, that, myristoylation, and, 'Ca2+']), verbo([binding]), complemento([by, 'Ncs1p', are, essential, for, its, translocation, from, cytoplasm, to, membranes])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, 'Ncs1p', mutants, lacking, myristoylation, '(', 'Ncs1p(G2A))', or, deficient, in, 'Ca2+']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', 'Ncs1p(E84Q/E120Q/E168Q))', revealed, that, 'Ca2+', binding, was, essential, for, both, 'phenotypes,', while, myristoylation, was, less, critical])].
[sujeto(['Exogenous', 'cAMP,', a, key, regulator, for, sexual, 'development,']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([conjugation, and, sporulation, of, 'ncs1Delta,', suggesting, involvement, of, 'Ncs1p', in, the, adenylate, cyclase, pathway, turned, on, by, the, 'glucose-sensing', 'G', 'protein-coupled', receptor, 'Git3p'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the, 'Ca2+-intolerance', of, ncs1Delta, was, not, affected, by, cAMP, or, 'recoverin,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, two, ncs1Delta, phenotypes, are, mechanistically, independent])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'Schizosaccharomyces', pombe, 'Ncs1p', negatively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([sporulation, perhaps, by, controlling, 'Ca2+-dependent', desensitization, of, 'Git3p'])].
[sujeto(['Ca2+', ions, play, a, crucial, role, not, only, as, the]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([for, neurotransmitter, 'release,', but, also, in, other, aspects, of, brain, 'function,', such, as, 'short-term', and, 'long-term', modulation, of, synaptic, 'efficacy,', which, may, underlie, certain, forms, of, learning, and, memory])].
[sujeto(['The', actions, of, 'Ca2+', are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'Ca(2+)-binding', 'proteins,', including, a, group, of, proteins, known, as, neuronal, calcium, sensor, '(', 'NCS)', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Some', members, of, this, 'family,', such, as, recoverin, and, guanylate, 'cyclase-activating', 'protein,', are, only]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, photoreceptor, cells, and, have, been, implicated, in, the, control, of, visual, transduction, 'pathways,', while, the, functional, roles, of, the, other, members, are, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', is, an, 'N-terminally', myristoylated, protein, that, contains, four, 'EF-hand', 'motifs,', three, of, which, are, able, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['Ca2+', in, the, submicromolar, range])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'NCS-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, enhance, evoked, neurotransmitter, 'release,', 'paired-pulse', facilitation, and, exocytosis, in, several, neuronal, and, neuroendocrine, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Recent', experiments]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'NCS-1', interacts, directly, with, phosphatidylinositol, 4, -, hydroxykinase, in, yeast, as, well, as, mammalian, 'cells,', suggesting, that, it, may, enhance, neuronal, secretion, by, modulating, cellular, trafficking, steps, in, a, 'phosphoinositide-dependent', manner])].

[sujeto(['The', present, review, describes, current, knowledge, about, the, cellular, functions, and, molecular, mechanisms, by, which, 'NCS-1', may]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([neurotransmitter, release])].
[sujeto(['The', crystal, structure, of, 'AtCBL2']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, determined, at, 2.1, 'A', resolution])].

[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)', or, the, originally, identified, homologue, frequenin, belongs, to, a, superfamily, of, 'EF-hand', calcium]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins])].

[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, many, membranes, and, cytosolic, 'proteins,', both, in, a, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', and, in, a, 'Ca(2+)-independent', 'manner,', and, its, physiological, role, is, governed, by, its, 'N-terminal', myristoylation])].
[sujeto(['To', understand, the, role, of, myristoylation, in, altering, 'Ca(2+)', response, and, other, basic, biophysical, 'properties,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, the, 'Ca(2+)', filling, pathways, in, both, myristoylated, '(', 'myr)', and, 'non-myristoylated', '(', 'non-myr)', forms, of, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([observed, that, 'Ca(2+)', binds, simultaneously, to, all, three, active, 'EF-hands', in, 'non-myr', 'NCS-1,', whereas, in, the, case, of, myr, 'NCS-1,', the, process, is, 'sequential,', where, the, second, 'EF-hand', is, filled, 'first,', followed, by, the, third, and, fourth, 'EF-hands'])].
