[sujeto(['Besides,', the, analysis, of, '(', 15, ')', 'N-relaxation', data]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'non-myr', 'NCS-1', is, more, dynamic, than, myr, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['The', overall, molecular, tumbling, correlation, time]), verbo([increases]), complemento([by, approximately, 20, '%', upon, myristoylation])].
[sujeto(['Comparing', the, apo, forms, of, 'non-myr', 'NCS-1', and, myr, 'NCS-1,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([the, possibility, of, existence, of, some, 'substates,', which, are, structurally, closer, to, the, holo, form, of, the, protein])].
[sujeto(['There', are, more, such, substates, in, the, case, of, 'non-myr', 'NCS-1', than, in, the, case, of, the, myr, 'NCS-1,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, former, accesses, larger, volumes, of, conformational, substates, compared, with, the, latter])].
[sujeto(['Further,', the, study]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, the, possibility, of, 'Ca(2+)', binding, simultaneously, to, different, parts, of, the, protein, is, more, favourable, in, 'non-myr', 'NCS-1', than, in, myr, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, to, interact, with, membrane, and, cytosolic, proteins, and, its, physiological, role, is, governed, by, 'N-terminal', myristoylation])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'paper,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, 'NMR', assignments, of, both, myristoylated, and, 'non-myristoylated', 'NCS-1', in, the, presence, of, a, membrane])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, protocol, to, produce, large, quantities, of, high, purity, myristoylated, and, 'non-myristoylated', neuronal, calcium, sensor, 1, '(', 'NCS-1)', protein])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', is, a, member, of, the, neuronal, calcium, sensor, '(', 'NCS)', family, and, plays, an, important, role, in]), verbo([modulating]), complemento(['G-protein', signaling, and, exocytosis, pathways, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['Many', of, these, functions, are, 'calcium-dependent', and]), verbo([require]), complemento(['NCS-1', to, be, modified, with, an, 'N-terminal', myristoyl, moiety])].
[sujeto(['The', properties, of, the, 'C-terminally', tagged, 'NCS-1', variants, are, indistinguishable, from, those]), verbo([reported]), complemento([for, untagged, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['Using', this, 'system,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, isolated, and, characterized, mutant, 'NCS-1', proteins, that, have, attenuated, '(', 'NCS-1', 'E120Q)', and, abrogated, '(', 'NCS-1', 'DeltaEF)', ability, to, bind, calcium])].
[sujeto(['The', large, quantities, of, 'NCS-1', proteins, isolated, from, small, culture, volumes, of, 'auto-inducible', media, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([the, necessary, reagents, for, further, biochemical, and, structural, characterization])].
[sujeto(['The', affinity, tag, at, the, 'C-terminus', of, the, protein]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, suitable, reagent, for, easily, identifying, binding, partners, of, the, various, 'NCS-1', constructs])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', this, method, could, be, used, to, produce, other, recombinant, proteins, of, the, 'NCS', 'family,', and, may, be, extended, to]), verbo([express]), complemento([and, isolate, myristoylated, variants, of, other, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Not', all, myristoylated, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([the, same, localization, within, 'cells,', indicating, that, other, factors, must, determine, their, membrane, targeting])].
[sujeto(['Most', members, of, the, family, are, 'N-terminally', myristoylated, and, are, either, constitutively, 'membrane-bound', or]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, 'Ca2+/myristoyl', switch, that, allows, their, reversible, membrane, association, in, response, to, 'Ca2+', signals])].
[sujeto(['In', the, case, of, hippocalcin, and, 'NCS-1,', or, alternatively, 'KChIP1', '(', 'K+', 'channel-interacting', protein, 1, ')', ',', their, 'N-terminal', myristoylation, motifs, are, sufficient, for]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([to, distinct, organelles])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, an, 'N-terminal', myristoylated, hippocalcin, peptide, is, able, to, specifically, reproduce, the, membrane, targeting, of, 'hippocalcin/NCS-1', when, introduced, into, permeabilized, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', peptide]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, liposomes, containing, phosphatidylinositol, 4, ',', 5, -, bisphosphate, '[', 'PtdIns(4,5)P2]', with, high, affinity, '(', 'K(d)', 50, 'nM)'])].
[sujeto(['Full-length', hippocalcin, also]), verbo([bound]), complemento([preferentially, to, liposomes, supplemented, with, 'PtdIns(4,5)P2'])].
[sujeto(['Co-expression', of, 'hippocalcin-(1-14)-ECFP', '(']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cyan, fluorescent, 'protein)', or, 'NCS-1-ECFP', partially, displaced, the, expressed, 'PH', '(', pleckstrin, 'homology)', domain, of, phospholipase, delta1, from, the, plasma, membrane, in, live, 'cells,', indicating, that, they, have, a, higher, affinity, for, 'PtdIns(4,5)P2', than, does, this, 'PH', domain])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Golgi', localization, of, the, 'PH', domain, of, 'FAPP1', '(', 'four-phosphate-adaptor', protein, 1, ')', ',', which]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, phosphatidylinositol, 4, -, 'phosphate,', was, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1),', a, 'Ca(2+)-binding', protein, of, the, calcium, sensor, 'family,']), verbo([modulates]), complemento([various, functions, in, intracellular, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', order, to, understand, the, structural, role, of, myristoylation, and, calcium, on, conformational, 'stability,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, equilibrium, unfolding, and, refolding, of, myristoylated, and, 'non-myristoylated', 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['Myristoylation', affects, the, pattern, of, equilibrium, transitions, substantially, but, not, the, number, of, 'intermediates,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, structural, role])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, myristoylation, reduces, the, stiffening, of, the, protein, during, initial, unfolding, in, the, presence, of, calcium])].
[sujeto(['The', effects, of, myristoylation, are, more, pronounced, when, calcium, is, 'present,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, relationship, between, them])].
[sujeto(['Inactivating', the, third, 'EF-hand', motif, '(', 'E120Q', 'mutant)', drastically, affects, the, equilibrium, unfolding, 'transitions,', and, calcium]), verbo([has]), complemento([no, effect, on, these, transitions, of, the, mutants])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, role, of, myristoylation, in, 'unfolding/refolding', of, the, protein, is, largely, dependent, on, the, presence, of, calcium])].
[sujeto(['The', neuronal, calcium, sensor, '(', 'NCS)', family, of, 'Ca(2+)-binding', proteins]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([a, number, of, different, processes, in, neurons, and, photoreceptor, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', first, of, these, proteins, to, be, 'characterized,', 'recoverin,', was, shown, to, exhibit, a, 'Ca(2+)/myristoyl', switch, whereby, its, 'N-terminal', myristoyl, group, is, sequestered, in, the, 'Ca(2+)-free', form, and, is, exposed, on, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, allow, the, protein, to, become, 'membrane-associated'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([subsequently, been, shown, that, certain, other, family, members, also, exhibit, this, mechanism, in, living, cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, sequence, comparison, combined, with, information, from, structural, analyses, to, attempt, to, identify, candidate, residues, within, the, 'NCS', proteins, that, determine, whether, or, not, the, 'Ca(2+)/myristoyl', switch, operates, in, cells, and, have, tested, their, functional, significance, by, mutagenesis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', other, structural, aspects, within, the, 'C-terminal', domains, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, allow, the, switch, to, operate])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, a, key, role, for, residues, within, the, motif, 'EELTRK', in, 'NCS-1', in, keeping, the, myristoyl, group, exposed, and, allowing, the, protein, to, be, constitutively, 'membrane-associated'])].
[sujeto(['Ca(2+)', plays, a, central, role, in, the, function, of, neurons, as, the]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([for, neurotransmitter, 'release,', and, many, aspects, of, neuronal, 'activity,', from, rapid, modulation, to, changes, in, gene, 'expression,', are, controlled, by, 'Ca(2+)'])].
[sujeto(['These', actions, of, 'Ca(2+)', must, be]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'Ca(2+)-binding', 'proteins,', including, 'calmodulin,', which, is, involved, in, 'Ca(2+)', 'regulation,', not, only, in, 'neurons,', but, in, most, other, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['One', family, of, 'these,', the, neuronal, calcium, sensor, '(', 'NCS)', 'proteins,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, restricted, expression, in, retinal, photoreceptors, or, neurons, and, neuroendocrine, 'cells,', suggesting, that, they, have, specialized, roles, in, these, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Two', members, of, the, family, '(', recoverin, and, guanylate, 'cyclase-activating', 'protein)']), verbo([have]), complemento([established, roles, in, the, regulation, of, phototransduction])].
[sujeto(['Despite', close, sequence, 'similarities,', the, 'NCS', proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, neuronal, 'distributions,', suggesting, that, they, have, different, functions])].
[sujeto(['Recent', work]), verbo([has]), complemento([begun, to, demonstrate, the, physiological, roles, of, members, of, this, protein, family])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, review, we, describe, the, known, sequences, and, structures, of, the, 'NCS', 'proteins,', information, on, their, interactions, with]), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, and, current, knowledge, about, their, cellular, and, physiological, functions])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, sensors, '(', 'NCSs)', belong, to, a, family, of, 'Ca(2+)-binding', 'proteins,', which, serve, important, functions, in, 'neurotransmission,', and, are, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([from, yeast, to, humans])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, the, neuronal, calcium, 'sensor-1,', called, frequenin, in, the, fruit, fly, and, in, 'frog,']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, release, of, neurotransmitters])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, sensors, like, other, members, of, the, family, share, common, structural, 'features:', they, contain, four, 'EF-hands', as, potential]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, for, 'Ca(2+)', and, an, 'N-terminal', consensus, sequence, for, myristoylation])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', 'recoverin,', distantly, related, to, 'NCSs,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, expressed, and, purified, from, 'Escherichia', 'coli,', involving, a, combination, of, different, chromatographic, steps])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([earlier, been, purified, adopting, a, 'two-step', procedure, used, for, recoverin, purification])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([overexpressed, 'NCS-1', from, rat, in, its, myristoylated, and, nonmyristoylated, form, in, 'E'])].
[sujeto(['The', purified, protein, was, identified, by, 'Western', blotting, and, mass, spectrometry, and, assayed, for, its, ability, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['Ca(2+)', using, a, 'Ca(2+)', shift, 'assay,', terbium, 'fluorescence,', and, 'Stains-all', binding])].
[sujeto(['The', present, protocol]), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, 'rapid,', more, efficient, and, 'simplified,', 'single-step', method, for, purifying, 'NCS-1', for, structural, and, functional, studies])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, sensor, '(', 'NCS)', proteins, transduce, 'Ca2+', signals, and, are, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([from, yeast, to, humans])].
[sujeto(['We', determined, 'NMR', structures, of, the, 'NCS-1', homolog, from, fission, yeast, '(', 'Ncs1),', which]), verbo([activates]), complemento([a, phosphatidylinositol, 4, -, kinase])].
[sujeto(['Ncs1', contains, an, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-NH2-linked', myristoyl, group, on, a, long, 'N-terminal', arm, and, four, 'EF-hand', 'motifs,', three, of, which]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['Ca2+,', assembled, into, a, compact, structure])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', a, unique, remodeling, of, each, 'NCS', protein, by, its, myristoyl, 'group,', and, 'Ca2+-dependent', unmasking, of, different, 'residues,', may, explain, how, each, family, member]), verbo([recognizes]), complemento([distinct, target, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Frequenin,', a, 'Ca(2+)-binding', 'protein,']), verbo([has]), complemento([previously, been, implicated, in, the, regulation, of, 'neurotransmission,', possibly, by, affecting, ion, channel, function])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([direct, evidence, that, frequenin, is, a, potent, and, specific, modulator, of, 'Kv4', 'channels,', the, principal, molecular, components, of, subthreshold, activating, 'A-type', 'K(+)', currents])].
[sujeto(['Frequenin']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['Kv4'])].
[sujeto([2, current, amplitudes, '(', partly, by]), verbo([enhancing]), complemento([surface, expression, of, 'Kv4'])].
[sujeto(['Closely', related, 'Ca(2+)-binding', 'proteins,', such, as, neurocalcin, and, 'visinin-like', protein, '(', 'VILIP)-1']), verbo([have]), complemento([no, such, effects])].
[sujeto(['Specificity', for, 'Kv4', currents, is]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([because, frequenin, does, not, modulate, 'Kv1'])].
[sujeto(['Frequenin']), verbo([has]), complemento([negligible, effects, on, 'Kv4'])].
[sujeto([1, 'subunits,', we, determined, that, the, differential, effects, of, frequenin, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, means, of, the, 'Kv4', 'N', terminus])].
[sujeto([2, channel, proteins, are, coexpressed, in, similar, neuronal, populations, and]), verbo([have]), complemento([overlapping, subcellular, localizations, in, brain])].
[sujeto(['Together,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, support, for, the, concept, that, frequenin, may, be, an, important, 'Ca(2+)-sensitive', regulatory, component, of, native, 'A-type', 'K(+)', currents])].
[sujeto(['NCS1', '(', neuronal, calcium, 'sensor-1)', is, a, 'Ca(2+)-myristoyl', switch, protein, of, the, 'NCS', protein, family]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, synaptic, plasticity, and, neurotransmission, via, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', regulation, of, dopamine, 'D2', receptor, and, associated, 'Gprotein', coupled, receptor, kinase, '(', 'GRK)-2'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, bovine, photoreceptors, contain, 'NCS1', that, is, capable, of, a, partially, irreversible, interaction, with, isolated, photoreceptor, membranes, and, implicated, in, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', binding, and, regulation, of, 'GRK1', in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'NCS1-', recoverin, 'C-terminal', chimeric, construct, '(', 'NR),', it, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'Ca(2+)-myristoyl', switch, of, 'NCS1', is, affected, by, its, 'C-terminal', segment, downstream, the, fourth, 'EF-loop', of, the, 'protein,', which, is, variable, within, the, 'NCS', family])].
[sujeto(['NR']), verbo([retains]), complemento([structural, stability, and, sensitivity, to, 'Ca(2+),', but, interacts, with, photoreceptor, membranes, with, lower, affinity, in, a, 'Ca(2+)-', dependent, fully, reversible, manner, and, displays, altered, 'GRK1', modulation])].
[sujeto(['These', data, combined, with, fluorescent, probing, of, surface, hydrophobicity, of, 'NCS1,', 'NR', and, recoverin]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'C-terminal', segment, of, 'NCS1', regulates, reuptake, of, myristoyl, group, under, 'Ca(2+)-free', conditions, and, participates, in, organization, of, the, 'target-binding', pocket, of, the, protein])].
[sujeto(['We', point, out, a, putative, role, of, 'NCS1', in, photoreceptors, as, a, modulator, of, 'GRK', activity, and, propose]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, the, 'C-terminal', segment, of, 'NCS1', as, an, appropriate, way, for, selective, suppression, of, excessive, membrane, accumulation, and, aberrant, activity, of, the, protein, in, neurons, associated, with, central, nervous, system, dysfunctions])].
[sujeto(['EF-hand', calcium, sensors]), verbo([respond]), complemento([structurally, to, changes, in, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', 'concentration,', triggering, diverse, cellular, responses, and, resulting, in, broad, interactomes])].
[sujeto(['Two', intermediate, structures]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'Ca(2+)', binding, to, the, 'EF-hands', were, observed, during, refolding])].
[sujeto(['Molecular', dynamics, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, atomistic, details, of, the, unfolding, process, and, rationalize, the, different, domain, stabilities, during, mechanical, unfolding])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, emphasize, that, 'NCS1']), verbo([has]), complemento([evolved, a, remarkable, complex, interdomain, cooperativity, and, a, fundamentally, different, folding, mechanism, compared, to, structurally, related, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([various, neuronal, functions])].
[sujeto(['Although', it, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'heart,', very, little, is, known, about, its, cardiac, functions])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', was, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, young, 'hearts,', and, its, deletion, decreased, survival, and, contractile, function, in, young, mice])].
[sujeto(['This', was, due, to, reduced, 'Ca(2+)/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinase, 'II', '(', 'CaMKII)', activity, in, 'Ncs1(-/-)', 'myocytes,', which]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, reduced, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, 'Ca(2+)', uptake, and, release])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', physically, and, functionally]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, inositol, 1, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, trisphosphate, receptors, '(', 'IP(3)Rs)', in, the, heart])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'IP(3)R', stimulation, resulted, in, phosphorylation, of, 'CaMKII-&Icirc;&acute;,', which, was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'NCS-1', overexpression])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, functional, link, exists, between, 'NCS-1,', 'IP(3)R', 'function,', and, 'CaMKII', activation, that, may, affect, global, 'Ca(2+)', signals, in, the, immature, heart])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'NCS-1', was, upregulated, in, hypertrophic, 'hearts,', and, 'hormone-induced', hypertrophy, was, largely]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([in, 'Ncs1(-/-)', hearts])].
[sujeto(['Inhibitors', of, 'IP(3)Rs,', 'CaMKII,', and, calcineurin, all]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['NCS-1-induced', 'hypertrophy,', which, suggests, the, involvement, of, these, pathways])].
[sujeto(['NCS-1', is, an, important, regulator, of, immature, heart, function, and, 'hypertrophy,', and, it, functions, in, part, by]), verbo([promoting]), complemento(['IP(3)R', 'function,', followed, by, 'CaMKII-dependent', signal, activation])].
[sujeto(['Adult', cortical, neurons, forming, the, corticospinal, tract, '(', 'CST)', normally]), verbo([have]), complemento([low, levels, of, the, neuronal, calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS1)', protein])].
[sujeto(['In', primary, cultured, adult, cortical, 'neurons,', the, 'lentivector-induced', overexpression, of, 'NCS1']), verbo([induces]), complemento([neurite, sprouting, associated, with, increased, 'phospho-Akt', levels])].
[sujeto(['When', the, 'PI3K/Akt', signalling, pathway, was, pharmacologically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'NCS1-induced', neurite, sprouting, was, abolished])].
[sujeto(['In', injured, corticospinal, 'neurons,', overexpression, of, 'NCS1']), verbo([induced]), complemento([axonal, sprouting, and, regeneration, and, also, neuroprotection])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, demonstrate, that]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([the, levels, of, intracellular, 'NCS1', in, injured, and, uninjured, central, neurons, enhances, their, intrinsic, anatomical, plasticity, within, the, injured, adult, central, nervous, system])].
[sujeto(['Many', neurodevelopmental, genes, were]), verbo([increased]), complemento([during, scarless, repair, on, 'post-injury', days, 1, and, 3])].
[sujeto(['Neuropeptide', 'Y', 'Receptor', type, 'I,', cJun, related, 'Transcription', 'Factor', '(', 'junD),', 'Synaptophysin,', 'SNAP', 25, ',', 'Neuronal', calcium, sensor, 1, '(', 'NCS1),', neural, 'visine-like', calcium]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, 1, '(', 'NVP1),', nerve, growth, 'factor-induced', gene, 'A', '(', 'NGFI-A/EGR1),', 'VGF8A', 'protein,', 'p27kip1,', and, members, of, the, 'GABA', and, serotonin, family, each, had, 2, -, to, 3, -, fold, expression, increases, '(', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['We', speculate, that, fetal, skin, cells]), verbo([express]), complemento([neurotrophins, during, skin, development, that, regulate, peripheral, neuron, formation])].
[sujeto(['During', injury, these, factors]), verbo([promote]), complemento([the, survival, and, regeneration, of, peripheral, 'neurons;', this, interaction, of, 'neuropeptides,', neuropeptide, 'receptors,', and, neurotrophins, may, modulate, the, fetal, scarless, repair, mechanisms, in, response, to, injury])].
[sujeto(['Identification', of, these, neurodevelopmental, candidate, genes]), verbo([provides]), complemento([insight, for, new, investigation, into, mechanisms, regulating, scarless, healing])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, sensor, '(', 'NCS)', proteins]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([signal, transduction, and, are, highly, conserved, from, yeast, to, humans])].
[sujeto(['Ncs1p', expression]), verbo([increases]), complemento([approximately, 100, -, fold, when, fission, yeast, grows, in, high, extracellular, 'Ca(2+)', '(', &, 'gt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Transcriptional', reporter, assays, show, that, ncs1, promoter, activity]), verbo([increased]), complemento([30, -, fold, when, extracellular, 'Ca(2+)', was, raised, to, 0.1, 'M', and, was, highly, 'Ca(2+)-specific'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ca(2+)-responsive', ncs1, promoter, region, consists, of, 130, nucleotides, directly, upstream, from, the, start, codon, and, contains, tandem, repeats, of, the, 'sequence,', 5, '\'', -, 'caact-3\',', that]), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, 'Prz1p'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ca(2+)-sensitive', ncs1Delta, phenotype, is, rescued, by, a, yam8, null, 'mutation,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, possible, interaction, between, 'Ncs1p', and, the, 'Ca(2+)', 'channel,', 'Yam8p'])].
[sujeto(['Ca(2+)', uptake, and, 'Ncs1p']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, yeast, membranes, are, both, decreased, in, 'yam8Delta,', suggesting, 'Ca(2+)-induced', binding, of, 'Ncs1p', to, 'Yam8p', results, in, channel, closure])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'Ncs1p']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['Ca(2+)', tolerance, in, fission, 'yeast,', in, part, by, cytosolic, 'Ca(2+)', buffering, and, perhaps, by, negatively, regulating, the, 'Yam8p', 'Ca(2+)', channel])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'inducible,', modest, overexpression, of, neuronal, calcium, sensor, 1, '(', 'Ncs1)', selectively, in, the, adult, murine, dentate, gyrus, '(', 'DG)']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([a, specific, form, of, exploratory, behavior])].
[sujeto(['The', mice, also, display, a, selective, facilitation, of, 'long-term', potentiation, '(', 'LTP)', in, the, medial, perforant, path, and, a, selective, enhancement, in, 'rapid-acquisition', spatial, 'memory,', phenotypes, that, are, reversed, by, direct, application, of, a, 'cell-permeant', peptide, '(', 'DNIP)', designed, to, interfere, with, 'NCS-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, dopamine, 'type-2', receptor, '(', 'D2R)'])].

[sujeto(['Parkinson\'s', disease, '(', 'PD),', the, second, most, frequent, neurodegenerative, disorder, at, old, 'age,', can, be]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, elevated, expression, or, the, 'A53T', missense, mutation, of, the, presynaptic, protein, 'alpha-synuclein', '(', 'SNCA)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, that, a, functional, dopamine, 'D2', receptor, promoter, variant, '(', 'DRD2', -, 141, 'Ins/Del)', predicts, response, to, nicotine, replacement, therapy, '(', 'NRT)'])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, extends, this]), verbo([finding]), complemento([in, the, same, population, of, 363, 'NRT-treated', 'subjects,', by, examining, variation, in, the, gene, encoding, the, neuronal, calcium, 'sensor-1', protein, '(', 'FREQ),', which, functions, to, regulate, 'D2', receptor, desensitization])].

[sujeto(['Phenotypic', heterogeneity, of, cancer, cells, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([not, only, by, genetic, and, epigenetic, alterations, but, also, by, stochastic, variation, of, intracellular, signaling, molecules])].
[sujeto(['Using', cells, that, stably]), verbo([express]), complemento(['F&Atilde;&para;rster', resonance, energy, transfer, '(', 'FRET)', 'biosensors,', we, show, here, a, correlation, between, a, temporal, fluctuation, in, the, activity, of, 'Rac1', and, the, invasive, properties, of, 'C6', glioma, cells])].
[sujeto(['By', using, 'long-term', 'time-lapse', 'imaging,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Rac1', activity, in, 'C6', glioma, cells, fluctuated, over, a, timescale, that, was, substantially, longer, than, that, of, the, replication, cycle])].
[sujeto(['Among', the, transcription, factors, upregulated, in, 'Rac1(high)', 'cells,', 'Egr2', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, positively, regulate, expression, of, the, four, 'membrane-related', 'invasion-associated', genes])].
[sujeto(['The', identified, signaling, network, might]), verbo([cause]), complemento([the, fluctuations, in, 'Rac1', activity, and, the, heterogeneity, in, the, invasive, capacity, of, glioma, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, important, role, in, the, regulation, of, neurotransmitter, release, per, 'synapse,', axonal, growth, and, bouton, formation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, factors, involved, in, this, unusual, feature, by, examining, the, molecular, evolution, of, the, two, frq, genes, in, 'Drosophila', and, the, evolutionary, dynamics, of, 'NCS', family, in, a, large, set, of, bilaterian, species])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, no, amino, acid, replacements, fixed, across, the, twelve, 'Drosophila', species, surveyed])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', synonymous, substitutions]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, prevalent, in, the, evolution, of, the, coding, region, of, frq1, and, 'frq2,', indicating, the, presence, of, strong, functional, constraints, following, gene, duplication])].
[sujeto(['Despite', 'that,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([detected, that, significant, evolutionary, rate, acceleration, had, occurred, in, 'Frq1', in, early, times, from, the, 'duplication,', in, which, positive, selection, '(', likely, promoting, functional, 'diversification)', had, probably, an, important, role])].
[sujeto(['The', analysis, of, sequence, conservation, and, 'DNA', topology, at, the, 'non-coding', regions, of, both, genes]), verbo([has]), complemento([allowed, the, identification, of, 'DNA', regions, candidates, to, be, 'cis-regulatory', elements])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, possible, mechanism, of, regulatory, diversification, between, frq1, and, frq2])].
[sujeto(['Selected', amino, acid, substitutions, in, 'Frq1', likely, contributed, to, the, functional, divergence, between, the, two, 'duplicates,', 'which,', in, 'turn,', should]), verbo([have]), complemento([diverged, in, their, regulation, by, 'ecdysone-induced', early, genes])].
[sujeto(['A', variety, of, 'Ca2+']), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, are, known, to, play, an, integral, role, in, catecholamine, release, from, synapses, as, well, as, secretory, 'cells,', such, as, chromaffin, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Drosophila', protein, frequenin, and, its, mammalian, homolog, neuronal, 'Ca2+', 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)', belong, to, a, family, of, 'Ca2+', sensors, with, 'EF', hands, that]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['Ca2+', and, then, interact, with, other, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Frequenin/NCS-1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, enhance, exocytotic, activity, in, addition, to, altering, 'Ca2+', channel, regulation])].
[sujeto(['To', better, understand, how, 'NCS-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['stimulus-secretion', 'coupling,', bovine, chromaffin, cells, were, infected, with, 'Semliki', 'Forest', virus, '(', 'SFV)', vectors, containing, the, rat, 'NCS-1', gene])].
[sujeto(['Exocytosis', elicited, by, membrane, depolarization, was, not, significantly, different, between, cells, infected, with, 'SFV']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([green, fluorescent, protein, '(', 'GFP)', or, 'GFP', plus, 'NCS-1,', except, that, the, overexpression, of, 'NCS-1', resulted, in, a, faster, rundown, in, exocytosis])].
[sujeto(['When', cells, were]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, 'histamine,', 'NCS-1', overexpression, led, to, higher, 'exocytosis,', as, well, as, '[', 'Ca2+]i', elevation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'NCS-1', may, regulate, cellular, activity, through, the, modulation, of, the, phosphatidylinositol, signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, aimed, to, examine, the, effects, of, chronic, social, defeat, stress, on, the, dopamine, receptors, and, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'post-endocytic', trafficking, pathways])].
[sujeto(['We', observed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'D2S,', 'D2L', and, 'D2Rs', dimers, in, the, prefrontal, cortex, '(', 'PFC)', of, susceptible, 'and/or', unsusceptible, mice, compared, with, controls])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, demonstrated, that, chronic, social, defeat, stress]), verbo([induced]), complemento([increased, expression, of, 'D2S,', 'D2L,', and, 'D2R', dimers, in, the, 'PFC', of, susceptible, 'and/or', unsusceptible, mice])].
[sujeto(['Neuronal', calcium, 'sensor-1', '(', 'NCS-1)', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, multiple, neuronal, functions, by, binding, partners, mostly, through, a, largely, exposed, hydrophobic, crevice, '(', 'HC)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, absence, of, a, 'ligand,', the, 'C-terminal', tail, '(', loop, 'L3,', residues, 'D176', to, 'V190)']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, the, 'HC', pocket, as, a, ligand, 'mimetic,', occupying, the, 'HC', and, regulating, its, conformational, stability])].
[sujeto(['A', recent, experimental, study]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, 'L3', deletion, resulted, in, global, structure, destabilization])].
[sujeto(['Our', cumulative, 2, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;s', 'MD', simulations, demonstrated, that, 'L3', deletion]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, structural, flexibility, of, the, 'C-domain', and, the, distant, 'N-domain'])].
[sujeto(['These', conformational, changes]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'C-terminal', tail, truncation, may, affect, the, regulation, of, target, interactions])].
[sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([atomic, details, of, the, conformational, dynamics, effects, of, the, 'C-terminal', tail, on, human, wild, type, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, both, the, 'G-protein-coupled', receptor, '(', 'GPCR)', dopamine, 'D2', receptor, '(', 'D2R),', regulating, its, internalization, and, surface, 'expression,', and, the, cognate, kinases, 'GRK1', and, 'GRK2'])].
[sujeto(['Determination', of, the, crystal, structures, of, 'Ca(2+)/NCS-1', alone, and, in, complex, with, peptides, derived, from, 'D2R', and, 'GRK1']), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, the, differential, recognition, is, facilitated, by, the, conformational, flexibility, of, the, 'C-lobe-binding', site])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, two, copies, of, the, 'D2R', peptide, bind, within, the, hydrophobic, crevice, on, 'Ca(2+)/NCS-1,', but, only, one, copy, of, the, 'GRK1', peptide, binds])].
[sujeto(['The', different]), verbo([binding]), complemento([modes, are, made, possible, by, the, 'C-lobe-binding', site, of, 'NCS-1,', which, adopts, alternative, conformations, in, each, complex])].
[sujeto(['C-terminal', residues, 'Ser-178-Val-190']), verbo([act]), complemento([in, concert, with, the, flexible, 'EF3/EF4', loop, region, to, effectively, form, different, 'peptide-binding', sites])].
[sujeto(['Removal', of, 'Ser-178-Val-190', generated, a, 'C-terminal', truncation, mutant, that, formed, a, 'dimer,', indicating, that, the, 'NCS-1', 'C-terminal', region]), verbo([prevents]), complemento(['NCS-1', oligomerization])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, the, flexible, nature, of, the, 'C-terminal', region, is, essential, to, allow, it, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([its, 'protein-binding', sites, and, adapt, its, conformation, to, accommodate, both, ligands])].
[sujeto(['This', appears, to, be, driven, by, the, variability, of, the, conformation, of, the, 'C-lobe-binding', 'site,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([ramifications, for, the, target, specificity, and, diversity, of, 'NCS-1'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'cardiomyocytes,', intracellular, calcium, '(', 'Ca2+)', transients, are, elicited, by, electrical, and, receptor, 'stimulations,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, muscle, contraction, and, gene, 'expression,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Although', such, elevations, of, 'Ca2+levels', '(', '[', 'Ca2+])', also, occur, in, the, 'nucleus,', the, precise, mechanism, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['[', 'Ca2+]', regulation, during, different, kinds, of, 'stimuli,', and, its, relationship, with, cytoplasmic, '[', 'Ca2+]', regulation, are, not, fully, understood])].

[sujeto(['Both', viruses, infected, and, replicated, in, macrophage, and, mixed, glial, cell, cultures, at, similar, 'levels,', but, 'V1CSF']), verbo([induced]), complemento([significantly, greater, neuronal, death, than, 'Petaluma', in, a, neurotoxicity, assay])].
[sujeto(['Cyclosporin', 'A', treatment, of, 'Petaluma-infected', animals]), verbo([caused]), complemento([neurodevelopmental, delay, and, reduced, 'N-acetyl', 'aspartate/creatine', ratios, in, the, brain])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, neurodevelopmental, delay, and, neuronal, injury, is, 'FIV', strain, specific, but, that, systemic, immune, suppression, is, also, an, important, determinant, of, 'FIV-induced', neurovirulence])].
[sujeto(['Culture', supernatants, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['CD8+', 'T', cells, derived, from, a, panel, of, 'HIV-1-infected', subjects, were, assessed, for, their, ability, to, suppress, 'HIV-1', 'LTR-mediated', chloramphenicol, acetyl, transferase, '(', 'CAT)', expression])].

[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', strong, suppression, was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'CD8+', 'T-cell', supernatants, from, some, subjects, with, very, low, 'CD8+', 'T-cell', counts, and, relatively, low, chemokine, levels])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, suppression, of, gene, expression, by, 'CD8+', 'T-cell', culture, supernatants, showed, statistical, correlation, with, 'beta-chemokine', levels, and, with, higher, 'CD8+', 'T-cell', 'count,', no, correlation, could, be]), verbo([found]), complemento([with, correlates, of, clinical, 'well-being'])].

[sujeto(['The', second, part, of, the, study]), verbo([involved]), complemento([randomizing, patients, to, 'N-acetyl-cysteine', or, 'placebo;', patients, receiving, 'N-acetyl-cysteine', had, a, statistically, significant, survival, advantage, over, those, receiving, placebo])].
[sujeto(['Their', determinants]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, assessed, by, stepwise, regression, analysis, using, as, possible, predictors, 'age,', 'sex,', 'serum-beta2-m', '(', 'S-beta2-m),', 'CD4', lymphocyte, 'count,', or, 'HIV', infection, stage, and, therapy])].

[sujeto(['CD4+', 'T-cells', were]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, concanavalin, 'A', '(', 'Con', 'A)', for, 2, or, 7, days, in, the, presence, of, various, concentrations, of, the, 'trichothecenes,', vomitoxin, '(', 'VT', or, 'deoxynivalenol),', nivalenol, '(', 'NIV),', 15, -, acetyl, deoxynivalenol, '(', 15, -, 'ADON),', 3, -, acetyl, deoxynivalenol, '(', 3, -, 'ADON),', 'T-2', toxin, '(', 'T-2)', and, verrucarin, 'A', '(', 'Ver', 'A)'])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, trichothecenes, as, a, group, can, either, inhibit, or, superinduce, both, 'IL', secretion, and, mRNA, levels, in, 'CD4+', 'T-cells'])].
[sujeto(['Vaccines']), verbo([inducing]), complemento([cytotoxic, 'T-cell', responses, are, required, to, achieve, protection, against, cancers, and, intracellular, infections, such, as, 'HIV', and, 'Hepatitis', 'C', virus])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, describe, the, novel, 'CD8+', 'T-cell']), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['adjuvant,', cationic, adjuvant, formulation, '(', 'CAF)', 9, ',', consisting, of, dimethyldioctadecylammonium, '(', 'DDA)-liposomes', stabilized, with, monomycoloyl, glycerol, '(', 'MMG)-1', and, combined, with, the, 'TLR3', 'ligand,', 'Poly(I:C)'])].

[sujeto(['The', mechanism, by, which, glucocorticosteroids, '(', 'GCS)']), verbo([suppress]), complemento([proliferation, of, human, peripheral, blood, mononuclear, leukocytes, '(', 'PBML)', was, investigated])].

[sujeto(['In', human, immunodeficiency, 'virus-1', '(', 'HIV-1)-infected', cell, 'cultures,', 'cell-to-cell', fusion, and, the, formation, of, multinucleated, giant, cells, '(', 'syncytia)', are]), verbo([induced]), complemento([as, a, consequence, of, interactions, between, the, viral, envelope, glycoprotein, on, infected, cells, and, cell, surface, 'CD4', molecules, on, uninfected, cells])].

[sujeto(['Label-fracture', 'technique,', which, allows, high, 'resolution,', coincident, views, of, immunocytochemical, markers, on, the, cell, surfaces, and, intramembrane, particles, '(', 'IMPs)', over, 'platinum/carbon', replicas, of, the, exoplasmic, faces, of, the, 'freeze-fractured', plasma, 'membranes,', was, used, to, analyze, the, surface, distribution, and, dynamics, of, 'CD3,', 'CD4,', 'HLA', class, 'I', and, 'II', lymphocyte, surface, 'antigens,', all]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, transmembrane, proteins])].

[sujeto(['Redistribution', of, the, 'antigens,']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, treatment, at, 37, degrees, 'C', '(', for, 20, 'min)', with, specific, antibodies, before, 'fixation,', resulted, in, capping, of, the, immunolabeling, in, demarcated, domains, of, the, plasma, membrane, but, failed, to, reveal, correspondent, domains, of, 'IMPs'])].
[sujeto(['This', observation, implies, that, migration, of, antigens, into, the, 'patching/capping', domains, may, be, simultaneous, with, the, exclusion, of, other, membrane, proteins, from, the, same, 'areas,', as, occurs, during, viral, budding, and, receptor]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['Redistribution', of, the, 'antigens,']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, treatment, at, 37, degrees, 'C', with, specific, monoclonal, 'antibodies,', results, in, patching, and, capping, of, the, labeling, as, observed, in, 'label-fractured', specimens])].

[sujeto(['However,', in, cells, where, the, aggregation, of, intramembrane, particles, is]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, incubation, with, 'glycerol,', colloidal, 'gold-labeled', 'CD3', and, 'CD4', molecules, are, seen, confined, to, particulate, domains, of, the, membrane])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([assessed, the, effect, of, two, ether, glycerol, 'lipids,', 77, -, 6, '(', '(', 2, 'S,', 3, 'R)-4-(Tetradecyloxy)-2-amino-1,3-butanediol)', and, 56, -, 5, '(', '(', 'S)-2-Amino-3-O-hexadecyl-1-propanol),', which, are, substrates, for, sphingosine, 'kinases,', on, inflammatory, responses])].

[sujeto(['Administration', of, 56, -, 5, to, mice]), verbo([increased]), complemento([disease, progression, in, an, experimental, autoimmune, encephalomyelitis, model, and, this, was, associated, with, a, considerable, increase, in, the, infiltration, of, 'CD4(+)', 'T-cells,', 'CD11b(+)', monocytes, and, 'F4/80(+)', macrophages, in, the, spinal, cord])].

[sujeto(['There']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, several, attempts, to, use, radiotherapy, as, an, in, situ, vaccine])].
[sujeto(['Recent', evidence]), verbo([has]), complemento([demonstrated, that, this, ectonucleotidase, is, 'up-regulated', in, 'T', helper, type, 17, cells, when, generated, in, the, presence, of, transforming, growth, 'factor-&Icirc;&sup2;', '(', 'TGF-&Icirc;&sup2;),', and, hence, 'CD73', expression, is, related, to, the, acquisition, of, immunosuppressive, potential, by, these, cells])].

[sujeto(['In', silico]), verbo([binding]), complemento([predictions, for, class, 'I-', and, 'II-binding', putative, epitopes, can, be, complemented, with, biochemical, verification, of, 'HLA', binding, 'capacity,', processing, and, immunogenicity, of, the, predicted, peptides])].
[sujeto(['Antiretroviral', therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([transformed, 'HIV-1', infection, into, a, managed, condition, with, 'near-normal', life, expectancy])].

[sujeto(['Our', previous, work]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, this, sex, disparity, is, a, consequence, of, higher, activity, of, the, 'androgen-induced', gene, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'PPAR&Icirc;&plusmn;)', in, male, 'CD4(+)', 'T', cells])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'PPAR&Icirc;&plusmn;', functions, within, 'CD4(+)', and, 'CD8(+)', 'T', lymphocytes, and, 'NKT', cells, to, negatively, regulate, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', responses, in, male, mice, and, identified, 'Ifng', as, the, gene, target, of, 'PPAR&Icirc;&plusmn;', repression])].

[sujeto(['Recent', compelling, evidence, indicates, that, 'Th17']), verbo([confer]), complemento([host, immunity, against, a, variety, of, 'microbes,', including, extracellular, and, intracellular, pathogens])].

[sujeto(['The', membrane, antigen]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([on, both, the, activated, 'T', lymphocytes, and, tumor, cells, was, characterized, in, a, 2, -, 'D', electrophoresis, 'system:', molecular, weight, 55, -, 60, 'kDa,', 'pI-approximately', 6.0])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', the, proliferation, capacity, of, tumor, cells, was, detected, to, be]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([significantly, in, the, presence, of, the, binding, 'antibodies,', no, influence, on, '[', 3, 'H]thymidine', uptake, into, stimulated, 'T', cells, was, 'found,', suggesting, different, functional, consequences, of, binding, the, respective, antigen, on, malignant, and, normal, cells])].
[sujeto(['An', interesting]), verbo([finding]), complemento([is, the, enhanced, expression, of, major, histocompatibility, complex, class, 'I', molecules, on, tumor, cells, incubated, with, human, natural, antibodies])].
[sujeto(['First,', the, effect, of, 'PMA', on, the, expression, of, cell, surface, markers, was, 'assessed:', a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([of, 'CD3', and, 'CD4,', and, an, enhanced, expression, of, 'CD8', molecule, were, observed, on, 'T-ALL', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'PMA', exhibited, an, heterogenous, effect, on, various, 'activation-associated', molecules, such, as, a]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, transferrin, receptor, and, 'T10', molecule, and, an, induced, expression, of, 4, 'F2', and, 'CD9', molecules])].
[sujeto(['It', is, known, that, functional, 'high-affinity', 'IL-2R', are, composed, of, at, least, two, 'IL2']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['molecules,', the, alpha, '(', 'p55)', and, beta, '(', 'p70)', chains])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'PMA', induced, the, expression, of, both, 'IL-2R', alpha, and, 'IL-2R', beta, 'chains,', as, well, as, 'IL-2', production, by, 'T-ALL', cells])].
[sujeto(['Cross-linking', experiments, with, 125, 'I-labelled', recombinant, 'IL-2', '(', 125, 'I-rIL-2)', revealed, both, p55, '(', 'IL-R', 'alpha)', and, p70, '(', 'IL-2R', 'beta)', 'IL-2-binding', 'polypeptides,', whereas]), verbo([binding]), complemento([equilibrium, assays, on, 'PMA-treated', cells, demonstrated, the, presence, of, a, low, number, '(', 31, -, 413, ')', of, 'high-affinity', binding, 'sites/cell', in, five, out, of, six, cases, 'analysed,', as, well, as, intermediate, affinity, 'IL-2R', '(', 1234, -, 3919, 'sites/cell)', in, four, out, of, six, 'cases,', according, to, the, time, of, incubation, with, 'PMA'])].
[sujeto(['PMA', alone]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, spontaneous, proliferation, of, 'T-ALL', cells, in, three, 'cases,', whereas, a, clear, synergy, between, 'IL-2', and, 'PMA', could, be, detected, in, three, 'patients\'', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', exogenous, 'rIL-2']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cell, proliferation, of, 'PMA-preincubated', 'T-ALL', cells, in, four, cases, studied])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, observations, indicate, that, a, 'short-term', incubation, of, 'T-ALL', cells, with, 'PMA', can]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'IL-2/IL-2R', system, on, these, cells, without, inducing, strong, modifications, of, their, differentiation, status])].
[sujeto(['These', results, thus]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, this, system, may, be, involved, in, the, proliferation, process, of, some, activated, immature, 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CD7', molecule, is, a, 40, -, kDa, member, of, the, 'Ig', superfamily, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([structural, homology, to, the, murine, 'Thy-1', molecule, and, is, acquired, early, in, human, 'T', cell, ontogeny])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, expression, of, the, 'CD7', molecule, is, markedly, 'up-regulated', during, 'T', cell, activation])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, the, signals, required, for, 'CD7', 'up-regulation', on, human, 'T', cells])].

[sujeto(['Whereas', 'CD7', expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([78, +, /, -, 25, '%', by, 0.5, microM, 'ionomycin,', expression, of, 'CD25', '(', 'IL-2R', 'alpha),', class, 'II', 'MHC,', 4, 'F2,', transferrin, 'receptor,', 'CD2,', 'CD3,', 'CD4,', 'CD5,', and, 'CD8', molecules, was, not, increased])].

[sujeto(['These', data, demonstrate, that, induction, of, a, transmembrane, calcium, flux, generates, signals, that]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, 'CD7', gene, transcription])].

[sujeto(['IL-7', is, a, hemopoietic, growth, factor, that]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, proliferation, of, early, 'B', lineage, cells])].

[sujeto(['Number', of, patients]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['CD4', in, groups, 1, ',', 2, ',', and, 3, were, higher, than, the, controls])].

[sujeto(['The', 'TROSY-(1)H-(15)N-HSQC', spectra, of, '[', '(', 2, ')', 'H,', '(', 13, ')', 'C,', '(', 15, ')', 'N]Arg-labeled', and, '[', '(', 2, ')', 'H,', '(', 13, ')', 'C,', '(', 15, ')', 'N]Ile-labeled', unliganded, '(', 'mut)', gp120core, showed, many, fewer, crosspeaks, than, the, expected, 'number,', and, also, many, fewer, crosspeaks, in, comparison, with, the, labeled, '(', 'mut)', gp120core]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, the, 'CD4-mimic', 'peptide,', 'CD4M33'])].

[sujeto(['Recent', studies, demonstrate, that, molecules, from, apoptotic, pathways]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['HIV-1', replication])].

[sujeto(['Full', length, cellular, 'FLIP', '(', 'cFLIP)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HIV-1', replication, in, these, cells])].

[sujeto(['The', inactivated, 'FADD', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HIV-1', replication])].
[sujeto(['Polyinosine-polycytidylic', acid, '(', 'poly(I:C);', a, synthetic, analog, of, 'dsRNA)', and, bacterial, lipopolysaccharide, '(', 'LPS),', the, ligands, for, 'Toll-like', receptors, '(', 'TLR)', 'TLR3', and, 'TLR4,', 'respectively,', are, known, to]), verbo([decrease]), complemento(['HIV-1', infection, in, 'monocyte-derived', macrophages, '(', 'MDMs),', but, the, 'mechanism(s)', are, incompletely, understood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'poly(I:C)-', and, 'LPS-stimulation', of, 'MDMs', abrogated, infection, by, 'CCR5-using,', 'macrophage-tropic', 'HIV-1,', and, by, vesicular, stomatitis, virus, 'glycoprotein-pseudotyped', 'HIV-1', 'virions,', while, 'TLR2,', 'TLR7', or, 'TLR9', agonists, only, partially, reduced, infection, to, varying, extent])].
[sujeto(['Integrated', 'pro-viruses', were, readily, detected, in, 'unstimulated,', 'TLR7-', and, 'TLR9-stimulated', 'cells,', but, not, in, 'TLR3-', or, 'TLR4-stimulated', 'MDMs,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([the, alteration, of, 'post-entry,', 'pre-integration', 'event(s)'])].
[sujeto(['Using', microarray, analysis, and, quantitative, reverse, transcription, '(', 'RT)-PCR,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([increased, microRNA, '(', 'miR)-155', levels, in, 'MDMs', upon, 'TLR3/4-', but, not, 'TLR7-stimulation,', and, a, 'miR-155', specific, inhibitor, '(', but, not, a, scrambled, 'control)', partially, restored, infectivity, in, 'poly(I:C)-stimulated', 'MDMs'])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', mRNA, and, protein, levels, of, several, 'HIV-1', dependency, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, trafficking, 'and/or', nuclear, import, of, 'pre-integration', complexes, '(', 'ADAM10,', 'TNPO3,', 'Nup153,', 'LEDGF/p75)', were, found, in, 'poly(I:C)-stimulated', and, 'miR-155-transfected', 'MDMs,', and, a, reporter, assay, suggested, they, are, authentic, 'miR-155', targets])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, 'miR-155', exerts, an, 'anti-HIV-1', effect, by, targeting, several, 'HIV-1', dependency, factors, involved, in, 'post-entry,', 'pre-integration', 'events,', leading, to, severely, diminished, 'HIV-1', infection])].
[sujeto(['In', the, absence, of, a, high, resolution, structure, of, a, 'gp120-coreceptor', 'complex,', biochemical, studies, of, 'CCR5']), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, importance, of, its, 'N', terminus, and, second, extracellular, loop, '(', 'ECL2)', in, binding, gp120, and, mediating, viral, entry])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, panel, of, synthetic, 'CCR5', 'ECL2-derived', 'peptides,', we, show, that, the, 'C-terminal', portion, of, 'ECL2', '(', 2, 'C,', comprising, amino, acids, 'Cys-178', to, 'Lys-191)']), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['HIV-1', entry, of, both, 'CCR5-', and, 'CXCR4-using', isolates, at, low, micromolar, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['In', functional, viral, 'assays,', these, peptides]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['HIV-1', entry, in, a, 'CD4-independent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Neutralization', assays, designed, to, measure, the, effects, of, 'CCR5', 'ECL2', peptides, when, combined, with, either, with, the, small, molecule, 'CD4', mimetic, 'NBD-556,', soluble, 'CD4,', or, the, 'CCR5', 'N', terminus, showed, additive, inhibition, for, 'each,', indicating, that, 'ECL2']), verbo([binds]), complemento([gp120, at, a, site, distinct, from, that, of, 'N', terminus, and, acts, independently, of, 'CD4'])].
[sujeto(['Using', saturation, transfer, difference, 'NMR,', we, determined, the, region, of, 'CCR5', 'ECL2', used, for]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['gp120,', showed, that, it, can, bind, to, gp120, from, both, 'R5', and, 'X4', 'isolates,', and, demonstrated, that, the, peptide, interacts, with, a, 'CD4-gp120', complex, in, a, similar, manner, as, to, gp120, alone])].
[sujeto(['As', the, 'CCR5', 'N', 'terminus-gp120', interactions, are, dependent, on, 'CD4', 'activation,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, gp120, has, separate, binding, sites, for, the, 'CCR5', 'N', terminus, and, 'ECL2,', the, 'ECL2', binding, site, is, present, prior, to, 'CD4', 'engagement,', and, it, is, conserved, across, 'CCR5-', and, 'CXCR4-using', strains])].
[sujeto(['Binding', of, the, 'HIV', envelope, to, the, chemokine, coreceptors]), verbo([triggers]), complemento([membrane, fusion, and, signal, transduction])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, static, cortical, actin, in, resting, 'T', cells, represents, a, restriction, and, that, 'HIV', utilizes, the, 'Galphai-dependent', signaling, from, the, chemokine, coreceptor, 'CXCR4', to, activate, a, cellular, 'actin-depolymerizing', 'factor,', 'cofilin,', to, overcome, this, restriction])].
[sujeto(['HIV', 'envelope-mediated', cofilin, activation, and, actin, dynamics, are, important, for, a, postentry, process, that]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, viral, nuclear, localization])].

[sujeto(['Our', model, of, 'Lv2', restriction]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, route, taken, into, a, cell, is, important, in, determining, whether, a, productive, infection, occurs])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, susceptible, 'MCR', can, enter, restrictive, 'HeLa(CD4)', cells, via, two, 'pathways;', a, 'clathrin/AP2', mediated, endocytic, route, that, is, sensitive, to, 'Lv2', restriction, and, an, 'alternative,', 'non-clathrin', mediated, 'route,', which, results, in, more, efficient, infection])].
[sujeto([demonstrated, that, certain, chemokines, such, as, 'CCL19']), verbo([activate]), complemento([cofilin, and, actin, 'dynamics,', promoting, 'HIV', nuclear, localization, and, integration, into, resting, 'CD4', 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['Apparently,', these, chemokines, synergize, with, the, viral, envelope, 'protein,']), verbo([triggering]), complemento([cofilin, and, actin, dynamics, necessary, for, the, establishment, of, viral, latency])].
[sujeto(['Traditionally,', chemokine, control, of, 'HIV', infection, focuses, on, competitive]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'down-modulation', of, the, 'co-receptors,', particularly, 'CCR5'])].
[sujeto(['This', new, study]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, a, diverse, group, of, chemokines, may, also, affect, 'HIV', infection, through, synergistic, or, antagonistic, interaction, with, the, viral, coreceptor, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Toll-like', receptor, '(', 'TLR)-induced', maturation, of, 'DCs']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([their, ability, to, mediate, 'trans-infection', of, 'T', cells, and, their, ability, to, migrate, from, the, site, of, infection])].
[sujeto(['Because', 'TLR-induced', maturation, can, be]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, nuclear, receptor, '(', 'NR)', 'signaling,', we, hypothesized, that, 'ligand-activated', 'NRs', could, repress, 'DC-mediated', 'HIV-1', transmission, and, dissemination])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, ligands, for, peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, gamma, '(', 'PPARgamma)', and, liver, 'X', receptor, '(', 'LXR)']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([proinflammatory, cytokine, production, by, 'DCs', and, inhibited, 'DC', migration, in, response, to, the, chemokine, 'CCL21', by, preventing, the, 'TLR-induced', upregulation, of, 'CCR7'])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', 'PPARgamma', and, 'LXR', signaling]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, immature, and, mature, 'DC-mediated', 'trans-infection', by, preventing, the, capture, of, 'HIV-1', by, 'DCs', independent, of, the, viral, envelope, glycoprotein])].
[sujeto(['PPARgamma', and, 'LXR', signaling]), verbo([induced]), complemento([cholesterol, efflux, from, 'DCs', and, led, to, a, decrease, in, 'DC-associated', 'cholesterol,', which, has, previously, been, shown, to, be, required, for, 'DC', capture, of, 'HIV-1'])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', both, cholesterol, repletion, and, the]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([knockdown, of, the, cholesterol, transport, protein, 'ATP-binding', cassette, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)', restored, the, ability, of, 'NR', ligand, treated, cells, to, capture, 'HIV-1', and, transfer, it, to, 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PPARgamma', and, 'LXR', signaling, 'up-regulate', 'ABCA1-mediated', cholesterol, efflux, from, 'DCs', and, that, this, accounts, for, the, decreased, ability, of, 'DCs', to, capture, 'HIV-1'])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'NR', ligands, to, repress, 'DC']), verbo([mediated]), complemento(['trans-infection,', 'inflammation,', and, 'DC', migration, underscores, their, potential, therapeutic, value, in, inhibiting, 'HIV-1', mucosal, transmission])].
[sujeto(['HIV', fusion, and, entry, into, 'CD4', 'T', cells, are]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, two, 'receptors,', 'CD4', and, 'CXCR4'])].
[sujeto(['This', receptor, requirement, can, be, abrogated, by, pseudotyping, the, virion, with, the, vesicular, stomatitis, virus, glycoprotein, '(', 'VSV-G)', that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([viral, entry, through, endocytosis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'HIV', 'infection,', gp120]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, receptors, also, transduces, signals])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, in, transformed, 'T', 'cells,', the, 'VSV-G-pseudotyping', results, in, lower, viral, 'DNA', synthesis, but, a, higher, rate, of]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([migration])].

[sujeto(['A', vaccine, capable, of]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([protective, antiviral, antibody, responses, is, needed, to, curtail, the, global, 'AIDS', epidemic, caused, by, 'HIV-1'])].
[sujeto(['Although', rarely, elicited, during, the, course, of, natural, infection, or, upon, conventional, 'vaccination,', the, 'membrane-proximal', ectodomain, region, '(', 'MPER)', of, the, 'HIV-1', glycoprotein, of, 'M(r)', 41, ',', 0, '(', 'gp41)', envelope, protein, subunit, is, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, 3, such, human, broadly, neutralizing, antibodies, '(', 'BNAbs):', 40000000000.0, ',', 2, 'F5,', and, 'Z13e1'])].

[sujeto([2, 'F5,', like, 40000000000.0, ',']), verbo([induces]), complemento([large, conformational, changes, in, the, 'MPER', relative, to, the, membrane])].

[sujeto(['Low', concentrations, of, sodium, dodecyl, sulfate]), verbo([induce]), complemento([partial, unfolding, of, 'beta2-m', to, an, amyloidogenic, conformer, and, subsequent, amyloid, fibril, formation, in, 'vitro,', but, the, biological, molecules, that, induce, them, under, 'near-physiological', conditions, have, not, been, determined])].
[sujeto(['Some', 'lysophospholipids,', especially, lysophosphatidic, acid, '(', 'LPA),']), verbo([induced]), complemento([not, only, the, extension, of, 'Abeta2M', amyloid, fibrils, but, also, the, formation, of, 'Abeta2M', amyloid, fibrils, from, the, 'beta2-m', monomer, at, a, neutral, 'pH,', by, partially, unfolding, the, compact, structure, of, 'beta2-m', to, an, amyloidogenic, conformer, as, well, as, stabilizing, the, extended, fibrils])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', simple, addition, of, 'LPA', to, normal, plasma, did, not]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, fibril, stabilizing, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, possible, role, of, lysophospholipids, in, the, development, of, 'Abeta2M', amyloidosis])].
[sujeto(['Haemodiafiltration', combines, diffusion, and, convection, in, a, single, 'therapy,']), verbo([conferring]), complemento([theoretical, benefits, over, haemodialysis])].
[sujeto(['However,', only, few, randomised, comparisons]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, carried, out])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'high-flux', haemodialysis, and, haemodiafiltration, were, associated, with, sustained, reductions, of, pretreatment, beta, 2, microglobulin, 'levels,', 'however,', the]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([was, greater, with, haemodiafiltration])].
[sujeto(['Very', 'recently,', low, concentrations, of, 2, ',', 2, ',', 2, -, trifluoroethanol, '(', 'TFE)', and, the, 'sub-micellar', concentration, of, sodium, dodecyl, 'sulfate,', a, model, for, anionic, 'phospholipids,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, reported, to, cause, the, extension, of, 'Abeta(2)M', amyloid, fibrils, at, a, neutral, 'pH,', inducing, partial, unfolding, of, 'beta(2)-m', and, stabilization, of, the, fibrils])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'apoE,', 'GAGs', and, 'PGs', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, stabilize, 'Abeta(2)M', amyloid, fibrils, at, a, neutral, 'pH,', forming, a, stable, complex, with, the, fibrils])].

[sujeto(['Some', 'PGs,', especially, biglycan, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, polymerization, of, 'acid-denatured', 'beta(2)-m'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, are, consistent, with, the, hypothesis, that, in, 'vivo,', specific, molecules, that, affect, the, conformation, and, stability, of, 'beta(2)-m', and, amyloid, fibrils, will]), verbo([have]), complemento([significant, effects, on, the, deposition, of, 'Abeta(2)M', amyloid, fibrils])].

[sujeto(['In', the, presence, of, 0.5, mm, sodium, dodecyl, 'sulfate,', a, model, compound, of, potential]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([and, stabilizer, of, amyloid, fibrils, in, 'patients,', a, marked, increase, of, thioflavin, 'T', fluorescence, was, observed, after, 1, day, of, sonication, at, pH, 7.0])].
[sujeto(['The', products, of, sonication]), verbo([caused]), complemento([the, accelerated, fibril, formation, at, pH, 7.0])].
[sujeto(['Atomic', force, microscopy, images, showed, that, the, fibrils, formed, at, pH, 7.0]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, diameter, of, more, than, 7, 'nm,', thicker, than, those, prepared, at, pH, 2.5])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, repeated, 'self-seeding', at, pH, 7.0, with, fibrils, formed, at, the, same, pH, causes, a, marked, acceleration, of, 'growth,', indicating, the, maturation, of, fibrils])].

[sujeto(['CD4', is, a, cell, surface, glycoprotein, that, identifies, the, subset, of, human, 'T', lymphocytes, that]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['sIg+', 'B', lymphocytes, to, differentiate, and, secrete, 'Ig', after, intimate, 'T-B', cell, contact])].

[sujeto(['The', selectivity, of, the, renal, reabsorption, of, proteins]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, investigated, by, competition, experiments, in, conscious, rats])].
[sujeto(['The', animals, were, intravenously, injected, with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([doses, of, proteins, over, a, wide, range, of, net, charge, and, 'size,', including, 'lysozyme,', cytochrome, 'C,', 'metallothionein,', beta, 2, -, 'microglobulin,', 'retinol-binding', 'protein,', albumin, and, 'IgG'])].
[sujeto(['The', results, show, that, low, molecular, weight, cationic, proteins, and, low, or, high, molecular, weight, anionic, proteins, can]), verbo([increase]), complemento([each, 'other\'s', urinary, excretion])].
[sujeto(['Several', observations, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, these, effects, result, from, a, competitive, inhibition, of, renal, uptake])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, injected, proteins]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, tubular, type, proteinuria, irrespective, of, their, net, charge, and, size])].
[sujeto(['In', the, case, of, cationic, 'proteins,', this]), verbo([finding]), complemento([excludes, the, possibility, of, an, enhanced, glomerular, permeability, due, to, a, partial, neutralization, of, the, glomerular, polyanion, 'which,', as, demonstrated, with, protamine, 'sulfate,', entails, a, glomerular, type, proteinuria])].
[sujeto(['These', quantitative, data, on, the, mutual, inhibition, of, renal, uptake, of, a, wide, spectrum, of, specific, proteins]), verbo([lead]), complemento([us, to, challenge, the, concept, of, 'charge-', and, 'size-selective', tubular, reabsorption, of, 'proteins,', and, to, postulate, that, proteins, filtered, through, the, glomeruli, are, taken, up, by, common, tubular, endocytotic, sites, irrespectively, of, their, physicochemical, features])].

[sujeto(['Peptide', and, beta, 2, m, show, marked, synergy, in, their, abilities, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([surface, class, 'I', 'expression,', with, minimal, increases, promoted, by, peptide, in, the, absence, of, free, beta, 2, m])].
[sujeto(['Low', 'temperature-induced', molecules]), verbo([have]), complemento([indistinguishable, rates, of, loss, of, beta, 2, m, and, alpha, 1, /, alpha, 2, domain, conformational, epitopes, during, culture, at, 37, degrees, 'C'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, rate, of, alpha, 3, epitope]), verbo([loss]), complemento([is, much, 'slower,', indicating, a, minimum, of, two, steps, in, class, 'I', loss, from, the, cell, 'surface:', 1, ')', loss, of, beta, 2, m, binding, to, 'H', chain, and, unfolding, of, the, alpha, 1, /, alpha, 2, 'region;', then, 2, ')', 'denaturation,', 'degradation,', or, internalization, of, the, free, 'H', chains, possessing, alpha, 3, epitopes])].
[sujeto(['This', refolding, in, the, presence, of, beta, 2, m, and, peptide, can, explain, the]), verbo([reported]), complemento([requirement, for, both, components, in, sensitizing, cells, for, class, 'I-dependent', 'CTL', lysis])].
[sujeto(['Human', peripheral, blood, neutrophils, '(', 'PMN)', treated, with, 'granulocyte-macrophage', 'CSF', '(', 'GM-CSF)']), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, amount, of, class, 'I', 42, -, kDa, 'H', chain, and, 12, -, kDa, 'L', 'chain,', beta, 2, -, microglobulin, '(', beta, 2, 'm),', that, they, synthesize, by, 2.1, -, and, 2.6, -, 'fold,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, whether, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, translation, was, associated, with, an, increase, in, levels, of, class, 'I', 'H', chain, 'transcript,', 'RNA', blot, analysis, was, performed, on, 'PMN', that, had, been, cultured, in, the, presence, of, 'GM-CSF'])].
[sujeto(['Under', no, conditions, were, there]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, class, 'I', 'H', chain, transcript, when, class, 'I', heterodimer, protein, synthesis, was, increased])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', there, was, neither, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, synthesis, of, 'H', chain, 'mRNA,', as, measured, by, transcription, 'assay,', nor, an, alteration, in, the, degradation, rates, of, class, 'I', 'H', chain, transcript, in, 'PMN', cultured, with, 'GM-CSF'])].
[sujeto(['In', situ, hybridization, demonstrated, that, both, the, percentage, of, 'PMN', that]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([class, 'I', transcript, and, the, relative, amounts, of, transcript, per, cell, in, 'GM-CSF-cultured', 'PMN', were, the, same, as, those, in, control, 'PMN'])].
[sujeto(['Although', there, is]), verbo([increased]), complemento([translation, of, class, 'I', heterodimer, in, 'PMN', treated, with, 'GM-CSF,', there, is, no, increase, in, its, expression, on, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['The', maintenance, of, constant, levels, of, class, 'I', on, the, plasma, membrane, is, dependent, on, continued, protein, synthesis, and, is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([by, release, of, class, 'I', heterodimer, and, free, beta, 2, m, into, the, medium])].
[sujeto(['Heterodimer', is]), verbo([released]), complemento([in, the, context, of, plasma, 'membrane-derived', 'vesicles,', whereas, beta, 2, m, is, released, as, a, soluble, protein])].
[sujeto(['Maintenance', of, constant, levels, of, class, 'I', heterodimer, on, the, plasma, membrane, is, also]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, constitutive, internalization])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', inducible, synthesis, of, class, 'I', by, 'PMN', is, likely, a, consequence, of, 'post-transcriptional', 'regulation,', whereas, the, continued, synthesis, of, class, 'I', heterodimer, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, maintenance, of, its, expression])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', there, is, no]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, class, 'I', 'expression,', in, spite, of, increased, 'synthesis,', due, to, the, release, of, class, 'I', heterodimer, and, beta, 2, m, and, the, internalization, of, class, 'I', heterodimer, from, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'PMN', are, capable, of, 'post-transcriptional', regulation, of, protein, synthesis, and, are, able, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, expression, of, plasma, membrane, proteins, by, regulated, 'expression,', 'release,', and, internalization])].
[sujeto(['We', here, demonstrate, that, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'MHC', class, 'I', molecules, induces, homotypic, cell, adhesion, of, lymphocytes, and, monocytes])].
[sujeto([mAb, to, beta, 2, -, microglobulin]), verbo([caused]), complemento(['sustained,', largely, 'LFA-1-independent', adhesion, whereas, mAb, to, the, 'MHC', class, 'I', alpha, 'H', chain, caused, transient, 'LFA-1-dependent', adhesion])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, 'MHC', class, 'I', molecules, transduce, signals, that]), verbo([induce]), complemento([cell, adhesion, and, suggest, that, interaction, between, 'MHC', class, 'I-restricted', 'T', cells, and, 'APC', may, result, in, reciprocal, enhanced, adhesiveness, of, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['These', clones, represent, the, major]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([class, 'I', molecules, on, 'E,', with, 'B-F', alpha, size, variants, evidently, due, to, alternative, use, of, small, exons, in, the, cytoplasmic, region])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, structurally, homologous, domains, have, been, under, different, selective, pressures, during, evolution])].
[sujeto(['There', is, a, very, strong, 'G', +, 'C', bias, in, alpha, 3, and, beta, 2, 'm,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, an, overall, change, in, amino, acid, composition, in, 'B-F', compared, to, class, 'I', molecules, from, other, taxa])].
[sujeto(['Some', residues, with, important, functions, are, 'invariant,', including, seven, residues, that]), verbo([bind]), complemento([the, ends, of, the, 'peptide,', two, residues, that, bind, 'CD8,', and, three, residues, that, are, phosphorylated])].
[sujeto(['There', are, other, patches, of, invariant, residues, on, alpha, 1, ',', alpha, 2, ',', and, beta, 2, 'm;', these, might]), verbo([bind]), complemento(['TCR', or, other, molecules, involved, in, class, 'I', function])].
[sujeto(['Class', 'I', heterodimers, on, the, surface, of, cells, are, generally, unreceptive, to]), verbo([binding]), complemento([peptides, in, the, absence, of, exogenous, beta, 2, -, microglobulin])].
[sujeto(['Functionally,', this, 'cross-linking', creates, receptive, class, 'I', peptide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, by, acting, on, beta, 2, -, 'microglobulin-associated', molecules])].
[sujeto(['Despite', this, 'generalization,', some, exceptions]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, noted])].
[sujeto(['For', 'example,', murine, macrophage]), verbo([targets]), complemento([readily, process, 'heat-killed', 'Listeria', monocytogenes, '(', 'HKLM)', into, a, form, recognizable, by, immune, 'CD8', 'CTL'])].
[sujeto(['Using', an, assay, of, 'Listeria-specific,', 'CD8-mediated', cytotoxicity, to, quantitate, 'Ag', presentation, by, 'C57Bl/6', macrophage, 'targets,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, some, of, the, cellular, requirements, for, this, form, of, 'Ag', processing])].
[sujeto(['To']), verbo([gain]), complemento([insight, into, the, metabolic, requirements, for, 'Ag', 'processing,', we, examined, the, effects, of, several, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['LM', 'Ag', 'presentation,', 'however,', was, also, blocked, by, inhibitors, of, endosomal, acidification, '(', 'chloroquine,', ammonium, 'chloride,', and, 'monensin)', and, by, the, acid, protease, inhibitor, pepstatin, 'A,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, endocytic, processing, may, play, an, essential, role, in, 'CD8', recognition, of, this, 'Ag'])].
[sujeto(['To', formally, establish, that, this, pattern, of, exogenous, 'Ag', processing]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, presence, of, a, class, 'I', 'MHC', 'product,', we, demonstrated, that, 'beta-2', 'microglobulin-deficient', 'macrophages,', which, lack, class, 'I', 'MHC', product, 'expression,', cannot, present, 'HKLM', to, 'CD8', cells])].

[sujeto(['Interferon-gamma', '(', 'IFN-gamma)', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, acquired, immune, response, involving, maturation, and, activation, of, 'antigen-presenting', cells, '(', 'APC);', both, 'IFN-gamma', production, and, activation, of, 'APC', are, impaired, in, 'ESRD', patients, on, 'low-flux', hemodialysis, '(', 'HD)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', production, of, 'IFN-gamma']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'heat-killed', 'Staphylococcus', epidermidis, '(', 'Staph', 'epi)', was, performed, in, whole, blood, cultures])].
[sujeto([beta2M, resting, levels]), verbo([increased]), complemento([from, 26.6, +, /, -, 1.42, 'mg/l', in, 'Period', 'A', to, 34.7, +, /, -, 2.3, *, 'mg/l', in, 'Period', 'B,', and, decreased, to, 21.6, +, /, -, 1.07, 'mg/l', at, the, end, of, 'Period', 'A\'', '(', *, p, &, 'lt;', 0.0001, ')'])].
[sujeto(['High', levels, of, uremic, toxins, such, as, beta2M]), verbo([suppress]), complemento(['IFN-gamma', production, in, 'ESRD', patients, under, 'low-flux', 'HD'])].
