[sujeto(['Long-term', hemodialysis, '(', 'HD)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([an, inflammatory, response, and, is, associated, with, a, suppressed, cellular, immune, response, 'manifested,', in, 'part,', by, impaired, interferon, '(', 'IFN-gamma)', production])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'beta(2)-m', levels]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([significantly, by, 31, '%', with, 'high-flux', 'Helixone', '(', p, &, 'lt;', 0.002, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Stimulated', whole, blood, production, of, 'IFN-gamma', was, reduced, in, 'low-flux', 'HD', but]), verbo([increased]), complemento([to, near, normal, levels, after, 6, weeks, of, 'high-flux', 'HD'])].
[sujeto(['HGP-30,', a, 30, amino, acid, synthetic, peptide, homologous, to, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([region, of, 'HIV-1(SF2)', p17, '(', 'aa86-115),', has, previously, been, shown, to, elicit, both, cellular, and, humoral, immune, responses, when, conjugated, to, 'KLH', and, adsorbed, to, alum])].
[sujeto(['The', 'ISA', 51, and, 'MPL(R)-SE', adjuvants]), verbo([induced]), complemento([higher, antibody, responses, than, 'alum,', with, the, 'ISA', 51, being, more, potent])].
[sujeto(['Compared', to, 'KLH', conjugates, which]), verbo([induced]), complemento([significant, 'anti-KLH', antibody, 'titers,', minimal, antibody, responses, were, observed, to, peptide, 'G,', the, more, immunogenic, 'conjugate,', and, peptide, 'J'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, modified, 'HGP-30', 'L'])].
[sujeto([constructs, may, be, useful, as, 'HIV', vaccine, candidates, for, preferential, induction, of, 'TH1', directed, cell]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([immune, responses])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, pE50Y50, also, stimulated, polyclonal, proliferation, of, normal, gamma, 'delta,', but, not, alpha, 'beta,', 'T', cells])].
[sujeto(['Proliferation', of, gamma, delta, 'T', cells, did, not]), verbo([require]), complemento([prior, immunization, with, this, 'Ag', nor, the, presence, of, alpha, beta, 'T', 'cells,', but, was, enhanced, by, 'IL-2'])].
[sujeto(['The', gamma, delta, 'T', cell, response, proceeded, in, the, absence, of, accessory, 'cells,', 'MHC', class, 'II,', beta, 2, -, 'microglobulin,', or, 'TAP-1,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'Ag', presentation, by, 'MHC', class, 'I/II', molecules, and, peptide, processing, are, not, required])].
[sujeto(['Among', normal, 'splenocytes,', as, with, gamma, delta, 'T', cell, 'hybridomas,', the, response, was, strongest, with, 'V', gamma, 1, +, gamma, delta, 'T', 'cells,', and, in, comparison, with, related, 'polypeptides,', pE50Y50]), verbo([provided]), complemento([the, strongest, stimulus, for, these, cells])].
[sujeto(['This', supports, the, immunologic, relevance, of, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['assay,', and, emphasizes, the, importance, of, determinant, selection, in, defining, the, immune, response, of, individuals])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, examined, the, capacity, of, a, panel, of, 'DR-restricted', peptides, to, compete, with, one, another, for, binding, to, 'DR1'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'peptide-binding', capacity, of, the, four, different, 'DR', types, '(', 'DR1,', 'DR2,', 'DR5,', and, 'DR52a)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, further, examined, by, testing, a, collection, of, 133, different, peptides])].
[sujeto(['This', collection, is, unbiased, with, respect, to, previously, known, 'DR']), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'restrictions,', and, includes, peptides, of, 'eukaryotic,', 'bacterial,', and, viral, origins])].
[sujeto(['It', was]), verbo([found]), complemento(['that:', 1, ')', approximately, 15, to, 35, '%', of, the, peptides, tested, bound, any, given, 'DR', 'type;', 2, ')', 'DR-binding', capacities, appeared, to, correlate, with, each, 'other,', suggesting, that, different, alleles, of, the, 'DR', isotype, may, recognize, related, structures, on, an, 'Ag', 'molecule;', and, 3, ')', despite, the, statistical, correlation, between, binding, capacity, of, different, 'DR', 'types,', approximately, 50, '%', of, the, peptides, that, were, positive, binders, still, were, specific, in, that, they, could, bind, only, one, of, the, four, 'DR', molecules, tested])].
[sujeto(['Degenerate']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['(', i])].
[sujeto([',']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, most, or, all, the, 'DR', molecules, 'tested)', was, detected, in, only, a, minority, of, the, cases, analyzed, '(', approximately, 25, '%', ')'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', this, group, of, 'HIS', mice, also, mounted, the, highest, level, of, 'antigen-specific', 'A2-restricted', human, 'CD8(+)', 'T-cell', response, upon, vaccination, with, recombinant, adenoviruses]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([human, malaria, and, 'HIV', antigens])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', the, human, 'CD8(+)', 'T-cell', response]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, human, malaria, 'vaccine-immunized', 'HIS', mice, was, shown, to, be, functional, by, displaying, cytotoxic, activity, against, hepatocytes, that, express, the, human, malaria, antigen, in, the, context, of, 'A2', molecules])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([has]), complemento([led, to, the, proposed, use, of, 'histocompatible,', 'patient-specific', stem, 'cells;', 'however,', the, preparation, of, many, different, stem, cell, lines, for, clinical, use, is, a, daunting, task])].
[sujeto(['First,', we, use, a, combination, of, gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([and, mitotic, recombination, to, derive, 'HLA-homozygous', embryonic, stem, cell, '(', 'ESC)', subclones, from, an, 'HLA-heterozygous', parental, line])].
[sujeto(['Second,', we, derive, 'HLA', class, 'I-negative', cells, by]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([disruption, of, both, alleles, of, the, 'Beta-2', 'Microglobulin', '(', 'B2M)', gene, in, 'ESCs'])].
[sujeto(['These', 'B2M(-/-)', 'ESCs', could]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, universal, donor, cells, in, applications, where, the, transplanted, cells, do, not, express, 'HLA', class, 'II', genes])].
[sujeto(['Both', approaches, used, 'adeno-associated', virus, '(', 'AAV)', vectors, for, efficient, gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([in, the, absence, of, potentially, genotoxic, 'nucleases,', and, produced, 'pluripotent,', 'transgene-free', cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Zoster', is, uncommon, before, the, age, of, 50, years, in, immunologically, normal, 'individuals,', but, it, occurs, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([frequency, in, people, who, are, immunosuppressed])].
[sujeto(['A', common, theme, in, bacterial, pathogenesis, is, the, manipulation, of, eukaryotic, cells, by]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['A', novel, group, of, bacterial, virulence, factors, termed, the, 'WXXXE', family]), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', for, these, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['The', precise, mechanism, of, nucleotide, 'exchange,', 'however,']), verbo([has]), complemento([remained, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, structure, of, the, 'WXXXE-protein', 'IpgB2', from, 'Shigella', flexneri, and, its, complex, with, human, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['Our', observations, uncover, that, 'IpgB2']), verbo([induces]), complemento([conformational, changes, on, 'RhoA', mimicking, 'DbI-', but, not, 'DOCK', family, 'GEFs'])].
[sujeto(['The', biological, activities, of, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases', are, controlled, by, their, guanine, nucleotide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([states, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, the, role, of, 'Mg(2+)', cofactor, in, the, guanine, nucleotide, binding, and, hydrolysis, processes, of, the, 'Rho', family, 'members,', 'Cdc42,', 'Rac1,', and, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['Differing', from, 'Ras', and, 'Rab', 'proteins,', which]), verbo([require]), complemento(['Mg(2+)', for, 'GDP', and, 'GTP', 'binding,', the, 'Rho', 'GTPases', bind, the, nucleotides, in, the, presence, or, absence, of, 'Mg(2+)', 'similarly,', with, dissociation, constants, in, the, submicromolar, concentration])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, 'Mg(2+),', 'however,', resulted, in, a, marked]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, intrinsic, dissociation, rates, of, the, nucleotides])].
[sujeto(['The', catalytic, activity, of, the, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', appeared, to, be, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, free, 'Mg(2+),', and, 'GEF', binding, to, 'Rho', 'GTPase', resulted, in, a, 10, -, fold, decrease, in, affinity, for, 'Mg(2+),', suggesting, that, one, role, of, 'GEF', is, to, displace, bound, 'Mg(2+)', from, the, 'Rho', proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', 'GDP', dissociation, rates, of, the, 'GTPases', could, be, further]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, 'GEF', upon, removal, of, bound, 'Mg(2+),', indicating, that, the, 'GEF-catalyzed', nucleotide, exchange, involves, a, 'Mg(2+)-independent', as, well, as, a, 'Mg(2+)-dependent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'Mg(2+)', is, not, absolutely]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'GTP', hydrolysis, by, the, 'Rho', 'GTPases,', the, divalent, ion, apparently, participates, in, the, 'GTPase', 'reaction,', since, the, intrinsic, 'GTP', hydrolysis, rates, were, enhanced, 4, -, 10, -, fold, upon, binding, to, 'Mg(2+),', and, 'k(cat)', values, of, the, 'Rho', 'GTPase-activating', protein, '(', 'RhoGAP)-catalyzed', reactions, were, significantly, increased, when, 'Mg(2+)', was, present])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, directly, demonstrate, a, role, of, 'Mg(2+)', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, kinetics, of, nucleotide, binding, and, hydrolysis, and, in, the, 'GEF-', and, 'GAP-catalyzed', reactions, of, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'GEF', facilitates, nucleotide, exchange, by, destabilizing, both, bound, nucleotide, and, 'Mg(2+),', whereas, 'RhoGAP', utilizes, the, 'Mg(2+)', cofactor, to, achieve, high, catalytic, efficiency, and, specificity])].
[sujeto(['Intracellular', calcium]), verbo([has]), complemento([complex, impact, on, 'TRPC5,', including, a, permissive, role, for, other, 'activators,', as, well, as, inhibition, at, high, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'C', is, inhibitory, and]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([desensitisation, following, receptor, activation])].
[sujeto(['The', channel]), verbo([has]), complemento([voltage, dependence, but, the, biological, significance, of, this, is, 'unknown;', it, is, partially, due, to, intracellular, magnesium, blockade, at, aspartic, acid, residue, 633])].
[sujeto(['TRPC5', is, included, in, local, vesicular, trafficking]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, growth, factors, through, phosphatidylinositol, '(', 'PI)-3-kinase,', 'Rac1', and, 'PIP-5-kinase'])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, myosin, light, chain, kinase]), verbo([suppresses]), complemento(['TRPC5,', possibly, via, an, effect, on, trafficking])].
[sujeto(['Biological', roles, of, 'TRPC5', are, emerging, but, more]), verbo([reports]), complemento([on, this, aspect, are, needed])].
[sujeto(['TRPC5', is, a, broadly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([calcium, channel, with, capability, to, act, as, an, integrator, of, extracellular, and, intracellular, signals, at, the, level, of, calcium, entry])].
[sujeto(['rac1,', a, member, of, the, low, molecular, mass, 'GTP-binding', protein, 'family,']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, 20, -, fold, higher, 'GTPase', activity, than, 'H-ras,', but, the, structural, motifs, responsible, for, this, property, do, not, appear, to, reside, within, the, conserved, amino, acids, of, the, consensus, 'GTP-binding', domains, '[', 'M&Atilde;&copy;nard,', 'L'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, determined, the, 'contribution,', to, the, 'GTPase', 'activity,', of, additional, amino, acids]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, 'phosphate-magnesium-binding', '(', 'PM)', regions, of, rac1])].
[sujeto([rac1]), verbo([has]), complemento([three, different, amino, acids, from, 'H-ras', in, each, of, the, first, two, 'PM', 'regions,', while, the, third, 'PM', region, is, identical, to, that, of, 'H-ras'])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of, the, amino, acids, in, the, first, 'PM', region, '(', aa, 10, -, 17, ')', to, the, corresponding, amino, acids]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'H-ras', showed, that, modification, of, one, of, 'them,', 'Asp11,', resulted, in, a, 50, '%', decrease, of, the, 'GTPase', in, 'rac1,', whereas, 'Gly13', and, 'Ser17', had, no, effect])].
[sujeto([rac1, mutated, at, positions, 11, and, 29, as, well, as, 30, '(', 'P1-P2', 'mutant)', had, a, 3, -, 4, -, fold, reduced, 'GTPase', activity, compared, to, native, rac1, '(', 190, vs, 552, pmol, of, 'GTP', 'hydrolyzed/nmol', of, 'GTP', gamma, 'S-binding', 'protein/min', at, 37, degrees, 'C),']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([a, cooperative, '(', but, 'nonadditive)', interaction, between, both, domains])].
[sujeto(['All', mutants, with, reduced, 'GTPase', activity, also, had, reduced, affinity, for, 'GDP,', shown, by, both, equilibrium]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, 'GDP', dissociation, measurements])].
[sujeto(['We', evaluated, whether, 'RhoGDI2']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, physiological, role, in, embryo, 'implantation,', particularly, trophoblast, migration])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'RhoGDI2', in, 'HTR-8/SVneo', cells, was, associated, with, reduced, 'RAC1-guanosine', triphosphate, '(', 'GTP)', levels, and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', small, interfering, 'RNA-mediated', downregulation, of, 'RhoGDI2', resulted, in, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['RAC1-GTP', levels])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', 'RhoGDI2']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([trophoblast, cell, 'migration,', and, this, function, may, involve, suppression, of, 'RAC1', activation])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho', family, of, 'GTPases', consists, of, several, small, proteins, that]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, described, as, molecular, 'switches,', playing, important, roles, in, a, wide, variety, of, fundamental, cellular, processes, and, in, human, diseases, such, as, cancer])].
[sujeto(['These', 'proteins,', active, in, the, 'GTP', conformation, and, inactive, in, the, 'GDP', 'form,', are, in, turn]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs),', guanine, nucleotide, activating, proteins, '(', 'GAPs)', and, guanine, dissociation, inhibitors, '(', 'GDIs)'])].
[sujeto(['Acting', principally, upstream, of, 'Rac1,', 'Tiam1', is, mainly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, 'Rac1', mediated, signaling, pathways, including, cytoskeletal, 'activities,', cell, 'polarity,', endocytosis, and, membrane, 'trafficking,', cell, 'migration,', adhesion, and, 'invasion,', cell, growth, and, 'survival,', metastasis, and, carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['However,', given, the, large, number, of, protein, interaction, domains]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, its, 'structure,', it, is, possible, that, 'Tiam1', affects, cellular, processes, in, another, way, than, through, its, 'GEF', activity, by, interactions, with, other, signaling, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Due', to, its, functional, 'diversity,', 'Tiam1', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, multiple, steps, of, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['As', its, name, 'suggests,', 'Tiam1']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, increase, 'T-cell', lymphoma, invasion, and, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['It', also]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([migration, of, 'fibroblasts,', neuronal, and, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['On', the, 'contrary,', 'Tiam1-induced', cell, adhesion]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, 'described,', as, opposed, to, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', studies, indicate, that, 'Tiam1', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, both, 'anti-apoptotic', and, 'pro-apoptotic', mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['While']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([evidence, has, demonstrated, 'Tiam1\'s', contribution, to, tumorigenesis, and, 'metastasis,', others, suggest, that, 'Tiam1', could, have, 'anti-cancer', properties])].
[sujeto(['The', activation, of, 'Rho', proteins, is, catalyzed, by, guanine, 'nucleotide-exchange', factors, '(', 'GEFs),', which]), verbo([promote]), complemento([the, exchange, of, 'GDP', for, 'GTP'])].
[sujeto(['The', precise, mechanisms]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'Rho', proteins, are, not, fully, understood])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we, demonstrate, that, 'RhoA', activity, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, cylindromatosis, '(', 'CYLD),', a, deubiquitinase, harboring, multiple, functions])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'RhoA-mediated', cytoskeletal, 'rearrangement,', chromosome, 'separation,', and, cell, polarization, are, altered, in, 'CYLD-depleted', cells])].
[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', 'CYLD', does, not]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, 'RhoA;', 'instead,', it, interacts, with, and, deubiquitinates, 'leukemia-associated', 'RhoGEF', '(', 'LARG)'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, further, show, that, 'CYLD-mediated', deubiquitination, of, 'LARG']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([its, ability, to, stimulate, the, 'GDP/GTP', exchange, on, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, thus, identify, 'LARG', as, a, new, substrate, of, 'CYLD', and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([novel, insights, into, the, regulation, of, 'RhoA', activation])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'LARG-RhoA', signaling, pathway, may, play, a, role, in, diverse, 'CYLD-mediated', cellular, events])].
[sujeto(['Mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', is, a, 'serine/threonine', kinase, that, exists, in, two, separate, 'complexes,', mTORC1, and, 'mTORC2,', that, function, to, control, cell, size, and, growth, in, response, to, growth, 'factors,', 'nutrients,', and, cellular, energy, levels])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'Rac1,', a, member, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, 'GTPases,', is, a, critical, regulator, of, both, mTORC1, and, mTORC2, in, response, to, 'growth-factor', stimulation])].
[sujeto(['Deletion', of, 'Rac1', in, primary, cells, using, an, 'inducible-Cre/Lox', approach]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([basal, and, 'growth-factor', activation, of, both, mTORC1, and, mTORC2])].
[sujeto(['Rac1', appears, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([directly, to, mTOR, and, to, mediate, mTORC1, and, mTORC2, localization, at, specific, membranes])].
[sujeto(['This', function, of, 'Rac1']), verbo([provides]), complemento([a, means, to, regulate, mTORC1, and, mTORC2, simultaneously])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho', family, of, small, 'GTPases', represent, well, characterized, signaling, molecules, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([many, cellular, functions, such, as, actin, cytoskeletal, arrangement, and, the, cell, cycle, by, acting, as, molecular, switches])].
[sujeto(['A', 'Rac1-GDP-Zn', complex]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, crystallized, in, space, group, 'P3(2)21', and, its, crystal, structure, has, been, solved, at, 1.9, 'A', resolution])].
[sujeto(['These', trigonal, crystals]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([the, unexpected, ability, of, 'Rac1', to, coordinate, 'Zn', atoms, in, a, tetrahedral, fashion, by, use, of, its, biologically, relevant, switch, 'I', and, switch, 'II', regions])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', coordination]), verbo([causes]), complemento([switch, 'II', to, adopt, a, novel, conformation, with, a, 'symmetry-related', molecule])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', zinc, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, displace, magnesium, from, its, octahedral, coordination, at, switch, 'I,', although, 'GDP', binding, remained, stable])].
[sujeto(['This', structure, represents, the, first]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['Rac1-GDP-Zn', 'complex,', which, further, underscores, the, conformational, flexibility, and, versatility, of, the, small, 'GTPase', switch, regions])].
[sujeto(['Mammalian', 'Rho', family, 'GTPases', are, intracellular, signal, transducers, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([multiple, signaling, pathways, involved, in, actin, organization, and, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Such', an, approach]), verbo([has]), complemento([increasingly, been, recognized, to, impose, experimental, limitations, related, to, 'specificity,', dosage, 'and/or', clonal, variation])].
[sujeto(['Recent', progress, in, mammalian, 'Rho', 'GTPase', cell, biology, by, gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([individual, 'Rho', 'GTPases', in, mice, has, provided, more, convincing, evidence, of, their, physiological, roles, and, signaling, pathways, in, diverse, primary, cells])].
[sujeto(['Although', adaptive, compensation, by, related, 'Rho', 'GTPase', members, remains, a, potential, concern, in, the, gene]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['approach,', in, many, cases, these, studies, enable, an, elucidation, of, the, unique, functions, of, individual, 'Rho', 'GTPases', in, different, cell, types, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Rho', 'GDP-dissociation', inhibitor, '(', 'GDI)', alpha, and, 'Rho', 'GDIbeta', '(', or, 'D4/Ly-GDI),', closely, related, regulators, for, 'Rho', 'proteins,', are, both]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, hemopoietic, cell, lineages])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, combined, disruption, of, both, the, 'Rho', 'GDIalpha', and, 'Rho', 'GDIbeta', genes, in, mice, resulted, in, reduction, of, marginal, zone, 'B', cells, in, the, 'spleen,', retention, of, mature, 'T', cells, in, the, thymic, 'medulla,', and, a, marked, increase, in, eosinophil, numbers])].
[sujeto(['While', 'B', cells, showed, slightly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([chemotactic, migration, in, response, to, 'CXCL12,', peripheral, 'T', cells, showed, markedly, reduced, chemotactic, migration, in, response, to, 'CCL21', and, 'CCL19', associated, with, decreased, receptor, levels, of, 'CCR7'])].
[sujeto(['Rho', 'GDIalpha', and, 'Rho', 'GDIbeta', thus, play, synergistic, roles, in, lymphocyte, migration, and, development, by]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([activation, cycle, of, the, 'Rho', proteins, in, a, lymphoid, 'organ-specific', manner])].
[sujeto(['To', 'date,', at, least, 22, human, members]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified])].
[sujeto(['These', 'Rho', 'GTPases', function, as, 'GDP/GTP-related', binary, switches, that, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, diverse, extracellular, 'signal-mediated', stimuli])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['GTPases', then, interact, with, downstream, effectors, to, regulate, cytoplasmic, signaling, networks, that, in, turn, regulate, actin, 'organization,', cell, cycle, 'progression,', and, gene, expression])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([begun, to, explore, the, regulation, and, function, of, some, of, the, 'lesser-known', members, of, the, 'Rho', 'GTPase', family])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, that, 'Wrch-1', and, 'Wrch2', exhibit, unusual, 'GDP/GTP', binding, properties, and, undergo, posttranslational, lipid, modifications, distinct, from, those, of, the, classical, 'Rho', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['The', conversion, of, guanosine, triphosphate, '(', 'GTP)', to, guanosine, diphosphate, '(', 'GDP)', and, inorganic, phosphate, '(', 'Pi)', by, guanine, 'nucleotide-binding', proteins, '(', 'GNBPs)', is, a, fundamental, enzyme, reaction, in, living, cells, that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, an, important, timer, in, a, variety, of, biological, processes])].
[sujeto(['This', reaction, is, intrinsically, slow, but, can, be]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, 'GTPase-activating', proteins, '(', 'GAPs)', by, several, orders, of, magnitude])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, synthesized, and, characterized, a, new, fluorescent, 'nucleotide,', 2, '\'', '(', 3, '\'', ')', -, 'O-(N-ethylcarbamoyl-(5\'\'-carboxytetramethylrhodamine)', 'amide)-GTP,', or, 'tamraGTP,', which, is, sensitive, towards, conformational, changes, of, certain, 'GNBPs']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'GTP', hydrolysis])].
[sujeto(['Phospholipase', 'C-epsilon', '(', 'PLC-epsilon)', is, a, recently, identified, 'PLC', isoform]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, subunits, of, heterotrimeric, 'G', proteins, '(', 'Galpha(12),', 'Galpha(13),', and, 'Gbetagamma)', as, well, as, by, the, low, molecular, weight, 'GTPases,', 'Rho', and, 'Ras'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', in, mixed, detergent, phospholipid, 'micelles,', 'RhoA']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([the, phospholipase, activity, of, the, 'PLC-epsilon', fragment, in, both, a, 'concentration-dependent', and, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'O-(3-thiotriphosphate)-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'Rac1']), verbo([activated]), complemento([purified, 'PLC-beta2ina', guanine, 'nucleotide-dependent', 'manner,', 'Rac1', failed, to, promote, guanine, 'nucleotide-dependent', activation, of, purified, 'PLC-epsilon'])].
[sujeto(['Application', of, serotonin, '(', 5, -, 'HT)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, slow, inward, current, response, in, identified, neurons, of, 'Aplysia', ganglia, under, voltage, clamp])].
[sujeto(['After', the, injection, of, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'O-(3-thiotriphosphate)', '(', 'GTPgammaS),', the, responses, to, 5, -, 'HT', gradually, and, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([at, the, initial, 'period,', reached, its, 'plateau,', and, finally, decreased])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, 5, -, 'HT-induced', 'Na+-current', response, might, be, facilitated, by, the, activation, of, 'Aplysia', 'Rho', which, is, closely, homologous, to, 'RhoA,', 'RhoB', or, 'RhoC', in, mammalian, neuron])].
[sujeto(['Small', 'GTPases', of, the, 'Rho', family, including, 'Rac,', 'Rho', and, 'Cdc42']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([different, cellular, processes, like, reorganization, of, the, actin, cytoskeleton, by, acting, as, molecular, switches])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'Rac1', and, 'Rac3', are, very, closely, related, concerning, their, biochemical, 'properties,', such, as, effector, 'interaction,', nucleotide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, hydrolysis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', 'Rac2', displays, a, slower, nucleotide, association, and, is, more, efficiently]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, the, 'Rac-GEF', 'Tiam1'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, the, individual, functionalities, of, the, 'Rac', isoforms])].
[sujeto(['Cholesterol', 'efflux,', an, important, mechanism, by, which, high, density, lipoproteins, '(', 'HDL)', protect, against, 'atherosclerosis,', is, initiated, by, docking, of, apolipoprotein, 'A-I', '(', 'apoA-I),', a, major, 'HDL', 'protein,', to, specific]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, followed, by, activation, of, 'ATP-binding', cassette, transporter, 'A1', '(', 'ABCA1)', and, translocation, of, cholesterol, from, intracellular, compartments, to, the, exofacial, monolayer, of, the, plasma, membrane, where, it, is, accessible, to, 'HDL'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we, investigated, potential, signal, transduction, pathways, that, may, link, 'apoA-I']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, cholesterol, translocation, to, the, plasma, membrane, and, cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['By', using, 'pull-down', assays, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'apoA-I', substantially, increased, the, amount, of, activated, 'Cdc42,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Rho', in, human, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'apoA-I']), verbo([induced]), complemento([actin, 'polymerization,', which, is, known, to, be, controlled, by, 'Rho', family, 'G', proteins])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1', with, 'Clostridium', difficile, toxin, 'B']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['apoA-I-induced', cholesterol, 'efflux,', whereas, inhibition, of, 'Rho', with, 'Clostridium', botulinum, 'C3-exoenzyme', exerted, opposite, effects])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, two, downstream, effectors, of, 'Cdc42/Rac1', 'signaling,', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', and, p38, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', p38, 'MAPK),', are, activated, by, 'apoA-I'])].
[sujeto(['Pharmacological', inhibition, of, 'JNK', but, not, p38, 'MAPK']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['apoA-I-induced', cholesterol, 'efflux,', whereas, anisomycin, and, hydrogen, 'peroxide,', two, direct, 'JNK', 'activators,', could, partially, substitute, for, 'apoA-I', in, its, ability, to, induce, cholesterol, efflux])].
[sujeto(['Rho', family, 'GTPases', are, primary, mediators, of, cytoskeletal, 'reorganization,', although, they]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, reported, to, regulate, cell, secretion])].
[sujeto(['Yet,', the, extent, to, which, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases', are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, secretory, stimuli, in, neural, and, neuroendocrine, cells, remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['In', bovine, adrenal, chromaffin, 'cells,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento(['Rac1,', but, not, 'Cdc42,', to, be, rapidly, and, selectively, activated, by, secretory, stimuli, using, an, assay, selective, for, the, activated, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['To', examine, effects, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Rac1', on, 'secretion,', constitutively, active, mutants, of, 'Rac1', '(', 'Rac1-V12,', 'Rac1-L61)', were, transiently, expressed, in, adrenal, chromaffin, cells])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'RhoGDI,', a, negative, regulator, of, 'Rac1,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([secretory, responses, while, overexpression, of, effectors, of, 'Rac1,', 'notably,', 'p21-activated', kinase, '(', 'Pak1)', and, actin, depolymerization, factor, '(', 'ADF)', promoted, evoked, secretion])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', expression, of, effector, domain, mutants, of, 'Rac1-V12', that, exhibit, reduced, activation, of, the, cytoskeletal, regulators, 'Pak1', and, 'Partner', of, 'Rac1', '(', 'POR1)', resulted, in, a]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'Rac1-V12-mediated', enhancement, of, evoked, secretion])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Rac1,', in, 'part,', functions, to, modulate, secretion, through, actions, on, the, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, this, 'hypothesis,', the, actin, modifying, drugs, phalloidin, and, jasplakinolide]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['secretion,', while, 'latrunculin-A', inhibited, secretion, and, eliminated, the, secretory, effects, of, 'Rac1-V12'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', 'Rac1', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, secretory, stimuli, and, modulated, the, secretory, pathway, downstream, of, 'Ca2+', 'influx,', partly, through, regulation, of, cytoskeletal, organization])].
[sujeto(['Guanine', nucleotide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins, rapidly, cycle, between, a, guanosine, diphosphate, '(', 'GDP)-bound', and, guanosine, triphosphate, '(', 'GTP)-bound', 'state,', and, they, operate, as, binary, switches, that, control, cell, activation, in, response, to, environmental, cues])].
[sujeto(['GTPases', adopt, different, conformations, when]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['GTP', vs])].
[sujeto(['The', 'GTP-bound', state, is, generally, considered, to, be, the, active, conformation, that, allows, 'GTPases', to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, downstream, effectors, and, thereby, initiate, downstream, signaling, 'pathways,', which, regulate, many, important, biological, processes])].
[sujeto(['Many', members, of, the, 'Ras', family, of, 'GTPases,', notably, 'Ras', and, 'Rap1A,', and, the, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases,', 'Cdc42Hs,', 'Rac1,', 'Rac2', and, 'RhoA,', are, important, components, of, signal, transduction, pathways, used, by, antigen, 'receptors,', 'costimulatory,', cytokine, and, chemokine, receptors, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, immune, response])].
[sujeto(['These', toxins, transiently]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Rho', family, 'GTP-binding', 'protein-dependent', signaling, cascades, to, induce, cytoskeletal, rearrangements])].
[sujeto(['One', of, these, translocated, 'Salmonella', 'toxins,', 'SopE,', can]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Cdc42', in, a, 'Dbl-like', fashion, despite, its, lack, of, sequence, similarity, to, 'Dbl-like', 'proteins,', the, 'Rho-specific', eukaryotic, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors])].
[sujeto(['To', elucidate, the, mechanism, of, 'SopE-mediated', guanine, nucleotide, 'exchange,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, the, structure, of, the, complex, between, a, catalytic, fragment, of, 'SopE', and, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['SopE']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, and, locks, the, switch, 'I', and, switch, 'II', regions, of, 'Cdc42', in, a, conformation, that, promotes, guanine, nucleotide, release])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, catalytic, domain, of, 'SopE']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, entirely, different, architecture, from, that, of, 'Tiam1', and, interacts, with, the, switch, regions, via, different, amino, acids])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'SopE', represents, the, first, example, of, a, 'non-Dbl-like', protein, capable, of]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([guanine, nucleotide, exchange, in, 'Rho', family, proteins])].
[sujeto(['We', searched, for, novel, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, of, 'HRas', and, isolated, small, 'G-protein', dissociation, stimulator, '(', 'smgGDS),', a, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, known, to]), verbo([act]), complemento([on, numerous, 'Ras', and, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['SmgGDS', specifically]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, both, dominant, negative, and, nucleotide, free, forms, of, 'H', and, 'NRas,', but, not, with, the, corresponding, oncogenic, forms])].
[sujeto(['An', effector, domain, mutant, of, 'HRas,', 'HRasN17G37,', selectively, lost, the, ability, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([smgGDS])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', substrates, of, 'smgGDS,', such, as, 'KRas,', 'Rac1,', and, 'RhoA,']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, smgGDS, in, both, active, and, inactive, forms, which, requires, the, presence, of, 'poly-basic', residues, in, the, 'C-termini', of, the, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'C-terminal', 'poly-basic', region, of, small, 'GTPases', is, important, for, both, binding, and, nucleotide, exchange, by, smgGDS])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, role, of, 'ICAP-1', in, 'integrin-mediated', adhesive, 'function,', we]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([the, 'full-length', molecule, in, 'NIH3T3', cells])].
[sujeto(['ICAP-1', expression, strongly]), verbo([prevents]), complemento(['NIH3T3', cell, spreading, on, extracellular, matrix])].
[sujeto(['This', inhibition, is, transient, and, can, be, counteracted, by, coexpression, of, a, constitutively]), verbo([activated]), complemento([mutant, of, 'Cdc42,', suggesting, that, 'ICAP-1', acts, upstream, of, this, 'GTPase'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ICAP-1', binds, both, to, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1', in, 'vitro,', and, its, expression, markedly, inhibits, activation, of, these, 'GTPases', during, 'integrin-mediated', cell, adhesion, to, fibronectin, as, detected, by, 'PAK', binding, assay])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, data, show, for, the, first, time, that, 'ICAP-1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Rho', family, 'GTPases', during, 'integrin-mediated', cell, matrix, 'adhesion,', acting, as, guanine, dissociation, inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['A', heterodimer, of, prenylated, 'Rac1', and, 'Rho', 'GDP', dissociation, inhibitor, was, purified, and]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, competent, in, 'NADPH', oxidase, activation])].
[sujeto(['In', this, complex, in, which, 'Rac1', is]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'GDP,', the, switch, 'I', region, of, 'Rac1', is, in, the, 'GDP', conformation, whereas, the, switch, 'II', region, resembles, that, of, a, 'GTP-bound', 'GTPase'])].
[sujeto(['The', interactions, between, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoGDI', occur, through, hydrogen, bonds, which]), verbo([involve]), complemento([a, number, of, residues, of, 'Rac1,', 'namely,', 'Tyr64(Rac),', 'Arg66(Rac),', 'His103(Rac),', and, 'His104(Rac),', conserved, within, the, 'Rho', family, and, localized, in, the, switch, 'II', region, or, in, its, close, neighborhood])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, the, switch, 'II', region, of, 'Rac1,', hydrophobic, interactions]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['Leu67(Rac)', and, 'Leu70(Rac)', contribute, to, the, stability, of, the, 'Rac1-RhoGDI', complex])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, the, 'GDP-GTP', exchange, in, 'Rac1', upon]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'RhoGDI', partly, results, from, interaction, of, 'Thr35(Rac)', with, 'Asp45(GDI)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'Rac1-RhoGDI', 'complex,', the, accessibility, of, the, effector, loops, of, 'Rac1', probably, accounts, for, the, ability, of, the, 'Rac1-RhoGDI', complex, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'NADPH', oxidase])].
[sujeto(['It', is, well, established, that, glucotoxicity, '(']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, high, glucose, 'concentrations;', 'HG)', underlies, pathogenesis, of, islet, dysfunction, in, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, demonstrated, that, 'Nox2', plays, a, requisite, role, in, the, generation, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', under, 'HG', 'conditions,', resulting, in, mitochondrial, dysregulation, and, loss, of, islet, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-cell', function])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, that, 'gp91-ds-tat,', a, specific, inhibitor, of, 'Nox2,', but, not, its, inactive, 'analog,', significantly, attenuated, 'HG-induced', 'Nox2', 'activation,', 'ROS', generation, and, p38MAPK, 'activation,', thus]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'Nox2', activation, couples, with, p38MAPK, activation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([a, significant, inhibition, of, p38MAPK, phosphorylation, by, 'Rac1', 'inhibitors,', implying, a, regulatory, role, for, 'Rac1', in, promoting, the, 'Nox2-p38MAPK', signaling, axis, in, the, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-cell', under, the, duress, of, 'HG'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', we, present, the, first, evidence, that, the, 'Rac1-Nox2', signaling, module, plays, novel, regulatory, roles, in, 'HG-induced', p38MAPK, activation, and]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, 'glucose-stimulated', insulin, secretion, '(', 'GSIS)', culminating, in, metabolic, dysfunction, and, the, onset, of, diabetes])].
[sujeto(['The', phagocyte, 'NADPH', oxidase, 'Nox2,', heterodimerized, with, 'p22(phox)', in, the, 'membrane,', is, dormant, in, resting, cells, but, becomes]), verbo([activated]), complemento([upon, cell, stimulation, to, produce, 'superoxide,', a, precursor, of, microbicidal, oxidants])].
[sujeto(['Nox2', activation]), verbo([requires]), complemento([two, switches, to, be, turned, on, 'simultaneously:', a, conformational, change, of, the, cytosolic, protein, 'p47(phox)', and, 'GDP/GTP', exchange, on, the, small, 'GTPase', 'Rac'])].
[sujeto(['These', 'proteins,', in, an, active, 'form,']), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, their, respective, 'targets,', 'p22(phox)', and, 'p67(phox),', leading, to, productive, oxidase, assembly, at, the, membrane])].
[sujeto(['Although', arachidonic, acid, '(', 'AA)', efficiently]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Nox2', both, in, vivo, and, in, 'vitro,', the, mechanism, has, not, been, fully, 'understood,', except, that, 'AA', induces, 'p47(phox)', conformational, change])].
[sujeto(['However,', even, when, constitutively, active, forms, of, 'p47(phox)', and, 'Rac1', are, both]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'HeLa', 'cells,', superoxide, production, by, 'Nox2', is, scarcely, induced, in, the, absence, of, 'AA'])].

[sujeto(['Macrophage-derived', tumor, necrosis, factor, '(', 'TNF)-&Icirc;&plusmn;']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, found, in, choroidal, neovascularization, '(', 'CNV)', surgically, removed, from, patients, with, 'age-related', macular, degeneration])].

[sujeto(['In', 'CECs,', pretreatment, with, the, antioxidant, apocynin, or, knockdown, of, 'p22phox,', a, subunit, of, 'NADPH', 'oxidase,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'ROS', generation])].
[sujeto(['Apocynin', reduced, 'TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', and, 'Rac1', 'activation,', and]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'CEC', migration])].
[sujeto(['TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'Rac1', activation, and, 'CEC', migration, were]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', inhibitor, 'Bay11-7082'])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'Rap1a']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'ROS', generation, and, reduced, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', and, 'Rac1', activation])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'Rap1', by, 8, -, '(', 4, -, 'chlorophenylthio)adenosine-2\'-O-Me-cAMP']), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'CEC', migration, and, reduced, 'laser-induced', 'CNV', 'volume,', 'ROS', 'generation,', and, activation, of, 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', and, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, active, 'Rap1a', inhibits, 'TNF-&Icirc;&plusmn;-induced', 'CEC', migration, by, inhibiting, 'NADPH', 'oxidase-dependent', 'NF-&Icirc;&ordm;B', and, 'Rac1', activation, and, suggests, that, 'Rap1a', 'de-escalates', 'CNV', development, by, interfering, with, 'ROS-dependent', signaling, in, several, steps, of, the, pathogenic, process])].
[sujeto(['Crk', is, the, prototypical, member, of, a, class, of, 'Src', homology, 2, '(', 'SH2)', and, 'Src', homology, 3, '(', 'SH3)', 'domain-containing', adaptor, proteins, that, positively]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cell, motility, via, the, activation, of, 'Rac1', 'and,', in, certain, tumor, types, such, as, 'GBM,', can, promote, cell, invasion, and, metastasis, by, mechanisms, that, are, not, well, understood])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, 'Crk,', via, its, phosphorylation, at, 'Tyr251,']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([invasive, behavior, of, tumor, 'cells,', is, a, prominent, feature, in, 'GBM,', and, correlating, with, aggressive, glioma, grade, 'IV', staging, and, overall, poor, survival, outcomes])].
[sujeto(['At', the, molecular, 'level,', 'Tyr251', phosphorylation, of, 'Crk', is, negatively]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Abi1,', which, competes, for, 'Crk', binding, to, 'Abl', and, attenuates, 'Abl', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, results, show, that, 'Crk', and, 'Abi1']), verbo([have]), complemento([reciprocal, biological, effects, and, act, as, a, molecular, rheostat, to, control, 'Abl', activation, and, cell, invasion])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Crk', 'Tyr251', phosphorylation, regulate, invasive, cell, phenotypes, and, may, serve, as, a, biomarker, for, aggressive, 'GBM'])].
[sujeto(['Chemokines', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, leukocyte, recruitment, and, appropriate, host, defense, and, act, through, 'G-protein', coupled, receptors, '(', 'GPCR),', which, induce, 'downstream-signaling', leading, to, integrin, activation])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, 'alpha-', and, 'beta-', subunits, of, the, 'GPCRs', are, the, first, intracellular, molecules, that, transduce, signals, following, ligand]), verbo([binding]), complemento([and, are, therefore, indispensable, for, downstream, 'signaling,', relatively, little, is, known, about, their, contribution, to, 'LFA-1', activation, and, leukocyte, recruitment])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', we, discovered, that, all]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['GNB-isoforms', are, required, for, 'LFA-1', activation])].
[sujeto(['Their', 'down-regulation']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, a, significant, impairment, of, 'LFA-1', 'activation,', which, was, demonstrated, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, showed, that, 'GPCR-activation']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'Rac1-dependent', activation, of, 'both,', 'Plc&Icirc;&sup2;2', and, 'Plc&Icirc;&sup2;3'])].
[sujeto(['They']), verbo([act]), complemento(['non-redundantly', to, produce, 'IP3,', mediated, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)-flux,', and, 'LFA-1', activation, that, supported, 'chemokine-induced', arrest, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', we, demonstrate, that, all, 'GNB-isoforms', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'chemokine-induced', downstream, 'signaling,', and, 'Rac1,', 'Plc&Icirc;&sup2;2', and, 'Plc&Icirc;&sup2;3', are, critically, involved, in, integrin, activation, and, leukocyte, arrest])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho', family, of, small, guanosine, triphosphatases, '(', 'Rho', 'GTPases:', 'RhoA,', 'Cdc42,', and, 'Rac1)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([many, aspects, of, cell, 'behavior,', including, actin, dynamics, and, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['The', generation, of, calcium, ion, '(', 'Ca(2+))', microdomains, is, critical, in]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([cell, migration, because, they, control, the, localized, activity, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['TRPC5-mediated', 'Ca(2+)', influx]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['Rac1', 'activation,', thereby, promoting, cell, 'migration,', whereas, 'TRPC6-mediated', 'Ca(2+)', influx, increases, 'RhoA', 'activity,', thereby, inhibiting, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, unveil, antagonistic, 'Ca(2+)', influx, pathways, as, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([signaling, mechanism, for, the, integrated, regulation, of, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Moesin', is, a, member, of, the, 'ERM', 'family,', a, family, of, 'cross-linkers', between, the, plasma, membrane, and, the, actin, 'cytoskeleton,', which, are, known, to, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([reported]), complemento([the, 'RhoA', and, 'Rho', 'kinase-dependent', phosphorylation, of, moesin, at, 'Thr-558', in, hippocampal, neuronal, cells, by, glutamate])].
[sujeto(['Moesin', phosphorylation, at, 'Thr-558', was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([after, 2, min, of, 'KCl', 'treatment,', peaked, at, 5, 'min,', and, returned, to, the, basal, level, by, 60, min])].
[sujeto(['KCl', also]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Rac1,', but, not, 'RhoA,', in, 'PC12', 'cells,', and, 'KCl-induced', moesin, phosphorylation, was, suppressed, in, dominant, negative, 'Rac1', '(', 'N17', 'Rac1)-expressed', cells])].
[sujeto([60, mm, 'KCl']), verbo([induced]), complemento([chloride, conductance, in, 'PC12', 'cells,', and, pretreatment, with, 'Cl-', channel, blocker, abolished, 'Rac1', activation, and, moesin, phosphorylation, by, 'KCl'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, phosphorylation, of, moesin, at, 'Thr-558', in, 'PC12', cells, by, 'KCl', treatment, is, 'PKA-', and, 'Rac1-dependent', and, that, 'KCl-induced', chloride, conductance, is, involved, in, the, activation, of, this, signaling, system])].
[sujeto(['The', broadly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([transient, receptor, potential, '(', 'TRP)', family, of, ion, channels, are, permeant, to, 'cations,', most, resulting, in, increased, intracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, growth, factor, stimulation, initiates, the, rapid, translocation, of, the, transient, receptor, potential, ion, 'channel,', 'TRPC5,', from, vesicles, held, in, reserve, just, under, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['This', 'process,', which, we, term, '\'', rapid, vesicular, insertion, of, 'TRP\'', '(', 'RiVIT),', dramatically]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['membrane-associated', 'TRPC5', channels, and, functional, 'TRPC5', 'current,', resulting, in, tight, 'spatial-temporal', control, of, these, 'Ca(2+)-permeant', nonselective, channels])].
[sujeto(['Epidermal', growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)-induced', incorporation, of, functional, 'TRP', channels]), verbo([requires]), complemento([phosphatidylinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI(3)K),', the, 'Rho', 'GTPase', 'Rac1', and, phosphatidylinositol, 4, -, phosphate, 5, -, kinase, '(', 'PIP(5)K', 'alpha)'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'TRPC5', availability, affects, neurite, extension, rates, in, cultured, hippocampal, 'neurons,', and, may, be, a, general, mechanism, for, initiating, 'Ca(2+)', influx, and, cell, morphological, changes, in, response, to, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Evidence', is]), verbo([provided]), complemento([for, direct, 'protein-protein', interactions, between, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', 'alpha,', 'betaI,', 'betaII,', 'gamma,', 'delta,', 'epsilon,', and, zeta, and, members, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['Previous', 'investigations,', based, on, the, immunoprecipitation, 'approach,']), verbo([have]), complemento([provided, evidence, consistent, with, a, direct, 'interaction,', but, this, remained, to, be, proven])].
[sujeto(['It', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, activity, of, 'PKCalpha', was, potently, enhanced, by, 'RhoA', and, 'Cdc42', and, to, a, lesser, extent, by, 'Rac1,', whereas, the, effects, on, the, activities, of, 'PKCbetaI,', -, 'betaII,', -, 'gamma,', -, 'delta,', -, 'epsilon,', and, -, zeta, were, much, reduced])].
[sujeto(['PKCalpha', was]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, a, phorbol, 'ester-', and, 'Ca(2+)-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['This', was, reflected, by, a, substantial]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, phorbol, ester, concentration, requirements, for, activity, in, the, presence, of, 'Ca(2+),', which, for, each, 'Rho', 'GTPase', was, induced, within, a, low, nanomolar, phorbol, ester, concentration, range])].
[sujeto(['The', activity, of, 'PKCalpha', also, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, dependent, on, the, nature, of, the, 'GTP-', or, 'GDP-bound', state, of, the, 'Rho', 'GTPases,', suggesting, that, the, interaction, may, be, regulated, by, conformational, changes, in, both, 'PKCalpha', and, 'Rho', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['Such', an, interaction, could, result, in, significant, 'cross-talk', between, the, distinct, pathways]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, these, two, signaling, elements])].
[sujeto(['rac2-/-', neutrophils, displayed, significant, defects, in, 'chemotaxis,', in, 'shear-dependent', 'L-selectin-mediated', capture, on, the, endothelial, substrate, 'Glycam-1,', and, in, both, 'F-actin', generation, and, p38, 'and,', 'unexpectedly,', 'p42/p44', 'MAP', kinase, activation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, chemoattractants])].
[sujeto(['Superoxide', production, by, 'rac2-/-', bone, marrow, neutrophils, was, significantly, reduced, compared, to, wild, 'type,', but, it, was, normal, in]), verbo([activated]), complemento([peritoneal, exudate, neutrophils])].
[sujeto(['These', defects, were, reflected, in, vivo, by, baseline, 'neutrophilia,', reduced, inflammatory, peritoneal, exudate, 'formation,', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([mortality, when, challenged, with, 'Aspergillus', fumigatus])].
[sujeto(['Although', regulation, of, 'voltage-dependent', calcium, current, '(', 'ICa,V)', by, neurotransmitters, is, a, ubiquitous, mechanism, among, nerve, 'cells,', the, signaling, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([are, not, well, understood])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, previously, that, in, a, 'neuroblastoma-glioma', hybrid, cell, line, '(', 'NG108-15),', the, heterotrimeric, 'G-protein', 'G13', mediates, the, inhibition, of, 'ICa,V', produced, by, bradykinin, '(', 'BK)', via, an, unknown, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Various']), verbo([reports]), complemento([indicate, that, 'G13', can, couple, to, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Cdc42,', which, are, closely, related, members, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, monomeric, 'G-proteins'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, their, role, as, signaling, intermediates, in, the, pathway, used, by, 'BK', to, inhibit, 'ICa,V'])].
[sujeto(['Using', immunoblot, analysis, and, the, 'PCR,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([evidence, that, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Cdc42', all, are, expressed, in, 'NG108-15', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, activation, of, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', or, 'Cdc42', may, be]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, response, to, 'BK'])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, whether, any, of, these, monomeric, 'G-proteins']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([the, response, to, 'BK,', we, have, intracellularly, applied, blocking, antibodies, specific, for, each, of, the, candidate, proteins])].
[sujeto(['The', 'swelling-activated', chloride, current, '(', 'I', 'Cl,Vol)', is, abundantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, glioblastoma, '(', 'GBM)', 'cells,', where, it, controls, cell, volume, and, invasive, migration])].
[sujeto(['The', transduction, pathway]), verbo([mediating]), complemento(['I', 'Cl,Vol', activation, in, 'GBM', cells, 'is,', 'however,', poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['By', means, of, pharmacological, and, electrophysiological, 'approaches,', on, 'GL-15', human, 'GBM', cells, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'I', 'Cl,Vol', activation, by, hypotonic, swelling, required, the, activity, of, a, 'U73122-sensitive', phospholipase, 'C', '(', 'PLC)'])].
[sujeto(['I', 'Cl,Vol', activation, could, also, be]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, 'membrane-permeable', diacylglycerol, '(', 'DAG)', analog, 'OAG'])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'R59022,', an, inhibitor, of, diacylglycerol, kinase, '(', 'DGK),', reverted, 'I', 'Cl,Vol', 'activation,', suggesting, the, involvement, of, phosphatidic, acid])].

[sujeto(['We', finally, show, that, 'I', 'Cl,Vol', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, the, promigratory, fetal, calf, serum, in, a, 'PLC-', and, 'DGK-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Given', the, relevance, of, 'I', 'Cl,Vol', in, 'GBM', cell, volume, regulation, and, 'invasiveness,', the, several, key, signaling, molecules]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, this, study, to, be, involved, in, the, activation, of, the, 'I', 'Cl,Vol', may, represent, potential, therapeutic, targets, against, this, lethal, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Damage', to, the, filtration, barrier, results, in, albumin]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, the, 'urine,', a, hallmark, of, cardiovascular, disease, and, kidney, failure])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, ion, channel, 'TRPC5', mediates, filtration, barrier, injury])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'Trpc5-KO', 'mice,', a, 'small-molecule', inhibitor, of, 'TRPC5,', 'Ca2+', imaging, in, isolated, kidney, 'glomeruli,', and, live, imagining, of, podocyte, actin, 'dynamics,', we, determined, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'TRPC5', or, its, inhibition, abrogates, podocyte, cytoskeletal, remodeling])].

[sujeto(['This', complex, is, thought, to, play, a, structural, role, in]), verbo([ensuring]), complemento([membrane, stability, and, force, transduction, during, muscle, contraction])].
[sujeto(['The', multiple]), verbo([binding]), complemento([sites, and, domains, present, in, the, 'DAPC', confer, the, scaffold, of, various, signalling, and, channel, 'proteins,', which, may, implicate, the, 'DAPC', in, regulation, of, signalling, processes])].
[sujeto(['The', dystroglycan, complex, may]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, the, transduction, of, 'extracellular-mediated', signals, to, the, muscle, 'cytoskeleton,', and, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-dystroglycan', was, shown, to, be, involved, in, 'MAPK', and, 'Rac1', small, 'GTPase', signalling])].
[sujeto(['The', adaptor, proteins, syntrophin, contribute, to]), verbo([recruit]), complemento([and, regulate, various, signalling, proteins, such, as, ion, 'channels,', into, a, macromolecular, complex])].
[sujeto(['Although', dystrophin, and, dystroglycan, can, be, directly]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, signalling, 'pathways,', syntrophins, play, a, central, role, in, organizing, signalplex, anchored, to, the, dystrophin, scaffold])].
[sujeto(['The', dystrophin, associated, 'complex,', can]), verbo([bind]), complemento([up, to, four, syntrophin, through, binding, domains, of, dystrophin, and, 'dystrobrevin,', allowing, the, scaffold, of, multiple, signalling, proteins, in, close, proximity])].

[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'ATP-gated', 'P2X7', receptors, '(', 'P2X7R)', in, macrophages]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, production, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', by, a, mechanism, that, is, partially, characterized])].
[sujeto(['J774', cells, and, 'mP2X7-transfected', 'HEK293', cells, were]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, 'Bz-ATP', in, the, presence, and, absence, of, extracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['ROS', generation, in, either, 'J774', or, 'HEK293', cells, '(']), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['P2X7,', 'NOX2,', 'Rac1,', p47phox, and, 'p67phox)', was, strictly, dependent, on, calcium, entry, via, 'P2X7R'])].
[sujeto(['Stimulation', of, 'P2X7R']), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Pyk2', but, not, calmodulin])].
[sujeto(['This', signaling, mechanism, did, not]), verbo([require]), complemento(['PI3K,', p38, 'MAPK', or, calmodulin])].
[sujeto(['In', 'formyl-Met-Leu-Phe', '(', 'fMLP)-stimulated', rat, 'neutrophils,', a, synthetic, 'compound,', 6, -, 'chloro-2-(2-chlorophenyl)-4-oxo-1,4-dihydroquinoline-3-carboxylate', '(', 'Fal-002-2),']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([superoxide, anion, '(', 'O2(&acirc;&euro;&cent;-))', generation, with, an, 'IC50', value, of, about, 11, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M,', which, was, not, mediated, by, scavenging, the, generated, 'O2(&acirc;&euro;&cent;-)', or, by, a, cytotoxic, effect, on, neutrophils])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, 'p47(phox)', with, protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', isoforms, '(', &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;,', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;I,', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;II,', &, 'Icirc;&acute;', and, &, 'Icirc;&para;)', was, attenuated, by, 'Fal-002-2', with, a, similar, 'IC50', value, to, that]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, inhibition, of, 'O2(&acirc;&euro;&cent;-)', 'generation,', whereas, 'Fal-002-2', had, no, prominent, effect, on, 'PKC', isoform, membrane, translocation, and, did, not, affect, the, kinase, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, 'p21-activated', kinase, '(', 'PAK)', 1, with, 'p47(phox),', phosphorylation, of, 'PAK1', '(', 'Thr423/Ser144)', and, the, membrane, recruitment, of, 'PAK1', were, effectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'Fal-002-2'])].
[sujeto(['Fal-002-2', also, blocked, the, activation, of, 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42', in, a, concentration, range, that, effectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['PAK', activation])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Fal-002-2', inhibits, 'fMLP-stimulated', 'O2(&acirc;&euro;&cent;-)', generation, in, neutrophils, mainly, through, the, blockade, of, 'PKC', and, 'PAK', signaling, pathways, and, partly, through, p38, 'MAPK', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Chronic', hypoxia, '(', 'CH)']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['depolarization-induced', myofilament, 'Ca(2+)', sensitization, and, resultant, pulmonary, arterial, constriction, through, superoxide, '(', 'O(2)(-))-dependent', stimulation, of, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['Because', 'NAD(P)H', oxidase, '(', 'NOX)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, development, of, pulmonary, 'hypertension,', we, hypothesized, that, vascular, smooth, muscle, '(', 'VSM)', depolarization, increases, 'NOX-derived', 'O(2)(-)', production, leading, to, myofilament, 'Ca(2+)', sensitization, and, augmented, vasoconstrictor, reactivity, following, 'CH'])].
[sujeto(['As', epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR)']), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['Rac1-dependent', 'NOX', activation, in, renal, mesangial, 'cells,', we, further, sought, to, examine, the, role, 'EGFR', plays, in, this, response])].
[sujeto(['These', latter, responses, to, 'CH', were]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, general, inhibition, of, 'NOX', isoforms, '(', 'apocynin,', diphenylene, 'iodonium),', and, by, selective, inhibition, of, 'NOX', 2, '(', 'gp91ds-tat),', 'Rac1', '(', 'NSC', 23766, ')', ',', and, 'EGFR', '(', 'AG', 1478, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, these, 'observations,', 'CH']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['KCl-induced', 'EGFR', 'phosphorylation,', and, augmented, 'depolarization-induced', 'Rac1', activation, in, an, 'EGFR-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['This', study, establishes, a, novel, signaling, axis, in, 'VSM', linking, membrane, depolarization, to, contraction, that, is, independent, of, 'Ca(2+)', 'influx,', and, which]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([myofilament, 'Ca(2+)', sensitization, in, the, hypertensive, pulmonary, circulation])].
[sujeto(['Phosphatidylinositol', 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, important, in, normal, plant, growth, and, stress, responses])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', it, was, verified, that, 'PI3K', played, a, vital, role, in, rice, seed, germination, through]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['NADPH', oxidase, activity])].
[sujeto(['And', 'then,', the, signal, cascades, that, 'PI3K']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, 'ROS', liberation, was, also, evaluated])].
[sujeto(['Diphenylene', iodonium, '(', 'DPI),', an, 'NADPH', oxidase, 'inhibitor,']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([most, of, 'ROS', generation, in, rice, seed, 'germination,', which, suggested, that, 'NADPH', oxidase, was, the, main, source, of, 'ROS', in, this, process])].
[sujeto(['Pharmacological', experiment, and, 'RT-PCR', demonstrated, that, 'PI3K']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'Os', rboh9])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', functional, analysis, by, native, 'PAGE', and, the, measurement, of, the, 2, ',', 3, -, 'bis-(2-methoxy-4-nitro-5-sulfophenyl)-2H-tetrazo-lium-5-', carboxanilide, '(', 'XTT)', formazan, concentration, both, showed, that, 'PI3K']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'NADPH', oxidase])].

[sujeto(['However,', the]), verbo([cause]), complemento([and, effect, of, the, two, signals, in, cardiac, hypertrophy, remain, to, be, clarified])].
[sujeto(['We', extend, our, recent]), verbo([report]), complemento([by, investigating, a, potential, interaction, between, 'ROS', and, 'Ca(2+)', signals, utilizing, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, angiotensin, 'II', '(', 'ANG', 'II)-induced', cardiac, hypertrophy, models])].
[sujeto(['ANG', 'II-induced', initial, 'Ca(2+)', transients]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, inositol, trisphosphate, '(', 'IP(3))', triggered, initial, 'ROS', production, in, adult, rat, cardiomyocytes])].
