[sujeto(['This', then, results, in, the, breakage, of, two, 'H-bonds,', 'namely,', glutamic, acid, 1034, -, 'Gln995', and, aspartic, acid, '(', 'Asp)', 1056, -, 'Gln1013,', at, opposite, sides, of, the, interface, between, the, 'J&Icirc;&plusmn;', helix, and, the, 'LOV2', 'domain,', ultimately]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, a, disruption, of, 'J&Icirc;&plusmn;', helix, from, the, 'LOV2', core])].
[sujeto(['The', immediate, early, gene, pip92, is, rapidly, and, transiently]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'serum,', basic, fibroblast, growth, factor, '(', 'bFGF),', nerve, growth, factor, '(', 'NGF)', and, phobol, 'ester,', as, well, as, various, toxic, stimuli])].
[sujeto(['Rho', 'GTPases,', such, as, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, both, cytoskeletal, rearrangement, and, cell, cycle, control])].
[sujeto(['Rac1', and, 'Cdc42']), verbo([induce]), complemento([neurite, outgrowth, in, many, types, of, neuronal, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, examined, the, signal, transduction, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, pip92, 'induction,', focusing, on, the, involvement, of, 'Rho', family, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, triphosphate, '(', 'GTP)ases'])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, of, 'kinase-inactive', 'MEKK7', or, chemical, inhibitors, of, 'JNK', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'Rac1', by, 'FGF'])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'JNK', and, 'Rac1']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['Pak1', 'activity,', which, could, then, phosphorylate, and, activate, transcription, factor, 'Elk1'])].
[sujeto(['Stimulation', of, 'Pak1-dependent', 'Elk1', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, 'bFGF-induced', activation, of, pip92])].
[sujeto(['Suppression', of, endogenous, pip92, expression, by, siRNA, significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['bFGF-induced', neurite, 'outgrowth,', while, the, ectopic, expression, of, pip92, suppressed, the, neurite, extension])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, neurogenic, growth, 'factor-induced', expression, of, pip92, is, critical, for, the, regulation, of, neuronal, 'differentiation,', occurring, through, the, subsequent, activation, of, 'Rac1,', 'JNK,', 'Pak1', and, 'Elk1'])].
[sujeto(['T', lymphocytes, of, affected, males, with, 'WAS', exhibit, a, severe, disturbance, of, the, actin, 'cytoskeleton,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, the, 'WAS', protein, could, regulate, its, organization])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, 'WAS', protein]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, a, member, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, 'GTPases,', 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['It', was, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, different, mutant, 'WAS', proteins, from, three, affected, males, retained, their, ability, to, interact, with, 'Cdc42', and, that, the, level, of, expression, of, the, 'WAS', protein, in, these, mutants, was, only, 2, -, 5, '%', of, normal])].
[sujeto(['Taken', together, these, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'WAS', protein, might, function, as, a, signal, transduction, adaptor, downstream, of, 'Cdc42,', and, in, affected, 'males,', the, cytoskeletal, abnormalities, may, result, from, a, defect, in, 'Cdc42', signaling])].
[sujeto(['The', transferase, activities, of, the, fused, proteins, in, microsomal, fraction, of, belladonna, markedly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([by, the, incubation, with, methyl, jasmonate, either, in, 'Sdrac-1', or, 'Sdrac-2', 'transformant,', while, low, and, constant, activities, were, observed, in, the, untreated, control])].
[sujeto(['Recombinant', 'Sdrac-2', protein, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, bind, to, prenyl, chain, in, the, presence, of, cell, extracts, prepared, from, methyl, 'jasmonate-treated', 'S'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, both, 'Sdrac-1', and, 'Sdrac-2', translocate, to, plant, membranes, by, the, stimulation, with, methyl, 'jasmonate,', 'however,', targeting, of, these, proteins, is, triggered, by, the, independent, modification, 'mechanisms,', palmitoylation, for, 'Sdrac-1', and, prenylation, for, 'Sdrac-2'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, three, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, triphosphate, analogs, with, 'BODIPY', fluorophores, coupled, via, the, gamma, phosphate]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, 'GTPases', 'Cdc42,', 'Rac1,', 'RhoA,', and, 'Ras', and, displace, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, diphosphate, with, high, intrinsic, exchange, rates, in, the, presence, of, 'Mg(2+)', 'ions,', thereby, acting, as, 'synthetic,', low, molecular, weight, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors])].
[sujeto(['The', accompanying, large, fluorescence, enhancements, '(', as, high, as, 12, -, 'fold),']), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, a, reduction, in, guanine, quenching, of, the, environmentally, sensitive, 'BODIPY', dye, fluorescence, on, protein, 'binding,', allow, for, 'real-time', monitoring, of, this, spontaneous, nucleotide, exchange, in, the, visible, spectrum, with, high, 'signal-to-noise', ratios])].
[sujeto(['Binding', affinities]), verbo([increased]), complemento([with, longer, aliphatic, linkers, connecting, the, nucleotide, and, 'BODIPY', fluorophore, and, were, in, the, 10, -, 100, nM, range])].
[sujeto(['Steady-state', and, 'time-resolved', fluorescence, spectroscopy, showed, an, inverse, relationship, between, linker, length, and, fluorescence, enhancement, factors, and, differences, in, 'protein-bound', fluorophore, 'mobilities,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([optimization, criteria, for, future, applications, of, such, compounds, as, efficient, elicitors, and, reporters, of, nucleotide, exchange])].
[sujeto(['EDTA', markedly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([nucleotide, 'exchange,', enabling, rapid, loading, of, 'GTPases', with, these, probes])].
[sujeto(['Differences', in, active, site, 'geometries,', in, the, absence, of, 'Mg(2+),']), verbo([caused]), complemento([qualitatively, different, reporting, of, the, bound, state, by, the, different, analogs])].
[sujeto(['The', 'BODIPY', analogs, also]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, interaction, of, 'Cdc42', with, p21, activated, kinase])].
[sujeto(['Plexin', receptors, function, in, response, to, semaphorin, guidance, cues, in, a, variety, of, developmental, processes]), verbo([involving]), complemento([cell, motility])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, determined, the, structure, of, a, cytoplasmic, domain, '(', 'RBD)', of, 'plexin-B1', and, mapped, its, binding, interface, with, several, 'Rho-GTPases,', 'Rac1,', 'Rnd1,', and, 'RhoD'])].
[sujeto(['To', understand, whether, thermodynamic, properties, of, the, 'GTPase-RBD', interaction, contribute, to, such, different, 'behavior,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([examined, the, interaction, at, different, 'temperatures,', 'buffer,', and, pH, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Although', the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity, of, both, 'Rnd1', and, 'Rac1', with, the, 'plexin-B1', 'RBD', is, 'similar,', the, detailed, thermodynamic, properties, of, the, interactions, are, considerably, different])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, on, 'Rac1', binding, to, the, 'plexin-B1', 'RBD,', the, proteins, become, more, rigid, in, the, complex])].
[sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', 'Rnd1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([is, consistent, with, unchanged, or, slightly, increased, flexibility, in, one, or, both, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'GTPases', show, an, appreciable, reduction, in, affinity, for, the, dimeric, 'plexin-B1', 'RBD', indicating, that, 'GTPase']), verbo([binding]), complemento([is, not, cooperative, with, dimer, 'formation,', but, that, a, partial, steric, hindrance, destabilizes, the, dimer])].
[sujeto(['However,', a, reduced, affinity]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mode, to, a, disulphide, stabilized, model, for, the, dimeric, 'RBD', is, also, possible])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, cellular, 'studies,', the, interaction, thermodynamics, imply, that, further, levels, of, regulation]), verbo([involving]), complemento([additional, binding, partners, 'and/or', regions, outside, of, the, 'RhoGTPase', binding, domain, are, required, for, receptor, activation])].
[sujeto(['The', epithelial, sodium, channel, '(', 'ENaC)', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'aldosterone-sensitive', distal, nephron, where, it, performs, sodium, reabsorption, from, the, lumen])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, shown, that, 'ENaC', activity, contributes, to, the, development, of, 'salt-induced', hypertension, as, a, result, of, deficiency, of, 'EGF', level])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies, revealed, that, 'Rho', 'GDP-dissociation', inhibitor, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, control, of, 'salt-sensitive', hypertension, and, renal, injury, via, 'Rac1,', which, is, one, of, the, small, 'GTPases', activating, 'ENaC'])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, investigated, the, intracellular, mechanism]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([the, involvement, of, the, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;/Rac1', axis, in, the, control, of, 'ENaC', and, the, effect, of, 'EGF', on, 'ENaC', in, this, pathway])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, cortical, collecting, ducts, of, mice, and, 'rats,', and, its, expression, is, 'down-regulated', in, 'Dahl', 'salt-sensitive', rats, fed, a, high, salt, diet])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', in, cultured, cortical, collecting, duct, principal, cells]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['ENaC', subunits, expression, and, 'ENaC-mediated', sodium, reabsorption])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', deficiency]), verbo([causes]), complemento([enhanced, response, to, 'EGF', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Patch', clamp, analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', significantly, decreases, 'ENaC', current, density, and, prevents, its, 'up-regulation', by, 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'EGF', treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, active, 'Rac1,', which, was, further, enhanced, in, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;-deficient', cells])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, changes, in, the, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;-dependent', pathway]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, permissive, role, in, the, 'Rac1-mediated', enhancement, of, 'ENaC', activity, observed, in, 'salt-induced', hypertension])].
[sujeto(['To', define, roles, for, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', and, epithelial, sodium, channel, '(', 'ENaC)', in]), verbo([maintaining]), complemento([lung, fluid, balance, in, 'vivo,', we, used, two, novel, whole, animal, imaging, approaches])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, inhibition, of, 'NADPH', oxidase, with, a, 'Rac-1', 'inhibitor,', 'NSC23766,', resulted, in, alveolar, 'flooding,', which, correlated, with, a, decrease, in, lung, 'ROS', production, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, a, role, for, 'Nox2', in, alveolar, fluid, 'balance,', 'Nox2(-/-)', mice, showed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([retention, of, air, space, fluid, compared, with, 'wild-type', controls])].
[sujeto(['Acute', application, of, 'LPS']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, activity, of, 20, pS, nonselective, 'ENaC', channels, in, rat, type, 1, 'cells;', the, average, number, of, channel, and, 'single-channel', open, probability, '(', 'NPo)', increased, from, 0.14, &, 'Acirc;&plusmn;', 0.04, to, 0.62, &, 'Acirc;&plusmn;', 0.23])].
[sujeto(['Application', of, 'TEMPO', to, the, same, 'cell-attached', recording]), verbo([caused]), complemento([an, immediate, significant, decrease, in, 'ENaC', 'NPo', to, 0.04, &, 'Acirc;&plusmn;', 0.03])].
[sujeto(['These', data, demonstrate, 'that,', in, 'vivo,', 'ROS']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, capacity, to, stimulate, lung, fluid, clearance, by, increasing, 'ENaC', activity])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, in, 'PC12', 'cells:', '(', 1, ')', high, extracellular, 'KCl', induces, moesin, 'phosphorylation,', an, event, which, was, dependent, on, chloride, channel, 'activation,', and, '(', 2, ')', 'NGF', induces, moesin, phosphorylation, which, is, required, for, neurite, outgrowth])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'NGF-induced', intracellular, signaling, and, neurite, outgrowth, is, also, mediated, by, activation, of, anion, channels])].
[sujeto(['Using', a, 'patch-clamp', 'technique,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'NGF', treatment, increased, anionic, conductance, in, 'PC12', 'cells,', an, effect, which, was, completely, blocked, by, 'NPPB,', a, chloride, channel, inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['Also,', the, 'NGF-induced', moesin, phosphorylation, was]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, 'NPPB'])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', 'NPPB', and, 'SITS,', another, chloride, channel, 'blocker,']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['NGF-induced', 'TrkA', phosphorylation, and, subsequent, 'PI3K/Akt', phosphorylation, and, 'Rac1', activation, in, 'PC12', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, chloride, channel, inhibitors, also]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, neurite, outgrowth, and, decreased, the, cell, viability, in, response, to, 'long-term', treatment, of, 'NGF'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, chloride, ion, flux, plays, an, important, role, in, 'TrkA-mediated', signaling, pathway, during, 'NGF-induced', differentiation, of, 'PC12', cells])].
[sujeto(['Superoxide', '(', 'O(2)(-))', produced, by, 'NADPH', oxidase]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Na', absorption, and, renal, hemodynamics])].
[sujeto(['Increased', 'NaCl', in, the, thick, ascending, limb, '(', 'TAL)']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['O(2)(-)', generation])].
[sujeto(['In', other, 'cells,', 'Rac1,', a, regulatory, subunit, of, 'NADPH', 'oxidase,', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, elevated, 'NaCl'])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([luminal, 'NaCl', within, the, physiological, range, activates, 'Rac1', and, 'NADPH', oxidase, 'and,', 'thereby,', increases, 'O(2)(-)', production])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['NaCl', from, 10, to, 57, mM, in, medullary, 'TAL', suspensions, and, used, lucigenin, to, measure, 'O(2)(-)', generation, and, 'Western', blot, to, measure, 'Rac1', activity])].
[sujeto(['Increasing', 'NaCl']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['O(2)(-)', generation, from, 1.41, +, /, -, 0.16, to, 2.71, +, /, -, 0.3, nmol, 'O(2)(-)', x, 'min(-1)', x, mg, 'protein(-1)', '(', n, =, 6, ',', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([increase]), complemento([was, blocked, by, the, 'Na-K-2Cl', cotransporter, inhibitor, furosemide, and, the, 'NADPH', oxidase, inhibitor, apocynin])].
[sujeto(['When', we, added, 'NaCl,', 'Rac1', in, the, particulate, fraction]), verbo([increased]), complemento([from, 6.8, +, /, -, 0.8, to, 11.7, +, /, -, 2.4, '%', of, total, 'Rac1', '(', n, =, 7, ',', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, ')'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, absence, of, the, 'Rac1', 'inhibitor,', 'NaCl']), verbo([increased]), complemento(['O(2)(-)', generation, from, 1.07, +, /, -, 0.24, to, 2.02, +, /, -, 0.49, nmol, 'O(2)(-)', x, 'min(-1)', x, mg, 'protein(-1),', and, this, increase, was, completely, blocked, by, the, inhibitor])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', in, vivo, treatment, of, 'TALs', with, adenovirus]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['dominant-negative', 'Rac1', decreased, 'NaCl-induced', 'O(2)(-)', generation, by, 60, '%', compared, with, control, '(', 0.33, +, /, -, 0.04, vs])].
[sujeto(['We', concluded, that, physiological]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'NaCl', stimulate, 'TAL', 'O(2)(-)', generation, by, activating, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Cyclic', nucleotides]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, response, of, both, developing, and, regenerating, growth, cones, to, a, wide, range, of, guidance, molecules, through, poorly, understood, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['It', is, not, clear, how, cAMP, levels, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([or, how, they, translate, into, altered, growth, cone, behavior])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, growth, cones]), verbo([require]), complemento([a, 'substratum-specific', balance, between, cAMP, 'levels,', integrin, function, and, 'Rho', 'GTPases', to, maintain, motility, and, prevent, collapse])].
[sujeto(['Embryonic', chick, dorsal, root, ganglion, neurons, plated, on, different, concentrations, of, laminin, extend, growth, cones, at, similar, 'speeds,', yet]), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, levels, of, integrin, 'expression,', integrin, activation, and, intracellular, cAMP, levels])].
[sujeto(['Either']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([cAMP, signaling, or, activating, integrins, enhances, the, rate, of, growth, cone, 'motility,', but, only, on, substrata, where, these, two, factors, are, endogenously, low, '(', i])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', combining, these, two, positive, manipulations]), verbo([induces]), complemento([growth, cone, collapse, and, retraction, on, laminin, but, not, on, fibronectin])].
[sujeto(['Activated', fibroblasts, are]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, be, involved, in, the, deposition, of, extracellular, matrix, in, the, formation, of, peribronchial, fibrosis, in, asthma])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, novel, finding, of, activated, elongated, fibroblasts, accompanied, by, elevated, numbers, of, eosinophils, in, bronchoalveolar, lavage, fluid, from, 5, out, of, 12, patients, with, mild, asthma, '(', =, 42, '%', ')', ',', whereas, no, fibroblasts, were, observed, in, the, control, subjects, without, asthma, '(', n, =, 17, ')'])].
[sujeto(['The', elongated, fibroblasts, migrated, twice, as, far, when, compared, with, fibroblasts, from, corresponding, bronchial, biopsies, from, the, same, 'patients,', accompanied, by, an]), verbo([induced]), complemento([expression, of, 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1,', indicating, that, the, increased, expression, of, these, proteins, are, linked, to, increased, migratory, capabilities])].
[sujeto(['Differential', expression, patterns, between, the, two, fibroblast, groups, in, 'motility-regulating', 'proteins,', such, as, 'cofilin,']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([chloride, ion, channel, 'protein,', and, 'heat-shock', protein, 20, ',', were, identified, by, 'two-dimensional', electrophoresis, and, mass, spectrometry])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, the, presence, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento([and, mobile, fibroblasts, accompanied, by, an, induced, inflammatory, response, outside, the, airway, epithelium, in, patients, with, mild, 'asthma,', results, that, may, play, a, role, in, formation, of, airway, fibrosis])].
[sujeto(['The', elevated, expression, of, 70, kDa, heat, shock, protein, '(', 'Hsp70)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([resistance, to, 'stress-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([screened, a, variety, of, natural, products, for, their, ability, to, enhance, 'Hsp70', expression, as, 'anti-apoptotic', agent])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, glucuronic, acid, '(', 'GA)', induced, the, synthesis, of, 'Hsp70', and, that, cells, pretreated, with, 'GA', were, significantly, tolerant, to, stress, including, heat, shock, and, hydrogen, peroxide])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'GA', induces, the, production, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS),', a, process, inhibited, by, 'NADPH', oxidase, 'inhibitor,', diphenyleneiodonium, chloride, '(', 'DPI)', and, antioxidant, 'N-acetylcysteine', '(', 'NAC)'])].
[sujeto(['GA-induced', 'ROS', production, was, also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([in, 'RacN17', cell, line, overexpressing, a, dominant, negative, mutant, of, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GA', treatment]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['MAPKs', activation, '(', 'SAPK/JNK', and, 'p38)', and, 'Hsp70', expression, in, 'ROS', dependent, 'manner,', suggesting, that, 'GA', turns, on, the, signaling, pathway, by, generation, of, 'ROS', through, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['We', analyzed, the, profiles, of, newly, synthesized, proteins, by, 'GA', with, 2, -, dimensional, gel, electrophoresis, and, 'MALDI-TOF', 'MS', and]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, two, families, of, proteins, were, expressed, by, 'GA'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'GA-induced', stress, responses, are, mediated, by, 'ROS', generation, and, are, 'similar,', in, 'part,', to, heat, 'shock-induced', responses, and, 'GA', can, be, possibly, adopted, for, the, protecting, agent, from, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Adenovirus-mediated', expression, of, superoxide, dismutase, and, catalase]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TNF-alpha-induced', 'MCP-1', gene, 'expression,', suggesting, important, roles, of, superoxide, '(', 'O(2)(-)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, iron, chelator, 1, ',', 2, -, 'dimethyl-3-hydroxypyridin-4-one', and, the, hydroxyl, radical, scavengers, dimethylthiourea, and, dimethyl, sulfoxide]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TNF-alpha-induced', 'MCP-1', 'expression,', suggesting, important, roles, of, iron, and, hydroxyl, radicals, in, inflammatory, signal, activation])].
[sujeto(['generation,', with, diphenylene, iodonium]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['TNF-alpha-induced', 'MCP-1', mRNA, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, dominant, negative, 'N17Rac1', by, adenovirus]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['TNF-alpha-induced', 'MCP-1', mRNA, levels, and, 'MCP-1', protein, secretion])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'N17Rac1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TNF-alpha-induced', 'MCP-1', and, 'NF-kappaB', transcriptional, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'ROS', such, as, superoxide, and, 'H(2)O(2)', derived, from, 'Rac1-activated', 'NADPH', oxidase, mediate, 'TNF-alpha-induced', 'MCP-1', expression, in, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Glutathione', 'S-transferases', '(', 'GSTs)']), verbo([have]), complemento([poorly, understood, roles, in, plant, responses, to, environmental, stresses])].
[sujeto(['PEG', and, the, heavy, metals, 'Cd', '(', 20, 'microM),', 'Zn', '(', 30, 'microM),', 'Co', and, 'Ni', rapidly, and, markedly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([osgstu4, and, osgstu3, in, rice, seedling, roots])].
[sujeto(['Osgstu4', and, osgstu3, were, also]), verbo([induced]), complemento([in, roots, by, hypoxic, stress, but, not, by, cold, nor, heat, shock])].
[sujeto(['Salt', stress, and, abscisic, acid, '(', 'ABA)', rapidly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([osgstu3, in, rice, 'roots,', whereas, osgstu4, exhibited, a, late, salt, stress, and, no, 'ABA', response])].
[sujeto(['Salicylic', 'acid,', jasmonic, acid, and, the, auxin, 'alpha-naphthalene', acetic, acid]), verbo([triggered]), complemento([osgstu4, and, osgstu3, expression])].
[sujeto(['Osgstu4', and, osgstu3, were, rapidly, and, markedly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, the, antioxidant, dithiothreitol, and, the, strong, oxidant, hydrogen, 'peroxide,', which, suggested, that, redox, perturbations, and, reactive, oxygen, species, are, involved, in, their, stress, response, regulations])].
[sujeto([p38]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, involved, in, 'TGF-beta-induced', gene, 'expression,', but, the, upstream, of, the, signaling, pathway, leading, to, the, activation, of, p38, is, left, undefined])].
[sujeto(['Western', blot, analysis, revealed, that, 'TGF-beta']), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, activation, of, p38, within, 1, h, post, 'TGF-beta', treatment])].
[sujeto(['H2O2', also, strongly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([p38, activation, in, a, time, dependent, manner])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observed, that, 'TGF-beta-induced', p38, activation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'PDTC,', 'pyrrolidinedithiocarbamate,', a, known, 'antioxidant,', and, 'DPI,', diphenylene, iodonium, 'chloride,', one, of, the, known, 'NADPH', oxidase, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['To', test, whether, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'TGF-beta-induced', p38, 'activation,', we, examined, the, generation, of, 'ROS', and, activation, of, 'NADPH', oxidase])].
[sujeto(['FACS', analysis, showed, that, 'TGF-beta']), verbo([induced]), complemento([generation, of, 'ROS', in, 'time-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['DPI,', an, inhibitor, of, 'NADPH', 'oxidase,']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['TGF-beta-induced', 'ROS', production])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'TGF-beta-induced', p38, activation, is, mediated, by, 'Rac1-regulated', generation, of, reactive, oxygen, species, in, cultured, human, keratinocytes])].
[sujeto(['Low-level', arsenite, treatment, of, porcine, aortic, endothelial, cells, '(', 'PAEC)']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([superoxide, accumulation, that, was, attenuated, by, inhibitors, of, 'NAD(P)H', oxidase])].
[sujeto(['To', demonstrate, whether, arsenite]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento(['NADPH', 'oxidase,', intact, 'PAEC', were, treated, with, arsenite, for, up, to, 2, h, and, membrane, fractions, were, prepared, to, measure, 'NADPH', oxidase, activity])].
[sujeto(['Arsenite', '(', 5, 'microM)']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([a, twofold, increase, in, activity, by, 1, 'h,', which, was, inhibited, by, the, oxidase, inhibitor, diphenyleneiodonium, chloride])].
[sujeto(['Immunodepletion', of, 'p67(phox)', blocked, oxidase, activity]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, all, three, compounds])].
[sujeto(['However,', depleting, 'Rac1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([responses, only, to, arsenite, and, angiotensin, 'II'])].
[sujeto(['The', neutrophil, 'NADPH', oxidase, activation, 'factors,', 'p47,', p67, and, the, small, 'guanosine-nucleotide-binding', regulatory, '(', 'G)', protein, 'Rac1,', were]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, a, 'baculovirus/insect', cell, system, and, purified])].
[sujeto(['Elicitation', of, full, oxidase, activity, on, crude, neutrophil, membranes, using, a, 'cell-free', system]), verbo([required]), complemento([addition, of, recombinant, p47, and, 'p67,', but, not, that, of, 'Rac'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', in, the, case, of, 'KCl-washed', 'membranes,', addition, of, 'Rac,', prenylated, or, 'unprocessed,', together, with, p47, and, p67, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, enhance, oxidase, activation, up, to, fivefold])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, plasma, membrane, of, resting, neutrophils, contains, a, sufficient, amount, of, prenylated, 'Rac', for, efficient, oxidase, activation])].
[sujeto(['We', therefore, propose, that, 'Rac']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, 'membrane-associated', role, and, helps, to, dock, and, position, p47, and, p67, on, the, flavocytochrome, b, component, of, the, oxidase, complex])].
[sujeto(['Among', 'them,', 'Stem-A']), verbo([expresses]), complemento([genes, relating, to, stemness, and, is, correlated, with, poor, clinical, prognosis])].
[sujeto(['Si-FZD7', 'OC', cells, showed, reduced, cell, proliferation, with, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, 'G0/G1', 'sub-population,', with, no, effect, on, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['The', cells, also, displayed, a, distinctive, morphologic, change, by, colony, compaction, to, become, more, 'epithelial-like', and, polarised, with, smaller, internuclear, distances, and]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['z-axis', height])].
[sujeto(['Immunofluorescence', '(', 'IF)', staining, patterns, of, 'pan-cadherin', and, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-catenin']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([an, increase, in, 'cadherin-based', 'cell-cell', adhesion, in, 'si-FZD7', cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observed, a, significant, rearrangement, in, the, actin, cytoskeleton, and, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, tensile, contractility, in, 'si-FZD7', 'OC', 'cells,', as, evident, by, the, loss, of, stress, fibres, and, the, redistribution, of, 'phospho-myosin', light, chain, '(', 'pMLC)', from, the, sites, of, 'cell-cell', contacts, to, the, periphery, of, cell, colonies])].
[sujeto(['These', changes, in, pMLC, and, 'RhoA,', as, well, as, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['TopFlash', reporter, activities, in, 'si-FZD7', 'cells,', suggested, involvement, of, the, 'non-canonical', 'Wnt/planar', cell, polarity, '(', 'PCP)', pathway])].
[sujeto(['Selected', 'PCP', pathway, genes, '(', cadherin, 'EGF', 'LAG', 'seven-pass', 'G-type', receptor, 3, '(', 'CELSR3),', prickle, homolog, 4, '(', 'Drosophila)', '(', 'PRICKLE4),', 'dishevelled-associated', activator, of, morphogenesis, 1, '(', 'DAAM1),', profilin, 2, '(', 'PFN2),', protocadherin, 9, '(', 'PCDH9),', protocadherin, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;1', '(', 'PCDHA1),', protocadherin, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;17', pseudogene, '(', 'PCDHB17),', protocadherin, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;3', '(', 'PCDHB3),', sprouty, homolog, 1, '(', 'SPRY1)', and, protein, tyrosine, kinase, 7, '(', 'PTK7))', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, more, highly, expressed, in, 'Stem-A', than, non, 'Stem-A', subgroup, of, 'OC'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'FZD7', might, drive, aggressiveness, in, 'Stem-A', 'OC', by, regulating, cell, 'proliferation,', cell, cycle, 'progression,', maintenance, of, the, 'Mes', phenotype, and, cell, migration, via, casein, kinase, 1, &, 'Eacute;&rsaquo;-mediated', 'non-canonical', 'Wnt/PCP', pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', a, 'Drosophila', screen, for, oncogenes, that, cooperate, with, an]), verbo([activated]), complemento([allele, of, 'Ras', '(', 'Ras(ACT))', to, promote, tissue, overgrowth, and, 'invasion,', we, identified, the, 'GTP', exchange, factor, 'RhoGEF2,', an, activator, of, 'Rho-family', signalling])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'RhoGEF2', also, cooperates, with, an]), verbo([activated]), complemento([allele, of, a, downstream, effector, of, 'Ras,', 'Raf', '(', 'Raf(GOF))'])].
[sujeto(['We', dissect, the, downstream, pathways, through, which, 'RhoGEF2', cooperates, with, 'Ras(ACT)', '(', and, 'Raf(GOF)),', and, show, that, 'RhoGEF2']), verbo([requires]), complemento(['Rho1,', but, not, 'Rac,', for, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', of, the, 'Rho1', 'effectors,', we, show, that, 'RhoGEF2', +, 'Ras', '(', 'Raf)-mediated', tumorigenesis]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, 'Rho', kinase, '(', 'Rok)-Myosin-II', 'pathway,', but, not, 'Diaphanous,', 'Lim', kinase, or, protein, kinase, 'N'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho1-Rok-Myosin-II', pathway]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, the, activation, of, 'Jun', kinase, '(', 'JNK),', in, cooperation, with, 'Ras(ACT)'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, show, that, activation, of, 'Rok', or, 'Myosin', 'II,', using, constitutively, active, 'transgenes,', is, sufficient, for, cooperative, tumorigenesis, with, 'Ras(ACT),', and, together, with, 'Ras(ACT)']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, strong, activation, of, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['Our', observation, that, activation, of, 'Myosin', 'II,', which]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Filamentous', actin, '(', 'F-actin)', contractility, without, affecting, 'F-actin', 'levels,', cooperates, with, 'Ras(ACT)', to, promote, 'JNK', activation, and, 'tumorigenesis,', suggests, that, increased, cell, contractility, is, a, key, factor, in, tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, show, that, signalling, via, the, 'Tumour', necrosis, factor, '(', 'TNF;', also, known, as, 'Egr)-ligand-JNK', pathway, is, most, likely, the, predominant, pathway, that]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['JNK', upon, 'Rok', activation])].
[sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'C-related', kinase, 1, '(', 'PRK1', or, 'PKN)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, regulation, of, the, intermediate, filaments, of, the, actin, 'cytoskeleton,', as, well, as, having, effects, on, processes, as, diverse, as, mitotic, timing, and, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['It', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, interacting, with, the, 'Rho', family, small, 'G', proteins, and, arachidonic, acid, or, by, caspase, cleavage])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, 'HR1b', of, 'PRK1', binds, exclusively, to, 'Rac1,', whereas, the, 'HR1a', domain, binds, to, both, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, solution, structure, of, the, 'HR1b-Rac', complex])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'HR1b']), verbo([binds]), complemento([to, the, 'C-terminal', end, of, the, effector, loop, and, switch, 2, of, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rac1', 'C-terminal', region, reverses, in, direction, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, residues, in, switch, 2, ',', and, the, polybasic, region, itself, interacts, with, residues, in, 'HR1b'])].
[sujeto(['The', interactions, with, 'HR1b', do, not]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([the, polybasic, region, being, available, to, contact, the, negatively, charged, membrane, 'phospholipids,', which, is, considered, to, be, its, primary, role])].
[sujeto(['Activated', 'GTPases', of, the, 'Rho', family]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, spectrum, of, functionally, diverse, downstream, 'effectors,', initiating, a, network, of, signal, transduction, pathways, by, interaction, and, activation, of, effector, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Although', effectors, are, defined, as, proteins, that, selectively]), verbo([bind]), complemento([the, 'GTP-bound', state, of, the, small, 'GTPases,', there, have, been, also, several, indications, for, a, 'nucleotide-independent', binding, mode])].
[sujeto(['By', characterizing, the, molecular, mechanism, of, 'RhoA', interaction, with, its, 'effectors,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, equilibrium, dissociation, constants, of, several, 'Rho-binding', domains, of, three, different, effector, proteins, '(', 'Rhotekin,', 'ROCKI/ROK', 'beta/p160ROCK,', 'PRK1/PKNalpha', where, 'ROK', is, 'RhoA-binding', 'kinase)', for, both, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, two, novel, 'Rho-interacting', domains, in, 'ROCKI,', which, bind, 'RhoA', with, high, affinity, but, not, 'Cdc42', or, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Our', 'results,', together, with, recent, structural, 'data,', support, the, notion, of, multiple, 'effector-binding', sites, in, 'RhoA', and, strongly, indicate, a, cooperative]), verbo([binding]), complemento([mechanism, for, 'PRK1', and, 'ROCKI', that, may, be, the, molecular, basis, of, 'Rho-mediated', effector, activation])].
[sujeto(['It', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([either, by, members, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'G', 'proteins,', by, 'proteolysis,', or, by, interaction, with, lipids])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, investigate, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'PRK1', to, 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1,', two, members, of, the, 'Rho', family])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrate, that, 'PRK1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([with, a, similar, affinity, to, 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 'NMR', to, map, the, binding, contacts, of, the, 'HR1b', domain, with, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, mutagenesis, to, define, the, residues, in, 'Rac', that, are, important, for, binding, to, 'HR1b'])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', as, well, as, residues, adjacent, to, 'Switch', 'I,', in, 'Switch', 'II,', and, in, helix, 'alpha5,', it, appears, that, the, 'C-terminal', stretch, of, basic, amino, acids, in, 'Rac', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, a, high, affinity, interaction, with, 'HR1b'])].
[sujeto(['PKNbeta', is, a, novel, isoform, of, 'PKNalpha,', which, is, one, of, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([protein, kinases, for, the, small, 'GTPase', 'Rho'])].
[sujeto(['Northern', and, 'Western', blot, analyses, demonstrated, that, 'Graf2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, several, 'tissues,', with, the, highest, expression, in, skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['The', 'SH3', domains, of, 'Graf', and, 'Graf2', purified, from, 'Escherichia', coli]), verbo([bound]), complemento([directly, to, 'PKNbeta'])].
[sujeto(['The', interplay, of, 'PKNbeta', and, the, 'GTPase-activating', 'proteins,', 'Graf', and, 'Graf2,', may, offer, a, novel, mechanism]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, 'Rho-mediated', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Rho', family, 'GTPases']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([multiple, cellular, 'processes,', including, cytoskeletal, 'organization,', gene, 'expression,', and, transformation])].
[sujeto(['A', series, of, 'RhoA/Rac1', and, 'Rho/Ras', chimeras, was, generated, to, map, the, 'domain(s)', of, 'RhoA']), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, its, association, with, two, classes, of, effector, 'kinase,', represented, by, 'PRK2', and, 'ROCK-I'])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, switch, 1, domain, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, effector, 'binding,', the, 'N', terminus, of, 'Rho', '(', residues, 1, -, 75, ')', was, interchangeable, with, that, of, 'Rac'])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, the, region, of, 'Rho', that, confers, effector, binding, specificity, lay, further, 'C-terminal'])].
[sujeto(['However,', a, determinant, for, effector]), verbo([binding]), complemento([was, identified, between, 'Rho', residues, 75, -, 92])].
[sujeto(['Rac', to, 'Rho', point, mutations, '(', 'V85D', or, 'A88D)', within, loop, 6, of, 'Rac']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([its, association, with, 'PRK2', and, 'ROCK,', whereas, the, reciprocal, 'Rho(D87V/D90A)', double, mutant, significantly, reduced, effector, binding, capacity])].
[sujeto(['In', vivo, studies, showed, that, microinjection, of, 'Rac(Q6IL/V85D/A88D)', but, not, 'Rac(Q6IL)']), verbo([induced]), complemento([stress, fiber, formation, in, 'LLC-PK', epithelial, 'cells,', suggesting, that, loop, 6, residues, conferred, the, ability, of, 'Rac', to, activate, 'ROCK'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, although, 'Rho', effectors, can, utilize, a, 'Rho', or, 'Rac', switch, 1, domain, to, sense, the, 'GTP-bound', state, of, 'Rho,', unique, residues, within, loop, 6, are, essential, for, determining, both, effector, binding, specificity, and, cellular, function])].
[sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'N', 1, '(', 'PKN1),', which, in, part, resembles, yeast, protein, kinase, 'C,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, under, the, control, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', and, 3, -, 'phosphoinositide-dependent', kinase, 1, '(', 'PDK1)'])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, green, fluorescent, 'protein-tagged', 'PKN1']), verbo([has]), complemento([the, ability, to, translocate, in, a, reversible, manner, to, a, vesicular, compartment, following, hyperosmotic, stress])].
[sujeto(['PKN1', kinase, activity, is, not, necessary, for, this, 'translocation,', and, in, fact, the, 'PKN', inhibitor, 'HA1077', is, also, shown, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['PKN1', vesicle, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['PKN1', translocation, is, dependent, on, 'Rac1', 'activation,', although, the, 'GTPase']), verbo([binding]), complemento(['HR1abc', domain, is, not, sufficient, for, this, recruitment])].
[sujeto(['It', is, established, that, this, activation, pathway]), verbo([involves]), complemento(['PDK1,', which, is, shown, to, be, recruited, to, this, 'PKN1-positive', compartment, upon, hyperosmotic, stress])].
[sujeto(['Work', from, a, number, of, laboratories]), verbo([has]), complemento([established, a, role, for, certain, small, 'GTP-binding', proteins, in, controlling, the, enzymatic, activity, of, a, family, of, 'serine-threonine', kinases, known, as, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinases, '(', 'MAPKs)'])].
[sujeto(['MAPKs']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, classified, into, three, 'subfamilies:', extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinases, '(', 'ERKs),', also, known, as, 'MAPKs;', 'c-Jun', 'N-terminal', kinases, '(', 'JNKs);', and, p38, kinase])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', 'Ras', controls, the, activation, of, 'MAPKs,', we, and, others]), verbo([have]), complemento([recently, observed, that, in, certain, 'cells,', the, small, 'GTP-binding', proteins, 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42', but, not, 'Rho', regulate, the, activity, of, 'JNKs'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', because, 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42', but, not, 'Rho']), verbo([bind]), complemento([and, activate, a, kinase, known, as, 'Pak1,', it, has, been, suggested, that, 'Pak1', is, the, most, upstream, component, of, the, pathway, linking, these, 'GTPases', to, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, both, yeast, and, mammalian, 'cells,', 'Rho1p,', a, 'Rho', 'homologue,', and, 'RhoA,', 'respectively,', directly]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, a, number, of, 'proteins,', including, kinases, related, to, protein, kinase, 'C'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', in, 'yeast,', 'Rho1p', controls, the, activity, of, a, 'MAPK', cascade]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, bud, formation])].
[sujeto(['Considering', this, diversity, of]), verbo([target]), complemento([molecules, for, small, 'GTP-binding', 'proteins,', their, likely, tissue, specific, 'distribution,', and, the, potential, role, for, 'Rho', in, signaling, to, a, kinase, 'cascade,', we, decided, to, extend, our, initial, 'analysis,', exploring, the, ability, of, 'Ras', and, 'Rho-related', 'GTP-binding', proteins, to, activate, 'MAPK', or, 'JNK', in, a, variety, of, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, in, the, human, kidney, epithelial, cell, 'line,', 293, 'T,', 'Cdc42', and, all, 'Rho', 'proteins,', 'RhoA,', 'RhoB,', and, 'RhoC,', but, not, 'Rac', or, 'Ras', can, induce, activation, of, 'JNK'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, signaling, from, 'Rho', proteins, to, 'JNK', in, 293, 'T', cells, does, not, involve, 'Pak1'])].
[sujeto(['Taken', together, these, findings, demonstrate, that, 'Rho', signals, to, 'JNK', in, a, cell, 'type-specific', manner, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, existence, of, a, 'novel,', 'Pak1-independent', signaling, route, communicating, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'GTP-binding', proteins, to, the, 'JNK', pathway])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho-related', 'GTP-binding', proteins, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, regulate, signaling, pathways, involved, in, cytoskeletal, reorganization, and, 'stress-responsive', 'JNK', '(', 'Jun', 'N-terminal', 'kinase)', activation])].
[sujeto(['However,', to, 'date,', the, 'GTPase']), verbo([targets]), complemento([that, mediate, these, effects, have, not, been, identified])].
[sujeto(['PAK', defines, a, growing, family, of, mammalian, kinases, that, are, related, to, yeast, 'Ste20', and, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, vitro, through, binding, to, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1', '(', 'PAK:', p21, 'Cdc42-/Rac-activated', 'kinase)'])].
[sujeto(['Clues', to, 'PAK', function]), verbo([have]), complemento([come, from, studies, of, 'Ste20,', which, controls, the, activity, of, the, yeast, mating, 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinase, 'cascade,', in, response, to, a, heterotrimeric, 'G', protein, and, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['When']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'yeast,', hPAK1, was, able, to, replace, 'Ste20', in, the, pheromone, response, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Chemical', mutagenesis, of, a, plasmid, encoding, 'hPAK1,', followed, by, transformation, into, 'yeast,']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, the, identification, of, a, potent, constitutively, active, hPAK1, with, a, substitution, of, a, highly, conserved, 'amino-acid', residue, '(', 'L107F)', in, the, 'Cdc42-binding', domain])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, the, 'hPAK1(L107F)', allele, in, mammalian, cells]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, specific, activation, of, the, 'Jun', 'N-terminal', kinase, 'MAP', kinase, 'pathway,', but, not, the, mechanistically, related, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', 'MAP', kinase, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'PAK', and, 'Ste20', kinases, play, key, parts, in, linking, extracellular, signals, from, membrane, 'components,', such, as, 'receptor-associated', 'G', proteins, and, 'Rho-related', 'GTPases,', to]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['responses,', such, as, transcriptional, activation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, a, closely, related, 'PKN', homolog, in, 'Drosophila', '(', 'Pkn)', that, binds, specifically, to, 'GTP-activated', 'Rho1', and, 'Rac1', 'GTPases', through, distinct, binding, sites, on, 'Pkn'])].
[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, 'Pkn', with, either, of, these, 'GTPases', results, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([kinase, 'activity,', suggesting, that, 'Pkn', is, a, shared, 'Rho/Rac', effector, target])].
[sujeto(['Characterization', of, a, 'loss-of-function', mutant, of, 'Drosophila', 'Pkn', revealed, that, this, kinase, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([specifically, for, the, epidermal, cell, shape, changes, during, the, morphogenetic, process, of, dorsal, closure, of, the, developing, embryo])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'Pkn,', as, well, as, the, 'Rho1', 'GTPase,']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([a, pathway, for, cell, shape, changes, in, dorsal, closure, that, is, independent, of, the, previously, reported, 'Rac', 'GTPase-mediated', 'Jun', amino, '(', 'N)-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', cascade, that, regulates, gene, expression, required, for, dorsal, closure])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', it, appears, that, distinct, but, coordinated, 'Rho-', and, 'Rac-mediated', signaling, pathways]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, cell, shape, changes, required, for, dorsal, closure, and, that, 'Pkn', provides, a, 'GTPase', effector, function, for, cell, shape, changes, in, 'vivo,', which, acts, together, with, a, 'Rac-JNK', transcriptional, pathway, in, the, morphogenesis, of, the, 'Drosophila', embryo])].
[sujeto(['One', clone, obtained, by, this, procedure, contained, a, novel, cDNA, of, 291, base, pairs, and]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([strongly, with, 'RhoA', and, 'RhoC,', weakly, with, 'RhoB,', and, not, at, all, with, 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42Hs'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'N-terminal', part, of, 'rhotekin,', encoded, by, the, initial, cDNA, and, produced, in, bacteria, as, a, glutathione, 'S-transferase', fusion, 'protein,', exhibited, in, vitro]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 35, 'S-labeled', guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 3, -, 'O-(thio)triphosphate-bound', 'Rho,', but, not, to, 'Rac1', or, 'Cdc42Hs', in, ligand, overlay, assays])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', this, peptide]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([both, endogenous, and, 'GTPase-activating', 'protein-stimulated', 'Rho', 'GTPase', activity])].
[sujeto(['The', amino, acid, sequence, of, this, region, shares, approximately, 30, '%', identity, with, the, 'Rho-binding', domains, of, rhophilin, and, a, 'serine/threonine', 'kinase,', 'PKN,', two, other, 'Rho']), verbo([target]), complemento([proteins, that, we, recently, identified, '(', 'Watanabe,', 'G'])].
[sujeto(['To', our, 'knowledge,', this, is, the, first]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([sequence, for, 'Rho', 'effectors,', and, we, have, termed, this, region, 'Rho', effector, motif, class, 1])].

[sujeto(['The', mechanism, of, 'BCL-6', inhibition, does, not]), verbo([involve]), complemento([formation, of, a, stable, 'Rac1/BCL-6', complex, and, is, independent, of, 'Rac-induced', reactive, oxygen, species, production, or, 'Jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', kinase, activation])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'PAK1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([inhibition, downstream, of, 'Rac', and, can, directly, phosphorylate, 'BCL-6'])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([substantial, evidence, that, 'Rac1', signaling, inhibits, the, transcriptional, repressor, 'BCL-6', in, colorectal, cells, and, reveal, a, novel, pathway, that, links, 'Rac1', signaling, to, the, regulation, of, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Angiotensin', 'II', '(', 'Ang', 'II)']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([migration, of, vascular, smooth, muscle, cell, '(', 'VSMC)', in, addition, to, its, contribution, to, contraction, and, hypertrophy])].
[sujeto(['It', is, well, established, that, 'Rho', 'GTPases']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([cellular, contractility, and, migration, by, reorganizing, the, actin, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['Ang', 'II']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Rac1', 'GTPase,', but, its, upstream, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)', remains, elusive])].
[sujeto(['betaPIX-specific', siRNA, treatment, significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Ang', 'II-induced', 'VSMC', migration])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, betaPIX, is, involved, in, 'Ang', 'II-induced', 'VSMC', migration])].
[sujeto(['There', is, now, considerable, experimental, evidence, that, aberrant, activation, of, 'Rho', family, small, 'GTPases']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([uncontrolled, 'proliferation,', 'invasion,', and, metastatic, properties, of, human, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', to, 'date,', most, efforts]), verbo([have]), complemento([focused, on, inhibitors, that, block, 'Rho', 'GTPase', function, 'indirectly,', either, by, targeting, enzymes, involved, in, 'post-translational', processing, or, downstream, protein, kinase, effectors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([reported, the, identification, and, characterization, of, the, 'EHT', 1864, small, molecule, as, an, inhibitor, of, 'Rac', family, small, 'GTPases,', placing, 'Rac1', in, an, inert, and, inactive, state, and, then, impairing, 'Rac1-mediated', functions, in, vivo])].

[sujeto(['The', small, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases', 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1']), verbo([have]), complemento([each, been, shown, to, function, in, insulin, exocytosis, and, are, presumed, to, function, in, actin, remodeling, and, insulin, granule, mobilization])].

[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, small, interfering, 'RNA-mediated', depletion, of, 'Cdc42', from, isolated, islets, results, in, the, selective]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, second, phase, insulin, release])].

[sujeto(['GTP']), verbo([bound]), complemento(['Rac1', then, activates, its, downstream, 'effectors,', including, p21, activated, kinases, '(', 'PAK)'])].

[sujeto(['A', series, of, recent, studies]), verbo([report]), complemento([novel, roles, for, 'Pak1,', a, key, member, of, the, highly, conserved, family, of, 'serine-threonine', protein, kinases, regulated, by, 'Ras-related', small, 'G-proteins,', 'Cdc42/Rac1,', in, cardiac, physiology, and, cardioprotection])].

[sujeto(['Zoledronic', acid, is, being, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([for, its, antitumor, 'properties,', but, the, underlying, functions, are, not, well, understood])].

[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, in, 'PIK3CA', mutant, and, 'HER2', amplified, breast, cancers, sensitive, to, 'PI3K', 'inhibitors,', 'PI3K', inhibition, led, to, a, rapid, suppression, of, 'Rac1/p21-activated', kinase, '(', 'PAK)/protein', kinase, 'C-RAF', '(', 'C-RAF)/', protein, kinase, 'MEK', '(', 'MEK)/ERK', signaling, that, did, not, involve, 'RAS'])].

[sujeto(['Endothelial', cell, '(', 'EC)', migration]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, important, role, in, angiogenesis])].

[sujeto(['The', 'P-Rex', '(', phosphatidylinositol, '(', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, ')', -, trisphosphate, '(', 'PIP3)-dependent', 'Rac', 'exchanger)', family, '(', 'P-Rex1', and, 'P-Rex2)', of, the, 'Rho', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'Rho', 'GEFs)']), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Rac', 'GTPases', to, regulate, cell, 'migration,', 'invasion,', and, metastasis, in, several, human, cancers])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([the, 1.95, &, 'Atilde;&hellip;', crystal, structure, of, the, catalytic, 'P-Rex1', 'DH-PH', tandem, domain, in, complex, with, its, cognate, 'GTPase,', 'Rac1', '(', 'Ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, 'substrate-1)'])].

[sujeto(['P-Rex1', is, a, 'GEF', '(', 'guanine-nucleotide-exchange', 'factor)', for, the, small, 'G-protein', 'Rac', that, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'PIP3', '(', phosphatidylinositol, 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, 'trisphosphate)', and, 'G&Icirc;&sup2;&Icirc;&sup3;', subunits, and, inhibited, by, 'PKA', '(', protein, kinase, 'A)'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we, show, that, 'PP1&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', protein, phosphatase, 1, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;)']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['P-Rex1', through, an, 'RVxF-type', docking, motif])].
[sujeto(['PP1&Icirc;&plusmn;']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['P-Rex1', directly, in, 'vitro,', both, independently, of, and, additively, to, 'PIP3', and, 'G&Icirc;&sup2;&Icirc;&sup3;'])].
[sujeto(['PP1&Icirc;&plusmn;', also, substantially]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['P-Rex1', in, 'vivo,', both, in, basal, and, 'PDGF', '(', 'platelet-derived', growth, 'factor)-', or, 'LPA', '(', lysophosphatidic, 'acid)-stimulated', cells])].

[sujeto(['PP1&Icirc;&plusmn;']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['P-Rex1-mediated', 'Rac-dependent', changes, in, endothelial, cell, morphology])].
[sujeto(['Site-directed', mutagenesis, of, 'Ser1165', to, alanine]), verbo([caused]), complemento([activation, of, 'P-Rex1', to, a, similar, degree, as, did, 'PP1&Icirc;&plusmn;,', confirming, 'Ser1165', as, a, dephosphorylation, site, important, in, regulating, 'P-Rex1', 'Rac-GEF', activity])].

[sujeto(['To', 'date,', substrate, recognition, and, specificity, of, this, family, of, 'GEFs']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, mediated, exclusively, via, the, 'Dbl', homology, domain])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([the, novel, and, unexpected, finding, 'that,', in, the, 'Dbl', family, 'Rac-specific', 'GEF', 'P-Rex2,', it, is, the, 'PH', domain, that, confers, substrate, specificity, and, recognition])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, beta3beta4, loop, of, the, 'PH', domain, of, 'P-Rex2', is, the, determinant, for, 'Rac1', 'recognition,', as, substitution, of, the, beta3beta4, loop, of, the, 'PH', domain, of, 'Dbs', '(', a, 'RhoA-', and, 'Cdc42-specific', 'GEF)', with, that, of, 'P-Rex2']), verbo([confers]), complemento(['Rac1-specific', binding, capability, to, the, 'PH', domain, of, 'Dbs'])].
[sujeto(['The', contact, interface, between, the, 'PH', domain, of, 'P-Rex2', and, 'Rac1']), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, switch, loop, and, helix, 3, of, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', substitution, of, helix, 3, of, 'Cdc42', with, that, of, 'Rac1', now, enables, the, 'PH', domain, of, 'P-Rex2', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([this, 'Cdc42', chimera])].
[sujeto(['Despite', having, the, ability, to]), verbo([recognize]), complemento([this, chimeric, 'Cdc42,', 'P-Rex2', is, unable, to, catalyze, nucleotide, exchange, on, 'Cdc42,', suggesting, that, recognition, of, substrate, and, catalysis, are, two, distinct, events])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DEPDC1B', protein, exhibits, the, characteristic, features, of, a, signaling, 'protein,', and, contains, 2]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([domains, '(', 'DEP', and, 'RhoGAP)', that, are, involved, in, 'Rho', 'GTPase', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Small', 'GTPases,', such, as, 'Rac,', 'CDC42,', and, 'Rho,']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, multitude, of, cell, 'events,', including, cell, 'motility,', 'growth,', 'differentiation,', cytoskeletal, reorganization, and, cell, cycle, progression])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, it, was, a, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, and, induced, both, cell, migration, in, a, cultured, embryonic, fibroblast, cell, line, and, cell, invasion, in, cancer, cell, 'lines;', 'moreover,', it, was, observed, to, promote, 'anchorage-independent', growth, in, oral, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrated, that, 'DEPDC1B', plays, a, role, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Rac1', translocated, onto, cell, 'membranes,', suggesting, that, 'DEPDC1B', exerts, a, biological, function, by, regulating, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['DEPDC1B', was, a, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, and]), verbo([induced]), complemento([both, cell, migration, in, a, cultured, embryonic, fibroblast, cell, line, and, cell, invasion, in, cancer, cell, 'lines;', 'moreover,', it, was, observed, to, promote, 'anchorage-independent', growth, in, oral, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, demonstrated, that, 'DEPDC1B', exerts, a, biological, function, by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, oral, cancer, samples, overexpressed, 'DEPDC1B', 'proteins,', compared, with, normal, adjacent, tissue])].
[sujeto(['Cyclic', stretch, is, an, artificial, model, of, mechanical, force, 'loading,', which]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, reorientation, of, vascular, endothelial, cells, and, their, stress, fibers, in, a, direction, perpendicular, to, the, stretch, axis])].
[sujeto(['A', screen, of, short, hairpin, 'RNAs']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([63, 'Rho', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'Rho-GEFs)', revealed, that, at, least, 11, 'Rho-GEFs', &, 'acirc;&euro;&ldquo;', 'Abr,', 'alsin,', 'ARHGEF10,', 'Bcr,', 'GEF-H1', '(', also, known, as, 'ARHGEF2),', 'LARG', '(', also, known, as, 'ARHGEF12),', p190RhoGEF, '(', also, known, as, 'ARHGEF28),', 'PLEKHG1,', 'P-REX2,', 'Solo', '(', also, known, as, 'ARHGEF40)', and, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-PIX', '(', also, known, as, 'ARHGEF6)', &, 'acirc;&euro;&ldquo;', which, specifically, or, broadly, target, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1', 'and/or', 'Cdc42,', are, involved, in, 'cyclic-stretch-induced', perpendicular, reorientation, of, endothelial, cells])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'Solo']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['RhoA', activation, and, 'F-actin', accumulation, at, 'cell-cell', and, 'cell-substrate', adhesion, sites])].
[sujeto(['Knockdown', of, 'Solo']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['cyclic-stretch-', or, 'tensile-force-induced', 'RhoA', activation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Solo', is, involved, in, 'cell-cell-adhesion-mediated', mechanical, signal, transduction, during, 'cyclic-stretch-induced', endothelial, cell, reorientation])].
[sujeto(['New', drug]), verbo([targets]), complemento([are, urgently, needed, for, the, treatment, of, patients, with, pancreatic, ductal, adenocarcinoma, '(', 'PDA)'])].
[sujeto(['Pharmacological', inhibition, of, 'KRAS']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, 'unsuccessful,', leading, to, a, focus, on, downstream, effectors, that, are, more, easily, targeted, with, small, molecule, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Pancreatitis', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([with, 5, daily, intraperitoneal, injections, of, cerulein])].
[sujeto(['Tissues', and, cells, were, analyzed, by, 'histology,', 'immunohistochemistry,', quantitative, 'reverse-transcription', polymerase, chain, 'reaction,', and, immunofluorescence, analyses, for, factors]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, 'PI3K', signaling, pathway])].
[sujeto(['Pancreas-specific', disruption, of, 'Pik3ca', or, 'Rac1,', but, not, 'Pik3cb,']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, development, of, pancreatic, tumors, in, 'Kras(G12D/+);Ptf1a(Cre/+)', mice])].
[sujeto(['Levels', of]), verbo([activated]), complemento([and, total, 'RAC1', were, higher, in, pancreatic, tissues, from, 'Kras(G12D/+);Ptf1a(Cre/+)', mice, compared, with, controls])].
[sujeto(['p110&Icirc;&plusmn;', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, 'up-regulation', and, activity, of, 'RAC', guanine, exchange, factors, during, tumorigenesis])].

[sujeto(['KRAS', 'signaling,', via, 'p110&Icirc;&plusmn;', to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['RAC1,', is, required, for, transformation, in, 'Kras(G12D/+);Ptf1a(Cre/+)', mice])].
[sujeto(['CADM1', '(', 'Cell', adhesion, molecule, 1, ')', ',', a, cell, adhesion, molecule, belonging, to, the, immunoglobulin, 'superfamily,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'cell-cell', interaction, and, the, formation, and, maintenance, of, epithelial, structure])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, intracellular, signaling, pathways]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'CADM1-mediated', cell, adhesion, remain, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, established, a, 'cell-based', spreading, assay, to, analyze, the, signaling, pathway, specifically]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, the, 'trans-homophilic', interaction, of, 'CADM1'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'assay,', 'MDCK', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([exogenous, 'CADM1', were, incubated, on, the, glass, coated, with, a, recombinant, extracellular, fragment, of, 'CADM1,', and, the, degree, of, cell, spreading, was, quantified, by, measuring, their, surface, area])].
[sujeto(['Assay', screening, of, 104, chemical, inhibitors, with, known, functions, revealed, that, 'LY294002,', an, inhibitor, of, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K),', efficiently]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([cell, spreading, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Inhibitors', of, 'Akt', and, 'Rac1,', downstream, effectors, of, 'PI3K,', also, partially]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([cell, 'spreading,', while, the, addition, of, both, inhibitors, blocked, cell, spreading, to, the, same, extent, as, did, 'LY294002'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'trans-homophilic', interaction, mediated, by, 'CADM1', activates, the, 'PI3K', pathway, to, reorganize, the, actin, cytoskeleton, and, form, epithelial, cell, structure])].
[sujeto(['RAC1', and, 'CDC42,', but, not, 'RAS,']), verbo([bind]), complemento([and, activate, 'p110&Icirc;&sup2;', through, its, 'RAS-binding', domain])].
[sujeto(['Rapamycin']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, inhibit, migration, of, gastric, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, role, of, mTOR, pathway, in, 'CXCL12/CXCR4-mediated', cell, migration, and, the, potential, of, drugs]), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['PI3K/mTOR', pathway, remains, unelucidated])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'CXCL12', activated, 'PI3K/Akt/mTOR', pathway, in, 'MKN-45', cells])].
[sujeto(['Stimulating', 'CHO-K1', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['pEGFP-C1-Grp1-PH', fusion, protein, with, 'CXCL12', resulted, in, generation, of, phosphatidylinositol, '(', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, ')', -, 'triphosphate,', which, provided, direct, evidence, of, activating, 'PI3K', by, 'CXCL12'])].
[sujeto(['Down-regulation', of, 'p110&Icirc;&sup2;', by, siRNA, but, not, 'p110&Icirc;&plusmn;', blocked, phosphorylation, of, 'Akt', and, 'S6K1']), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'CXCL12'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'CXCR4', immunoprecipitated, by, 'anti-p110&Icirc;&sup2;', antibody]), verbo([increased]), complemento([after, 'CXCL12', stimulation, and, 'G(i)', protein, inhibitor, pertussis, toxin, abrogated, 'CXCL12-induced', activation, of, 'PI3K'])].
[sujeto(['Further', studies, demonstrated, that, inhibitors]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, 'PI3K/mTOR', pathway, significantly, blocked, the, chemotactic, responses, of, 'MKN-45', cells, triggered, by, 'CXCL12,', which, might, be, attributed, primarily, to, inhibition, of, mTORC1, and, related, to, prevention, of, 'F-actin', reorganization, as, well, as, 'down-regulation', of, active, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', rapamycin]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, secretion, of, 'CXCL12', and, the, expression, of, 'CXCR4,', which, might, form, a, positive, feedback, loop, to, further, abolish, upstream, signaling, leading, to, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([cells, expressing, high, levels, of, cxcl12, were, sensitive, to, rapamycin, in, its, activity, inhibiting, migration, as, well, as, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, mTOR, pathway, played, an, important, role, in, 'CXCL12/CXCR4-mediated', cell, migration, and, proposed, that, drugs, targeting, the, mTOR, pathway, may, be, used, for, the, therapy, of, metastatic, gastric, cancer, expressing, high, levels, of, cxcl12])].
[sujeto(['The', bacterial, pathogen, 'Listeria', monocytogenes]), verbo([causes]), complemento(['food-borne', illnesses, resulting, in, 'gastroenteritis,', 'meningitis,', or, abortion])].

[sujeto(['The', interaction, of, 'InlB', with, the, 'Met', receptor]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([host, signaling, pathways, that, promote, cell, surface, changes, driving, bacterial, uptake])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, mechanism, by, which, 'PI', 3, -, kinase]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([bacterial, internalization, is, not, understood])].
[sujeto(['The', 64, genes]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([encode, known, upstream, regulators, or, downstream, effectors, of, type, 'IA', 'PI', 3, -, kinase])].
[sujeto(['These', 9, human, proteins, include, a, 'Rab5', 'GTPase,', several, regulators, of, 'Arf', or, 'Rac1', 'GTPases,', and, the, 'serine/threonine', kinases, 'phosphoinositide-dependent', kinase, 1, '(', 'PDK1),', mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTor),', and, protein, kinase, 'C-&Icirc;&para;'])].

[sujeto(['In', primary, macrophages]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([with, the, tyrosine, kinase, ligand, 'colony-stimulating', factor, 1, '(', 'CSF1),', all, class, 'IA', 'PI3K', isoforms, participate, in, the, regulation, of, 'Rac1,', whereas, p110delta, selectively, controls, the, activities, of, 'Akt,', 'RhoA', and, 'PTEN,', in, addition, to, controlling, proliferation, and, chemotaxis])].
[sujeto(['The', prominent, role, of, p110delta, in, these, cells, correlates, with, it, being, the, main, 'PI3K', isoform, that, is]), verbo([recruited]), complemento([to, the, activated, 'CSF1', receptor, '(', 'CSF1R)'])].
[sujeto([2, ',', p110alpha, also, becomes, more, prominently]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'CSF1-induced', 'Akt', 'phosphorylation,', at, the, expense, of, p110delta])].

[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'p110delta-selective', 'PI3K', inhibitors, may, be, more, effective, in, inflammation, than, in, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Leukocyte', diapedesis, is, misregulated, in, inflammatory, disease, and, depends, on, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, monocytic, 'LFA-1', and, 'VLA-4', to, endothelial, 'ICAM-1', and, 'VCAM-1,', respectively])].

[sujeto(['In', human, peripheral, blood, monocytes, 'IC87114', was, as, effective, as, wortmannin, and, 'LY294002', at]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['diapedesis,', 'however,', in, 'THP-1', cells, 'LY294002', and, wortmannin, caused, a, 5, -, fold, reduction, in, 'diapedesis,', while, 'IC87114', only, decreased, diapedesis, 2, -, fold])].

[sujeto(['Flow', cytometric, analysis, demonstrated, that, 'PI3Kdelta', inhibition]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, amount, of, conformationally, active, beta, 1, -, 'integrins,', while, having, no, effect, on, the, prevalence, of, conformationally, active, beta, 2, -, integrins, expressed, on, the, cell, surface])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'PI3Kdelta', inhibition, resulted, in, a, 4, -, fold]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, the, activation, state, of, 'Rac-1', and, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, the, specific, necessity, of, 'PI3Kdelta', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([monocytic, integrin, activation, and, the, general, role, of, 'PI3K', signaling, during, 'diapedesis,', implicating, 'PI3K', as, a, target, for, therapeutic, intervention])].
[sujeto(['Rho', family, 'GTPases', control, a, diverse, range, of, cellular, 'processes,', and, their, deregulation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, human, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Guanine', nucleotide, dissociation, inhibitors, '(', 'GDIs)']), verbo([bind]), complemento([and, sequester, 'GTPases', in, the, 'cytosol,', restricting, their, actions])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI2', is, a, member, of, the, 'GDI', family, that]), verbo([acts]), complemento([as, a, metastasis, suppressor, in, a, variety, of, cancer, 'types;', 'however,', very, little, is, known, about, the, regulation, of, this, protein])].
[sujeto(['Phospho-mimetic', 'S31E-RhoGDI2', exhibits, reduced]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Rac1', relative, to, wild, 'type,', with, a, concomitant, failure, to, reduce, levels, of, activated, endogenous, 'Rac1', or, remove, 'Rac1', from, membranes])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, mechanism, of, downregulation, of, 'RhoGDI2', activity, through, 'PKC-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'Ser31'])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesize, that, this, mechanism, may, serve, to, neutralize, 'RhoGDI2', function, in, tumors, that]), verbo([express]), complemento(['RhoGDI2', and, active, 'PKC&Icirc;&plusmn;'])].
[sujeto(['Rho', 'GTPase', activation, is, partially]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([at, the, level, of, guanine, nucleotide, dissociation, 'inhibitors,', or, 'GDIs'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', to, 'GDIs', has, been, shown, to, dramatically, reduce, the, action, of, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', to, initiate, 'Rho', 'GTPase', activation])].
[sujeto(['Such', dissociation, would, likely, be, tightly, coupled, to, 'GEF-mediated', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, and, membrane, association, of, the]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['GTPase,', resulting, in, effector, binding, and, functional, responses])].
[sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, phosphorylation, of, either, the, 'Rho', 'GTPases', themselves, 'and/or', phosphorylation, of, 'GDIs', might, serve, as, a, mechanism, for, regulating, the, formation, 'and/or', dissociation, of, 'Rho', 'GTPase-GDI', complexes])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', the, selective]), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'Rac1', from, 'RhoGDI', complexes, induced, by, the, 'p21-activated', 'kinase-regulated', phosphorylation, of, 'RhoGDI', has, been, reported])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'G', proteins]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['L-type', 'Ca2+', currents, in, ventricular, cardiomyocytes])].
[sujeto(['Ventricular', myocytes, isolated, from, transgenic, '(', 'TG)', mice, that, overexpress, the, specific, 'GDP', dissociation, inhibitor, 'Rho', 'GDI-alpha', exhibited, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([basal, 'L-type', 'Ca2+', current, density, '(', approximately, 40, '%', ')', compared, with, myocytes, from, nontransgenic, '(', 'NTG)', mice])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ca2+', channel, agonist, 'BAY', 'K', 8644, and, the, 'beta-adrenergic', agonist, isoproterenol]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Ca2+', currents, in, both, 'NTG', and, 'TG', myocytes, to, a, similar, maximal, 'level,', and, no, changes, in, mRNA, or, protein, levels, were, observed, in, the, 'Ca2+', channel, 'alpha1-subunits'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, channel, activity, but, not, the, expression, level, was, altered, in, 'TG', myocytes])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', expression, of, a, 'dominant-negative', 'RhoA', but, not, a, 'dominant-negative', 'Rac-1', or, 'Cdc42', also, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['Ca2+', current, 'density,', which, indicates, that, inhibition, of, 'Ca2+', channel, activity, by, overexpression, of, 'Rho', 'GDI-alpha', is, mediated, by, inhibition, of, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['This', study, points, to, the, 'L-type', 'Ca2+', channel, activity, as, a, novel, downstream]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, the, 'RhoA', signaling, pathway])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'Rho', family, small, 'G', proteins, play, important, roles, in, 'Ang', 'II-induced', hypertrophic, responses, in, cardiac, myocytes])].
[sujeto(['RhoA/B/C', and, 'CDC42/Rac,', which, form, two, subgroups, of, the, rho, guanosine, triphosphatase, '(', 'GTPase)', 'family,']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([various, aspects, of, actin, cytoskeleton, organisation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'cytosol,', guanosine, diphosphate, '(', 'GDP)', dissociation, inhibitor, '(', 'GDI)']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, and, maintains, rho, 'GTPases', in, their, inactive, 'GDP-bound', form])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI', is, a, ubiquitously]), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['GDI,', whereas, 'D4/LyGDI', is, hematopoietic, 'cell-specific', and, 10, -, fold, less, potent, than, 'RhoGDI', in, binding, to, and, regulating, rho, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([combined, microanalytical, liquid, chromatography, with, the, use, of, specific, antibodies, in, order, to, separate, 'D4/LyGDI', and, 'RhoDGI-complexes', from, the, cytosol, of, 'U937', cells, and, to, demonstrate, that, the, two, 'GDIs', associate, with, different, rho, protein, partners])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI', can, form, a, complex, with, 'CDC42Hs,', 'RhoA,', 'Rac1', and, 'Rac2,', while, none, of, these, 'GTPases', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interact, with, 'D4/LyGDI'])].

[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'LyGDI', forms, complexes, with, specific, rho, 'GTPases', expressed, in, hematopoietic, cells, where, it, may, regulate, specific, pathways])].

[sujeto(['The', selective, dissociation, of, individual, 'Rho', 'GTPases', from, 'RhoGDI']), verbo([ensures]), complemento([appropriate, responses, to, cellular, 'signals,', but, the, underlying, mechanisms, are, unclear])].
[sujeto(['Diacylglycerol', kinase, &, 'Icirc;&para;', '(', 'DGK&Icirc;&para;),', which, phosphorylates, diacylglycerol, to, yield, phosphatidic, 'acid,', selectively, dissociates, 'Rac1', by]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento(['PAK1-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'RhoGDI', on, 'Ser-101/174'])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', phosphorylation, of, 'RhoGDI', on, 'Ser-34', by, protein, kinase, 'C&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'PKC&Icirc;&plusmn;)', selectively]), verbo([releases]), complemento(['RhoA'])].

[sujeto(['DGK&Icirc;&para;']), verbo([bound]), complemento([directly, to, the, 'C-terminus', of, 'RhoA', and, the, regulatory, arm, of, 'RhoGDI', and, was, required, for, efficient, interaction, of, 'PKC&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['Two']), verbo([targets]), complemento([of, the, 'RhoA', effector, 'ROCK', showed, reduced, phosphorylation, in, 'DGK&Icirc;&para;-null', cells])].
[sujeto(['Collectively', our, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['DGK&Icirc;&para;', functions, as, a, scaffold, to, assemble, a, signaling, complex, that, functions, as, a, 'RhoA-selective,', 'GDI', dissociation, factor])].
[sujeto(['We', identified, the, 'GDI-1-regulated', mechanism, of, 'RhoA', activation, from, the, 'Rho-GDI-1', complex, and, its, role, in]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([increased, endothelial, permeability])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of, a, 'GDI-1', mutant, form, '(', 'C-GDI)', containing, the, 'C', terminus, '(', aa, 69, to, 204, ')', also]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['RhoA', 'activation,', whereas, further, deletions, failed, to, alter, 'RhoA', activation])].

[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,']), verbo([expressing]), complemento([the, 'phospho-mimicking', mutant, 'S96D-GDI-1', protein, induced, 'RhoA', activity, and, increased, endothelial, permeability, independently, of, thrombin, stimulation])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, the, crucial, role, of, the, phosphorylation, of, the, 'C', terminus, of, 'GDI-1', at, 'S96', in, selectively]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['Inhibiting', 'GDI-1', phosphorylation, at, 'S96', is, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, modulating, 'RhoA', activity, and, thus, preventing, the, increase, in, endothelial, permeability, associated, with, vascular, inflammation])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([that, kidney, beta8, is, localized, to, glomerular, mesangial, 'cells,', and, expression, is, decreased, in, mouse, models, of, 'glomerulosclerosis,', suggesting, that, beta8, regulates, normal, mesangial, cell, differentiation])].
[sujeto(['Selective', beta8, stimulation]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['beta8-GDI', interaction, as, well, as, 'Rac1', '(', but, not, 'RhoA)', activation, and, lamellipodia, formation])].
[sujeto(['To', determine, whether, 'Rac1', directly]), verbo([modulates]), complemento(['RhoA-associated', myofibroblast, 'differentiation,', mesangial, cells, were, transduced, with, inhibitory, 'Rac', peptide, fused, to, human, immunodeficiency, 'virus-Tat,', resulting, in, enhanced, 'alpha-smooth', muscle, actin, organization])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, beta8, cytosolic, tail, in, mesangial, cells, organizes, a, signaling, complex, that, culminates, in, 'Rac1', activation, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['wild-type', 'differentiation,', whereas, decreased, beta8, activation, shifts, mesangial, cells, toward, a, 'RhoA-dependent', myofibroblast, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['Endogenous', contents, '(', approximately, 2, -, 4, 'microM)', of, 'RhoA', and, 'RhoGDI', were, near, 'stoichiometric,', whereas, a, supraphysiological, 'GDI', concentration, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, relax, 'Ca2+', sensitization, of, force, by, 'GTP', and, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'O-(3-thiotriphosphate)', '(', 'GTPgammaS)'])].
