[sujeto(['GDI', did, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Ca2+', sensitization, by, phorbol, ester])].
[sujeto(['Constitutively', active, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Ca2+', sensitization, by, 'GTP'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 1, ')', the, most, likely, in, vivo, function, of, 'GDI', is, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([perpetual, &, 'quot;recycling&quot;', of, 'GDP'])].
[sujeto(['RhoA/GDI', can, precede, translocation, of, 'RhoA', to, the, 'membrane;', 3, ')', activation, of, 'Rho-kinase', exposes, a, hydrophobic, 'domain;', and, 4, ')', 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1', can]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Ca2+', sensitization, by, activated, 'GTP'])].
[sujeto(['Determinants', of, membrane]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([of, 'Rho', proteins, were, investigated, in, live, cells, with, green, fluorescent, fusion, proteins, expressed, with, or, without, 'Rho-guanine', nucleotide, dissociation, inhibitor, '(', 'GDI)alpha'])].
[sujeto(['Targeting', was]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, binding, to, 'RhoGDI', alpha, in, the, case, of, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', 'Rac2,', and, 'Cdc42hs', but, not, 'RhoB', or, 'TC10'])].
[sujeto(['RhoA', was, cytosolic, even, when]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, levels, in, vast, excess, of, 'RhoGDI', alpha])].
[sujeto(['Oncogenic', 'Dbl']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([translocation, of, green, fluorescent, protein, '(', 'GFP)-Rac1,', 'GFP-Cdc42hs,', and, 'GFP-RhoA', to, lamellipodia])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'GFP-Cdc42hs', was, not, affected, by, substituting, farnesylation, for, geranylgeranylation])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', that, render, 'RhoA,', 'Cdc42hs,', or, 'Rac1,', either, constitutively, active, or, dominant, negative, abrogated]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'RhoGDI', alpha, and, redirected, expression, to, both, 'PMs', and, internal, membranes])].
[sujeto(['The', guanine, dissociation, inhibitors, 'RhoGDI', and, 'D4GDI']), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([guanosine, 5, '\'', -, diphosphate, dissociation, from, 'Rho', 'GTPases,', keeping, these, small, 'GTPases', in, an, inactive, state])].
[sujeto(['To', examine, the, functional, roles, of, the, 'N-terminal', domain, of, 'RhoGDI,', in, vitro, and, in, vivo, functional, assays]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, carried, out, with, 'N-terminally', truncated, proteins])].
[sujeto(['These', studies, show, that, the, first, 30, amino, acid, residues, are, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, inhibition, of, 'GDP', dissociation, but, appear, to, be, important, for, 'GTP', 'hydrolysis,', whilst, removal, of, the, first, 41, residues, completely, abolish, the, ability, of, 'RhoGDI', to, inhibit, 'GDP', dissociation])].
[sujeto(['The', combination, of, structural, and, functional, studies, allows, us, to, explain, why, 'RhoGDI', and, 'D4GDI', are, able, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([in, similar, ways, with, the, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'diphosphate-bound', 'GTPase,', but, differ, in, their, ability, to, regulate, 'GTP-bound', 'forms;', these, functional, differences, are, attributed, to, the, conformational, differences, of, the, 'N-terminal', domains, of, the, guanosine, 5, '\'', -, diphosphate, dissociation, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, two, transient, 'helices,', appear, to, be, associated, with, different, biological, effects, of, 'RhoGDI,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, clear, example, of, 'structure-activity', relationships, in, a, flexible, protein, domain])].
[sujeto(['The', estrogen, receptor, alpha, '(', 'ER)', is, a, 'ligand-dependent', transcription, factor, that, plays, a, critical, role, in, the, development, and, progression, of, breast, 'cancer,', in, 'part,', by]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([target, genes, involved, in, cellular, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, the, human, homologue, of, 'RDI1,', 'Rho', 'GDIalpha,']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['ERalpha,', 'ERbeta,', androgen, 'receptor,', and, glucocorticoid, receptor, transcriptional, activation, in, mammalian, cells, but, not, activation, by, the, unrelated, transcription, factors, serum, response, factor, and, 'Sp1'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', expression, of, constitutively, active, forms, of, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Cdc42']), verbo([decrease]), complemento(['ER', transcriptional, 'activity,', suggesting, that, 'Rho', 'GDI', increases, 'ER', transactivation, by, antagonizing, 'Rho', function])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'RhoA', by, expression, of, either, the, 'Clostridium', botulinum, 'C3', transferase, or, a, dominant, negative, 'RhoA', resulted, in]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['ER', transcriptional, 'activation,', thus, phenocopying, the, effect, of, 'Rho', 'GDI', expression, on, 'ER', transactivation])].
[sujeto(['Since', 'Rho', 'GTPases']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([actin, 'polymerization,', our, findings, suggest, a, link, between, the, major, regulators, of, cellular, architecture, and, steroid, receptor, transcriptional, response])].
[sujeto(['The', labeled, 'GDI', shows, a, 70, '%']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, fluorescence, emission, on, binding, geranylgeranylated, rac1])].
[sujeto(['GDP', and]), verbo([has]), complemento([an, affinity, for, rac1, within, a, factor, of, 2, of, the, unlabeled, 'GDI'])].
[sujeto(['The', kinetics, are, interpreted, in, terms, of, a, 'two-step', 'mechanism:']), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, rac, to, 'GDI', and, then, a, conformational, change, of, the, complex, with, an, overall, dissociation, constant, of, 0.4, nM])].
[sujeto(['The', conformational, change]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, rate, constant, of, 7.3, 's-1', '(', pH, 7.5, ',', 30, degrees, 'C),', and, the, reverse, has, a, rate, constant, of, 1.4, x, 10, '(', -, ')', 3, 's-1'])].
[sujeto(['To', overcome, difficulties, inherent, in, using, and, manipulating, 'lipid-modified', 'rac,', we, also, used, a, combination, of, unmodified, 'rac1,']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'Escherichia', coli, and, produced, with, 'C-terminal', truncation, '(', thus, lacking, the, cysteine, that, is, the, site, of, lipid, 'attachment),', and, farnesylated, 'C-terminal', peptide])].
[sujeto(['While', 'RhoA', is, known, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, assembly, of, focal, adhesions, and, stress, fibers, in, response, to, growth, 'factors,', the, function, of, 'RhoB', remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([reported, that, the, transient, expression, of, the, endogenous, 'RhoB', protein, is, regulated, during, the, cell, 'cycle,', contrasting, with, the, permanent, 'RhoA', protein, expression, '(', ')'])].
[sujeto(['Using', the, yeast, 'two-hybrid', system, to, characterize, proteins]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, 'RhoB,', we, identified, a, new, mouse, 'Rho', 'GDP', dissociation, 'inhibitor,', referenced, as, 'RhoGDI-3'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'NH2-terminal', alpha, helix, of, 'RhoGDI-3', is, strongly, amphipatic, and, differs, thus, from, that]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, previously, described, 'bovine,', 'human,', and, yeast, 'RhoGDI', proteins, and, mouse, and, human, 'D4/Ly-GDIs'])].
[sujeto(['Contrary', to, the, cytosolic, localization, of, all, known, 'GDI', 'proteins,']), verbo([acting]), complemento([on, 'Rab', or, 'Rho,', 'RhoGDI-3', is, associated, to, a, 'Triton', 'X-100-insoluble', membranous, or, cytoskeletal, subcellular, fraction])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'two-hybrid', 'system,', 'RhoGDI-3']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([specifically, with, 'GDP-', and, 'GTP-bound', forms, of, 'post-translationally', processed, 'RhoB', and, 'RhoG', 'proteins,', both, of, which, show, a, 'growth-regulated', expression, in, mammalian, cells])].
[sujeto(['No', interaction, is]), verbo([found]), complemento([with, 'RhoA,', 'RhoC,', or, 'Rac1', proteins])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'GDI-3', is, able, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['GDP/GTP', exchange, of, 'RhoB', and, to, release, 'GDP-bound', but, not, 'GTP-bound', 'RhoB', from, cell, membranes])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([guanine, nucleotide, dissociation, from, 'post-translationally', processed, 'Rho', and, 'Rac', proteins, but, its, biochemical, role, in, vivo, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, 'N-terminal', effector, site, mutations, in, the, 'Rac', protein, do, not, compromise, its, interaction, with, 'RhoGDI', and, 'that,', whilst, geranylgeranylation, and, -, 'AAX', proteolysis, of, the, 'C-terminal', 'CAAX', motif, of, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, efficient, interaction, with, 'RhoGDI,', methylesterification, of, the, 'C-terminal', cysteine, residue, is, not, required])].
[sujeto(['In', 'vitro,', 'RhoGDI', can, form, stable, complexes, with, 'Rho', and, 'Rac', proteins, in, both, the, 'GTP', and, 'GDP']), verbo([bound]), complemento([states])].
[sujeto(['Thus', 'GDI,', by, complexing, with, 'Rac-GTP', and]), verbo([preventing]), complemento(['GAP', stimulated, 'GTP', 'hydrolysis,', may, allow, transit, of, the, activated, form, of, the, 'Rac', protein, between, physically, separated, activator, and, effector, proteins, in, the, cell])].
[sujeto(['Blockade', of, mineralocorticoid, receptor]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, improve, the, clinical, outcomes, of, proteinuric, kidney, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Transient', transfection, assays, in, 'HEK', 293, cells, revealed, that, constitutively, active, 'Rac1', '(', 'CA-Rac1)']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([mineralocorticoid, 'receptor-dependent', reporter, 'activity,', which, was, accompanied, by, increased, nuclear, translocation, of, mineralocorticoid, receptor])].
[sujeto(['CA-Rac1', facilitated, mineralocorticoid, receptor]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([accumulation, also, in, podocytes, via, 'p21-activated', kinase, phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['In', mice, lacking, 'Rho', 'GDP-dissociation', 'inhibitor-alpha', '(', 'Arhgdia(-/-)', 'mice),', renal, 'abnormalities,', including, heavy, albuminuria, and, podocyte, 'damage,', were, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['Rac1', '(', but, not, 'RhoA)', and, mineralocorticoid, receptor, signaling, in, the, 'kidney,', without, alteration, in, systemic, aldosterone, status])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', albuminuria, and, histological, changes, in, 'Arhgdia(-/-)', mice, were]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, mineralocorticoid, receptor, 'blockade,', confirming, the, pathological, role, of, 'Rac1-mineralocorticoid', receptor, interaction])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, signaling, 'cross-talk', between, 'Rac1', and, mineralocorticoid, receptor, modulates, mineralocorticoid, receptor, activity, and, identify, 'Rac1', as, a, therapeutic, target, for, chronic, kidney, disease])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, these, proteins, can, be]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([by, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, containing, 'Dbl', and, 'Pleckstrin', homology, domains, resulting, in, membrane, insertion, of, a, 'Rho', family, 'member,', whereas, the, inactive, 'GDP-bound', form, is, sequestered, primarily, in, the, 'cytoplasm,', bound, to, the, guanosine, dissociation, inhibitor, 'RhoGDI'])].
[sujeto(['Dominant', interfering, variants, of, 'Rac1,', but, not, 'Cdc42,']), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([beta1, 'integrin-promoted', uptake, of, 'Yersinia', pseudotuberculosis])].
[sujeto(['Unexpectedly,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'Rac1(W56F)', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, specificity, switch, mutant, blocked, 'invasin-promoted', uptake, as, well, as, 'Cdc42-dependent', uptake, of, enteropathogenic, 'Escherichia', coli])].
[sujeto(['Fluorescence', resonance, energy, transfer, experiments, demonstrated, that, 'Rac1(W56F)']), verbo([retained]), complemento([the, ability, to, be, loaded, with, 'GTP,', bind, a, downstream, 'effector,', and, interact, with, 'RhoGDI'])].
[sujeto(['Mutational', analyses, of, intragenic, suppressors, and, coexpression, studies, demonstrated, that]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, 'Rac1(W56F)', mutant, to, 'RhoGDI', appeared, to, play, a, role, in, the, inhibition, of, uptake])].
[sujeto(['As', 'RhoGDI']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['RhoA,', overactivation, of, 'RhoA', may, account, for, the, uptake, interference, caused, by, 'Rac1(W56F)'])].
[sujeto(['These', data, are, consistent, with, the, proposition, that, 'Rac1(W56F)', blocks, 'invasin-promoted', uptake, by]), verbo([preventing]), complemento(['RhoGDI', from, inactivating, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'RhoGDI', allows, 'cross-talk', between, 'Rho', family, members, that]), verbo([promote]), complemento([potentially, antagonistic, 'processes,', and, disruption, of, this, 'cross-talk', can, interfere, with, 'invasin-promoted', uptake])].
[sujeto(['Rho', 'GTPases', '(', 'Rac,', 'Rho,', and, 'Cdc42)', play, important, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cell, function, through, their, ability, to, coordinate, the, actin, 'cytoskeleton,', modulate, the, formation, of, signaling, reactive, oxidant, 'species,', and, control, gene, transcription])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'Rho', 'GTPase', signaling, pathways]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, regulated, release, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', from, 'RhoGDI', 'complexes,', followed, by, their, reuptake, after, membrane, cycling])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, 'Src', kinase]), verbo([binds]), complemento([and, phosphorylates, 'RhoGDI', both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, at, 'Tyr156'])].
[sujeto(['Analysis', of, 'Rho', 'GTPase-RhoGDI', complexes, using, in, vitro, assays, of, complexation, and, in, vivo, by, coimmunoprecipitation, analysis, indicates, that, 'Src-mediated', phosphorylation, of, 'Tyr156']), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, dramatic, decrease, in, the, ability, of, 'RhoGDI', to, form, a, complex, with, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', or, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['Substantial', cortical, localization, of, 'tyrosine-phosphorylated', 'RhoGDI', is, also, observed, in, fibroblasts]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([active, 'Src,', where, it, is, most, evident, in, podosomes, and, regions, of, membrane, ruffling])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'membrane-localized', 'RhoGDI(Y156E)', mutant, is, associated, with]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cell, spreading, and, membrane, ruffling])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Src-mediated', 'RhoGDI', phosphorylation, is, a, novel, physiological, mechanism, for, regulating, 'Rho', 'GTPase', cytosol, 'membrane-cycling', and, activity])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([implicated, the, 'Rho', family, of, 'GTPases', and, the, 'Rho-activated', 'kinase,', 'ROCK-1,', in, mediating, the, 'zona-pellucida-induced', acrosome, reaction])].
[sujeto(['Others']), verbo([have]), complemento([implicated, the, 'Rho', 'GTPase', in, regulating, the, 'ionophore-induced', acrosome, reaction, in, the, sperm, of, several, mammalian, species, as, well, as, in, motility, of, bovine, sperm])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, head, and, tail, of, sperm, from, all, species, except, 'pig,', where, it, was, present, only, in, the, head])].
[sujeto(['PI(4)P5K', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, both, head, and, tail, of, sperm, from, all, 'species,', but, expression, was, typically, weaker, in, the, tail])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', 'ROCK-1', was]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, heads, and, tails, of, all, sperm, except, that, of, the, 'boar,', where, it, was, present, only, in, the, acrosomal, region])].
[sujeto(['These', observations, taken, together]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, expression, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', in, sperm, has, been, conserved, throughout, mammalian, 'evolution,', most, likely, due, to, the, role, of, these, 'GTPases', in, regulating, acrosomal, exocytosis])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, overexpression, of, 'RhoGDI', increased, resistance, of, cancer, cells, '(', 'MDA-MB-231', human, breast, cancer, cells, and, 'JLP-119', lymphoma, 'cells)', to, the, induction, of, apoptosis, by, two, chemotherapeutic, 'agents:', etoposide, and, doxorubicin])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanism, for, the, 'anti-apoptotic', activity, of, 'RhoGDI', may, derive, from, its, ability, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['caspase-mediated', cleavage, of, 'Rac1', 'GTPase,', which, is, required, for, maximal, apoptosis, to, occur, in, response, to, cytotoxic, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', the, data, show, that, 'RhoGDI', is, an, 'anti-apoptotic', molecule, that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cellular, resistance, to, these, chemotherapy, agents])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1', mediate, hypertrophic, signals, in, cardiac, myocyte, hypertrophy])].
[sujeto(['However,', effects, on, cardiac, function]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, inhibition, of, their, activity, in, the, heart, have, yet, to, be, evaluated])].
[sujeto(['Cardiac-specific', inhibition, of, 'Rho', family, protein, activities, was, achieved, by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['Rho', 'GDIalpha,', an, endogenous, specific, 'GDP', dissociation, inhibitor, for, 'Rho', family, 'proteins,', using, the, 'alpha-myosin', 'heavy-chain', promoter])].
[sujeto(['Increased', expression, of, 'Rho', 'GDIalpha']), verbo([led]), complemento([to, atrial, arrhythmias, and, mild, ventricular, hypertrophy, in, adult, mice, '(', 4, -, 7, 'months)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', left, ventricular, systolic, and, diastolic, function, was, largely, preserved, before, and, after, the, development, of, cardiac, 'hypertrophy,', indicating, that, 'Rho', 'GTPases', are, not]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, maintain, ventricular, contractile, function, under, basal, physiological, condition])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, connexin, 40, dramatically]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([from, 1, week, to, 4, weeks, of, age, in, the, transgenic, 'heart,', which, may, contribute, in, part, to, the, conduction, defects, in, the, transgenic, mice])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([novel, evidence, for, an, important, role, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', in, regulating, 'AV', conduction])].
[sujeto(['Studies', of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', in, 'Drosophila', and, 'Xenopus']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Rho', family, proteins, may, play, an, important, role, in, embryogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Cardiac-specific', inhibition, of, 'Rho', family, protein, activities, was, achieved, by]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['Rho', 'GDIalpha,', a, specific, 'GDP', dissociation, inhibitor, for, 'Rho', family, 'proteins,', using, the, 'alpha-myosin', heavy, chain, 'promoter,', active, at, embryonic, day, '(', 'E)8'])].
[sujeto(['RhoA,', 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42', activities, were, significantly, 'inhibited,', as, shown, by]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([membrane, translocation, of, these, proteins, in, the, transgenic, hearts])].
[sujeto(['Transgenic', 'F1', mice, for, each, of, two, independent, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([the, highest, levels, of, the, 'transgene,', died, around, 'E10'])].
[sujeto(['Homozygotes', of, the, middle, 'copy-number', 'lines,', in, which, 'Rho', 'GDIalpha', expression, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['four-fold', over, normal, 'levels,', were, also, embryonic, lethal])].
[sujeto(['Cell', proliferation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([in, the, transgenic, 'hearts,', as, shown, by, immunostaining, with, 'anti-phosphohistone', 'H3,', a, marker, of, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([new, biological, functions, for, 'Rho', family, proteins, as, essential, determinants, of, cell, proliferation, signals, at, looping, and, chamber, maturation, stages, in, mammalian, cardiac, development])].
[sujeto(['The', 'VirG', protein]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([at, one, pole, of, the, bacterium, can, recruit, neural, 'Wiskott-Aldrich', syndrome, protein, '(', 'N-WASP),', a, downstream, effector, of, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'Cdc42', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, 'actin-based', motility, of, 'Shigella'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'add-back', experiments, in, 'Xenopus', egg, 'extracts,', addition, of, a, guanine, nucleotide, dissociation, inhibitor, for, the, 'Rho', 'family,', 'RhoGDI,', greatly, diminished, the, bacterial, motility, or, actin, 'assembly,', which, was, restored, by, adding]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'N-WASP-depleted', 'extracts,', the, bacterial, movement, almost]), verbo([arrested]), complemento([was, restored, by, adding, exogenous, 'N-WASP', but, not, 'H208D,', an, 'N-WASP', mutant, defective, in, binding, to, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['In', pyrene, actin, 'assay,', 'Cdc42']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['VirG-stimulating', actin, polymerization, by, 'N-WASP-actin-related', protein, '(', 'Arp)2/3', complex])].
[sujeto(['Actually,', 'Cdc42']), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([actin, cloud, formation, on, the, surface, of, bacteria, expressing, 'VirG', in, a, solution, containing, 'N-WASP,', 'Arp2/3', 'complex,', and, 'G-actin'])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistological', study, of, 'Shigella-infected', cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([green, fluorescent, 'protein-tagged', 'Cdc42', revealed, that, 'Cdc42', accumulated, by, being, colocalized, with, actin, cloud, at, one, pole, of, intracellular, bacterium])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Cdc42', activity, is, involved, in, initiating, actin, nucleation, mediated, by, 'VirG-N-WASP-Arp2/3', complex, formed, on, intracellular, 'Shigella'])].
[sujeto(['Members', of, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'GTP-binding', 'proteins,', such, as, 'Rho,', 'Rac', and, 'Cdc42,']), verbo([have]), complemento([a, role, in, a, wide, range, of, cell, responses])].
[sujeto(['The', cytosolic, guanine, nucleotide, dissociation, 'inhibitors,', 'RhoGDIs,']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([both, the, 'GDP/GTP', exchange, cycle, and, the, membrane, 'association/dissociation', cycle])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 'NMR', spectroscopy, and, 'site-directed', mutagenesis, to, identify, the, regions, of, human, 'RhoGDI-1', that, are, involved, in, binding, 'Rac-1'])].
[sujeto(['At', least, one, specific, region, '(', residues, 46, -, 57, ')', of, the, flexible, 'N-terminal', domain, of, 'RhoGDI,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, tendency, to, form, an, amphipathic, helix, in, the, free, 'protein,', makes, a, major, contribution, to, the, binding, energy, of, the, complex])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, primary, site, of, 'Rac-1']), verbo([binding]), complemento([on, the, folded, domain, of, 'RhoGDI', involves, the, 'beta4-beta5', and, 'beta6-beta7', 'loops,', with, a, slight, movement, of, the, 3, '(', 10, ')', helix, accompanying, the, interaction])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([binding]), complemento([site, is, on, the, same, face, of, the, protein, as, the, binding, site, for, the, isoprenyl, group, of, 'post-translationally', modified, 'Rac-1,', but, is, distinct, from, this, site])].
[sujeto(['Isoprenylated', 'Rac-1', appears, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([with, three, distinct, sites, on, 'RhoGDI'])].
[sujeto(['The', isoprenyl, group, attached, to, the, 'C', terminus, of, 'Rac-1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([in, a, pocket, in, the, folded, domain, of, 'RhoGDI'])].
[sujeto(['This', is, distinct, from, the, major, site, on, this, domain, occupied, by, 'Rac-1', 'itself,', which]), verbo([involves]), complemento([two, loops, at, the, opposite, end, to, the, 'isoprenyl-binding', site])].
[sujeto(['It', is, probable, that, the, flexible, 'C-terminal', region, of, 'Rac-1', extends, from, the, site, at, which, 'Rac-1', contacts, the, folded, domain, of, 'RhoGDI', to, allow, the, isoprenyl, group, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([in, the, pocket, at, the, other, end, of, the, 'RhoGDI', molecule])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', the, flexible, 'N', terminus, of, 'RhoGDI-1,', and, particularly, residues, 48, -, 58, ',', makes, a, specific, interaction, with, 'Rac-1', which, contributes, substantially, to, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([affinity])].
[sujeto(['Paks', can, be]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, vivo, and, in, vitro, by, binding, to, 'GTP-bound', 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1,', members, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'GTPases', implicated, in, regulating, the, organization, of, the, actin, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, reported, that, the, 'SH2/SH3-containing', adaptor, protein, 'Nck', binds, 'Pak', kinase, through, its, second, 'SH3', domain])].
[sujeto(['Pak1', can, be]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([to, the, membrane, by, 'Nck', in, response, to, tyrosine, 'phosphorylation,', and, membrane, association, of, 'Pak1', is, sufficient, to, increase, its, specific, activity])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanism, whereby, 'Pak', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, membrane, 'localization,', 'however,', is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', show, here, that, expression, of, three, proteins, that]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Rho-family', 'GTPases', by, different, mechanisms, '(', 'RhoGDI,', 'Bcr', and, 'D57Y', 'Cdc42)', all, block, the, activation, of, 'Pak', by, a, 'membrane-targeted', 'Nck', 'SH3', 'domain,', demonstrating, that, the, in, vivo, activation, of, 'Pak1', induced, by, membrane, localization, is, dependent, on, 'Rho-family', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['This', implies, that, 'Pak', activity, can, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([in, cells, both, by, the, level, of, 'GTP', loading, of, various, 'Rho-family', 'GTPases', and, the, local, concentration, of, 'Pak', relative, to, these, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, also]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, existence, of, 'Rho-family', 'GTPases', in, addition, to, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1', that, can, activate, 'Pak', on, membranes])].
[sujeto(['Receptor', activation, of, phospholipase, 'D']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, signal, transduction, in, a, variety, of, cells])].
[sujeto(['Reconstitution', of, 'cell-free', guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'O-(3-thiotriphosphate)(GTP', gamma, 'S)-dependent', phospholipase, 'D', activity, from, human, neutrophils]), verbo([requires]), complemento([protein, factors, in, both, the, plasma, membrane, and, the, cytosol])].
[sujeto(['Herein,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, 'RhoGDI', '(', 'GDP', dissociation, 'inhibitor),', an, inhibitory, 'Rho-binding', 'protein,', to, selectively, extract, 'Rho-type', 'GTPases', from, the, plasma, 'membrane,', and, have, used, immunoprecipitation, as, well, as, chromatographic, methods, to, remove, cytosolic, 'Rho'])].
[sujeto(['Depletion', of, 'RhoA', from, either, the, plasma, membrane, or, the, cytosol, resulted, in, a, partial]), verbo([loss]), complemento([in, 'GTP', gamma, 'S', dependent, 'activity,', while, removal, of, 'RhoA', from, both, fractions, resulted, in, a, nearly, complete, loss, in, activity])].
[sujeto(['Cytosol', fractionated, using, 'DEAE-cellulose', chromatography, separated, 'ADP-ribosylation', factor, and, 'Rho', from, the, major]), verbo([activating]), complemento([fraction])].
[sujeto(['Gel', exclusion, chromatography, of, this, fraction, revealed, an]), verbo([activating]), complemento([factor, of, 50, kDa, apparent, molecular, mass])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'RhoA-depleted', 'membranes,', reconstitution, of, phospholipase, 'D', activity]), verbo([required]), complemento([both, 'RhoA', and, the, 50, -, kDa, factor])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'RhoA', along, with, a, 'non-Rho,', 'non-ADP-ribosylation', factor, 50, -, kDa, cytosolic, factor, are, both]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, reconstitute, 'GTP', gamma, 'S-dependent', phospholipase, 'D', activity, by, neutrophil, plasma, membranes])].
[sujeto(['There']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, considerable, progress, in, the, management, of, acute, lymphoblastic, leukemia, '(', 'ALL)', but, further, improvement, is, needed, to, increase, 'long-term', survival])].
[sujeto(['The', thiopurine, agent, 6, -, mercaptopurine, '(', 6, -, 'MP)', used, for, 'ALL', maintenance, therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, key, influence, on, clinical, outcomes, and, relapse, prevention])].
[sujeto(['This', signature, includes, the, 'GTPBP4', gene, coding, for, a, 'GTP-binding', protein, that]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, p53])].
[sujeto(['A', comprehensive, pathway, analysis, of, the, genes, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([between, resistant, and, sensitive, cell, lines, indicated, a, role, for, cell, cycle, and, 'DNA', mismatch, repair, system, in, thiopurine, resistance])].
[sujeto(['It', also, revealed, overexpression, of, the, 'ATM/p53/p21', 'pathway,', which, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, response, to, 'DNA', damage, and, induces, cell, cycle, arrest, in, thiopurine, resistant, 'LCLs'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', overexpression, of, the, p53]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'TNFRSF10D', or, the, negative, cell, cycle, regulator, 'CCNG2', induces, cell, cycle, arrest, and, may, also, contribute, to, thiopurine, resistance])].
[sujeto(['ARHGDIA', 'under-expression', in, resistant, cell, lines, may, constitute, a, novel, molecular, mechanism, contributing, to, thiopurine, resistance, based, on, 'Rac1', inhibition]), verbo([induced]), complemento([apoptosis, and, in, relation, with, thiopurine, pharmacodynamics])].
[sujeto(['Our', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([new, insights, into, the, molecular, mechanisms, underlying, thiopurine, resistance, and, suggests, a, potential, research, focus, for, developing, tailored, medicine])].
[sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([reported]), complemento([two, siblings, with, heritable, nephrotic, syndrome, caused, by, a, loss, of, function, mutation, in, the, gene, 'ARHGDIA,', which, encodes, for, 'Rho', guanine, nucleotide, dissociation, 'inhibitor-&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'GDI&Icirc;&plusmn;)'])].
[sujeto(['GDIs', are, known, to, negatively]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['Rho-GTPase', signaling])].
[sujeto(['We', hypothesized, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', sensitizes, podocytes, to, external, injury, via, hyperactivation, of, 'Rho-GTPases', and, p38, 'MAPK'])].
[sujeto(['These', experiments]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, common, pathway, by, which, heritable, and, environmental, risk, factors, converge, to, injure, 'podocytes,', from, 'Rac1', hyperactivation, to, p38, phosphorylation, and, synaptopodin, degradation, via, the, 'ubiquitin-proteasome', pathway, and, cathepsin, 'L'])].
[sujeto(['As', a, regulator, of, 'Rho', 'activity,', 'ARHGDIA', is, aberrantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, several, types, of, tumors, and, plays, different, roles, in, the, tumor, process])].
[sujeto(['Functional', assays, were, performed, to, investigate, whether, the, alteration, of, 'ARHGDIA']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, effect, on, cell, 'growth,', migration, and, 'invasion,', as, well, as, the, status, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'ARHGDIA', was, frequently, downregulated, in, 'HCC', and, associated, with, tumor, invasion, and, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['Low', level, of, 'ARHGDIA', exhibited, a]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([postoperative, 'OS', and, a, shorter, 'TTR', compared, those, with, high, levels])].
[sujeto(['Functional', assays, showed, that]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'ARHGDIA', promoted, 'HCC', cell, migration, and, invasion, in, vitro, and, lung, metastasis, formation, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, loss, of, 'ARHGDIA', significantly, induced, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', activation, which, may, contribute, to, invasion, and, metastasis, of, 'HCC'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', the, present, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([identified, loss, of, 'ARHGDIA', contributed, to, the, processes, of, hepatic, 'tumorigenesis,', in, particular, invasion, and, metastasis, which, may, provide, a, potential, therapeutic, target, for, 'HCC'])].
[sujeto(['SRNS']), verbo([causes]), complemento(['end-stage', kidney, 'disease,', which, cannot, be, cured])].
[sujeto(['While', the, disease, mechanisms, of, 'NS', are, not, well, 'understood,', genetic, mapping, studies]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, multitude, of, unknown, 'single-gene', causes])].
[sujeto(['We', combined, homozygosity, mapping, with, 'whole-exome', resequencing, and, identified, an, 'ARHGDIA', mutation, that]), verbo([causes]), complemento(['SRNS'])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'ARHGDIA', is, in, a, complex, with, 'RHO', 'GTPases', and, is, prominently]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, podocytes, of, rat, glomeruli])].
[sujeto(['ARHGDIA', mutations, '(', 'R120X', and, 'G173V)', from, individuals, with, 'SRNS', abrogated, interaction, with, 'RHO', 'GTPases', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([active, 'GTP-bound', 'RAC1', and, 'CDC42,', but, not, 'RHOA,', indicating, that, 'RAC1', and, 'CDC42', are, more, relevant, to, the, pathogenesis, of, this, 'SRNS', variant, than, 'RHOA'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', the, mutations]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([migration, of, cultured, human, 'podocytes;', 'however,', enhanced, migration, was, reversed, by, treatment, with, 'RAC1', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, identify, a, 'single-gene']), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, 'NS', and, reveal, that, 'RHO', 'GTPase', signaling, is, a, pathogenic, mediator, of, 'SRNS'])].
[sujeto(['The', malignant, brain, cancer, glioblastoma, multiforme, '(', 'GBM)', displays, invasive, growth, behaviors, that, are]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, extracellular, cues, within, the, neural, microenvironment])].
[sujeto([&, 'Icirc;&sup2;8', integrin, is, overexpressed, in, many, human, 'GBM', 'cells,', with, higher, integrin, expression, correlating, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([invasion, and, diminished, patient, survival])].
[sujeto(['Silencing', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;8', integrin, in, human, 'GBM', cells]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, impaired, tumor, cell, invasion, due, to, hyperactivation, of, the, 'Rho', 'GTPases', 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([for, the, first, time, that, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;v&Icirc;&sup2;8', 'integrin,', via, interactions, with, 'RhoGDI1,', regulates, activation, of, 'Rho', proteins, to, promote, 'GBM', cell, invasiveness])].
[sujeto(['Hence']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;v&Icirc;&sup2;8', 'integrin-RhoGDI1', signaling, axis, might, be, an, effective, strategy, for, blocking, 'GBM', cell, invasion])].
[sujeto(['The', activation, of, the, 'Rac1', 'GTPase', during, cell, signalling, entails, its, translocation, from, the, cytosol, to, 'membranes,']), verbo([release]), complemento([from, sequestering, 'Rho', 'GDP', dissociation, inhibitors, '(', 'RhoGDI),', and, 'GDP/GTP', exchange])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, those, 'steps,', we, show, here, that, optimal, 'Rac1', activation, during, cell, signalling]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, engagement, of, a, 'downstream,', 'cytoskeletal-based', feedback, loop, nucleated, around, the, cytoskeletal, protein, coronin, 1, 'A', and, the, 'Rac1', exchange, factor, 'ArhGEF7'])].
[sujeto(['Such', activity]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, formation, of, an, 'F-actin/ArhGEF7-dependent', physical, complex, of, coronin, 1, 'A', with, 'Pak1', and, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'that,', once, 'assembled,', promotes, the, 'Pak1-dependent', dissociation, of, 'Rac1', from, the, 'Rac1/RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', complex, and, subsequent, 'Rac1', activation])].
[sujeto(['Cdc42', cycling, through, 'GTP/GDP', states, is, critical, for, its, function, in, the, 'second/granule', mobilization, phase, of, insulin, granule, exocytosis, in, pancreatic, islet, beta, 'cells,', although, the, identities, of, the, 'Cdc42', cycling, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([remain, incomplete])].
[sujeto(['Given', that, 'RhoGDI', also]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Rac1', activation, in, beta, 'cells,', and, that, 'Rac1', activation, occurs, in, a, 'Cdc42-dependent', 'manner,', the, question, as, to, how, the, beta, cell, utilized, 'RhoGDI', for, differential, 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1', cycling, was, explored])].

[sujeto(['Cysmethynil,', a, specific, 'Icmt', inhibitor, discovered, in, our, 'laboratory,', is, able, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Ras-mediated', 'signaling,', cell, 'growth,', and, oncogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'Icmt', significantly]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([the, activation, of, both, 'RhoA', and, 'Rac1;', an, increase, in, 'Rho', 'GDP-dissociation', inhibitor, '(', 'RhoGDI)', binding, in, the, absence, of, methylation, appears, to, contribute, to, this, effect])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, 'Rac1', 'GTPase', signaling, is]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([by, phosphorylation, and, release, of, 'RhoGDI', by, the, effector, 'p21-activated', kinase, 1, '(', 'PAK1),', but, it, is, unclear, what, initiates, this, potential, 'feed-forward', mechanism, for, regulation, of, 'Rac', activity])].
[sujeto(['Phosphatidic', acid, '(', 'PA),', which, is, produced, from, the, lipid, second, messenger, diacylglycerol, '(', 'DAG)', by, the, action, of, 'DAG', kinases, '(', 'DGKs),', is, known, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['PAK1'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, investigated, whether, 'PA', produced, by, 'DGKzeta', initiates, 'RhoGDI']), verbo([release]), complemento([and, 'Rac1', activation])].

[sujeto(['DGKzeta', stably, associated, with, 'PAK1', and, 'RhoGDI,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([these, proteins, form, a, complex, that, functions, as, a, 'Rac1-selective', 'RhoGDI', dissociation, factor])].

[sujeto(['We', show, here, in, the, microglia, cell, line, 'Ra2', that, 'PAK1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['NADPH', oxidase, '(', 'NOX-2)', activity, in, a, 'stimulus-specific', manner])].

[sujeto(['We', further, present, evidence, that, the, effect, of, 'PAK1', on, the, respiratory, burst, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, phosphorylation, of, 'p47(Phox),', and, we, show, that, expression, of, a, 'p47(Phox)', '(', 'S303D/S304D/S320D)', 'mutant,', which, mimics, phosphorylation, by, 'PAK1,', induced, basal, superoxide, generation, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, findings, define, a, 'VAV1-Rac1-PAK1', signaling, axis, in, mononuclear, phagocytes]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([superoxide, production, in, a, 'stimulus-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Ubiquitination', of, eukaryotic, proteins]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([a, broad, range, of, cellular, 'processes,', including, regulation, of, 'T', cell, activation, and, tolerance])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, that, gene, related, to, anergy, in, lymphocytes, '(', 'GRAIL),', a, ring, finger, ubiquitin, 'E3', 'ligase,', is, required, for, the, induction, of, 'T', cell, 'anergy;', 'however,', the, 'substrate(s)', for, 'GRAIL', 'E3', ligase, activity, 'is/are', unknown])].

[sujeto(['GRAIL', was, subsequently, demonstrated, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([and, ubiquitinate, 'RhoGDI,', although, 'GRAIL-mediated', ubiquitination, of, 'RhoGDI', did, not, result, in, proteosomal, degradation])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', stable, 'T', cell, lines]), verbo([expressing]), complemento(['dominant-negative', 'RhoA', mimicked, the, 'GRAIL-mediated', 'IL-2', inhibition, 'phenotype,', and, 'T', cells, expressing, constitutively, active, 'RhoA', were, able, to, overcome, 'GRAIL-mediated', inhibition, of, 'IL-2', expression])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, validate, our, prokaryotic, screen, as, a, method, of, identifying, substrates, for, ubiquitin, 'E3', ligases, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, role, for, 'Rho', effector, molecules, in, 'T', cell, anergy])].
[sujeto(['The', small, 'GTPase', 'Rac1']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([the, activation, of, 'NADPH', 'oxidase;', 'however,', the, mechanism, of, 'Rac1', activation, is, incompletely, understood])].
[sujeto(['Transaortic', constriction, '(', 'TAC,', 'C57/Bl6', 'mice,', 360, 'microm,', 21, 'days)']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ratio, of, heart, to, body, weight, from, '[', per, 'thousand]', 'SHAM', 4.16, +, /, -, 0.09, to, 'TAC', 7.1, +, /, -, 0.37, ',', 'p&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, rosuvastatin]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['pressure-induced', cardiac, hypertrophy, '(', 5.5, +, /, -, 0.18, ',', 'p&lt;0'])].
[sujeto(['TAC']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, 4, -, fold, 'up-regulation', of, myocardial, 'NADPH', oxidase, activity, as, well, as, 'Rac1', 'activity;', both, effects, were, absent, in, 'statin-treated', animals])].
[sujeto(['In', cultured, rat, 'cardiomyocytes,', treatment, with, angiotensin, 'II', '(', 'AngII)']), verbo([increased]), complemento([translocation, of, 'Rac1', to, cell, membranes, and, 'Rac1', activity])].
[sujeto(['AngII', altered, neither, expression, nor, tyrosine, phosphorylation, of, 'GTPase']), verbo([activating]), complemento([protein, 'GAP-p190', and, the, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, 'Vav', and, 'Tiam'])].
[sujeto(['Transaortic', constriction, as, well, as, 'AngII']), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, binding, of, 'Rho', guanine, nucleotide, dissociation, inhibitor, '(', 'RhoGDIalpha)', to, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['The', association, of, 'RhoGDIalpha', with, 'Rac1', was]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, phosphatidylinositol, 3, -, kinase, and, depended, on, geranylgeranylation])].
[sujeto(['Statin', treatment]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['RhoGDIalpha-Rac1', binding, both, in, cultured, cardiomyocytes, and, during, myocardial, hypertrophy, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Transfection', with, 'RhoGDIalpha', siRNA, constructs, potently, reduced, 'RhoGDIalpha', protein, 'expression,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['AngII-induced', superoxide, production, and, lipid, 'peroxidation,', and, inhibited, 'AngII-induced', leucine, incorporation])].
[sujeto(['The', association, of, the, regulatory, protein, 'RhoGDIalpha', with, 'Rac1', represents, a, necessary, step, in, the, 'Rac1-dependent']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'ROS'])].
[sujeto(['Rac1-RhoGDIalpha']), verbo([binding]), complemento([may, represent, a, target, for, 'anti-hypertrophic', pharmacologic, 'interventions,', potentially, by, statin, treatment])].
[sujeto(['The', integration, of, signals]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, deciding, the, fate, of, mesenchymal, stem, cells, is, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['We', used, proteomics, profiling, to, identify, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;,', an, inhibitor, of, the, small, 'G-protein', 'Rho', 'family,', as, a, component, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([commitment, of, 'C3H10T1/2', mesenchymal, stem, cells, to, the, adipocyte, or, smooth, muscle, cell, lineage, in, response, to, bone, morphogenetic, protein, 4, '(', 'BMP4)'])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;', is, notably, 'down-regulated', during, 'BMP4-induced', adipocytic, lineage, commitment, of, 'C3H10T1/2', mesenchymal, stem, 'cells,', and, this]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, 'cytoskeleton-associated', protein, lysyl, oxidase])].
[sujeto(['Excess', 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;', completely]), verbo([prevents]), complemento(['BMP4-induced', commitment, to, the, adipocyte, lineage, and, simultaneously, stimulates, smooth, muscle, cell, commitment, by, suppressing, the, activation, of, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;']), verbo([induces]), complemento([stress, fibers, of, 'F-actin', by, a, process, involving, phosphomyosin, light, 'chain,', indicating, that, cytoskeletal, tension, regulated, by, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;', contributes, to, determining, adipocyte, versus, myocyte, commitment])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', the, overexpression, of, 'RacV12', '(', constitutively, active, form, of, 'Rac1)', totally, rescues, the, inhibition, of, adipocyte, commitment, by, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;,', simultaneously]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([formation, of, the, smooth, 'muscle-like', phenotype, and, disrupting, the, stress, fibers, in, cells, overexpressing, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, results, indicate, that, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&sup2;', functions, as, a, novel, 'BMP4', signaling]), verbo([target]), complemento([that, regulates, adipogenesis, and, myogensis])].
[sujeto(['The', major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, death, in, osteosarcoma, is, the, increase, in, metastatic, 'potential,', and, the, ezrin, expression, has, been, correlated, with, the, metastasis, development])].
[sujeto(['Ezrin']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'RhoGDI', by, dissociating, it, from, 'RhoGTPases,', which, allow, 'GTPases', to, load, with, 'GTP,', activate, 'RhoA', to, increase, cell, 'migration,', and, invasion])].
[sujeto(['RhoGTPases']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, contribute, to, pathologic, processes, including, cancer, cell, 'migration,', 'invasion,', and, metastasis, and, overexpression, of, either, the, 'GTPase', itself, or, some, elements, of, 'Rho', signaling, that, have, been, detected, in, many, human, 'tumors,', including, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', expression, in, the, osteosarcoma, tissues, to, understand, the, role, of, the, 'ezrin-Rho', family, pathway, in, osteosarcoma, metastatic, progression])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([blocked, the, ezrin, expression, using, siRNA, assay, to, investigate, a, possible, correlation, with, 'RAC1', and, 'RHOA', expression, in, the, osteosarcoma, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['It', is, possible, that, the, mechanism, of, cell, motility]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', is, maintained, in, 'osteosarcomas,', and, since, the, expression, of, 'ezrin,', 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', do, not, correlate, with, metastatic, progression, in, osteosarcoma])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho', family, of, 'GTPases', '(', members, of, the, 'Ras', 'superfamily)', are, best, known, for, their, roles, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([cytoskeletal, dynamics])].
[sujeto(['Unlike', 'Ras', 'proteins,', which, are, frequently, mutated, in, cancer, '(', around, 30, '%', ')', ',', 'Rho', proteins, themselves, are, generally, not]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, mutated, in, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Rather,', misregulation, of, 'Rho', activity, in, cancer, was, thought, to, occur, by, overexpression, of, these, proteins, or, by, misregulation, of, molecules, that, control, 'Rho', 'activity,', such, as, activation, or, overexpression, of, 'GEFs', and, inactivation, or]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'GAPs', or, 'GDIs'])].
[sujeto(['Recent', 'studies,', enabled, by, 'next-generation', tumor, exome, 'sequencing,']), verbo([report]), complemento([activating, point, mutations, in, 'Rho', 'GTPases', as, driver, mutations, in, 'melanoma,', as, well, as, 'breast,', and, head, and, neck, cancers])].

[sujeto(['The', 'FERM', domain, containing, protein, 7, gene, '(', 'FRMD7)', associated, with, the, 'X-linked', disorder, idiopathic, congenital, nystagmus, '(', 'ICN)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, regulation, of, neurite, elongation, during, neuronal, development])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho', 'GDP', dissociation, inhibitor, 'alpha,', 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;,', the, main, regulator, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases,', can, form, a, complex, with, the, 'GDP-bound', form, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', and]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([their, activation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, the, full, length, of, the, mouse, 'FRMD7,', rather, than, the, 'N-terminus', or, the, 'C-terminus', 'alone,', directly]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, specifically, initiates, 'Rac1', signaling, in, mouse, neuroblastoma, cell, line, '(', 'neuro-2a)'])].

[sujeto(['Although', statins, are, known, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([proliferation, and, induce, death, in, a, number, of, cancer, cell, 'types,', the, mechanisms, through, which, downregulation, of, the, mevalonate, '(', 'MVA)', pathway, activates, death, signaling, remain, poorly, understood])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([characterized, an, adhesion, and, signaling, unit, comprised, of, protein, tyrosine, phosphatase, '(', 'PTP)-PEST', and, the, extracellular, matrix, '(', 'ECM)', adhesion, receptor, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;8', integrin, that, plays, essential, roles, in, directional, cell, motility])].

[sujeto(['The', aim, of, this, study, was, to, evaluate, the, function, of, 'RhoGDI2', in, lung, cancer, 'epithelial-mesenchymal', transition, '(', 'EMT)', process, and, to, illustrate, the, underlying, mechanisms, that, will]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, improvement, of, lung, cancer, treatment])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, showed, that, the, activity, of, 'Rac1,', a, key, gene, that, is, crucial, for, the, initiation, and, metastasis, of, human, lung, 'adenocarcinoma,']), verbo([causing]), complemento([the, redistribution, of, 'F-actin', with, partial, loss, of, 'cell-cell', adhesions, and, stress, 'fibers,', was, significantly, suppressed, by, 'RhoGDI2'])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI2']), verbo([promoted]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'EMT', marker, gene, 'E-cadherin', and, repressed, 'EMT', promoting, genes, 'Slug,', 'Snail,', &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-SMA', in, both, 'A549', cells, and, lung, and, liver, organs, derived, from, the, mouse, models])].
[sujeto(['Knocking-down', 'RhoGDI2']), verbo([induced]), complemento([abnormal, morphology, for, lung, organs])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, 'RhoGDI2', repressed, the, activity, of, 'Rac1', and, may, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, rearrangement, of, cytoskeleton, in, lung, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['RhoGDI2']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento([the, metastasis, of, lung, cancer, mediated, through, 'EMT', by, regulating, the, expression, of, key, genes, such, as, 'E-cadherin,', 'Slug,', 'Snail', and, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-SMA', in, both, in, vivo, and, in, vitro, models])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, identify, a, critical, role, for, 14, -, 3, -, 3, &, 'Iuml;&bdquo;', in]), verbo([promoting]), complemento([breast, cancer, 'metastasis,', in, part, through, binding, to, and, inhibition, of, 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;,', a, negative, regulator, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', and, a, metastasis, suppressor])].
[sujeto([14, -, 3, -, 3, &, 'Iuml;&bdquo;']), verbo([binds]), complemento(['Ser174-phosphorylated', 'RhoGDI&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, blocks, its, association, with, 'Rho', 'GTPases,', thereby, promoting, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)-induced', 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Cdc42', activation])].
[sujeto(['When', 14, -, 3, -, 3, &, 'Iuml;&bdquo;', is, overexpressed, in, 'MCF7', breast, cancer, cells, that]), verbo([express]), complemento([14, -, 3, -, 3, &, 'Iuml;&bdquo;', at, low, 'levels,', it, increases, 'motility,', reduces, 'adhesion,', and, promotes, metastasis, in, mammary, fat, pad, xenografts])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', depletion, of, 14, -, 3, -, 3, &, 'Iuml;&bdquo;', in, 'MCF7', cells, and, in, an, invasive, cell, 'line,', 'MDA-MB231,']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['Rho', 'GTPase', activation, and, blocks, breast, cancer, migration, and, invasion])].
[sujeto(['Our', work, indicates, that, 14, -, 3, -, 3, &, 'Iuml;&bdquo;', is, a, novel, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([to, prevent, breast, cancer, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, signal, transduction, mechanisms, underlying, 'MPA-induced', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-cell', toxicity]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, fully, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Eighty-three', real, positives, were, obtained, by, 'Y2H', 'analysis,', and, of, 'these,', arginine, 'N-methyltransferase', 3, '(', 'PRMT3)', protein]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, 'RhoGDI-&Icirc;&plusmn;', in, 'INS-1E', cells])].
[sujeto(['PRMT3', gene, expressions, and, its, protein, levels, were, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([during, 'MPA-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', 'PRMT3', and, 'RhoGDI-&Icirc;&plusmn;', were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, interact, in, 'INS-1E', cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'MPA', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, regulate, this, interaction, in, 'INS-1E', cells, by, 'down-regulating', the, gene, expression, of, 'PRMT3'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, control, of, the, interaction, between, 'PRMT3', and, 'RhoGDI-&Icirc;&plusmn;', could, be, used, to, prevent, 'MPA-induced', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-cell', death])].
[sujeto(['The', activation, of, 'Rac1', and, related, 'Rho', 'GTPases']), verbo([involves]), complemento([dissociation, from, 'Rho', 'GDP-dissociation', inhibitor, proteins, and, translocation, to, 'membranes,', where, they, bind, effectors])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, that, the, binding, of, 'Rac1', to, membranes, 'requires,', and, colocalizes, 'with,', 'cholesterol-rich', 'liquid-ordered', '(', 'lo)', membrane, domains, '(', lipid, 'rafts)'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, a, fluorescence, resonance, energy, transfer, '(', 'FRET)', assay, that, robustly, detects, 'Rac1', membrane, targeting, in, living, cells])].
[sujeto(['Surprisingly,', 'FRET', with, acceptor, constructs, that, were]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([to, either, raft, or, 'non-raft', areas, indicated, that, 'Rac1', was, present, in, both, regions])].
[sujeto(['Functional', studies, showed, that, 'Rac1', localization, to, 'non-raft', regions]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['GTP', loading, as, a, result, of, inactivation, by, 'GTPase-activating', proteins])].
[sujeto(['In', 'vitro,', 'Rac1', translocation, to, supported, lipid, bilayers, also]), verbo([required]), complemento([lo, 'domains,', yet, 'Rac1', was, concentrated, in, the, 'liquid-disordered', '(', 'ld)', phase])].
[sujeto(['These', 'results,', 'therefore,']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Rac1', translocates, to, the, membrane, at, domain, 'boundaries,', then, diffuses, into, raft, and, 'non-raft', 'domains,', which, controls, interactions])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, resolve, discrepancies, in, our, understanding, of, 'Rac', biology, and, identify, novel, mechanisms, by, which, lipid, rafts]), verbo([modulate]), complemento(['Rho', 'GTPase', signaling])].
[sujeto(['The', participation, of, 'Rac', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, following, 'sequence:', '(', 1, ')', 'Translocation', of, the, 'RacGDP-RhoGDI', complex, to, the, 'membrane;', '(', 2, ')', 'Dissociation', of, 'RacGDP', from, 'RhoGDI;', '(', 3, ')', 'GDP', to, 'GTP', exchange, on, 'Rac,', mediated, by, a, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, 'factor;', '(', 4, ')', 'Binding', of, 'RacGTP', to, 'p67(phox);', '(', 5, ')', 'Induction', of, a, conformational, change, in, 'p67(phox),', promoting, interaction, with, 'Nox2'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, by, which, 'RhoGDI2']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([tumor, cell, survival, and, metastasis, remain, unclear])].
[sujeto(['VEGF-C', depletion]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['RhoGDI2-induced', gastric, cancer, metastasis, and, sensitized, 'RhoGDI2-overexpressing', cells, to, 'cisplatin-induced', apoptosis, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Secreted', 'VEGF-C']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([gastric, cancer, cell, invasion, and, conferred, cisplatin, resistance, to, 'RhoGDI2-overexpressing', cells])].
[sujeto(['We', also, show, that, 'RhoGDI2', positively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Rac1', activity, in, gastric, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'Rac1', expression]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['RhoGDI2-induced', 'VEGF-C', 'expression,', and, this, inhibition, was, associated, with, decreased, invasiveness, and, increased, sensitivity, to, cisplatin, in, 'RhoGDI2-overexpressing', cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, 'RhoGDI2', might, be, a, potential, therapeutic]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, simultaneously, reducing, metastasis, risk, and, enhancing, chemotherapy, efficacy, in, gastric, cancer])].
[sujeto(['The', major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, death, in, osteosarcoma, is, the, increase, in, metastatic, 'potential,', and, the, ezrin, expression, has, been, correlated, with, the, metastasis, development])].
[sujeto(['Ezrin']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'RhoGDI', by, dissociating, it, from, 'RhoGTPases,', which, allow, 'GTPases', to, load, with, 'GTP,', activate, 'RhoA', to, increase, cell, 'migration,', and, invasion])].
[sujeto(['RhoGTPases']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, to, contribute, to, pathologic, processes, including, cancer, cell, 'migration,', 'invasion,', and, metastasis, and, overexpression, of, either, the, 'GTPase', itself, or, some, elements, of, 'Rho', signaling, that, have, been, detected, in, many, human, 'tumors,', including, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([analyzed, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', expression, in, the, osteosarcoma, tissues, to, understand, the, role, of, the, 'ezrin-Rho', family, pathway, in, osteosarcoma, metastatic, progression])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([blocked, the, ezrin, expression, using, siRNA, assay, to, investigate, a, possible, correlation, with, 'RAC1', and, 'RHOA', expression, in, the, osteosarcoma, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['It', is, possible, that, the, mechanism, of, cell, motility]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', is, maintained, in, 'osteosarcomas,', and, since, the, expression, of, 'ezrin,', 'Rac1', and, 'RhoA', do, not, correlate, with, metastatic, progression, in, osteosarcoma])].
[sujeto(['Rho-GDP-dissociation', 'inhibitor-&Icirc;&sup3;', '(', 'Rho-GDI&Icirc;&sup3;)', was, identified, as, an, important, downregulator, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, 'GTPases,', because, of, its, ability, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([nucleotide, exchange, and, thus, membrane, association])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, indicate, that, the, overexpression, of, 'Rho-GDI&Icirc;&sup3;']), verbo([maintains]), complemento(['NSCs', in, the, stem, cell, 'state,', meanwhile, preventing, 'NSC', migration, through, inhibition, of, 'Rac1', 'expression,', one, of, the, 'Rho-family', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['This', study]), verbo([provides]), complemento([the, basis, for, further, study, of, the, molecular, mechanism, of, 'NSC', migration])].
[sujeto(['Epidermal', growth, factor, receptor, '(', 'EGFR)', signaling]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([cell, growth, and, 'survival,', and, its, overactivation, drives, cancer, development])].
[sujeto(['One', important, branch, of, 'EGFR', signaling, is, through, activation, of, 'GTPase', 'Rac1,', which, further]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([cell, 'proliferation,', survival, and, cancer, metastasis])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, 'EGFR']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Rac1', via, inducing, the, accumulation, of, its, specific, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, 'factor,', 'T-cell', lymphoma, invasion, and, metastasis, 1, '(', 'Tiam1)', in, 'non-small-cell', lung, cancer, and, colon, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,', elevated, 'Tiam1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'EGFR-induced', tumorigenesis])].
[sujeto(['We', further]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([that, 'AKT,', a, key, downstream, protein, kinase, of, 'EGFR,', phosphorylates, 'Tiam1', at, several, consensus, 'sites,', facilitates, the, interaction, of, 'Tiam1', with, scaffold, proteins, 14, -, 3, -, 3, and, leads, to, an, increase, of, 'Tiam1', stability])].
[sujeto(['Together,', our, study, identifies, a, bidirectional, '(', phosphorylation, and, 'dephosphorylation)', regulatory, mechanism, controlling, 'Tiam1', stability, and]), verbo([provides]), complemento([new, insights, on, how, 'EGFR', signaling, triggers, 'Rac1', activation, and, cancer, development])].
[sujeto(['In', 'diabetes,']), verbo([increased]), complemento([retinal, oxidative, stress, is, seen, before, the, mitochondria, are, damaged])].
[sujeto(['High', glucose]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['RAC1', and, 'NOX2', '(', expression, and, 'activity)', and, increased, 'ROS', in, endothelial, cells, before, increasing, mitochondrial, 'ROS', and, mitochondrial, 'DNA', '(', 'mtDNA)', damage])].
[sujeto(['An']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'NOX2', expression, and, membrane, association, of, 'RAC1', and, 'p47(phox)', were, also, seen, in, diabetic, rat, retina])].
[sujeto(['RAC1', activation, and, 'p47(phox)', expression, were, also]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, the, retinal, microvasculature, from, human, donors, with, diabetic, retinopathy])].
[sujeto(['The', 'TIAM1-RAC1-NOX2', signalling, axis, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, the, initial, stages, of, diabetes, to, increase, intracellular, 'ROS', leading, to, mitochondrial, damage, and, accelerated, capillary, cell, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Strategies']), verbo([targeting]), complemento(['TIAM1-RAC1', signalling, could, have, the, potential, to, halt, the, progression, of, diabetic, retinopathy, in, the, early, stages, of, the, disease])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, sirtuin1, '(', 'SIRT1)', deacetylase, is, overexpressed, in, several, human, cancers, and]), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, linked, to, cancer, cell, motility, as, a, 'context-dependent', regulator, of, multiple, 'pathways,', its, role, in, 'Rac1', activation, has, not, been, reported])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', 'SIRT2']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, to, be, upregulated, in, some, 'cancers;', 'however,', studies, have, also, reported, its, role, in, tumor, suppression])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'SIRT1', and, 'SIRT2', positively]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, levels, of, 'Rac1-GTP', and, the, activity, of, 'T-cell', lymphoma, invasion, and, metastasis, 1, '(', 'TIAM1),', a, 'Rac', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)'])].
[sujeto(['Transient', inhibition, of, 'SIRT1', and, 'SIRT2', resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([acetylation, of, 'TIAM1,', whereas, chronic, 'SIRT2', knockdown, resulted, in, enhanced, acetylation, of, 'TIAM1'])].
[sujeto(['SIRT1']), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['Dishevelled', '(', 'DVL)', protein, levels, in, cancer, 'cells,', and, 'DVL', along, with, 'TIAM1', are, known, to, augment, 'Rac', 'activation;', 'however,', 'SIRT1', or, 2, has, not, been, previously, linked, with, 'TIAM1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, diminished, sirtuin, activity, led, to, the, disruption, of, the, 'DVL1-TIAM1', interaction])].
[sujeto(['We', hence, propose, a, model, for, 'Rac', activation, where, 'SIRT1/2', positively]), verbo([modulates]), complemento([the, 'DVL/TIAM1/Rac', axis, and, promotes, sustained, pathway, activation])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)', induced, two, waves, of, 'Rac1', 'activation;', 'namely,', at, 5, min, and, 12, h, after, stimulation])].
[sujeto(['A', second, wave, of, 'EGF-induced', 'Rac1', activation, was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'EGF-induced', cell, 'migration,', 'however,', the, spatiotemporal, regulation, of, the, second, wave, of, 'EGF-induced', 'Rac1', activation, remains, largely, unclear])].

[sujeto(['Furthermore,', these, effects]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'LTC4', were, found, to, be, blocked, in, the, presence, of, the, antagonist, of, cysteinyl, leukotriene, receptor, 1, '(', 'CysLT1)'])].
[sujeto(['This', blockage, indicates, that, 'LTC4', -]), verbo([mediated]), complemento(['CysLT1', signaling, regulates, the, second, 'EGF-induced', wave, of, 'Rac1', activation])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 5, -, 'LOX', 'inhibitors,', 'CysLT1', antagonists, and, the, knockdown, of, 'CysLT1', inhibited, 'EGF-induced', 'T', cell, lymphoma, invasion, and, 'metastasis-inducing', protein, 1, '(', 'Tiam1)', expression])].

[sujeto(['Therefore,', our, results, indicate, that, the, 5, -, 'LOX/LTC4', /, 'CysLT1', signaling, pathway]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['EGF-induced', cell, migration, by, increasing, 'Tiam1', 'expression,', leading, to, a, second, wave, of, 'Rac1', activation])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', 'CysLT1', may, serve, as, a, new, molecular]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, antimetastatic, therapy])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, 'CysLT1', 'antagonist,', 'montelukast,', which, is, used, clinically, for, allergy, 'treatment,', might]), verbo([have]), complemento([great, potential, as, a, novel, type, of, antimetastatic, agent])].
[sujeto(['Deregulated', 'Ras', signaling, initiates, and]), verbo([maintains]), complemento([melanocyte, neoplasia])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Rho-like', 'GTPase', 'Rac']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, 'Ras-induced', neoplastic, transformation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', a, recurrent, 'UV-induced', mutation]), verbo([activating]), complemento(['RAC1', has, recently, been, detected, in, human, melanoma])].
[sujeto(['Malignant', melanocytes, displayed, elevated, 'RAC', activity, that, extended, into, the, suprabasal, 'epidermis,', deeper, into, the, 'dermis,', and, was]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([in, metastases])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([used, zebrafish, transgenic, models, to, demonstrate, that, deregulated, 'Ras/Raf/mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, signaling, can, initiate, melanocyte, neoplasia])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, did, not, detect, an, additive, effect, when, combined, with, 'V600EBRAF,', nor, could, 'V12RAC1', substitute, for]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento(['Pi3k', signaling, to, restore, melanoma, progression])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Rac', contributes, to, the, progression, of, melanoma, and, that, 'Tiam1', may, activate, 'Rac', in, nodular, presentations])].
[sujeto(['In', 'humans,', mutations, in, the, gene, encoding, 'ATRX,', a, chromatin, remodeling, protein, of, the, 'sucrose-nonfermenting', 2, 'family,']), verbo([cause]), complemento([several, mental, retardation, 'disorders,', including, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-thalassemia', 'X-linked', mental, retardation, syndrome])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', aberrant]), verbo([increased]), complemento(['calcium/calmodulin-dependent', protein, kinase, 'II', '(', 'CaMKII)', activity, was, observed, in, the, mPFC, of, 'ATRX(&Icirc;&rdquo;E2)', mice])].
[sujeto(['Increased', 'CaMKII', autophosphorylation, and, activity, were, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, the, 'Rac1-guanine', nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', 'T-cell', lymphoma, invasion, and, metastasis, 1, '(', 'Tiam1)', and, 'kalirin-7,', known, substrates, of, 'CaMKII'])].
[sujeto(['We', confirmed]), verbo([increased]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, 'p21-activated', kinases, '(', 'PAKs)', in, mPFC, extracts])].

[sujeto(['Together,', our, data, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, aberrant, 'CaMKII', activation, likely, mediates, abnormal, spine, formation, in, the, mPFC])].
[sujeto(['T-cell', lymphoma, invasion, and, 'metastasis-inducing', protein, '(', 'Tiam1)', is, a, 'Ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, substrate, '(', 'Rac)-specific', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, that, was, isolated, based, on, its, ability, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, metastatic, phenotype])].
[sujeto(['In', polarized, migrating, 'keratinocytes,', 'Tiam1', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([at, the, leading, edge, where, it, cooperates, with, the, 'Protease-activated', receptor, 1, '(', 'Par1)', complex, to, establish, 'front-rear', polarity])].
[sujeto(['Although', a, positive, correlation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, observed, between, 'Tiam1', expression, and, tumor, grade, in, a, variety, of, human, 'malignancies,', including, 'breast,', its, role, in, breast, cancer, cells, has, not, yet, been, examined])].
[sujeto(['Consistent', with, 'this,', small, interfering, ribonucleic, acid, '(', 'siRNA)-mediated', suppression, of, 'Tiam1', expression, limits, the, motility, of, cell, lines, in, which, 'Tiam1', expression, is, high, '(', 'MDA-MB-231', and, 'MDA-MB-453),', but, does, not, substantially, alter, the, overall, levels, of]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Rac'])].

[sujeto(['Immunofluorescence', and, cellular, fractionations, indicate, that, 'Tiam1', is]), verbo([found]), complemento([predominantly, in, the, 'Golgi', of, breast, cancer, 'cells,', and, in, the, latter, case, 'Tiam1', was, shown, to, 'co-fractionate', with, a, limited, pool, of, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Tiam1', expression, correlates, with, cell, motility, in, human, breast, cancer, 'cells,', and, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([to, support, the, motile, phenotype])].

[sujeto(['T-cell', lymphoma, invasion, and, metastasis, 1, '(', 'Tiam1)', specifically]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['Rho-like', 'GTPases', '(', e])].
[sujeto(['However,', no, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([yet, comprehensively, examined, the, involvement, of, 'Tiam1-Rac1', pathway, in, hepatocellular, carcinoma])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistochemistry', showed, that, patients, with, a, high, clinical, stage, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'III-IV)', and, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-fetoprotein', levels, had, a, higher, tendency, to]), verbo([express]), complemento(['Tiam1', and, 'Rac1', on, tumor, cells, than, the, patients, with, low, pathologic, grade, hepatocellular, carcinoma, '(', 'I-II)', '(', 'P', =, 0.008, and, 0.01, ',', 'respectively)', and, low, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;-fetoprotein', levels, '(', 'P', =, 0.006, and, 0.002, ',', 'respectively)'])].
[sujeto(['Earlier', studies, identified, a, consensus, 'PDZ-binding', motif, and, a, synthetic, peptide, capable, of]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, the, 'Tiam1', 'PDZ', 'domain,', but, little, is, known, about, its, ligand, specificity, and, physiological, role, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['Protein', database, searches, using, the, consensus, 'PDZ-binding', motif, identified, two, eukaryotic, cell, adhesion, 'proteins,', 'Syndecan1', and, 'Caspr4,', as, potential, 'Tiam1', 'PDZ', domain]), verbo([binding]), complemento([proteins])].
[sujeto(['Equilibrium']), verbo([binding]), complemento([experiments, confirmed, that, 'C-terminal', peptides, derived, from, 'Syndecan1', and, 'Caspr4', bound, the, 'Tiam1', 'PDZ', domain])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', cell, biological, analysis, established, that, 'Syndecan1', is, a, physiological]), verbo([binding]), complemento([partner, of, 'Tiam1', and, that, the, 'PDZ', domain, has, a, function, in, 'cell-matrix', adhesion, and, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, data]), verbo([provide]), complemento([insight, into, the, 'structure,', 'specificity,', and, function, of, the, 'Tiam1', 'PDZ', domain])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', our, data]), verbo([report]), complemento([on, a, physiological, role, for, the, 'Tiam1', 'PDZ', domain, and, establish, a, novel, link, between, two, previously, unrelated, signal, transduction, 'pathways,', both, of, which, are, implicated, in, cancer])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'RhoA', and, 'RhoB', scores, slightly, increased, with, tumor, 'grade,', whereas, the, 'Rac1', score, remained, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['Tiam1', expression, scores, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([with, the, increase, in, tumor, 'grade,', tumor, spreading, and, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['The', data, show, that, 'Tiam1', expression]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([with, the, progression, of, breast, carcinomas, and, is, inversely, associated, with, several, established, breast, tumor, markers])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Tiam1', counteracts, the, progression, of, breast, carcinomas, and, is, suitable, as, a, novel, breast, tumor, marker])].
[sujeto(['Metastasis', formation, is, the]), verbo([leading]), complemento([cause, of, death, in, cancer, patients])].
[sujeto(['Using', an, in, vitro, model, 'system,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'Tiam1', '(', 'T-lymphoma', invasion, and, metastasis, 1, ')', as, a, gene, that, can, induce, invasion, by, and, metastasis, of, mouse, 'T-lymphoma', cells])].
[sujeto(['Rho-like', 'GTPases', play, a, pivotal, role, in, the, orchestration, of, changes, in, the, actin, cytoskeleton, in, response, to, receptor, 'stimulation,', but]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, shown, to, be, involved, in, transcriptional, activation, and, cell, cycle, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', they, can]), verbo([induce]), complemento([oncogenic, transformation, in, fibroblast, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'chapter,', we, first, summarize, what, is, known, about, the, signalling, pathways, that, are]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'Tiam1', and, 'Rho-like', 'GTPases,', and, discuss, the, putative, effectors, that, may, mediate, the, effects, in, different, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, previously, that, 'Clostridium', difficile, toxin, 'B', '(', 'ToxB),', an, inhibitor, of, 'RhoA,', 'Rac1,', and, 'Cdc42,', induces, apoptosis, of, cerebellar, granule, neurons, '(', 'CGNs)'])].
[sujeto(['In', a, manner, similar, to, 'ToxB,', selective, inhibition, of, 'Rac']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['CGN', apoptosis, associated, with, enhanced, 'caspase-3', activation, and, reduced, phosphorylation, of, the, 'Rac', effector, 'p21-activated', kinase])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, 'ToxB,', caspase, inhibitors, do, not, protect, 'CGNs', from]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([inhibition, of, 'Rac'])].
[sujeto(['Also', dissimilar, to, 'ToxB,', selective, inhibition, of, 'Rac', does, not]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['MEK1/2/ERK1/2', or, activate, 'JNK/c-Jun'])].
[sujeto(['Instead,']), verbo([targeted]), complemento([inhibition, of, 'Rac', suppresses, distinct, 'MEK5/ERK5,', 'p90Rsk,', and, 'Akt-dependent', signaling, cascades, known, to, regulate, the, localization, and, expression, of, the, 'Bcl-2', homology, 3, 'domain-only', protein, 'Bad'])].
[sujeto(['Adenoviral', expression, of, a, constitutively, active, mutant, of, 'MEK5', is, sufficient, to, attenuate, neuronal, cell, death]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, selective, inhibition, of, 'Rac', with, 'NSC23766', but, not, apoptosis, induced, by, global, inhibition, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases', with, 'ToxB'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, data, demonstrate, that, global, suppression, of, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases', with, 'ToxB']), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, loss, of, 'MEK1/2/ERK1/2', signaling, and, activation, of, 'JNK/c-Jun,', resulting, in, diminished, degradation, and, enhanced, transcription, of, the, 'Bcl-2', homology, 3, 'domain-only', protein, 'Bim'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', selective, inhibition, of, 'Rac']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['CGN', apoptosis, by, repressing, unique, 'MEK5/ERK5,', 'p90Rsk,', and, 'Akt-dependent', prosurvival, 'pathways,', ultimately, leading, to, enhanced, 'expression,', 'dephosphorylation,', and, mitochondrial, localization, of, proapoptotic, 'Bad'])].
[sujeto(['Dendritic', spine, morphology, changes, in, response, to, ischemic, insults, in, 'vivo,', but, cell, 'type-specific', differences, and, the, molecular, mechanisms]), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, such, morphologic, changes, are, unexplored])].
[sujeto(['Rac1', is, a, 'Rho-family', 'GTPase', that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, actin, cytoskeleton, and, is, involved, in, spine, dynamics])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, 'Rac1', and, the, 'Rac', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)', 'Tiam1', are, differentially]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'OGD', in, hippocampal, and, cortical, neurons])].

[sujeto(['This', work, defines, fundamental, differences, in, signalling, pathways, that]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([spine, morphology, in, distinct, neuronal, populations, that, may, have, a, role, in, the, differential, vulnerability, to, ischemia])].
[sujeto(['Cingulin', '(', 'CGN)', and, paracingulin, '(', 'CGNL1)', control, 'RhoA', activation, in, epithelial, cells, by]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([with, 'RhoA', guanidine, exchange, factors])].
[sujeto(['CGNL1', depletion, also]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['Rac1', activation, during, junction, assembly])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, 'that,', 'unexpectedly,', 'Madin-Darby', canine, kidney, epithelial, cells, depleted, of, both, 'CGN', and, 'CGNL1', '(', 'double-KD', 'cells)', display, normal, 'Rac1', activation, and, tight, junction, '(', 'TJ)', 'formation,', despite]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([junctional, recruitment, of, the, 'Rac1', activator, 'Tiam1'])].

[sujeto(['Non-muscle', myosin, 'II', '(', 'NM', 'II)']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([a, wide, range, of, cellular, 'functions,', including, neuronal, 'differentiation,', which, requires, precise, 'spatio-temporal', activation, of, 'Rho', 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, explored, the, possibility, that, 'NM', 'II']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([neuronal, 'differentiation,', particularly, morphological, changes, in, growth, cones, and, the, distal, 'axon,', through, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', of, the, 'Dbl', family])].

[sujeto(['Eph/ephrin']), verbo([binding]), complemento([can, lead, to, various, and, opposite, cellular, behaviors, such, as, adhesion, versus, 'repulsion,', or, cell, migration, versus, 'cell-adhesion'])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', 'Eph', endocytosis]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, one, of, the, critical, steps, responsible, for, such, diversity])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, showed, that]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['EphA2', are, degraded, in, the, lysosomes, and, that, about, 35, '%', of, internalized, receptors, are, recycled, back, to, the, plasma, membrane])].

[sujeto(['These', results, show, that, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([developed, novel, 'Rac1', inhibitors, that, may, be, used, as, a, novel, anticancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Tiam1', is, a, large, 'multi-domain', protein, that, contains, several, 'protein-protein']), verbo([binding]), complemento([domains, that, are, important, for, regulating, cellular, function])].
[sujeto(['It', was, determined, that, the, 'coiled-coil', domain, of, 'Par3b']), verbo([binds]), complemento([the, 'PHn-CC-Ex', domain, with, a, dissociation, constant, of, &, 'acirc;&permil;&circ;', 30, &, 'Acirc;&micro;M'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'Ras', homolog, family, '(', 'Rho)', and, one, of, its, 'targets,', 'Rho-associated', protein, kinase, '(', 'ROCK),']), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, a, wide, variety, of, biological, 'processes,', including, bone, formation])].

[sujeto(['Amplification', of, 'insulin-like', growth, factor, 'I', receptor, '(', 'IGF-IR)', and, deletion, of, tumor, suppressor, phosphatase, and, tensin, homolog, '(', 'PTEN)', are, implicated, in, 'Trastuzumab', 'resistance,', 'however,', the, underlying, mechanisms]), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, clearly, defined])].
