[sujeto(['Immense', previous, efforts]), verbo([have]), complemento([elucidated, the, core, machinery, in, cell, 'migration,', actin, remodeling, regulated, by, 'Rho', family, small, 'GTPases', including, 'RhoA,', 'Cdc42,', and, 'Rac1;', 'however,', the, spatiotemporal, regulation, of, these, molecules, remains, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'EGF', induces, biphasic, 'Rac1', activation, in, the, process, of, cell, 'migration,', and, 'UTKO1,', a, cell, migration, 'inhibitor,', inhibits, the, second, 'EGF-induced', wave, of, 'Rac1', activation, but, not, the, first, wave])].

[sujeto(['To', our, 'knowledge,', this, is, the, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([to, use, a, chemical, genetic, approach, to, demonstrate, the, mechanism, of, temporal, activation, of, 'Rac1'])].

[sujeto(['Nerve', 'Growth', 'Factor', '(', 'NGF)-induced', neuronal, differentiation]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, activation, of, members, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, small, 'GTPases'])].

[sujeto(['ITX3', specifically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([endogenous, 'TrioN', 'activity,', as, evidenced, by, its, ability, to, inhibit, neurite, outgrowth, in, nerve, growth, factor, '(', 'NGF)-stimulated', 'PC12', cells, or, 'C2C12', differentiation, into, myotubes])].
[sujeto(['Rac1']), verbo([has]), complemento([a, crucial, role, in, epidermal, growth, factor, '(', 'EGF)-induced', membrane, 'ruffling,', lamellipodial, 'protrusion,', and, cell, migration])].
[sujeto(['Several', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', including, 'Sos1,', 'Sos2,', 'Tiam1', and, 'Vav2']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, transduce, the, growth, signal, from, the, 'EGF', receptor, to, 'Rac1'])].

[sujeto(['There', is, now, considerable, experimental, evidence, that, aberrant, activation, of, 'Rho', family, small, 'GTPases']), verbo([promotes]), complemento([the, uncontrolled, 'proliferation,', 'invasion,', and, metastatic, properties, of, human, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', to, 'date,', most, efforts]), verbo([have]), complemento([focused, on, inhibitors, that, indirectly, block, 'Rho', 'GTPase', 'function,', by, targeting, either, enzymes, involved, in, 'post-translational', processing, or, downstream, protein, kinase, effectors])].
[sujeto(['We', recently, determined, that, the, 'EHT', 1864, small, molecule, can]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['Rac', function, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['We', determined, that, 'EHT', 1864, specifically]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Rac1-dependent', 'platelet-derived', growth, 'factor-induced', lamellipodia, formation])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', our, biochemical, analyses, with, recombinant, 'Rac', proteins]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'EHT', 1864, possesses, high, affinity, binding, to, 'Rac1,', as, well, as, the, related, 'Rac1b,', 'Rac2,', and, 'Rac3', 'isoforms,', and, this, association, promoted, the, loss, of, bound, 'nucleotide,', inhibiting, both, guanine, nucleotide, association, and, 'Tiam1', 'Rac', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, 'factor-stimulated', exchange, factor, activity, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['EHT', 1864, therefore, places, 'Rac', in, an, inert, and, inactive, 'state,']), verbo([preventing]), complemento([its, engagement, with, downstream, effectors])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, evaluated, the, ability, of, 'EHT', 1864, to, block, 'Rac-dependent', growth, 'transformation,', and, we, determined, that, 'EHT', 1864, potently, blocked, transformation]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, constitutively, activated, 'Rac1,', as, well, as, 'Rac-dependent', transformation, caused, by, 'Tiam1', or, 'Ras'])].

[sujeto(['Polymorphonuclear', neutrophils, '(', 'PMNs),', the, main, effectors, of, the, innate, immune, 'system,']), verbo([have]), complemento([rarely, been, considered, as, an, anticancer, therapeutic, tool])].
[sujeto(['However,', recent, investigations, using, animal, models, and, preliminary, clinical, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([highlighted, the, potential, antitumor, efficacy, of, 'PMNs'])].
[sujeto(['In', the, current, 'study,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, 'PMNs', from, some, healthy, donors, naturally, have, potent, 'cancer-killing', activity, against, 4, different, human, cancer, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Transfecting', the, immortalized, mammary, cells, with, plasmids]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([activated, forms, of, the, rat, sarcoma, viral, oncogene, homolog, '(', 'Ras)', and, teratocarcinoma, oncogene, 21, '(', 'TC21)', oncogenes, was, sufficient, to, provoke, aggressive, attack, by, 'PMNs'])].
[sujeto(['However,', transfection, with]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, substrate, '(', 'Rac1)', was, 'ineffective,', suggesting, specificity, in, 'PMN-targeting', of, neoplastic, cells])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'PMNs', from, lung, cancer, patients, were, also]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, exhibit, relatively, poor, 'cancer-killing', activity, compared, to, the, cytolytic, activity, of, the, average, healthy, donor])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PMN-based', treatment, regimens, may, represent, a, paradigm, shift, in, cancer, immunotherapy, that, may, be, easily, introduced, into, the, clinic, to, benefit, a, subset, of, patients, with, 'PMN-vulnerable', tumors])].
[sujeto(['It']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, established, that, the, key, metabolic, pathways, of, glycolysis, and, oxidative, phosphorylation, are, intimately, related, to, redox, biology, through, control, of, cell, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Under', physiological, conditions, glucose, metabolism, is, linked, to, control, of, the, 'NADH/NAD', redox, 'couple,', as, well, as]), verbo([providing]), complemento([the, major, 'reductant,', 'NADPH,', for, 'thiol-dependent', antioxidant, defenses])].

[sujeto(['A', new, family, of, 'ras-related', 'proteins,', designated, rac, '(', 'ras-related', 'C3', botulinum, toxin, 'substrate)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified])].
[sujeto([rac1, and, rac2, possess, four, of, the, five]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([functional, domains, in, ras, associated, with, binding, and, hydrolysis, of, guanine, nucleotides])].

[sujeto(['The', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, racs, are, plasma, 'membrane-associated', 'GTP-binding', proteins, which, could, regulate, secretory, 'processes,', particularly, in, myeloid, cells])].
[sujeto(['Patients']), verbo([have]), complemento([severe, 'infections,', 'autoimmunity,', or, both])].
[sujeto(['Methods', 'We', performed, genetic, and, cellular, immunologic, studies]), verbo([involving]), complemento([five, unrelated, children, with, 'early-onset', invasive, bacterial, and, viral, 'infections,', 'lymphopenia,', and, defective, 'T-cell,', 'B-cell,', and, natural, killer, '(', 'NK)-cell', responses])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', in, 'DOCK2-deficient', 'fibroblasts,', viral, replication, was]), verbo([increased]), complemento([and, 'virus-induced', cell, death, was, 'enhanced;', these, conditions, were, normalized, by, treatment, with, interferon, 'alfa-2b', or, after, expression, of, 'wild-type', 'DOCK2'])].
[sujeto(['Children', with, clinical, features, of, combined, 'immunodeficiencies,', especially, with, 'early-onset,', invasive, 'infections,', may]), verbo([have]), complemento([this, condition])].

[sujeto(['It', is, predominantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, neural, tissues, and, causes, cellular, morphological, changes, by, activating, the, small, 'GTPase', 'Rac1'])].

[sujeto(['The', dedicator, of, cytokinesis, '(', 'Dock)', family, is, composed, of, atypical, guanine, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)', that]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'Rho', 'GTPases', 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42'])].

[sujeto(['Among', the, 'Dock', 'proteins,', 'Dock3', is, predominantly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, central, nervous, system, and, recent, studies, have, revealed, that, 'Dock3', plays, a, role, in, protecting, retinal, ganglion, cells, from, neurotoxicity, and, oxidative, stress, as, well, as, in, promoting, optic, nerve, regeneration])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'review,', we, discuss, the, current, understanding, of, the, 11, 'Dock', 'GEFs', and, their, therapeutic, 'potential,', with, a, particular, focus, on, 'Dock3', as, a, novel]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, the, treatment, of, glaucoma, and, other, neurodegenerative, diseases])].
[sujeto(['Dedicator', of, cytokinesis, 2, -, engulfment, and, cell, motility, protein, 1, '(', 'DOCK2&acirc;&euro;&cent;ELMO1)', complex, formation, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'DOCK2-mediated', 'Rac', signaling])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, identified, the, 'N-terminal', 177, -, residue, fragment, and, the, 'C-terminal', 196, -, residue, fragment, of, human, 'DOCK2', and, 'ELMO1,', 'respectively,', as, the, mutual]), verbo([binding]), complemento(['regions,', and, solved, the, crystal, structure, of, their, complex, at, 2.1, -, &, 'acirc;&bdquo;&laquo;', resolution])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', the, entire, regions, of, both, 'DOCK2', and, 'ELMO1', assemble, to, create, a, rigid, 'structure,', which, is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, 'DOCK2&acirc;&euro;&cent;ELMO1', 'binding,', as, revealed, by, mutagenesis])].
[sujeto(['The', interactions, between, the, 'N-', and, 'C-terminal', regions, of, 'ELMO1', reportedly]), verbo([cause]), complemento([its, 'autoinhibition,', and, binding, with, a, 'DOCK', protein, relieves, the, autoinhibition, for, ras, homolog, gene, 'family,', member, 'G', binding, and, membrane, localization])].
[sujeto(['In', 'fact,', the, 'DOCK2&acirc;&euro;&cent;ELMO1', interface, also, buries, the, 'ELMO1', residues]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, autoinhibition, within, the, hydrophobic, core, of, the, helix, bundle])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', the, present, complex, structure]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([the, structural, basis, by, which, 'DOCK2', and, 'ELMO1', mutually, relieve, their, autoinhibition, for, the, activation, of, 'Rac1', for, lymphocyte, chemotaxis])].
[sujeto(['It', is, usually, inherited, as, an, 'autosomal-dominant', 'trait,', but, 'autosomal-recessive', inheritance]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, documented])].
[sujeto(['In', an, individual, with, 'autosomal-recessive', 'AOS,', we, combined, autozygome, analysis, with, exome, sequencing, to, identify, a, homozygous, truncating, mutation, in, dedicator, of, cytokinesis, 6, gene, '(', 'DOCK6)', which, encodes, an, atypical, guanidine, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)', known, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento([two, members, of, the, 'Rho', 'GTPase', 'family:', 'Cdc42', and, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['Another', homozygous, truncating, mutation, was, identified, upon]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([sequencing, of, 'DOCK6', in, an, unrelated, individual, with, 'AOS'])].

[sujeto(['Dock', family, proteins, are, evolutionary]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([exchange, factors, for, the, 'Rho', 'GTPases', 'Rac', and, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'particular,', 'Dock', proteins]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([actin, 'cytoskeleton,', cell, adhesion, and, migration])].
[sujeto(['Not', 'surprisingly,', members, of, the, 'Dock', family]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, involved, in, various, 'pathologies,', including, cancer, and, defects, in, the, central, nervous, and, immune, systems])].
[sujeto(['DOCK', '(', dedicator, of, 'cytokinesis)', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, '(', 'GEFs)']), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, 'Rho-family', 'GTPases', 'Rac', and, 'Cdc42', to, control, cell, 'migration,', 'morphogenesis,', and, phagocytosis])].
[sujeto(['The', 'DOCK', 'A', and, 'B', subfamilies]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['Rac,', whereas, the, 'DOCK', 'D', subfamily, activates, 'Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['Nucleotide', exchange, is, catalyzed, by, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['DHR2', domain, '(', 'DOCK(DHR2))'])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, molecular, basis, for, 'DOCK(DHR2)-mediated', 'GTPase', activation]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, elucidated, through, structures, of, a, 'DOCK9(DHR2)-Cdc42', 'complex,', the, factors, determining, recognition, of, specific, 'GTPases', are, unknown])].
[sujeto(['To', understand, the, molecular, basis, for, 'DOCK-GTPase', 'specificity,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([determined, the, crystal, structure, of, 'DOCK2(DHR2)', in, complex, with, 'Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['DOCK2(DHR2)', and, 'DOCK9(DHR2)', exhibit, similar, tertiary, structures, and, homodimer, interfaces, and, share, a]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['GTPase-activating', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Cell', migration, is, a, fundamental, biological, process]), verbo([involving]), complemento([membrane, polarization, and, cytoskeletal, 'dynamics,', both, of, which, are, regulated, by, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CDM', family, 'proteins,', 'Caenorhabditis', elegans, 'CED-5,', human, 'DOCK180', and, 'Drosophila', melanogaster, 'Myoblast', 'City', '(', 'MBC),', are, implicated, to]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([membrane, extension, by, functioning, upstream, of, 'Rac'])].
[sujeto(['Although', genetic, analysis]), verbo([has]), complemento([shown, that, 'CED-5', and, 'Myoblast', 'City', are, crucial, for, migration, of, particular, types, of, 'cells,', physiological, relevance, of, the, 'CDM', family, proteins, in, mammals, remains, unknown])].
[sujeto(['DOCK2-deficient', mice, '(', 'DOCK2-/-)', exhibited, migration, defects, of, 'T', and, 'B', 'lymphocytes,', but, not, of, 'monocytes,', in, response, to, 'chemokines,', resulting, in, several, abnormalities, including, 'T', 'lymphocytopenia,', atrophy, of, lymphoid, follicles, and]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'marginal-zone', 'B', cells])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', in, lymphocyte, migration, 'DOCK2', functions, as, a, central, regulator, that]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([cytoskeletal, reorganization, through, 'Rac', activation])].
[sujeto(['G-protein-coupled', receptors, '(', 'GPCRs)']), verbo([regulate]), complemento([the, organisation, of, the, actin, cytoskeleton, by, activating, the, 'Rac', subfamily, of, small, 'GTPases'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'guanine-nucleotide-exchange', factor, '(', 'GEF)', 'P-Rex1', is, engaged, downstream, of, 'GPCRs', and, phosphoinositide, 3, -, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)', in, many, cell, 'types,', and]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([tumorigenic, signalling, and, metastasis, in, breast, cancer, and, 'melanoma,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'P-Rex1-dependent', functions]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, attributed, to, its, 'GEF', activity, towards, 'Rac1,', we, show, that, 'P-Rex1', also, acts, as, a, 'GEF', for, the, 'Rac-related', 'GTPase', 'RhoG,', both, in, vitro, and, in, 'GPCR-stimulated', primary, mouse, neutrophils])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, either, 'P-Rex1', or, 'RhoG', caused, equivalent, reductions, in, 'GPCR-driven', 'Rac', activation, and, 'Rac-dependent', 'NADPH', oxidase, 'activity,', suggesting, they, both, function, upstream, of, 'Rac', in, this, system])].
[sujeto(['Loss', of, 'RhoG', also, impaired, 'GPCR-driven', recruitment, of, the, 'Rac', 'GEF', 'DOCK2,', and, 'F-actin,', to, the]), verbo([leading]), complemento([edge, of, migrating, neutrophils])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, new, signalling, hierarchy, in, which, 'P-Rex1,', acting, as, a, 'GEF', for, 'RhoG,', regulates, 'Rac-dependent', functions, indirectly, through, 'RhoG-dependent', recruitment, of, 'DOCK2'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, thus]), verbo([have]), complemento([broad, implications, for, our, understanding, of, 'GPCR', signalling, to, 'Rho', 'GTPases', and, the, actin, cytoskeleton])].
[sujeto(['The', incidence, of, esophageal, adenocarcinoma, '(', 'EAC)']), verbo([has]), complemento([risen, 600, '%', over, the, last, 30, years])].
[sujeto(['With', a, 5, -, year, survival, rate, of, '~15%,', the, identification, of, new, therapeutic]), verbo([targets]), complemento([for, 'EAC', is, greatly, important])].
[sujeto(['We', analyze, the, mutation, spectra, from, 'whole-exome', sequencing, of, 149, 'EAC', 'tumor-normal', 'pairs,', 15, of, which]), verbo([have]), complemento([also, been, subjected, to, 'whole-genome', sequencing])].

[sujeto(['The', reorganization, is]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, effector, proteins, recruited, to, the, site, of, activity, by, 'locally-generated', lipid, second, messengers])].

[sujeto(['Here,', we, show, that, macrophages, prepared, from, mice, lacking, either, of, the, classical, 'PLD', isoforms, 'PLD1', or, 'PLD2,', or, 'wild-type', macrophages, whose, 'PLD', activity]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, pharmacologically, 'inhibited,', display, 'isoform-specific', actin, cytoskeleton, abnormalities, that, likely, underlie, decreases, observed, in, phagocytic, capacity])].

[sujeto(['Multicellular', development]), verbo([has]), complemento([evolved, independently, on, numerous, occasions, and, there, is, great, interest, in, the, developmental, mechanisms, utilized, by, each, of, the, divergent, lineages])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, data, indicate, that, actin]), verbo([has]), complemento([a, role, at, very, early, stages, of, autophagosome, formation, linked, to, the, 'PtdIns3P', generation, step])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([found, that, two, members, of, the, 'Rho', family, of, 'proteins,', 'RHOA', and, 'RAC1', have, a, regulatory, function, on, 'starvation-mediated', 'autophagy,', but, with, opposite, roles])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', 'RHOA']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, activatory, role, whereas, 'Rac', has, an, inhibitory, one])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, found, that, inhibition, of, the, 'RHOA', effector, 'ROCK', impaired, the, 'starvation-mediated', autophagic, response])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, actin]), verbo([participates]), complemento([in, the, initial, membrane, remodeling, stage, when, cells, require, an, enhanced, rate, of, autophagosome, 'formation,', and, this, actin, function, would, be, tightly, regulated, by, different, members, of, the, 'Rho', family])].
[sujeto(['The', small, 'GTPase', 'RalA']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, glucose, uptake, in, 'insulin-stimulated', 'adipocytes,', although, it, remains, unclear, whether, 'RalA', has, a, similar, role, in, insulin, signaling, in, other, types, of, cells])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, the, 'Rho', family, 'GTPase', 'Rac1', has, a, critical, role, in, 'insulin-dependent', glucose, uptake, in, myoblast, culture, and, mouse, skeletal, muscle])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms, underlying, 'Rac1-dependent', glucose, 'uptake,', mostly]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, the, plasma, membrane, translocation, of, the, glucose, transporter, 'GLUT4,', remain, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Ectopic', expression, of, a, constitutively]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['RalA', mutant, indeed, stimulated, 'GLUT4', 'translocation,', suggesting, an, important, role, of, 'RalA', also, in, muscle, cells])].
[sujeto(['GLUT4', translocation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, constitutively, activated, mutation, of, 'Rac1', or, more, physiologically, by, upstream, 'Rac1', 'regulators,', such, as, phosphoinositide, 3, kinase, and, the, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, 'FLJ00068,', was, abrogated, when, the, expression, of, 'RalA', was, downregulated, by, 'RNA', interference])].
[sujeto(['The', expression, of, constitutively]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['Rac1,', on, the, other, 'hand,', caused, 'GTP', loading, and, subcellular, redistribution, of, 'RalA'])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', we, propose, a, novel, mechanism]), verbo([involving]), complemento(['RalA', for, 'Rac1-mediated', 'GLUT4', translocation, in, skeletal, muscle, cells])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, study, showed, that, overexpression, of, human, 'Dsg3', in, several, epithelial, lines]), verbo([induces]), complemento([formation, of, membrane, 'protrusions,', a, phenotype, suggestive, of, 'Rho', 'GTPase', activation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, examined, the, interaction, between, 'Dsg3', and, actin, in, detail, and, showed, that, endogenous, 'Dsg3', colocalises, and]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'actin,', particularly, the, junctional, actin, in, a, 'Rac1-dependent', manner])].

[sujeto(['In', 'accordance,', overexpression, of, 'Dsg3', results, in, a, remarkable]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, 'Rac1', and, 'Cdc42', activities, and, to, a, lesser, 'extent,', 'RhoA'])].

[sujeto(['Rho', family, 'GTPase-specific', guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factors, of, the, 'Dbl', family]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([a, variety, of, cellular, events, including, cytoskeletal, 'arrangement,', signal, 'transduction,', and, gene, expression, through, activation, of, 'Rho', family, 'GTPases'])].

[sujeto(['Western', blotting, indicated, that, 'VAV2', is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, 'INS-1', 832, /, 13, beta, 'cells,', normal, rat, islets, and, human, islets])].

[sujeto(['Stem', cells]), verbo([have]), complemento([attracted, great, interest, for, their, therapeutic, capacity, in, tissue, regeneration])].

[sujeto(['Arfaptin', 1, had, no, significant, effects, on, guanine, nucleotide]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'Arfs,', nor, enzymatic, activities, of, guanine, nucleotide, exchange, factor, '(', 'GEF)', and, 'GTPase', activating, protein, '(', 'GAP)', acting, on, 'Arfs'])].
[sujeto(['However,', arfaptin, 1]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['Arf', activation, of, cholera, toxin, and, phospholipase, 'D', '(', 'PLD)', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Only', 'GTP-bound', forms, of, 'Arf1,', 5, ',', and, 6]), verbo([interacted]), complemento([with, arfaptin, 1, and, 2, ',', but, 'GTP-Arf1', showed, the, strongest, binding, to, the, arfaptins])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, the]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, 'Arfs', to, 'arfaptins,', 'GDP-Rac1', or, dominant, negative, 'Rac1-N17N', bound, to, arfaptin, 2, ',', whereas, 'GTP-Rac1', or, dominant, active, 'Rac1-Q61L', did, not, bind, to, arfaptin, 2])].
[sujeto(['Neither', 'GTP-Rac1', nor, 'GDP-Rac1']), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, arfaptin, 1])].
[sujeto(['Based', on, our, 'observation,', we, propose, that, arfaptin, 2, is, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, 'GDP-Rac1', and, for, 'GTP-Arf1,', and, is, involved, in, interactions, between, the, 'Rac1', and, 'Arfs', signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([explored, the, roles, of, 'ADP-ribosylation', factors, '(', 'ARFs),', phospholipase, 'D', '(', 'PLD)', 'isozymes,', and, arfaptins, in, phorbol, ester, '(', 'PMA)-induced', membrane, ruffling, in, 'HeLa', cells])].
[sujeto(['PMA', stimulation]), verbo([induced]), complemento([ruffling, and, translocated, cortactin, to, the, plasma, membrane])].
[sujeto(['The', cortactin, translocation, was]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, dominant, negative, '(', 'DN)-ARF6,', 'DN-ARF1,', and, 'DN-Rac1,', but, not, by, 'DN-RhoA', and, 'DN-Cdc42'])].
[sujeto(['The', inability, of, 'DN-forms', of, 'ARF6,', 'ARF1,', and, 'Rac1', to, affect, 'PLD', activity, in, response, to, 'PMA', indicated, that, this, enzyme, was, not]), verbo([activated]), complemento([via, these, small, 'G', proteins, and, that, its, activation, was, not, essential, for, the, induction, of, ruffling])].
[sujeto(['DN-ARF1', had, no, effect, on, the, ruffling]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'DA-ARF6', or, 'DA-Rac1,', and, 'DN-ARF6', had, no, effect, on, that, induced, by, 'DA-ARF1', or, 'DA-Rac1'])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, hand, 'DN-Rac1']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, effect, of, 'DA-ARF6', but, not, that, of, 'DA-ARF1'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'PMA', causes, membrane, ruffling, via, an, 'ARF6-Rac1', pathway, and, also, an, 'ARF1', pathway, operating, in, parallel])].
[sujeto(['Overexpression', of, 'PLD1', and, 'PLD2']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['PMA-induced', cortactin, translocation, and, 'actin-cortactin', complex, 'formation,', supporting, the, view, that, these, enzymes, are, not, required, for, 'ruffling,', but, actually, suppress, it])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, 'PMA-induced', membrane, ruffling, is]), verbo([caused]), complemento([via, 'ARF6-Rac1', and, 'ARF1', pathways, operating, in, parallel, and, that, 'PLD', may, be, inhibitory])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, expression, of, arfaptin, 2, /, 'POR1', '(', partner, of, 'Rac1)', in, cultured, cells]), verbo([induces]), complemento([the, formation, of, pericentriolar, and, nuclear, 'aggregates,', which, morphologically, resemble, mutant, huntingtin, aggregates, characteristic, of, 'HD'])].
[sujeto(['Endogenous', arfaptin, 2, localizes, to, aggregates]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, expression, of, an, abnormal, 'amino-terminal', fragment, of, huntingtin, that, contains, polyglutamine, '(', 'polyQ)', expansions])].
[sujeto(['A', dominant, inhibitory, mutant, of, arfaptin, 2]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([aggregation, of, mutant, 'huntingtin,', but, not, in, the, presence, of, proteasome, inhibitors])].

[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', secretion, elicited, by, depolarizing, 'K(+)', concentrations, was]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, the, dominant, negative, mutants, 'RhoA(N19),', 'Rac1(N17),', and, 'Cdc42(N17)', and, was, diminished, by, the, constitutively, active, mutants, 'RhoA(V14),', 'Rac1(V12),', and, 'Cdc42(V12)'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'ARF6', 'GTPase,', the, least]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([member, of, the, 'ADP', ribosylation, factor, '(', 'ARF)', 'family,', associates, with, the, plasma, membrane, and, intracellular, endosome, vesicles])].

[sujeto(['The', combination, injury, was, associated, with, twofold]), verbo([increased]), complemento([activity, of, neuronal, nitric, oxide, synthase, and, 'oxidative/nitrosative', 'stress,', as, indicated, by, significant, increases, in, plasma, 'nitrate/nitrite', 'concentrations,', 3, -, nitrotyrosine, '(', an, indicator, of, peroxynitrite, 'formation),', and, malondialdehyde, lung, tissue, content])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, systemic, inflammation, was, evidenced, by, 'twofold,', 'sixfold,', and, threefold]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase,', 'IL-8,', and, myeloperoxidase, lung, tissue, 'concentrations,', respectively, '(', each, 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.05, vs])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([1, ')', that, nitric, oxide, formation, derived, from, increased, neuronal, nitric, oxide, synthase, activity, represents, a, pivotal, reactive, agent, in, the, 'patho-physiology', of, combined, burn, and, smoke, inhalation, injury, and, 2, ')', that, selective, neuronal, nitric, oxide, synthase, inhibition, represents, a, 'goal-directed', approach, to, attenuate, the, degree, of, injury])].
[sujeto(['Atherosclerosis', is]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, arterial, segments, exposed, to, disturbed, flow])].
[sujeto(['Perturbed', shear, stress]), verbo([increases]), complemento([also, the, endothelial, expression, of, 'oxidation-sensitive', responsive, genes, '(', such, as, 'ELK-1', and, 'p-JUN)'])].
[sujeto(['Results', indicated, that, chronic, treatment, with, red, wine, significantly, attenuated, the, activation, of, 'redox-sensitive', genes, '(', 'ELK-1', and, 'p-JUN)', and]), verbo([increased]), complemento([endothelial, nitric, oxide, synthase, '(', 'eNOS)', expression, '(', which, was, decreased, by, perturbed, shear, 'stress)', in, cultured, human, coronary, endothelial, cells, '(', 'EC)', and, in, 'atherosclerosis-prone', areas, of, hypercholesterolemic, mice])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'short-term', supplementation, with, red, wine, to, 'C57BL/6J', mice, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([upregulation, of, aortic, eNOS, and, 'SIRT1', expression, induced, by, physical, training])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, establish, that, administration, of, low, doses, of, red, wine, can, attenuate, the, proatherogenic, effects]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, perturbed, shear, stress, in, vitro, and, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['This', evidence, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([implications, for, the, prevention, of, atherosclerotic, lesion, progression, and, its, clinical, manifestations])].
[sujeto(['Reduced', caloric, intake]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([arterial, blood, pressure, in, healthy, individuals, and, improves, 'endothelium-dependent', vasodilation, in, obese, and, overweight, individuals])].
[sujeto(['The', 'SIRT1', protein, deacetylase]), verbo([mediates]), complemento([many, of, the, effects, of, calorie, restriction, '(', 'CR)', on, organismal, lifespan, and, metabolic, pathways])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, role, of, 'SIRT1', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['endothelium-dependent', vasomotor, tone, is, not, known])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, 'SIRT1']), verbo([promotes]), complemento(['endothelium-dependent', vasodilation, by, targeting, endothelial, nitric, oxide, synthase, '(', 'eNOS)', for, deacetylation])].
[sujeto(['SIRT1', and, eNOS, colocalize, and, coprecipitate, in, endothelial, 'cells,', and, 'SIRT1', deacetylates, 'eNOS,']), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([eNOS, activity, and, increasing, endothelial, nitric, oxide, '(', 'NO)'])].
[sujeto(['SIRT1-induced']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, endothelial, 'NO', is, mediated, through, lysines, 496, and, 506, in, the, 'calmodulin-binding', domain, of, eNOS])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'SIRT1', in, the, endothelium, of, arteries]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['endothelium-dependent', vasodilation, and, decreases, bioavailable, 'NO'])].

[sujeto(['The', intricate, link, between, lysine, acylation, and, cellular, metabolism]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, clarified, by, the, occurrence, of, several, such, 'metabolite-sensitive', acylations, and, their, selective, removal, by, sirtuin, deacylases])].

[sujeto([enterica, 'Pat', '(', 'SePat)', acetyltransferase]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, biochemically, characterized])].

[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([indicated, that, 'N(&Icirc;&micro;)-lysine', acetylation, and, its, impact, on, cellular, metabolism, may, be, just, as, diverse, in, bacteria, as, they, are, in, eukaryotes])].
[sujeto([enterica, 'Pat', 'enzyme,', 'specifically,']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, been, implicated, in, the, modulation, of, many, metabolic, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['Understanding', the, molecular, mechanisms, of, how, this, enzyme, controls, the, activity, of, diverse, enzymes, by, 'N(&Icirc;&micro;)-lysine', acetylation, will, advance, our, understanding, of, how, the, prokaryotic, cell]), verbo([responds]), complemento([to, its, changing, environment, in, order, to, meet, its, metabolic, needs])].
[sujeto(['Acetyl-coenzyme', 'A', synthetase, '(', 'Acs)']), verbo([activates]), complemento([acetate, into, 'acetyl-coenzyme', 'A', '(', 'Ac-CoA)', in, most, cells])].
[sujeto(['inactivate)', 'Acs']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, growth, 'arrest,', a, condition, that, correlates, with, a, drop, in, energy, charge, '(', 0.17, ')', in, the, 'acetylation-deficient', 'strain,', relative, to, the, energy, charge, in, the, 'acetylation-proficient', strain, '(', 0.71, ')'])].

[sujeto(['Acs-dependent', depletion, of, 'ATP,', coupled, with, the, rise, in, 'AMP', 'levels,']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([the, synthesis, of, 'ADP', needed, to, replenish, the, pool, of, 'ATP'])].

[sujeto(['They']), verbo([mediate]), complemento([adaptive, responses, to, a, variety, of, 'stresses,', including, calorie, restriction, and, metabolic, stress])].
[sujeto(['Sirtuin', 3, '(', 'SIRT3)', is, localized, in, the, mitochondrial, 'matrix,', where, it]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, acetylation, levels, of, metabolic, 'enzymes,', including, acetyl, coenzyme, 'A', synthetase, 2, '(', refs, 1, ',', 2, ')'])].

[sujeto(['The', cells, were, treated, with, oleate, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento([lipid, accumulation, and, 'Nile', red, staining, was, used, to, assess, the, number, of, lipid, droplets, in, 'HepG2', cells])].

[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, effect, of, 'CBE', on, the, expression, of, genes]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, intestinal, lipid, metabolism])].

[sujeto(['Recently,', 'statins,', inhibitors, of, 3, -, 'hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme', 'A', 'reductase,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, inhibit, proliferation, of, both, vascular, and, airway, smooth, muscle, cells, independently, of, lowering, cholesterol])].

[sujeto(['Simvastatin', '(', 0.1, -, 1.0, 'muM)', significantly]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([cell, proliferation, and, 'DNA', synthesis, induced, by, 'FBS', in, a, 'concentration-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['The', antiproliferative, effects, of, simvastatin, were, mimicked, by, 'GGTI-286,', a, 'geranylgeranyltransferase-I', 'inhibitor,', 'C3', 'exoenzyme,', an, inhibitor, of, 'Rho,', and, 'Y-27632,', an, inhibitor, of, 'Rho-kinase,', a]), verbo([target]), complemento([protein, of, 'RhoA'])].

[sujeto(['Because', these, isoprenoids, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, prenylation, of, small, 'G', proteins, 'RhoA', and, 'Ras,', 'respectively,', the, present, results, demonstrate, that, an, inhibition, in, airway, smooth, muscle, cell, proliferation, by, simvastatin, is, due, to, prevention, of, geranylgeranylation, of, 'RhoA,', not, farnesylation, of, 'Ras'])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', statins, may]), verbo([have]), complemento([therapeutic, potential, for, prohibiting, airway, remodeling, in, bronchial, asthma])].
[sujeto(['Calcium', overload]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, as, a, critical, event, in, glutamate, excitotoxicity, associated, neurodegeneration])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', zinc, accumulation, and, its, neurotoxic, role, similar, to, calcium]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, proposed])].
[sujeto(['Earlier,', we]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, free, chelatable, zinc, released, during, hypobaric, hypoxia, mediates, neuronal, damage, and, memory, impairment])].
[sujeto(['The', molecular, mechanism, behind, hypobaric, hypoxia]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([neuronal, damage, is, obscure])].
[sujeto(['The', role, of, free, zinc, in, such, neuropathological, condition]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Hypobaric', hypoxia, resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([expression, of, 'metallothionein-3', and, zinc, transporters, '(', 'ZnT-1', and, 'ZIP-6)'])].

[sujeto(['Therefore,', zinc, chelating, strategies, which, block, zinc]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([neuronal, damage, linked, with, cerebral, hypoxia, and, other, neurodegenerative, conditions, can, be, designed, in, future])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'AG490,', a, 'Jak2', 'inhibitor,', had, an, inhibitory, effect, on, 'H2O2-induced', 'TRPM2', activation])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, 'AG490', almost, completely, blocked, 'H2O2-induced']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, intracellular, 'Ca(2+)', in, 'TRPM2/HEK', and, 'U937', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', the, 'patch-clamp', 'study,', 'AG490']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, 'H2O2-evoked', inward, current, but, not, the, 'ADP-ribose-induced', inward, current, in, 'TRPM2/HEK', cells])].

[sujeto(['Moreover,', 'AG490']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([intracellular, reactive, oxygen, species, 'level,', which, was, measured, by, using, a, 'hydroperoxide-sensitive', fluorescent, 'dye,', on, incubation, with, 'H2O2'])].
[sujeto(['Although', transient, receptor, potential, ankyrin, 1, '(', 'TRPA1)', channel, is, also]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'H2O2,', the, 'H2O2-induced', 'Ca(2+)', entry, through, 'TRPA1', was, only, slightly, delayed, by, 'AG490'])].
[sujeto(['An', excessive, activation, of, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', polymerases, '(', 'PARPs)', may]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([a, form, of, neuronal, death, similar, to, that, occurring, in, neurodegenerative, disorders])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, this, 'process,', we, exposed, organotypic, hippocampal, slices, to, 'N-methyl-N\'-nitro-N\'-nitrosoguanidine', '(', 'MNNG,', 100, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M', for, 5, 'min),', an, alkylating, agent, widely, used, to]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['PARP-1'])].
[sujeto(['MNNG']), verbo([induced]), complemento([a, pattern, of, degeneration, of, the, 'CA1', pyramidal, cells, morphologically, similar, to, that, observed, after, a, brief, period, of, oxygen, and, glucose, deprivation, '(', 'OGD)'])].
[sujeto(['MNNG', exposure, was, also, associated, with, a, dramatic]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'PARP-activity', and, a, robust, decrease, in, 'NAD(+)', and, 'ATP', content])].
[sujeto(['These', effects, were]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, 'PARP-1', but, not, 'PARP-2', inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['In', our, experimental, 'conditions,', cell, death, was, not]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'AIF', translocation, '(', 'parthanatos)', or, 'caspase-dependent', apoptotic, processes])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'PARP', activation, was, followed, by, a, significant, deterioration, of, neuronal, membrane, properties])].
[sujeto(['Using', electrophysiological, recordings, we, firstly, investigated, the]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([ability, of, 'ADP-ribose', to, open, 'TRPM2', channels, in, 'MNNG-induced', cells, 'death,', but, the, results, we, obtained, showed, that, 'TRPM2', channels, are, not, involved])].
[sujeto(['We', then, studied, the, involvement, of, glutamate, 'receptor-ion', channel, complex, and, we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'NBQX,', a, selective, 'AMPA', receptor, 'antagonist,', was, able, to, effectively, prevent, 'CA1', neuronal, loss, while, 'MK801,', a, 'NMDA', 'antagonist,', was, not, active])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, observed, that, 'MNNG', treatment]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, ratio, of, 'GluA1/GluA2', 'AMPAR', subunit, 'expression,', which, was, associated, with, an, inward, rectification, of, the, 'IV', relationship, of, 'AMPA', sEPSCs, in, the, 'CA1', but, not, in, the, 'CA3', subfield])].

[sujeto(['Hydrogen', sulfide, '(', 'H&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;S)', is, a, toxic, gaseous, 'substance,', and, accidental, exposure, to, high, concentrations, of, 'H&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;S']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, reported, to, be, lethal, to, humans])].
[sujeto(['Inhaled', and, absorbed, 'H&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;S', is, partially, dissolved, within, the, circulation, and]), verbo([causes]), complemento([toxic, effects, on, lymphocytes])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'H&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;S', toxicity, have, not, been, well, documented])].
[sujeto(['Cells', were, exposed, to, a, 'H&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;S', 'donor,', sodium, hydroxysulfide, '(', 'NaHS),', at, pH, 6.0, ',', 7.0, ',', or, 8.0, for, 1, h, at, 37, &, 'Acirc;&deg;C', in, a, sealed, conical, tube, to, avoid, the]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, dissolved, 'H&acirc;&sbquo;&sbquo;S', gas])].
[sujeto(['Cytotoxicity', and, cellular, sulfide, concentrations]), verbo([increased]), complemento([dramatically, as, the, pH, of, the, 'NaHS', solution, decreased])].
[sujeto(['Sulfide']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, cleavage, of, 'caspase-3', and, poly, '(', 'ADP-ribose)', polymerase, and, induced, early, cellular, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['These', results, indicate, that, sulfide]), verbo([induces]), complemento(['pH-dependent', and, 'caspase-dependent', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, blebbing, of, the, plasma, membrane, occurred, in, 'sulfide-exposed', cells])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'ROCK-1', and, 'ROCK-2', '(', 'Rho', 'kinases)', were]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, 'sulfide,', and, 'sulfide-induced', cell, blebbing, was, suppressed, by, a, 'ROCK', 'inhibitor,', suggesting, that, a, 'Rho', pathway, is, involved, in, 'sulfide-induced', blebbing, in, lymphocytes])].
[sujeto(['Endoplasmic', reticulum, '(', 'ER)', stress]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, several, neurodegenerative, 'diseases,', including, 'Parkinson\'s', disease])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, present, study, that, exogenous, application, of, sodium, hydrosulfide, '(', 'NaHS;', an, 'H(2)S', 'donor,', 100, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M)', significantly, attenuated, 6, -, 'OHDA', '(', 50, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M)-induced', cell, death])].
[sujeto(['Blockade', of, 'Akt', also, significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, protein, abundance, of, 'Hsp90', in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', overexpression, of, cystathionine, &, 'Icirc;&sup2;-synthase', '(', a, main, 'H(2)S-synthesizing', enzyme, in, the, 'brain)', elevated, the, 'Hsp90', protein, level, and]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([6, -, 'OHDA-induced', 'ER', stress])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', the, protective, effect, of, 'H(2)S', against, 6, -, 'OHDA-induced', 'ER', stress, injury, in, 'SH-SY5Y', cells]), verbo([involves]), complemento([the, 'Akt-Hsp90', pathway])].
[sujeto([perforatum, '(', 'HP)']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, 'NO-mediated', neuroprotective, effect, in, 'GD-PC12', cells, was, investigated])].
[sujeto(['Induced', death, in, 'PC12', cells, by, 'GD', exposure, for, 18, h, was, partially]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, cell, incubation, with, sodium, nitroprusside, '(', 'SNP),', a, 'NO-donor'])].
[sujeto(['SNP']), verbo([increased]), complemento([survival, and, nitrite, production, in, 'GD-cells', in, a, 'concentration-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Co-incubation', of, cells, with, 10, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M', 'SNP', plus, 50, -, 100, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;g/ml', 'HP', under, 'GD', insult, significantly]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['GD-induced', cell, death, to, a, higher, extent, than, 'SNP', alone, as, shown, by, an, augmentation, of, cell, survival, and, intracellular, 'bcl-2', levels, and, a, decrease, of, lipid, 'peroxidation,', 'caspase-3', activation, and, 'PARP', cleavage])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento(['that:', '(', 1, ')', 'SNP', could, protect, 'PC12', cells, from, 'GD-induced', cytotoxicity, through, 'NO', generation, and, '(', 2, ')', the, enhancement, of, the, 'SNP-mediated', neuroprotective, effect, on, 'GD-cells', by, 'HP', might, arise, in, part, through, scavenging, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', and, inhibition, of, mitochondrial, dysfunction, associated, with, the, hypoglycemic, episode])].
[sujeto(['This', current]), verbo([finding]), complemento([might, highlight, the, development, of, therapeutic, strategies, aimed, at, manipulating, 'NO-donors', in, combination, with, herb, supplements, containing, 'ROS', scavenger, compounds, for, prophylaxis, from, brain, ischemia])].
[sujeto(['Hypoglycemia-induced', cerebral, neuropathy, can, occur, in, patients, with, diabetes, who, attempt, tight, control, of, blood, glucose, and, may]), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, cognitive, dysfunction])].
[sujeto(['Accumulating', evidence, from, animal, models]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, 'hypoglycemia-induced', neuronal, death, is, not, a, simple, result, of, glucose, 'deprivation,', but, is, instead, the, end, result, of, a, multifactorial, process])].
[sujeto(['Lactate', administered, without, glucose, was, not, sufficient, to]), verbo([promote]), complemento([electroencephalogram, recovery, from, an, isoelectric, state, during, hypoglycemia])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([an, intriguing, 'possibility:', that, increasing, brain, lactate, following, hypoglycemia, offsets, the, decrease, in, 'NAD(+)', due, to, overactivation, of, 'PARP-1', by, acting, as, an, alternative, energy, substrate, that, can, effectively, bypass, glycolysis, and, be, fed, directly, to, the, citric, acid, cycle, to, maintain, cellular, 'ATP', levels])].
[sujeto(['We', investigated, the, role, of, protein, tyrosine, 'phosphatase-alpha', '(', 'PTP&Icirc;&plusmn;)', expression, in, the, cell, death, profile, of, the, 'A431', human, carcinoma, cell, line, that, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, cytotoxic, concentrations, of, the, nitric, oxide, '(', 'NO)', donors, sodium, nitroprusside, '(', 'SNP)', and, 3, ',', 3, -, 'bis-(aminoethyl)-1-hydroxy-2-oxo-1-triazene', '(', 'NOC-18)'])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'NO', donors]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([extensive, cell, detachment, in, 'A431', parental, cells, as, compared, to, the, detachment, observed, for, 'A431', cells, that, ectopically, expressed, 'PTP&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'A431', '(', 'A27B(PTP&Icirc;&plusmn;))', 'cells)'])].

[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'A431', '(', 'A27B(PTP&Icirc;&plusmn;))', cells, showed, partial, inhibition, of, the, activities, of, 'caspase-8,', 'caspase-3,', and, 'PARP-1', upon, detachment, and, cell, death]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'SNP', treatment])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, from, these, results, that, 'PTP&Icirc;&plusmn;']), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, 'A431', tumor, cell, death, profile, mediated, by, 'NO', donors])].
[sujeto(['Cyclic', 'ADP-ribose', '(', 'cADPR)', is, a, second, messenger]), verbo([modulating]), complemento([intracellular, calcium, levels])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, described, a, 'cADPR-dependent', calcium, signaling, pathway, in, bovine, rod, outer, segments, '(', 'ROS),', where, calcium, ions, play, a, pivotal, role])].
[sujeto(['Micromolar', 'Zn(2+)', and, 'Cu(2+)']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([the, disk, 'ADPR-cyclase', activity, '(', half, maximal, inhibitory, 'concentration,', 'IC50=1'])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, properties, of, the, intracellular, 'membrane-associated', 'ROS', disk, 'ADPR-cyclase', are, more, similar, to, those, of, the, 'ADPR-cyclase']), verbo([found]), complemento([in, 'CD38-deficient', mouse, 'brain,', than, to, those, of, 'CD38', or, 'CD157'])].
[sujeto(['The', novel, intracellular, mammalian, 'ADPR-cyclase', would, elicit, 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([from, the, disks, at, various, rates, in, response, to, change, in, free, 'Ca(2+)', 'concentrations,', caused, by, light, versus, dark, 'adaptation,', in, fact, there, was, no, difference, in, disk, 'ADPR-cyclase', activity, in, light, or, dark, conditions])].
[sujeto(['Data']), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, disk, 'ADPR-cyclase', may, be, a, potential, target, of, retinal, toxicity, of, 'Zn(2+)', and, may, shed, light, to, the, role, of, 'Cu(2+)', and, 'Zn(2+)', deficiency, in, retina])].
[sujeto(['Disturbed', ion, homeostasis, and, apoptosis]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, implicated, in, the, pathophysiology, of, bipolar, disorder, '(', 'BD)'])].
[sujeto(['TRPM2,', a, nonselective, cation, 'channel,', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, apoptosis, and, is, possibly, linked, with, 'BD'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', 'monensin,', a, sodium, 'ionophore,', was, used, to, model, the]), verbo([increase]), complemento(['[', 'Na(+)](in)', and, '[', 'Ca(2+)](in)', seen, in, 'BD', patients])].

[sujeto(['Monensin', treatment, for, 24, h]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, the, long, form, of, 'TRPM2,', and, increased, expression, of, the, short, form])].

[sujeto(['GPI', 15427, treatment]), verbo([provides]), complemento([marked, benefits, for, 'NO-dependent', neurovascular, function, in, diabetic, mouse, 'CC'])].
[sujeto(['In', contrast, to, other, 'metal-dithiocarbamate', '[', 'DEDTC]', 'complexes,', the, 'copper-DEDTC', complex, is, highly, 'cytotoxic,']), verbo([inducing]), complemento([oxidative, 'stress,', preferentially, in, tumor, cells])].
[sujeto(['Because', nitric, oxide, '(', 'NO)', forms, adducts, with, 'Cu[DEDTC](2),', we, investigated, whether, 'NO', donors, like, 'S-nitroso-N-acetyl', penicillamine, '(', 'SNAP)', or, sodium, nitroprusside, '(', 'SNP),', and, 'nitrite,', a, 'NO', decomposition, 'product,']), verbo([modulate]), complemento(['Cu[DEDTC](2)', cytotoxicity, against, human, tumor, cells])].

[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, bradykinin, hyperpolarizes, the, cell, membrane, of, subconfluent, 'MDCK', cells, by, increase, of, the, potassium, conductance])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, performed, to, elucidate, the, intracellular, mechanisms, involved])].
[sujeto(['To', this, 'end,', the, effects, of, bradykinin, on, the, potential, difference, across, the, cell, membrane, '(', 'PD),', on, formation, of, inositol, 'phosphates,', and, on, intracellular, calcium, concentration, '(', 'Cai)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, analyzed, in, cells, without, or, with, pretreatment, with, pertussis, toxin, or, 12, -, 'O-tetradecanoylphorbol', 13, -, acetate, diester, '(', 'TPA)'])].
[sujeto(['In', untreated, 'cells,', bradykinin]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, transient, increase, of, inositol, 1, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, trisphosphate, and, inositol, 1, ',', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, 'tetrakisphosphate,', increase, of, 'Cai,', activation, of, potassium, channels, and, hyperpolarization, of, the, cell, membrane])].
[sujeto(['In', cells, pretreated, with, pertussis, toxin, the, effect, of, bradykinin, on, inositol, trisphosphate, formation, is, almost, abolished, but, bradykinin, still]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, transient, increase, of, 'Cai', and, 'PD', in, the, presence, and, absence, of, extracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['In', cells, pretreated, with, 'TPA', the, 'bradykinin-induced']), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, inositol, trisphosphate, formation, is, 'blunted,', the, 'bradykinin-induced', increase, of, 'Cai', 'abolished,', but, the, 'bradykinin-induced', hyperpolarization, still, present])].
[sujeto(['The', observations, indicate, that, bradykinin]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['Cai', in, part, by, phorbol, ester, and, pertussis, toxin, sensitive, activation, of, phospholipase, 'C'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', bradykinin, is, capable, of]), verbo([enhancing]), complemento(['Cai', by, utilizing, pertussis, toxin, insensitive, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', bradykinin, is, able, to, transiently]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, potassium, conductance, without, a, general, increase, of, intracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['Previous', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'ATP', enhances, intracellular, calcium, concentration, and, activates, potassium, channels, in, 'Madin', 'Darby', canine, kidney, '(', 'MDCK)-cells,', thus, leading, to, hyperpolarization, of, the, cell, membrane])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, performed, to, elucidate, the, intracellular, mechanisms, involved])].
[sujeto(['To', this, 'end,', the, effects, of, 'ATP', on, the, potential, difference, across, the, cell, membrane, '(', 'PD),', on, formation, of, inositol, 'phosphates,', and, on, intracellular, calcium, concentration, '(', 'Cai)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, analyzed, in, cells, without, or, with, pretreatment, with, pertussis, toxin, or, 12, -, 'O-tetradecanoyl', phorbol, 13, -, acetate, diester, '(', 'TPA)'])].
[sujeto(['In', untreated, 'cells,', 'ATP']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, sustained, hyperpolarization, and, an, increase, of, inositol, 1, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, trisphosphate, '(', 'IP3),', inositol, 1, ',', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, tetrakisphosphate, '(', 'IP4),', and, 'Cai'])].
[sujeto(['In', cells, pretreated, with, pertussis, 'toxin,', the, effect, of, 'ATP', on, inositol, trisphosphate, is, almost, 'abolished,', but, 'ATP', still]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, an, increase, of, 'PD', and, 'Cai,', which, is, sustained, in, the, 'presence,', and, transient, in, the, 'absence,', of, extracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['In', cells, pretreated, with, 'TPA,', the, effect, of, 'ATP', on, inositol, trisphosphate, is, reduced, and, the, effect, on, 'Cai', 'blunted;', but, 'ATP', still]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, a, hyperpolarization, of, the, cell, 'membrane,', which, is, sustained, in, the, 'presence,', and, transient, in, the, 'absence,', of, extracellular, calcium])].
[sujeto(['The', observations, indicate, that, 'ATP']), verbo([activates]), complemento([phospholipase, 'C', by, a, phorbol, ester, and, pertussis, toxin, sensitive, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'ATP']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['Cai', by, pertussis, toxin, insensitive, mechanisms, allowing, recruitment, of, calcium, from, 'both,', extracellular, fluid, and, intracellular, stores])].

[sujeto(['Inositol', 1, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, trisphosphate, rose, within, 1, min, followed, by, an]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, inositol, 1, ',', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, 'tetrakisphosphate,', inositol, 1, ',', 3, ',', 4, -, 'trisphosphate,', inositol, 1, ',', 4, -, bisphosphate, and, inositol, 1, -, phosphate, beginning, within, 2, min])].

[sujeto(['Stimulation', of, human, 'A431', epidermoid, carcinoma, cells, by, bradykinin]), verbo([causes]), complemento([a, very, rapid, release, of, inositol, phosphates, and, a, transient, rise, in, cytoplasmic, free, 'Ca2+', concentration, '(', '[', 'Ca2+]i)'])].
[sujeto(['After', a, lag, 'period,', bradykinin, also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, massive, accumulation, of, 'Ins(1,3,4)P3', and, inositol, 1, ',', 3, ',', 4, ',', 5, -, tetrakisphosphate, '[', 'Ins(1,3,4,5)P4]'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'high-mobility', group, box, protein, 1, '(', 'HMGB1)', is, increasingly]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([as, an, important, inflammatory, mediator])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'PARP-1', activation, contributes, to, 'LPS-induced', 'PARylation', of, 'HMGB1,', but, the, 'PARylation', of, 'HMGB1', is, insufficient, to, direct, its, migration, from, the, nucleus, to, the, 'cytoplasm;', 'PARP-1', regulates, the, translocation, of, 'HMGB1', to, the, cytoplasm, through, upregulating, the, acetylation, of, 'HMGB1'])].

[sujeto(['These', studies, revealed, a, new, mechanism, of, 'PARP-1', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, inflammatory, response, to, endotoxin])].
[sujeto(['Non-alcoholic', fatty, liver, disease, '(', 'NAFLD)']), verbo([has]), complemento([become, the, most, common, form, of, chronic, liver, disease, in, the, world])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies, in, cultured, cells, and, mice]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, 'sirtuin,', especially, sirtuin, 1, '(', 'SIRT1),', is, a, key, metabolic, sensor, for, regulating, metabolic, homeostasis, and, thus, has, the, potential, to, ameliorate, 'NAFLD'])].
[sujeto(['RT-PCR', and, 'Western', blotting, demonstrated]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([expression, of, 'SIRT1,', 'SIRT3,', 'SIRT5,', and, 'SIRT6', in, the, 'NAFLD', group, in, comparison, with, the, control, group])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([both, the, optimization, of, a, homogeneous, 'fluorescence-based', assay, and, the, development, of, a, new, heterogeneous, 'fluorescence-based', assay, to, determine, smSirt2, activity])].
[sujeto(['Binding', of, the, hits, to, their]), verbo([targets]), complemento([is, rationalized, by, docking, studies, using, a, homology, model, of, smSirt2])].
[sujeto(['Sirtuin', enzymes]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([metabolism, and, aging, processes, through, deacetylation, of, 'acetyl-lysines', in, target, proteins])].
[sujeto(['More', than, 6, ',', 800, mammalian, acetylation, sites, are, 'known,', but, few]), verbo([targets]), complemento([have, been, assigned, to, most, sirtuin, 'isoforms,', hampering, our, understanding, of, sirtuin, function])].
[sujeto(['Deacetylation', data, for, all, seven, human, sirtuins, obtained, with, this, system]), verbo([reveal]), complemento(['isoform-specific', substrate, preferences, and, deacetylation, substrate, candidates, for, all, sirtuin, 'isoforms,', including, 'Sirt4'])].
[sujeto(['Our', microarray, platform, enables, parallel, studies, on, physiological, acetylation, sites, and, the, deacetylation, data, presented]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, exciting, resource, for, the, identification, of, novel, substrates, for, all, human, sirtuins])].
[sujeto(['Silent', information, regulator, 2, '(', 'Sir2)', enzymes, or, sirtuins, are, a, family, of, evolutionarily]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([intracellular, protein, deacetylases, that, can, catalyze, the, acetyl, group, removal, from, the, specific, 'N&Icirc;&micro;-acetyl-lysine', '(', 'AcK)', side, chains, on, a, variety, of, proteins, from, all, kingdoms, of, life])].
[sujeto(['SIRT1-7)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, found, in, mammals, including, humans])].
[sujeto(['The', 'sirtuin-catalyzed', deacetylation, reaction]), verbo([has]), complemento([captured, tremendous, interest, during, the, past, a, few, years, because, of, '(', 'i)', its, increasingly, demonstrated, importance, in, many, crucial, biological, processes, such, as, gene, 'transcription,', 'metabolism,', and, 'aging,', and, thus, its, therapeutic, potential, for, metabolic, and, 'age-related', diseases, and, 'cancer,', and, '(', 'ii)', its, unique, deacetylation, chemistry])].
[sujeto(['The', first, part, of, this, article, will]), verbo([provide]), complemento([an, updated, mechanistic, picture, of, the, 'sirtuin-catalyzed', deacetylation, reaction])].
[sujeto(['The', second, part, will, be, focused, on, how, the, mechanistic, knowledge]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, exploited, for, the, design, of, effective, sirtuin, modulators])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([has]), complemento([recently, emerged, as, a, major, covalent, modification, and, interplays, with, other, 'modifications,', such, as, 'phosphorylation,', 'methylation,', ubiquitination, '(', addition, of, a, small, protein, called, 'ubiquitin)', and, 'SUMOylation', '[', addition, of, a, 'ubiquitin-like', protein, known, as, 'SUMO', '(', small, 'ubiquitin-related', 'modifier)],', to, form, multisite, modification, programmes, for, cellular, regulation, in, diverse, organisms])].
[sujeto(['The', acetyltransferases, belong, to, three, major, 'families,', whereas, deacetylases]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, divided, into, the, classical, and, sirtuin, '[', 'Sir-tu-in,', for, 'Sir2', '(', silent, information, regulator, 2, ')', -, like, 'protein;', named, after, the, yeast, protein, 'Sir2]', families])].
[sujeto(['In', addition, to, these, 'enzymes,', proteins, containing, the, 'bromodomain,', a, protein, module, named, after, the, fly, protein, 'Brahma', '(', 'God', of, creation, in, 'Hindu),', are, relevant, to, lysine, acetylation, biology, due, to, their, ability, to]), verbo([recognize]), complemento(['acetyl-lysine-containing', peptides])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', recent, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([made, intimate, links, between, these, three, different, groups, of, proteins, to, different, pathological, conditions])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'chapter,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, brief, overview, of, these, proteins, and, emphasize, their, direct, links, to, related, human, diseases])].
[sujeto(['In', all, cell, lines, 'examined,', 'NO-ASA']), verbo([induced]), complemento([cell, cycle, arrest, in, the, 'G(2)/M', phase, transition, accompanied, by, altered, expression, of, 'G(2)/M', 'transition-related', proteins])].
[sujeto(['In', 'SW480', colon, cancer, cells, 'NO-ASA']), verbo([modulated]), complemento([proteins, controlling, this, transition])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', it, markedly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, levels, of, cyclin, 'B1,', decreased, the, expression, of, cyclin, 'D1', and, 'Cdc25C,', and, increased, the, 'Thr14/Tyr15-phosphorylation', of, 'Cdk1', while, leaving, unchanged, its, protein, levels])].
[sujeto(['These', 'changes,', including, the, 'G2/M', 'arrest,', were]), verbo([prevented]), complemento([by, pretreating, the, cells, with, the, 'anti-oxidant', 'N-acetyl-cysteine,', indicating, that, redox, signaling, is, likely, responsible, for, the, cell, cycle, 'changes,', a, conclusion, consistent, with, the, known, redox, regulation, of, these, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', these, results, confirm, the, profound, cytokinetic, effect, of, 'NO-ASA', and]), verbo([provide]), complemento([strong, evidence, that, it, regulates, cell, cycle, transitions, through, its, ability, to, induce, oxidative, 'stress,', which, activates, redox, signaling, in, the, target, cell])].
[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress, by, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', contributes, to, somatic, aging, in, 'general,', and, also]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, reproductive, aging])].
[sujeto(['Telomere', shortening, is, also]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'aging,', and, telomeres, are, particularly, susceptible, to, 'ROS-induced', damage])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([shown, that, antioxidant, 'N-acetyl-L-cysteine', '(', 'NAC)', effectively, rescues, oocytes, and, embryos, from, 'ROS-induced', telomere, shortening, and, apoptosis, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['Using', mice, as, 'models,', we, tested, the, hypothesis, that, reducing, oxidative, stress, by, 'NAC', might]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([or, delay, ovarian, aging, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['Mice', treated, with, a, 'long-term', low, concentration, '(', 0.1, 'mM)', of, 'NAC', had]), verbo([increased]), complemento([litter, sizes, at, the, ages, of, 7, -, 10, months, compared, with, 'age-matched', controls, without, 'NAC', treatment])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, appropriate, treatment, with, the, antioxidant, 'NAC', postpones, the, process, of, oocyte, aging, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([provides, first, evidence, for, deacetylation, activity, of, 'CobB1', in, 'Streptomyces', coelicolor])].
[sujeto(['The', protein, is, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([in, streptomycetes])].

[sujeto(['Although', an, astonishing, number, of, acetylated, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified, in, those, 'studies,', the, acetyltransferases, that, target, these, proteins, remain, largely, unknown])].

[sujeto(['To', the, best, of, our, 'knowledge,', this, is, the, first, protein, acetyltransferase, in, mycobacteria, that, both, is, dependent, on, cAMP, and]), verbo([targets]), complemento([a, central, metabolic, enzyme, by, a, specific, 'post-translational', modification])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, show, that, 'Rv1151c,', a, 'sirtuin-like', deacetylase, in, 'Mycobacterium', 'tuberculosis,']), verbo([reactivates]), complemento([acetylated, 'ACS', through, an, 'NAD(+)-dependent', deacetylation])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', 'Pat', and, the, 'sirtuin-like', deacetylase, in, mycobacteria, constitute, a, reversible, acetylation, system, that]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'ACS'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'BH3', mimetic, 'ABT737']), verbo([induces]), complemento([autophagy, by, competitively, disrupting, the, inhibitory, interaction, between, the, 'BH3', domain, of, 'Beclin', 1, and, the, 'anti-apoptotic', proteins, 'Bcl-2', and, 'Bcl-X(L),', thereby, stimulating, the, 'Beclin', 1, -, dependent, allosteric, activation, of, the, 'pro-autophagic', lipid, kinase, 'VPS34'])].

[sujeto(['To', examine, the, potential, role, of, 'S1PR(2)', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([neuronal, excitability, we, used, the, established, selective, antagonist, of, 'S1PR(2),', 'JTE-013'])].

[sujeto(['In', order, to, further, study, the, signaling, mechanisms, of, 'GLP-1', 'receptor,', we, investigated, the, effect, of, the, third, intracellular, 'loop-derived', peptide, on, endogenous, 'mono-ADP-ribosyltransferase']), verbo([mediated]), complemento(['mono-ADP-ribosylation', of, 'G-proteins', &, 'Icirc;&sup2;', subunit, in, 'CHO', cells])].

[sujeto(['Presynaptic', imidazoline, receptors, '(', 'R(i-pre))', are]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, the, sympathetic, axon, terminals, of, animal, and, human, cardiovascular, 'systems,', and, they, regulate, blood, pressure, by, modulating, the, release, of, peripheral, noradrenaline, '(', 'NA)'])].

[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, activation, of, 'R(i-pre)', in, 'SCG', neurons, reduced, 'N-type', 'I(Ca)', in, a, pertussis, 'toxin-', and, 'voltage-insensitive', 'pathway,', and, this, inhibition, attenuated, repetitive, action, potential, firing, in, 'SCG', neurons])].
[sujeto(['In', vertebrate, 'retina,', melatonin]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([various, physiological, functions])].
[sujeto(['The', protein, kinase, 'C', '(', 'PKC)', activator, 'PMA', potentiated, the, glycine, currents, and, in, the, presence, of, 'PMA', melatonin, failed, to]), verbo([cause]), complemento([further, potentiation, of, the, 'currents,', whereas, application, of, the, 'PKC', inhibitor, bisindolylmaleimide, 'IV', abolished, the, 'melatonin-induced', potentiation])].
[sujeto(['The', melatonin, effect, persisted, when, '[', 'Ca(2+)](i)', was, chelated, by, 'BAPTA,', and, melatonin]), verbo([induced]), complemento([no, increase, in, '[', 'Ca(2+)](i)'])].
[sujeto(['Neither', 'cAMP-PKA', nor, 'cGMP-PKG', signalling, pathways, seemed, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([because, 8, -, 'Br-cAMP', or, 8, -, 'Br-cGMP', failed, to, cause, potentiation, of, the, glycine, currents, and, both, the, 'PKA', inhibitor, 'H-89', and, the, 'PKG', inhibitor, 'KT5823', did, not, block, the, 'melatonin-induced', potentiation])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'melatonin,', being, at, higher, levels, at, 'night,', may, help, animals, to, detect, positive, or, negative, contrast, in, night, vision, by, modulating, inhibitory, signals, largely, mediated, by, glycinergic, amacrine, cells, in, the, inner, retina])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, examined, 'long-term', synaptic, plasticity, in, the, avian, auditory, 'midbrain,', a, region]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, 'experience-dependent', learning])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, coactivation, of, 'N-methyl-D-aspartate', receptors, '(', 'NMDAR)', and, type, 1, cannabinoid, receptors, '(', 'CB1R)', induces, 'long-term', depression, '(', 'LTD)', at, the, synapse, between, the, central, shell, and, the, external, portion, of, the, inferior, colliculus, of, the, chicken])].
[sujeto(['Although', endocannabinoids, are, commonly, thought, of, as, presynaptic, 'modulators,', recent]), verbo([reports]), complemento([have, suggested, that, they, can, also, modulate, the, postsynaptic, site])].
[sujeto(['In', the, avian, 'midbrain,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'LTD', is, mediated, by, both, presynaptic, and, postsynaptic, changes])].
[sujeto(['The', presynaptic, mechanism, consists, of, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, neurotransmitter, 'release,', whereas, a, depression, of, 'NMDAR-mediated', current, takes, place, on, the, postsynaptic, side])].
[sujeto(['Taste', receptor, cells, '(', 'TRCs)']), verbo([express]), complemento([multiple, umami, receptors])].
[sujeto(['To', clarify, the, components, that]), verbo([participate]), complemento([in, intracellular, umami, signal, transduction, in, 'mouse,', we, recorded, the, activation, of, 'TRCs'])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, the, 'Galphai', 'inhibitor,', pertussis, 'toxin,', did, not]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, intracellular, 'Ca2+', level, in, many, 'TRCs'])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistochemical', analysis, revealed, that, a, subset, of, 'TRCs']), verbo([responding]), complemento([to, umami, stimuli, expressed, 'alpha-gustducin'])].
[sujeto(['For', 'instance,', in, addition, to, depolarization, and, stimulation, of, norepinephrine, 'release,', muscarinic, agonists, and, 'Angio', 'II']), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, 'M-type', 'K(+)', current, and, the, 'N-type', 'Ca(2+)', current])].
[sujeto(['We', recently]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, muscarinic, receptors, modulate, the, delayed, rectifier, current, 'I(KV)', as, well])].
[sujeto(['Therefore', a, whole, cell, 'patch-clamp', experiment, was, carried, out, in, rat, cultured, sympathetic, neurons, to, assess, whether, 'Angio', 'II']), verbo([modulates]), complemento(['I(KV)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Angio', 'II', increased, 'I(KV)', by, about, 30, '%', with, a, time, constant, of, approximately, 30, s])].
[sujeto(['Angio', 'II']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['I(KV)', and, further, reduced, the, stimulatory, action, of, a, muscarinic, agonist, on, 'I(KV)'])].

[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, found, that, the, protein, kinase, 'C', activator, 'PMA', enhanced, 'I(KV),', thereby, mimicking, and, further, attenuating, the, action, of, 'Angio', 'II', on, 'I(KV)'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'AT(1)', receptors, by, coupling, to, pertussis, 'toxin-insensitive', 'G', 'proteins,', stimulate, an, 'ATP-dependent', and, 'PKC-mediated', pathway, to, modulate, 'I(KV)'])].
[sujeto(['A', 'Ca(2+)']), verbo([release]), complemento([from, osmotically, intact, 'ROS', discs, elicited, by, cADPR, was, studied, in, the, presence, of, the, 'Ca(2+)', tracer, 'fluo-3'])].

[sujeto(['For', 'example,', 'PKC']), verbo([causes]), complemento([facilitation, or, 'long-lasting', activation, of, certain, ionic, channels, involved, in, spike, firing, after, the, receptor, stimulation])].
[sujeto(['An', outward, current, response, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, voltage, change, of, the, cell, membrane, from, -, 60, mV, to, +, 10, mV])].

[sujeto(['On', stimulation, with, extracellular, 'signals,', 'GEFs']), verbo([induce]), complemento([the, exchange, of, guanosine, diphosphate, to, guanosine, 'triphosphate,', resulting, in, the, activation, of, the, small, guanosine, 5, 'C-triphosphatases'])].

[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([investigated, a, role, of, 'CD38', and, its, regulation, through, 'interleukin-8', '(', 'IL8)', signaling, in, 'lymphokine-activated', killer, '(', 'LAK)', cells])].

[sujeto(['Ang', 'II', and, 'Ang-(1-7)']), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([the, 'Na+', -, 'ATPase', activity, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, '(', from, 10, '(', -, 11, ')', to, 10, '(', -, 5, ')', 'M),', with, maximal, effect, obtained, at, 10, '(', -, 7, ')', 'M', for, both, peptides])].

[sujeto(['The', following, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, a, 'PTX-insensitive,', cholera, toxin, '(', 'CTX)-sensitive', 'G', 'protein/adenosine', 3, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, cyclic, monophosphate, '(', 'cAMP)/PKA', pathway, is, involved, in, this, 'process:', '(', 1, ')', the, inhibitory, effect, of, both, peptides, is, completely, reversed, by, 10, '(', -, 9, ')', 'M', guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'O-(2-thiodiphosphate)', '(', 'GDPbetaS;', an, inhibitor, of, the, 'G', protein, 'activity),', and, mimicked, by, 10, '(', -, 10, ')', 'M', guanosine, 5, '\'', -, 'O-(3-thiotriphosphate)', '(', 'GTPgammaS;', an, activator, of, the, 'G', protein, 'activity);', '(', 2, ')', the, effects, of, both, peptides, are, mimicked, by, 'CTX', but, are, not, affected, by, 'PTX;', '(', 3, ')', 'Western', blot, analysis, reveals, the, presence, of, the, 'Gs', protein, in, the, isolated, basolateral, membrane, 'fraction;', '(', 4, ')', '(', 10, '(', -, 10, ')', -, 10, '(', -, 6, ')', 'M)', cAMP, has, a, similar, and, 'non-additive', effect, to, 'Ang', 'II', and, 'Ang-(1-7);', '(', 5, ')', 'PKA', inhibitory, peptide, abolishes, the, effects, of, 'Ang', 'II', and, 'Ang-(1-7);', and, '(', 6, ')', both, angiotensins, stimulate, 'PKA', activity])].
[sujeto(['Gbetagamma-activated', inwardly, rectifying, 'K(+)', '(', 'GIRK)', channels]), verbo([have]), complemento([distinct, gating, properties, when, activated, by, receptors, coupled, specifically, to, 'Galpha(o)', versus, 'Galpha(i)', subunit, 'isoforms,', with, 'Galpha(o)-coupled', currents, having, approximately, 3, -, fold, faster, 'agonist-evoked', activation, kinetics])].
[sujeto(['To', identify, the, molecular, determinants, in, 'Galpha', subunits]), verbo([mediating]), complemento([these, kinetic, 'differences,', chimeras, were, constructed, using, pertussis, toxin, '(', 'PTX)-insensitive', 'Galpha(oA)', and, 'Galpha(i2)', mutant, subunits, '(', 'Galpha(oA(C351G))', and, 'Galpha(i2(C352G)))', and, examined, in, 'PTX-treated', 'Xenopus', oocytes, expressing, muscarinic, m2, receptors, and, 'Kir3'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Galpha(oA)/Galpha(i2)', chimera, results]), verbo([led]), complemento([us, to, examine, an, interaction, between, the, 'alpha-helical', domain, and, the, 'Ras-like', domain, previously, implicated, in, mediating, a, 4, -, fold, slower, in, vitro, basal, 'GDP', release, rate, in, 'Galpha(i1)', compared, with, 'Galpha(o)'])].
[sujeto(['Mutations', disrupting, the, interdomain, contact, in, 'Galpha(i2(C352G))', at, either, the, 'alphaD-alphaE', loop, '(', 'R145A)', or, the, switch, 'III', loop, '(', 'L233Q/A236H/E240T/M241T),', significantly, accelerated, the, 'GIRK', activation, kinetics, consistent, with, the, 'Galpha(i2)', interdomain, interface]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['receptor-catalyzed', 'GDP', release, rates, in, vivo])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, differences, in, 'Galpha(i)', versus, 'Galpha(o)-coupled', 'GIRK', activation, kinetics, are, due, to, intrinsic, differences, in, 'receptor-catalyzed', 'GDP']), verbo([release]), complemento([that, 'rate-limit', 'Gbetagamma', production, and, is, attributed, to, heterogeneity, in, 'Galpha(i)', and, 'Galpha(o)', interdomain, contacts])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'HSR', '(', heavy, sarcoplasmic, 'reticulum)', fractions, from, rabbit, skeletal, 'muscle,', 'NAADP-induced', 'Ca2+']), verbo([release]), complemento([was, observed])].

[sujeto(['Lysophosphatidic', acid]), verbo([stimulates]), complemento([the, proliferation, of, ovarian, cancer, cell, through, specific, members, of, the, guanosine, 'triphosphate-binding', 'protein-coupled', receptor, family])].
