[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'DNA', repair, is, a]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([mechanism, for, arsenic, enhancement, of, ultraviolet, 'radiation-induced', 'DNA', damage, and, carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1', '(', 'PARP-1),', a, zinc, finger, 'DNA', repair, 'protein,']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, sensitive, molecular, target, for, arsenic])].
[sujeto(['Since', cellular, 'poly(ADP-ribosyl)ation', capacity]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, positively, correlated, with, zinc, status, in, 'cells,', we, hypothesize, that, arsenite, 'binding-induced', zinc, loss, from, 'PARP-1', is, equivalent, to, zinc, deficiency, in, reducing, 'PARP-1', 'activity,', leading, to, inhibition, of, 'DNA', repair])].
[sujeto(['To', test, this, 'hypothesis,', we, compared, the, effects, of, arsenite, exposure, with, zinc, 'deficiency,', created, by, using, the, 'membrane-permeable', zinc, chelator, 'TPEN,', on, 8, -, 'OHdG', 'formation,', 'PARP-1', activity, and, zinc]), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, 'PARP-1', in, 'HaCat', cells])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, molecular, mechanism, of, zinc]), verbo([loss]), complemento([induced, by, 'arsenite,', 'ICP-AES,', near, 'UV', 'spectroscopy,', 'fluorescence,', and, circular, dichroism, spectroscopy, were, utilized, to, examine, arsenite, binding, and, occupation, of, a, peptide, representing, the, first, zinc, finger, of, 'PARP-1'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, arsenite, binding, as, well, as, zinc, loss, altered, the, conformation, of, zinc, finger, structure, which, functionally, leads, to, 'PARP-1', inhibition])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, arsenite, binding, to, 'PARP-1', protein, created, similar, adverse, biological, effects, as, zinc, 'deficiency,', which, establishes, the, molecular, mechanism, for, zinc, supplementation, as, a, potentially, effective, treatment, to, reverse, the, detrimental, outcomes, of, arsenic, exposure])].
[sujeto(['Arsenic']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, genotoxicity, of, other, carcinogenic, agents, such, as, ultraviolet, radiation, and, 'benzo[a]pyrene'])].
[sujeto(['Recent']), verbo([reports]), complemento([suggest, that, inhibition, of, 'DNA', repair, is, an, important, aspect, of, arsenic, 'cocarcinogenesis,', and, 'DNA', repair, proteins, such, as, 'poly(ADP', 'ribose)', polymerase, '(', 'PARP)-1', are, direct, molecular, targets, of, arsenic])].
[sujeto(['Although', arsenic]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, generate, reactive, 'oxygen/nitrogen', species, '(', 'ROS/RNS),', little, is, known, about, the, role, of, 'arsenic-induced', 'ROS/RNS', in, the, mechanism, underlying, arsenic, inhibition, of, 'DNA', repair])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([herein, that, 'arsenite-generated', 'ROS/RNS', inhibits, 'PARP-1', activity, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['Cellular', exposure, to, 'arsenite,', as, well, as, hydrogen, peroxide, and, 'NONOate', '(', nitric, oxide, 'donor),']), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['PARP-1', zinc, 'content,', enzymatic, 'activity,', and, 'PARP-1', 'DNA', binding])].
[sujeto(['Most', 'importantly,', arsenite, incubation, with, purified, 'PARP-1', protein, in, vitro, did, not, alter, 'PARP-1', activity, or, 'DNA-binding', 'ability,', whereas, hydrogen, peroxide, or, 'NONOate']), verbo([retained]), complemento(['PARP-1', inhibitory, activity])].
[sujeto(['These', results, strongly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, cellular, generation, of, 'ROS/RNS', plays, an, important, role, in, arsenite, inhibition, of, 'PARP-1', 'activity,', leading, to, the, loss, of, 'PARP-1', 'DNA-binding', ability, and, enzymatic, activity])].
[sujeto(['Pathological']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, excess, zinc, ions, has, been, implicated, in, ischemic, brain, cell, death])].
[sujeto(['In', 'stroke,', 'ischemia-induced', zinc]), verbo([release]), complemento([and, 'hypoxia-inducible', 'factor-1', '(', 'HIF-1)', accumulation, concurrently, occur, in, the, ischemic, tissue])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, tests, the, hypothesis, that, the, presence, of, high, intracellular, zinc, concentration, is, a, major]), verbo([cause]), complemento([of, modifications, to, 'PARP-1', and, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', during, 'hypoxia,', which, significantly, contributes, to, cell, death, during, ischemia])].
[sujeto(['Although', 3, -, h, hypoxia, or, 100, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M', of, zinc, alone, did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([noticeable, 'cytotoxicity,', their, combination, led, to, a, dramatic, increase, in, astrocytic, cell, death, in, a, 'zinc-concentration-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Exposure', of, astrocytes, to, hypoxia, for, 3, h, remarkably]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, levels, of, intracellular, zinc, and, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'protein,', which, was, further, augmented, by, added, exogenous, zinc])].
[sujeto(['Our', studies, show, that, zinc]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([hypoxic, cell, death, through, overexpression, of, the, hypoxia, response, factor, 'HIF-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', via, the, cell, fate, determine, factor, 'PARP-1', 'modification,', which, provides, a, novel, mechanism, for, 'zinc-mediated', ischemic, brain, injury])].
[sujeto(['Arsenic', is, a]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([human, carcinogen, and, there, is, evidence, that, arsenic, augments, the, carcinogenicity, of, 'DNA', damaging, agents, such, as, ultraviolet, radiation, '(', 'UVR)', thereby, acting, as, a, 'co-carcinogen'])].
[sujeto(['We', and, others]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, arsenite, interferes, with, the, function, of, certain, zinc, finger, 'DNA', repair, proteins])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([reported]), complemento([that, zinc, reverses, the, effects, of, arsenite, in, cultured, cells, and, a, 'DNA', repair, target, 'protein,', poly, '(', 'ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1'])].
[sujeto(['Cell-based', findings, demonstrate, that, 'ssUVR-induced', 'DNA', damage, and, mutagenesis, are]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, 'arsenite,', and, supplemental, zinc, partially, reverses, the, arsenite, effect])].
[sujeto(['In', vivo, studies, confirm, that, zinc, supplementation]), verbo([decreases]), complemento(['arsenite-enhanced', 'DNA', damage, in, response, to, ssUVR, exposure])].
[sujeto(['From', these, data, we, can, conclude, that, zinc, offsets, the, impact, of, arsenic, on, 'ssUVR-stimulated', 'DNA', damage, in, cells, and, in, vivo]), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, zinc, supplementation, may, provide, a, strategy, to, improve, 'DNA', repair, capacity, in, arsenic, exposed, human, populations])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([cancer, risk, may, not, be, restricted, to, comparatively, high, occupational, 'exposure,', but, may, also, occur, via, environmental, 'exposure,', for, example, in, areas, in, close, proximity, to, zinc, smelters])].
[sujeto(['While', direct, interactions, with, 'DNA', appear, to, be, of, minor, 'importance,', elevated, levels, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, detected, in, diverse, experimental, 'systems,', presumably, due, to, an, inactivation, of, detoxifying, enzymes])].
[sujeto(['Also,', the, interference, with, proteins]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, cellular, response, to, 'DNA', 'damage,', the, deregulation, of, cell, growth, as, well, as, resistance, to, apoptosis, appears, to, be, involved, in, 'cadmium-induced', carcinogenicity])].
[sujeto(['Within', this, 'context,', cadmium]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, disturb, nucleotide, excision, 'repair,', base, excision, 'repair,', and, mismatch, repair])].
[sujeto(['Particularly', sensitive]), verbo([targets]), complemento([appear, to, be, proteins, with, 'zinc-binding', 'structures,', present, in, 'DNA', repair, proteins, such, as, 'XPA,', 'PARP-1', as, well, as, in, the, tumor, suppressor, protein, p53])].
[sujeto(['Whether', or, not, these, interactions, are, due, to, displacement, of, zinc, or, due, to, reactions, with, thiol, groups]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, zinc, complexation, or, in, other, critical, positions, under, realistic, exposure, conditions, remains, to, be, elucidated])].
[sujeto(['Further', potential, mechanisms, relate, to, the, interference, with, cellular, redox, 'regulation,', either, by]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([generation, of, 'ROS', or, by, reaction, with, thiol, groups, involved, in, the, regulation, of, signaling, pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', ability, of, 'continuous,', 'low-level', 'MMA(III)', exposure, to]), verbo([cause]), complemento([an, increase, in, genotoxic, potential, by, inhibiting, repair, processes, necessary, to, maintain, genomic, stability, is, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Following', genomic, insult, within, cellular, systems, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1', '(', 'PARP-1),', a, zinc, finger, 'protein,', is, rapidly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([and, recruited, to, sites, of, 'DNA', strand, breaks])].
[sujeto(['When', 'UROtsa', cells, are, continuously, exposed, to, 50, nM, 'MMA(III),', 'PARP-1', activity, does, not]), verbo([increase]), complemento([despite, the, increase, in, 'MMA(III)-induced', 'DNA', 'single-strand', breaks, through, 12, weeks, of, exposure])].
[sujeto(['When', 'UROtsa', cells, are, removed, from, continuous, 'MMA(III)', exposure, '(', 2, 'weeks),', 'PARP-1', activity]), verbo([increases]), complemento([coinciding, with, a, subsequent, decrease, in, 'DNA', damage, levels])].
[sujeto(['The', zinc, finger, domains, of, 'PARP-1', contain, vicinal, sulfhydryl, groups, which, may]), verbo([act]), complemento([as, a, potential, site, for, 'MMA(III)', to, 'bind,', displace, zinc, 'ion,', and, render, 'PARP-1', inactive])].
[sujeto(['Mass', spectrometry, analysis, demonstrates, the, ability, of, 'MMA(III)', to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([a, synthetic, peptide, representing, the, 'zinc-finger', domain, of, 'PARP-1,', and, displace, zinc, from, the, peptide, in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', supplementation, did, not, produce, an, overall]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, 'PARP-1', protein, 'levels,', decrease, the, levels, of, 'MMA(III)-induced', reactive, oxygen, 'species,', or, alter, 'Cu-Zn', superoxide, dismutase, levels])].
[sujeto(['Overall,', these, results, present, two, potential, interdependent, mechanisms, in, which, 'MMA(III)', may]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, susceptibility, of, 'UROtsa', cells, to, genotoxic, insult, 'and/or', malignant, 'transformation:', elevated, levels, of, 'MMA(III)-induced', 'DNA', damage, through, the, production, of, reactive, oxygen, 'species,', and, the, direct, 'MMA(III)-induced', inhibition, of, 'PARP-1'])].
[sujeto(['Arsenic']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['DNA', repair, and, enhances, the, genotoxicity, of, 'DNA-damaging', agents, such, as, 'benzo[a]pyrene', and, ultraviolet, radiation])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, arsenite, binds, to, both, 'CCHC', 'DNA-binding', zinc, fingers, of, the, 'DNA', repair, protein, 'PARP-1', '(', 'poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1)'])].
[sujeto(['MALDI-TOF-MS', analysis, of, peptides, harboring, 'site-directed', substitutions, of, cysteine, with, histidine, residues, within, the, 'PARP-1', zinc, finger, revealed, that, arsenite]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, peptides, containing, three, or, four, cysteine, 'residues,', but, not, to, peptides, with, two, 'cysteines,', demonstrating, arsenite, binding, selectivity])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([finding]), complemento([was, not, unique, to, 'PARP-1;', arsenite, did, not, bind, to, a, peptide, representing, the, 'CCHH', zinc, finger, of, the, 'DNA', repair, protein, 'aprataxin,', but, did, bind, to, an, aprataxin, peptide, mutated, to, a, 'CCHC', zinc, finger])].
[sujeto(['PARP-1', zinc, content, and, 'DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([were, decreased, by, 76, and, 80, '%', ',', 'respectively,', compared, with, protein, isolated, from, untreated, cells])].
[sujeto(['We', observed, comparable]), verbo([decreases]), complemento([in, zinc, content, for, 'XPA', '(', xeroderma, pigmentosum, group, 'A)', protein, '(', 'CCCC', zinc, 'finger),', but, not, 'SP-1', '(', specificity, 'protein-1)', or, aprataxin, '(', 'CCHH', zinc, 'finger)'])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, demonstrate, that, 'PARP-1', is, a, direct, molecular]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, arsenite, and, that, arsenite, interacts, selectively, with, zinc, finger, motifs, containing, three, or, more, cysteine, residues])].
[sujeto(['An', excellent, correlation, between, 'PARP-1', inhibition, in, protein, extracts, and, the, ability, of, the, complexes, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([to, the, 'zinc-finger', motif, '(', in, competition, with, 'zinc)', was, established])].
[sujeto(['The', results, support, a, model, whereby, displacement, of, zinc, from, the, 'PARP-1', zinc, finger, by, other, metal, ions]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, decreased, 'PARP-1', activity])].
[sujeto(['Alzheimer\'s', disease, '(', 'AD)']), verbo([causes]), complemento(['progressive,', 'age-dependent', cortical, and, hippocampal, dysfunction, leading, to, abnormal, intellectual, capacity, and, memory])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, a, novel, protective, treatment, for, 'AD', pathology, with, phytic, acid, '(', inositol, 'hexakisphosphate),', a, phytochemical]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, food, grains, and, a, key, signaling, molecule, in, mammalian, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'MC65', 'cells,', 48, -, 72, -, hour, treatment, with, phytic, acid]), verbo([provided]), complemento([complete, protection, against, amyloid, precursor, 'protein-C-terminal', 'fragment-induced', cytotoxicity, by, attenuating, levels, of, increased, intracellular, 'calcium,', hydrogen, 'peroxide,', 'superoxide,', 'A&Icirc;&sup2;', 'oligomers,', and, moderately, upregulated, the, expression, of, autophagy, '(', 'beclin-1)', protein])].
[sujeto(['There', was, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, brain, levels, of, cytochrome, oxidase, and, a, decrease, in, lipid, peroxidation, with, phytic, acid, administration])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, phytic, acid, may, provide, a, viable, treatment, option, for, 'AD'])].
[sujeto(['Arsenic']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([skin, tumor, formation, when, combined, with, other, 'carcinogens,', including, 'UV', radiation, '(', 'UVR)'])].
[sujeto(['In', this, study, we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, low, micromolar, concentrations, of, arsenite, synergistically, increases, 'UVR-induced', oxidative, 'DNA', damage, in, human, keratinocytes, as, detected, by, 8, -, 'hydroxyl-2\'-deoxyguanine', '(', 8, -, 'OHdG)', formation])].
[sujeto(['Poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1', '(', 'PARP-1)', is]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, base, excision, 'repair,', a, process, that, repairs, 8, -, 'OHdG', lesions])].
[sujeto(['Arsenite']), verbo([suppresses]), complemento(['UVR-induced', 'PARP-1', activation, in, a, 'concentration-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, 'PARP-1', activity, by, 3, -, aminobenzamide, or, small, interfering, 'RNA', silencing, of, 'PARP-1', expression, significantly]), verbo([increases]), complemento(['UVR-induced', 8, -, 'OHdG', 'formation,', suggesting, that, inhibition, of, 'PARP-1', activity, by, arsenite, contributes, to, oxidative, 'DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['PARP-1', is, a, zinc, finger, 'protein,', and, mass, spectrometry, analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, arsenite, can, occupy, a, synthetic, apopeptide, representing, the, first, zinc, finger, of, 'PARP-1', '(', 'PARPzf)'])].
[sujeto(['When', the, 'PARPzf', peptide, is, preincubated, with, 'Zn(II)', followed, by, incubation, with]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([concentrations, of, 'arsenite,', the, 'ZnPARPzf', signal, is, decreased, while, the, 'AsPARPzf', signal, intensity, is, increased, as, a, function, of, arsenite, 'dose,', suggesting, a, competition, between, zinc, and, arsenite, for, the, same, binding, site])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrate, that, arsenite]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([oxidative, 'DNA', damage, repair, and, suggest, that, interaction, of, arsenite, with, the, 'PARP-1', zinc, finger, domain, contributes, to, the, inhibition, of, 'PARP-1', activity, by, arsenite])].
[sujeto(['Arsenite', inhibition, of, 'poly(ADP-ribosyl)ation', is, one, likely, mechanism, for, the]), verbo([reported]), complemento(['co-carcinogenic', activities, of, arsenic, in, 'UVR-induced', skin, carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['Arsenic', is, a]), verbo([recognized]), complemento([human, 'carcinogen,', but, the, mechanism, of, carcinogenesis, is, not, well, understood])].
[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress, and, inhibition, of, 'DNA', damage, repair]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, postulated, as, potential, carcinogenic, actions, of, arsenic])].
[sujeto(['The', present, study, tests, the, hypothesis, that, arsenite, not, only]), verbo([induces]), complemento([oxidative, stress, but, also, inhibits, the, activity, of, the, 'DNA', base, excision, repair, 'protein,', 'poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1', '(', 'PARP-1),', leading, to, exacerbation, of, the, oxidative, 'DNA', damage, induced, by, arsenic])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', supplementation, and, 'PARP-1', siRNA, were, used, to]), verbo([increase]), complemento([or, 'decrease,', 'respectively,', the, 'PARP-1', 'protein\'s', physiological, function])].
[sujeto(['At', high, concentrations, '(', 10, microM, or, 'higher),', arsenite, greatly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([oxidative, 'DNA', 'damage,', as, indicated, by, 8, -, 'OHdG', formation])].
[sujeto(['At', lower, concentrations, '(', 1, 'microM),', arsenite, did, not, produce, detectable, 8, -, 'OHdG,', but, was, still, able, to, effectively]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['PARP-1', activity])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', supplementation, reduced, the, formation, of, 8, -, 'OHdG,', restored, the, 'PARP-1', activity]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([by, 'arsenite,', but, did, not, decrease, 'ROS', production])].
[sujeto(['SiRNA', knockdown, of, 'PARP-1', did, not, affect, the, 8, -, 'OHdG', level]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'arsenic,', while, it, greatly, increased, the, 8, -, 'OHdG', level, produced, by, hydrogen, peroxide, indicating, that, 'PARP-1', is, a, molecular, target, of, arsenite])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrate, that, in, addition, to]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([oxidative, stress, at, higher, 'concentrations,', arsenite, can, also, inhibit, the, function, of, a, key, 'DNA', repair, 'protein,', 'PARP-1,', even, at, very, low, 'concentrations,', thus, exacerbating, the, overall, oxidative, 'DNA', damage, produced, by, 'arsenite,', and, 'potentially,', by, other, oxidants, as, well])].
[sujeto(['Epidemiological', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([associated, arsenic, exposure, with, many, types, of, human, cancers])].
[sujeto(['Arsenic']), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, shown, to, act, as, a, 'co-carcinogen', even, at, low, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'study,', we, tested, the, hypothesis, that, low, concentrations, of, arsenic, could]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento(['PAPR-1', activity, and, so, exacerbate, levels, of, ultraviolet, radiation, '(', 'UVR)-induced', 'DNA', strand, breaks])].
[sujeto(['Low', concentrations, of, arsenite, '(', &, 'lt;or=2', 'microM)', alone, did, not]), verbo([induce]), complemento([significant, 'DNA', strand, 'breaks,', but, greatly, enhanced, the, 'DNA', strand, breaks, induced, by, 'UVR'])].
[sujeto(['Further', studies, showed, that, 2, microM, arsenite, effectively]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento(['PARP-1', activity])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', neither, arsenite, 'treatment,', nor, zinc, supplementation, changed, 'UVR-triggered', reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', 'formation,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, their, effects, upon, 'UVR-induced', 'DNA', strand, breaks, are, not, through, a, direct, free, radical, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Combination', treatments, of, arsenite, with, 'PARP-1', inhibitor, 3, -, aminobenzamide, or, 'PARP-1', siRNA, demonstrate, that, 'PARP-1', is, the]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, arsenite])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, findings, show, that, arsenite, at, low, concentration, exacerbates, 'UVR-induced', 'DNA', strand, breaks, by]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento(['PARP-1', 'activity,', which, may, represent, an, important, mechanism, underlying, the, 'co-carcinogenicity', of, arsenic])].
[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress, and, zinc]), verbo([release]), complemento([are, both, known, to, contribute, to, neuronal, death, after, 'hypoglycemia;', 'however,', the, 'cause-effect', relationships, between, these, events, are, not, established])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, 'found,', using, a, rat, model, of, profound, 'hypoglycemia,', that, the, neuronal, zinc]), verbo([release]), complemento([and, translocation, that, occur, immediately, after, hypoglycemia, are, prevented, by, the, nitric, oxide, synthase, inhibitor, 7, -, nitroindazole, but, not, by, overexpression, of, superoxide, 'dismutase-1', '(', 'SOD-1)'])].
[sujeto(['However,', overexpression, of, 'SOD-1']), verbo([prevented]), complemento([activation, of, 'poly(ADP-ribose)', 'polymerase-1', '(', 'PARP-1)', and, neuronal, 'death,', suggesting, that, zinc, release, is, upstream, of, superoxide, production])].
[sujeto(['A', key, role, for, the, vesicular, zinc, pool, in, this, process, was]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([by, reduced, superoxide, formation, and, neuronal, death, in, mice, deficient, in, zinc, transporter, 3])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([a, series, of, events, in, which, nitric, oxide, production, triggers, vesicular, zinc, 'release,', which, in, turn, activates, 'NADPH', oxidase, and, 'PARP-1'])].
[sujeto(['This', sequence, may, also, occur, in, other, central, nervous, system, disorders, in, which, 'zinc,', nitric, 'oxide,', and, oxidative, stress]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, linked])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', neurotoxicity]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, demonstrated, in, 'ischemic,', 'seizure,', 'hypoglycemic,', and, 'trauma-induced', neuronal, death, where, 'Zn(2+)', is, thought, to, be, synaptically, released, and, taken, up, in, neighbouring, 'neurons,', reaching, toxic, concentrations])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'PARP-1', activation, alone, can, not, explain, this, loss, of, neuronal, 'NAD(+)'])].
[sujeto(['NAD(+)', was, recently, demonstrated, to, permeate, neurons, and, 'glia,', and, we]), verbo([have]), complemento([now, shown, that, exogenous, 'NAD(+)', can, reduce, 'Zn(2+)', 'neurotoxicity,', and, 3, -, 'acetylpyridine,', which, generates, inactive, 'NAD(+),', potentiated, 'Zn(2+)', neurotoxicity])].
[sujeto(['Resveratrol', and, fisetin, '(', sirtuin, 'activators)', potentiated, 'NAD(+)']), verbo([loss]), complemento([and, 'Zn(2+)', neurotoxicities])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Hep-2', cells, contain, abundant, labile, zinc, stores, that, may, be, depleted, by, the, ionophore, 'TPEN', or, increased, by, external, zinc, supplementation])].
[sujeto(['Chromium', '(', 'VI)-induced', cytotoxicity, and, apoptosis, were]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, 'zinc-depleted', cells, after, 24, 'h,', in, particular, at, chromium, '(', 'VI)', concentrations, of, 50, and, 150, 'micromol/l'])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', elevated, levels, of, labile, zinc, were, able, to, protect, against, apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 10, 'micromol/l', chromium, '(', 'VI)', but, at, higher, chromium, '(', 'VI)', concentrations, '(', 50, and, 150, 'micromol/l)', acted, 'synergistically,', significantly, enhancing, oxidative, stress, and, the, course, of, 'apoptosis,', possibly, through, oxidative, stress, and, mitochondrial, damage])].
[sujeto(['In', both, shark, and, mammalian, 'VSM,', 'ET-1']), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, rise, in, cytosolic, 'Ca(2+)', concentration, '(', '[', 'Ca(2+)](i))', via, activation, of, the, inositol, trisphosphate, '(', 'IP(3))', receptor, '(', 'IP(3)R)', and, subsequent, release, of, 'Ca(2+)', from, the, sarcoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'SR)'])].
[sujeto(['IP(3)R-mediated']), verbo([release]), complemento([of, 'SR', 'Ca(2+)', causes, 'calcium-induced', calcium, release, '(', 'CICR)', via, the, ryanodine, receptor, '(', 'RyR),', which, can, be, sensitized, by, cyclic, adeninediphosphate, ribose, '(', 'cADPR)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, the, antagonists, of, the, 'RyR,', 'Ruthenium', 'Red,', high, concentrations, of, ryanodine, and, 8, -, 'Br', 'cADPR,', diminish, the, '[', 'Ca(2+)](i)', response, to, 'ET-1', in, shark, 'VSM'])].

[sujeto(['Structures', of, the, 'PutA', 'PRODH', domain, complexed, with, competitive, inhibitors, acetate, '(', 'K(i)', =, 30, 'mM),', 'L-lactate', '(', 'K(i)', =, 1, 'mM),', and, 'L-tetrahydro-2-furoic', acid, '(', 'L-THFA,', 'K(i)', =, 0.2, 'mM)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, determined, to, 'high-resolution', limits, of, 2.1, -, 2.0, 'A'])].

[sujeto(['This', geometry]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([direct, hydride, transfer, as, a, plausible, mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Mutation', of]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([active, site, residue, 'Leu432', to, 'Pro', caused, a, 5, -, fold, decrease, in, 'k(cat)', and, a, severe, loss, in, thermostability])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, molecular, basis, for, increased, plasma, proline, levels, in, schizophrenic, subjects, carrying, the, missense, mutation, 'L441P', is, due, to, decreased, stability, of, human, 'PRODH2'])].
[sujeto(['Cloning', of, the, human, cDNA, and, gene]), verbo([has]), complemento([enabled, the, identification, of, 29, rare, mutations, in, homocystinuric, patients, and, two, common, variants, '[', 677, 'C&gt;T', '(', 'A222V)', and, 1298, 'A&gt;C', '(', 'E429A)]', with, mild, enzymatic, deficiency])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([expressed]), complemento([the, 1025, 'T&gt;C', mutation, as, well, as, two, previously, reported, amino, acid, substitutions, '[', 983, 'A&gt;G', '(', 'N324S)', and, 1027, 'T&gt;G', '(', 'W339G)]', and, observed, decreased, enzyme, activity, at, 10, '%', ',', 36, '%', ',', and, 21, '%', of, control, 'levels,', 'respectively,', with, little, or, no, effect, on, affinity, for, 5, -, methyltetrahydrofolate])].
[sujeto(['Expression', of, these, mutations, in, cis, with, the, 677, 'C&gt;T', 'polymorphism,', as, observed, in, the, 'patients,', resulted, in, an, additional, 50, '%']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, enzyme, activity])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([brings, the, total, to, 33, severe, mutations, identified, in, patients, with, severe, 'MTHFR', deficiency])].
[sujeto(['Impaired', functioning, of, methylenetetrahydrofolate, reductase, '(', 'MTHFR)', can]), verbo([cause]), complemento([high, levels, of, homocysteine, in, plasma, or, 'hyperhomocysteinemia,', which, is, an, independent, risk, factor, for, cardiovascular, diseases, and, neural, tube, defects])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([studied, in, detail, the, effect, of, modulation, of, hydrophobic, and, electrostatic, interactions, of, 'Escherichia', coli, 'MTHFR', on, its, structure, and, function])].
[sujeto(['Alterations', in, hydrophobic, interactions, of, 'MTHFR,', using, 'urea,']), verbo([lead]), complemento([to, dissociation, of, the, native, 'tetramer,', resulting, in, stabilization, of, enzymatically, active, holoenzyme, dimers, followed, by, unfolding, of, the, holoenzyme, dimer, to, the, denatured, monomer, along, with, dissociation, of, 'FAD', from, the, enzyme])].
[sujeto(['This', is, the, first]), verbo([report]), complemento([of, an, enzymatically, active, dimer, of, 'E'])].
[sujeto([coli, 'MTHFR', and]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, dimer, rather, than, tetramer, is, the, smallest, functionally, active, unit, of, the, enzyme])].
[sujeto(['Modulation', of, electrostatic, 'interactions,', using, 'NaCl,']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, dissociation, of, the, native, 'enzyme,', resulting, in, stabilization, of, an, enzymatically, inactive, partially, unfolded, holoenzyme, dimer])].
[sujeto(['Comparative', analysis, of]), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, enzymatic, activity, and, changes, in, structural, features, of, 'MTHFR', demonstrate, a, very, good, correlation, between, enhanced, flexibility, of, the, 'enzyme-bound', 'FAD', and, loss, of, enzymatic, 'activity,', suggesting, the, importance, of, rigidity, of, the, 'FAD', cofactor, in, maintenance, of, the, enzymatic, activity, of, 'MTHFR'])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, riboflavin, status, may, affect, homocysteine, 'metabolism,', but, only, in, a, small, segment, of, the, population, who, have, both, low, folate, status, and, are, homozygotes, for, the, 'MTHFR', 'C677T', mutation])].
[sujeto(['Two', common, polymorphisms, of, the, human, enzyme]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, 'identified:', 677, 'C&gt;T,', which, leads, to, the, substitution, of, 'Ala-222', by, 'valine,', and, 1298, 'A&gt;C,', which, leads, to, the, replacement, of, 'Glu-429', by, 'alanine;', the, former, polymorphism, is, the, most, frequent, genetic, cause, of, mild, 'hyperhomocysteinemia,', a, risk, factor, for, cardiovascular, disease])].
[sujeto(['By', using, a, baculovirus, expression, 'system,', recombinant, human, 'MTHFR']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, expressed, at, high, levels, and, purified, to, homogeneity, in, quantities, suitable, for, biochemical, characterization])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Glu429Ala', protein]), verbo([has]), complemento([biochemical, properties, that, are, indistinguishable, from, the, 'wild-type', enzyme])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Ala222Val', 'MTHFR,', 'however,']), verbo([has]), complemento([an, enhanced, propensity, to, dissociate, into, monomers, and, to, lose, its, 'FAD', cofactor, on, 'dilution;', the, resulting, loss, of, activity, is, slowed, in, the, presence, of, methyltetrahydrofolate, or, adenosylmethionine])].
[sujeto(['Because', this, substrate, is, unstable, and, dissociates, spontaneously, into, formaldehyde, and, 'tetrahydrofolate,', the, customary, method, to, assay, the, catalytic, activity, of, this, enzyme]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, to, measure, the, oxidation, of, '[', 14, 'C]N(5)-methyltetrahydrofolate', to, 'N(5),', 'N(10)-methylenetetrahydrofolate', and, quantify, the, '[', 14, 'C]formaldehyde', that, dissociates, from, this, product])].
[sujeto(['This']), verbo([report]), complemento([describes, a, very, sensitive, radioenzymatic, assay, that, measures, directly, the, reductive, catalysis, of, 'N(5),N(10)-methylenetetrahydrofolate'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'radio-labeled', 'substrate,', '[', 14, 'C]N(5),N(10)-methylenetetrahydrofolate,', is, prepared, by, condensation, of, '[', 'C(14)]formaldehyde', with, tetrahydrofolate, and, the, stability, of, this, substrate, is]), verbo([maintained]), complemento([for, several, months, by, storage, at, -, 80, degrees, 'C', in, a, pH, 9.5, buffer])].
[sujeto(['A', 'K(m)', value, of, 8.2, microM, was, obtained, under, conditions, of]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([substrate, concentration, to, ensure, saturation, kinetics])].
[sujeto(['Elevated', plasma, homocysteine, levels, are, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([risk, for, cardiovascular, disease, and, neural, tube, defects, in, humans])].

[sujeto(['Higher', folate]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, associated, with, a, reduced, colorectal, cancer, '(', 'CRC)', 'risk,', but, excessive, folate, may, promote, tumor, progression])].
[sujeto(['It', is, indicated, that, maternal, folic, acid, supplementation, during, early, pregnancy, may]), verbo([increase]), complemento([the, risk, of, wheeze, in, early, childhood, and, that, the, 'TT', genotype, of, 'MTHFR', 'C677T', polymorphism, impairing, folic, acid, metabolism, would, be, at, high, risk, of, asthma, development])].

[sujeto(['These', forms]), verbo([have]), complemento([isomer, shifts, delta, =, 0.79, 'mm/s', at, 4.2, 'K,', consistent, with, tetrahedral, 'Fe2+(Cys)3(O-R)', coordination])].

[sujeto(['We', achieved, 75, '%', reduction, of, 'C42S', rubredoxin, by, irradiating, an, oxidized, sample, at, 77, 'K', with, synchrotron, 'X-rays;', the, radiolytic, reduction, produced, exclusively, form, 'A,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, this, form, represents, a, 'serine-bound', 'Fe2+', site])].
[sujeto(['The', presence, of, glycerol, '(', 30, -, 50, '%', 'v/v)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, favor, the, 'B', form])].
[sujeto(['Previous', absorption, and, circular, dichroism, studies, of, reduced, 'wild-type', rubredoxin]), verbo([have]), complemento([suggested, 'd-d', bands, at, 7400, ',', 6000, ',', and, 3700, 'cm(-1)'])].
[sujeto(['The', mutant, proteins]), verbo([have]), complemento(['d-d', transitions, at, slightly, lower, 'energy,', namely, 5730, ',', 6100, 'cm(-1)', in, form, 'A', and, 5350, ',', 6380, 'cm(-1)', in, form, 'B'])].
[sujeto(['The', electronic, and, redox, properties, of, the, 'iron-sulfur', cluster, and, tungsten, center, in, the, 'as-isolated', and, 'sulfide-activated', forms, of, formaldehyde, ferredoxin, oxidoreductase, '(', 'FOR)', from, 'Thermococcus', litoralis, '(', 'Tl)']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, investigated, by, using, the, combination, of, 'EPR', and, 'variable-temperature', magnetic, circular, dichroism, '(', 'VTMCD)', spectroscopies])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, '[', 'Fe4S4]2+,+', cluster, '(', 'Em=-368mV)', that, undergoes, redox, cycling, between, an, oxidized, form, with, an, 'S=0', ground, state, and, a, reduced, form, that, exists, as, a, 'pH-', and, 'medium-dependent', mixture, of, 'S=3/2', '(', 'g=5'])].

[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, iron, atoms, in, ferredoxin, are, first, reduced, by, the, intramolecular, reductants, in, the, presence, of, triphenyl, phosphine, with, the, concomitant, formation, of, 'S2-2,', which, then, reacts, with, triphenyl, phosphine, resulting, in, the, formation, of, triphenyl, phosphine, sulfide])].

[sujeto(['These', 'FNRs', contain, two, unique, aromatic, residues, stacked, on, the, 'si-', and, 're-face', of, the, isoalloxazine, ring, moiety, of, the, 'FAD', prosthetic, group, whose, configurations, are, often]), verbo([found]), complemento([among, other, types, of, flavoproteins, including, 'plant-type', 'FNR', and, 'flavodoxin,', but, not, in, bacterial, 'NADPH-thioredoxin', reductase])].
[sujeto(['The', 'Y50G', and, 'Y50S', mutations]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, 'FAD', fluorescence, 'emission,', whereas, those, of, the, wild, type, and, 'Y50W', mutant, were, quenched])].
[sujeto(['All', three, mutants]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([thermal, stabilities, compared, to, wild, type])].

[sujeto(['Previously', we, showed, that, covalent]), verbo([binding]), complemento([of, the, hypoxia, probe, 'EF5', predicts, metabolic, activation, of, 'SN30000', in, a, panel, of, cancer, cell, lines, under, 'anoxia,', suggesting, that, they, are, activated, by, the, same, reductases])].

[sujeto(['The', 'MRG1', mRNA, transcript, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([widely, and, encodes, a, nuclear, protein, that, share, two, highly, conserved, 'domains,', 'CR1', '(', 14, 'aa)', and, 'CR2', '(', approx])].
[sujeto(['The', 'CR2', domain, is, significantly, acidic, and]), verbo([activates]), complemento([transcription, in, yeast, cells])].
[sujeto(['The', 'full-length', 'MSG1', and, 'MRG1', fused, to, 'GAL4', 'DNA-binding', domain]), verbo([activates]), complemento([transcription, in, mammalian, 'cells,', and, this, is, dependent, on, the, presence, of, the, 'CR2', domain])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'MRG1', and, 'MSG1', may, function, as, transcription, activators])].
[sujeto(['A', novel, gene, called, msg1, '(', 'melanocyte-specific', 'gene)', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, expressed, at, high, levels, in, 'B16-F1', cells, but, at, low, levels, in, 'B16-F10', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', pigmented, murine, melanocyte, cell, line, 'melan-a']), verbo([expressed]), complemento(['msg1,', as, did, pigmented, primary, cultures, of, murine, and, human, 'melanocytes;', 'however,', seven, amelanotic, or, very, weakly, pigmented, human, melanoma, cell, lines, were, negative])].
[sujeto(['Transformation', of, murine, melanocytes, by, transfection, with, 'v-Ha-ras', or, 'Ela', was, accompanied, by, depigmentation, and]), verbo([led]), complemento([to, complete, loss, of, msg1, expression])].
[sujeto(['This', 'C-terminal', domain, was]), verbo([conserved]), complemento([with, 76, '%', amino, acid, identity, in, another, protein, product, of, a, novel, human, 'gene,', 'MRG1', '(', 'msg1-related', 'gene),', isolated, from, normal, human, melanocyte, cDNA, by, 5, '\'', -, rapid, amplification, of, cDNA, ends, based, on, the, homology, to, msg1])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, msg1, encodes, a]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['protein,', is, 'melanocyte-specific,', and, appears, to, be, lost, in, depigmented, melanoma, cells])].
[sujeto(['PTEN', '(', phosphatase, and, tensin, 'homolog),', a, tumor, suppressor, frequently, mutated, in, human, 'cancer,']), verbo([has]), complemento([various, cytoplasmic, and, nuclear, functions])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', topotecan, '(', 'TPT),', a, topoisomerase, 'I', 'inhibitor,', and, cisplatin, '(', 'CDDP)', were, employed, to]), verbo([induce]), complemento(['DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['The', results, indicate, that, 'TPT', or, 'CDDP']), verbo([activates]), complemento(['ATM', '(', 'ATM', 'serine/threonine', 'kinase),', which, phosphorylates, 'PTEN', at, serine, 113, and, further, regulates, 'PTEN', nuclear, translocation, in, 'A549', and, 'HeLa', cells])].

[sujeto(['The', transcriptional, cofactor, 'CITED1']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([osteoblastic, differentiation, and, blunts, the, stimulation, of, osteoblastic, differentiation, by, parathyroid, hormone, '(', 'PTH)'])].

[sujeto(['The', 'MSG1']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([protein, has, a, strong, transcriptional, activating, activity, but, does, not, bind, directly, to, 'DNA'])].

[sujeto(['Recent', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([revealed, the, essential, role, of, retinol, binding, protein, 4, '(', 'RBP4)', in, insulin, resistance])].
[sujeto(['Treatment', with, human, 'retinol-bound', 'RBP4', '(', 'holo-RBP4)', significantly]), verbo([induced]), complemento([intracellular, triglyceride, '(', 'TAG)', synthesis, in, 'HepG2', cells, and, this, effect, is, 'retinol-independent'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'RBP4', treatment]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, levels, of, mature, 'SREBP-1', and, its, nuclear, 'translocation,', thereby, increasing, the, expression, of, lipogenic, 'genes,', including, fatty, acid, synthase, '(', 'FAS),', acetyl, coenzyme, 'A', 'carboxylase-1', '(', 'ACC-1),', and, diacylglycerol, 'O-acyltransferase', 2, '(', 'DGAT-2)'])].
[sujeto(['The', cyclic, adenosine, monophosphate, '(', 'cAMP)-response', element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', was, identified, as, the, target, transcription, factor, involved, in, the, 'RBP4-mediated', 'up-regulation', of, 'PGC-1&Icirc;&sup2;', transcription, as, a, result, of, phosphorylation, on, 'Ser133'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', in, vivo, 'RBP4', infusion]), verbo([induced]), complemento(['SREBP-1c', activation, and, consequently, accelerated, hepatic, lipogenesis, and, plasma, 'TAG', in, 'C57BL/6J', 'mice,', a, phenomenon, not, observed, in, 'Ppargc1b', knockout, mice])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, mechanism, by, which, 'RBP4', achieves, its, effects, on, hepatic, lipid, metabolism])].
[sujeto(['Mitochondrial', biogenesis, is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([by, nuclear, encoded, transcription, 'co-activator', peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;', 'coactivator-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;),', which, is, regulated, by, several, upstream, factors, including, protein, kinase, 'A', and, 'Akt/protein', kinase, 'B'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, shown, that, selenoprotein, 'H', enhances, the, levels, of, nuclear, regulators, for, mitochondrial, 'biogenesis,', increases, mitochondrial, mass, and, improves, mitochondrial, respiratory, 'rate,', under, physiological, condition])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', overexpression, of, selenoprotein, 'H', protects, neuronal, 'HT22', cells, from, ultraviolet, 'B', 'irradiation-induced', cell, damage, by, lowering, reactive, oxygen, species, 'production,', and]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([activation, of, 'caspase-3', and, -, 9, ',', as, well, as, p53])].
[sujeto(['We', first, confirmed, our, previous, observation, that, selenoprotein, 'H', transfected, 'HT22', cells]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, protein, levels, of, 'nuclear-encoded', mitochondrial, biogenesis, 'factors,', peroxisome, 'proliferator-activated', receptor, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;', 'coactivator-1&Icirc;&plusmn;,', nuclear, respiratory, factor, 1, and, mitochondrial, transcription, factor, 'A'])].
[sujeto(['We', then, observed, that, total, and, phosphorylation, of, protein, kinase, 'A,', 'Akt/protein', kinase, 'B', and, cyclic, adenosine, monophosphate, response, 'element-binding', protein, '(', 'CREB)', were, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, selenoprotein, 'H', transfected, cells, compared, to, vector, transfected, 'HT22', cells])].
[sujeto(['To', verify, whether, the, observed]), verbo([stimulating]), complemento([effects, on, mitochondrial, biogenesis, pathways, are, caused, by, selenoprotein, 'H', and, mediated, through, 'CREB,', we, knocked, down, selenoprotein, 'H', mRNA, level, using, siRNA, and, inhibited, 'CREB', with, napthol, 'AS-E', phosphate, in, selenoprotein, 'H', transfected, cells, and, repeated, the, measurements, of, the, aforementioned, biomarkers])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, revealed, that, silencing, of, selenoprotein, 'H', not, only]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([the, protein, levels, of, 'PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;,', nuclear, respiratory, factor, 1, and, mitochondrial, transcription, factor, 'A,', but, also, decreased, the, total, and, phosphorylation, levels, of, protein, kinase, 'A,', protein, kinase, 'B,', and, 'CREB'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', selenoprotein, 'H', transfection]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, activity, of, mitochondrial, complexes, and, prevented, the, ultraviolet, 'B', induced, fall, of, mitochondrial, membrane, potential])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, the, effects, of, selenoprotein, 'H', on, mitochondrial, biogenesis, and, mitochondrial, function, are, probably]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([through, protein, kinase, 'A-CREB-PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, 'Akt/protein', kinase, 'B-CREB-PGC-1&Icirc;&plusmn;', pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', transcription, factor, cyclic, adenosine, monophosphate, '(', 'cAMP)', response, element]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB)', and, the, neurotrophin, 'brain-derived', neurotrophic, factor, '(', 'BDNF)', have, been, implicated, in, rodent, models, of, depression])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, that, 'Bdnf', expression, critically, rely, on, a, potent, 'CREB', coactivator, called, 'CREB-regulated', transcription, coactivator, 1, '(', 'CRTC1)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, mice, lacking, 'CRTC1', associate, neurobehavioral, endophenotypes, related, to, mood, disorders])].
[sujeto(['Crtc1(-/-)', mice, exhibit, impulsive, 'aggressiveness,', social, 'withdrawal,', and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([sexual, 'motivation,', together, with, increased, behavioral, 'despair,', 'anhedonia,', and, 'anxiety-related', behavior, in, the, 'novelty-induced', hypophagia, test])].

[sujeto(['The', inhibin, 'alpha-subunit', gene, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, 'ovary,', 'testis,', 'adrenal,', and, pituitary])].

[sujeto(['Expression', of, 'CREB']), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CBP),', a, coactivator, that, interacts, with, 'SF-1', and, 'CREB,', further, enhanced, transcription, by, these, pathways])].
[sujeto(['Stimulation', by, the, 'SF-1', and, cAMP, pathways, was, associated, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([histone, 'H4', 'acetylation,', suggesting, that, chromatin, remodeling, accompanies, their, actions])].

[sujeto(['Different', classes, of, mammalian, transcription, 'factors-nuclear', 'receptors,', cyclic, adenosine, 3, '\'', ',', 5, '\'', -, 'monophosphate-regulated', enhancer]), verbo([binding]), complemento([protein, '(', 'CREB),', and, signal, transducer, and, activator, of, 'transcription-1', '(', 'STAT-1)-functionally', require, distinct, components, of, the, coactivator, 'complex,', including, 'CREB-binding', protein, '(', 'CBP/p300),', nuclear, receptor, coactivators, '(', 'NCoAs),', and, 'p300/CBP-associated', factor, '(', 'p/CAF),', based, on, their, platform, or, assembly, properties])].

[sujeto(['Sestrins', '(', 'Sesns)', are, a, family, of, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['stress-responsive', 'proteins,', transcriptionally, regulated, by, p53, and, forkhead, transcription, factor, that, exhibit, oxidoreductase, activity, in, vitro, and, can, protect, cells, from, oxidative, stress])].

[sujeto(['These', findings, establish, that, 'TORC2', can, function, as, a, central, regulator, of, growth, in, response, to, signals, that, are, distinct, from, those]), verbo([regulating]), complemento(['TORC1,', and, support, efforts, to, target, 'TORC2', for, cancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['New', anticancer, drugs, that]), verbo([target]), complemento([oncogenic, signaling, molecules, have, greatly, improved, the, treatment, of, certain, cancers])].
[sujeto(['However,', resistance, to]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([therapeutics, is, a, major, clinical, problem, and, the, redundancy, of, oncogenic, signaling, pathways, provides, 'back-up', mechanisms, that, allow, cancer, cells, to, escape])].
[sujeto(['Whereas', chemoresistance]), verbo([caused]), complemento([by, 'AKT', is, readily, reversed, with, 'rapamycin,', 'PIM-mediated', resistance, is, refractory, to, mTORC1, inhibition])].
[sujeto(['The', therapeutic, effect, of, blocking, 'cap-dependent', translation, is, 'mediated,', at, least, in, 'part,', by]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([production, of, 'short-lived', oncoproteins, including, 'c-MYC,', 'Cyclin', 'D1,', 'MCL1,', and, the, 'PIM1/2', kinases, themselves])].
[sujeto(['Hence,']), verbo([targeting]), complemento([the, convergence, of, oncogenic, survival, signals, on, translation, initiation, is, an, effective, alternative, to, combinations, of, kinase, inhibitors])].
[sujeto(['Phosphatiditylinositide-3-kinase', '(', 'PI3K)', is]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, some, cancers, by, direct, 'mutation,', but, it, is, activated, more, commonly, in, cancer, by, mutation, of, upstream, acting, receptor, tyrosine, kinases, '(', 'TK)'])].
[sujeto(['At', 'present,', there, is, no, systematic, method, to, determine, which, 'TK', signaling, cascades]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['PI3K', in, certain, 'cancers,', despite, the, likely, utility, of, such, information, to, help, guide, selection, of, tyrosine, kinase, inhibitor, '(', 'TKI)', drug, strategies, for, personalized, therapy])].
[sujeto(['This', approach, also, determined, the, molecular, mechanisms, and, adaptors]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'PI3K', activation, following, inhibition, of, the, mTOR, kinase, 'TORC1'])].
[sujeto(['Using', this, technique, to, define, the, pathways, that]), verbo([activate]), complemento(['PI3K', signaling, in, a, given, tumor, could, help, inform, clinical, decision, making, by, helping, guide, personalized, therapeutic, strategies, for, different, patients])].
[sujeto([p53, is, reportedly]), verbo([activated]), complemento([without, any, genotoxicity, through, redox, modulation, of, redox, factor, 1, '(', 'REF1)'])].
[sujeto(['REF1', is, documented, to]), verbo([modulate]), complemento([the, redox, status, under, selenomethionine, '(', 'SeMet)'])].
[sujeto(['The', amount, of, ubiquitinated, p53]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([significantly, under, 'SeMet', 'treatment,', suggesting, that, 'SeMet', might, inhibit, the, 'proteasome-dependent', degradation, of, p53])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, alternate, mechanism, of, p53, stabilization, by, 'SeMet', might, provide, an, important, clue, in, elucidating, the, molecular, mechanism, of, chemopreventative, compounds, against, various, oxidative, stresses])].
[sujeto(['Organic', selenium, compounds]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, documented, to, play, a, role, in, cancer, prevention])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, study, showed, that, selenomethionine, '(', 'SeMet)']), verbo([induces]), complemento([p53, activation, without, genotoxic, effects, including, apoptosis, and, cell, cycle, arrest])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, investigated, the, mechanism, by, which, organic, selenium, compounds]), verbo([promote]), complemento(['p53-mediated', base, excision, repair, '(', 'BER)', activity])].
[sujeto(['Our', data, demonstrated, for, the, first, time, that, the, interaction, between, growth]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([and, 'DNA', 'damage-inducible', protein, 45, 'A', '(', 'Gadd45a),', which, is, a, 'p53-activated', downstream, 'gene,', and, two, 'BER-mediated', repair, 'proteins,', proliferating, cell, nuclear, antigen, '(', 'PCNA)', and, 'apurinic/apyrimidinic', endonuclease, '(', 'APE1/Ref-1),', was, significantly, increased, in, a, 'p53-dependent', manner, following, treatment, with, organic, selenium, compounds])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, observed, that, the, activity, of, 'APE1', was, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([in, a, 'p53-dependent', manner, in, response, to, the, organic, selenium, compounds])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'BER', activity, is, dependent, on, 'wild-type', p53, activity, and, is, mediated, by, the, modulation, of, protein, interactions, between, 'Gadd45a', and, repair, proteins, in, response, to, organic, selenium, compounds])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, that, 'p53-dependent', 'BER', activity, is, a, distinct, chemopreventive, mechanism]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, organic, selenium, 'compounds,', and, that, this, may, provide, insight, into, the, development, of, effective, chemopreventive, strategies, against, various, oxidative, stresses, that, contribute, to, a, variety, of, human, 'diseases,', particularly, cancer])].
[sujeto(['This', study, was, designed, to, investigate, the, hypothesis, that, the, toxic, effects, of, 'di(2-ethylhexyl)phthalate', '(', 'DEHP),', the, most, abundantly, used, plasticizer, and, ubiquitous, environmental, contaminant, that]), verbo([cause]), complemento([alterations, in, endocrine, and, spermatogenic, functions, in, animals, is, mediated, through, the, induction, of, reactive, oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)', and, activation, of, nuclear, p53, and, p21, proteins, in, 'LNCaP', human, prostate, adenocarcinoma, cell, line])].
[sujeto(['It', was, demonstrated, that, 24, h, exposure, of, the, cells, to, 3, mM, 'DEHP', or, its, main, 'metabolite,', 'mono(2-ethylhexyl)phthalate', '(', 'MEHP,', 3, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M)']), verbo([caused]), complemento([strongly, amplified, production, of, 'ROS'])].
[sujeto(['Both', 'SS', '(', 30, 'nM)', and, 'SM', '(', 10, &, 'Icirc;&frac14;M)', supplementations, reduced, 'ROS', 'production,', and, p53, and, p21, activation, that]), verbo([induced]), complemento([significantly, only, by, 'MEHP-exposure'])].
[sujeto(['Di(2-ethylhexyl)-phthalate', '(', 'DEHP)', is, the, most, abundantly, used, phthalate, 'derivative,', inevitable, environmental, exposure, of, which, is, suspected, to, contribute, to, the]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([incidence, of, testicular, dysgenesis, syndrome, in, humans])].
[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress, and, mitochondrial, dysfunction, in, germ, cells, are]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([to, contribute, to, 'phthalate-induced', disruption, of, spermatogenesis, in, 'rodents,', and, 'Leydig', cells, are, one, of, the, main, targets, of, 'phthalates\'', testicular, toxicity])].
[sujeto(['Selenium', is, known, to, be]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, modulation, of, intracellular, redox, 'equilibrium,', and, plays, a, critical, role, in, 'testis,', 'sperm,', and, reproduction])].
[sujeto(['The', overall, results, of, this, study, demonstrated, the, cytotoxicity, and, genotoxicity, potential, of, 'DEHP,', where, 'MEHP', was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, more, potent, than, the, parent, compound])].
[sujeto(['SS', and, 'SM', produced, almost, the, same, level, of, protection, against, antioxidant, status, modifying, 'effects,', 'ROS', and, p53]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['potentials,', and, 'DNA', damaging, effects, of, the, two, phthalate, derivatives])].
[sujeto(['Selenium', '(', 'Se)', compounds, are, well, known, to]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([cell, proliferation, and, induce, cell, death, in, human, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Respective', chemical, forms, of, 'Se', are, intracellularly, metabolized, via, complicated, 'pathways,', which]), verbo([target]), complemento([distinct, molecules, and, exhibit, varying, degrees, of, 'anti-carcinogenicity', in, different, cancer, 'types;', 'however,', the, precise, mechanisms, by, which, 'Se', activates, apoptosis, remain, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['SeMet']), verbo([increased]), complemento([apoptotic, cells, in, 'p53-positive', 'A549', 'cells,', whereas, 'MSC', increased, apoptotic, cells, in, 'p53-mutated', 'HSC-3', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', the, occurrence, of, endoplasmic, reticulum, '(', 'ER)', stress, was]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([by, the, observation, that, levels, of, phosphorylated, eIF2alpha, and, 'caspase-12', activity, are, increased, in, 'Se-treated', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', present, findings, demonstrate, that, 'Se-induced', apoptosis, in, carcinoma, cells, is, basically, a, 'caspase-dependent', process]), verbo([involving]), complemento([complicated, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['Activation', of, both, the, intrinsic, apoptotic, pathway, and, 'ER', stress, pathway, plays, a, major, and, concurrent, 'role,', while, p53, activation, seems, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([only, a, functional, role, in, 'SeMet'])].
[sujeto(['Ionizing', radiation, '(', 'IR)', therapy]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, widely, employed, in, the, treatment, of, cancer])].
[sujeto(['However,', certain, 'issues,', including, 'toxicity,']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, raised, in, conjunction, with, 'IR', therapy, for, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Recently,', selenomethionine, '(', 'SeMet)', as, an, antioxidant]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, the, subject, of, a, great, deal, of, attention, for, its, chemopreventive, effects])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'DNA', repair, activity, has, been, enhanced, in, response, to, 'SeMet', against, 'IR'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', our, data, showed, that, p53, functional, activity, was, significantly, reduced, against, 'IR', in, the, cells]), verbo([expressing]), complemento([a, mutant, form, of, redox, factor, 1, '(', 'Ref-1)', contrast, with, 'Ref-1', 'wild-type', cells, treated, with, 'SeMet,', suggesting, that, p53, activation, under, the, modulation, of, 'Ref-1', might, play, an, important, role, in, 'IR-treated', cells, in, the, presence, of, 'SeMet'])].
[sujeto(['From', this, 'study,', we]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, 'p53-mediated', protective, mechanism, of, 'SeMet', might, provide, clues, for, reducing, side, effects, of, 'IR', therapy])].
[sujeto(['Selenomethionine', '(', 'SeMet)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, identified, as, a, chemopreventive, antioxidant, to, activate, 'p53-mediated', nucleotide, excision, repair])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, examined, whether, 'p53-mediated', base, excision, repair, '(', 'BER)', might, be]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'SeMet'])].
[sujeto(['When', methyl, 'methanesulfonate,', a, 'BER-inducing', 'agent,', was, treated, in, the, 'cells,', 'DNA', damage, was, rapidly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([in, the, presence, of, 'SeMet'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', our, data, showed, that, the, removal, of, 'apurinic/apyrimidinic', sites, was, significantly]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([in, the, presence, of, 'SeMet'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we, observed, that, the, expression, of, 'gadd45a,', known, to]), verbo([involve]), complemento(['BER', as, one, of, the, p53, downstream, 'genes,', was, increased, by, 'SeMet', in, p53, 'wild-type', 'RKO', cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, 'p53-dependent', 'BER', activity, as, a, distinct, mechanism, of, 'SeMet', might, play, an, important, role, to, prevent, cancer, caused, by, various, oxidative, stresses])].
[sujeto(['An', analysis, of, variance, model, was, fit, to, identify, genes, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([between, treatments, and, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['The', highest, numbers, of, differentially]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([genes, by, treatment, were, 1329, '(', 63, '%', ')', of, 2109, genes, in, normal, epithelial, cells, after, selenium, 'treatment,', 1354, '(', 66, '%', ')', of, 2051, genes, in, stromal, cells, after, vitamin, 'E', 'treatment,', and, 329, '(', 56, '%', ')', of, 587, genes, in, tumor, cells, after, combination, treatment, '(', false, discovery, rate, =, 2, '%', ')'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, mean, percentage, of, 'p53-positive', tumor, cells, in, the, 'selenium-treated', group, '(', 26.3, '%', ')', ',', compared, with, that, in, the, 'placebo-treated', group, '(', 5, '%', ')', ',', showed, borderline, statistical, significance, '(', difference, =, 21.3, '%', ;, 95, '%', 'CI', =, 0.7, to, 41.8, ;, 'P', =])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, the, feasibility, and, efficiency, of, the, preoperative, model, and, its, power, as, a, 'hypothesis-generating', engine])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([also, identified, cell, 'type-', and, 'zone-specific', tissue, effects, of, interventions, with, selenium, and, vitamin, 'E', that, may, have, clinical, implications])].
[sujeto(['The', repair, of, single, base, mutations, in, mammalian, genes, can, be, directed, by, 'single-stranded', oligonucleotides, in, a, process, known, as]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([gene, repair])].
[sujeto(['The', mechanism, of, this, reaction, is, currently, being, elucidated, but, likely]), verbo([involves]), complemento([a, pairing, step, in, which, the, oligonucleotide, align, in, homologous, register, with, its, target, sequence, and, a, correction, step, in, which, the, mutant, base, is, replaced, by, endogenous, repair, pathways])].
[sujeto(['This', process, is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, the, activity, of, various, factors, and, proteins, that, either, elevate, or, depress, the, frequency, at, which, gene, repair, takes, place])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'report,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, addition, of, selenomethionine, reduces, gene, repair, frequency, in, a, 'dose-dependent', fashion])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([find]), complemento([that, selenium, induces, expression, of, 'Ref-1', 'which,', in, 'turn,', modifies, the, activity, of, p53, during, the, cell, cycle])].
[sujeto(['Selenium', in, various, chemical, forms]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, the, subject, of, cancer, chemoprevention, 'trials,', 'but,', more, 'recently,', selenium, has, been, used, in, combination, with, 'DNA-damaging', chemotherapeutics])].
[sujeto(['Seleno-l-methionine', pretreatment]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, 'DNA', repair, 'response,', which, protected, from, subsequent, challenge, with, 'DNA-damaging', agents])].
[sujeto(['The', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, '(', 'a)', p53, may, be, an, important, genetic, determinant, that, distinguishes, normal, cells, from, cancer, 'cells,', and, '(', 'b)', combinatorial, chemotherapeutics, that, act, by, 'p53-dependent', mechanisms, may, enhance, chemotherapeutic, efficacy, by, increasing, the, chemotherapeutic, window, distinguishing, cancer, cells, from, normal, cells])].
[sujeto(['SM,', 'p-XSC', and, 'p-XMS', but, not, 'MSC']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([levels, of, secreted, 'PSA', in, 'AR', cells])].
[sujeto(['SM,', 'MSC', and, 'p-XMS']), verbo([increased]), complemento([glutathione, '(', 'GSH)', levels, in, 'AI', 'LNCaP', cells])].
[sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', in, both, cell, 'types,', only, 'p-XSC', significantly]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['GSH', concentrations, to, &, 'lt;50%', of, control, suggesting, either, an, increase, in, intracellular, oxidative, stress, or, a, change, in, 'GSH/GSSG', ratio])].
[sujeto(['On', the, basis, of, 'RT-PCR', 'analysis,', 'SM', and, 'p-XSC']), verbo([increased]), complemento([p53, gene, expression, by, 2, -, fold, in, 'AR', cells, but, not, in, 'AI', cells, and, only, 'SM', enhanced, epidermal, growth, factor, receptor, in, 'AR', cells])].
[sujeto(['Depending', on, the, 'structure,', organoselenium, compounds, exhibit, differential, effects, on, 'growth,', 'PSA', 'secretion,', oxidative, stress, and, selective, gene, responses, in, human, prostate, cancer, cells, and]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([the, potential, of, developing, novel, organoselenium, compounds, as, chemopreventive, agents, in, models, of, human, prostate, cancer])].
[sujeto(['However,', evidence, from, experimental, studies, indicates, that, 'SeMet']), verbo([has]), complemento([weaker, anticancer, effects, than, most, other, forms, of, selenium])].
[sujeto(['Recent', studies, showed, that, the, anticancer, activity, of, 'SeMet', can, be]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([by, methioninase, '(', 'METase),', indicating, that, 'SeMet', metabolites, are, responsible, for, its, anticancer, activity])].
[sujeto(['SeMet', and, 'METase', cotreatment, significantly]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, superoxide, and, apoptosis, in, 'LNCaP', cells])].
[sujeto(['Cotreatment', with, 'SeMet', and, 'METase', resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([levels, of, phosphorylated, p53, '(', 'Ser15),', total, 'p53,', 'Bax,', and, 'p21(Waf1)', proteins])].
[sujeto(['LNCaP', cells, treated, with, 'SeMet', and, 'METase', also, showed, p53, translocation, to, 'mitochondria,']), verbo([decreased]), complemento([mitochondrial, membrane, 'potential,', cytochrome, c, release, into, the, 'cytosol,', and, activation, of, 'caspase-9'])].
[sujeto(['The', effects, of, 'SeMet', and, 'METase', were]), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([by, pretreatment, with, a, synthetic, superoxide, dismutase, mimic, or, by, knockdown, of, p53, via, 'RNA', interference])].
[sujeto(['Reexpression', of, 'wild-type', p53, in, 'PC3', cells, resulted, in]), verbo([increases]), complemento([in, superoxide, 'production,', 'apoptosis,', and, 'caspase-9', activity, and, a, decrease, in, mitochondrial, membrane, potential, following, cotreatment, with, 'SeMet', and, 'METase'])].
[sujeto(['Our', study, shows, that, apoptosis]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'SeMet', plus, 'METase', is, superoxide, mediated, and, p53, dependent, via, mitochondrial, 'pathway(s)'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, superoxide, and, p53, may, play, a, role, in, cancer, chemoprevention, by, selenium])].
[sujeto(['In', 'response,', 'wild-type', p53, protein, accumulates, in, irradiated, cells, and, the, stabilized, and, transactivated, protein, can, then]), verbo([induce]), complemento([genes, involved, in, cell, cycle, arrest, in, 'G1,', or, in, the, initiation, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Selenium', protects, cells, from, 'UVB-induced', cell, death, and, apoptosis, by, mechanisms, which, are, 'unclear,', although, recent]), verbo([reports]), complemento([suggest, that, selenium, protects, against, 'UV-induced', cell, damage, by, inducing, 'DNA', repair, enzymes, and, transactivating, p53])].
[sujeto(['We', examined, whether, selenomethionine, could, protect, human, skin, cells, from, 'UV', 'radiation-induced', p53, 'transactivation,', using, a, 'pRGCDeltafos-lacZ', 'p53-dependent', reporter, construct, stably, transfected, in, an, amelanotic, melanoma, cell, line, '(', 'Arn-8)', which]), verbo([expresses]), complemento(['wild-type', p53])].
[sujeto(['The', percentage, of, cells, with, transcriptionally, active, p53]), verbo([increased]), complemento([dose, dependently, up, to, 20, 'mJ/cm2', 'UVB'])].
[sujeto([85, ',', 'n=5', independent, 'experiments)', and]), verbo([decreased]), complemento(['UV-induced', p53, protein, accumulation, as, assessed, by, 'Western', blotting])].
[sujeto(['We', conclude, that, selenomethionine]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([broad, band, 'UVB-induced', p53, transactivation, and, protein, accumulation, and, that, this, effect, correlates, with, reported, protective, effects, of, selenium, against, 'UV-induced', 'DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['While', there, is, an]), verbo([increasing]), complemento([interest, in, selenium, chemoprevention, against, human, colon, polyp, recurrence, and, other, 'cancers,', the, 'mechanism(s)', by, which, these, agents, inhibit, carcinogenesis, are, uncertain])].
[sujeto(['More', 'recently,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, suggested, that, selenium, may, exert, growth, inhibitory, effects, by, activating, p53])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, study, we, tested, the, hypothesis, that, selenomethionine, might, affect, colon, cancer, cell, growth, by, p53]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([apoptosis, 'and/or', cell, cycle, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', although, 'HCT116', and, 'HCT116-p53KO', are, isogenic, cell, 'lines,', selenomethionine]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, 'G2/M', cell, cycle, arrest, in, 'HCT116', and, 'RKO', 'cells,', but, not, in, 'HCT116-p53KO', cells])].
[sujeto(['Similarly,', both, 'HCT116', and, 'RKO', demonstrated, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, apoptosis, '(', 100, -, 170, '%', ;, p, &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')', with, 50, -, 100, microM, selenomethionine])].
[sujeto(['Cell', cycle]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([and, apoptosis, observed, in, 'HCT116', and, 'RKO', cell, lines, were, accompanied, by, a, marked, increase, in, p53, protein, expression, following, selenium, treatment])].
[sujeto(['These', results, clearly]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, selenomethionine, exerts, p53, dependent, growth, inhibitory, effects, in, colon, cancer, cells, by, inducing, 'G2/M', cell, cycle, arrest, as, well, as, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Selenium,', in, the, form, of, 'seleno-L-methionine', '(', 'SeMet),']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['Redox-factor-1', '(', 'Ref1)', and, p53, proteins, in, normal, human, and, mouse, fibroblasts])].
[sujeto(['Ref1', and, p53, are, known, to, be, associated, with, each, 'other,', resulting, in]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento(['sequence-specific', 'DNA', binding, by, p53, and, transactivation, of, 'p53-regulated', effector, genes])].
[sujeto(['SeMet', preferentially]), verbo([induced]), complemento([the, 'DNA', repair, branch, of, the, p53, 'pathway,', while, apoptosis, and, cell, cycle, arrest, were, unaffected])].
[sujeto(['In', the, current, 'study,', 'Brca1', and, 'Ref1', were, shown, to]), verbo([interact]), complemento([concurrently, with, p53, in, targeting, a, 'SeMet-induced', 'DNA', repair, response])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', like, p53, and, 'Ref1,', 'Brca1', was]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, 'SeMet-mediated', 'DNA', damage, 'protection,', as, brca1, -, /, -, mouse, fibroblasts, were, not, protected, from, 'UV-radiation', by, 'SeMet', treatment])].
[sujeto(['These', findings, indicate, that, besides, p53, and, 'Ref1,', 'Brca1', is]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, selenium, protection, from, 'DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['Various', selenium, chemical, forms]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, shown, to, differ, widely, in, their, anticancer, properties])].
[sujeto(['The', main, dietary, form, is, 'selenomethionine,', which, we, showed]), verbo([modulated]), complemento([p53, activity, by, causing, redox, regulation, of, key, p53, cysteine, residues])].
[sujeto(['Methyl-seleninic', acid]), verbo([caused]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, one, or, more, p53, threonine, 'residues,', but, did, not, affect, any, known, serine, phosphorylation, sites])].
[sujeto(['By', contrast, sodium, selenite]), verbo([caused]), complemento([phosphorylation, of, p53, serines, 20, ',', 37, and, 46, known, to, mediate, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Selenomethionine', did, not]), verbo([cause]), complemento([detectable, phosphorylation, of, p53, serines, or, threonines])].
[sujeto(['The', generation, of, reactive, oxygen, species]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, implicated, in, ultraviolet, radiation, '(', 'UVR)-induced', skin, damage])].
[sujeto(['In', 'mice,']), verbo([increasing]), complemento([dietary, selenium, intake, protects, skin, from, 'UVR-induced', 'DNA', damage, and, photocarcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['In', primary, keratinocytes, the, greatest, reduction, in, apoptosis, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([with, 100, nm, of, either, selenium, compound, '(', 71, '%', reduction, in, the, numbers, of, total, apoptotic, 'cells;', 'P', &, 'lt;', 0.01, ')'])].
[sujeto(['Supplementation', with, 100, -, 200, nm, selenite, or, selenomethionine]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['UVR-induced', 'apoptosis,', but, did, not, decrease, the, levels, of, 'UVR-induced', 'p53,', as, measured, by, 'Western', blotting])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', this, data]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, selenium, prevents, 'UVR-induced', cell, death, by, inhibiting, 'p53-independent', cell, death, pathways])].
[sujeto(['The', cancer, chemopreventive, properties, of, selenium, compounds, are, well, 'documented,', yet, little, is, known, of, the, 'mechanism(s)', by, which, these, agents]), verbo([inhibit]), complemento([carcinogenesis])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, selenium, in, the, form, of, selenomethionine, '(', 'SeMet)', can]), verbo([activate]), complemento([the, p53, tumor, suppressor, protein, by, a, redox, mechanism, that, requires, the, redox, factor, 'Ref1'])].
[sujeto(['SeMet']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['sequence-specific', 'DNA', binding, and, transactivation, by, p53])].
[sujeto(['The', evidence]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, the, 'DNA', repair, branch, of, the, p53, pathway, was, activated])].
[sujeto(['More', 'recently,', it]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, that, mild, 'G6PD', deficiency, moderately, affects, cardiac, 'function,', whereas, severe, 'G6PD', deficiency, leads, to, embryonic, lethality, in, mice])].
[sujeto(['How', 'G6PD', deficiency, affects, organisms]), verbo([has]), complemento([not, been, fully, elucidated, due, to, the, lack, of, a, suitable, animal, model])].
[sujeto([elegans, in, parallel, with]), verbo([increased]), complemento([oxidative, stress, and, 'DNA', oxidative, damage])].
[sujeto(['Phenotypically,', 'G6PD-knockdown']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([germ, cell, apoptosis, '(', 2, -, fold, 'increase),', reduced, egg, production, '(', 65, '%', of, 'mock),', and, hatching, '(', 10, '%', of, 'mock)'])].
[sujeto(['To', investigate, the, signaling, pathways]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, defective, oogenesis, and, embryogenesis, caused, by, 'G6PD', 'knockdown,', mutants, of, p53, and, 'mitogen-activated', protein, kinase, '(', 'MAPK)', pathways, were, examined])].
[sujeto(['Neither', 'pmk-1', nor, 'mek-1', mutation, significantly, affected, egg, 'production,', whereas, 'sek-1', mutation, further]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([egg, production, in, 'G6PD-deficient', 'C'])].
[sujeto(['Intriguingly,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, function, of, 'sek-1', or, 'mek-1', dramatically, rescued, defective, hatching, '(', 8.3, -, and, 9.6, -, fold, 'increase,', 'respectively)', induced, by, 'G6PD', knockdown])].
[sujeto(['elegans,', which, are, possibly, associated, with]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([oxidative, stress, and, altered, 'MAPK', 'pathways,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['Novel', therapeutic, approaches, are]), verbo([required]), complemento([for, the, treatment, of, osteosarcoma])].
[sujeto(['Combination', chemotherapy, is, receiving]), verbo([increased]), complemento([attention, in, order, to, identify, compounds, that, may, increase, the, therapeutic, index, of, clinical, anticancer, drugs])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'regard,', naturally, occurring, molecules, with, antitumor, activity, and, with, limited, toxicity, to, normal, tissues]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, suggested, as, possible, candidates, for, investigation, of, their, synergistic, efficacy, in, combination, with, antineoplastic, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Relevantly,', 'Pi']), verbo([has]), complemento([emerged, as, an, important, signaling, molecule, capable, of, modulating, multiple, cellular, functions, by, altering, signal, transduction, 'pathways,', gene, expression, and, protein, abundance, in, many, cell, types])].
[sujeto(['Previously,', we, showed, that, 'Pi']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([proliferation, and, aggressiveness, of, 'U2OS', human, osteosarcoma, cells, and, that, 'Pi', is, capable, of, inducing, sensitization, of, osteosarcoma, cells, to, doxorubicin, in, a, 'p53-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Specifically,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([and, compare, the, antiproliferative, effects, of, a, combination, between, 'Pi', and, 'doxorubicin,', 'Taxol', and, 5, -, fluorouracil, '(', 5, -, 'FU)', treatments])].

[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'Pi', did, not, potentiate, the, anticancer, effects]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 5, -, 'FU'])].
[sujeto(['Oxidative', stress]), verbo([regulates]), complemento([the, activity, of, the, cell, survival, factor, 'PKB,', through, the, regulation, of, 'PtdIns(3,4,5)P&acirc;&sbquo;&fnof;', synthesis])].

[sujeto(['These', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, inhibition, of, 'PIP4K', signaling, might, be, useful, as, a, novel, strategy, to, increase, the, susceptibility, of, tumor, cells, to, therapeutics, that, function, through, increased, oxidative, stress])].

[sujeto([p53, is, a, 'cancer-related', transcriptional, 'factor,', and, its, 'DNA-binding', domain, '(', 'DBD)', contains, a, 'Zn2+,', which]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, be, important, for, aggregation, and, 'sequence-specific', 'DNA', binding])].

[sujeto(['The', insertion, of, 'Arg248', between, the, backbone, phosphate, groups, in, the, minor, groove]), verbo([caused]), complemento([a, narrowing, of, the, minor, 'groove,', which, is, not, seen, in, the, simulation, without, 'Zn2+'])].

[sujeto(['(', 'ABSTRACT', 'TRUNCATED', 'AT', 250, 'WORDS)', 'Activation', of, 'wild-type', p53, in, response, to, genotoxic, stress, occurs, through, different, mechanisms, including, protein, 'conformation,', posttranslational, 'modifications,', and]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento(['localization,', leading, to, 'DNA', binding, to, 'sequence-specific', promoters])].
[sujeto(['Zinc', ion, plays, a, crucial, role, in, stabilizing, 'p53/DNA']), verbo([binding]), complemento([to, induce, canonical, target, genes])].
[sujeto(['However,', whether, zinc, supplementation, might]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, beneficial, antitumor, effect, in, 'wild-type', 'p53-carrying', cells, in, combination, with, 'drugs,', has, not, been, addressed, so, far])].

[sujeto(['Yet,', for, 'decades,', the, 'small-molecule', restoration, of, 'wild-type', '(', 'WT)', p53, function, in, mutant, p53, tumors, '(', 'so-called', p53, mutant, '\'', 'reactivation\')']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, elusive, to, researchers])].
[sujeto(['The', p53, protein]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, binding, of, a, single, zinc, ion, for, proper, 'folding,', and, impairing, zinc, binding, is, a, major, mechanism, for, loss, of, function, in, missense, mutant, p53])].
[sujeto(['The', most, common, 'mutation,', 'R175H,', inactivates, p53, by, reducing, its, affinity, for, the, essential, zinc, 'ion,', leaving, the, mutant, protein, unable, to]), verbo([bind]), complemento([the, metal, in, the, low, '[', 'Zn(2+)]free', environment, of, the, cell])].
[sujeto(['The', exploratory, cancer, drug, zinc, 'metallochaperone-1', '(', 'ZMC1)', was, previously, demonstrated, to]), verbo([reactivate]), complemento([this, and, other, 'Zn(2+)-binding', mutants, by, binding, 'Zn(2+)', and, buffering, it, to, a, level, such, that, 'Zn(2+)', can, repopulate, the, defective, binding, 'site,', but, how, it, accomplishes, this, in, the, context, of, living, cells, and, organisms, is, unclear])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, demonstrated, that, 'ZMC1']), verbo([increases]), complemento([intracellular, '[', 'Zn(2+)]free', by, functioning, as, a, 'Zn(2+)', 'ionophore,', binding, 'Zn(2+)', in, the, extracellular, 'environment,', diffusing, across, the, plasma, 'membrane,', and, releasing, it, intracellularly])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, physical, mechanism, linking, zinc, 'metallochaperone-1', in, both, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, activities, and, define, the, remaining, critical, parameter, necessary, for, developing, synthetic, metallochaperones, for, clinical, use])].
