[sujeto(['Mechanistically,', 'DUSP16', silencing]), verbo([causes]), complemento([cellular, senescence, by, activating, the, tumor, suppressors, p53, and, 'Rb'])].
[sujeto(['Reactive', oxygen, species, '(', 'ROS)']), verbo([have]), complemento([an, important, role, in, regulating, various, cellular, processes])].
[sujeto(['Our', previous, study, confirmed, that, 'selenite,', an, 'anti-tumour', 'agent,']), verbo([triggered]), complemento([apoptosis, through, the, production, of, 'ROS', in, multiple, types, of, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, discovered, that, 'ROS', also]), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([protective, autophagy, by, decreasing, the, expression, of, 'ULK1,', an, initiator, of, 'autophagy,', in, 'selenite-treated', 'NB4', cells])].
[sujeto(['Further', experiments, demonstrated, that, 'p-p53', '(', 'S392),', a, phosphorylation, event]), verbo([promoted]), complemento([by, 'p70S6K,', bound, to, the, promoter, of, 'ULK1', and, modulated, its, expression])].
[sujeto(['Experiments', in, a, mouse, tumour, model, with, 'NB4', cells]), verbo([provided]), complemento([in, vivo, confirmation, of, the, alterations, in, the, 'p70S6K/p53/ULK1', axis])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, results, show, that, 'ROS']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([autophagy, by, downregulating, the, 'p70S6K/p53/ULK1', axis, in, 'selenite-treated', 'NB4', cells])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'XAF1', forms, a, positive, feedback, loop, with, p53, and, acts, as, a, molecular, switch, in, 'p53-mediated', 'cell-fate', decisions, favoring, apoptosis, over, 'cell-cycle', arrest])].
[sujeto(['XAF1']), verbo([binds]), complemento([directly, to, the, 'N-terminal', 'proline-rich', domain, of, p53, and, thus, interferes, with, 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase, 'MDM2', binding, and, ubiquitination, of, p53])].
[sujeto(['XAF1']), verbo([stimulates]), complemento(['homeodomain-interacting', protein, kinase, 2, '(', 'HIPK2)-mediated', 'Ser-46', phosphorylation, of, p53, by, blocking, 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase, 'Siah2', interaction, with, and, ubiquitination, of, 'HIPK2'])].
[sujeto(['XAF1', also, steps, up, the, termination, of, 'p53-mediated', 'cell-cycle']), verbo([arrest]), complemento([by, activating, zinc, finger, protein, 313, '(', 'ZNF313),', a, 'p21(WAF1)-targeting', ubiquitin, 'E3', ligase])].
[sujeto(['XAF1']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, 'p53,', 'Siah2,', and, 'ZNF313', through, the, zinc, finger, domains, 5, ',', 6, ',', and, 7, ',', 'respectively,', and, truncated, 'XAF1', isoforms, preferentially, expressed, in, cancer, cells, fail, to, form, a, feedback, loop, with, p53])].
[sujeto(['Leptin,', a, peripheral, signal, synthetized, by, the, adipocyte, to]), verbo([regulate]), complemento([energy, 'metabolism,', can, also, be, produced, by, 'placenta,', where, it, may, work, as, an, autocrine, hormone])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, that, leptin, promotes, proliferation, and, survival, of, trophoblastic, cells])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'work,', we, aimed, to, study, the, molecular, mechanisms, that]), verbo([mediate]), complemento([the, survival, effect, of, leptin, in, placenta])].
[sujeto(['We', tested, the, late, phase, of, 'apoptosis,']), verbo([triggered]), complemento([by, serum, 'deprivation,', by, studying, the, activation, of, 'Caspase-3', and, 'DNA', fragmentation])].
[sujeto(['Recombinant', human, leptin, added, to, 'BeWo', cell, line, and, human, placental, 'explants,', showed, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([on, 'Caspase-3', activation])].
[sujeto(['We', also]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, cleavage, of, 'Poly', '[', 'ADP-ribose]', 'polymerase-1', '(', 'PARP-1)', was, diminished, in, the, presence, of, leptin])].
[sujeto(['Placental', explants, cultivated, in, the, absence, of, serum, in, the, culture, media]), verbo([increased]), complemento([the, apoptotic, cleavage, of, 'DNA', and, this, effect, was, prevented, by, the, addition, of, 100, ng, 'leptin/ml'])].
[sujeto(['To', improve, the, understanding, of, leptin, mechanism, in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, process, of, apoptosis, we, determined, the, expression, of, different, intermediaries, in, the, apoptosis, cascade])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, under, serum, deprivation, 'conditions,', leptin, increased, the, 'anti-apoptotic', 'BCL-2', protein, 'expression,', while, downregulated, the, 'pro-apoptotic', 'BAX', and, 'BID', proteins, expression, in, 'Swan-71', cells, and, placental, explants])].
[sujeto(['Moreover', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'p53,', one, of, the, key, cell, 'cycle-signaling', 'proteins,', is, downregulated, in, the, presence, of, leptin, under, serum, deprivation])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, observed, 'anti-apoptotic', effect, of, leptin, in, placenta, is, in, part, mediated, by, the, p53, pathway])].
[sujeto(['In', 'conclusion,', we]), verbo([provide]), complemento([evidence, that, demonstrates, that, leptin, is, a, trophic, factor, for, trophoblastic, cells])].
[sujeto(['TET1', protein, is]), verbo([reported]), complemento([to, suppress, cancer, invasion, and, metastasis, in, prostate, and, breast, cancer, while, 'EZH2,', a, polycomb, group, 'protein,', has, been, identified, as, an, oncogene, in, many, types, of, cancers, including, gastric, cancer])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, there, is, an, inverse, relation, of, the, expression, pattern, of, 'TET1', and, 'EZH2', in, both, normal, gastric, mucosa, and, gastric, cancer])].
[sujeto(['In', gastric, 'mucosa,', 'EZH2', is, selectively]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, the, proliferating, neck, cells, while, 'TET1', and, 5, -, 'hydroxymethyl-cytosine', '(', 5, -, 'hmc)', exhibit, very, low, expression, in, the, neck, cells])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', in, proliferating, 'Ki67-positive', gastric, cancer, 'cells,', 'EZH2', is, highly]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([while, 'TET1', and, 5, -, hmc, expression, is, significantly, 'down-regulated'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'Tet1', overexpression]), verbo([induced]), complemento([p53, tumor, suppressor, protein])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, p53, protein, level, is, accompanied, by, the, phosphorylation, of, p53, by, activated, 'DNA-PK'])].
[sujeto(['Together,', these, results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([a, mechanism, by, which, 'TET1', suppresses, cancer, formation, by, coupling, 'DNA', demethylation, with, 'DNA-PK', activation, of, p53, and, suppression, of, oncogenic, protein, 'EZH2'])].
[sujeto(['Conversely,']), verbo([loss]), complemento([of, 'TET1', and, 5, -, hmc, expression, might, contribute, to, 'EZH2', 'up-regulation', during, gastric, cancer, development])].
[sujeto(['To', overcome, proteotoxic, stress, inherent, to, malignant, 'transformation,', cancer, cells]), verbo([induce]), complemento([a, range, of, adaptive, 'mechanisms,', with, the, master, transcription, factor, 'heat-shock', factor, 1, '(', 'HSF1)-orchestrated', response, taking, center, stage])].
[sujeto([mutp53, via, constitutive, stimulation, of, 'EGFR', and, 'ErbB2', signaling, hyperactivates, the, 'MAPK', and, 'PI3K', 'cascades,', which]), verbo([induce]), complemento([stabilization, and, phosphoactivation, of, 'HSF1', on, 'Ser326'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', mutp53, protein, via, direct, interaction, with]), verbo([activated]), complemento(['p-Ser326', 'HSF1', facilitates, 'HSF1', recruitment, to, its, specific, 'DNA-binding', elements, and, stimulates, transcription, of, 'heat-shock', proteins, including, 'Hsp90'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'turn,']), verbo([induced]), complemento(['Hsp90', stabilizes, its, oncogenic, clients, including, 'EGFR,', 'ErbB2', and, 'mutp53,', thereby, further, reinforcing, oncogenic, signaling])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', mutp53, initiates, a, feed, forward, loop, that, renders, cancer, cells, more, resistant, to, adverse, 'conditions,']), verbo([providing]), complemento([a, strong, survival, advantage])].
[sujeto(['DS-7423,', a, 'novel,', 'small-molecule', dual, inhibitor, of, 'phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase', '(', 'PI3K)', and, mammalian]), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR),', is, currently, in, phase, 'I', clinical, trials, for, solid, tumors])].
[sujeto(['Although', 'DS-7423', potently]), verbo([inhibits]), complemento(['PI3K&Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'IC50&acirc;&euro;&Scaron;=', 15.6, 'nM)', and, mTOR, '(', 'IC50&acirc;&euro;&Scaron;=', 34.9, 'nM),', it, also, inhibits, other, isoforms, of, class, 'I', 'PI3K', '(', 'IC50', 'values:', 'PI3K&Icirc;&sup2;&acirc;&euro;&Scaron;=', 1, ',', 143, 'nM;', 'PI3K&Icirc;&sup3;&acirc;&euro;&Scaron;=', 249, 'nM;', 'PI3K&Icirc;&acute;&acirc;&euro;&Scaron;=', 262, 'nM)'])].
[sujeto(['The', 'PI3K/mTOR', pathway, is, frequently]), verbo([activated]), complemento([in, ovarian, clear, cell, adenocarcinomas, '(', 'OCCA)', through, various, mutations, that, activate, 'PI3K-AKT', signaling])].
[sujeto(['In', mouse, xenograft, 'models,', 'DS-7423']), verbo([suppressed]), complemento([the, tumor, growth, of, 'OCCA', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Flow', cytometry, analysis, revealed, a]), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'S-phase', cell, populations, in, all, the, cell, lines, and, an, increase, in, 'sub-G1', cell, populations, following, treatment, with, 'DS-7423', in, six, of, the, nine, 'OCCA', cell, lines, tested])].
[sujeto(['DS-7423-mediated', apoptosis, was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([more, effectively, in, the, six, cell, lines, without, 'TP53', mutations, than, in, the, three, cell, lines, with, 'TP53', mutations])].
[sujeto(['Concomitantly', with, the]), verbo([decreased]), complemento([phosphorylation, level, of, 'MDM2', '(', mouse, double, minute, 2, 'homolog),', the, level, of, phosphorylation, of, 'TP53', at, 'Ser46', was, increased, by, 'DS-7423', in, the, six, cell, lines, with, 'wild-type', 'TP53,', with, induction, of, genes, that, mediate, 'TP53-dependent', 'apoptosis,', including, p53AIP1, and, 'PUMA', at, 39, nM, or, higher, doses])].
[sujeto(['Our', data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, the, dual, 'PI3K/mTOR', inhibitor, 'DS-7423', may, constitute, a, promising, molecular, targeted, therapy, for, 'OCCA,', and, that, its, antitumor, effect, might, be, partly, obtained, by, induction, of, 'TP53-dependent', apoptosis, in, 'TP53', 'wild-type', 'OCCAs'])].
[sujeto(['Nutlin-3,', a, 'MDM2', 'antagonist,']), verbo([has]), complemento([antitumor, activity, in, various, cancers])].
[sujeto(['We', demonstrated, that, 'Nutlin-3']), verbo([induced]), complemento([apoptosis, through, 'down-regulation', 'phospho-Ser392-p53', in, two, 'HCC', cells])].
[sujeto(['The', result]), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, inhibition, of, p53, phosphorylation, on, 'Ser392', presents, an, alternative, for, 'HCC', chemotherapy])].
[sujeto(['The', p90, ribosomal, 'S6', kinase, '(', 'RSK)', family, is, a, group, of, highly]), verbo([conserved]), complemento(['Ser/Thr', kinases, that, promote, cell, 'proliferation,', 'growth,', motility, and, survival])].
[sujeto(['As', they, are, almost, exclusively]), verbo([activated]), complemento([downstream, of, extracellular, 'signal-regulated', kinases, 1, and, 2, '(', 'ERK1/2),', therapeutic, intervention, by, 'RSK', inhibition, is, less, likely, to, produce, such, severe, side, effects, as, those, observed, following, inhibition, of, the, upstream, master, regulators, 'Raf,', 'MEK', and, 'ERK1/2'])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'BI-D1870,', a, potent, small, molecule, inhibitor, of, 'RSKs,', induces, 'apoptosis,', although, 'preferentially,', in, a, 'p21-deficient', background])].
[sujeto(['On', the, other, 'hand,', 'BI-D1870', also]), verbo([induces]), complemento([a, strong, 'transcription-', and, 'p53-independent', accumulation, of, p21, protein, and, protects, cells, from, gamma, irradiation, '(', &, 'Icirc;&sup3;IR)-induced', 'apoptosis,', driving, them, into, senescence, even, in, the, absence, of, &, 'Icirc;&sup3;IR'])].
[sujeto(['Although', we, identified, p21, in, in, vitro, kinase, assays, as, a, novel, 'RSK', substrate, that, specifically, becomes, phosphorylated, by, 'RSK1-3', at, 'Ser116', and, 'Ser146,', 'RNA-interference,', overexpression, and, 'co-immunoprecipitation', studies, as, well, as, the, use, of, 'SL0101,', another, specific, 'RSK', 'inhibitor,', revealed, that, 'BI-D1870']), verbo([mediates]), complemento([p21, accumulation, via, a, yet, unknown, pathway, 'that,', besides, its, 'off-site', targets, 'polo-like', 'kinase-1', and, 'AuroraB,', also, does, also, not, involve, 'RSKs'])].
[sujeto(['Cancer', control, by, adaptive, immunity]), verbo([involves]), complemento([a, number, of, defined, death, and, clearance, mechanisms])].
[sujeto(['However,', efficient, inhibition, of, exponential, cancer, growth, by, 'T', cells, and, 'interferon-&Icirc;&sup3;', '(', 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;)']), verbo([requires]), complemento([additional, undefined, mechanisms, that, arrest, cancer, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, show, that, the, combined, action, of, the, 'T-helper-1-cell', cytokines, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', and, tumour, necrosis, factor, '(', 'TNF)', directly]), verbo([induces]), complemento([permanent, growth, arrest, in, cancers])].
[sujeto(['To', safely, separate, senescence]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, tumour, immunity, from, 'oncogene-induced', 'senescence,', we, used, a, mouse, model, in, which, the, 'Simian', virus, 40, large, 'T', antigen, '(', 'Tag)', expressed, under, the, control, of, the, rat, insulin, promoter, creates, tumours, by, attenuating, 'p53-', and, 'Rb-mediated', cell, cycle, control])].
[sujeto(['When', 'combined,', 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', and, 'TNF', drive, 'Tag-expressing', cancers, into, senescence, by]), verbo([inducing]), complemento([permanent, growth, arrest, in, 'G1/G0,', activation, of, p16INK4a, '(', also, known, as, 'CDKN2A),', and, downstream, 'Rb', hypophosphorylation, at, 'serine&acirc;&euro;&permil;795'])].
[sujeto(['This', 'cytokine-induced', senescence, strictly]), verbo([requires]), complemento(['STAT1', and, 'TNFR1', '(', also, known, as, 'TNFRSF1A)', signalling, in, addition, to, p16INK4a])].
[sujeto(['In', 'vivo,', 'Tag-specific', 'T-helper', 1, cells, permanently]), verbo([arrest]), complemento(['Tag-expressing', cancers, by, inducing, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;-', and, 'TNFR1-dependent', senescence])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', as, 'IFN-&Icirc;&sup3;', and, 'TNF']), verbo([induce]), complemento([senescence, in, numerous, murine, and, human, 'cancers,', this, may, be, a, general, mechanism, for, arresting, cancer, progression])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([previously, demonstrated, that, green, tea, polyphenols, '(', 'GTP)', induce, apoptosis, in, prostate, cancer, cells, irrespective, of, p53, status])].
[sujeto(['GTP', treatment]), verbo([induced]), complemento([p53, stabilization, and, activation, of, downstream, targets, 'p21/waf1', and, 'Bax', in, a, 'dose-dependent', manner, specifically, in, 'LNCaPshV', cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'GTP-induced', 'FAS', upregulation, through, activation, of, 'c-jun-N-terminal', kinase, resulted, in, 'FADD', 'phosphorylation,', 'caspase-8', activation, and, truncation, of, 'BID,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, apoptosis, in, both, 'LNCaPshV', and, 'LNCaPshp53', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', 'parallel,', treatment, of, cells, with, 'GTP', resulted, in, inhibition, of, survival, 'pathway,']), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'Akt', deactivation, and, loss, of, 'BAD', phosphorylation, more, prominently, in, 'LNCaPshp53', cells])].
[sujeto(['These', distinct, routes, of, cell, death, converged, to, a, common, 'pathway,']), verbo([leading]), complemento([to, loss, of, mitochondrial, transmembrane, 'potential,', cytochrome, c, release, and, activation, of, terminal, 'caspases,', resulting, in, 'PARP-cleavage'])].
[sujeto(['GTP-induced', apoptosis, was, attenuated, with, 'JNK', 'inhibitor,', 'SP600125', in, both, cell, 'lines;', whereas, 'PI3K-Akt', 'inhibitor,', 'LY294002', resulted, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([cell, death, prominently, in, 'LNCaPshp53', 'cells,', establishing, the, role, of, two, distinct, pathways, of, 'GTP-mediated', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', 'GTP', exposure, resulted, in, inhibition, of, class, 'I', 'HDAC', 'protein,', accumulation, of, acetylated, 'histone-H3', in, total, cellular, 'chromatin,', resulting, in]), verbo([increased]), complemento([accessibility, of, transcription, factors, to, bind, with, the, promoter, sequences, of, 'p21/waf1', and, 'Bax,', regardless, of, the, p53, status, of, 'cells,', consistent, with, effects, elicited, by, an, 'HDAC', 'inhibitor,', trichostatin, 'A'])].
[sujeto(['These', results, demonstrate, that, 'GTP']), verbo([induces]), complemento([prostate, cancer, cell, death, by, two, distinct, mechanisms, regardless, of, p53, 'status,', thus, identifying, specific, 'well-defined', molecular, mechanisms, that, may, be, targeted, by, chemopreventive, 'and/or', therapeutic, strategies])].
[sujeto(['Interaction', of, 'non-structural', protein, 5, 'A', '(', 'NS5A)', of, 'Hepatitis', 'C', virus, '(', 'HCV)', with, human, kinases, 'namely,', casein, kinase, 1, &, 'Icirc;&plusmn;', '(', 'ck1&Icirc;&plusmn;)', and, protein, kinase, 'R', '(', 'PKR)']), verbo([have]), complemento([different, functional, implications, such, as, regulation, of, viral, replication, and, evasion, of, interferon, induced, immune, response, respectively])].
[sujeto(['A', structural, model, of, 'NS5A', peptide, containing, phosphoacceptor, residue, 'Serine', 232]), verbo([bound]), complemento([to, 'ck1&Icirc;&plusmn;', has, been, generated, using, the, known, 3, -, 'D', structures, of, 'kinase-peptide', complexes])].
[sujeto(['The', substrate]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([residues, in, 'ck1&Icirc;&plusmn;', has, been, identified, from, the, model, and, these, are, found, to, be, conserved, well, in, the, ck1, family])].
[sujeto(['ck1&Icirc;&plusmn;', -, substrate, peptide, complex]), verbo([has]), complemento([also, been, used, to, understand, the, structural, basis, of, association, between, 'ck1&Icirc;&plusmn;', and, its, other, viral, stress, induced, 'substrate,', tumour, suppressor, p53, transactivation, domain, which, has, a, crystal, structure, available])].
[sujeto(['NS5A', from, genotype, 1, b]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, to, interact, and, inhibit, 'PKR', whereas, 'NS5A', from, genotype, 2, 'a/3a', are, unable, to, bind, and, inhibit, 'PKR', efficiently])].
[sujeto(['Using', 'PKR', crystal, 'structure,', sequence, alignment, and, evolutionary, trace, analysis, some, of, the, critical, residues, responsible, for, the, interaction, of, 'NS5A', 1, b, with, 'PKR']), verbo([have]), complemento([been, identified])].
[sujeto(['The', substrate]), verbo([interacting]), complemento([residues, in, 'ck1&Icirc;&plusmn;', have, been, identified, using, the, structural, model, of, kinase, -, substrate, peptide])].
[sujeto(['The', 'PKR']), verbo([interacting]), complemento(['NS5A', 1, b, residues, have, also, been, predicted, using, 'PKR', crystal, 'structure,', 'NS5A', sequence, analysis, along, with, known, experimental, results])].
[sujeto(['Designing', inhibitors, to]), verbo([prevent]), complemento([this, interaction, could, enable, the, 'HCV', genotype, 1, infected, patients, respond, well, to, interferon, therapy])].
[sujeto(['Structural', and, biophysical, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, that, 'MDM2', binding, could, be, regulated, by, the, dynamics, of, a, 'pseudo-substrate', lid, motif])].
[sujeto(['However,', these, experiments, and, subsequent, computational, studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([produced, conflicting, mechanistic, models, of, 'MDM2', function, and, dynamics])].
[sujeto(['We', propose, a, unifying, conformational, selection, model, that, can, reconcile, experimental, findings, and]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, fundamental, role, of, the, lid, as, a, dynamic, regulator, of, 'MDM2-mediated', binding])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, dynamic, equilibrium, between, &, 'quot;closed&quot;', and, &, 'quot;semi-closed&quot;', lid, forms, may, be, a, fundamental, characteristic, of, 'MDM2', regulatory, 'interactions,', which, can, be, modulated, by, 'phosphorylation,', phosphomimetic, mutation, as, well, as, by, the, lid, size])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, revealed, that, these, factors, may]), verbo([regulate]), complemento(['p53-MDM2', binding, by, 'fine-tuning', the, thermodynamic, equilibrium, between, preexisting, conformational, states, of, 'apo-MDM2'])].
[sujeto(['The', dominant, &, 'quot;semi-closed&quot;', lid, form, and, weakened, dependence, on, the, phosphorylation, seen, in, simulations, with, the, complete, lid, can]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, rationale, for, binding, of, small, 'p53-based', mimetics, and, inhibitors, without, a, direct, competition, with, the, lid, dynamics])].
[sujeto(['The', results]), verbo([suggested]), complemento([that, a, conformational, selection, model, of, preexisting, 'MDM2', states, may, provide, a, robust, theoretical, framework, for, understanding, 'MDM2', dynamics])].
[sujeto(['Probing', biological, functions, and, mechanisms, of, 'MDM2', regulation, would]), verbo([require]), complemento([further, integration, of, computational, and, experimental, studies, and, may, help, to, guide, drug, design, of, novel, 'anti-cancer', therapeutics])].
[sujeto(['Polyphenols', as, &, 'quot;sensitizers&quot;', together, with, cytotoxic, drugs, as, &, 'quot;inducers&quot;', cooperate, to]), verbo([trigger]), complemento([apoptosis, in, various, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Hence,', their, combination, having, similar, mode, of, mechanism, may, be, a, novel, approach, to]), verbo([enhance]), complemento([the, efficacy, of, inducers])].
[sujeto(['Additionally,', this, will, also, enable, to, achieve, the, physiological, concentrations, facilitating, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, the, activity, at, concentrations, which, the, compound, can, individually, provide])].
[sujeto([6, h, 'pre-treated', cells, with, 10, &, 'Acirc;&micro;M', 'RES/CUR', and, 100, &, 'Acirc;&micro;M', 'RES/30', &, 'Acirc;&micro;M', 'CUR', 'doses,', followed, by, 10, &, 'Acirc;&micro;M', 'CC', for, 18, h, were, investigated, for, 'Ser-167', 'ER-phosphorylation,', cell, cycle, 'arrest,', redox, 'homeostasis,', stress]), verbo([activated]), complemento([protein, kinase, '(', 'SAPKs:', 'JNK', and, p38, 'MAPK)', pathways, and, downstream, apoptosis, effectors])].
[sujeto(['Low', dose, 'RES/CUR']), verbo([enhances]), complemento([the, 'CC', action, through, 'ROS', mediated, 'JNK/p38', as, well, as, mitochondrial, pathway, in, 'MCF-7', cells])].
[sujeto(['However,', 'RES/CUR', sensitization]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([apoptosis, in, p53, mutant, 'MDA', 'MB-231', cells, 'without/with', involvement, of, 'ROS', mediated, 'JNK/p38', adjunct, to, 'Caspase-9'])].
[sujeto(['This', may, offer, a, novel, approach, to, achieve]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([action, of, 'CC', with, concomitant, reduction, of, side, effects, enabling, improved, management, of, 'hormone-dependent', breast, cancer])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([found, significant, elevation, of, 'O(6)', methylguanine, 'DNA', methyl, transferase, '(', 'MGMT)', expression, in, a, small, sample, of, consecutive, patients, who, have, failed, tamoxifen, treatment])].
[sujeto(['Further', we, show, that, administration, of, the, 'MGMT', 'inhibitor,', 'O(6)-benzylguanine', '(', 'BG),', at, nontoxic, 'doses,']), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, restoration, of, a, favorable, estrogen, receptor, alpha, '(', 'ER&Icirc;&plusmn;)', phosphorylation, phenotype, '(', high, 'p-ER&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'Ser167/low', 'p-ER&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'Ser118),', which, has, been, reported, to, correlate, with, sensitivity, to, endocrine, therapy, and, improved, survival])].
[sujeto(['In', 'tamoxifen-resistant', breast, cancer, 'cells,', 'BG', alone, or, in, combination, with, antiestrogen, '(', tamoxifen, '[', 'TAM]/ICI', 182, ',', 780, '[', 'fulvestrant,', 'Faslodex])', therapy]), verbo([enhances]), complemento([p53, upregulated, modulator, of, apoptosis, '(', 'PUMA)', 'expression,', cytochrome, 'C', release, and, poly, '(', 'ADP-ribose)', polymerase, '(', 'PARP)', 'cleavage,', all, indicative, of, apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'BG']), verbo([increases]), complemento([the, expression, of, 'p21(cip1/waf1)'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'tamoxifen-resistant', 'MCF7', breast, cancer, 'xenografts,', 'BG', alone, or, in, combination, treatment]), verbo([causes]), complemento([significant, delay, in, tumor, growth])].
[sujeto(['Immunohistochemistry', confirms, that, 'BG']), verbo([increases]), complemento(['p21(cip1/waf1)', and, 'p-ER&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'Ser167', expression, and, inhibits, 'MGMT,', 'ER&Icirc;&plusmn;,', 'p-ER&Icirc;&plusmn;', 'Ser118', and, 'ki-67', expression])].
[sujeto(['Collectively,', our, results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'MGMT', inhibition, leads, to, growth, inhibition, of, 'tamoxifen-resistant', breast, cancer, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, and, resensitizes, 'tamoxifen-resistant', breast, cancer, cells, to, antiestrogen, therapy])].
[sujeto(['These', findings]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'MGMT', inhibition, may, provide, a, novel, therapeutic, strategy, for, overcoming, antiestrogen, resistance])].
[sujeto(['The', 'E3', ubiquitin, ligase, 'MDM2', functions, as, a, crucial, negative, regulator, of, the, p53, tumor, suppressor, protein, by, antagonizing, p53, transactivation, activity, and]), verbo([targeting]), complemento([p53, for, degradation])].
[sujeto(['Cellular', stress]), verbo([activates]), complemento([p53, by, alleviating, 'MDM2-mediated', functional, 'inhibition,', even, though, the, molecular, mechanisms, of, 'stress-induced', p53, activation, still, remain, poorly, understood])].
[sujeto(['Two', opposing, models]), verbo([have]), complemento([been, proposed, to, describe, the, functional, and, structural, role, in, p53, activation, of, 'Ser17', phosphorylation, in, the, 'N-terminal', &, 'quot;lid&quot;', '(', residues, 1, -, 24, ')', of, 'MDM2'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, lid, is, partially, structured, in, 'apo-MDM2', and, occludes, p53, peptide, binding, in, a, ligand, 'size-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['Importantly,', neither, 'Ser17', phosphorylation, nor, the, 'phospho-mimetic', mutation, 'S17D']), verbo([has]), complemento([any, functional, impact, on, p53, peptide, binding, to, 'MDM2'])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, demonstrate, that, 'Ser17', phosphorylation, is, functionally, neutral, with, respect, to, p53, 'binding,']), verbo([suggesting]), complemento([that, 'MDM2', phosphorylation, at, a, single, site, is, unlikely, to, play, a, dominant, role, in, 'stress-induced', p53, activation])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, demonstrate, that, nucleotide, excision, repair, '(', 'NER)', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, the, 'ATR/p53', checkpoint, via, modulation, of, 'XPA', nuclear, import, and, that, this, regulation, occurs, in, a, cell, 'cycle-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto(['We', show, that, depletion, of, p53, abrogated, the, 'UV-induced']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([translocation, of, 'XPA,', while, silencing, of, 'Chk1', or, 'MAPKAP', 'Kinase-2', '(', 'MK2)', had, no, effect])].
[sujeto(['Inhibition', of, p53, transcriptional, activities, and, silencing, of, 'p53-Ser15', phosphorylation, also, reduced, the, 'damage-induced', 'XPA']), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([import])].
[sujeto(['By', 'contrast,', while, most, of, the, 'XPA', in, 'S-phase', cells, was, initially, located, in, the, cytoplasm, before, 'DNA', 'damage,', 'UV', irradiation]), verbo([stimulated]), complemento([bulk, import, of, 'XPA', into, the, nucleus])].
[sujeto(['Our', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, upon, 'DNA', damage, in, 'S', 'phase,', 'NER', could, be, regulated, by, the, 'ATR/p53-dependent', checkpoint, via, modulation, of, the, 'XPA', nuclear, import, process])].
[sujeto(['In', 'contrast,', the]), verbo([nuclear]), complemento([import, of, 'XPA', in, 'G(1)', or, 'G(2)', phase, appears, to, be, largely, independent, of, 'DNA', damage, and, p53])].
[sujeto(['The', phosphatase, and, tensin, homolog, gene, '(', 'PTEN)', on, chromosome, 10, controls, the, first, step, in, the, phosphatidylinositol, 3, kinase, '(', 'PI3K)-Akt-mammalian']), verbo([target]), complemento([of, rapamycin, '(', 'mTOR)', pathway, and, is, genetically, inactivated, in, many, solid, tumors])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([find]), complemento([an, absence, of, 'PTEN', 'deletions,', 'mutations,', or, protein, mislocalization, in, 'PEL'])].
[sujeto(['However,', we]), verbo([find]), complemento([consistent, hyperphosphorylation, at, serine, 380, of, 'PTEN,', which, is, an, inactivating, 'modification,', in, 'PEL', cell, lines, and, in, tumor, xenografts])].
[sujeto(['Reintroduction', of, 'PTEN', into, 'PEL']), verbo([inhibited]), complemento([colony, formation, in, soft, 'agar,', verifying, the, functional, dependence, of, 'PEL', on, 'PI3K', signaling])].
[sujeto(['Protein', kinase, 'CK2']), verbo([has]), complemento([many, established, in, vitro, 'substrates,', but, it, is, only, within, the, past, few, years, that, we, have, begun, to, ascertain, which, of, these, are, its, real, physiological, 'targets,', how, their, phosphorylation, may, contribute, towards, regulating, normal, cell, 'physiology,', and, how, phosphorylation, of, these, proteins, might, influence, the, development, of, diseases, such, as, cancer])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, physiological, nature, of, this, interaction]), verbo([has]), complemento([never, been, fully, established])].
[sujeto(['In', the, present, 'article,', we, summarise, a, recent, study, from, our, laboratory, showing, that, phosphorylation, of, p53, at, 'Ser392,', the, sole, site, modified, by, 'CK2', in, 'vitro,', is]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, a, novel, mechanism, where, the, stoichiometry, of, phosphorylation, is, governed, by, the, rate, of, turnover, of, the, p53, protein])].
[sujeto(['We', consider, the, possible, role, of, 'CK2', in]), verbo([regulating]), complemento([the, p53, response, in, a, wider, context, and, suggest, key, issues, that, should, be, addressed, experimentally, to, provide, a, more, cohesive, picture, of, the, relationship, between, this, important, protein, kinase, and, a, pivotal, 'anti-cancer', surveillance, system, in, cells])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([a, new, electrochemical, immunosensor, for, ultrasensitive, detection, of, phosphorylated, p53, at, 'Ser392', '(', 'phospho-p53(392))', based, on, graphene, oxide, '(', 'GO)', as, a, nanocarrier, in, a, multienzyme, amplification, strategy])].
[sujeto(['Greatly']), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([sensitivity, was, achieved, by, using, the, bioconjugates, featuring, horseradish, peroxidase, '(', 'HRP)', and, 'p53(392)', signal, antibody, '(', 'p53(392)Ab(2))', linked, to, functionalized, 'GO', '(', 'HRP-p53(392)Ab(2)-GO)', at, a, high, ratio, of, 'HRP/p53(392)Ab(2)'])].
[sujeto(['The']), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, response, current, was, proportional, to, the, 'phospho-p53(392)', concentration, in, the, range, of, 0.02, -, 2, nM, with, the, detection, limit, of, 0.01, 'nM,', which, was, 10, -, fold, lower, than, that, of, the, traditional, sandwich, electrochemical, measurement, for, 'p53(392)'])].
[sujeto(['The', responses, of, epidermal, 'TP53', from, organ, cultured, skin, irradiated, in, medium, with, and, without, serum, were]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, be, similar])].
[sujeto(['After', an, initial]), verbo([increase]), complemento([at, 4, 'h,', the, 'TP53', 'D01', signal, returned, to, low, 'steady-state', levels, for, at, least, 72, h])].
[sujeto(['After', irradiation, and, 'incubation,', the, epidermis, was, removed, and, assayed, by, 'Western', blotting, and, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([to, have, increases, in, the, 'TP53', 'D01', epitope, and, the, 'TP53', phosphoserine, 15, '(', 'TP53-S15p)', epitope, that, reached, a, maximum, at, about, 3, h])].
[sujeto(['When', the, dermis, was, compared, to, 'epidermis,', it, was]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, dermis, had, a, smaller, response, to, radiation, and, more, phosphorylated, 'TP53'])].
[sujeto(['Polo-like', kinase, 4, is, essential, for, centrosome, 'duplication,', but, its, hyperactivation]), verbo([causes]), complemento([supernumerary, centrosomes])].
[sujeto(['Here', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([that, 'polo-like', kinase, 4, is, directly, phosphorylated, and, activated, by, 'stress-activated', protein, kinase, kinase, kinases, '(', 'SAPKKKs)'])].
[sujeto(['Stress-induced', 'polo-like', kinase, 4, activation]), verbo([promotes]), complemento([centrosome, 'duplication,', whereas, 'stress-induced', 'SAPK', activation, prevents, centrosome, duplication])].
[sujeto(['In', the, early, phase, of, stress, 'response,', the, balance, of, these, opposing, signals]), verbo([prevents]), complemento([centrosome, overduplication])].
[sujeto(['However,', in, the, late, phase, of, stress, 'response,', p53, downregulates, 'polo-like', kinase, 4, 'expression,', thereby]), verbo([preventing]), complemento([sustained, 'polo-like', kinase, 4, activity, and, centrosome, amplification])].
[sujeto(['If', both, p53, and, the, 'SAPKK', 'MKK4', are, simultaneously, 'inactivated,', as, is, frequently]), verbo([found]), complemento([in, cancer, 'cells,', persistent, 'polo-like', kinase, 4, activity, combined, with, the, lack, of, 'SAPK-mediated', inhibition, of, centrosome, duplication, conspire, to, induce, supernumerary, centrosomes, under, stress])].
[sujeto(['Indeed,', 'tumour-derived', 'MKK4', mutants]), verbo([induced]), complemento([centrosome, amplification, under, genotoxic, 'stress,', but, only, in, 'p53-negative', cells])].
[sujeto(['Thus,', our, results]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, mechanism, that, preserves, the, numeral, integrity, of, 'centrosomes,', and, an, unexplored, 'tumour-suppressive', function, of, 'MKK4'])].
[sujeto(['Gambogic', acid, '(', 'GA)']), verbo([has]), complemento([been, wildly, studied, to, show, potent, 'anti-tumor', effects, in, vivo, and, in, vitro])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([confirmed, that, 'GA', stabilized, and, activated, p53, through, 'down-regulating', the, expression, of, 'MDM2', in, variety, of, cancer, cell, lines])].
[sujeto(['Therefore,', questions, of, whether, 'GA']), verbo([induces]), complemento(['post-translational', modifications, of, p53, and, subsequent, activation, of, 'p53;', and, if, that, is, the, 'case,', which, upstream, signaling, 'pathway(s)', is, '(', 'are)', responsible, for, that, are, proposed])].
[sujeto(['GA']), verbo([induces]), complemento([p53, phosphorylation, at, sites, 'Ser15', and, 'Ser20', in, a, 'concentration-', or, 'time-dependent', 'way,', which, was, a, direct, result, of, 'DNA', 'damage,', as, 'gamma-HA2X', foci, and, '\'', 'comet\'', 'DNA', fragments, were, detected])].
[sujeto(['GA']), verbo([induces]), complemento([p53, phosphorylation, through, activation, of, an, 'ATM-', and, 'Rad3-related', 'pathway,', and, 'GA-induced', phosphorylation, of, 'Chk1', is, also, involved])].
[sujeto(['Upon', treatment, with, 'GA,', 'ATR', activation, is, clearly, associated, with, p53, 'phosphorylation,', as, well, as, activation, of, its]), verbo([target]), complemento([gene, 'p21(Waf/CIP1)'])].
[sujeto(['Furthermore,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([the, dephosphorylation, of, 'Cdk1', at, 'Thr161', induced, by, 'GA', was, 'abrogated,', followed, by, a, remarkable, disruption, of, 'G2/M', arrest, when, the, cells, were, 'pre-incubated', with, caffeine])].
[sujeto(['Interestingly,', the, sensitivity, to, caffeine]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, cytotoxicity, of, 'GA', as, well])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', these, data, showed, an, important, role, of, the, 'DNA', damage, response]), verbo([mediated]), complemento([by, 'ATR-Chk1', in, 'p53/p21(Waf/CIP1)', activation, and, downstream, 'G2/M', arrest, during, 'GA', treatment])].
[sujeto(['Upon', prolonged]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, 'mitosis,', cells, undergo, adaptation, and, exit, mitosis, without, cell, division])].
[sujeto(['These', tetraploid, cells, are, either, eliminated, by, apoptosis, or]), verbo([arrested]), complemento([in, the, subsequent, 'G(1)', phase, in, a, spindle, 'checkpoint-', and, 'p53-dependent', manner])].
[sujeto([p53]), verbo([has]), complemento([long, been, known, to, be, activated, by, spindle, 'poisons,', such, as, nocodazole, and, 'Taxol,', although, the, underlying, mechanism, remains, elusive])].
[sujeto(['Here', we, present, evidence, that, stabilization, and, activation, of, p53, by, spindle, disruption]), verbo([requires]), complemento([the, spindle, checkpoint, kinase, 'TTK/hMps1'])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', at, 'Thr18']), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['p53-dependent', activation, of, not, only, p21, but, also, 'Lats2,', two, mediators, of, the, postmitotic, checkpoint])].
[sujeto(['Our', findings, therefore]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanism, connecting, the, spindle, checkpoint, with, p53, in, the, maintenance, of, genome, stability])].
[sujeto(['We', previously]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, 'pro-apoptotic', 'DNA', damaging, 'agent,', 'cisplatin,', mediated, the, 'proteasome-dependent', degradation, of, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, associated, with, its, increased, phosphorylated, status])].
[sujeto(['Since', 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, usually, plays, an, opposite, role, to, p53, and, 'TAp63', in, human, 'cancers,', we, tested, the, notion, that, phosphorylation, events]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'DNA', damage, would, affect, the, protein, degradation, of, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, in, 'HNSCC', cells, upon, cisplatin, exposure])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, is, phosphorylated, in, the, 'time-dependent', fashion, at, the, following, 'positions:', 'S385,', 'T397', and, 'S466,', which, were, surrounded, by, recognition, motifs, for, 'ATM,', 'CDK2', and, p70s6K, 'kinases,', respectively])].
[sujeto(['We', showed, that, chemical, agents, or, siRNA]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([the, activity, of, 'ATM,', 'CDK2', and, p70s6K, kinases, blocked, degradation, of, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, in, 'HNSCC', cells, after, cisplatin, exposure])].
[sujeto(['Site-specific', mutagenesis, of, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, residues]), verbo([targeted]), complemento([for, phosphorylation, by, 'ATM,', 'CDK2', or, p70s6k, led, to, dramatic, modulation, of, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, degradation])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', we, demonstrated, that, the, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, protein, is, a]), verbo([target]), complemento([for, direct, in, vitro, phosphorylation, by, 'ATM,', 'CDK2', or, p70s6K])].
[sujeto(['Our', results, implicate, specific, 'kinases,', and]), verbo([target]), complemento([phosphorylation, sites, in, the, degradation, of, 'Delta', 'Np63', alpha, following, 'DNA', damage])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, showed, that, pretreatment, with, 'Andro', significantly]), verbo([enhances]), complemento(['TRAIL-induced', apoptosis, in, various, human, cancer, cell, 'lines,', including, those, 'TRAIL-resistant', cells])].
[sujeto(['In', search, of, the, molecular, mechanisms, responsible, for, 'DR4', 'up-regulation,', we]), verbo([found]), complemento([that, the, tumor, suppressor, p53, plays, an, essential, role, in, 'DR4', transcriptional, activation])].
[sujeto(['Andro', is, capable, of]), verbo([activating]), complemento([p53, via, increased, p53, phosphorylation, and, protein, 'stabilization,', a, process, mediated, by, enhanced, reactive, oxygen, species, production, and, subsequent, 'c-Jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', kinase, activation])].
[sujeto(['Pretreatment', with, an, antioxidant, '(', 'N-acetylcysteine)', or, a, 'c-Jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', kinase, inhibitor, '(', 'SP600125)', effectively]), verbo([prevented]), complemento(['Andro-induced', p53, activation, and, 'DR4', 'up-regulation', and, eventually, blocked, the, 'Andro-induced', sensitization, on, 'TRAIL-induced', apoptosis])].
[sujeto(['Earlier', studies]), verbo([have]), complemento([demonstrated, a, functional, link, between, 'B56gamma-specific', protein, phosphatase, 2, 'A', '(', 'B56gamma-PP2A)', and, p53, tumor, suppressor, activity])].
[sujeto(['Upon', 'DNA', 'damage,', a, complex, including, 'B56gamma-PP2A', and, p53, is, formed, which]), verbo([leads]), complemento([to, 'Thr55', dephosphorylation, of, 'p53,', induction, of, the, p53, transcriptional, target, 'p21,', and, the, inhibition, of, cell, proliferation])].
[sujeto(['Although', an]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([interaction, between, p53, and, 'B56gamma', is, observed, after, 'DNA', 'damage,', the, underlying, mechanism, and, its, significance, in, 'PP2A', 'tumor-suppressive', function, remain, unclear])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, show, that, the]), verbo([increased]), complemento([interaction, between, 'B56gamma', and, p53, after, 'DNA', damage, requires, 'ATM-dependent', phosphorylation, of, p53, at, 'Ser15'])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', we, demonstrate, that, the, 'B56gamma3-induced', inhibition, of, cell, 'proliferation,', induction, of, cell, cycle]), verbo([arrest]), complemento([in, 'G(1),', and, blockage, of, 'anchorage-independent', growth, are, also, dependent, on, 'Ser15', phosphorylation, of, p53, and, 'p53-B56gamma', interaction])].
[sujeto(['Taken', 'together,', our, results]), verbo([provide]), complemento([a, mechanistic, link, between, 'Ser15', 'phosphorylation-mediated', 'p53-B56gamma', interaction, and, the, modulation, of, p53, tumor, suppressor, activity, by, 'PP2A'])].
[sujeto([p38, 'MAPK', and, 'ATM', were, identified, as, physiological, substrates, of, 'Wip1,', and, we, previously]), verbo([reported]), complemento([a, substrate, motif, that, was, defined, using, variants, of, the, 'p38(180pT', 182, 'pY)', diphosphorylated, 'peptide,', 'TDDEMpTGpYVAT'])].
[sujeto(['However,', the, substrate, recognition, motifs, for, 'Wip1']), verbo([have]), complemento([not, been, fully, defined, as, the, sequences, surrounding, the, targeted, residues, in, 'ATM', and, p38, 'MAPK', appear, to, be, unrelated])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([found]), complemento([that, rWip1, dephosphorylates, phosphoserine, and, phosphothreonine, in, the, 'p(S/T)Q', 'motif,', which, is, an, essential, requirement, for, substrate, recognition])].
[sujeto(['In', 'addition,', 'acidic,', 'hydrophobic,', or, aromatic, amino, acids, surrounding, the, 'p(S/T)Q', sequence]), verbo([have]), complemento([a, positive, 'influence,', while, basic, amino, acids, have, a, negative, influence, on, substrate, dephosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['A', 'three-dimensional', molecular, model, of, 'Wip1', with, a]), verbo([bound]), complemento([substrate, peptide, and, 'site-directed', mutagenesis, analyses, suggested, that, the, important, residues, for, 'ATM(1981pS)', substrate, recognition, are, similar, but, not, identical, to, those, for, the, 'p38(180pT', 182, 'pY)', substrate])].
[sujeto(['Results', from, this, study, should, be, useful, for, predicting, new, physiological, substrates, that, may, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([by, 'Wip1', and, for, developing, selective, anticancer, drugs])].
[sujeto(['Although', the, recently, identified, 'Pirh2', protein, is, known, as, a, 'p53-induced', 'ubiquitin-protein', 'E3', 'ligase,', which, negatively]), verbo([regulates]), complemento(['p53,', the, detailed, mechanism, underlying, the, regulation, of, 'Pirh2', remains, largely, unknown])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, 'Pirh2', appears, to, be]), verbo([regulated]), complemento([through, cell, 'cycle-dependent', mechanism])].
[sujeto(['Together,', our, data]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, phosphorylation, of, 'Pirh2', may, act, as, a, 'fine-tuning', to, maintain, the, balance, of, 'p53-Pirh2', autoregulatory, feedback, 'loop,', which, facilitates, the, tight, regulation, of, p53, stability, and, tumor, suppression])].
[sujeto(['In', this, 'study,', we, examined, the, molecular, mechanisms]), verbo([involved]), complemento([in, the, sensitization, effect, of, luteolin, on, cancer, cell, killing, induced, by, 'cisplatin,', an, important, cancer, chemotherapeutic, agent])].
[sujeto(['First,', we]), verbo([provided]), complemento([evidence, that, the, sensitization, effect, of, luteolin, on, 'cisplatin-induced', apoptosis, is, p53, 'dependent,', as, such, effect, is, only, found, in, p53, 'wild-type', cancer, cells, but, not, in, p53, mutant, cancer, cells])].
[sujeto(['Second,', we, observed, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([of, p53, protein, level, in, 'luteolin-treated', cancer, cells, without, increase, of, p53, mRNA, 'level,', indicating, the, possible, effect, of, luteolin, on, p53, posttranscriptional, regulation])].
[sujeto(['Third,', we, identified, the, critical, role, of, 'c-Jun', 'NH(2)-terminal', kinase, '(', 'JNK)', in, regulation, of, p53, protein, 'stability:', luteolin]), verbo([activates]), complemento(['JNK,', and, 'JNK', then, stabilizes, p53, via, 'phosphorylation,', leading, to, reduced, ubiquitination, and, proteasomal, degradation])].
[sujeto(['Finally,', by, using, an, in, vivo, nude, mice, xenograft, 'model,', we, confirmed, that, luteolin]), verbo([enhanced]), complemento([the, cancer, therapeutic, activity, of, cisplatin, via, p53, stabilization, and, accumulation])].
[sujeto(['In', 'summary,', data, from, this, study]), verbo([reveal]), complemento([a, novel, molecular, mechanism, involved, in, the, anticancer, effect, of, luteolin, and, support, its, potential, clinical, application, as, a, chemosensitizer, in, cancer, therapy])].
[sujeto(['PAC-1', is, an, 'inducible,', 'nuclear-specific,', 'dual-specificity', 'mitogen-activated', protein, '(', 'MAP)', kinase, phosphatase, that]), verbo([has]), complemento([been, shown, recently, to, be, a, transcription, target, of, the, human, 'tumor-suppressor', protein, p53, in, signaling, apoptosis, and, growth, suppression])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we]), verbo([report]), complemento([in, vitro, characterization, of, 'PAC-1', phosphatase, activity, with, three, distinct, 'MAP', kinase, subfamilies])].
[sujeto(['ERK2', dephosphorylation, by, 'PAC-1']), verbo([requires]), complemento([association, of, its, 'amino-terminal', domain, with, 'ERK2', that, results, in, catalytic, activation, of, the, phosphatase])].
[sujeto([p38alpha, also]), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, but, does, not, activate, 'PAC-1,', whereas, 'JNK2', does, not, bind, to, or, cause, catalytic, activation, by, 'PAC-1'])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', our, 'structure-based', analysis]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([that, individual, mutation, of, the, conserved, 'Arg294', and, 'Arg295', that, likely, comprise, the, 'phosphothreonine-binding', pocket, in, 'PAC-1', to, either, alanine, or, lysine, results, in, a, nearly, complete, loss, of, its, phosphatase, activity, even, in, the, presence, of, 'ERK2'])].
[sujeto(['These', results]), verbo([suggest]), complemento([that, 'Arg294', and, 'Arg295', play, an, important, role, in, 'PAC-1', catalytic, activation, induced, by, 'ERK2', binding])].
[sujeto(['Cell', cycle, distribution, analysis, of, 'HepG2', polyclonal, core, positive, cells]), verbo([reveals]), complemento([a, peculiar, accumulation, of, cells, in, 'G2/M', phase])].
[sujeto(['Different', pathways]), verbo([mediate]), complemento(['G2/M', 'arrest:', such, as, p53, and, double, strand, 'RNA', protein, kinase, '(', 'PKR)'])].
[sujeto(['Flow', cytometry, in, 'p53-null', cells, demonstrates, that, p53, plays, only, a, marginal, role, in]), verbo([inducing]), complemento(['HCV', 'core-dependent', 'G2/M', phase, accumulation, that, seems, to, be, significantly, affected, by, the, functional, inactivation, of, 'PKR'])].
[sujeto(['HCC', core, positive, cells, are, characterized, by, a, significant, 'PKR', phosphorylation, in, 'Thr', 446, 'residue,', which]), verbo([leads]), complemento([deregulation, of, mitosis])].
[sujeto(['Moreover,', we, observe, that, the, overexpression, of, the, viral, protein]), verbo([induces]), complemento([an, upregulation, of, 'PKR', 'activity,', which, does, not, correlate, with, an, increased, 'eIF-2', phosphorylation])].
[sujeto(['This', uncommon, behavior, of, 'PKR']), verbo([suggests]), complemento([that, its, activation, by, 'HCV', core, protein, could, involve, alternative, 'PKR-dependent', 'pathways,', implicated, in, 'core-dependent', 'G2/M', accumulation])].
[sujeto(['The', tumor, suppressor, protein, p53]), verbo([mediates]), complemento(['stress-induced', growth, arrest, or, apoptosis, and, plays, a, major, role, in, safeguarding, genome, integrity])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([report]), complemento([on, the, characterization, of, p53, 'C-terminal', phosphorylation, by, 'CHK1', and, 'CHK2,', two, 'serine/threonine', '(', 'Ser/Thr)', protein, 'kinases,', previously, implicated, in, the, phosphorylation, of, the, p53, 'N', terminus])].
[sujeto(['Using', tryptic, phosphopeptide, 'mapping,', we]), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, six, additional, 'CHK1', and, 'CHK2', sites, residing, in, the, final, 100, amino, acids, of, p53])].
[sujeto(['Phosphorylation', of, at, least, three, of, these, 'sites,', 'Ser366,', 'Ser378,', and, 'Thr387,', was]), verbo([induced]), complemento([by, 'DNA', 'damage,', and, the, induction, at, 'Ser366', and, 'Thr387', was, abrogated, by, small, interfering, 'RNA', targeting, chk1, and, chk2])].

[sujeto(['The', 'cancer-specific', expression, of, 'Survivin,', a, member, of, the, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, family, of, 'proteins,', coupled, with, its, importance, in]), verbo([inhibiting]), complemento([cell, death, and, in, regulating, cell, 'division,', makes, it, a, target, for, cancer, treatment])].
[sujeto(['We', also, observed, that, 'UV-B', exposure, to, 'NHEK', resulted, in, significant, '(', 1, ')']), verbo([decrease]), complemento([in, 'Smac/DIABLO', and, '(', 2, ')', increase, in, p53])].
[sujeto(['UV-B', treatment, resulted, in, a, significant]), verbo([increase]), complemento([in, protein, or, mRNA, levels, '(', or, 'both)', of, 'Survivin,', 'phospho-Survivin', and, p53, and, a, concomitant, decrease, in, 'Smac/DIABLO', in, mouse, skin])].
[sujeto(['This', study, 'demonstrated,', for, the, first, 'time,', the, involvement, of, 'Survivin', '(', and, the, associated, 'events)', in, 'UV-B', response, in, vitro, and, in, vivo, in, experimental, models, regarded, to]), verbo([have]), complemento([relevance, to, human, situations])].
[sujeto(['Here,', we, demonstrate, that, 'PPM1D']), verbo([interacts]), complemento([with, the, nuclear, isoform, of, uracil, 'DNA', 'glycosylase,', 'UNG2,', and, suppresses, base, excision, repair, '(', 'BER)'])].
[sujeto(['We']), verbo([have]), complemento([identified, 'UNG2', phosphorylation, sites, at, threonines, 6, and, 126, that, exhibit, enhanced, phosphorylation, following, 'UV', irradiation])].

[sujeto(['Survivin', is, a, member, of, the, inhibitor, of, apoptosis, gene, family, that, is]), verbo([expressed]), complemento([in, most, human, cancers, and, may, facilitate, evasion, from, apoptosis, and, aberrant, mitotic, progression])].

[sujeto(['(', 'ABSTRACT', 'TRUNCATED', 'AT', 400, 'WORDS)', 'Using', a, new, model, of, a, reversible, pancreatic, fistula, which, allows, the, 'long-term-investigation', under, nearly, physiological, conditions, on, the, unrestrained, 'dog,', we, tested, the, effect, of, somatostatin, '(', 50, 'micrograms),', calcitonin, '(', 4, 'micrograms),', glucagon, '(', 1, 'microgram),', and, prostaglandin, 'E1', '(', 150, 'micrograms)', on, the, exocrine, pancreatic, function, in, 45, experiments, over, a, period, of, 13, 'h:', 'SST']), verbo([inhibits]), complemento([the, basal, as, well, as, the, secretin, or, 'CCK-stimulated', 'secretion:', calcitonin, shows, inhibition, of, the, stimulated, secretion, 'only;', glucagon, blocks, the, 'secretin-stimulated', pancreatic, 'function;', and, 'PGE1', reduces, the, bicarbonate, concentration, and, trypsin, output, in, secretin, 'stimulation,', but, in, one, of, the, two, series, it, stimulates, the, basal, secretion])].
